name: Library Room 1 Rambla Catalunya
summary: Library Room (20m2 ) , shared room with 4 beds. You will have a bed for yourself, but you may have another guest sharing the room with you. The towel is not included in this room. You have the possibility to rent one for € 2 We offer breakfast only coffee and a variety of teas that you can drink throughout the day.
space: Modernist apartment 300 m2, with high ceilings , mosaic floors and a beautiful terrace . We rented a bed in a shared room of 5 beds, a modernist building in 1900 with Sunny Balcony . Enjoy Barcelona to be at the heart of the city , located in the most chic area of Barcelona , near La Pedrera and Casa Batllo , in the main city center . This modernist apartment is an excellent  place filled with spaces , so you can relax after a long day visist the city.

You have the possibility to rent one for € 2 We offer breakfast only coffee and a variety of teas that you can drink throughout the day. neighborhood_overview: This stunning neighborhood esta literally in the center of a whole . You are within walking distance of the famous Ramblas , an un walk from the old town 's Gothic and Born . Also very close to Gaudi's Casa Batllo and and the famous Sagrada Familia, a must visit if you do sightseeing in the city . If you simply want to shop and eat , you could find everything you need in Passeig de Gracia
notes: If there is anything else you would like to ask, please contact me , I would be very happy to help ! And anyway , I would appreciate if you could contact me with a little message before booking , even if it is just for showing up! Thank you !
transit: From the airport train comes in Paseo de Gracia this is five minutes from the apartment cake To visit the places most emblematic of Barcelona: it is best to walk. The apartment is 5 minutes from the stop Diagonal green line ( L3) .
access: access to the kitchen for breakfast and dinner . - Refrigerator - Microwave - Coffee - Toaster Access to the terrace Access to all areas of the house
interaction: We will do our best to make your holiday a real pleasure. With the hope that you enjoy your stay with us.
house_rules: Respect the rest of the residents of the building. No smoking at home (you can only smoke on the terrace) People are not allowed younger than 20 years No guests without request Washing can be used under agreement with the host, cleaning including the price is 5 euros Please make sure to turn off all the lights and the fan when not in your room. Towels are provided on arrival, but should not be used on the beach, bring your own beach towels. Avoid making loud noise or music playing late at night. Access to the kitchen allows, please make sure the kitchen sink clear of dishes immediately after meals. Cooked or open canned food etc., should be wrapped in plastic film available before storing in the refrigerator. Do not store any food out of the kitchen area, including inside the cloth hangers in the bedroom. You are allowed to eat and drink in the kitchen only, not on beds or furniture. We invite you to have a bottle of water on the floor next to his bed, but do not bring drinks beside th

host.host_about:
Soy una persona extrovertida, servicial y amiga de mis amigos. Soy realista y muy positiva; para mi no hay problemas, hay soluciones.
No puedo vivir sin mis amigos y familia.
Y no hay nada mejor que una cerveza bien fría en una terraza. Disfruto mucho de los domingos de barbacoas y paellas con amigos y familia.
Practico cualquier deporte: esquiar, patinar, atletismo, deporte de aventura, montar a caballo, el baile...... Soy una persona muy activa y que no sabe estar quieta y me desespero cuando no tengo nada que hacer.

reviews.comments: Karla was a great, super friendly host and the apartment and the Library room was very spacious, very clean, and stylish. The location is also excellent in the heart of Gracia and right next to metro station Diagonal. A sunny terrace lets you enjoy the sunn weather. I felt very comfortable and I would recommend a stay at Karla's place anyone!
esta es la tercera vez que regreso al piso de Karla y bueno me gusta mucho este lugar, es agradable y limpio. Karla esta muy atenta a cualquier necesidad, muy maja, 100% recomiendo.
Good place Karla is Nice and everything is clean.
Karla fue muy hospitalaria y de gran ayuda en todo momento. La recomiendo 100%

I had a really nice experience at Karla's place. The flat is located in a strategic point where you can easily access any (touristic) part of the city even by walking, and the price is reasonable (cheap, really). Karla and her family are very kind and willing to help you with everything you may need. You can have access to a well equipped kitchen, and everything in the place is clean. As there were several people in the flat when I stood, it seemed a little like a hostel, but for me it was not a disadvantage but the opposite: we had nice talks and we made friends. But if you are looking for a more private place, probably this may not be the one.
Friendly host. The place was clean and it was a good place to meet people.

Super cómodo, te sientes como en tu propia casa. Karla siempre esta a disposición para ayudarte y es una persona super chevere! Tiene espacios excelentes para pasar el rato si no quieres estar paseando por Barcelona. Lo recomiendo bastante :)
Very accommodating, nice clean place. In a very nice part of the city. Great for a short stay
Very good,  Karla is so nice. I arrived with my bike. She gave me a lot of help. Nice place with really nice host. Strongly recommend!
Karla fue una excelente anfitrion. Las personas que conocí en el lugar fueron muy agradables. Volvería a ir.

The apartment is very big and I got a room with four beds in it. The check-in went well. The bathroom was clean, but the door was broken and thus very loud when opening at night. My room was clean, just as the sheets. However the bunk bed was creaking very easily, just moving made a loud noise, so that sleeping was very hard. 
Karla was very friendly when asking her if I could change from sleeping on the top of the bunk bed to the bottom. 
The location was quite central and not far away from bus or metro.

Karla est très sympathique, bien qu'elle ne parle que l'anglais. Cependant, il s'agit plus d'un hostel qu'un appartement... Nous étions au moins 10. Il n'y a qu'une seule salle de bain, donc fallait s'y prévoir. Le wifi n'a jamais fonctionné, ni pour moi, ni pour mon amie...Sinon en général c'est très propre et il y a une cuisine complète. L'appartement est aussi très bien situé: près du quartier gothique et des casa de Gaudi, facilement joignable en métro. Cependant, demander bien l'adresse à Karla avant de vous y rendre, pcq air bnb ne m'a pas fourni la bonne, donc j'ai dû chercher.

If you're looking for a backpackers hostel this is perfect. The room has five beds (not four). Due to being on a busy road it was quite noisy.  Karla was welcoming when I arrived and I didn't see her again.

The apartment is located in a great part of the city, very close to diagonal metro station which makes it easy to get around. The apartment itself is not as pretty, I think it looks better in the pictures but if you're only looking to sleep it will be just fine. There is only one bathroom which wasn't a problem when I was there but there weren't many people staying there at the time.

Muy buena experiencia con Karla, excelente ubicación y muy buenas instalaciones, lo único negativo fue el ruido que se oía e la calle pero digamos que eso no depende del anfitrión, volvería a hospedarme allí, gracias por todo!

Karls's flat is amazing, it's very big, very spacious, very clean and very comfortable. The location is perfect. You have hot water, wifi and a big terrace. The room is nice and cozy, inside you've got a fan, big windows. Price is reasonable. I look forward to staying again!

It is a spacious house where i met really nice people. Though the wifi conection is really hard to get it specially when there is +14 people trying to connect with it.
For some reason one day the host decided to blame me for the dirt in the house (which wasn't done by me, definitely). The fridge was full of food too, I can barely put my food on it, it's like a puzzle.
I look forward to come back to Barcelona but in a different hostel.
Good.

Thank you Karla, Paulina really enjoyed to stay at your place.
She had a very good time and recommendations to visit the city.
We'll come again !

Karla was pleasant and allowed me keep my bags at her place while I went out to see the city one last time. Her hostel is very centrally located and close tto lots of tourist sites. Only thing is, I thought I had coordinated my early arrival with her, but I think we had a problem ofmiscommunication. She was not very happy to see me on arrival as I had woken her up, although I thought she was well aware of my early arrival. Also, more outlets would be great! Otherwise,   not a bad stay at all!
Very very nice! I loved it to live here for a few days. I will come again !
Nice apartment, great location and friendly host
Ha sido un buen tiempo en Karlas apartamento, muy bien por encontrar nuevas personas:) karla era muy amable y servicial. Gracias!
Très bon rapport qualité prix. L'appartement est spacieux. Il fonctionne comme une auberge de jeunesse.

I had had great time at Karla's. Such a friendly house full of kind people an in depth great neighbourhood to boot
Karla's English is pretty good bu it boulder definitely help if you spoke some Spanish. 
I felt very welcome there and even spent a few nights with her family (who taught me how to play rummy), but also felt free to be in my own an use the space a my own.
I never felt that my possessions were at risk and left them unsupervised sometimes for a full day at a time. No loss at all.
Overall, had a great time and would definitely go back.

Estuve como  en mi casa. Muy acogedora pero sin peso. 
Karla es muy profesional 
Lugar de ubicación ideal. Clientela muy simpática, buena simpatía entre todos. 
Volveré.
great location,clean and very friendly  a bit noise
Great...

Karla fue super amable y el lugar está muy bien ubicado en un lindo edificio viejo y muy espacioso.
Altamente recomendable !!

Karla es muy simpatica y agradable. Me ha recivido con atencion y el piso le falta nada. Fui aqui solo para una noche, por eso no he disfrutado muchisimo el atmosfera pero tengo el sentido que eso es un lugar muy carismatico con simple gente y por eso proxima vez volveré a este piso. Karla is nice, she hosted me with many atention and the flat is missing nothing. I was there just for a night so I didn't really enjoyed the place but I had the feeling that this is a really charaismatic atmosphere with simple people and that's why I will come back there for my next trip in barcelona.
Karla is very welcoming and made you feel you can ask her anything you need.

Karla es una excelente anfitriona me recibió a la llegada y me dio un recorrido por la casa explicándome todo. La ubicación del departamento es muy buna puedes llegar en tren fácilmente desde el aeropuerto.

Well I have been stay in this apartment of 4 bed dormitory for 8days. I found that the host was not as helpful as what she looks like in the picture.The first impression of the night I check-in was that I don't feel myself welcomed! And the host didn't mention this is a mixed dormitory (mixed gender) in their homepage. I was pretty freak out the first night finding there was a man besides me. I wonder is it a normal practice of not stating clearly in Europe countries, but we have totally different policy in listing in Asia. I was thinking to move the second day but find another Asian gal just check in, and she leave on the same day as me, so then I stay for the rest days. The only thing I like is the location. It is convenient. So if you are not care about the unpleasant feeling of sharing room with the opposite gender and rudely treated by the host. You can then consider.
Muy bien todo

La habitación es exactamente como se muestra en la foto. Camas cómodas, habitación muy limpia. El piso es grande, se puede usar la cocina y te dan té y café. Tiene una terraza gigante muy agradable. Karla es muy amable y te explica todo muy bien. Volvería sin dudas. Recomendable!

very good hodtel! it's located in the city center, has kitchen with fridge, gas-stove, microwave oven. Carla is very hospitable person. And there are only 4 beds in rooms, so you can sleep pretty well)

Todo genial, karla súper atenta, corre todo el día, pero cuando tiene un momento para hablar te puede ayudar en lo que quieras. Como es un hostal se podría tener un poco más de onda. Pero si tú interés está en conocer y recorrer todo el día como yo. Queda perfecto. Volvería siempre a este mismo Lucas. La ubicación es increíble todo queda cerca
De bedden zijn prima in orde. Verder is het leuk dat je bij Karla en haar kinderen in de huiskamer kunt zitten. De ligging is aan de rand van Gràcia, een wijk die mijn hart gestolen heeft.

La ubicación de esta habitación es genial, fue muy fácil desplazarme por toda la ciudad desde este punto ya que está bien conectada con las líneas del metro. En general la casa de Karla es muy limpia y linda, la recomiendo totalmente.
Excelente, acogedor y buen trata por Karla..
This is a great location and the price was fair. This place was hard to find and it was difficult to get a response from the host.

Muy bien y muy silencio.
Gracias
Muy bueno!! 100% recomendable.
Karla ha sido una estancia cómoda y confortable. La terraza es un detallazo☺
Relación calidad/precio acordes
It is close to the Metro to get any within Barcelona!

Like in family place, it was perfect ! 
I will back!

Thank you Karla
Estancia cómoda, no estuvimos mucho tiempo en la casa, solo para dormir, pero piso grande comunicado con más habitaciones.
Excelente atención, los servicios están muy completos.
Excelente estadia, muy buen sitio, cerca de todo, muy agradable y excelente relacion precio servicio. Karla es muy amable y servicial, no tuve problema alguno durante mi corta estadia.

Karla's place is lovely, and located in a great area. I enjoyed how convenient it was to get around, with the metro and many shops and restaurants being a short walk away. Her place does host  quite a few people at a time, but you would never notice with how clean everything is! I enjoyed meeting the other people also staying in the room.  As I was on a budget, this economic and beautiful apartment was perfect for me. Would definitely recommend.

Karla and the place was good. I didn't have a problem with one bathroom for too many people. Bathroom was clean and usually available. Equipment in kitchen and cleanliness of them was also fine. But I think that there are some rules which are modifiable like "terrace will be closed after 22pm because of not disturbing neighbours" and "dont open the windows of rooms which are facing the road". But they are not very important if you will stay for short time.

Es fácil llegar y encontrar el alojamiento. Es muy centrico en uno de los barrios más bonitos de Barcelona.
Hay un buen ambiente en el hostal. Karla te ayuda en lo que te hace falta.
The stay at Karlas house was very nice. I met a lot of friendly people and in the evenings I enjoyed to relax together with others at the big terrace of the flat.
Me he sentido muy cómoda y si vuelvo a Barcelona me gustaría alojarme de nuevo ahí.

Esta bien comunicado por transporte. 
Tiene una terraza grande que está muy bien. 
El único problema es que solo hay un servicio y una ducha para todos por lo demás bien. 
Es de agradecer que pude usar la casa a excepción de la cama hasta las 9 de la noche que me fui. Así pude hacer lo que quise por Barcelona sin llevar maletas a cuestas. 
Gracias
Karla is a great person! It was a short stay at Karla´s place. Very clean and friendly environment, she was very helpful and everything was perfect. Thank you so much!
Karla muy buena anfitriona, está por todo.
Muy central, fácil accesso y adecuado por corto tiempo
Nice apartment and very central. I found everything clean and very reasonable for the price. Karla was very sweet and she and Peter were very helpful when my phone got stolen. Thank you so much!
Great location.
One of the cheapest accommodation in the city, there's nothing much to be expected. Aside from not enough electrical slots and only one bathroom, it was a confortable stay.

Was a bit hard and confusing to find the place because the address listed on the website is just the road instead of the place itself. Other than that, it was a great stay. Centrally located, kind hosts, very smooth.

The location of this place was fabulous! Walking distance to a lot of things, bars, clubs, attractions, bus lines, subway line, etc. Not the sort of hostel in which you hang out with the other travels, it's more quiet and for keeping to yourself it seems. But it was a very nice place.
Karla was really very nice and the place very clean and near to public transport . I recommend it !
Excelente todo ! No me puedo quejar de nada.
조용해서 너무 좋았어요
Great place where I met people from all over the world, in a fantastic neighborhood

Karla hat mich super in Empfang genommen. Hat mir alles gezeigt, wo ich was finde. Die Zimmer sind sauber. Ein kleiner Nachteil, es gibt für alle nur ein Badezimmer. Tip von mir, wer Frühaufsteher ist sollte morgens duschen gehen. :-) Das Hostel, ich nenne es mal so, liegt perfekt an der Metro, L3. Von da aus erreicht ihr alles. Ob mit der Metro oder zu Fuß. 
Ich hatte eine wunderbare Zeit bei Karla und würde immer wieder kommen. :-)

Muy buena comunicación. Anfitriona de confianza, ubicación perfecta. Compartes habitacion, así que tienes que ir c (Email hidden by Airbnb) pensa la gran terraza y la estupenda ubicación, para pasar unos días está bien.
it was a great experience , thanks for hosting

Hi, thanks for the amazing time in your flat, Karla. 
It was the perfect place for me to stay in Barcelona and enjoy the city and the people. 
Karla s place feel s like big open minded community and you will find interesting people. 
Thanks a lot for the wonderful days, see you again. 
Toni

This place is run like a hostel and is more expensive than any of the hostels if you can book your hostel stay early enough. Moreover the location is not the best and you need to take metro to get to the major attractions. I booked another Airbnb in Barcelona for a little more (10 euros per night) and had a room to myself. This place had a rank smell, was dusty and the kitchen and bathrooms had mould. There are in fact three rooms with bunk beds, and they add you to any of the beds randomly. I was asked to give two euros the next day for the towel when this wasn't informed when given a towel. The person who asked for the two euros started to swear when I politely told him I didn't have the exact change. I only had 1 euro and thirty cents, which he took, with an attitude after he stalked off swearing, before I checked out. The only good thing was that I could check in at 1am, like any other hostel. I would not recommend this place to anyone.

The hostel is simple with a quiet atmosphere where I met some great people. It is just a straight line up the road from where the busses from the airport arrive so there is no room for error in going between them.
This place is located near city centre. Karla, the host, is very nice and the terrace is really good to talk, smoke and eat.
El lugar es idéal para ir a conocer Barcelona. La ubicación es estupenda, ya que puedes llegar a los sitios turisiticos caminando.
Personne adorable et très chaleureuse.Ambiance conviviale , très bon rapport qualité prix
Basically like a hostel. Nice location!
Karla es atenta y hospitalaria. Disfruté mucho la estadía.
Everything is good!

The flat is in a perfect spot. It could no be better. You have all activities and meetings close by, the metro and supermarkets. And it is still not so touristic. 
All is nice and I can recommend the flat. Breakfast was not included. There is only one bathroom for the guests. 
For the check it better call Karla two or one hour before arrival to make sure she is there.
You will definitely enjoy your stay in Barcelona if you stay here, it will get hard to find a better and cheaper option.

The place is generally pretty nice: good location being in walk proximity to many sightseeings, bus stop and metro station. The host Karla is also very responsive and helpful. The only thing that the hostel is situated very close to one of main city roads so noise from cars was heard until the midnight. Overall, I'd recommend it to young people who like active neighborhood.

위치 좋음. 구글맵으로 찾아보니 20번지가 아니라 17번지라 30분장도 헤맸다. 한방에 5명 2개의 벙크침대와 1개의 싱글침대가 있고 큰 장롱에 자물쇠로 귀중품 보관가능. 콘센트2개밖에 없어서 눈치게임. 욕실은 다른방 사람들과 같이 써야함. 1개로는 부족하다고생각함.수건제공 안함(2유로) 아침식사 (온니 커피와 티) 호스트가 불친절함. 처음 도착해서 집안구조만 설명해주고 봐도 인사도 안하고 인사를 해도 띠꺼움 ㅡㅡ ㅋ 위치는 카사바트요와 카서밀라 도보로 10분, 카탈루냐 광장 도보로 20분.. 마트 도보 1분. 위치는 상당히 좋음.
La ubicación es buena, pues esta cerca de varias rutas de transporte, pero si te gusta caminar tampoco esta muy lejos de los puntos de interés de Barcelona.
Todo genial, la limpieza impecable, la ubicación lo mejor! Si sos de caminar, vas a poder llegar caminando a los mejores lugares de interés! La cama cómoda y todos en general buena onda!
Es un lugar excelentemente ubicado ya que tiene rápido acceso a la sagrada familia, muy cerca de la pedrera y la casa batlló
Todo perfecto. Muy recomendable y un trato muy amable y rápido.
Excelente relación precio calidad, el alojamiento esta muy bien ubicado y karla es muy atenta.

Es un edificio antiguo pero bonito, conservado, con elevador aunque no puedes tomarlo ya que solo se detiene en pisos pares, pero por estar en un primero piso no es tan pesado subir por las escaleras, las puertas de los cuartos son pesadas pero que mejor que ejecutar los brazos durante tu estancia. Un bonito lugar.
Perfect and beautiful space

El lugar es genial! Esta en el corazón de Barcelona, es limpio, tranquilo y muy bien organizado. Además esta muy bien comunicado con el transporte público. 
Karla siempre estuvo al pendiente si necesitaba ayuda con algo y en general todo ha salido de maravilla. 
Muy recomendable !
Its a nice cozy place, owners are nice, in center and cheap.
El lugar es muy lindo! Con una excelente ubicación y Karla es muy amable!
Todo ok
Great

Un lugar con cierto encanto. Armario con llave donde dejar las pertenencias. Una agradable terraza. Un baño para todos los huéspedes (el piso tendrá capacidad para unas 20 personas) se queda corto. Karla es encantadora.

La relacion precio calidad es muy buena. Es un alojamiento muy practico, la ubicacion es excelente. La limpieza tambien. Tiene una cocina muy equipada y una terraza muy linda. Es una buena alternativa al hostel. Porque podes tener tranquilidad e intimidad y a la vez compartir momentos con otros viajeros.

I had a great time in Barcelona staying at Karla’s place!

The location was perfect with walking distances to practically everything
The layout with the terrass and the common rooms was also very nice and made it extremely easy to meet new people - something that I value highly
Karla, the host was also extremely quick and good at responding making everything a lot easier

There are only two things I was a little dissapointed with 
First of all the fans were not nearly good enough to keep the room cool and so it was quite hard to fall asleep at times
Also something that isnt mentioned online is that you will have to share a bathroom (toilet and shower) with around 10 people so if you all get up at the same time there will be a long queue

All in all, I’d say its definitely worth a stay - Especially if you are travelling on your own and want to meet new people to explore the city with!
Everything was excellent, the accommodation is spacious and in a very good area. The only negative - just one shower for a fairly large number of people.
Ottimo posto e ottima la posizione
Hermoso lugar, instalaciones cómodas y excelente ubicación.
Good stay!
It was great! Met some nice people but there is more rooms than you think
Hôte très chaleureuse, à l’écoute des voyageurs et disponible. Elle s’adapte aux voyageurs. Appartement très bien situé en ville.
I went to the place and rang the bell but no one responded so I had to walk for two hour to get internet and contact her, she told me that sometimes she doesn't hear to the bell.
Excelente ubicación, camas cómodas y buena comunicación con la host!
Recommend! really nice place with big terrace <3. Great location and really nice and clean place. Will go there next time if would visit Barcelona.
Respuesta rápida, ante la poca antelación de la reserva
Excelente ubicación acceso fácil y hermoso lugar regresaría siempre!

name: Waikoloa Beach Villas C1.  Hilton Pool Pass Included in 2019
summary: 3 Bedroom Waikoloa Beach Villa with Hilton Pool Pass for up to 6 guests at a time thru  2019, Swimming Pool, Hot Tub & More!
space: Waikoloa Beach Villa C1 is sprawled out over 2,200 square feet and features three bedrooms, three full bathrooms and comfortably accommodates up to eight guests. The villa includes the Hilton Waikoloa Pool Pass for stays in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  From the front porch, guests enter the home where there is a warm and inviting living room, with cozy furnishings surrounding a large flat screen TV. The well-equipped kitchen is made for entertaining, and offers high-end appliances, a breakfast bar with seats for four, and the dining area with seats for six. Just outside the living room is a covered lanai with a built-in BBQ and a dining table for four guests.  Located upstairs is the master suite and and a junior suite both with private bathrooms. There is a comfortable king-size bed, a private balcony with amazing views, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and double vanities off the master bedroom. The junior suite  has a queen-size bed and a private bathroom with a tub
description: 3 Bedroom Waikoloa Beach Villa with Hilton Pool Pass for up to 6 guests at a time thru (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , Swimming Pool, Hot Tub & More! Waikoloa Beach Villa C1 is sprawled out over 2,200 square feet and features three bedrooms, three full bathrooms and comfortably accommodates up to eight guests. The villa includes the Hilton Waikoloa Pool Pass for stays in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  From the front porch, guests enter the home where there is a warm and inviting living room, with cozy furnishings surrounding a large flat screen TV. The well-equipped kitchen is made for entertaining, and offers high-end appliances, a breakfast bar with seats for four, and the dining area with seats for six. Just outside the living room is a covered lanai with a built-in BBQ and a dining table for four guests. neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds. The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.
notes: Inquire about our concierge services for dinning and golf reservations, activities and grocery shopping  Please Note: due to property and association by-laws the maximum occupancy listed is the maximum occupancy that is allowed in the property regardless of age of the guests. GENERAL TERMS, RESTRICTIONS & DISCLOSURES: The general terms, conditions and disclosures which apply to this property include, but are not limited to, the following: The "House Rules" for each complex are located in the informational binder in your vacation rental. Upon arrival, please make sure to familiarize with and adhere to the "House Rules". 1.) BEACHES: All beaches in Hawaii are public; there are no privately-owned beaches. Private property begins at the high tide mark or at the commencement of the vegetation line. 2.) OCEAN WARNING: Ocean swimming has certain inherent risks. Wave and current conditions and dangerous sea creatures vary from area to area, day to day and season to season. Risk and responsibil
transit: Rental car recommended
access: - Hilton Pool Pass for up to 6 guests at a time for stays thru 2019 - 2 Swimming Pools - 2 Hot Tubs - Fitness Room - 3 Bedrooms - 3 Bathrooms - Sleeps 8 - Gourmet Kitchen - High-End Appliances - Air Conditioning - Linens  - Beach Towels - Multiple Flat Screen TVs - Cable TV in living room (bedrooms have roku device) - High Speed Wireless Internet - Ceiling Fans - Telephone Service - Washer & Dryer - Large Terrace - Private Balcony in Master Bedroom - Outdoor Dining & Living - 2+ Beach Chairs - 2+ Boogie Boards - 1 Portable Ice Cooler - Gas BBQ Grill & at both Pools - 1 Car Garage - Concierge Service - Non-Smoking
interaction: Our office is open M-F 8:30-4:30. We are located in the Waikoloa Beach Resort - you are welcome to come by and meet our team! Available for emergency assistance 24/7
house_rules: Yes, there are House Rules. Basics are; Quiet hours from 10pm- 8 am, no parties, no smoking, no articles of clothing or beach gear on lanai, no glass at the pool. If you have specific questions or concerns, please ask. The complete condensed rules are posted in each unit.

host.host_about:
Aloha!
We have had the pleasure of hosting thousands and thousands of guests since 2006. We have built beautiful relationships with our returning guests and love to share the "aloha" with all of our guests.
We look forward to building our relationship with Air BnB!

reviews.comments: 别墅性价比超高,三个卧室都各自配有卫生间,还有泳池,超市就在对面,有厨房,可以自己煮饭,离海边也非常近,一家人住真的是非常合适,推荐

The house is just perfect. There was everything there to have a fab holiday. We ran out of gas and the bottle was exchanged within 20 min of calling the Resortica people. We had a little trouble with the Drive-in Gate but we found a way to work it. My family and I had a wonderful stay and would love to come again.
Great stay. The place is spacious and beautiful. Felt like a palace for the 5 of us. Within walking distance of shops and restaurants but still quiet and secluded.
Had a ton of fun with our family during Christmas here. Very relaxing!
Great location, everything you need for a beach day is waiting for you! (Towels, sand toys, chairs, snorkeling equipment, coolers, umbrellas, etc.)

This place is awesome for a family. Plenty of space, beautiful area, very close to shopping center, restaurants and beach. We were able to use the Hilton Pass a few times to enjoy the dolphins and their pools.  This place has plenty of amenities such as towels, outdoor play gear like (Hidden by Airbnb) s, boogie board, cooler etc... I am giving it 4.5 stars only because some of their furniture are wearing out. Like the chairs in dinning room, the sofa by the TV and the master bed. Other than that was a perfect place. Hope you get to enjoy it! Ah and remember don't leave any towels outside hanging! this was a bit challenging because I don't like sand inside the place and I rather air them out first. Mahalo :-)
We really like the house, the host provides all necessary supplies, which is very considerate, rooms are clean, we had a really nice vacation with this place!
Nice place

We (6 middle-aged couples) were in Villa C1 at Waikaloa Beach Villas for 14 days  - a great villa at this complex  in all respects. Loved it. We went to celebrate retirements, birthdays, relax and enjoy each others company and this complex provided us such an ideal opportunity to do so compared to the often crowded hotel resorts. This C1 villa has absolutely everything you need including heaps of beach gear in garage. We didn't want to spend $'s eating out each night and the really well appointed kitchen and BBQ allowed us to cook our own meals when we wished.  C1 is 10 metres from one of the the complexes 2 pools. Queens Market Place over road and Kings up the road, golf clubs in walking distance and ample walking opportunities. The community is compact from the Waikaloa Villas at one end to the Hilton Resort at  the other. The WBV's provide a pass to the Hilton to use their pools- we used and just well worth having a look at this complex complete with its own monorail!! We had a rental to do some day touring and beach visits. While there is a food store at Queen's its expensive so a short drive (15 mins) to the larger store at Waikoloa Village well worth it. Eat out options average at Queens and the nearby Kings Market Places, but we found Sansei Seafood, Steak and Sushi Bar at Queens superb - but you need to book. Most bars have happy hour (50% on beers and house wines from 3-6). We found beach front Lava Lava Beach Club by far the best here for ambiance, drinks and food-try the pulled pork sliders! and the marvellous sunset too and turtles came ashore  for the night. Hapuna Beach the best but need to take own chairs and umbrellas (from the garage). We did an 11 hour day trip with tour company to other side of island to see the volcanoes - much of the flora and fauna shown we have in NZ  but the lava glow/aura we saw at night was stunning. Trip was expensive but included a lunch and seated dinner - value for money ?? but we went to see the volcanoes and weren't disappointed.  Discount available if you want to sit through a Hilton presentation (no thanks).
We've been fortunate to travel worldly. In terms of relaxation this was the best. Two weeks without rain and 29-32 deg temps - heaven!   We're already planning a return in 2018! Just leave us a 10 day window please!

This place was as described and was a fantastic place to call home for a week. Very clean and large. Great beach nearby next to the mariott and all kinds of beach stuff to use which was a bonus. Also the Hilton pass for the week was an awesome addition as we made use of it 3 times. Great luah at the Marriott for those interested in that as very close by. I would stay here again.

My parents live in Hawaii and we have never had the opportunity to take our three kids to visit, this was our first shot.  Our youngest is affected with autism which adds a layer of anxiety because we wanted to make sure he was in a safe, comfortable and calm environment.
Your house was not only beautiful and in a great location, but it was so warm, safe and inviting for all of my children and our entire family.  The garage was packed with everything you need to enjoy venturing into Hawaii and the bathrooms, beds and kitchen were clean, comfortable and sticked with everything we needed to start a new family tradition.
I would recommend this to any family traveling to Hawaii and who are worried about their kids being comfortable.  We were a two minute walk to the beach and hotel pools.  Then able to escape the hotel chaos.
Thank you.

Wonderful place.   We went with a family of 5 including a few little ones.   The proximity to great beaches, shops, pools and access the Hilton resort were all perfect for us.   Everything was exceptionally clean and well equipped. Thanks for helping make our first trip to the Big Island memorable and wonderful.    I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this property.

name: Confortable apartment in BCN- WIFI
summary: Confortable apartment in the center of Barcelona, great location!
description: Confortable apartment in the center of Barcelona, great location! Service expenses are not included in the price. WIFI, Internet included in the price.
notes: Service expenses are not included in the price. WIFI, Internet included in the price.
house_rules: Salida del apartamento 12 horas. Check in 15 horas. Piso NO FUMADOR! Los gastos de servicios NO están incluidos en el precio. Fast WIFI, Internet esta incluido en el precio. La finca tiene ascensor

reviews.comments: Очень оперативные и гостеприимные хозяева - написали поздно ночью, в обед уже заселились. Квартира абсолютно новая и со вкусом и дорого обставлена, есть вся необходимая техника (кроме стиральной машины, под которую есть выход - может появится позже). Район очень аутентичный и симпатичный, за 20-30 минут пешком с коляской можно добраться до центра. Для голодных прямо в соседней двери есть очень хорошая бургерная, которую рекомендуют путеводители. Нам понравилось.

Great place. Great neighborhood and great host. Apartment has everything that suppose to have. Its a re-modelled and brand new place. Everything is how it was described on the listing and the host met at the time we suppose to and the time we agreed on. I didn't meet Sebastian but I did meet his wife Vanina. She is super cool.
Apto bem mobiliado , tudo novo internamente .
Great stay!

We really enjoyed staying at Pablo's place. He was very accommodating to our early arrival and helped out with last minute suggestions to print a boarding pass! The apt was comfortable for 3 people. The bathroom was a bit small for all of us and the shower fixtures kept sticking. Overall though the apt was nice and clean. Would definitely recommend!
We had a great stay. Clean, modern apartment in a great location

La estadía estuvo genial! La ubicación perfecta. Con el metro la línea L3 en 10’ estás en plaza Catalunya y esta misma línea te conecta con la L9 que te lleva al aeropuerto. En 20’ a pie llegas al puerto. El departamento es espacioso, cómodo y en muy buen estado, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. El único inconveniente que tuvimos la última semana fue que tras una lluvia fuerte, se inundó el departamento porque la cañería del patio estaba tapada. Dentro de la semana resolvieron el problema. 
Muy recomendable!
Muy bien ubicado. El Barrio es muy lindo.

The apartment is very nice and is perfect located. We stayed with our Baby for one month. 
Great place to learn crawling too!:-) 
All in all we enjoyed our stay. And Pablo‘s daughter - who took care of us - is very nice. In comparison to other hosts Pablo or his daughter do not use many words in their communication or give more information than needed. But it‘s ok if you like that.

Excelente anfitrión, super atento, cálido y pendiente de mis necesidades, especialmente en la ola de frío extremo de la "bestia del Este", que de inmediato me trajo un refuerzo de calefacción para combatir temperaturas nada habituales en Barcelona. Todo el confort en un ambiente más que agradable. Rodeado de sitios para poder proveerse de todo a cualquier hora y a un paso del metro y 8 minutos de Ramblas. Una maravilla!!
Excelente localização.

name: ''Right on the beach on Maui''.
summary: ''Right on the Beach'' is no exaggeration. Wake up in our cute apartment and take a beach-walk, on over a mile of quiet, practically deserted, white sand beaches lined with groves of coconut palms.  Then enjoy our pool or relax in your own Jacuzzi.
space: Aloha and welcome to our listing. We have to warn you, our condo is unique. As you see in the photo's, there are few places where you can step out onto your living room lanai and run towards a near-deserted beach.  This is a place where you relax and relish the peace of the waves softly lapping on the shore while you watch the whales and a phenomenal sunset. Our beach is part of Maui's turtle sanctuary; many of our guests have encounters, swimming or on a beach walk with Aikane, the quintessential Hawaiian green turtle.  Take a dip in the pool or enjoy a scented bath in your own private Jacuzzi.  Share a drink and have some pupu's; (small kine snack), and enjoy the 180 degree sunset every night from the comfort of your own lanai. After a day on the beach, our fully equipped kitchen is  and ready for you to serve a fabulous al-fresco dinner under the stars, on your own, private lanai. Or prepare a delicious BBQ dinner on one of our barbecue’s steps away from your unit. Maybe you prefer
description: ''Right on the Beach'' is no exaggeration. Wake up in our cute apartment and take a beach-walk, on over a mile of quiet, practically deserted, white sand beaches lined with groves of coconut palms.  Then enjoy our pool or relax in your own Jacuzzi. Aloha and welcome to our listing. We have to warn you, our condo is unique. As you see in the photo's, there are few places where you can step out onto your living room lanai and run towards a near-deserted beach.  This is a place where you relax and relish the peace of the waves softly lapping on the shore while you watch the whales and a phenomenal sunset. Our beach is part of Maui's turtle sanctuary; many of our guests have encounters, swimming or on a beach walk with Aikane, the quintessential Hawaiian green turtle.  Take a dip in the pool or enjoy a scented bath in your own private Jacuzzi.  Share a drink and have some pupu's; (small kine snack), and enjoy the 180 degree sunset every night from the comfort of your own lanai. After a day
neighborhood_overview: The quiet apt is in walking distance of the beach-side shopping malls. There are restaurants that serve local food, as well as international cuisine; Italian, Mexican, Chinese, Indian, Thai, to name a few. Many visitor activities take place in Kihei and everywhere else on the island. Visitor information is available on the wall next to the managers office or check with the visitor activity center at Times Market a block away from the condoYou can arrange activities on the phone from the condo.
notes: The apt is equipped with everything you may need. If you like a periodic cleaning during long stays, I will arrange that for you. If you have questions about our pool, BBQ or shuffle-board court, please ask our friendly managers Sue and John.
transit: If you don't have a car, there are bus-stops all along South Kihei Road, within a few minute walking distance, that offer island-wide connections.   There are car-rental company's in the vicinity, should you want to rent a car. Or you can use Uber and local taxi services if you prefer. You can also rent bicycles, motor cycles in the neighborhood. You name it, Maui's got it.
access: Our ground-floor-unit opens up to the lawn that leads to the ocean. Here guest have access to the pool, BBQ and the shuffle-board court. Visitor information is available in the lobby of our building where our wonderful manager Sue, has her office. There is small library here as  well if you like to read. We encourage our guests to leave a good read behind for the next reader. If you don't find what you like, our county library is just around the corner.
interaction: When you arrive from the airport, I meet you at the condo and give you the scoop. During your stay, I can be reached by phone and by email.  Before you leave, I meet you again at the unit, for the guest check-out. I hope you sign our guest-book and become one of our regulars.
house_rules: Our building is a non-smoking zone for adults only. Pets, unless they are service dogs, are not allowed. We ask our guests to please wash the sand of their bodies after going to the beach at our beautiful shower next to the barbecue. The house-rules are on display in the unit.

host.host_about:
We are the Oosterveen's. We have been blessed to live on Maui since 1983. There is no better place to be in the world. Our first stay in Hawaii, we were so inspired by the Hawaiian culture and splendid nature, that we did not want to leave. And so we didn't and never looked back. Over the years, we have  shared our beautiful beach-front condo with the world.
We welcome you to come and stay, and share one of the most beautiful beaches on Maui with us. 
Maui no ka oi!
Aloha.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 132 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Alice welcomed us into her home with ALOHA! We immediately felt ready to begin our vacation after hours of travel. We didn't stay at the condo much and mostly enjoyed the island. The location was perfect as a starting point to explore the island. We did visit after 5 tropical storms had hit in the previous 3 months so it was a little humid but no worries, the living room A/C was there to our rescue. Good tip: leave it on when your away to keep the condo cool otherwise it doesn't cool down the place when it's really hot. We slept on the pull outs (since the A/C is there) and plus who can beat the ocean sounds and view outside the living room?! We would gladly stay here again and we both think it was a steal! Oh, and the fruit Alice left us from her garden was tasty!

"Right on the beach on Maui" could not be more accurate!   As nice as the description and photos are, it really doesn't provide just how nice it really is... very clean and comfortable.... all amenities you might want... fantastic host!   Really, a little slice of paradise and a great find!   

The condo is well managed, has barbecues, beautiful grounds and pool and is so, so close to the beach.   It's perfectly situated in Kihei, close to everything... and we cannot wait to come back!
My wife and I loved our stay here. Nice apt right on a very private beach... Alice was wonderful to deal with!  Andrew and Robbyn, Vancouver, BC

Right on the beach is 100% correct!  This condo was just steps away from a lovely, west facing beach in Kehei.  We got gorgeous sunsets every day we were there.  The condo was great for my wife and myself, and Alice was a very accommodating host.  We loved having the washer & dryer in the unit.  Being able to go home with clean clothes was fabulous.  We also very much enjoyed the location.  Easy driving distance from many attractions, and close walking distance to groceries and many great restaurants.  100% recommended and we'd love to stay here if we return to Maui!
Alice was fantastic! She greeted us with such a warm welcome and even had a bottle of wine and box of chocolates waiting

Our hostess was there to greet us and provided many 'homey' items to make us feel welcome and comfortable.  The description listed was very accurate and we enjoyed every bit of our stay there.  We loved the location!  It has wonderful access to the beach, we could sit from the lanai and see the water and the sunset, or just walk across the lawn and be right on the beach!  There were many restaurants that we could walk to in a short time.  Convenience in having a grocery store close by was a big help, too!  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would stay here again if we come back to Maui!  Thank you, Alice Diane for provided a comfy place to stay on our dream vacation!

Our trip to Maui was made so comfortable and enjoyable by Alice Diane and her perfect condo on the beach.  The small complex is off the main road and has just a nicely groomed lawn between our patio and the ocean.  Being able to walk out the back door with our coffee each morning for a stroll on the beach was soul food.  Alice was available for any questions we had and very thoughtful.  I would highly recommend this place and host to a friend.

Alice met us at the door and took us on a tour of the facilities.  She had water and wine and snacks all set up.  Place was gorgeous and very accommodating and it was maybe a 10 second walk to the beach.  We had activities planned, but we all agreed we would have been content to stay at the condo and just enjoy the beach.  I look forward to going back.
Absolutely wonderful place to stay on the beach.  Nice long walking beach with a sunset every night.  The condo was clean and well equipped.   We plan on coming back next year.  ALOHA

We had a great time on our honeymoon. We had the beach all to ourselves. We did not want to leave it went by to fast. We will be coming back to celebrate our anniversary.
Thank you so much Alice for the memories.
Tom and Virginia

The perfect spot to explore Maui or just to spend long, slow days at the secluded beach just steps away from the condo. We enjoyed breakfast at the beach every morning, just brought our towels and sat down in the sand. What a way to start the day! The condo is really home away from home, it has everything you need - and more! Alice is so warm and welcoming and made our stay extra special with fruit from her garden, chilled champagne and Hawaiian chocolates. The place is not smack in the middle of the most luxurious resorts and golf courts which we really appreciated. Instead, visiting the local restaurants meant dining amongst both tourists and locals and getting a bit closer to "the real" Maui. The beach just in front of the house is beautiful and we loved swimming there and reading under the palm trees. It was also easy access to the rest of the island, like Road to Hana which we did one day. What a journey! Do it if you have the time, we really recommend it. The pool was closed during our stay due to retiling but we didn't miss it for a second.

What is the point if you cannot use the patio,
have to walk thru the parking lot to get to the beach and have workman
in your view all day. Being awakened at 6:30am is not my idea of a vacation.

Amazing location! Right on the beach is right! When you open the back door you can hear the ocean. The location is great for getting around the rest of the island so if you plan on traveling around Maui it's perfect. Grocery stores and food are within walking distance so it's easy to get what you need. The location on the island itself is perfect, it can rain all around you but where you are will be sunny and dry. Alice provides everything you need and to make it a more welcoming she left us a few welcome items; muffins, coffee, champagne, juice, that type of stuff. We are already planning another stay there!

It's a fascinating stay, a small but cozy condo with beach access from the backyard, exactly as advertised and exactly what we needed. The host is very friendly and our communication is flawless. All the little extras simply made our vacation even more enjoyable. We can feel the hospitality of our host in every detail in this home. Definitely will come back!

Alice was a great host, and we had a fabulous stay at her place. Her unit is actually right on the beach. That was the best part of the trip. We didn't have to do anything but walk out the back door and we were on the beach. Perfect way to relax. It is close to a grocery store, great coffee shop, and restaurants in Kihei/Wailea. Alice is definitely welcoming and accommodating as well. Highly recommend!

Amazing place! Would stay here again. You can't go wrong. You are right on the beach, there is a beautiful gas grill on premises, and condo has washer/dryer. We even had sea turtles on the beach. And amazing sunsets.

This is a lovely apartment right next to the beach.  All of the systems in the apartment worked well, and it was very easy to get in touch with Alice.  It was very convenient to have a washer and dryer in the apartment.

This place is right on the beach!  We had the most wonderful time enjoying Maui from this condo and hope to come back someday.  Alice was very accommodating and caring making sure we had everything we needed.  I recommend her condo to anyone who is looking for a perfect beach vacation.

My husband and I spent a lovely week at Alice's condo. We enjoyed our morning coffee on the nice patio with views of the palm trees and ocean beyond- an absolutely lovely view and perfect for watching the sunset! Even though the patio opens up to a shared space, we found it still to be quite private and peaceful. 

The condo is walking distance to some delicious restaurants and allows easy access to the highway to visit the rest of the island. 

We found the condo to be very comfortable with all of the amenities we would need. There is a nice grill on site as well as a pool. We would definitely stay here again!

This was everything Alice listed! The restaurants were great & we swam on our beach everyday it was literally steps away from the lanai. We also saw several turtles swimming & one 2 came up on the beach to sun themselves. We will definitely be back ❤
This place is in a PERFECT location.   You can walk everywhere.  The sunsets right out your back door are incredible!!

The perfect spot to celebrate our 25th anniversary.  Alice's condo is very clean and well furnished, including a well equipped kitchen. Alice also provides everything you'll need for the beach - umbrella, chairs, towels and beach toys. The location is perfect and only a short drive to the best swimming and snorkeling beach where turtles are plentiful. It's also located within easy walking distance to restaurants, grocery stores and a great gelato store. There is a beach right outside the back door for lounging and watching the sunset  and a great little pool within feet of the door. The perfect spot for the perfect vacation! Thanks Alice!!

The location is amazing. Many of the condos in Kihei require you to cross a busy street to get to the beach, but this place is right on a beautiful beach with gorgeous views of the sunset over the West Maui mountains. Alice Diane is a great host, leaving snacks for us when we checked in and the use of a cooler and beach toys. The location is convenient for exploring other parts of Maui as well. We would definitely want to stay at this property again.

We thought it would be great and it exceeded our expectations. The location was perfect for walking to so many restaurants, shops and grocery stores. We watched the sunset everyday and went in the pool and met the other people visiting and who lived there. The beach in front of the condo was lovely to walk on daily and swim at in the morning. Alice was such a joy during the check in and check out process. She left us chocolates, chips and waters and use of what she already had. She also supplies pool toys, beach umbrellas and beach chairs which was great and so nice because we didn't have to go buy them or rent them ourselves! The wifi and AC were lovely additions to have. Everything was clean and the bed was comfortable. This is the spot to be in Kihei!
Nice and secluded on the beach. Had a great time. Close to a lot of amazing restaurants.

Alice is such a sweetheart and goes out of her way to ensure you have a comfortable stay! Everything is well organized, and she leaves complimentary beach toys, food, and drinks. The location is great for easy access to the rest of the island, and while the beach is small and a little rough, it is still beautiful and literally RIGHT THERE. We plan to stay here again!
Great House! Beautiful beaches!

The location couldn't get any better.  You are within walking distance of food shopping, local crafts, restaurants and of course, you're right on the beach.  Nothing compares to waking up to the sound of the waves crashing.  

The condo has everything you need to feel at home and most importantly Alice is an amazing host.  From snacks, fruit and beautiful smelling flowers to giving you all the information you need to enjoy your stay, she was amazing.  My husband and I are already trying to plan out our next visit.  Mahalo nui loa Alice!

Great condo in great location.  There is no need to plan trips to the beach, because you are already there.   Staying here is a great way to experience the beauty of Maui because you can go walk or swim on the beach anytime that you want.  Alice and her family are great hosts who truly want to make your experience as pleasant as possible.
A great host. Well organised and easy communication. Loved the location right on the beach and very walkable to local restaurants and shops

Alice was a great host and the place is beyond words. We know exactly the place we want to stay at the next time we are in Maui. 

Mahalo Alice!!

A little gem in  paradise. The host is very attentive to detail and the place extremely comfortable, clean and with everything you need for your stay. Walking distance  to amazing dinning and beaches.
We will definitely come back.

It is literally steps from the beach!! This is no joke, from the back lanai it took 1 minute over the dune to the beach itself and the unexpected part was that the beach was also really private. we would see maximally four groups of people there at a time.  Sometimes we would be the only ones out there. This was partly due to the 70's weather but still!
Also the restaurants in Kihei are right there, as Alice says.

The only thing I would mention is that the unit is older so it's not "hotel" newness and one shouldn't expect it. I didn't expect it. We ended up sleeping on the pullout foam mattress to compensate for the older soft bed, but we didn't mind this.

Alice was very responsive with the two issues that came up in our trip and that was really nice.
Great location right off the beach and near restaurants and retail.

We had such an amazing stay!  You know you are staying in the right place when the family is able to unplug the entire time and not turn on the T.V.  The beachfront is truly just outside the back door.   We were able to relax as the complex was small and quiet.   The location was great... not far from the airport, lots of different beach parks close by and just around the corner from great places to eat!  You really don't need a car as restaurants and groceries are all within walking distance!   We hope to return again in the not so distant future!
Great location, comfortable space and wonderful host made our vacation here perfect!

Our stay with Alice was quite perfect. She left us fruit to enjoy when we arrived, a bottle of champagne chilled in the refrigerator as well as cold juice. We enjoyed the complimentary beach chairs, umbrella & boogie board. The patio, literally on the beach was amazing. We loved how close we were to so many fantastic restaurants and a centrally located on the island to a lot of things we wanted to do. I would definitely recommend this condo if you want to be close to the beach, and experience some food and activity in Kihei or Wailea.

My wife and I had a fantastic stay here and Alice was the perfect host! Our flight was delayed getting into Maui and most the restaurants were closed but Alice went out and provided us some groceries and snacks for a late dinner on top of the spread she already had laid out. That touch meant the world to us.

The condo was cozy and met our needs perfectly. ‘Right on the beach’ is right... we were just steps away from an amazing Hawaiian beach that felt almost private with little foot traffic. The surf was a little rocky but the water was crystal clear and situated nicely for a beautiful sunset.

This place was located centrally to anything you would need. We were within walking distance to the Times supermarket and the Azeka shopping center which has a lot of great restaurants and just minutes down the road was the Kalama Village which also had a lot of shops and eateries.

Our stay was amazing and we will definitely use this place again if/when we return to Maui. 

Mahalo & aloha!
A wonderful location that is right on the beach. Is also walkable to several stores and restaurants.

If you are planning a trip to Maui and looking to be in a prime location on the beach with amazing restaurants, grocery stores and shops within walking distance - look no further. Alice’s condo was clean, cozy, and had everything my family of 3 needed to enjoy our vacation. The beach, which is literally a few feet away from the condo, is in a secluded stretch of the Kihei coast and provides the luxury of avoiding crowds at other Kihei beaches.     There are spectacular views of the sunset that can be experienced from the beach or while relaxing on the lanai (back patio). Alice was very professional and responsive. In addition to welcoming us with the aloha spirit, she stocked the condo with treats, snacks, and drinks. We would definitely stay here again!
We really enjoyed our stay and were so happy with everything that was provided. Alice thinks of everything you could possibly need!  Thank you!!!!

Despite Hurricane Lane accompanying us on our first visit to Maui, staying at Alice Diane’s place was beyond amazing! We were still lucky enough to experience our own private beach, morning sunrise, and gorgeous evening sunsets. Thank you for your sweet hospitality and so grateful that your place kept us safe from the storm!  This was truly an aloha experience with its healing and soothing spirit. We will be back!
The location is excellent.  Walking distance to restaurants and shops. Easy access to the property.
alice has the perfect place to be on maui it truly is everything and more!!! definitely worth it all.
Well stocked kitchen, incredible views of sunset, really is right on the beach
What a lovely location.   Right on the ocean with sea breezes crackling the palm fronds. You can swim right from the beach in front of the complex.  We saw a sea turtle.

This was exactly what we were looking for, when they say "on the beach" they mean "on the beach!"   Amazing sunsets you can see from the living room, walk out the patio door 50 feet and you're on the beach.  A sandy beach with calm surf and few other visitors.   Neighbors were quiet and the hosts left thoughtful gifts (fruit, drinks, etc).  Walking distance to supermarkets and many great restaurants.

MAGNIFICENT! THE BEST BEACH IN TOWN! My husband and I loved Alice's apartment. You cannot beat the location and the beach is in your backyard. There were beautiful sunsets and it is as if you have your own private beach. There were very few people. We went for our honeymoon and would recommend this apartment to everyone! If I go back to Maui, I am definitely staying there. It is central and easy to get to other towns as well. Kihei is great if you prefer a relaxing beach atmosphere. You can also walk to restaurants, coffee shops, and a supermarket! Surfing is more on the north shore. Thank you again Alice! We LOVED staying at your place! Til next time!

name: Ocean Bluff Retreat
summary: INSPIRING Blue OCEAN Views, the Sound of the Crashing Surf and the Refreshing Coastal Breezes await you. The Generous Wraparound Patio is a Nature Lovers Dream. Unobstructed Views of Migrating Humpback Whales (when in season) and Sea Birds flying by. This is a SPACIOUS Floor Plan, Ideal for a party of 2 or 4. The Bedrooms are Beautifully Appointed. Forever Ocean Views.  Ideal for Special Occasions & Life Celebrations
space: The Views are Absolutely Impressive! The Master Bedroom has Forever Ocean Views. It is Generous in Size with a Beautifully Appointed Queen Size Bed and Designer Bathroom En~Suite.  The Guest Bedroom also has Forever Ocean Views and Two Twin Beds with a Newly Renovated Bathroom.  The Living Room is Wonderful and Absolutely Comfortable with Ocean Views and a Flat Screen TV.  The Kitchen is Fully Stocked for all Your Cooking Needs. Eat at the Breakfast Bar, the Dining Room or the Outside Table along the Generous Wrap-Around Patio.

Unobstructed Views of Migrating Humpback Whales (when in season) and Sea Birds flying by. This is a SPACIOUS Floor Plan, Ideal for a party of 2 or 4. The Bedrooms are Beautifully Appointed.
