And ignore the people who say the Bronx isn't safe!!! The people are friendly and helped me to find the apartment!
Doug is very frendly. The neighborhood is safer than I thought. The house is old but the room is spacious. A little bit far from downtown though.

Douglas is a very friendly host and he is happy to answer any questions you may have. During my stay however, there were some insects in the kitchen and bathroom... But as I said, Douglas is a great host and I would stay here again. Thanks!
Very clean, quite place. A great deal
There's was a lot larger than I expected. Short walk to the subway, and easy to find. For the price I didn't mind the extra few minutes it took to get downtown.
Great place and was as described. Got value for my money!

L'appartement de Douglas manque clairement de nettoyage ! les sols de la chambre et les draps semblaient propres mais les parties communes (cuisine et salle de bain) ignobles ! WC, douche, murs moisis, tapis de douche sale, présence de cafards.... 
Dommage ! Car l'hôte est accueillant et l'emplacement correct si l'on veut être au Nord de NY.
Excellent stay! Great host. Love the privacy. Thanks.

Mi estancia en el apartamento de Douglas fue muy buena, es ideal para quien quiera un lugar para ducharse y dormir, es muy barato y el Subway D y B están a solo 2 cuadras y te dejan en 30 minutos en times square. La cama es comoda, la habitación cuenta con aire acondicionado, sábanas y toallas limpias, el agua de la ducha sale bien caliente, hay todo lo necesario para desayunar.
No hay lujos , solo lo necesario para hacer base en NY y pasar el día paseando y recorriendo, anduve poco por el barrio pero nunca sentí miedo, tampoco recomendaría andar  caminando muy tarde.Douglas es amable. Recomiendo este apartamento.

The key pick up was smooth and the host leaves you to get on with your trip. The place was clean and WiFi was good subway was 3 mins away and the area felt safe at all times. my on gripe was the TV did not work but apart from that all was very ok.
Good place
Great place to say very quiet & spacious as well I recommend you guys to come and stay

I came to NYC for 3 days, 2 nights trip and Douglas sir's offered room is the best place to stay at so reasonable price at such a safe and calm location.. Highly recommended.. Douglas sir showed such a great hospitality.. Thanks to Airbnb as well for having Douglas sir's apt in their list..

Very quiet neighbourhood with an easily accessible location. Guest was accommodating and hardly disturbed my stay in the house with his presence. I would always come back to stay when ever I am in the city!

Douglas is a very kind man who has set up his apartment so that you are the "star." You feel that you have access to the kitchen and bath at all times. It is homey in the apartment. There was heat by the end of October. The bedroom is very comfortable. I did find that the B train goes to his stop, as well as the D.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Douglas is a very welcoming and warm host.  I couldn't have been happier with the accommodations offered at the incredible value that I secured the room at.
Close to public transport, nice place, Douglas provided water, tea and coffee and breakfast, was very nice, the place is quiet and the room is very big
房間很大,有提供浴巾,三個人一起住也沒問題,廚房有咖啡和茶可以使用,房源的位置離交通非常近,到市區差不多30-40分鐘｡第一天晚上到達的時候房東還特別出來接我,讓我很像回家一樣,房東人很好,很好溝通,我最後一天要坐夜車,房東也讓我把行李放在他那一整天｡附近的店家都比較早關門,差不多晚上八點左右就關了,但還是有一間小店可以買到東西,推薦｡
Everything was easy and perfect :-)

Es un lugar estupendo para los que quieren disfrutar la ciudad y necesitan hospedarse en una habitación cómoda y limpia. La habitación queda a unas tres cuadras de la línea D y a dos de la línea 4 de subterráneo y se puede estar en Manhattan en 20 minutos. En el barrio se pueden encontrar algunos lugares para comprar comida. Es de destacar la privacidad y la buena atención de Douglas. Súper recomendable!
방도 넓고 가성비는 좋습니다.

Douglas is a wonderful host. I came to Bronx for an interview. I stayed for 2 days at his place. He offered me breakfast which is very good. The house is clean, calm, WiFi is fast. Overall I had a good stay at his place. People at the apartments were helpful. I would highly recommend Douglas place.
You feel like you are in your house.

If you are looking for a quick stay in NYC, stay here. It is not a beautiful hotel room, but it will help you save a lot of money. Also, this place is super close to the subway station and local markets, walking less than 3 min.
Douglas es muy amable y servicial.

You get what you pay for. Room is clean and spacious, but do not expect any kind of luxury. Accomodation is an easy 5min walk away from the next Metro-station. Host is friendly and helpful, just check the check-in procedure soon enough in advance, as there were some problems in my case. But for that price it is still good value! (And you get 2 bottles of water per day and some light breakfast, such as muffin or cake)
Douglas was very attentive and nice! The room was very clean. I love the fact that he had water and coffee available for me. He gave me great tips about public transportation too.
Second time staying with Douglas. I feel like that's all the review you need.
Douglas's place was quiet,  clean and the foom was big. My son was able to come and go as pleased and the staff was great! I highly ecommend Douglas Place!

Doug's place is awesome. It's a huge room, great location just a few minutes from 2 major subway lines, and has got to be the best value for the price you can get in NY. The room was quiet and Doug lets you use the kitchen and even gives you coffee and pastries! Anyone lucky enough to have the option to stay at Doug's should absolutely do so!
This was my 3d stay here, it's great value, worry-free, had no problems and had everything I needed.

Let me start off by saying that I would definitely stay here again. Douglas is a great host and the place is very close to a train station. That being said, you just need to understand that this isn't a luxury apartment. The bed isn't great, the radiator makes a noise, and the hot water isn't very reliable. Also, bear in mind that staying in the Bronx means that it's going to take you a while to get to the main New York attractions. There's good wifi though! I would definitely recommend this place to people visiting New York.
Es un lugar muy bien ubicado en un barrio seguro, con muchas tiendas cerca, Douglas es muy amable, atento y responsable, una gran persona.

This was my second time at Douglas place and I would do it over and over... Douglas is a great host and his apartment is just 30 minutes from Manhattan... Train Station is one corner away... the price is unbeatable!

Douglas is very quiet and respectable, as well as accommodating to requests. Replies fairly fast and the train is about a 2 minute walk away. This is a good place to stay if you’re looking to stay in the city for a few days. He provided water bottles and some loaf cake for breakfast and coffee.
Altamente recomendado. Calidad precio inmejorable
It was my first Airbnb experience and Douglas is a great host. He takes care of details in the apartment and was very clean. And I slept very well. Thanks Douglas!

Yo pruebo escribir mis pensadas favorables en (Website hidden by Airbnb) calle,la conedad de Bronx...todos son muy interesante. El tren es muy cerca. Douglas es muy 
genial, simpático, y inteligente. La cuarto est limpia. La baño está limpia y linda. La cama es muy confortable. Está en la cuarta un television con una pantilla grande. Muchos Gracias, Douglas. Que dios te bendiga.

Douglas is a really nice guy with lot's of interesting ideas to talk about.
He was super flexible with my check-in which helped a lot and really hospitable throughout.
Nice Place and reasonable price and not really far from city

I barely spend time at the apartment during my stay, just used it to sleep and shower but I got what I paid for clean and comfortable. Very close to the subway. Douglas is kind and respectful. He provides very convenient breakfast. I would stay there again.
Douglas is a good guy. He was not at the house generally. But I had good memories about NYC and it is definitely including him. Bronx is a silent area.
As a solo female traveler I'm selective about where I stay and Douglas's place was great. He was an excellent host, communicative and thoughtful providing bagels and water. I'd definitely go back.
I had a nice stay . The room was clean,  comfortable,  and quiet.   The apartment is near the train.  Douglas was a good host.
Amazing value in NYC, 1 1/2 blocks from the subway, convenient connections to all of the city
Very nice host. The área is safe, easy access to subway and 20 Min to Rockefeller centre.

Good accommodation for its price! However not the most comfortable place to stay unless you like sleeping on a plastic mattress that makes the loud and annoying wrinkle noise anytime you move. Also, watch out for the host because he will try to gauge you for extra charges. Tried to make me pay for 2 guests because I brought a friend over. Ridiculous.
Douglas is a nice guest. Room located in the Bronx close to public transportation and 24h grocery stores. 45 min or more to reach Time Square.

I had a wonderful stay at Douglas’s apartment. The room was as pictured and was very large and spacious. It was also very close to the D train, making the commute into Manhattan very easy. I would definitely stay here again!
Good place, perfectly connected to the metro. It‘s perfect for a few days on a budget and can highly recommend. Douglas is a kind host.

An inexpensive stay in the Bronx, close to subway route D to take you downtown in about 30 mins or so.

Room nice & big, clean bed linen & comfortable bed though could do with a bedside cabinet to put your cell phone on etc at night (cheap to implement though it’d be real helpful to guests, + a bedside lamp?)

I reset the tv & whilst it picked up stations, only one wasn’t scrambled & it kept failing, therefore tv ought to be OFF the facility list. 
Good hot water for shower though bathroom not the cleanest, I cleaned the WC somewhat upon arrival.
A day of good cleaning generally throughput would make this a much better place as it all comes across it hasn’t been painted generally for years, window cills coated with grime generally.
Room 2 star, bathroom 1 star desperately needs updating, kitchen 2 star & clean. Overall a 1-2 star rating 
Very limited breakfast (no bread) though shops were only 3 mins walk away so sorted my own

Room has an internal gate type lock but door lock was badly damaged so no lock for when you are out for added privacy. 
Douglas is a lovely host wants to be helpful - he has a busy schedule was out lots - good place to simply do your own thing. 

Overall a good stay noting the price, bit noisy Sat eve with adjacent young gatherings til early hours & what sounded like children or pets steps running back n fourth upstairs most nights - all to be expected with apartment living

Would I stay again? So long as the standard doesn’t drop anymore then yes, though I know my wife 100% wouldn’t if she were with me next time due to cleanliness 

I think the reflection of the bathroom etc needing cleaning g better is simply Douglas being so busy, & often when one lives in their own surroundings they simply can’t see things 
Douglas just needs to buy a couple of cans of paint & spend a weekend focusing on how nice it’d make his guests & himself feel 

**
To add, I just arrived in Indianapolis at another Airbnb & for just $20 a night the room is immaculate - simply the difference of a host having more time & focus available
The host does provide light breakfast and water everyday, and it isn't too far from Manhattan
Douglas was super accommodating with my weird check in and check out schedule. He also was very hospitable and we found out we both have a deep love for Activia yogurt :)

Perfect stay for Sightseeing New York. The apartment was clean and quiet. There are 2 subway stations in 3 min and 7 min walking distance. It takes about 20-40 min to be in Manhattan

I would visit Douglas definetly again :)
It was really convenient for getting into Manhattan.
Excellent host, as advertised. Kind and communicative. A worry free experience.
Very nice guest. Great at communicating.

Todo perfecto, la casa limpia, en una buena zona (no hay que tener miedo porque sea el Bronx), cerca de la estación de metro.
Con Douglas todo fenomenal, no pudo ir mejor, recomiendo que si viajan a Nueva York, se alojen en su vivienda. Trato inmejorable.

Douglas' apartment is olde world NY.  This is an apartment in a building constructed when apartments were meant to be GRAND - housed (as it is) on the GRAND Concourse.  In its time this was intended to be the West Side's answer to East Side luxury.  You will still find remnants of that glory today.  In Douglas' apartment you have exquisite hardwood floors, largess in space, panelled walls - in that olde Manhattan fashion and truly stunning parquet in the kitchen.  More than that you will find one of the most genuine and charming hosts going.  This apartment is also well located - being close to the super fast (when it runs of course) D Train which happily dashes from 125th Street to 59th Street.  This was my second visit ... and I am definitely determined to add more.  That is, I think, the most sincere way I know of saying that this flat - and its master - come highly recommended - certainly by me.  Thanks so, Douglas.

Douglas apartment is close to the subway and in downtown new York in 40 mins. A light breakfast is great tea muffin some cereal and water. The bed is comfortable. Douglas  is a nice man. The only downside is if you want to have a shower you stand in the bath and throw a couple buckets of water over you. That is your shower. It's a good accomdation if your on a budget.

Douglas is a very kind person, hospital and helpful. The house is not a palace, but you can find everything you need. And it is very close to two line that brings directly to the heart of Manhattan (it is 30 minutes from Time Square).

For the price you pay the room is definitely ok. It is a little bit old fashioned but the bedroom is clean, and more important, during night it was very quiet in the room. The apartment is very close to metro B & D, which take you to downtown NYC.
Decent place for a short time stay
Excelente.
all good for the price.

Quiet, private, and economical. A cool neighborhood with some neat shops and great food, close to public transit, very respectful host. This was my first AirBNB and Douglas's manners have set the standard for those to come!
Excelente lugar para hospedarse, buena ubicación y cerca de todo. Douglas es muy atento y buena persona. 100% Recomendable
Douglas's place is ideally located less than 5 minutes' walk from three subway stations. It offers a comfy bed and friendly hospitality. Good place for a short stay in the Big Apple.
excellent place to stay, really near to the subway, the bedroom is large.

It's a very big room at an affordable price. The host is very courteous, he'd bought me lunch one time. The host is really friendly if you showed respect toward him. He'll show you respect. FYI it is an older apartment.
The place is in a safe area in Manhatan and Douglas was very helpful for checking in and out.
Third time here. Love the place. My only critique of the place is the water pressure for the warm water in the showers isn’t always consistent

name: SMALL AND COZY PARISIAN STYLE APT IN EAST HARLEM
summary: Available room for rent in a small and cozy Apt located in East Harlem. Shared bathroom. 15 min from Midtown. 10 mins from Central Park. 3 blocks from East river plaza.  10 mins to Apollo theater, Red Rooster,  Sylvia's restaurant, Studio Museum in Harlem. Mins from the museums (Met etc.)
space: Nice sunlight in the bedroom in the morning. Quiet, clean, cozy and peaceful.
description: Available room for rent in a small and cozy Apt located in East Harlem. Shared bathroom. 15 min from Midtown. 10 mins from Central Park. 3 blocks from East river plaza.  10 mins to Apollo theater, Red Rooster,  Sylvia's restaurant, Studio Museum in Harlem. Mins from the museums (Met etc.) Nice sunlight in the bedroom in the morning. Quiet, clean, cozy and peaceful. Internet I like to give space to my guests. It's location. Close to all. Central Park. Cute restaurants, mall (East river plaza), 6 train station one block away, 20 mins to midtown. Friendly people around. Supermarket one block away, bus station across the street. Convenient. Mins from the East side Museums (Met and Guggenheim.  Great for various culture cuisine. ( American, African, Caribbean, Mexican, Italian, French) Subway 6 train a block away. Bus across the street. Taxi all over 24 hours Minimum 5 nights stay.

Supermarket one block away, bus station across the street. Convenient. Mins from the East side Museums (Met and Guggenheim.  Great for various culture cuisine. ( American, African, Caribbean, Mexican, Italian, French)
notes: Minimum 5 nights stay.

access: Internet
interaction: I like to give space to my guests.
house_rules: No other visitor. No loud music. It's a quiet, clean and peaceful place therefore I would expect it to remain the same. No shoes in the apt. My place is a small apt please I prefer to accommodate 1 guest at a time. In case another guest is staying during the trip too I have an additional fee of $25 listed in my listing. Please read it before booking and ask for permission for second guest. No surprise guest please, let me know in advance.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Creative director. Love art, food, fashion and travel. American raised in France. Dog mom. Very open to other culture and people. Speaks 5 languages. Easy going.

reviews.comments:
Marie var ett mycket bra värd.  Hon tog hand om mig från dag 1. Allt jag behövde veta om staden , hon var mycket vänlig och informerade mig allt jag behövde veta om hushållet och området.  Framför allt så är det är väldigt fin lägenhet rent och snyggt.  Jag fick ett väldigt bra bemötande och uppskattar verkigen allt hon har gjort för mig, Stort utbud härligt område nära Subway på 2 minuters avstånd.  du har apollo 10 minuter gång avstånd. Du har harlems shopping gata på 125 street som är bara endast ca 5 minuter gång avstånd. Väldigt centralt och lätt att ta sig överallt med bussar och tåg.
Nästa gång jag besöker New york så är det Marie jag kommer definitivt bo hos så länge det finns ett ledigt rum att hyra

Ja rekommenderar Marie väldigt starkt!!

Great place, Cool host!

Thanx Marie!

Hôte très sympatique. Apartement bien situé, tout près du métro.
Merci Marie pour l'accueil. À la prochaine!

Marie was friendly and accommodating, and made my 2nd trip to NYC and 1st time using Airbnb a great experience! The bed was comfortable and the hot shower in the morning helped after walking for miles each day! She also made coffee and I was free to store items in the fridge.  The place was clean and pretty quiet for NYC, with so much activity going on. A decent location, especially if you love Puerto Rican food! Yum! Very close to a bus stop and only 1 1/2 blocks from the train going Uptown or Downtown.
I really enjoyed my stay with Marie. She made me feel right at home, very accommodative. Coffee in the morning and the bed was VERY comfortable. I look forward to staying there again.
It's nice!
Marie was great! She was very gracious and kind. I look forward to staying at her place again.

My host was unequivocally accommodating and extended the finest hospitality one could ask for.  She was thorough and explicit with her instructions, making it very easy for me to go about my schedule without any conflict or confusion.  On top of that, our conversation in the few times our schedules overlapped was refreshing and truly inspiring.  The neighborhood is amazing and very easy to access in terms of pubic transportation.  Overall, I would recommend anybody to stay here!
Marie wasaVERY welcoming host. Her place suites my needs perfectly. She even took care of my pup for an hour or so while I went out.
Marie a ete tres accueillante, a ete également un très bon guide,mon séjour fut tres agreable,  quartier  proche de tout , lit super confortable je recommande a tous.
I loved staying with Marie, she was so sweet when I wore the wrong shoes she let have some of her Epsom salts to soak my feet in he tub :) definitely would stay with her again.

Todo correcto. Marie me facilito la llegada a la casa y la estancia. Muy amable. El apartamento está muy cerca de la salida del metro y es una calle muy transitada y con muchas tiendas. No estuve mucho en casa pero la cama es muy cómoda. Ideal para estancias cortas y Marie muy agradable. 


All right. Marie make me easy the arrival at the house. Very friendly. The apartment is very close to the subway exit and it´s in a good street with many shops . I wasn´t home much but the bed is comfortable . Ideal for short stay. Marie cool person and amability.
Apartment was exactly as descirbed, Marie was easily accessible and very approachable. Made the experience that much better knowing I could come and go without worry.

Marie is a warm gracious host,  a cool lady. Her place even more charming than the pictures.  Coffee, Wi-FI, a comfy bed; easy to get everywhere and I was all over NYC for a week of work! I kept some food there so I had breakfast; easy communication  and the privacy of the room was perfect for my needs. I'd stay again in a New York minute.
It was really good to be at Marie's. She made me feel really comfortable. The bed is delicious. 2 blocks from the subway station. Really convenient!

My stay was perfect. I was expecting for a comfortable bed and a good bathroom in a quiet neighborhood. All of three aspects have fully met my expectations. The apt is located in a safe place, only 1 1/2 blocks from the green Metro line. Then it´s only a 15 minutes ride to most attractions in Manhattan. I had also the opportunity to interact with Marie, who is a very smart and nice person who will make everything possible for you to have a great stay. Highly recommended!
Marie, Thank you for everything!! Close to the sub and easy to find :)
Very good location, very nice host!

I spent two nights at Marie's and it was wonderful. She is a fantastic host and her apartment is lovely. It was easy to get to the subway station from the apartment. The neighborhood was well-lit after dark and there are lots of restaurants on the way. Thank you, Marie, for helping make my New York stay an enjoyable experience!!!
Marie was super nice all the time, always helpful and make me feel almost like a rommie. Always super polite. The apartment was cozy as the description says. Super recommend staying with Marie

Marie made me feel extremely welcome, she was very helpful, gave me great hints an tips for the city. Especially as I was visiting New York on my own. Room was as describe very clean, comfortable bed! Great access to the main city via subway cab or uber. Very vibrant area with amazing friendly people. Will definately be returning! Have made a great friend in Marie loved staying with her!

El departamento de Marie es ideal para descansar después de un día agotador en la ciudad. La cama es muy cómoda y lo mejor de todo es que el cuarto da a un patio interior y es muy silencioso y tranquilo (lo que no es fácil en el East Harlem). Marie es muy amable y estuvo siempre al pendiente de que estuviera cómodo. El departamento está muy cerca de dos estaciones de Metro y moverse por todo NY es muy sencillo. Lo recomiendo totalmente.

The apartement was small, but cozy. It is perfectly situated for those who want to join the centrel park or a gospel worship. The center is not far either. 
Although the environment of Harlem is not the cleanest one.
Marie was extremely friendly and was very helpful in any requests I may have. The bed was comfortable, and lots of cute restaurants around.

Convenient to the Subway. Lots of places to eat by her place.  She was very quick to respond to all of my messages.  Additionally she let me keep my bag in her place till I left later in the evening.  All around great stay!

The place was exactly as Marie described and the apartment was very clean. She was great with communication as this was my first air bnb and would reply very quickly to any questions I had. The apartment is close to downtown about a 20 minute subway so very convenient. Marie was extremely friendly.

Marie fue persona muy amable y pendiente de mi comodidad y bienestar. El barrio es el típico del área de Harlem con su población de varias etnias pero muy tranquilo y seguro. El acceso al Subway y bus desde el apartamento de Marie fue muy cercano y fácil

This is going to be a mixed review. I never met Marie, which was kind of strange since she lives in this apartment.  I stayed there for 3 nights. Every night I wondered where she would sleep since there's only one bedroom and one bed. Maybe the sofa in the living room is a sofa bed where she sleeps when there's a guest?   That kind of puzzled me. Marie always answered my e-mails and was kind enough to let me bring my stuff before the check in time. She gave me instructions on how to open the apartment but I didn't get clear instructions on how to enter the building. I was very lucky that another airbnb couple staying in another apartment opened the door for me, otherwise I wouldn't have been able to open the building door. The apartment itself is tiny but comfortable. The bed is very comfortable and theres a fan for hot nights. Marie only provided a towel and nothing else. I was lucky I had a bar of soap. There's a tv that can't be watched by guests because there's no control. I wasn't sure if I could use the fridge and kitchen so I ate out. There's plenty of cheap restaurants around, mostly mexican.  The neighborhood is quite rough and dirty. It didn't feel very safe especially at night. It's mostly a dominican-mexican neighborhood. The building is very old and shabby but the apartment is quite nice and cozy. Access to buses and metro station was great. Only two blocks to the metro.

I feel lucky to have stayed at Marie's place. It was my first time in NYC and I was there just for the weekend. She welcomed me to the place when I arrived and explained routes & attractions around the city so I could plan accordingly. The apartment is as described and in a convenient location. New York is a great place to visit and even better when you have a kind, interesting, and fantastic hostess such as Marie! Merci et à bientôt ;)

Marie was a wonderful host. Her apartment is super cute and very clean. From the moment I arrived, Marie was very welcoming, friendly and extremely helpful. She made me feel extremely welcome. She explained some facts about the neighborhood, which is very safe. People are very friendly and there are numerous little shops around he area. I would highly recommend Marie's apartment. It was an amazing experience!

The stay at Marie's place was great. It is a small cozy studio but it is perfect for a one person stay. She was very welcoming and happy to help out with suggestions of places to see. Would recommend it for a short visit to New  York city.
Excellent little place. Great location, welcoming host, comfortable bed. I'd happily come back.
Marie was a great host. Place was as described and what you'd expect in MY. Bed was cozy.
Marie is a very nice host, thank you so much! The room is cozy and clean, transportation is close only several minutes walking. I recommend Marie's  room for sure!

Marie is a really really good host. She is open minded, easy-going, easy to communicate with and so on. Had really good conversations with her in the evenings (when I was too tired to walk any more in the city) and she always made me feel like I am at home. I would recommend this place to anybody !

Thanks, Marie
I loved my time in New York with you !
Marie was a great host.  Her place was close to the subway which can take you basically everywhere.

I had a pleasant stay in Maria's flat. I had a private and clean room with a comfortable bed plus wifi. Exactly according to my needs and as it was described. My host Maria was very helpful. She always replied in a few minutes, gave me useful info about NYC and was very helpful both with my complicated arrival and departure.

Marie's place is in a great location in East Harlem - a really quick walk to the 116th & Lexington subway station and close to some great restaurants and bars offering live music in the center of Harlem. I love that it's located in a less tourist-y spot; grabbing a bite to eat on the way to the subway was inexpensive and delicious. Then Marie herself is a great host! I got in pretty late my first night, and she was so kind and conversant even though I'd woken her up. She provided me all kinds of ideas for sightseeing, and we had some really good conversations besides. Thank you for a wonderful stay, Marie!

My stay in New York was amazing because of Marie and her apartment. 
The apartment is as described and look the same as in the pictures, very clean and close to public transportation. The neighbourhood is safe with many grocery stores, fast food, and restaurants.
 Marie is an amazing host, she makes you feel at home, helps you to go around the city, she even helped me with my luggage to the Airport.

Honestly, she's the best host ever!!!!
Marie was a wonderful host, very open and nice to talk with. She showed me around some places in Manhattan, great experience.

I had an incredible stay with Marie. The apartment is exactly as described and cozy. It was conveniently located near the Metro and had many options for food. The neighborhood is safe and the evenings are quiet. Marie was always very welcoming and quick to respond to any of my concerns. 
Thank you so much for having me, Marie!

Marie's apartment is on a vibrant block in a diverse, exciting neighborhood. There was a train line nearby, and many businesses in the area offering food, drink, and everything else.  Marie's place is a bargain and a terrific option for short visits to New York City. I had a very comfortable stay in her compact, clean, and cozy apartment, and enjoyed meeting and speaking with Marie during my stay. She was very easy to reach and helpful, and I had everything I needed while staying at her place. I was really pleased with the location as I didn't feel stuck in a tourist trap, and it was overall a genuine and fun experience— I appreciated being able to explore East Harlem before heading further south in Manhattan to do other things. I'm very glad I found Marie's listing and was able to stay with her during my trip.

The place was great, ideal for a short stay. It's a compact appartment, just as described. The area feels safe, I got to know the area a bit by walking the neighborhood several blocks from the apartment, including during the evening. Marie was very nice and accommodating. If you come by car, there is a reasonably priced parking garage a few blocks away (545 East 116th Street) where you can keep your car safely for under $20/day.
Host is great. Comfortable room and bed. Close to metro station and cheap food around.

Marie is really really helpful and easy to get on well with, she gave me a lot information about NYC and told me a lot about the train, we have the same idea about travelling and living, it's really nice to know her!

Marie was very accommodating, even working with me on last minute changes for personal reasons during the stay. The neighborhood was wonderful and I would highly recommend her place for anyone wishing to check New York out from a quieter area than downtown or midtown.

I had an amazing time in Marie's apartment , it's exactly how the title says , small and cozy , and it's clean too. It's placed in a good area , the subway station is 5 min away from her apartment , and a lot of fast foods around. About her , she's an amazing person , i would give her 11/10 , i enjoyed talking to her everytime i was comming home. I totally recomand this place.
The room is cozy, the train is near, there's food places everywhere, Marie is awesome. That should sum it all up.

Loved staying in East Harlem! Loved the diversity of this area. Marie's place is a stone's throw from the subway and has some cheap and TASTY Mexican restaurants nearby (one just next door and Hot Jalapeños opposite). 

Marie was very friendly, accomodating for a last minute change in my circumstances and a great conversationalist to chat with. She provides bed linen, fresh towels and her shower was great! I was out all day, every day - so often I left when she was still asleep. She didn't mind me tip toeing past her from my bedroom to the bathroom whilst she was asleep on the sofa. 

They say NYC is the city that never sleeps... if this is your first time to NYC then assume on eating out for your 3 meals a day. Marie let me leave milk and some fruit in the fridge which was great for an evening snack :)
Marie is simply the person you would like to meet not only in your airbnb dreams but also as a good friend in your life. The rest is understood.
I had a good stay with Marie. The keys may take some practice and patience to get used to. They can work. The room is cozy and quiet at night.
I had my own bedroom and the rest I shared with Marie. Everything was clean and Marie was very friendly, she is fantastic. She makes you feel to be welcome in New York.
Awesome appartement, awesome girl. Foncez !!!!

El departamento es pequeño, pero es muy tranquilo respecto que no tiene ruidos y se puede dormir bien, el barrio esta bien conectado, no es un barrio fancy pero conecta aprox en 30 minutos con downtown.

I had a great time at Marie's. She was incredibly welcoming and helpful. Would definitely recommend to anyone. The apartment is clean and well stocked. Good shower. Bed is on the soft side but comfortable.

The place is almost exactly as described - great location if you are taking the subway (which you totally should). Marie is warm and welcoming. Had an issue with the keys and she was quick to switch hers with mine. Perfect. Great place to stay. Thanks!!
Amazing and cozy room. Really close to restaurants and public transit (subway). I would totally recommend this place!
Maria is a great host and make everything easy for you! The place is near station, easy for travel! Anyway, I really enjoyed the time with Maria!

I had a wonderful time staying at Marie's place.
The apartment is well located, with lots of stores and restaurants around, and the subway is only 2 streets away, which is just perfect.
Marie always replied to my questions in a matter of a few minutes, making it super easy to keep communication open. Besides, she is super friendly, and even invited me to spend Thanksgiving with her and a group of close friends. Too bad I lost track of time while enjoying the empty city and ended up missing it!
I totally recommend this place and would love to go back myself.
Thanks Marie!
Marie is a wonderful host and the place is very cute and comfy.

Marie was great! They room was small and cozy but clean. Bathroom is very small but has everything required. The area was where I'm familiar and VERY easy access to the train which is extremely convenient. Had good convo with Marie, and was able to get in and out when I needed. I would definitely stay here again!

Marie is so sweet. Her room is  neat and warm. It's close to blue line, and if you want to  visit central park you can just walking. Marie is  friendly and she is a model as well, so   
don't miss her room!
Impressive experience. The room is cozy and comfortable. Marie is an amazing host. We talk a lot and have a great time with each other.
非常棒!

I am a professional working student who needed this place last minute for work in NYC for a week. Host hid the fact she didn't have her own room and slept on the couch outside. Was very very uncomfortable with this. Wish I was told beforehand host would sleep on the couch for the week. The keys did not work and I had to buzz in everytime to the apt which took 5 mins and was dangerous in east harlem. Host kept the apartment and bathroom very very dirty, the water was chalky white which got me sick, and there was no heat. The host also blasted the tv loudly and was incredibly rude to me. I ended up leaving a day early because it was too much. Please do not stay here, it was the worst experience and very unprofessional.

Marie was a very friendly and welcoming host, making her guest feel comfortable at the place.  She is very prompt to reply to messages during your stay.  The place is warm and the bed is very comfortable.  Overall a great stay!

Marie is super chill and helpful-totally willing to talk or give you space, and her home is really cozy.  The apartment is only two blocks away from the subway, and there are a lot of good, cheap eats nearby. :)

Marie is my first ever Airbnb host, and it was a pleasant experience!

I would not hesitate to book with Marie again if I ever have to be in the area in the future! She is a great host and very responsive towards your questions and needs.

The bedroom is comfortable and it provides a lot of privacy, and the location is SO convenient because it is close (less than 5 mins of walking) to a subway station, and is surrounded by a bunch of eateries.

You cannot go wrong with this listing!

Marie was a great host. She was very nice and accommodating, and responded promptly whenever I had a question. The house has everything needed, the room is cozy. Convenient location. Check-in was flexible. Would do it again!

This is the best place to stay in Uptown. It has reasonable price and good decorations. The location is also good, only 4 minutes walk to a subway station. The problem is that it is an old building and may suffer from heat system problem and other problems old buildings may have. Marie is very friendly and responsive to my need when dealing with problems. This makes me feel like at home.
Marie es la mejor anfitriona. Responde todas tus dudas, tiene siempre una sonrisa y es muy buena onda. ;)
Repeat guest, very friendly and accommodating host.

私は､初めてのﾆｭｰﾖｰｸ､初めてのairbnbでしたが､Marieさんは､質問に直ぐに答えてくれるので安心でした｡
私のためのﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは､快適で安眠できました｡良心的な宿泊料金で助かりました｡
It's very good place to enjoy of NYC. Very close to subway. The district is safe and Marie is very toughtful for sucessful your travel.
Host is respectful, hospitable, and accessible by phone at all times.
Marie was really kind and the neighborhood was really lively but not overwhelming. It was a nice change of pace in Manhattan!

The place had a lot of places to eat close by and connected to the subway very well. Hence very efficient. Marie was very nice. The house was neat and clean. I had good privacy. This was my first AirBNB stay. Good experience.
Crawling distance to subway, very comfy bed, heard birds chirping in the AM from the backyard (didn't realize they can exist in the city).
I a great time and Marie was very accommodating. Very close to subway but a bit off if you walk.
Very clean and inviting place at a great value.

Marie is a really welcoming and friendly host. If you are looking for a base camp to explore NYC this is a perfect choice. Very close to a subway station, lots of dining options nearby, lively but safe neighbourhood - not a tourist trap, real people live there :) The room is small but the bed is comfy, the 
bathroom is clean, and the host is responsive... hey, what else does one actually need?
Real great and convenient location in Manhattan, Marie is very considerate and helpful. Getting such a place in Manhattan with this price is unbelievable!

Marie is AMAZING ! She is a lovely host. She made my trip memoriable. 
Location is perfect ! and you can't find anywhere for better value. Thanks Marie :)

Wenn Du einen ruhigen, gemütlichen Ort inmitten von New York City suchst, dann ist Marie’s Hide Away genau das Richtige  für dich – hier erwartet dich morgendliches Vogelgezwitscher, viel Licht und ein bequemes Bett. Die Wohnung ist „klein, aber fein“ und Marie ist eine wunder-bare Gastgeberin; vorausschauend organisiert, unkompliziert und hilfsbereit!

Marie's place is a block from the subway, walking distance from Central Park and many good restaurants, cozy, and easy to find. Marie took interest in how our stay was going and helped us navigate the city. She made us feel at home.

Marie was very friendly and gave me good advice and was very helpful with my bags. The apartment was small but nicely furnished and quiet. It is very close to the subway and a quick trip to down town.  I had a good stay.

Marie was a wonderful host. Not only did she make me feel at home, I enjoyed our conversations and learning about her amazing background.  As a former resident of East Harlem, I absolutely love the neighborhood and highly recommend it as a place to stay for travelers who love adventure and cultural diversity. Great hospitality and neighborhood, you won't be disappointed!

Marie is very kind and helpful, she's really there for you to help make your stay wonderful. I loved the space, it was indeed beautiful and cozy. The bed was exceptionally comfortable and the fan was perfect in the summer heat! Just right. I highly recommend Marie and her wonderful home!

Marie was really nice to me and told me all about the places I wanted to see. She is really sweet, inteligent ane interesting person. LOVED her apartment and fashion tips. Next time i am in New York i would probably stay again.

Marie is a good person, polite and available for the customers, bud the apartment is in bad conditions, the bathroom was so durty and she need especify that is her apartment and she lives there, thats mean that you rent just the room and she sleeps on the couch and I didnt pay for this conditions

Appartement très sympas, bien placé, proche du metro et des bus, proche de central parc et des endroits à visiter en transport ! Le quartier est agréable !
Marie est très accueillante et donne de bon conseils ! Elle parle français courrement !  Nous avons passé six nuits chez marie et tout c'est bien déroulé ! Rapport qualité prix parfait ! Je recommande !

It was my First experience with air BnB and was great! Marie is gently and sociable. She answered to all my needs, like cooking. The house is in a perfect location because Is very near to central Park and for me that i spent all the vacation in the area was perfect. If i will return in New York i call her again.

I absolutely loved my stay! The place immediately felt like home and Marie felt like a roommate who I had lived with for years. The place is small but perfect for people who are out and about most of the day. The neighbourhood is lively and interesting, I especially liked the proximity to Central Park for morning running and to the Subway for maneuvering around the city. I highly recommend this place :)

This place is located in a part of East Harlem where  the latino community seems  to have a strong presence. The neighborhood is not fancy but it is safe and quiet. It is somewhat far away from downtown but there is a subway stop just two blocks away so you can be anywhere downtown easily. There are many shops  in the area and some banks also.  The apartment is comfortable and I would say that it is perfect for one guest. Marie, the host, is very nice, quiet, open minded and friendly  so my staying was really pleasant. If I have to go back to New York I would definitely try to stay at her place again.

L'emplacement est top , proche des métros. Le quartier est très vivant et tout est à proximité. La chambre est un peu petite mais c'est largement suffisant pour 1 personne. Marie est très accueillante. C'est une hôte au top. Elle donne les bons plans pour les sorties ect ... petit plus elle parle français.

Marie is such a lovely host! 
The Apartment is well located to the sub and there is good access to the airport. 
Marie always helped with any kind of questions and gave me information and everything was really quick as well. 
I would always stay there another time :)))
the place was great tight in the heart of east Harlem. Closer to central park for those who enjoy running

L'appartement de Marie est petit mais tout est ok pour un court séjour. L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter Harlem et se rendre par la ligne 6 sur les principaux sites de Manhattan. Marie est une personne adorable et je recommande vivement.

Marie es una excelente persona, su casa está a cuadra y media de una estación del metro y eso hace que te puedas mover muy fácil.

Su departamento es pequeño pero está muy limpio.

Mi vuelo llegó muy temprano y salió muy tarde, para aprovechar más el día me puse de acuerdo con Marie y ella me guardo mi equipaje y así aproveche hasta el último momento en la gran manzana.

Spent three nights Marie's! Location was phenomenal. Target, 7-Eleven, Wendy's and two 24 hour Spanish Restaurants all less than a 10 minute walk. I couldn't think of a better location for late night stops and quick bites. The 2, 3 and 6, 4, 5 subway were also a 10 minute walk. Marie was welcoming, friendly, good conversationalist and overall a genuine person. Very responsive to messages. She even waited up to 3AM when my friend and I arrived. Bed was comfortable, had walking room with 2 luggage bags and a backpack! Definitely 100% would stay here again! :)
Marie is a great host. Everything was perfect ! I enjoyed talking to her after my long days of sightseeing. I could have not wished for a better host in NY.
Marie est une hote vraiment cool!! Elle est accueillante et met tout de suite à l'aise. Elle donne de bons conseils. Son logement est conforme à la description. Rien a redire. Je recommande +++
Marie is the best of the best of the best. What a great human being! Super sweet and funny too . ..and so easy going!! Staying with her made my first time in New York extra special..i love this human
Marie is a gracious host.  I felt right at home!

Marie is a kind and awesome person who has shared with me everything about the culture, life and ways of thinking of the Americans and gives me a lot of advices for visiting NYC in few days. The house is small as in the description but very comfortable and clean. I would highly recommend her and I’ll stay again in her place on my next visit! Very close to line green and red of the underground and Central Park North.

My stay at Marie's was fantastic. The location was easy to get to and was right in the area I needed to be. Marie is full of energy and is willing to help with directions or suggestions of where to eat and what to do. It was such a pleasure to stay with her!

I consider myself really lucky to have stayed at Marie's place. She is my first airbnb experience and she really made it a great one. Such an educated, very friendly and helpful person - I believe that I just made a new friend in NY. The area is really nice very lively shops are open at anytime of the day and really safe to walk around at anytime night and day. It is also close to any part of NY to go to. I found it very easy to walk around or get the train. The place was also very good and comfortable - for the price that Marie offers as well, makes it an excellent choice for staying in NY. Marie that you so much for your great hospitality and see you soon :)
The Appartement of Marie is located like described and the subway to downtown is only 200m away. Marie is a cool and warm-hearded person. it is a pleasure to talk with her.
So so
Perfect place to stay as a solo traveler. I wasn’t there much, but was nice to have place to crash.
Very nice place for staying in NYC. Walking distance to line 6 and 15 mins to midtown with subway. Marie is very friendly and happy to help on anything.

Marie is simply the most wonderful host. It was my first ever solo AirBnB stay, but Marie was very conscientious about communicating with me prior to my arrival, alleviating any of my anxiety. Her hospitality was also outstanding - she waited up till 2am for me to arrive and opened the door for me, kindly allowed me to check out late and everything was neat and clean. It's a small place but super cozy for 1. Our 2 hour conversation on the night before I left also made my trip to NYC so invaluable! Marie has the best family stories and sense of humour; I wouldn't have wanted to spend my last night in NYC any other way! Thanks Marie! Can't wait to be back again!
Due to MY change of plans, I didn't stay at Marie's place. But she replies to messages constantly and instantly which should really help when arranging your trips!
Marie is an amazing host and incredibly interesting person. Talking with her was a delight. The space was also a steal being so close to the downtown and in a cool neighborhood.

We had great experience staying at Marie’s apartment. She is a great host who knows how to handle the conversation. We’ve met as a strangers, but said good bye as friends. This is how she makes her place warm and cares about her guests. Moreover, she is a walking map if you ask her which places to visit, question her and she will guide you. 
Thank you again Marie!
the apartment is small but cozy and it's 5km away from downtown. Marie is super cool and happy to talk. it's a nice place for a short stay in Manhattan.
Marie was very friendly, accommodating and communticated well.  Her apartment was as described; cute, cozy, clean and close to the subway. Plenty of restaurants and stores nearby also.
A nice place near the subway station.

Overall, I enjoyed my stay and would recommend it. The apartment is on the small side (this is Manhattan), but despite the close quarters, the room you stay in is comfortable and surprisingly private (Marie sleeps on the couch in the adjacent living area but you won't even know she's there). The pictures were accurate. I came during the winter, and the room can get a little hot when the heating is on (there's a radiator next to the be bed that can't be controlled). The 6 line is located close by, giving easy access to the rest of the city. Marie is very friendly and accommodating host. I enjoyed talking with her. She even saved me from a wrinkled suit by letting me use her steamer!
Marie est  une super host! elle merite son statud de superhosts. vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés!
Very nice experience. Everything was fine. Thanks to Marie!
Our stay was perfect. Marie-Caroline was the ideal host. The apartment is very quiet and near to the subway station. And the bed is very comfortable ! I highly recommend ! :)
El Depto es como dicen las fotos y está limpio. Marie ha sido muy amable

Marie is hands down the best Airbnb host I’ve ever had! So sweet and caring, she gave us many wonderful tips for places to eat and things to do in the area. We are thinking of moving to New York soon, and she made us feel not only accepted but supported and cared for. 

Her place was clean and organized, without being veneer-like as some Airbnb homes can be.

The subway is an easy block and a half away that will take you all the way to lower Manhattan. Definitely check out Doña Maty’s right downstairs for the best late night tacos and quesadillas. The area is quite busy, but we felt safe at all times. Would absolutely recommend her place to anyone staying in New York. A stellar value!
Caroline was a great host, very accommodating, friendly and responsive.  Her place is great in I'll revisit when back.

Great location and host. No frills!
If you need to stay in Manhattan on a budget, this is a great choice. The room was comfortable and clean, as was the bathroom (although a little cramped). You’re steps away from the subway (Line 6) and Citi rental bikes! There was good communication from Marie at all times and she helped me navigate from the airport to the apartment via public transport. Her status as a Superhost is well deserved!

An excellent host, totally on top of everything,kind, considerate, will help you navigate NY if you need it. The set up is perfect for me, my own room, wi-fi and anything you need right out the door, and the 6 train only two blocks away. I get SO much done when I stay here!
Very recommended

Caroline's place was perfect. It's very close to Manhattan, e.g. Central Park and the Met. There is a subway station less than a mile away that takes you anywhere in New York City. There are shops and restaurants all along the street of her place. The Mexican restaurant next door has great tacos and coffee!
Caroline was very nice and accommodating!

There is probably no better place to stay and no better host than Caroline in NYC! Caroline was very helpful and very easy. It was a fantastic and peaceful atmosphere in the cozy apartment right from the start! The apartment is close to the subway and you can go downtown very quickly, and living in Harlem is much cheeper than in midtown - highly recommend this for your stay in New York. Supermarkets, shops, restaurants, everything is just next door.

Everything at Caroline’s place is exactly as it is described. She is very nice and also Lucky (her dog)!, always with a smile to help anything we needed. 

The location is pretty good, it is less than 2 blocks to the nearest subway station and it takes 15 minutes or less to get to the downtown by metro. 

The only thing to improve is to have a fan or ac in to the room, because at night it were about 30 Celsius degrees and it’s difficult for sleeping or just staying at least for us but apart from that everything was ok!

Thank you Caroline!

Caroline is very nice host. The apartment is at good location, close to the metro station and lots of shops. The area is safe. The apartment is small but sufficient. The bedroom is oriented to the small gardens between the buildings and not at street. Thank you Caroline!

Caroline is a superb host with amazing local knowledge on places to eat and things to do! She has a wonderful yorkie, called Lucky, who is gorgeous!! The apartment is clean and tidy and close to the subway!

Con's - there is no lift in the apartment and East Harlem can be a little unnerving at night.

Excellent accueil de la part de Caroline. Cette expérience fait partie de mes meilleurs Airbnb. Caroline est chaleureuse et nous met à l'aise. J'avais l'impression de me sentir chez moi. 
Ma communication a été très facile avec elle. 

Je recommande vivement cette adresse.!!!! 
De plus, l'emplacement de l'appartement est génial. Il se trouve près des commerces et du métro. 
Les commerçants du quartier sont super.

Caroline was a great host. She was always quick to reply and gave me lots of local tips. Her place is close to a subway station and lots of helpful services (food shopping, laundromat).

There is no AC so keep that in mind if you're traveling in the height of summer like I was but Caroline gave me a fan to help me cope.

Caroline is a very good person, she was very nice with us!

Caroline gave us precise instructions for the check in. The place is close the the Metro and there is a delicious taco restaurant (taco Mix Grill) just besides the place.

Caroline est une super (Website hidden by Airbnb) petit soin
Appartement très bien situé et très silencieux
Caroline is a really nice host. I' m very thankfull for the good Time in her room. ❤
Great location, very close to subway, Caroline is super warm and nice! She provided everything we needed during the stay.
Host is very nice person. She helped me a lot. There is cute dog !!!!

Pratique à deux pas du métro, nous sommes arrivés tard mais cela n'a posé aucun problème. Certes le lieu n'est pas très grand, mais nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Caroline qui est une personne formidable et avec qui on peut avoir de bonnes discussions (dans toutes les langues ou presque !). Elle est aussi de bon conseil pour les lieux incontournables. Tout ce que j'aime d'un séjour en Airbnb!

Très bonne situation  dans Harlem, proche du métro. Marie nous avait donné  les bonnes infos pour arriver jusque chez elle facilement depuis l'aéroport.  Elle et son petit chien Lucky nous ont très bien accueillis. Elle parle français et ça facilite les choses ! l'appartement est petit mais très cosy, fonctionnel,bien décoré et propre. Les nuits sont calmes. A recommander pour votre séjour à NY !!

Caroline es muy amable y siempre está dispuesta a ayudar y brindar los mejores consejos para conocer la ciudad .

En cuanto a ubicación estás en las orillas de Manhattan lo mejor es que tienes a 2 cuadras la estación del metro y pues facilita mucho el transporte . La ubicación no es la más “bonita” pero es seguro aunque llegues en la madrugada sin problemas
Our stay was great! Great host, small cozy and clean apartment. Her dog is adorable. Would stay there again.
Caroline's stay was perfect.  It was my second time staying at this stylish, convenient, and very friendly home.  Recommended highly.

Caroline is a kind and friendly host, she went out of her way to make us feel welcome and was so helpful with everything, the space is very small but very clean, if you are spending most of your time out exploring the city it will be perfect for you!

Caroline est très, vraiment très chaleureuse, accueillante - une hospitalité comme je l'adore. Elle connaît bien la ville, mais que NYC, et elle prend le temps de faire la causette. On se sent très proche de l'idée initiale d'Airbnb.

Caroline is very helpful and and an extremely warm person.  Her apartment is really small so you need to be comfortable with that.  Very cute little dog.  TINY bathroom.  Immediate neighborhood pretty safe and busy through the early evening but about 6 blocks west it is a little sketchy if you are taking the subway back after 9pm coming up the west side.  Good value and close to the subway stop for east side of Manhattan.
Es un sitio ubicado en Harlem, lleno de sitios de comercio, y seguro. Es un poco distante de los sitios turísticos de Manhattan pero el metro esta muy cerca. Caroline siempre esta dispuesta a ayudar.

La chambre de Caroline est située très proche du métro ce qui a été un vrai plus pour nous afin de profiter un maximum de Manathan.
Caroline est très sympa et très discrète.
Appartement bien situé, proche métro dans un quartier très sympa. Caroline est très accueillante, de bons conseils et passe du temps avec vous !
Amazing. Good location and subway for everything. Marie is a great person and Lucky the lovely dog!

Me encantó el departamento de Caroline!! ella es muy amable y tiene muy buena disposición. Su departamento es muy limpio y tiene mucho estilo, además de estar muy bien ubicado. Tiene un perrito que se porta muy bien! es muy tranquilo y no se nota que está ahí. Es un lugar pequeño pero muy acogedor

name: Northshore Home: Stunning ocean-views, 1 acre land
summary: So private and so close!  All you hear is the sound of the ocean and singing tropical birds looking into your window. Beautiful  3 bedroom home on the Pupukea Hill Side with stunning ocean and valley views. Built on poles, this home in an upscale neighborhood. Large private grounds with fruit trees, gardens and a wrap around lanai is yours to enjoy. Ideal for families, couples or even if you like to have a large place for yourself. Can sleep up to 8 in 3 bedrooms.  Close to the best beaches!
space: A beautiful drive up the hill and about a mile from many beautiful wide sandy Northshore Beaches, Waimea Bay, Sharks Cove or Sunset Beach. Enjoy a fantastic view from this very private 3 Bedroom, 4 bed home. My  Australian style pole house has two very large yards with fruit trees, a double garage and a wrapped around lanai (balcony) with stunning ocean and valley views. There is a second lanai upstairs and accessible from the upstairs master bedroom. Simple furniture, high-speed internet access (complimentary) Cable TV with all basic channels.  There is a big screen TV with Bose Speakers and a VCR in the living room and a TV in the upstairs bedroom. The TV in one of the downstairs guest bedroom is not connected to cable. I have Netflix, YouTube, and good high-speed wifi internet connection. The home has a full kitchen, a washer & dryer, but no dishwasher. There is a large kitchen counter, bar chairs and a  living room with a couch set.  Views are breathtaking when sitting in the livin

Beautiful  3 bedroom home on the Pupukea Hill Side with stunning ocean and valley views. Built on poles, this home in an upscale neighborhood. Can sleep up to 8 in 3 bedrooms.  Close to the best beaches! A beautiful drive up the hill and about a mile from many beautiful wide sandy Northshore Beaches, Waimea Bay, Sharks Cove or Sunset Beach. Enjoy a fantastic view from this very private 3 Bedroom, 4 bed home. My  Australian style pole house has two very large yards with fruit trees, a double garage and a wrapped around lanai (balcony) with stunning ocean and valley views. There is a second lanai upstairs and accessible from the upstairs master bedroom. Simple furniture, high-speed internet access (c
neighborhood_overview: Upscale and quiet neighborhood. Listen to the sound of the ocean , watch tropical birds in your yard and pick some fresh fruits. The views are stunning. Surfing is the best in the world during the winter. Swimming, diving, snorkeling, hiking spots, amazing sunset views are just some of the gifts of staying on the North Shore.  Can you walk to the beaches?  Yes, you easily could, but I recommend taking your rental car. There is so much to see around the neighborhood, so many restaurants, food trucks, parks, stores, the beach with the turtles - parking is free and easy.  The shoreline with a large Foodland Supermarket and a Coffee Bean Store, Pupukea Beach and Sharks Cove is less than a mile. Haleiwa Town or the Turtle Bay Hotel about 7 miles, Waimea Park, 1 1/2 miles, Sunset Beach 2-3  miles  ( depending on where you go)  The beach where you can swim with the turtles is 3 miles away.  A boat tour to see sharks leaves from Haleiwa harbor (7 miles away) Enjoy horseback riding or a helicop
notes: This is a true and very safe residential home and a local country neighborhood. People are friendly and the Aloha spirit governs here.  Feel free to jog around the neighborhood. Don't worry about some barking dogs, you will love the homes around here and the views - it's really beautiful. Yes, we have mosquitos. The Northshore and Hawaii, in general  is beautiful and green, it means we have rain, but mostly in the evening or during the night. It's important to keep the front door and bug screens closed to keep pest including mice out of the home. Twice a month my house is treated for pest, but you will always see Geckos and once in a while a cock roach. They are part of the inventory in any home and are harmless.  Trash pick up is Wednesday morning and I would appreciate you putting the gray trash can out to the street on Tuesday night.  Our water is clean and safe to drink, but I also provide ice cold drinking water to my guests, and you can find an additional container in the garage.
transit: A rental car is the best solution to stay at this house. Public busses operate from Foodland and Kam Hwy. It's 1.1 mile walk up and down a hill to get there. (Hitchhiking is safe and used often)
access: Guests have access to the entire home, but the owner has some personal items in the house. The house is your's alone to enjoy when rented.
interaction: I would be happy to help whenever I can. I will be at my second apartment in Honolulu. I lived at the home I know rent at times for more than 25 years.
house_rules: Surfers, military, couples and single travelers (gay and straight) over 18 are welcome. Please discuss any parties or events planned prior to booking your room with the owner. There are additional requirements and cleaning charges for parties or events. This property  is only available to NON-Hawaii residents.

host.host_about: Two easy going  guys, open minded, travel the globe constantly.

reviews.comments: Juergen was a very nice host, and his place was spatious and comfortable.  We stayed for two days and got unlucky weather, so it was nice to have a relaxing living room kick back in.  Juergen was actually not home very much.  I believe he was just starting to rent the place out again, so he had bought new sheets, towels etc.  The kitchen hadn't been used in a while, and there was a bit of dust and such around, otherwise, it was tidy enough and we were happy with our stay.

An amazing place in an incredible location right in the middle of the North Shore of Oahu!! It is the perfect place from which to explore the island and to view the famous waves!! Juergen is a very friendly and accommodating host and the room was perfect and the house amazing!! Unfortunately we did not meet him as he was away but he arranged everything for us to enter his house and our stay was perfect! There is a Foodland supermarket at the bottom of the road which is very convenient. The room was a good size and the double bed very comfortable! We highly recommend this place!!

Wow, what a special place to stay! Juergen is very kind, and his house overlooking the ocean is spectacular. I saw humpback whales jumping in the distance, and Chameleons climbing on the trees. If you are interested in visiting the North Shore, this a wonderful way to do it. The house works perfectly as a starting point for many fun North Shore activities, and there is a Foodland just down the street! Thanks Juergen :)
Great host nice house in pupukea

This house is spacious and have a good location  up the hill close to all you facilities you will need. The host Juergen is super helpful and friendly and will make your stay easier. This host is highly recommended from all 4 of us!

Great house and the view is amazing.
Juergen was a great host, took good care of us and let us use the house as if we actually lived there with him.
It was amazing.
Thanks a lot for the espressos :)
Mahalo!
Sitio espectacular. Como en casa.
This was lovely relaxing (Website hidden by Airbnb) is well located in North Island.The host is very relaxed person.

The room is very comfortable, the mattress is firm but not too hard and there are great pillows and high thread count clean sheets (Im very picky about these things!) You have a lock on your door, so there's an extra element of security. I think this is a good room for a single person but not so much a couple as the bed is squeaky so it could be rather embarrassing ;) I was traveling alone so I was a little nervous about staying with two people I didn't know but Juergen and his housemate Dimitri are extremely welcoming and made me feel very much at home. The location is wonderful, very easy to get to all the best parts of the North Shore. I would definitely stay here again.

Started our honeymoon at Juergen's home. The views from up on the cliff where his house is perched are stunning! He was very nice and even offered assistance when we had a little car trouble. Ample parking, great local knowledge and highly recommended. Will definitely stay here again next time we come to North Shore.

The view and privacy was perfect. We never saw the host so the place felt like our own.  There is a washer and dryer,  full kitchen,  a beautiful living area and two bedrooms with three queen sized beds.  The place was clean and well stocked with towels and linens.

Beautiful cabin-style home tucked on a hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Gorgeous sunsets, beautiful wrap around lanai. Very secluded and such a unique home. Beautiful art throughout the entire home. Sculptures, animals figurines, masks, statues - the artwork added an amazing vibe and feel to the entire place. Views from the living room were unbelievable. Views from the master bedrooms were just as good. The bed in the master bedroom was sooooo comfortable. The pillows along with the mattress made it feel like you were sleeping on a cloud! Water cooler in the kitchen was a very nice touch. Kitchen had all the amenities to prepare meals. Pictures were exactly as described.

Staying at Juergen's house was one of the highlights of our trip to Hawaii! It is the perfect location for those looking to hang around the North Shore area. It was a quick trip to the grocery store, beaches, etc. The area is private and quiet with outstanding views from the home. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer!
This place was awesome! The house has tons of character, amazing views, and comfortable beds. We were very happy with our stay.
Great spot! Thanks!

Great location. House is older so expect some things to be worn. Comfy beds. Great views. Everything we needed in the kitchen. Very fast responses to any questions. Excellent value. Overall great stay and would stay again.

This place has amazing views and character in a truly great location. The only downside is it it tired and could do with a good spruce up. If your not too fussy then this is the place for you. Jorgen Is a great host and very responsive

Gorgeous view. Big, open house up the hill. A bit rustic, but has the basics. Car recommended to get to the beach/town. Very peaceful area up in the treetops overlooking the beautiful ocean. Be prepared for some bugs and geckos since you’re in nature, but overall a gorgeous spot to relax looking out at the ocean.

We had a great week at juergens place. It was a big house on the hills in Pupkea, only 1 mile from Foodland, but driving is much safer than walking down the narrow, whindy road to get to kamehameha hwy (main road to beaches). The house is made of all wood which was beautiful and unique. It has a lot of character and the location offers an amazing view of waimea sunset area. The house is a lil older (but clean and tidy) so expect a real hawaiian style vacation.  The ac units in each room didnt do much for us but most of the fans worked out well. Some of the lights didnt work so if these things matter to you i think they would accomodate with a simple request for bulbs ahead of time. We were okay with the lights we had but upstairs was a little dim at times. The hosto was great responding to everything right away. He even treated us to dinner since he had to get the washer replaced, which was super prompt. Usually id prefer to stay closer to the beach but this location was so close to everything that it was a nice change of pace, and nice to be so close to northshore beaches (waimea, sunset, rockys) as opposed to being in waialua,where i stay usually. Overallourstay  was great! Clean house, lots of towels, great view, new washer AND dryer!! Supersafe.garage doesnt close but doesnt need to since its a safe area.
Stunning views. Great host. Lots of communication. Rustic home.

Emplacement idéal ! Calme, dans la nature, proche des commerces, des plages et des trails !
Vue magnifique et maison très confortable !
Nous avons adoré notre séjour !!!

A few of my friends and I stayed in this beautiful home on our vacation to Hawaii and we had such a wonderful experience. Amazing view, cabin-like feel to the home, serene, and very quick responses. I highly recommend this place to everyone!! Juergen had a beautiful home and he was a great host. Thank you!

Juergens house was great, just what we were expecting. Close access to many beaches, especially with a rental car, beautiful wrap around porch was used every night to sit and watch the sunsets and enjoy the quiet nights.

The home is located on the hillside near Sharks Cove. The views are breathtaking.  Home is very spacious with everything you need. Don’t be afraid of the bugs, you’re in the jungle growth, and we were visited by some little Pigs in the morning. 

Juergen’s commuication and respond was outstanding and he has been one of our favorite host. I now understand why he is a super host.

This place, the view, the host—it’s awesome! Needs some TLC in the bathroom area, but spent the weekend in north shore for a stay cation and it really just fit the bill for our group spacious and private! Right up the mountain (2min) from Foodland and world known beaches! 

The host was nice enough to bring a blender by in the middle of the night when asked if he had one, and didn’t. That’s super-host status right there!! 

The view and character of the house is unforgettable, and we will be back soon! 

Mahalo, Juergen!!!

Staying at Juergen’s place was great fun! The sunset on the deck is beautiful and the visits from the pigs were always good fun. It was exactly as I expected and the location is great! (Rental car is a must in the North Shore) If I had to offer any suggestions it would be to put fly screens on the sliding doors so they can be left open during the night to let in the beautiful sea breeze that cools the house down!
Our family of 6 stayed at Juergen's for 8 days. The view was stunning and conveniently located- close to great beaches. During our stay we had a couple questions and he was very quick to respond.

This house was disguesting. Termites in sink and cupboards. M8ce turds in cupboards. Freezer was full of frost to point it was unusable. Garbage all over garage and deck. Thw place stunk. AC unit did not work. Frayed electrical cords plugged in.

We do not recommend this place. Took host almost 12 hours to respond.
We left and found other accomendations.
Ein super Haus an einer fantastischen Örtlichkeit. Leider schon etwas in die Jahre gekommen!
Overall, we enjoyed our stay. Great location and views from the lanai. However, we had a bit of issues with cleanliness of the house and some of the lighting fixtures were not able to work.

Loved the location, it's right in the heart of North Shore. Close to great beaches, groceries, shopping, and things to do. Loved that we could go surfing, paddle boarding, kayaking, hiking, shopping, and have great food so close to the house. It is about a mile up the hill from the beach so you have gorgeous views of the ocean and sunsets with the wrap around deck. Geckos all over the place, which my kids loved. At the bottom of the hill was a grocery store which was great. The house is in the country side of the island with winding roads so it was a bit hard to find when we got in after dark but Juergen was super helpful in finding it and answered right away when I called. His place reminds me of a little surfer's bungalow. Totally gives a great island vibe. Definite value for the price and highly recommend.

Great spot on the North Shore. Foodland is right down the road along with several public beaches. The view from the deck is amazing and the inside is beautiful. Juergen is very nice and responsive to messages. A++

Our stay was great. Just expect no door connecting the upstairs room to the rest of the house. There will definitely be bugs, but the house is overall beautiful in itself. The downstairs bathroom will tend to clog. It's not exactly the cleanest house, but there is character within and if you don't mind that then you will definitely enjoy this home.
Beautiful location and quiet

Juergen’s place provided a truly rustic feel if you’re looking for an “out-in-the-woods” kind of feel for your stay. The house was spacious and old-fashioned. Different from most stylish houses. Juergen was helpful and responsive when assistance was required. It was pleasant communicating with him.
Great location, amazing views, and a nice place. Host was accommodating and quick to respond
Great communicator and accommodating
Very quick responses to my questions and wonderful location
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 58 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
