Renting from a privately managed unit gives you all the advantages for less the cost.
notes: Tax Id (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: With over 60 beaches to explore, best to have a car to get around.
access: You have access to all amenities at the resort with the exception of the laundry room which belongs to a different program.  You have several laundry facilities to choose from close by.
interaction: Our on island contact is there if you should need anything and will address any housekeeping or maintenance requests during your stay.
house_rules: Hawaiian law prohibits smoking in buildings or lanais.  Designated smoking areas on property. Islander on the Beach - Keyless Locks 	- Complimentary parking 	- No resort fee when staying with us 	- 2 pool towels included  	- 4 Hand/Wash/Bath Towels 	- Front desk services a different program, but you do pick up your parking pass there - only 	- Cleaning Fee is a Clean Out Fee.  Additional services can be purchased directly from housekeeping 	- The unit is provided with starter amounts of shampoo, soap, and toilet paper 	- You are responsible for your Toilet Paper, Paper Towels, Soaps and Shampoo 	 Driving direction and your access will be sent 5 days prior to arrival with your entry instructions.  If you don`t receive it, check your spam folder.  It will be coming from Info@hulanow and is sent automatically from the system.  The instructions will provide a lock box code, which is your keyless door lock code, you will go directly to the unit and let yourself in. Your contact is Val (Phon

host.host_about:
Hula Now is a Marketing and Reservation Company for Kauai Oceanfront Vacation Properties.

Office is open Pacific Coast Time ONLY

reviews.comments:
To be clear, "Hula" isn't a person, this listing is run by a company.  Which isn't necessarily a bad thing, but don't expect to meet a little lady called Hula.  The condo is in a hotel/condo/timeshare complex.  The view from the room is great, you can see the sun rise in the morning (at least we could in winter.)  We didn't use the pool or hot tub, but there seemed to be a great poolside bar that kept people coming back.

Everything about the place is advertised.  The one negative would be parking.  While you do get a parking spot in the lot, there are generally more cars than spots.  If you go out in the evening expect to have to park far away from the hotel when you get back.
Very clean and comfortable. Great ocean view over the pool area. Bed was firm and comfortable. Kitchenette had the bare essentials. We really enjoy staying at the Islander.

This is a private condo in the Aston Islander on the Beach resort. So, the experience is more in lines of a hotel/resort as opposed to a typical AirBnB setup. If you like to interact with the hosts etc., this might not be a place for you. For us, we actually like privacy and this was the perfect fit.
 They room was just as shown in the pictures. It was very clean and had beautiful views of the ocean. There were adequate number of towels and toiletries in the room and we never felt the need to call for a room service in the three days we stayed there. The location itself was very central to everything. We never had an issue with finding food / supplies within a 5 minute distance. All in all, I would definitely stay here in our next trip to Kauai and would absolutely recommend this place if you are planning a visit.
Wonderful location, great suite. We will come back in the future.

This unit was awesome! Great location - small shopping complex with a market, coffee shop, fish market/restaurant with fresh catch, snorkel/kayak gear rentals right next door. Awesome amenities - pool, HOT hot tub, and tiki bar with a great happy hour and excellent bar tenders on property. Tons of beach walking right out front and a nice path. The condo came with beach towels, a huge plus for me! Also had wifi in the room and got a parking pass from the front desk that was included. The room was very nice and clean, bed was comfy, kitchenette was useful. This place had everything we could have wanted and was fairly priced. Third floor unit facing the beach had great views. Neighbors were quiet and respectful of noise hours which was great for us going to bed shortly after dark and getting up early to make the most of our time here. Loved it, will definitely stay again!

The listing description was absolutely accurate. We felt as though we had already visited when we arrived because the pictures that were provided were what we saw in real time. It was a beautiful location and our room was terrific. We were notified that a new coffee pot was brought to us after we arrived and this was an extra indication that they were aware of any imperfection that might affect our trip.

This was a very spacious and comfortable room. The ocean view was better than most high end hotels previously visited. The beach was not a place where you could swim easily but the pool and hot tub more than made up for that short fall. There were plenty of beautiful beaches nearby for swimming and Snorkeling. It was conveniently located on the east side of the island close to all the activities we enjoyed. There was grocery and drug stores nearby so we were not forced to eat out for every meal. I would highly recommend this place and would use it again when we come back to Kauai.

We had a very relaxing stay and the condo met all our needs and expectations.  The central location makes it convenient for exploring other parts of the island.  The facility was very clean and well maintained. Although others have mentioned parking issues, we were always able to park reasonably close to our unit.  We would certainly stay there again!

The resort is better than the pictures as well as our unit 306! It is actually a hotel.
Its location at the top floor center in the main building provided the best view from its wide lanai: the neatly kept grounds of the resort everywhere you look, followed by the pool & jacuzzi area by the tiki bar and behind all that the beach front and beautiful waives where we spotted a sea turtle swimming. 

The room unit was very clean, airconditioned and had all the necessities for a convenient stay.  Every night we slept keeping the lanai door open, so we can hear the waives crashing in the near distance. Highly recommended! Just keep the slider net closed, so no uninvited small tropical guests get inside :-)

There is a nice shopping plaza next door with everything you may need for your vacation: snorkel rental shop, fish restaurant, souvenir shops, attraction bookings etc.

Also, twice a week a farmers market takes place there offering huge selection of local organic non-GMO fruits,  vegetables, honey etc. Free luau dancers are having their show as well twice a week.  

All I can say is that we got great value for our money and if we have another chance to visit Kauai we'll look this place first.

Wonderful place!!! The home has amazing views!!!! Extremely well equipped, excellent location, and easy access to the beach. Great location and a farmer's market on Tuesday and Thursday within a minute walking distance.

The room had a gorgeous view and the location was extremely convenient. Plenty of fantastic food and drinks within walking distance not to mention the huge stretch of gorgeous beach front. The room itself was extremely comfortable and I couldn't ask for more. I would definitely stay at this unit again!

Great view! Could see whales from the balcony, very clean, very comfortable bed, loved the property. Would definitely stay there again! Great location and close to great food. Thank you so much! We would definitely stay here again!
Convenient location.  Easy walk to restaurants and CVS/Longs Drugs.
Great location! Quiet and nice beach and pool.
We had a great stay here. Perfect location, right on the beach and close to good places to eat. The room was perfect for my wife and I. Great view from the balcony

Great location. Amazing sea views from the room. You can wake up to sunrise every morning.  Good communication from the host through email with clear instructions. Central to north and south shore. Highly recommend!
Nice view of ocean, good central location.

My wife and I found this to be a great stay! Everything was communicated easily and accurately. The place had a very comfortable bed with beautiful ocean views. The pool and spa were very relaxing with a fantastic poolside tiki bar. Nearby are various coffee shops, lounges, restaurants, and the Sleeping Giant Grill, which had some of the best fish on our trip. We found the location to be ideal for day trips and adventures. Walls might be a little thin, as a family checked in next door on our last day and were loud, but that might have been from their excitement. Overall, we definitely will plan to come back here the next time we vacation in Kauai!
This place was fantastic! Great location just a short ride from the airport. Wonderful facilities with a pool and hot tub, bar and parking. We'd definitely stay again - thanks!

This is a great place.  Centrally located on the island.  Close to local coffee shop and restaurants.  The grounds are mature and well kept.  The beach is easy access and pretty.  I wouldn't consider the beach one that I would spend a lot of time swimming in as it is a bit rough.  But, nice for a quick dip and you can't beat the easy access.  The condo itself has all the necessities and is well kept.  I'd stay here again in the future.
地理位置很好,酒店里直接可以走到海滩边,离机场很近,附近超市小镇都在开车五分钟的距离内,酒店维持得很好,很喜欢,下次去还会选择

We had a lovely stay here! The unit was great, we loved having access to the pool (and the beach which was a minute walk away) and managed to get pretty easily into Kapaa and then further around Kauai. Car rental is likely necessary if you're looking to explore the island but that can be said of any accommodation. The ability to park the car without charge was a pleasant plus. There are a number of good restaurants/cafes in the same complex as the unit, which is highly convenient.
It had a beautiful view of the ocean front and check in was seamless. By a bunch of great restaurants as well - great stay!
Great place! Would love to stay there again in the future.
Gorgeous view from the unit. In a nice area.
Room and location was just as described. Didn't spend a great amount of time at the condo but it was perfect to come back and unwind after a long day of exploring beautiful Kauai!
Beautiful view of ocean, perfectly centered location, with a coffee shop and restaurants within walking distance. Would stay again.

I was pleasantly surprised by this space. I was able to fall asleep every night to the sound of waves on the beach. Great little view too. Waking up with the sun rising over the ocean out front. Everything I needed was in walking distance. The beach was great. Pool was perfect. A little bar for beverages. Perfect place to take a little rest and enjoy myself. Thanks!

Pictures don't do this place justice! The room is part of the Islander resort- a great, central and laid back resort. Walkable to some great spots in Kapaa, but also a great location for jetting off wherever adventure takes you on the island. Pool and bar area along the ocean are great extras that allow you to "stay in" and not feel one bit guilty about!

This was a great location for us , we love Kapaa and the coconut market place! Trees lounge also has live music  every night, and love the fresh farmers market as well two days a week!  And free hula show !

We really enjoyed our stay. The room has great ocean views and nice balcony that we used daily. We love that side of the island, seeing the sunrise every morning from the beach that is a minute away. The resort's pool is great, with a little bar and live music once or twice a week.

Loved our stay here! Parking was super convenient, the place was very clean, very comfy bed, amazing view of the ocean & pool area from the balcony! Great location - Kapaa is SUCH a cute town and only a 5 minute drive away! Would definitely recommend staying at this airbnb - we were so sad to leave!!
Die Unterkunft hat eine bombastische Aussicht und einen wirklich unschätzbaren Balkon, es was ruhig und sauber. Genau richtig für Kauai und sehr zentral gelegen um die Insel zu erkunden.

This room exceeded my expectations! The view is great, the location is perfect and it was super clean. It wasn't fancy, but it provided everything we needed for our stay. I'd highly recommend staying here.

My wife and I stayed here five nights in March. The place was clean, outfitted well enough to have breakfasts and cocktail hours, and in a location close to coffee shops, a market and some good restaurants. Try the hotel next door, or sleeping giant grill for tacos. The lanai and ocean view were what made this place really special for us. Central location on the island makes an equidistant drive to go north or south. Worked well for us. The only small thing, is that the pool is not heated, and in March it was a bit cold for us to use. Place was clean, check in was easy, we didn’t actually talk to anyone. Just make sure you go to the front desk of the hotel and get a parking pass. Aloha!
This place was clean, convenient and the view is absolutely relaxing. Great for a family of three.

Great view of the ocean, can hear the waves all day and all night. 

Easy check in and out.

Comfortable and clean.

Cute place that looks just like the photos. The bed was a bit hard for our tastes (both our hips were hurting after a few days), but this is really so dependent on your opinion, so wouldn't really dock the place for it. The location is great, and it was clean. I'd say this is like a nice 3-start hotel.
Convenient location! Comfortable place

Room 306 was a great stay with great views and close proximity. Conveniently located between two other resorts and all three have great poolside bars, make sure to try the Colada Vic From Mike at Hukilau Linai or the lava flow at Lava Lava

Pros:

Great location and awesome view! The east side of Kauai was a perfect place to stay as you have access to both the North and South beach with just a short drive away. Plenty of great food options nearby including Sleeping Giant Grill which is literally less than 100 feet away from the unit. Coconut Market was conveniently a short walk away as well.

Cons:

We had a 6 night stay but were only provided 4 towels for two people and 3 small toilet paper rolls. If staying more than 4 nights, be prepared to pay $35 plus tip for a mid-stay cleaning / towel and linen change. Unfortunately, the service did not include toilet paper, so I had to go buy some from the store. No one wants to go buy toilet paper on their vacation. It was a hassle that I wasn't expecting, so this is a heads up.

Overall, we had a great trip, and this was a perfect unit for me and my wife.
Beautiful!

Great location staying on the east shore especially since parts of the north shore were closed off. The coconut market came in handy which is in walking distance. Wish we hadn’t needed to buy so many things to stock the room & essentials though. No coffee filters or coffee offered. No beach accessories besides two towels. No cleaning service no matter how long you stay. Got pretty stinky in that place and noticed multiple cockroaches.
Beautiful spot can't wait to come back again soon!

Room 306 is a sweet oasis. We appreciated waking up every morning to a beautiful view and falling to sleep to the sounds of the waves. (Heads up-bring ear plugs if you’re a light sleeper since the roosters wake up around 6am). 

The room is clean and compact with a small fridge for storing drinks and snacks and all the dishes, glasses and flatware you could need. The best part is the patio where you can look out over the courtyard, pool and ocean beyond. 

You’re also in a great spot for any adventures. Most of our excursions were less than a 20 min drive including kayaking on the Wailua River with Ali’i Kayaks, zip lining with Outfitters Kauai and surfing with Learn to Surf. We’ll definitely be back!
Nice condo. Great resort. Nice location.
A quiet place with a beautiful view.  Be sure to remember to bring your own coffee, shampoo and soap.
good value great views and staff. fun pool bar with a great bartender!
Loved my stay
Good location

We had a great time! the view is fantastic, the grounds are beautiful, and the beach has a nice long walking area running across multiple properties, with local Heiau. I'm not sure if the beach would be swimmable, but it was very picturesque. There was a booklet taking about the local sites and food options, which we found very helpful.
The bed was comfortable (firm mattress), and despite other reviews plenty of linens (extra sheets and towels) were provided. There was a hair drier in our unit. 
The kitchen area was small but sufficient for our purposes, and the AC worked great, though the instructions in the unit stressed not turning the temperature lower than 70, so those used to sleeping in 68 degrees or below may take issue.
One note- the instructions in the unit were much more extensive than the house manual on Air BnB, and sometimes they contradicted each other. For example, many instructions referred to a lockbox for the key, when we just had to enter a code into the door. Also some check-out instructions said to take trash out to bins at the base of the stairs, and some said to just lock up and leave. As there were no trash bins at the base of the stairs... I'm sure this is because Hula Now has multiple units/properties, but it might be good to clarify that.
Overall we had a great experience in a perfect central location for exploring Kauai! Mahalo!

Good value for the location and beach access. I would recommend for the price for sure.  Cool location central in Kauai with lots of local areas and things to do. The room is what you would expect and easy to get In and out of. Definitely worth it!!

Beach view was great! There was also a pool and bar on-site. There were a good number of restaurants and markets within walking distance and plenty within a few minutes drive. The room was clean and had everything we needed available.  Check-in and out was easy.
Loved the location! Would definitely stay here again.

Unit was exactly as pictured/described. Good central location on the island for exploring both north and south. Having the pool was great and we enjoyed a picnic dinner on the beach, watching sunrise every morning, and going to sleep to the sound of the waves crashing.

We loved staying at this place on Kaua’i! It’s about halfway driving distance to the south to Koloa and to the north Hanalei- which makes you able to have a flexible schedule if the weather changes, like it did for us.  Also it’s only like 15 minutes to the airport! Because of its location on the coast, it was often sunny right around Kapa’a even if it wasn’t elsewhere so we enjoyed the beach and the pool very much! The bed was super comfy and we loved that the lanai overlooks the ocean.  It was nice to have a mini fridge for snacks and drinks but the location is also walking distance to a couple of restaurants including Lava Lava and Hukilau, and for our morning coffee Imua coffee hit the spot! Parking was easy although there are certainly less spots available after 8 pm but we were able to find a spot by driving around the lot for a little while.  Thanks for an awesome place for us to enjoy Kaua’i! We can’t wait to come back!
Great location and great views! Would stay again.
Great place to stay!  Good location, right on the beach. The unit was clean and comfortable.  Great value for the price. We will stay again on a future trip!

Photo is exact view from 3rd floor balcony. Beautiful view. The Kapa'a East island location was a great choice. We traveled all over Kauai and everything seemed an easy drive.

Read some complaints about the Coconut Market.  I have none. The market stocks everything you need and then some. We bought rum, t shirts,  fresh fruit bowls, salads, hot sandwiches. The store is immaculate.

We never used the coffee pot because there is a very nice coffee shop next door. A two minute walk from the lobby. Opens at 6:00 AM.

Bed very nice (firm). Great shower head. Kitchen adequately stocked for two. Very nice juicer, which we did not use. Last day discoverd a safe in closet. Kitchen area is small but it's not like we were cooking for guests.

I would certainly return to this unit and recommend it to friends.

This is third floor with out an elevator. That may be an issue for some people.

My only negative is no wi-fi. I couldn't get it to work in lobby either. 

All things considered,  an A+ for room and location.

We had a great stay at this hotel. This was more of a room in a boutique hotel. We had no personal interaction or suggestions from the host though. so if that is what you're looking for I don't think this would be for you. we didn't mind though. the place has a great view of the ocean and pool. the lava lava beach club on the property was great. the place was clean with your basic needs. it was more of a kitchenette than kitchen. the location is great as we traveled the entire exterior of the island and this is located in the middle and near the airport. there is a shopping center next to the property where you can pick up all your necessities. overall we were happy with our stay, but I wanted to let people know what to expect.

Die Unterkunft mit der Zimmernummer 306 hat eine absolut perfekte Lage. Nicht nur, dass die Anlage direkt am Strand liegt, sondern auch, dass man eine sehr zentrale Lage innerhalb des Resorts im obersten Stockwerk mit einer sehr guten Sicht hat (wahrscheinlich eine der besten Wohnungen in der gesamten Anlage). Gegenüber des Eingangs des Resorts liegt zudem der Coconut Marketplace, in dem alles für die kleineren Einkäufe erledigt werden kann (ABC-stores, Burger-/Fastfood-Shops, kleinere Restaurants, Souvenirzeugs, Cafes ...). Die kleine Küchen-Nische ist nicht sehr groß, aber vollkommen ausreichend für die Zubereitung von Frühstück oder kleinen Snacks.

Der Pool ist zentral in der Anlagenmitte sehr schön angelegt, direkt dahinter ist der Zugang zum Strand, ohne jegliche Straßen-/Gehwegüberquerungen.

Anlage ist von unserer Seite aus sehr empfehlenswert.
 
Mahalo und viele Grüße aus Stuttgart, Germany
Gerlinde & Udo
This place is wonderful! View of the ocean and the sunrise is spectacular. Would definitely recommend it.
Great location, very convenient store at the Coconut Market place. The place was simple and clean, and the view was amazing!!
Looking over the pool and the beach, beautiful view

This was a great location and was within walking distance to shops and restaurants.  The host will not respond to your questions.  Yes there was toilet paper, a hairdryer and an iron in case you're wondering.
Great place!  Check-in and Check-out went great.  Beautiful spot with lovely ocean view.  Close to restaurants and very clean.  Would highly recommend this property!

This was a wonderful room with an amazing view!  Having the pool and bar and ocean just steps away was fantastic. The staff was friendly as can be, there were always chairs available at the pool and on the beach. There was live music by the pool two nights/week and it was really great music! 
Every morning we walked to Lydgate state park. A wonderful way to start the day.

Myself and my husband stayed in Room 306 for 8 days and 7 nights in Jan/Feb 2019. The room is exactly as it appears in the pictures, with views to match! We enjoyed breakfast on the balcony every morning looking at the ocean. Based on previous reviews, we brought an extra roll of toilet paper (not needed), extra shampoo/conditioner/shower gel (needed because of our length of stay), a hairdryer (not needed), and purchased coffee filters and coffee at the local supermarket. We also stocked up on breakfast food and some dinner foods for grilling at the grills near the pool area at the local supermarket, which you can walk to in the Coconut Marketplace. We found we had zero issue with the amount of towels provided, and there were more than enough garbage bags for us to keep the room clean ourselves. Overall, this was a great “jumping off” point for our vacation in Kaua’i. You could spend a whole week relaxing at the resort and its nearby beaches within walking distance and have a successful vacation. Or, you could do as we did and spend several days traveling north to Hanalei, south to Poipu, and west to Waimea - nothing is more than 1 hour drive. Highly recommended place if you are looking for a low maintenance condo vacation rental with convenience to multiple Kaua’i destinations.
Our stay was great. The view was amazing and everything was great with the room.

name: 3BR Private Williamsburg Apartment
summary: Perfectly located in popular Williamsburg.  With roof access and washer/dryer/dishwasher you can either enjoy the neighborhood or stay home comfortably. In walking distance to the J/M or L train, many bars and restaurants and music venues.
space: 3 bedroom, one bathroom with flatscreen tv, washer/dryer in unit, dishwasher/microwave/coffee maker. Ideal for 4 people with one in each bed and one on the couch. However, can accommodate up to 3 more people if able to share a bed.
description: Perfectly located in popular Williamsburg.  With roof access and washer/dryer/dishwasher you can either enjoy the neighborhood or stay home comfortably. In walking distance to the J/M or L train, many bars and restaurants and music venues. 3 bedroom, one bathroom with flatscreen tv, washer/dryer in unit, dishwasher/microwave/coffee maker. Ideal for 4 people with one in each bed and one on the couch. However, can accommodate up to 3 more people if able to share a bed. Access to roof with views of the Manhattan skyline. Will be out of the country during this time...however, will designate two very good friends nearby the apartment for emergency contact. Amazing restaurants and bars of all types.  Music venues and clubs all over the neighborhood as well. 4 minute walk to the J or M train; 8 minute walk to the L train.
neighborhood_overview: Amazing restaurants and bars of all types.  Music venues and clubs all over the neighborhood as well.
transit: 4 minute walk to the J or M train; 8 minute walk to the L train.
access: Access to roof with views of the Manhattan skyline.
interaction: Will be out of the country during this time...however, will designate two very good friends nearby the apartment for emergency contact.
house_rules: No smoking in apartment or on fire escape (go out front or on roof).  No loud music after 10pm. No large parties (9 or more).

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I've lived all over the US but am proud to finally call NYC home.  I love to travel and experience new places and things. Very hands off..give you what you need and there for you if you need something, but otherwise I will probably be traveling if you're in my spot :)

reviews.comments: What an awesome host!  Super friendly, very communicative, excellent apartment.  Clean towels, brand new soaps, and beer in the fridge! What more could you ask for??  Awesome Williamsburg location--shops, dining, and metro all in walking distance.  Would definitely stay again.  Thank you, Chris!!

name: Awesome flat in the center (HUTB-014195)
summary: There are 3 double rooms (in 2 of them have balcony) a bathroom, 2 toilets and a huge and lovely living/dining room, kitchen. On the 1st floor (2nd real, without elevator). Nice neighborhood, good tapas bars, restaurants, pubs nearby. You can rent it by rooms too from November to March.
space: We offer a lovely flat with 3 double rooms (2 of them with balcony), a big living and dining room, fully equipped kitchen, 2 bathrooms. It is in the center just 10 min walk from the "Rambla" and the port, and also from the Pl. Espanya with the Magic Fountain. The closest metro station is within 3 min by walk from us, with 2  metro lines and the funicular so you can reach every important thing in the city within 15-20 min, there are a lot of restaurant, bars, tapas bars, pharmacy, bank, grocery, bakery just next to the flat. Bedsheets and towels are included in price and there is also WIFI in the whole flat.
description: There are 3 double rooms (in 2 of them have balcony) a bathroom, 2 toilets and a huge and lovely living/dining room, kitchen. On the 1st floor (2nd real, without elevator). Nice neighborhood, good tapas bars, restaurants, pubs nearby. You can rent it by rooms too from November to March. We offer a lovely flat with 3 double rooms (2 of them with balcony), a big living and dining room, fully equipped kitchen, 2 bathrooms. It is in the center just 10 min walk from the "Rambla" and the port, and also from the Pl. Espanya with the Magic Fountain. The closest metro station is within 3 min by walk from us, with 2  metro lines and the funicular so you can reach every important thing in the city within 15-20 min, there are a lot of restaurant, bars, tapas bars, pharmacy, bank, grocery, bakery just next to the flat. Bedsheets and towels are included in price and there is also WIFI in the whole flat. whole flat with equipped kitchen. bedsheets and towels check-in, check-out, telephone number (and
neighborhood_overview: Next to the Montjuic hill, close to the Pl. Espanya and Magic Fountain, 15min walk from the Ramblas and even less from the port.
notes: We have a rent-a-bike shop in  the same building, we can arrange the key pick up there. Permit nr: HUTB-014195
transit: Metro L2, L3 and Funicular and also several buses within 2-3 minutes
access: whole flat with equipped kitchen. bedsheets and towels
interaction: check-in, check-out, telephone number (and quick presence) if needed
house_rules: No smoking (only in the balconies), no pets, no party  +20€ extra fee in cash for any arrival after midnight

host.host_about: likes traveling, photography, cooking

reviews.comments: Very nice apartment and it's close to city centre.

The location is perfect: quite close to the metro station and it takes only ten minutes in metro to most of the travel spots! The condition of the apartment was very good and clean. The only defect is that the wash machine didn't work, it was somewhat inconvenient as we were staying there for five days.
A great apartment in a great location. Value for money and our host, Suzy, was really accommodating. I would recommend this apartment and would certainly return next time I'm in Barcelona.

The apartment looks great online but even better in person. Our stay was a pleasant and comfortable one. Suzy was very helpful. Our experience was great! The wifi was a little spotty but this didn't take away from our general impression. Amazing location!

Suzy met us outside and showed us around the apartment, which was actually a larger one to the one we originally booked but still in the same location.  The apartment was great and had all the facilities.  It was also very conveniently located in proximity to shops, bars and metro.  We really loved the location and enjoyed hanging out at the La Esquinita pinchos bar just around the corner.  Suzy was very helpful and even let us keep our bags at the place while we did some more exploring on our last day in Barcelona.  In summary, we could not have wished for anything better!  Would love to stay here again!

It was our second visit in the same barrio, even in the same block. Apartment is like in descrpition. El Poble Sec is wonderful area, it's easy to go every where in Barcelona. We were four adults and apartment was really good for us.
Very nice and helpful host. Good flat. Great location.
Nice place.. Well located and clean!!

Accueil efficace,dès notre arrivée.Discret ensuite. Dommage de ne pas avoir eu plus d echanges, l impression d une simple location,nous attendons autre chose de ce principe de location.

Par ailleurs ménage fait mais pas dans les coins,donc un peu limite.Micro onde et poignées poisseux…

De plus 2 chambres donnent sur une rue bruyante et simple vitrage, nous avons peu dormi la première nuit, vive les boules Quies!
Autre point négatif en hiver:pas de chauffage,juste des radiateurs soufflants a déplacer….on aurait aimé être prévenus..

Sinon tres bien situé dans un quartier animé avec des bars à tapas sympas,distance a pied des ramblas et facile en métro pour tout le centre.

Notre arrivée à Barcelone s'est très bien passé, nous avons vite trouvés nos marques dans cet appartement. L'appartement est très proche du métro qui nous permet d'être en quelques minutes dans les plus beaux endroits de la ville. Suzy s'est montrée très arrangeante pour notre heure d'arrivée et de départ. Ce logement nous à permis un bon séjour à Barcelone!
Suzy's place was great! Very spacious and clean. Ideal location in Barcelona. The place had all the amenities you could ask for. I wouldn't hesitate to go back.
MUY BUENA UBICACION Y EN BUENAS CONDICIONES.

Appartement agréable et très bien situé avec des commerces à proximité. Hôte accueillant mais peu présent. Toute les consignes à respecter sont affichées sur les murs. Des objets sont à vendre.(magnets). Le principe de la location entre particuliers airbnb n'est pas vraiment respecté dommage!  Deux chambres conformes à la description en revanche la troisième chambre est très petite et sombre avec un lit d'appoint. La machine à laver ainsi que le four ne fonctionnés pas.
Dommage.
Übergabe der Wohnung lief problemlos, gute Erreichbarkeit von Suzy, sehr gute Lage, umgeben von vielen leckeren Tapasbars.

Such a great location! There are so many bars and places to eat within a 2 minute walk. There's a lot of nightlife around here. The apartment itself is a little noisey, but I didn't mind it too much. There were 4 of us who stayed here and we had plenty of space. I would recommend this location!
Quartiere perfetto. Host molto disponibile, in tutto. La casa potrebbe essere più pulita.

Getting the keys and leaving the flat was uncomplicated and easy. The flat is a good option when travelling to Barcelona. It has enough space and everything what you need. The location is very comfortable as there are a lot of bars and restaurants nearby and it's in walking distance to La Rambla. The only things that were a little bit disturbing are, that the beds are not too comfortable and its quite loud during the night. :)

Nos recibieron muy bien. Adam, el compañero de Susy nos explicó cómo funcionaba todo y nos ayudó con todas nuestras dudas.
La ubicación es muy linda, es barrio es ruidoso pero no es problema. El departamento es muy cómodo. La cocina es chica pero se puede cocinar bien. La ducha es excelente. Nos pudimos bañar las cuatro personas seguidas sin quedarnos sin agua

El piso es exactamente igual que en las fotos. Nos recibieron a la hora convenida, muy amable y cordial.
Es muy cómodo, muy cerca de todo. De restaurantes, de bares, supermercados, multitiendas con amplio horario.
Caminando puedes llegar a todo el centro, Raval, Gotic, etc.
Recomendadísimo.
Nos dejaron salir incluso más tarde de la hora convenida.

The listing of this apartment was exactly how they presented it online. The apartment was very spacious, clean, and never ran out of hot water for showering. The hosts were very welcoming and caring. There was a problem with the keys and the lock before we had arrived, but Suzy was already on top of the situation and made sure there was nothing we had to worry about. Suzy was very easy to get a hold of and super nice about any questions we had. The area the apartment was in was a great location. All the main attractions were very easy to walk to and was right next to a lively street filled with many restaurants to choose from. The owners also own a bike shop downstairs from the apartment which me and some friends took advantage of and rented bikes from them. I felt very welcomed staying here and recommend this apartment to anyone.
Todo era perfecto . BUENA UBICACION Y CALIDAD / PRECIO BUENA . El Suzy y su esposo fueron muy buenos . Gracias

My friends and I (5 adults) stayed in the flat during our weeklong Barcelona outing.  The flat is in excellent location. It is right on the busy street full of restaurants and a 10 minute walk away from La Rambla and Gothic quarter. 

The flat was clean and spacious (by European standards) and I can see how up to 6 people (3 couples) can comfortably stay there. 

The hosts were nice and friendly. When our kettle broke down, they got us a new one in a short amount of time.

Given its location, it is truly awesome.

The only issue is that given its central location, it can get noisy at night especially during football/soccer games.
El piso es sencillo pero correcto y cumplió con nuestras expectativas. Cuando llegamos había un problema con la nevera que nos solucionaron rápidamente. La zona es muy animada y bien comunicada.

The location of Suzy's flat in Batcelona was fabrastic! Centrally located to public transportation and local restaurants and bars, but on a quiet side street with outdoor cafes. The flat is obviously used as a rental property year round, and did not feel as "homey" as other Airbnb stays.
Très bon séjour, bel appartement, propre.
Everything was perfect, the apartment was in the center no need to usee the car.....
Nice flat in center of Barcelona.
Lovely apartment in a great area. Really close to lots of shops/supermarkets. Everyone we dealt with was friendly, would definitely recommend!
Great central location. Good communication regarding key pick up. Apartment was very clean and tidy. We did have a problem with the hot water which was fixed immediately

Host was very flexible with our arrival and leaving. Full marks for this.
Attention to detail in respect to lights not working, shower curtain, bath mat which should have been replaced a long time ago, wallpaper loose.
Area is very noisy at night and lasts into early morning.
Nice neighbourhood, friendly people. Helped take bags up the stairs.
We had a great experience! The flat was clean and cozy and the location is fantastic !
Big apartment and good location (away from crowded Rambla, but still on Carree de Blai, where the vibrant night life is with full of Tapas and Pintxos bars).
Ottima posizione vicino al centro della città ed alla metro ma la casa non è tenuta benissimo specialmente i bagni. Wifi molto lenta
Un apt muy centrico, de facil acceso. Todo limpio. Lo volveria a escoger en un futuro viaje.

Nice appartment in a perfect location next to the city  center (10 min from ramblas) . . And very nice hosts too ! 
Just a thing : the rooms are a bit noisy  because  of the busy  street in front of the appartment... a good place to stay anyway !
Beautiful apartment in a wonderful neighborhood.

Apparemment conforme à la description. Il est bien situé et nous avons pu visiter la ville dans avoir à prendre le métro.
Suzy répond très rapidement et est disponible. 
Le seul hic est la faible insonorisation avec l'extérieur et les autres voisins...

Appartement bien situé pour visiter la ville, à proximité du centre ancien et mer à pied et transports publics (bus et métro) à proximité. La rue reste bruyante même en soirée.  L'appartement est spacieux et bien équipé.  On recommande cette adresse. Bon séjour!
Only stayed for one night with some friends. Place was good, at a great location. The hosts were quick to answer and accommodating
Hello, Thank you for Everything, it was a Lovely Stay. We were very satisfied. Best regards,
Logement spacieux, bien équipé et très bien situé. Seul problème : le bruit de la rue tard dans la nuit...

The appartment is well located and it ticks all the boxes, perfect for a family stay.
Barcelona is an amazing city and las Ramblas is a short walk from the flat.
Thank you for the hospitality.
Très très bien
Good (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the hosts was flawless and warming.

This house is nice and cosy. Good if you are with a group of people! What I liked was the location in the city. There are very lovely tapasbars around and if you hire bikes it's easy to go anywhere fast! Thanks for staying there Suzy!

Perfectamente ubicado, limpio y bien equipado, este piso era perfecto para nuestra estancia. No llegamos a conocer personalmente a Suzy, pero por la comunicación que mantuve con ella parece ser una persona muy simpática y correcta. Todo genial!

L'appartement est très bien rangé et spacieux et il est très bien situé pour les transports et restaurants 
Malheureusement il est très très bruyant : vie nocturne très importante / immeuble mal insonorisé 
Je ne le conseille pas Avec une Famille 
Mais pour venir passer un Weekend entre amis il est parfait

Lovely apartment.
Good for young travelers.
Near many restaurants and bars. 
2 subway stops very near.
15 minutes by  foot to the Raval.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado, en plena zona de bares de tapas y pinchos y de cafeterías. A pocos minutos de la Plaza de España y del metro. La zona es un poco animada, al menos cuando estuvimos (fin de semana) y hubo ruido en la calle por la noche. Suzy atendió todas nuestras dudas por chat y nos recibió Sil. Estuvimos muy cómodos los 4, aunque algunos aspectos de limpieza y puertas rotas son mejorables. También hemos echado de menos una TV.
Piso muy bonito.  Aconsejato para tres, cuatro personas.
The apartment was pretty cool and well suited, but it was too noisy at night (we could hear what people did outside)
Close to lots of good tapas places. Clean and host was very helpful.

Great apartment located a short walk to La Rambla. There were many bars and restaurants with outdoor cafes located on the pedestrian street within in a minute or two walk from the apartment, very nice!

Buena localización 
Buena comunicación
Très bon séjour passé à Barcelone, appartement idéal pour visiter du Barcelone tout en etant au calme

Such a lovely hostess. Suzy was able to help me and my family with every little hiccup we had from getting to the apartment from the airport while there was a taxi strike to making sure we were with everything we needed. Thank you for the lovely hospitality.
非常好的地理位置,房间也非常的大,居住起来非常的舒适,楼下还有很多酒吧,非常热闹,感谢Suzy
Logement conforme aux attentes.  C’est vrai que le quartier est populaire, mais ce n’est pas si dérangeant que marqué dans certains commentaires.

Tiene una buena ubicación, el apartamento es muy antiguo y cosas  dentro de él un poco mal mantenidas.
Solo para llegar muy cansados y dormir.
Wir verbrachten drei Nächte in Suzys Wohnung! Wir fühlten uns dort sehr wohl und würden wieder kommen! Danke Suzy!
Excelente apartamento. Todo limpio y en orden, amplio, agradable, identico a las fotografías. Hay lugares para comer a un paso! Un poco de ruido por la vida nocturna. Totalmente recomendado.

The location is perfect!
Be prepared for 3 levels of steep staircase.
Good value for a quick stay

Nice appartment, excatly how we expected and according to the pics and description. The location is really good, central, near several subway stations, a lot of cafes, small grocery shops and several supermarkets. The communication with Suzy was super easy and fast. We stayed for 3 days in Barcelona and were very satisfied with our choice. The only thing that you should consider is that the windows are facing the street, so it's not a calm or silent place, but for us it wasn't a problem.
@Suzy: Thanks a lot for your hospitality!
The place is in heart of the city every attraction is in 20min reach. I would definitely suggest to go for it.
The stay was awesome. Nice host and cool apartment close to most city centre. We had an amazing time.

name: Architect designed 60's beach house
summary: Our home is an architect design 1960's beach house, only a few minutes from Whale Beach. It boasts wooden floorboards, exposed beams and open plan living/kitchen/dining.
description: Our home is an architect design 1960's beach house, only a few minutes from Whale Beach. It boasts wooden floorboards, exposed beams and open plan living/kitchen/dining.

host.host_location: Whale Beach, New South Wales, Australia

name: Large and Sunny Private Room near Prospect Park
summary: Large bright room with a full size bed and wardrobe, desk and free wifi. 25 minutes subway ride to downtown Manhattan and 20 minutes to Brighton beach.
space: The room is equipped with an A/C and a window that opens towards a fire escape.
description: Large bright room with a full size bed and wardrobe, desk and free wifi. 25 minutes subway ride to downtown Manhattan and 20 minutes to Brighton beach. The room is equipped with an A/C and a window that opens towards a fire escape. You will have access to the entire apartment, except for my own bedroom. I will be staying in one of the bedrooms and am available most of the time. This is a very safe neighborhood with a short walk to the beautiful Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Museum + lots of shops, restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies and Laundromats within walking distance. It's a 20 minute subway ride to Canal Street in Manhattan and 20 minutes the beautiful Brighton beach (white sand) and the historic Cony Island. You can use subways number 2, 5 or B and Q
neighborhood_overview: This is a very safe neighborhood with a short walk to the beautiful Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Museum + lots of shops, restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies and Laundromats within walking distance. It's a 20 minute subway ride to Canal Street in Manhattan and 20 minutes the beautiful Brighton beach (white sand) and the historic Cony Island.
transit: You can use subways number 2, 5 or B and Q
access: You will have access to the entire apartment, except for my own bedroom.
interaction: I will be staying in one of the bedrooms and am available most of the time.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm a TV producer and an artist that travels and tours in Europe and North America a couple of times a year. I have been living in New York for the past 8 years and consider this city my long-sought after home! 
 I don't smoke, don't own any pets and love art, music, swimming and outdoor activities.

reviews.comments: Melody was super flexible with check-in and check-out, a very accommodating and kind host. Beautiful apartment, great location, 10/10 would recommend!

name: Short walk to Lanikai Beach UB
summary: Lanikai means "heavenly water". This studio is only a couple of hundred feet from one of the best beaches in the world. It is perfect for getting away from the madness of Waikiki.   Come relax in our spacious studio with a king size bed,  cooking appliances & utensils, private bath, SMART TV, free WiFi & beach accessories.  You even have a private lanai.  An additional 14.962% tax and $80 cash cleaning fee due upon arrival.   Children must be 12 years old.  NO CABLE TV; only SMART TV.
space: Our private, non-smoking studios are quiet and spacious (approx. 350 sq. ft + outside space).   Our units are designed with private entries and the Interiors are designed with lots of windows, ceramic tile or carpeting with ceiling fans to make for a cool and comfortable ambiance but are also equipped with A/C, if needed. All our accommodations are completely furnished with king size bed and either a sleeper sofa or futon. They include cooking appliances (2 burner hotplate, microwave, toaster & coffeemaker) and utensils Each room has it’s own private bath with tub/shower combo, blow dryer, towels and linens, cable TV, secure wireless internet access, free on-site parking and beach accessories (chairs, umbrellas & beach towels). We do not provide laundry facilities, however, there are several laundromats nearby in Kailua Town. We provide fresh linens once a week and towels upon request; all other housekeeping is provided by the guest.
description: Lanikai means "heavenly water". This studio is only a couple of hundred feet from one of the best beaches in the world. It is perfect for getting away from the madness of Waikiki.   Come relax in our spacious studio with a king size bed,  cooking appliances & utensils, private bath, SMART TV, free WiFi & beach accessories.  You even have a private lanai.  An additional 14.962% tax and $80 cash cleaning fee due upon arrival.   Children must be 12 years old.  NO CABLE TV; only SMART TV. Our private, non-smoking studios are quiet and spacious (approx. 350 sq. ft + outside space).   Our units are designed with private entries and the Interiors are designed with lots of windows, ceramic tile or carpeting with ceiling fans to make for a cool and comfortable ambiance but are also equipped with A/C, if needed. All our accommodations are completely furnished with king size bed and either a sleeper sofa or futon. They include cooking appliances (2 burner hotplate, microwave, toaster & coffeemake
neighborhood_overview: Lanikai is a residential area.  We are located on a one way street with a bike trail to one side.  The beach is only a few hundred feet away.  We don't even bother with shoes.
notes: Hawaii State Govt tax of 14.962% (subject to change) of room total is due to owner upon check-in.  Payable by cash or credit card (Visa, M/C or Discover). $80.00 CLEANING FEE IS DUE IN CASH UPON ARRIVAL.
transit: Although Oahu has a wonderful bus system (The Bus) luggage larger than a small carry on is not allowed.  Car rental is recommended, or you can take a shuttle and rent a car at Enterprise or a bicycle once in Kailua.
interaction: We believe it is important to welcome our guests in person as this is often the only time we interact, but we are readily available any time for questions or concerns.  On the rare occasion we cannot be on site, we leave directions and information until we can meet in person.
house_rules: Due to strict neighborhood codes & covenants, our vacation rentals are for the sole use of the registered guests. For the quiet enjoyment of other guests as well as the neighbors, no gatherings, parties or loud music on the premises are allowed.  Children must be at least 8 years old. PLEASE NOTE: NO SMOKING IN OR AROUND PROPERTY.

host.host_about: My family has been hosting vacation guests for over 20 years.  While I travel, Pixie and Andy take good care of my property in Lanikai and most likely will be the ones to welcome you.

reviews.comments: Eva's place was everything that we expected and so much more! The location is just perfect, two steps from the most beautiful beach one could imagine. Mary, who takes care of the apartment, is super friendly, totally flexible regarding checkins/outs and extremely helpful as to places to go and stuff to see. The apartment is very comfortble, has a beautiful private garden, and is really quiet. Our stay at Lanikai was just amazing and we are definitely coming back soon!

A wonderful location only metres from Lanikai Beach.  Mary was a wonderful host, going out of her way to ensure we were comfortable and oriented to the area.  The accommodation was very comfortable.  Having two main areas in the apartment allowed for space during the stay.  The kitchen area enabled us to cook some nights, rather than needing to head into nearby Kailua.  As we'd planned to spend our week on the beach we didn't organise a car; though for those wanting to travel around the area and beyond, a car would be advisable due to the infrequency with which the bus runs and what can be large waits when transiting between busses.
We found this great because it was very close to beach, quiet residential neighbourhood, Mary was a great host and our studio was clean,comfortable & with a lovely balcony
Muito legal! Praia show mas não pode ventar se não é impossível curtir. Natureza de tirar o fôlego .

It’s not a materialistic hotel, it’s the perfect Hawaii stay. I lived in Hawaii over 10 years and came back for a visit and it was perfect. The perfect place to stay and the price and location are unbeatable. I will stay here again.
Convenient location and clean.

My sister and I loved staying at Lanikai studios. This was exactly what we were looking for on this vacation. The apartment is literally 3 houses down from the entrance to Lanikai beach, so about a 2 minute walk. Mary was a great host and made us feel right at home. We knew that if anything came up,  she would be there to help us, but since nothing came up,  we mostly kept to ourselves. I wanted a relaxing vacation away and thus place hit the spot. I would definitely recommend Lanikai studios to anyone and will definitely stay again if I am every back in Lanikai!

As the other comment stated, if you are looking for a quiet place near the beach, this is it! 30 second walk to the beach can’t be beat. Place was clean and cute with a nice balcony and little kitchen area. Our stay was fantastic, only minor complaint would be that the a/c could have worked a little better as it was stifling while we were there! All in all great stay.
Location was fantastic. Just couple minuets walk to beautiful Lanikai beach.

Best part about this place is that it’s right across the street from the beach and that was exactly what we were looking for. Unfortunately, for the price and location of the Airbnb, we were expecting nicer. While the unit itself worked for our stay, it felt run down, sort of a motel feel to it. Also, the shower didn’t drain until about 10 minutes after showering and the flush of the toilet was loud enough to hear outside. Bed was comfortable and the hot plate worked well enough for us to cook everyday, and again, being right across from the beach was amazing. Our host was friendly and easily reachable for questions. The property also has beach toys, chairs and umbrellas, which is awesome! But like I said, for the price and location, we were expecting a much nicer place. Overall though, would stay here again. 

Mahalo!

It is a very clean room.
The interior was cute.
It is close to the beach, easy to go shopping, convenient location.
The host is very kind.

Great location with the beach access just steps from the front gate. Enjoyed this quiet retreat very much with its private second floor lanai looking over the lush green back yard. Could hear the birds and geckos every day. And see the full moon rising and setting. The kitchenette had everything we needed to make a hot breakfast and simple meals for lunch and dinner.

name: 5 Star 2BDR, Prime Location, Very Quiet, Elevator
summary: Manhattan apartment ideally located just two blocks from One World Observatory (Freedom Tower). Situated right in the middle of all that Downtown NYC has to offer: Battery Park, NY Stock Exchange, South Street Seaport, City Hall, 9-11 Memorial, Brooklyn Bridge, Wall St, "Charging Bull", World Financial District, Liberty Ferry, Century21 Store, China Town, Canal Street and the NEW Brookfield Place are just some of many world-renowned places to experience. This is the best location in NYC to stay.
space: *Apartment is centrally positioned  (100feet/35 meters  from Broadway) in downtown area and it's close to everything.    It is located on the high floor of an elevator building and it's very quiet (rare to find in NYC). *There is a laundry room in the building with washers and dryers. *One room has two single beds, another one queen-size bed. *All beds have memory-foam mattresses, down/feather pillows, down/feather comforters, cotton sheets, cotton pillow cases and cotton comforter covers. *Each room has a large dresser, night stand, table lamp (night light) and alarm clock. *In a living area you will find an office desk with chair, dinning table with four chairs, sectional sofa-bed (that converts to a double bed), coffee-table and a cable TV with 100+ HD channels.  *There is a (free) wireless internet in the apartment.  *Kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessities including coffee maker, toaster, dishwasher, plenty of silver-wear, glassware, plates, pots and pans, mugs and also
description: Manhattan apartment ideally located just two blocks from One World Observatory (Freedom Tower). Situated right in the middle of all that Downtown NYC has to offer: Battery Park, NY Stock Exchange, South Street Seaport, City Hall, 9-11 Memorial, Brooklyn Bridge, Wall St, "Charging Bull", World Financial District, Liberty Ferry, Century21 Store, China Town, Canal Street and the NEW Brookfield Place are just some of many world-renowned places to experience. This is the best location in NYC to stay. *Apartment is centrally positioned  (100feet/35 meters  from Broadway) in downtown area and it's close to everything.    It is located on the high floor of an elevator building and it's very quiet (rare to find in NYC). *There is a laundry room in the building with washers and dryers. *One room has two single beds, another one queen-size bed. *All beds have memory-foam mattresses, down/feather pillows, down/feather comforters, cotton sheets, cotton pillow cases and cotton comforter covers. *Eac
neighborhood_overview: Wall St., 9/11 Memorial, Woolworth building, Century 21, Statue of Liberty, South Street Seaport, Brooklyn Bridge, and Tribeca are all 5 minute walks (or less).
notes: Only a few minutes away from South Street Seaport, where pop-up shops and awesome food vendors have brought renewed life and energy into the neighborhood. There is a "TKTS" booth only a few blocks away at the South Seaport where you can get up to 75% off Broadway tickets. (this booth opens an hour earlier than the one in Times Square. There is also a MUCH shorter line.) 3 min walk to the new Freedom Tower and the 9/11 Memorial Museum. 3 min walk to Wall Street and the NY Stock Exchange. 10 min walk to Ellis Island/Statue of Liberty Ferry. 1 min walk to Century 21 Dept store. This is truly an awesome location!
transit: Tired of waiting for the cab and than explaining over and over to your driver where to take you? We can arrange pick-up and drop-off from/to the airport in luxury SUV Chevy Suburban. Our driver will be there a soon as you get your luggage (he will be waiting for you just outside the exit door).  There is FREE internet available in the car so you can check your email as soon as you get outside the airport building. There is a seating for 8 (driver + 7 passengers). If there is more than 4 of you, your ride, beside that it will be way more comfortable than in a yellow cab, will also be less expensive (you won't have to get two cabs). Please contact us for the special (discounted) rate. Subway entrance to eight different lines (2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, J, Z) is 15 seconds/30 meter/90 feet away (right on the nearest corner, Broadway). You will be minutes (a few train stops) from everything NYC has to offer.
access: Guests will have access to the full apartment.
interaction: I'll be available to answer your questions and concerns throughout your stay. Tired of waiting for the cab and than explaining over and over to your driver where to take you? We can arrange pick-up and drop-off from/to the airport in luxury SUV Chevy Suburban. Our driver will be there a soon as you get your luggage (he will be waiting for you just outside the exit door). There is FREE internet available in the car so you can check your email as soon as you get outside the airport building. There is a seating for 8 (driver + 7 passengers). If there is more than 4 of you, your ride, beside that it will be way more comfortable than in a yellow cab, will also be less expensive (you won't have to get two cabs). Please contact us for the special (discounted) rate. Subway entrance to eight different lines (2, 3, 4, 5, A, C, J, Z) is 15 seconds/30 meter/90 feet away (right on the nearest corner, Broadway). You will be minutes (a few train stops) from everything NYC has to offer.
house_rules: **Maximum 5 guests throughout your stay (no daytime or nighttime visitors).  If more than 5 guests are present at any time inside the apartment you might face the penalty per rules and regulations (this includes your own guests). - Absolutely no smoking inside the apartment and be mindful of your neighbors (no parties at any time and no loud music and noises after 10pm).  -Pets are not allowed in the apartment at ANY time. *   EVERY ADULT STAYING IN THE APARTMENT WILL BE CHECKED FOR (Website hidden by Airbnb) GOVERNMENT ISSUED ID, NO EXCEPTIONS. ** AT LEAST ONE GUEST HAS TO BE OLDER THAN 21.

reviews.comments: Two friends and I had a great experience staying in Jennifer's apartment. The apartment is in easy walking distance for lots of tourist attractions and is also close to the subway. The apartment itself is spacious and well-presented. Jennifer was very responsive in advance of our stay. Two of Jennifer's friends met me at the apartment and were very helpful. Jennifer also let us leave our luggage in the flat until the evening so we didn't have to carry it around with us on our check-out day, which was generous of her.

Jennifer was beyond amazing!  I truly fell in love with her beautiful CLEAN spot!  I ah a last minute cancel on a previous apartment and literally took about twenty minutes to complete a brand new booking with Jennifer.  She really saved the day; and when we walked in it was so peaceful and homey with water waiting for us, YESSS!!!  Thank you boo, lol!  Anyways, HIGHLY would recommend!

Jennifer's apartment was terrific. It is centrally located (a few streets above the financial district), with lots of restaurants around, and easy access to the subway system. It was clean, cosy, and the host even had a bottle of champagne ready for me when I arrived. Finally, it was super easy to communicate and coordinate with the host. Highly recommend it!

We loved the place! Jennifer is such a good host and she left us everything that we needed and more! 

The apartment is really well located and looks exactly like in the photos. 

We recommend it!

Our stay at the apartment was terrific. Location is superb being right in the centre of downtown - it's minutes walk from Wall Street, one world trade centre etc and has an excellent bar next door to the entrance. Jennifer was vey accommodating with our arrival time and the coffee provided was readily appreciated by our whole party. The apartment is exactly as it looks like in the photos and is a great size if you are traveling with a larger party. Jennifer was also very accommodating with us asking for an extra few hours before 'check out' due to flights leaving a little bit later. Overall a great stay and glad we booked where we did.

Our experience with Jennifer was fantastic.  She was very responsive from the time that we booked the apartment.  She was very helpful.  The apartment is exactly as depicted on the site.  Very good location with nearby subway access.  I went to run the NYC marathon and Jennifer was kind enough to allow me to come back to the apartment to shower and change.  We left a pair of glasses and Jennifer contacted us immediately and was more than willing to send them back to us.

This place is amazing :) Looks just like the pictures and was spacious enough for six people. I drove my car from DC and was able to find street parking easily within a block of the front door. The Kitchen has everything you need to make a meal and a cup of coffee. There's plenty of pillows, towels, blankets, and even a extra set of keys. Jennifer was an amazing host -- I cant wait to come back.

I booked this place for me and 5 of my friends. I was lucky to find Jennifer's place with its very reasonable price and very great location (near the World Trade Center). I'd highly recommend it if you want to visit New York.

Jennifer was prompt and courteous.  She met us outside as soon as we arrived, and helped us get settled.  The apartment was clean and comfortable, and in a great location in Battery Park.  She returned promptly when we had a small issue figuring out the stove, and it was sorted out immediately.  It was easy to book, to stay and to depart.  She even placed a bottle of champagne in the fridge!
Everything was set as we expected. The apartment  location is great.

Loved Jennifer's spot. It was perfect for me and my 5 friends! It was my Bridal Shower weekend and what a surprise to walk in and find a bottle of champagne waiting for us. Lovely touch. The place was clean and there was plenty of linen and glassware for everyone. Fantastic location. We had a delicious dinner at Da Mikele and late breakfast at Pret. We never met Jennifer, but the guy that let us in was on time and friendly. My only advice to people is to bring your own washcloth as only towels were provided.  But we had a great experience! I live in Westchester in a 1 bedroom, so anytime I have friends from out of town, I'm going back to Jens place.
Jennifer was a great host. She accommodated my request for a late check out. The location is brilliant and the apartment is as described. I will definitely stay here again.

Everything like clockwork, and as advertised. Including the bottle of Champagne you see on the table!
Great location, no hassle going in. And I was even allowed late check-out to accommodate my work schedule!
Thanks Jennifer!

Jennifer was great host! She allowed us drop out bags off early while the room was getting professionally cleaned. Location was equally amazing just a couple blocks away from the World Trade Center and the Subway. Bar downstairs was a great place to grab some craft brews, awesome French cafe next door for your morning caffeine fix, and plenty of shops on Broadway if you was to do some shopping. Definitely an awesome experience overall!
as described - highly recommended

Five of us stayed, and were quite comfortable in Jennifer's apartment.  We were welcomed in person by her friend, and had great connectivity with Jennifer by text.  She provided directions to the subway station and grocery store, as we requested, and had champagne and bottled water chilling for us.
Location was fabulous, and the little touches were appreciated.

Jennifer was a great host! The apartment was in a great location in the financial district. Walking distance to great sites, restaurants/bars and the subway. One of my favorite things about the apartment was that every time we thought we needed something, Jennifer already had it! Extra towels, shampoo/conditioner, pots/pans, wine opener, etc. We had a great stay and I'd definitely recommend the apartment!

Jennifer was a great host. Her friend met us on Christmas Day evening to let us in and they really worked with us on time. Her place is amazingly quiet for New York City. The location is marvelous since it is near Wall Street it gets quiet at night. It is near several subway access points and is right between 911 Memorial and South Seaport. The apartment had everything my family of 6 needed for the weekend. We even found parking on the street all weekend and just used a garage on Monday. Would rent the space again. Super clean. Highly recommend. Thanks Jennifer!
Fantastic place to stay when visiting Manhattan. We were a group of 4 and lived it.

Jennifer's place was as described and pictured, and all of her communications were prompt. The location was great, with both subway and cab's easily accessible. The apartment was clean and we were left with everything we needed. The only suggestion I would make is to add a mirror to each room, as there was only one full length mirror in the apartment. This was only problematic to us, as we were a group of all girls all trying to do hair and makeup while getting ready for a night out. Overall, I would stay again and would recommend Jennifer's to anyone interested.
It was a great place, just as she described it in the post.

We loved Jennifer's apartment.  It was clean and comfortable.  Exactly as described.   It was located in a great area with transportation easily accessible.  There were restaraunts, grocery stores, coffee shops and much more all within walking distance. I plan on taking my daughter to the city over the summer and I will definitely book Jennifer's apartment.
Great place to stay! Jennifer is super responsive and very accommodating. The place is beautiful and looks just like the pictures listed. Great location near subway and attractions!

Le logement est idéalement situé, joli et propre. Nous étions 6 et le logement contient tout ce qu'il faut pour voyager léger. Nous avons été très bien accueilli. Jennifer a su être disponible et réactive dès que nous avions besoin de renseignements. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour. Je le conseille vivement.

Arriving was super smooth as Jennifer reached out to see when we would arrive and had someone waiting to let us in.

The apartment was clean and more spacious than I imagined.

Location was excellent near multiple subway lines (2,3,4,5,A,C,R,J,Z) and a couple blocks from the World Trade Center.

A grocery store is walking distance down the street and a great gastropub next door.  For your mornings, there is a French cafe next door as well and a Dunkin Donuts just one short block down.

Kitchen had all the utensils, pots, etc. that were needed (maybe not a microwave?).

Definitely would stay here again on our next visit!

Jennifer was very responsive and accommodating from the time we made our reservation throughout our stay in this apartment. We traveled to New York for a long weekend family trip and this space worked very well for us.  The apartment was clean, quiet and as advertised.  It is steps away from a subway station, making it easy to travel to all parts of the city. We would book again without hesitation when we return.

Jennifer was very accommodating and she meet us at the apartment at the scheduled time.
The location is great, the best you can find in downtown, with easy access to neighborhood attractions and lots of public transportation.
The apartment is exactly as described in the add. Very well equipped kitchen, spacious living room, decent sized bathroom and bedrooms. 
The apartment was clean, with lots of clean towels. We would have preferred cotton bed-sheets instead of the polyester that were provided. 
We also enjoyed the complimentary bottle of champagne (thank you Jennifer).
Great place to stay in Manhattan.
Adriana and Doru

Début de séjour compliqué. L'adresse indiquée n'était pas la bonne (le 15 au lieu du 11, Maiden lane). Ensuite, Jennifer n'était pas sur les lieux ,  avec mon anglais très limité, j'ai passé mon portable au concierge du  n°15 qui ne comprenait pas jennifer qui ne parle pas très bien non plus l'anglais ? je commençais à m'inquiéter et j'ai tout de suite pensé à une arnaque ! mais 10 mn. après Jennifer est apparu (35mn d'angoisse). Le quartier calme, très bien, et l'appartement très bien situé, parfait pour une semaine.

The place was exactly as advertised. Cute, clean and plenty of room for 5 people. The champagne was a really nice touch.
There is a great bar/food right next door to our place which was really convenient too.

Nous avons passé une semaine en famille à 4 dans cet appartement qui est conforme à la description sur le site. Situé au sud de Manhattan, à proximité du mémorial du 11 septembre, il est très calme, proche des commerces, et bien équipé. Nous avons été accueillis par une amie de Jennifer qui nous a remis les clés. A signaler que l'adresse est le numéro 11 et non le 15 Maiden Lane.
Pour la suite, nous avons échangé par mail avec Jennifer qui a répondu à nos demandes.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour et recommandons cet appartement.

Jennifer is extremely helpful, our flight was delayed by 4 hours and did not arrive until almost 2 AM but she help us with airport pickup and wait up till then.  The place is well located and as advertised on Airbnb.

Jennifer was wonderful. We were in New York for the 5 Boro bike tour so we needed a comfortable place that could accommodate the four bikes. Jennifer met us at the apartment and made sure we got settled in. The champagne upon arrival made the next day's bike tour more tolerable. The apartment was as described. Having lived in New York, I expected a much smaller place. This was perfect.

Jennifer était très sympa attentionnée ,nous avons été très bien accueillis .
L'adresse est inexacte,c'est le numéro 11 et pas le 15!
Appartement très propre et bien situé ,à proximité des commerces et de la station de métro Fulton. Cette station est desservie par plusieurs métros qui permettent de se rendre aisément vers les différents sites touristiques.
Quartier relativement calme le soir,car quartier financier de NEW York .
Nous recommandons cet appartement.
Très bon séjour .
À notre arrivée nous avons pu laisser nos valises à 13 heures avant de prendre possession  de l'appartement vers 16 heures.
Jennifer a été aux petits soins pour nous.
La bouteille de champagne nous attendait,une attention particulière sympathique .

Accueil chaleureux, prévenant (proposition de réservation de taxi à l'avance pour nous cueillir à l'aéroport + champagne pour fêter l'arrivée), agréable dans un quartier bien sympa. Nous recommandons chaudement.
Jennifer was a great and supportive host. Her appartement is perfectly located: round the corner is the subway station, several supermarketes and pubs. We enjoyed our stay in NYC very much.
Host was very nice/helpful. Neighborhood was good

The apartment was comfortable with all the amenities described. Excellent location in financial district with multiple local connections to the subway system. Jennifer was an excellent host who welcomed us and made us feel that she was available if needed. The only downside was  the background noise from  the air conditioning system  of a nearby office block (but I suspect that is a common problem in the 'Big
Apple).  As with much accommodation in New York it could not exactly be called cheap hence the lower score for value for
money.
房東很熱心,很容易與她聯絡,若有任何需要都可以向她詢問｡住宿的地點非常方便,距離地鐵很近,到哪都很容易,而且該區域相當安靜｡讓我們擁有很棒的住宿環境｡
The place was perfect to house myself and two other co-workers. It's exactly the description and the pictures that are posted. Communicated and coordinated amazing, thanks!

Our host was very nice and helpful all the time.  She answered promptly to all our enquires. She gave permission to drop our luggage two hours before check-in time.  The description of the apartment was accurate and it was adequate to accomodate six guests, even if one bedroom had no windows.  Kitchen was well equipped and supplies were abundant, including coffee. Good air conditioning.  Apartment was clean and we found with pleasure a bottle of champagne  (Prosecco from Italy) when we got in. Fantastic location near all the major landmarks of downtown/ financial district. (no views from the windows).  Close to subway stations and several bus lines.  A great experience!
Absolutely amazing apartment and location. Jennifer was easy to contact and super friendly. Exactly what was listed in the description!
Jennifer was great and very helpful. Location of the apartment was ideal. Great proximity to just about all subway lines. Excellent place to stay for a family. Sleeper couch is a great plus.

Très bonne expérience de NY dans un quartier idéal pour un séjour de 8 jours. Proximité du métro et quartier très agréable sans être oppressant. Le logement est tel que décrit, peut être petit pour 5 ou 6, parfait pour 4 personnes.
Things were very well coordinated and our host was very good at checking in and communicating with us.  A very positive experience.
Jennifer met us upon arrival and the apartment was as described. We enjoyed it's convenient location to several subway stations. All and all a great place to stay.
Great experience, good communication, comfortable housing, convenient location.
很负责任的房东,房间整洁,公寓位于曼哈顿的中心位置,步行到各个大景点及地铁非常方便｡由于我们提前到达,房东特意安排事先把行李放进房间,非行感谢詹妮弗

We enjoyed staying at Jennifer's. Great location, really close to all the interesting spots and historical places. All amenities are as described, apartment is in great shape. Cannot overstate the importance of location. Jennifer made the stay easy by providing help when needed.
The only thing that was wrong was the address number was listed wrong so we ended up at the wrong place. Next door actually. Other than that our host was very welcoming to us when we meant her.

Apartment was as described and great location for subway etc. Didn't actually meet Jennifer in person but she was always contactable and responded promptly and helpfully to all our queries. Good wifi. Used the communal laundry on 3rd floor with no problems. We liked the Thai take-away place opposite. We visited in August so it was good to have air-con and fan available. Would use again.

As all the other reviews attest, exactly as described, and just like the pictures. Jennifer responds to any question almost immediately. 
Clean, convenient, and close to the downtown attractions in a perfect location. Everything downtown is walkable from this property and all subway options are within a block. 
We are a family of four that in addition to exploring New York were also visiting family in Brooklyn. We were extremely pleased with the easy access to BK by train and car. 
A tip to those that will drive in as we did. There are three parking options very near by. Check for parking on line before you arrive.
This was my first Airbnb experience and Jennifer was a great host!  She was easy to communicate with and her place was a fantastic location for visiting NYC!
Great location! Lovely place, though it was a little small for 3 travellers. Jennifer was a grea host and I would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

We had a great time staying at Jennifer's apartment. She was super helpful and friendly, and organised a driver from the airport for us which was great late on a Saturday night. 
The apartment was exactly as described, well equipped, surprisingly spacious and quiet (yes there is aircon noise, but this just became background after a little while).
There was everything we needed to prepare and eat some meals at 'home' and the 3rd floor laundry was really good. 
Very well-located for subway, the 9/11 Museum and Brooklyn Bridge. Be aware it's quite a ride up to Central Park and Uptown attractions.
Thanks Jennifer, we had a great stay!

Jennifer's apartment is in a excellent location.  We were three adults who stayed for just one night, we found the beds excellent, the shower hot, all in all a really good  experience.
Jennifer was a very caring hostess whose communication before and during our stay was great.  Highly recommended.

Alles perfekt geklappt. Wohnung ist gut gelegen für Ausflüge. Leider nur ein Badezimmer vorhanden. Sauberkeit war OK. Preis ist jedoch zu hoch für was die Wohnung wirklich bietet. Jennifer hat immer sofort reagiert auf meine Anfragen.

Jennifer was a great host; extremely responsive and reasonable. Her friend met us at the appointed time and knew all of the things to point out (keys, wifi code, TV, trash, recycling, etc.). 
The location was a nice change for our group who normally land in midtown... steps away from Trinity Church, WTC memorial, Brooklyn Bridge, etc. 
For (4) adults it felt a little cramped at times but we remedied that by staying out and about. The bathroom could use some updates to match the rest of the apartment...there were some minor issues with the shower curtain rod, TP holder, and hot water but Jennifer was quick to respond.
Overall nice place, great location, and wonderful host!
My family had a wonderful stay at Jennifer's place. It's so easy to coordinate with her and the location is the best. Thanks Jennifer!

We got to the place a bit ahead of schedule and it was still being cleaned. Jennifer was very accommodating as we were allowed to leave our things as we decided to get lunch while we waited.
