There was an issue with the heater which the Jennifer was unaware of, but she made arrangement to get it tended to as soon as we pointed it out. 
I was expecting a package which got misplaced but Jennifer was extremely helpful in helping me locate it, even after we left, she checked in for an update, and if she could have been of further assistance.
All in all, we had a pleasant stay, the area is very convenient and the building safe. All the necessary amenities were provided and recommendations for nearby restaurants etc given. I would definitely recommend this space to anyone who's looking to be in the midst of things!

Jennifer was friendly and helpful in communication. The location was surprisingly good (it's in the Financial District rather than Uptown): a lively neighbourhood that felt very safe. Easy connections by subway from Fulton Street, about 100 metres away. We really enjoyed our stay.
Jennifer kept communication open and was responsive. We had a couple changes and she was as accommodating as she could be. The location was perfect for our needs. The apartment was clean and neat.
Jennifer s'est rendue très disponible. Logement très bien situé.

It was a good experience for what we wanted: clean, quiet, in a location near a meeting I had the following day. Had coffee and other amenities, WiFi was spotty but otherwise had everything we needed.

Jennifer was at the apartment to greet us. Great location and walking distance to many sightseeing activities. French Cafe below had good coffee and bagels for breakfast. Also a bar/restaurant next to apartment entrance. Space is as described, clean and warm. Appreciated all the linen & towels available for our group of 4 adults and 2 small kids. Shower was hot and powerful! Perfect. Would stay again. Thank you!

AMAZING LOCATION!

Would like thank Jennifer for hosting us. The flat was perfect for and has everything you need. Super spacious too for such a sought after location.

Would recommend to anyone be it business or leisure.

Thanks again.
The place came as advertised and we had a good weekend
We felt very welcomed by Jennifer and her communication was great! The apartment was clean and very comfortable.

Jennifer and her husband were great to deal with. She got in touch with us the day before arrival & check-in was smooth. Also very accommodating with allowing us leave our luggage there for 2 hours after check-out, as long as they could get in for house-keeping.  The appartment is darker than it appears in the photo, but overall fine and very clean. Plenty of bottled water for us in fridge and coffee, and kitchen is well stocked in equipment. My only criticism is that the sheets could do with replacing, well worn and not great quality. Great location though and only a few mins from subway station.
Love it will stay again

Awesome spacious unit in fidi that made working in the area a breeze! Clean place, well setup kitchen, close to tons of places to eat and drink and really easy check in/out process. Couldn't have asked for a better unit, I'll definitely be back.
The place was clean and exactly as it looked in the listing.

Jennifer'a is a superbly located, spacious apartment in downtown Manhattan.  It is very well equipped, including a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room.

Communication was excellent and Jennifer was a generous, accommodating host. 

Will. come. back. Period!

Very cozy and clean appartment, well and stylish furnished. Quiet neighborhood, subway within walking distance. Jennifer and her friend were very helpful and cooperative at all the time. It was very nice to make your acquaintance !

Jennifer responded quickly and kept in touch with us about arrival. Her place could not have been better. Great location, neat as a pin, very well appointed, super comfortable and peaceful. Easy to get to, lots of good stuff around. Just really perfect, and a great price!
Everything was as described and expected, she  quickly answer your question. I recommend this appartment with so good location.
Awesome place! Close to subway station and 911 memorial. Good communication, pretty spacious for being in the city. Jennifer was easy to keep in contact with. Would def rent again
Check in was super easy- Jennifer went out of her way to make sure my flight arrival and check in time would work, location is fantastic, and the appartment is clean and super comfortable. Thanks!!
Awesome location, perfect apartment and wonderful hosts. Could not fault any aspect of our stay! Highly recommend and will certainly be back!
Good host, great location. Would stay again!
Jennifer's place is great, but what really made our stay wonderful was her attentiveness to every detail. She even organized us ride from JFK. Thanks!

Jennifer was really fast at replying and making sure we were settled and happy. She also arranged a cheap ride from the airport to the apartment. The apartment is also really quite for being in a busy neighborhood. The are several subways close by and the neighborhood is walking distance to many tourist attractions.
Perfect location and apartment..Jennifer allways available...For sure we will return ..Cassio
This is a great location.  Jennifer stayed in touch with us and answered all of our questions right away.
Great place!! So clean and quiet and a great location.

This location could not have been better! So close to all that we wanted to do in the area. Within minutes you can be at the base of the Brooklyn Bridge and walk over to Dumbo. Also, there are several subway stations class to this apartment so you literally have easy and convenient access to all of Manhattan.
Very stylish and comfortable apartment in a super location. Jen was a great host and very easy to contact and communicate with. Her driver, Dan, was also awesome. We would definitely stay here again.

Jennifer, my wife, adult daughter, and I loved your great apartment. We always felt safe and secure. The apt was just the right size with a well-appointed kitchen, attached living room, two bedrooms, and bathroom. Great internet, cable TV, plenty of hot water, and comfort. Your apt could not be in a better location with it's nearby access to Battery Park and the Statue of Liberty/Ellis Island ferry rides, 9/11 Memorial, Wall Street, Broadway TKTS booth, Fulton street subway station, great restaurants, and much more. For you guests arriving late in the evening, the Malt House next door is great for dinner and/or drinks. The French Gormand, also next door, is great for breakfast croissants and coffee. We will recommend it to all our friends in Texas! The best to you and your family. Mark, Marcia, and Lauren

Our family of six stayed five nights. Great location, close to subway, and very clean with comfortable beds, plenty of towels. Jennifer went above and beyond as a host to greet us and give us recommendations. We would definitely stay here again!

Jennifer is doing a very good job of it becoming a good experience. She is very service minded and helpful with information. The apartment is really beautiful and is well located. Everything is clean and delicious. Here you live well













Jennifer is doing a very good job of it becoming a good experience. She is very service minded and helpful with information. The apartment is really beautiful and is well located. Everything is clean and delicious. Here you live well













Jennifer is doing a very good job of it becoming a good experience. She is very service minded and helpful with information. The apartment is really beautiful and is well located. Everything is clean and delicious. Here you live well












Jennifer is doing a very good job of it becoming a good experience. She is very service minded and helpful with information. The apartment is really beautiful and is well located. Everything is clean and delicious. Here you live well :-)

Appartement très bien situé dans le sud de Manhattan (proche de nombreux métros), très bien agencé, très agréable, très bien équipé (il y a tout ce qu'il faut) et très calme (ce qui est un luxe à NY). Seul petit bémol: l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux. Jennifer est très attentionnée et pleine de bons conseils. Bref, nous avons passé un excellent séjour d'une semaine dans cet appartement.

Clean and comfortable. Friendly neighbors. It felt quiet and tranquil in an urban setting. Conveniently located to nearby retail locations and subway stations. Walking distance to WTC, the Oculus, Battery Park, ferry station. Great location. Owner was kind enough to provide bottled water, champagne, towels and other amenities needed. Would definitely stay here again in the future.
Great location for downtown. Great price. Well kept comfortable apartment. Great dining within walking distance. And very near the Freedom Towers. Good find.

The apartment was really great. Clean and enough space for 6 people. It's in a great location and everything in downtown is really close. Jennifer was a great host. She answers really quick, check-in and check-out was easy. 
I would come back and stay again at the apartment.

Our stay here was great - the place was comfortable, Jennifer was easy to communicate with, our check-in went flawlessly - the location is perfect and centrally located for anyone who wants to explore the downtown financial district and it is a good jumping point for anyplace in the 5 boros!

Great stay! It was a really cute apartment located near great sights. The apartment was very clean and they had everything ready for us- water bottles, plenty of linens, toiletries, they went above and beyond! Getting in touch with them was very easy. I really have no complaints and would definitely recommend staying here.
A great and convenient place!!

Thanks Jennifer. We enjoyed our stay!  The apartment was perfectly located near our daughter's apt, the subway and all you would want to see in the financial district. We were traveling with family so it was great to be able to stay together and have enough space. Check in was simple and convenient. Jennifer was easy to communicate with and answered all our questions. We are hoping our daughter stays in the area. We love to visit and would certainly stay here again!

Jennifer's place is perfect. It's closer to the 9/11 Museum and Memorial than I had expected. The location is great for what we wanted. Jennifer was very responsive and easy to work with. I would definitely recommend Jennifer's place!
The place was great! Amazing location, really safe and the apartment was spacious enough for six people!

Very centrally located, public transportation easily accessible, clean and comfortable apartment. Highly recommended for family trips. Safe area, host very accessible. Highly recommended. Walking distance to the 9/11 memorial and close to the ferry that takes you to the Statue of Liberty.
We had a great stay. The host was super easy to communicate with and she was very nice. She made sure that we had everything we needed and the whole process was easy and wonderful.

Jennifer's place was amazing! It's in a great location for exploring New York, either on foot or using a nearby subway station. The apartment had everything we needed and was modern and clean. Jennifer was very helpful and accommodating throughout our stay. I would definitely recommend!

The apartment was centrally located- kitty corner to the 911 memorial and easy subway access. The host was timely and answered emails asap. 
Dan the driver was great too! He met us at the airport with a big air conditioned Suburban. There was tons of room for all five ladies and our luggage. He gave us a tour of the city both to and from the airport- totally worth the $109 charge.

We enjoyed our stay very much.  Great communication with the owner.
The apartment is clean, quiet and close to subway stations.  We were 5 people and had no problems .  The apartment is quite spacious with a large living room and kitchen.

I would definitely recommend it to anyone

First and foremost, the location at 5 Star Downtown was superb. For a first time NYC visitor, the transportation options were very convenient since the metro stations were a block away with access to nearly all of the Uptown/Downtown metro lines and a walking distance to Battery Park and others. I could not ask for better location other than 5 Star Downtown.

Secondly, the apartment was very comfortable and accommodated all six of us to stay. The spacious apartment provided us amble space to kick back and relax after eventful days and not to mention, having the elevator and the kitchen were bonuses. Jennifer’s prompt services made our staying more comfortable by accommodating any unexpected requests by us.

For those who want to take advantage of the chauffeur services to the apartment, I strongly recommend using Dan’s service as he is very knowledgeable and engaging person. He provided us a tour of NYC with a 10-15-minute stop at Brooklyn side so I can view NYC at its whole for the first time. It was well spent because I didn’t feel any rush or urgent pressure at all as it made my trip very relaxing and “spoiled”!

Jennifers place is a great location. Close to public transport so you can get anywhere in the city easily. She is very accommodating and responsive to all needs. We arrived super late and she helped us no problem. Price is great location perfect!
Our host was very accommodating and responsive, the unit was very clean and in a great location. We had a wonderful time on our first trip to NYC. I highly recommend!

The place was perfect! Good sized apartment for the price and the area. Multiple subway lines within a short walking distance. I'm personally biased because it's around the corner from my corporate office. I will definitely be using this apartment again next time I have to travel to NY
房主很热情,在门口等着,详细介绍各种设施｡房间很干净,设施很方便｡最好的是位置,在曼哈顿区,游览很方便｡房间稍小一些,但足够住｡

Jennifer was wonderful to communicate with and very accommodating with everything. The apartment is in a great area close to everything we wanted to do and is also close to the subway for trips outside of the financial district. Thanks again!
Very good location for anyone who wishes to experience lower New York.   Very comfortable and great service and communication by Jennifer!
Great convenient location in lower manhattan !!!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour de 6 jours à New York, l'appartement est très bien situé proche du métro " fulton station" à 3 minutes à pieds, proche de ground zero. Jennifer est tres disponible, elle nous a organisé notre transfert de JFK vers l'appartement, Dan nous a tranquillement conduit vers notre destination tout en prenant le temps de s'arrêter pour que nous puissions prendre des photos de New York by night. Appartement plus conçu pour 4 personnes que pour 5. Logement à recommander
Clean, comfortable and ideally located near subway stations to pretty much anywhere you want to go. Host very easy to reach w questions.

Jennifer was a great host. She always responded really quickly to all our questions. We also took advantage of her offer of an airport pick-up, which saved us the hassle of finding our way on arrival - definitely recommend this. 

The apartment is terrifically centrally located. It's right in the heart of FiDi and provides a convenient, quiet base to explore the city.

This is definitely a great deal! The 2-bedroom apartment is located at the center downtown Manhattan, with everything supplied. The rooms were clean and cozy which made us just feel like home. Jennifer and her husband are very nice people. We arrived 1 hour later than the schedule at night and they just waited for us. Jennifer always replied quickly to our questions, and she texted us everyday to make sure we are comfortable there. I truely believe I got more value than what I spent. All 5 stars! No question.

Jennifer and Jessica were both great to deal with. Easy communication, check in was smooth - she even troubleshooted the cable tv that wasn't connecting. Two good bedrooms, sleeper sofa, well-stocked kitchen and clean bathroom. Quiet apartment with elevator on 8th floor. We were even able to get a later check out and leave our bags to make our day easier. Loved the flexibility! The only thing to be mindful of is the AC - only a fan in the second bedroom (although it wasn't too hot) and the AC units in the lounge and first bedroom are quite noisy when they kick in. But that's very common for NYC apartments and some hotels. We parked at a place called Laz parking about 8 minutes walk away (Pearl St) - it was $20 for 24hrs.

Very clean, safe, & quiet.  We spent a little more than we planned but it was worth it. We had 4 people and it was perfect amount of space.  Jennifer was easy to work with and very responsive to our questions.  

We had no issues - only a great experience.  Would highly recommend!  Thank you.

Jennifer was excellent  on the communication . The apartment was as described neat ,tidy , and functional
Location was excellent !!!easy walk to Fulton Subway, Staten Island Ferry and World Trade . We had a great time

This is a very elegant place in a great location - an easy walk to the World Trade Center, Battery Park and, one of our favorite places: Eataly. We were a party of 6 and considering that one may have to pay for 2 rooms in a hotel for that many people, the price is a relative bargain. 

The hostess, Jennifer, takes great pains to accommodate her guests.
My friend and I were attending a seminar,. The location and accommodations were perfect, but the hospitality of the host and her support staff, was even better.
Professional, spacious, well equipped. Perfect.
Great apartment with everything in walking distance. Jennifer was great communicating with us and even though we didn't meet in person it was a seamless check in and check out process
Great location, Jennifer was great. Her driver to and from airport was great.
Jennifer is a very nice landlord. The location of her apartment is very good ,wihch close to the main attractions and subway stations.

My family had a wonderful time in NYC and in Jennifers Apartment. The sleeping rooms and beds where super clean and super comfortable - and that was so important after those super long sightseeing days. Also the Metro Station is just a view minutes away - a small supermarket is close by. The apartment offers High Speed WLAN - Facetime etc. really went smooth. The kitchen had all machines and things you´d need to prepare meals. So we can recommend this apartment really to everyone - and last but not least: Jennifer is such a responsive and kind host. You will never feel alone in NYC! Thanks Jennifer
Top Lage in Downtown

Amazing location, right next to WTC and Fulton station which allows you to get anywhere quickly within NY. 

Jennifer allowed us to check in early and leave our bags in the apartment after check out as our flight was not until 7pm.

She was always in contact with us to check everything was fine and offer advice.

The apartment is as it looks on the pictures. There was plenty of room for us 4 guys to stay over 4 nights.

Would 100% recommend the apartment!

This space is so convenient to everything downtown. Just a couple blocks from all subways. Quiet building and comfy beds! The place was spotless on check in and all the photos are 100% accurate. Jennifer is a super communicative and responsive host. Check in was a breeze and even accommodated early arrival :) Thank you Jennifer!!
En rigtig god lejlighed med alt nødvendigt udstyr og en fantastisk belligenhed. Absolut nattero og meget tæt på subway. God plads for fire. Jennifer er meget imødekommende og kommunikerer effektivt.
Great location and the host is wonderful!
Jennifer is very serviceminded, friendly and professional!

Jennifer’s 2 bedroom apartment is in a great location downtown. It has plenty of space and great amenities such as sheets and towels, which made it easier on our family as we traveled through the city. I would highly recommend the apartment!

Jennifer's apartment is the best-located apartment in Lower Manhattan.  You are, literally, just steps from everything Downtown has to offer, and just a short subway ride to the rest of Manhattan.

We had a lovely time at Jennifer's (Website hidden by Airbnb) was well-equipped, clean, and nicely furnished.  And the bonus is that there's a laundry room just a few floors down, which we pretty much monopolized having come in from a three week trip to Israel.

My husband and I highly recommend Jennifer's place to anyone looking for a quality apartment in a highly-coveted area of Manhattan.

I booked this apartment for six friends who were visiting the city. The space accommodated this group size well and it was super cozy and quiet. They also raved about how comfortable the mattresses were. Overall great experience and host!
We had a wonderful stay at Jennifer's. A fantastic location, true to pictures, and a very comfortable fit for our group of 6. Jennifer was helpful and gracious!
Jennifer was extremely helpful with the check-in and out processes. Everything was as described and the location was amazing. Very smooth experience and worth every penny!
Very close to Fulton.  Pictures accurately reflect the space.
Good location, heat and noise insulation a bit lacking, but standard for the area.
Jennifer’s place is clean, comfortable and in a fantastic location in the heart of Downtown Manhattan. It’s just like in the photos. Jennifer was great to deal with. Super responsive and very nice.
Jennifer's space was perfect for a work trip to the city. Close to where we needed to be, quiet, clean and great hospitality. We will be coming back and recommending to our other colleagues.

I found the apartment to be as shown within the photos, there was 5 of us staying and it was more than adequate, location wise, for us it was great as away from Times Square and  all the noise, but close enough to just jump on the subway and you were in the thick of it in know time.
We found Jennifer to very helpful and nothing was to much trouble, would certainly look at staying there again should we go back to New York.

Jennifer was accommodating in every way. Her place is very conveniently located which is a huge plus.  I have back issues but the bed was comfortable and I didn't have any aches in the morning. Overall a great experience!

Jennifer's place is a great spot for a group of five or less eager to explore Manhattan.  It is well situated, quiet and clean.  My family had a fantastic stay and we would strongly recommend it highly to anyone.  I am hopeful to get back for a future stay myself.  Thank you Jennifer for making our trip to New York a great one.

Wonderful time at this apartment. Very well equiped and very comfortable beds! Jennifer was a great host and very helpful with arranging for our airport transfers in the midst of a winter storm. Great location near subway, supermarkets, restaurants and NYC sites. Great Airbnb experience.
Great apartment. Perfect location both for work downtown and touristing both in financial district and rest of city. plenty of room for family and recommend it highly.

I would highly recommend this place and also Jennifer as a host. I was late for check in by 4 hours due to a delayed flight, and  arrived at 1230a and Jennifer was amazing about it and despite the late hour, organized a smooth check in process for me. I really appreciated that.

The place is very clean, in a quiet and convenient part of town. The living room is pretty spacious and the bed is comfy. It’s an incredible deal for a true 2BR in New York. Definitely would stay again!

The host was very accommodating and helpful. The location is superb with easy access to various metro lines, lots of coffee and food options with a block radius, and right next to a shopping mall (for those rainy weekends, like ours happened to be). Place was beautiful, very clean, with lots of extra towels and kitchen stuff like cups and tea kettle, etc. Its located in a busy area but yet it’s so quiet in the apartment. The beds were comfy, the internet fast, and we can’t say enough great things about staying here, and look forward to coming back again.

Great location for anyone who wants to be near Wall Street, or the 9/11 memorial. Jennifer is a great host, and check-in and check-out was very easy. The place is comfortable for 4 people and everything you need for the stay is in the unit. Would recommend.
This apartment was as expected from the pictures. We stayed with two adults and three kids, and it worked perfectly. It's a very short walk to the nearest subway stop and it's quiet at night.
We loved staying here.Apt was pretty much functional to our needs.Great location!!
Jennifer’s apartment is great.  But in particular, she was tremendously accommodating throughout our stay.  Highly recommended.
Jennifer's two bedroom downtown apartment was truly a rare find. The home felt spacious enough for our family of five and was located in a very convenient part of the city. Thanks for hosting us!

This apartment is great. The location is perfect. You are right by the World Trade Centre, Wall St, South Seaport and Battery Park. Fulton station is on the next corner so you can get the subway anywhere from there.

The apartment itself is big by NYC standards and very clean and comfortable. 2 spacious bedrooms and a sofa bed in the lounge. It has a nice kitchen with all the appliances and equipment you might need.

Jennifer was super helpful and friendly. We loved it. Hope to stay again soon!

Great location and a wonderful host in the heart of NYC! Jennifer had been very helpful and accommodating, she was extremely responsive to our queries and made our stay very comfortable. She is thoughtful and kind, she even helped us with our luggage.

The apartment is very clean and wonderful and hostess with the mostest. Everything was easy and communication was excellent. Apartment is very nice and it was wonderful to have comfortable accommodations.
Lovely stay.  Jennifer is a great hostess.
À deux pas du 9-11 Mémorial et du métro. Un emplacement calme et bien situé.

El Apartamento es agradable, el métro cerca, comercios restaurantes bien 
Parte baja de Manhattan , quedamos contentos,repetiriamos la estancia
Отличное месторасположение,очень удобно и быстро можно добраться до туристических мест
Terrific place!  Jennifer was a very accommodating host.  Well appointed suite.   Kitchen quite useful.  Excellent location.  Would stay again! Highly recommended!
Very good location and very responsive host. We fit 4 people comfortably.

Jennifer's place was amazing. Apart from being located in one of the best neighborhoods in New York City, the place was spotless when we arrived. Jennifer was a great host, she left water bottles and a bottle of champagne to welcome us, and she made sure we had everything we needed. Getting in touch with her was also extremely easy and she made sure to accommodate all of her guests' needs. Would definitely stay here again!!

Jennifer was easy to communicate with and very quick to respond and answer all of our questions. Her apartment is very comfortable and quiet.  We felt safe and the neighborhood is convenient to all that lower Manhattan offers.  Great access to both Fulton St and Church St subway stations.  We would stay here again.
Easy and convenient apartment in FiDi. Nice neighborhood to walk around. The whole apartment has everything you might need for a visit to New York.
Jennifer’s place is exactly as pictured! Great location for getting around the city & she made the check-in process very simple. Would definitely stay again
Apartment was in a very convenient location. Worked for us since we only spend one night

Jennifer was great. Very responsive and friendly. The perfect host.
The location of the unit is top notch!
Jennifer’s place was great I highly recommend it. She was a great host & she’s great on communication. If i ever travel back To NYC is def look into her place again!
Jennifer was a great host and the apartment was perfect for our party of four. She was very accommodating and responded quickly. Highly recommend booking this apartment!
Very nice place to stay

Exactly as pictured and described!! Check in was super easy despite us being late! Jennifer was available any time we had questions about anything. She’s super nice and out stay was wonderful! Was a SUPER quiet place which was so nice for sleeping!!

Location, location, location...did I mention a great location. Over half of what I wanted to see was very close by. Federal Hall is a stones throw and a must see. George Washington was sworn in there as our First President. They have a Statue and a plaque of him praying at Valley Forge. Across the street is the New York Stock Exchange and you have Wall Street right there and The Federal Reserve. Another block and you have the famous charging bull. It’s also very close to the New York departure for the Statue of Liberty and I drove across the Brooklyn Bridge twice just to say I did it.

We arrived a little late and met Jennifer’s husband instead of her and we are very glad that we did. I parked in an area that would have gotten me a ticket or towed. I didn’t even see the sign and didn’t know what to look for. Her husband not only gave me some great advice about the area but he actually came out with me and helped get me parked in a great place for the night and explained the parking signs and what to look for. 

Once we got back he helped unlock the bathroom door that my 4yr Old shut and locked. We realized once in that we forgot to grab some bottled water but he had some of that as well. Super great people. I would highly recommend staying here.

The apartment was very quiet. If not for seeing people in the elevator I wouldn’t know anyone else lived there. We slept soundly. They are close to everything with plenty of new food places to try and traditional. I took two Uber’s while there as I didn’t want to drive in that traffic but I would recommend the subway. It’s a little intimidating at first with 4 kids that have never been to a city bigger than Nashville but it’s  the best way to get around.

The apartment was clean, nice, super comfortable bed and had everything we needed. There were six of us and it was perfect for our stay.
Just as described! Great location.

Jennifer’s place was a perfect location for us. Central to downtown and a short  subway trip away from all the tourist hustle and bustle of mid and uptown NY.  Jennifer’s communication and responsiveness were fantastic. Would definitely recommend.
This place has the best location to explore Lower Manhattan. We had a great time!

Great place for 4-5  pax of family. Jen is very warm and attentive, swift in response, best location to stay on around Manhattan, lots of interesting place to walk around to. Trust me, you won't regret this choice, even my mum who is very fussy person compliments Jen's place.

The unit is smaller and less sunny and bright than it looks in the pictures. To be fair, New York was mostly overcast with occasional showers during our stay. However, in the photos, the curtains were open to allow in sunshine but it wasn't really obvious that the view outside the window was another apartment block in very close proximity so we felt like we were looking into someone else's apartment and vice versa which is why we kept the curtains closed, hence the dimness. Also, the building, elevator, hallways, apartment itself feels old and dated. However, it was in a GREAT location, two blocks from Wall Street and the Freedom Tower, a block or two from the subway station, a short walk to the pier and harbor, tons of eateries, coffee shops around. The neighborhood has a lively, vibrant feel and is always bustling with action. It felt really safe to walk around as there are always tons of people. Second bedroom has two twin beds which worked really well for our two kids, but no windows so the floor fan that's provided helped a lot at night.

Jennifer was an amazing host making sure we were quickly checked in and the apartment prepared for us at very short notice.  Her apartment is in a fantastic part of the city close to the Wold trade Center and subway to anywhere in the city. Wished we could stay longer in this great location! Thank-you Jennifer!
地理位置超级好,家俬好用,床很舒服,干净,值得再订
Excellent host, brilliant location, would highly recommend.
I had a wonderful time staying here, would recommend it to anyone!
Good location. Easy to communicate.

We stayed here for 5 nights . The location is perfect ! Walking distance to 9/11 memorial and One World observatory , 12 minute walk to  a cruise terminal that takes you to Statue of Liberty,  few steps to Federal Reserve, 
I am super glad we are in a perfect location esp with 2 kids. I don’t have to take the subway to see these places 
This place has a lot of good restaurants around  too.
Jennifer ‘s place is not the newest building but she keeps it very clean . I am
So grateful that she made it hypoallergenic as much as possible for my respiratory compromised children.  The building is very quiet with an elevator . Highly recommended !

Nice place, great location  ,
Jennifer was very arranging .. thanks 
We had a super stay in NY,  as usual !

Jennifer's house is very clean and has a very good location close to all the attractions in the Lower Manhattan. The only issue you need to consider is parking. It's very difficult to find a parking space in the street, so we used the parking APP to reserve a nearby garage. And the garage charged more for oversize cars (like SUV, VAN, etc.). And if you want to do laundry, you can use the third floor laundry room and Jennifer offers the laundry card. You just need to add money to use the laundry card. The issue is you need to add at least $12 to the laundry card which is much more for one washing and drying.  And during our stay,  the building's hot water system was broken, so we had no hot water in the first day. Jennifer helped us to contact the building's management and followed all the status of the repairing. Overall, we had a great stay in Jennifer's house in NY. Thank you, Jennifer.
Quiet and comfortable apartement in the Financial District of downtown NY. Jennifer is a great host, warm welcoming and taking care of all needs. My family and I had a great time. Thank you!
Great place and location .  Thanks!

Nos alojamos cómodamente seis personas. La ubicación es muy buena, junto al Word Trade Center, con muchos locales comerciales y restaurantes así como una boca de metro. No conocimos a Jennifer pero su amiga esperó amablemente a que llegáramos del aeropuerto. 
El apartamento tiene todo el menaje y ropa de casa necesaria pero necesita una limpieza profunda y ser pintado. El aire acondicionado hace mucho ruido.

This place has a great location. The apartment itself is very minimal which was OK for us because we didn’t spend much time there. Check in was kind of hairy a little bit of back-and-forth, but we eventually got there and it was fine.  Great location!

I’m afraid to say we found the apartment to be very old and tired. The whole place is in need of redecoration and I could never describe it as five star. The location is good for sightseeing and close to the Metro.

Jennifer's place was perfect!  The location was accessible to everything, it was very clean and comfortable.  Check in was easy and Jennifer was quick to respond to all my questions and her husband offered great dining and shopping suggestions.  I would not hesitate to book this airbnb for my next trip to the city.
Excellent apartment and fantastic location! Jennifers communication was perfect...Highly recommend!
不错,靠近世贸大厦,近地铁,交通方便,房东很好沟通,亲自接待的我们
Tres bien
Great host, great location. Much better than staying in a hotel.
Jennifer was excellent! The place was exactly as expected, which is to say convenient, clean, and very pleasant. Would definitely return!

Läget var bra om man vill bo på den södra delen av Manhattan, två min gång till  century 21 och ground zero.
Bra kommunikation genom tunnelbanan som ligger runt hörnet.
Vi bodde med två barn 2 och 7 år gamla, finns en jätte bra lekpark  ovanför Battery Park fem minuter från lägenheten.
Fabulous location, and very responsive host. Highly recommended.
It’s really a wonderful experience to stay here, will stick with it in future if travel there again, thanks Jennifer again!
It's a very cozy room suitable for a group of people. The location is super convenient for just walking around. And the host is very helpful!
Great place, very clean, great location !
Excellent place, very well located, super convenient, big for NYC standards, close to everything. I loved it.
Great space.  Would definitely  stay again!
You cannot beat this location! You can walk to all the 911 memorials and the Statue of Liberty ferry!
호스트분도 친절했고, 아파트는 전반적으로 깨끗했습니다. 여러명이서 묶기 좋았습니다.
La ubicación perfecta
Great apartment in a great location.  Everything was as described.  Thank you so much for the great hospitality!
Great stay at Jennifer's place.

This apartment was such a delight. It’s in a nice, safe building on a pretty quiet street. The apartment was very clean and had everything one would possibly need. It’s very close to the World Trade Center and the Oculus. I liked that the second bedroom as 2 twin beds so my older kids could sleep in the same room but they didn’t have to share the same bed. We had an enjoyable time and look forward to coming back.
The location and price are perfect for visiting NYC. Host is very responsive
Lovely spacious place for us and our two kids when we came in for the broadway play- centrally located and close to metro, steps from 9/11 memorial and lots of places to get food.
Right in downtown,convenient location, close to everywhere. Room is clean. Good to stay
Great.
Great location close to everything you want to visit in Lower Manhattan. Jennifer was really attentive and helped with our check in especially when our fights was late arriving
Great location and great apartment - I would stay here again.

name: Perfect family getaway
summary: Simply the most beautiful space in the city, nothing compares it. Paradise in the heart of Montreal. Perfect for a single person, business traveler or a couple traveling with a small family with 2 children under 14 years old 1 bedroom with 1 Queen bed and 1 bunk bed. The house is in a small alley where it circulates less than 5 cars a day! Give an impression of countryside or the charm of Europe.
space: For travelers seeking peace and quiet and a strategic starting point to visit the city. For single person, couple or small family with 2 children under 14 years (bunk beds) and 1 child in the park for babies 2 years and under. The house offers you 2 beautiful terraces and a beautiful private grassy courtyard to relax and have fun Outdoor BBQ A few board games and card games on site to keep you entertained. The house can in no time accommodate more than 2 adults It is a non-smoking place inside and out, peace and quiet, no reception, party, party is tolerated. Large backyard with terrace, chef's kitchen and heated floor. Luxury house offering luxury.

notes: NOT SUITABLE FOR 3 ADULTS / PAS DE 3e ADULTES House rules -Fresh linens and towels are provide one time for 2 people max at start and after that you have access to a washer & a dryer on site. - We don’t allow excessive noise, if disturbances will be reported by neighbours, the security deposit will be kept.  - If we find the place very messy or when children are With adults , we will be kept $50 on the security deposit for every extra hour of cleaning required. The garbage have to be get out on the provide schedule. - Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries or illness that occur while on the apartment. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all Guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.  - Guests are not allowed to sleep more than the maximum quantity a unit sleeps (max 2 Adult). If there are more people who sle
transit: Metro Beaudry station 1 min Bus Station Brri Uqam 5 min
