Central air conditioning 5th floor with elevator Access to shared, furnished roof terrace Apartment, 3 Bedrooms + Den, 2 Full Baths. Location: Eixample, Barcelona, Spain, At Pg. Sant Joan / Valencia, by Verdaguer metro.  Walk to Sagrada Familia and Passeig de Gracia Shopping.  The apartment is in the historical part of the Eixample area.  The neighborhood is beautiful. Accessibility - 4 floors above street level. With Elevator Apartment description - 3 double-bedroom newly renovated apartment with 2 full bathrooms plus den with one single bed. One bathroom with sink, bathtub, toilet. Second bathroom with shower, sink, toilet. Complete kitchen including oven, microwave oven and full-size refrigerator. Balcony off Master Bedroom. Two double beds and 3 single beds. Maximum occupancy - 8 people. 42' flat screen TV in living room. DVD player and DVD collection. For maximum comfort this apartment h
notes: license number: HUTB-001300
house_rules: Guests need to be quiet at night while in the apartment. We do NOT accept stays of groups of guests under 21 y.o., which are unaccompanied by adults over 30y.o.

host.host_about: We are from Barcelona, Spain, and Dallas, TX.

reviews.comments:
The Grande 1 Apartment on Valencia Street is located in a wonderful neighborhood and equipped with all you might need for a short or longer stay in BCN. Everything was as we expected - lovely furnished and very spacious! There are lots of restaurants and bars in a short distance and it is very close to the center of the city. We stayed there for three nights as a family of five adults and highly recommend the place even for bigger groups of people.
Thanks a lot to Fernando and his lovely team!

This is a beautiful apartment in a beautiful neighbourhood in Barcelona. An amazing market and supermarket just round the corner, a beautiful walk into town. 

The flat was spacious and suited our needs perfectly, roof terrace is beautiful, great views of the city including Sagridia Familia which is a couple of blocks away. 

Fernando and his team were very helpful, yet gave us the space we needed, they quickly came to check out a window that looked broken. 

Highly recommended.
Appartement très bien placé et très agréable. Accueil sympathique et arrangeant pour l'arrivée et le départ.

Thanks for the perfect stay in your apartment! It was a nice apartment, well air-conditioned and able to changed by us, everything was clean and we were welcomed very nice. All information regarding the apartment were provided before and explained in a welcome "map" in the apartment. 

The bathrooms were very clean and what was perfect that the water pressure from the shower was really good thats not often. ;)

There was a really nice café in front of the apartment with good breakfast and discounted for us, because we were guest from this apartment. Supermarket is in the near area. 

We had a perfect stay! Thanks a lot!

I think the picture of the terrace is slightly misleading (the terrace is a communal terrace for the building, rather than one of the building), but otherwise flat was ok and staff were very helpful checking in etc.

Big nice apartment which could comfortably sleep 8 (or more). Hosts were easy to contact and meet, and they were flexible when we asked for a later check out. Area is good, a few blocks from the Sagrada Familia, and about 20 mins walk to Las Ramblas. Furnishings a bit sparse but no real problem.

Appartement semblable aux photos accueillantes. Parfait pour un grand groupe, petit bémol pour le voisinage qui insiste sur le fait qu'ils ne veulent pas de bruit à partir de 23h. Bonus avec la terrasse sur le toit et quartier très près du centre ville.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré les hôtes mais leurs emails explicatifs étaient complets.

We stayed for a week at Fernando's apartment with our two kids (a 4 year old and a 1 year old) and our experience was nothing short of fantastic.

Fernando accepted hour booking within an hour of placing the request, and he answered all the questions I asked.

The apartment itself was big, comfortable, and very cozy, it felt like home. It looked exactly as in the pictures, with no surprises whatsoever.

Shortly after we arrived we were greeted by someone who wanted to make sure that everything was OK. The kitchen was stocked with some basic stuff such as olive oil, coffee, sugar, dishwasher detergent, etc., which was extremely convenient.

The apartment had a crib and a highchair for the baby.

In summary, I cannot recommend this place enough.

The apartment is in a perfect location and was ideal for our family which included two infants. It was tidy and easily accessible with aloft and two showers. There is bike shop across the road whose host is very friendly. Also handily located are all the public transport options and cafe bars. There is an excellent market and supermarket nearby. I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment.

Really pleasant stay in Barcelona. The apartment was excellent for our group, the pictures really don't do it justice, it is massive. There was plenty of space for seven of us and the bright and open rooms were very welcoming. We were left to our own devices throughout and everything we needed was left in the apartment for us. The location is also good, close to some of the main sites but far enough away from the centre to not feel crowded. Would recommend!
The location was excellent and the apartment was roomy and charming! The beds weren't the most comfortable, but overall we had a great stay while in Barcelona!

Fernando's place is an absolute palace. Really big space with nice fresh air able to come through the place regularly, so it never gets hot in summer (the air con is super powerful also) bathrooms and kitchen are a good size and living room is very relaxing. The location is very central and 10 mins walk to any trains.

I really liked the apartment! It was nice and roomy. I commend the air conditioning - it worked great.  It was a thoughtful touch they had tour guide books in the apartment. It was a great location, close to a lot of the Gaudi sites, and accessible to great restaurants and markets and a partial view of Sagrada Familia from the rooftop.

The apartment building is quiet.  No noise between 22:00 and 8:00.  The bedrooms have really big closets.  There are windows on the street side and on the coutyard side for plenty of natural light.

The shower curtain in the large bathroom would attack you when you showered. You had to fight the curtain from wrapping around your body.
The location is perfect!!! We walked to most attractions!! But the host is quite difficult to contact
公寓和图片展示的一样 非常整洁干净 地点离主要景点巴特罗米拉圣家堂及购物街均只有一公里左右 我们都是步行前往 特别推荐的是出公寓左转走200米有一个菜场和超市无缝连接 简直太方便了  公交地铁站近 洗澡水很好 空调也好 非常推荐大家入住 进门因为是用密码 所以不需要等待房东办入住 但是要注意 因为欧洲人的习惯 都只有一床被单可盖 还好我随身有睡袋 否则年纪大的人晚上会觉得冷

What a fabulous place. Perfect location for sundowners overlooking Sagrada Familia on the roof terrace!
Hosts bent over backwards to help us when we had a problem with the iron and it was changed immediately. 

Only thing is the noise from the traffic in the twin bedroom is not for light sleepers but it didn't bother us (I just think this is useful for families or groups visiting). However, there are 2 other bedrooms to choose from. 

What an amazing city this is and this is the perfect location to explore everywhere- such a beautiful part of town :) 

Thank you for a wonderful stay.

We stayed at Fernando's place twice while we were in Barcelona. The place was spacious and very well decorated. The second washroom is very small but I guess that is just typical Spain! Otherwise, communicating with Fernando was very efficient, and we had no issues checking in/out.
Nice large apartment, suitable for our family of 5. Host was very responsive and everything went smoothly for us.
Perfect place, the apartment was great for 7 people. Also the communication was very easy and they were really flexible about our arriving and leaving time. Thanks a lot!!

Great hosts, great location (very close to metro and very walkable to central parts of city) and comfortable apartment for our Barcelona stay.  Fernando and Eduardo were very responsive and provided perfect instructions for our arrival and stay, thanks also for the late night dinner recommendation.
This was a great apartment in a great location.

What a pleasant quaint apartment in Barcelona. Great safe beautiful location. We enjoyed the cafe across the street daily. Very clean. Central air. Washer AND dryer (rare). Great porches to relax on and hang clothes to dry. Cute rooftop patio over looking Sagrada. I would definitely stay again. Smooth easy check in process. Host also stored our luggage on check out day so we could explore the city. Only complaint would be the beds could have had more than one very very flat pillow. They also did not have sheets on them, only one blanket which Americans aren't really used to but I believe this is more common in Europe.

We were a group of friends (party of 6) visiting Barcelona and this apartment was great for our needs. Lots of social space and a roof top terrace, which was a great place to gather. Location wise it was a good position well served by the metro and with supermarkets, bars, cafes all close by. Having a pin code rather than sharing door keys was great so we could all come and go at different times.

Very good location. A lots of good restaurants and cafe around. Nice workers. 
The apartment is clean and nice!

Nicely furnished and clean apartment & perfectly located for a city trip! 
Everything from check-in to check-out went well. Absolutely recommendable apartment!
The apartment and the area are both beautiful. The greeter Eduardo was friendly. Our wifi and bathroom problems did not get resolved after reporting them several times. We enjoyed our stay anyway.

Fernando's apartment was perfect for the seven of us. We loved the light from every room. Great space for a big family. Loved that everything was sorted quickly. Highly recommended for families. Nice area too and close to Sagrada Familia. We allowed a late check out too. Recommended!

Very kid friendly apartment.  Lots of space.  Excellent location.  Eduardo (the greeter) was extremely helpful and welcoming and was available at all times to answer any questions.   

Everything you need is within a 5 minute walk (stores, coffee, public transport).   Other people commented that this apartment was "loud"  We did not feel that way, but we also slept with the windows closed.

the appartement was a real jewel. The situation is perfect, on a great metro line, the sagrada familia and plaza catalunyia are only a few blocks away. We had fresh towels, and everything to clean the dishes and to cook, so no need to buy that much at the supermarket.
The check in and check out were really easy to do.
Thanks a lot for this wonderful week end, should we come back to barcelona, we would definitely try to come back to this place.
The location was amazing. 5 blocks from Passeig de Garcia. Not so crowded but many restaurants are nearby. The apt was also awesome. Felt like I was living in 19th century.

Very comfortably stay here . Very large flat , great communal roof terrace .   Three bedrooms and one bedroom has an extra single room which you enter through the room.   It comfortable slept 4 guys with a room each but would be suitable for more people also (Website hidden by Airbnb) Easy entry into flat and building with a code , would recommended this place
Convenient keyless access to the apartment, located close to several tourist attractions. Highly recommended!

The apartment is vey well located. Shamefully the photos and reality seem to differ. Apartment is quite run down. Dishwasher basket was broken, I informed host and nothing was done. Toilet was unhooked to floor and I  also informed host, no solution provided. Kitchen furniture was broken. On the good side beds were. comfortable and clean. Carpets erre old and dusty and need replacement.
Nice apartment -- good location, interesting layout.

L'appartement est exactement conforme aux photos. 
Il est grand, on était à l'aise comme ci on était chez nous. 
Fernando est disponible ainsi que son équipe pour toutes nos demandes. L'appartement est vraiment bien situé, proche de petit commerce ainsi que de très bon restaurant. 
Je vous recommande sans hésitation.
Good location but the apt is rather old and a little disappointing overall.
Fernando hat sich sehr viel Zeit genommen und ausführliche Tipps gegeben sei es Freizeitgestaltung, Restaurants, Bars oder Busanbindungen.

This is a great location, and the apartment was spacious. With seven people in our group we had enough room. We also had family over for dinner and enjoyed our time on the roof garden once the sun started to go down. The apartment is a traditional Spanish design and we appreciated the main bedrooms being away from the living area so people who were up late did not disturb those who wanted to sleep. The main bedrooms are on the street end of the apartment and you should be aware the streets are loud at night. Barcelona is a vibrant city where people stay out late. This apartment is very close to many of the tourist sites and the metro, the neighborhood felt safe and there are many small cafes and restaurants nearby.

Pros - spacious, master bed comfortable, good air con, hot water all the time, apt looks like in the photos.  WiFi worked fine 4 out of 5 days.
Cons - the apt lobby and stairwell smell HORRIBLE. Maybe it's a Barcelona thing but it was really nasty to come and go with that smell.  The other beds besides the Master not that comfortable.  Sparse with blankets. The apt is adequate but if you are looking for nice accommodations for vacation,  I am sure you can do better.  As advised by Fernando and others, noisy in twin room and master, the 3rd bedroom by kitchen you can hear the elevator go up and down.  The master when you shut the shutter doors is quite enough.  If you need a big place and not that picky, this would work for you.  There is some kind of home day care on one of the apts that face the courtyard and you can hear lots of kidsin the am.  Not terrible but something to note. The location is fine, we felt safe.

Thanks a lot, Its a very pleasant stay. The staffs, Madara and Liliana were super nice and patience. My request was well responded. The location is perfect, very close to Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo, and stores on Gracia Street. The room is spacious, good for 2 families with children. All in all, a pleasant stay in This apartment, thank you!

Appartement vétuste par rapport aux photos mais néanmoins satisfaisant au niveau literie et salles de bain.
Cuisine minuscule et vraiment sous équipée ( à peine quelques couverts et vaisselle).
Pour le reste ok, nous avons apprécié la climatisation.
Nous sommes déçus par le rapport qualité prix, nous nous attendions au vu des photos à autre chose...mais Barcelone est sans doute chère...
Mais le séjour fut néanmoins agréable et la communication avec la personne en charge de la location s'est bien passée.
Nous ne trouvons pas que cet appartement réponde à la philosophie Airbnb...
La situation dans la ville n'est pas mal mais c'est une route très passante.
Proximité de la Sagrada Familia (10 min à pied)

Este apartamento muy bien distribuido cuenta con cuatro habitaciones (dos baños) una cocina con recursos básicos. La localización es excelente, permite ir caminando a muchos sitios y se encuentra muy cerca de rutas de bus y estaciones de metro. Fermando deja unas recomendaciones que ayudan mucho durante la estancia.

Excelente ubicación, lugar espacioso, con buena distribución de habitaciones.
Excelente comunicación con el anfitrión y cercano a lugares de interés.

je mets une note de 11 sur 20 car les prestations sont un peu en dessous de ce que l'on est en droit d'attendre d'autant plus que le prix du séjour est augmenté de près de deux nuits supplémentaires pour l'accueil de " plus de 4 locataires" alors que l'appartement est proposé dans la gamme 6-7 personnes.
Efficient information before check in. Nice location in the city center. We can walk to every where we want. The balcony in main room is my favorite!  Highly recommend for everyone.

Fantastic space in a great area, Eixample. Very clean upon arrival and great communication with hosts. Perfect for a big group (we had 7 guests all sleep comfortably). Keyless entry was very helpful as no need to worry about keys and coordination with a big group. Would definitely stay here again!

O apartamento é muito bom e espaçoso.  Ótimo para famílias e grupos.  
Bem montado,  limpo e bem localizado.  
As fotos do airbnb dão a impressão de que o apartamento é mais conservado  porque não retratam o desgaste natural do piso e paredes.  Nada que comprometa, mas gerou uma decepção inicial ao entramos.
Great place to stay in Barcelona with a big group. Perfect communication to the host and easy check in
Excelente en todo sentido. Muy recomendable.
Un apartamento muy agradable, amplio y buen situado

Wonderful neighborhood.  Felt very safe and close to everything. 10-15 walk to most everything. Very large apartment. We were five and had plenty of extra room. Very very clean. Perfect choice. Thank you!

We had a fantastic time at Fernando's apartment. The location is very good to get too most places of interest in Barcelona. The apartment has a great old Barcelona charm with beautiful tiled floors throughout. Its a little noisy if your not used to living in a city but for us this was not a big issue. The showers all worked well and the beds comfortable. But when we were there it could have benefited from upgrades on the bedding. I would recommend this place if wanting to be close to the city sites.

The apartment is very nice and spacious.
Furthermore the location is great for reaching the main attractions.
I had asked the owner to let us find the apartment warm and so it was.
He also gave us clear and precise information.

L'appartamento è molto bello e spazioso.
La posizione è ottima per raggiungere le maggiori atteazioni.
Avevo chiesto al proprietario di farci trovare l'appartamento caldo e così è stato.
Inoltre ci ha dato informazioni chiare e precise.

Location is perfect. Supermarket and Tapa Bars are all over. 10 mins walk to La Sagrada de Familia. The place is clean and it was so convenient checking in to the house. 

The host is spectacular. When I asked a question, it is answered immediately. Fernando also provided tips and options to make my stay stress free.

This Airbnb was wonderful! There was plenty of space for all 5 of us. The WiFi worked very well. We also loved the sun room! We visited in January, when it’s a bit colder and the heater worked amazingly so we were never cold!
Es espacioso Y con buena ubicación
Good location with big rooms and kitchen.

Great place 
Spacious 
Really great location !
The host is kind. The place was way bigger than we expected and close to the Metro and a few other attractions. We had a good experience.
Fomos muito bem atendidos pelo Fernando e pela Madara. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado, amplo, confortável e bem equipado, apesar de antigo. Recomendamos.

Fernando's place is wonderful, very central in Barcelona, 8 minutes away from Sagrada familia and from passeo de la gracia. We enjoyed it as a family, having breakfast together every day and in the evening sitting on the couch before we all went to bed. The mattresses were fine. Definitely recommended!

name: Beautiful Comfy Flat Valencia St A
summary: 2 bedroom apartment with central A/C in historical building with some of the original features, like high ceilings and mosaic floors.  5th floor with elevator.  Located in the superb neighborhood of Eixample Dret, just 15 min walking to Las Ramblas and 10 min walking to Gaudi sights, like Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera.  By metro stations of Verdaguer and Girona.
space: Description of the apartment - · Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment with a glass-enclosed balcony on the 5th floor of an 100-year-old Art Nouveau building, renovated outside and inside. The floors are still the original colorful mosaic, and the ceilings are 9 feet high. There is an elevator, air conditioning, central heating, and a full kitchen with granite countertop, pots & pans, dishes, etc. One full bathroom with toilet, sink, and half-tub with shower. The living room has a dining table, TV, etc. You can see the tips of La Sagrada Familia from the enclosed balcony. The apartment fits one to four although an occupancy of three would be the ideal for the size. In case your dates are not available in this apartment, we have a few other 2 bedroom apartments in the same building. Please see our other (Hidden by Airbnb) ads or our website. Description of location - · The apartment is located in the beautiful Eixample, halfway between Gaudi's La Pedrera (also known as Casa Milà) on the Passeig
description: 2 bedroom apartment with central A/C in historical building with some of the original features, like high ceilings and mosaic floors.  5th floor with elevator.  Located in the superb neighborhood of Eixample Dret, just 15 min walking to Las Ramblas and 10 min walking to Gaudi sights, like Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera.  By metro stations of Verdaguer and Girona. Description of the apartment - · Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment with a glass-enclosed balcony on the 5th floor of an 100-year-old Art Nouveau building, renovated outside and inside. The floors are still the original colorful mosaic, and the ceilings are 9 feet high. There is an elevator, air conditioning, central heating, and a full kitchen with granite countertop, pots & pans, dishes, etc. One full bathroom with toilet, sink, and half-tub with shower. The living room has a dining table, TV, etc. You can see the tips of La Sagrada Familia from the enclosed balcony. The apartment fits one to four although an occupancy of three w
neighborhood_overview: Superb neighborhood of Eixample Dret, just 15 min walking to Las Ramblas and 10 min walking to Gaudi sights, like Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera.  By metro stations of Verdaguer and Girona. There are many restaurants, cafés and groceries stores right by the building. Passeig de Sant Joan is a very wide promenade with many new and trendy nice cafés and restaurants.
notes: license number:   HUTB-001306
access: shared rooftop terrace, open hours 7am-10pm (07.00-22.00)

host.host_about: We are from Barcelona, Spain, and Dallas, TX.

reviews.comments: This is a lovely apartment.  We sat on the terrace and drank wine and  watched the street below.  The kitchen was small but functional and I cooked several meals. The staff / greeters were especially nice with ideas and explanation of the apartment.  We like the Eixample neighborhood, but August is not a time I would recommend as many shops and restaurants are closed.

Logement très correct pour quelques jours a barcelone.
tres bien situé,calme.
Katsya a été prévenante et efficace.
je recommande cette place.

Hemos estado 4 días en este apartamento y a gusto. Es un poquito más viejo que lo que aparenta en las fotos pero está muy bien, está limpio, bien ubicado y tiene todo lo necesario. Calle sin ruidos y bar enfrente para desayunar muy agradable. 
El primer día, al no haber huéspedes el día anterior, nos permitieron hacer el checkin a las 9 de la mañana y el último día lo mismo, como no había nuevos huéspedes, pudimos salir del mismo a la tarde, cosa que agradecimos un montón. Se puede ir andando a casi todos los sitios típicos de Barcelona, enseguida estás en Paseo de Gracia. Tiene salida de metro muy cerquita aunque nosotros no la usamos.

We just left this nice flat in Barcelona and everything was great. Katya was so helpful and answered all our questions about area and transportation around the city. She responded quickly to our question of how to use the washer dryer combo and was so kind. The flat was easy to get around to all the sites and some within walking. Everything was neat and clean with just the right homey touches.

Likte veldig godt å bo i leiligheten. Litt bråk fra gata pga veiarbeid og trafikk. Leiligheten har nydelig takterasse som dessverre ikke kan brukes etter kl 23. Leiligheten er gammel og noe slitt, det kommer ikke frem på bilder. Men den var veldig ren. Husverten var hyggelig og ga oss mye informasjon. Litt langt til stranda selv med metro.

I loved the time spended in barcelona. the appartamen is situated jn a quite area where you can sleep very well. i felt like at home. very confortable and very nice appartament. i would like to come back the next time. i didnt  meet the owner of the appartament but i think they was a nice people. thanks  a lot
The apartment is very nice, however, it was smaller than we expected. The bathroom was too small for our family of four adults, however, it is an adequate apartment in a nice building.
Beautiful apartment, small but the perfect size for a few people. Good location and very clean

Appart très joli et fonctionnel proche de la sagrada et du metro. L'appartement parait plus grand sur les photos. Les bémols sont l'appartement qui n'est pas son lieu principal donc qui parait être que pour la location et les parkings alentours hors de prix.

Fernando and family did an excellent job of explaining the check-in process and responding to requests both before and after our stay. The location of the apartment cannot be beat. It is walking distance to everything in Barcelona, including a nearby metro station. The apartment is smaller than it appears in the pictures. It was just right for two people. More than that may be a squeeze.

The apartment was lovely and well situated. Just 2 mins walk to a metro station, shop and cafes. The host was amazing and super helpful. The maps they provided us with, we took everywhere and the handy restaurant guide was fantastic. The rooftop terrace was also great and we could see Sagrada Familia and Tibidabo Mountain from there which topped it off. I would definitely recommend.

Very nice flat! Well located in walking distance from Sagrada Familia, metro and other attractions. The flat was clean and looked pretty much as in the pictures. The kitchen and bathroom are small but well equipped (including basic stuff as coffee, oil, vinegar, all the kitchen tools, etc). Air conditioner and hot water system worked perfectly. We did not meet Fernando directly since we arriver late in the night, but everything was ready waiting for us. Overall, great place to stay. We had a wonderful 4 days in Barcelona, and the apartment was part of the story.

My son and I really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was easily found and is in a great neighborhood. There are lots of great restaurants nearby and I was able to walk to many great sites. All needed information is provided upon checking and the communication with Fernando prior to our arrival was great.

Séjour à Barcelone très agréable. Appartement idéalement bien placé. 
Nous avons apprécié la sélection de restaurants et bars.  Seul bémol, l'utilisation de la terrasse avec des horaires très restreints.

Очень удобное месторасположение, в самом центре.
Квартира небольшая, но очень удобная.
Рекомендую!!!

Apartment is clean and nice. It's exactly the same as you may find on photos. Neighbors located not far away from all main sightseeing. I had a business trip but pretty sure that it would be good for you if you are a tourist as well. 
The whole booking process went well. 
I haven't seen anyone because key collection is automated and easy. 
That was actually pretty good just because I was too tired to have small talks with a host :) 

I definitely recommend Fernando's apartment.
All good

Kleine Wohnung, aber ausreichend ausgestattet. Türen und Fenster brauchen Unterhalt. Bequeme zentrale Lage an Straße mit lautem Verkehr. Viele Geschäfte und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe. Formlose Check-in und Check-out. Ausgezeichnete Auskunft und Kommunikation.

Lots of street noise but very nice neighborhood. Good restaurants. Big market just down the block. Don't expect any wifi. Had to go next door to creperie for that. Just a block and a half to metro and busses. Walk to Segrada Familia. Great rooftop terrace!!  Place is small but kitchen came supplied with all the basics including some coffee. Really nice to have these.
Nice apartment at good location, keep in mind that one of the bedrooms is much smaller than the other one! Wifi Internet could be better.

La ubicación es óptima y está cerca de todo. El piso es un poco más chico y más viejo de lo que parece en fotos pero esta muy bien. 
El único problema fue el wifi que funciona MUY lento, lo demás ok.
Lovely space with original tiled floor. Comfortable beds. Great views from the roof terrace. Good location.
The place has a great location and it good. We were all happy with the stay.

Great location. Nicely furnished space. It has two beautiful patio doors, one that allows you to sit outside. Above the trees so you have a clear view. Apartment has a nice rooftop terrace. 

We got this mainly for the washer and dryer feature and we had trouble with that appliance. The hot water also kept kicking off. Floors were dusty. A bit pricey.

Nice place in great location for exploring the city! The communication before we came and whilst we were there was really easy and friendly which we appreciated. The bathroom and kitchen are simple but functional and the tiled floors throughout the apartment are a nice feature.

This flat is excellent for quality, price and location. We enjoyed the seating area on the balcony and the roof terrace and the air conditioning was a great relief at the end of a hot day. Beds are comfy and the living space is perfect for groups with more than enough seating. Love Barcelona and love this place.
The flat is roomy, cool and well positioned to visit Sagrada Familia. Easy to get around and lovely to return to after busy days. Great having the balconies and the roof top terrace was a bonus.

We enjoyed our stay very much. The place is a bit smaller then on the pics.. But its only a five minutes walk to sagrada familia and underground station. The place was clean and we had everything we needed - air condition included. Communication was super uncomplicated and fast and friendly. Check in and check out times very flexible. We came earlier and left later. Great. If you Look for a nice place to stay very central. Its the place. We had some problems with using WiFi the first days. But not all the time.
Excellent emplacement et lits dignes d'un hôtel.

The location is surprisingly perfect. We walked everywhere and when we wanted the train it’s just a couple blocks away. The area is busy and fun. Easy to grab a taxi and a good meal or cocktail. 4 can fit comfortably but three may be ideal for some. Madra was superb and beyond helpful. The patio off the bedroom is a nice touch as well as French doors off the living space. A really great space that feels like city living. I actually enjoyed the street noise it wasn’t too much ever. 
I’d stay here again if back in Barcelona.

This place was amazing. It’s in a great location with a little supermarket across the street and amazing restaurants all around. If you stay here you have to eat breakfast at Billy Brunch at some point! The apartment is easy to find and access. The only thing that I didn’t particularly like was the thin walls, you can hear everything going on next door. Therefore, it may not be good for a family with small kids but the apartment does seem to be great for families as it has a master room and a room with 2 twins. There’s a cute balcony in the master and there’s access to the top rooftop terrace that has amazing views of the sunset. Fernando was immediate was responses and made our experience even better. Highly recommend!
Nice place and good location
This is a great apartment. Lovely little terrace, very comfortable, excellent location. It was very easy to get in and out. I recommend!

It's a really nice place with a great localization. The appartament is really sunny and comfortable, the central heating was working good, so there was no problems with warmth inside during some chill winter nights. There are some markets and coffee bars around the corner. You can go by foot to Sagrada Familia, it's less than 10 minutes walk. There are also buss stations from which you can travel to other parts of the city, and there are also night busses stops so you can go to the fiesta at night. Highly reccomended place in Barcelona.
Great apartment in the center of Barcelona
Great stay and fab communication
Amazing your place Fernando

Check-in was very smooth with great communication. 
Fantastic location! The apartment was extremely clean with all necessary amenities such as iron, hairdryer and coffee machine (very important!). 
The bed was very comfy and although the apartment is on a main road it was fairly quiet. 
Lovely roof terrace from which you can see Sagrada Família!
Would definitely stay again.

The wall is thin.
Missing trash box.

name: Cozy Bedroom in Heart of Cihangir
summary: In Cihangir, the “Western-spirited” neighbourhood in Istanbul, home to fashion and arts community. One person bedroom with small balcony in big, bright and fully equipped apartment, with a big open kitchen, 1 bathroom and 1 toilet, and a dining room.
space: The room is about 10 square meters / 107 square feet. It is furnished with one single bed, a small hanger closet, a library unit and an office desk. It has a small balcony looking out to the closed but sunny apartment inner ward. Our living-room is spacious and bright. Half of it is my personal study area, but the common area is still very big, and furnished with armchairs, a couch and a dinner table for 4-5 people. We have a big open kitchen, fully equipped with all expectable facilities and utensils. Including a dishwasher, an oven, a garbage disposal unit for organic waste, all kinds of coffee machines, a big fridge inside which we can manage you some room, etc… There are 2 bathrooms : 1 toilet only, 1 with shower, toilet and a washing machine. The flat has hot water 24/7 (I know it sounds mundane, but it is not always the case in Istanbul), a central heating system, and unlimited 50 mbps wireless internet.
description: In Cihangir, the “Western-spirited” neighbourhood in Istanbul, home to fashion and arts community. One person bedroom with small balcony in big, bright and fully equipped apartment, with a big open kitchen, 1 bathroom and 1 toilet, and a dining room. The room is about 10 square meters / 107 square feet. It is furnished with one single bed, a small hanger closet, a library unit and an office desk. It has a small balcony looking out to the closed but sunny apartment inner ward. Our living-room is spacious and bright. Half of it is my personal study area, but the common area is still very big, and furnished with armchairs, a couch and a dinner table for 4-5 people. We have a big open kitchen, fully equipped with all expectable facilities and utensils. Including a dishwasher, an oven, a garbage disposal unit for organic waste, all kinds of coffee machines, a big fridge inside which we can manage you some room, etc… There are 2 bathrooms : 1 toilet only, 1 with shower, toilet and a washing
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located at the end of Sıraselviler Street, right in Cihangir “kahve” (a square that local people use as a meeting point). It is 10 mins walking distance to Istiklal Street and Taksim square, the heart of “modern” Istanbul, where you’ll find a shopping district and all the nightlife (restaurants, bars, clubs etc).  There is a big supermarket 2 mins from the apartment, and a “bakkal” (small shop open until the late hours of the night) just next to the entrance of our apartment building.
transit: You’ll find a metro station up the street in Taksim, a tramway station 5 mins walking down the street (this tramway will let you access the “old Istanbul” touristic areas, such as Big Bazaar, Hagia Sophia…). Within 15 mins walking distance is also to the Karaköy pier, where you can board on a boat to the Asian side of the city.
access: You are free to use any space and equipment (except personal items and personal groceries) in the flat except our private bedrooms, and my personal area in the living room.
interaction: We are two people sharing the flat. A French girl, and myself. We both know the surrounding area very well and will be happy to help you out with information and recommendations about where to hang out.
house_rules: We want you to feel at home, so please feel free to be yourself. We never felt the need to write down formal house code, we just naturally expect you to be respectful towards us and our neighbours in the building.

reviews.comments: I can warmly recommend to stay at Deniz and Virgine's place! Was there four nights. The apartment is exactly how it should be like: clean, bright, not hard to find, well located. It's in the heart of Cihangir, very nice, central neighbourhood with lots of  cafes, bars, restauraunts, Shops. As Deniz grew up in Cihangir he can give you excellent tips! They are both very kind and made my Istanbul stay an excellent experience!

It's a very good room to stay at, apartment is nice and cozy with amazing people. It is located 2 min away from the Tramway which makes it near to everything in Istanbul.
Deniz and the people are very lovely, plus he knows Istanbul very much so he can guide you anywhere.

Deniz is a great host. He took his time to explain everything and had usefull suggestions. The appartment is nice and very modern for the area. Coffee was even included :) Couldn't recommend more, Not a single problem.

great place in a great area.
come as guest.
leave as friend!

Deniz and his girlfriend were wonderful hosts. I visited Istanbul at a somewhat tense time, but they made sure I was well-informed. Even when I cut my stay short, they were very accommodating. The apartment is very nice and the bed extremely comfortable, not to mention the excellent location. Thank you! Would stay again. :)

I had a wonderful stay at Deniz's apartment, which is located in the best part of charming Cihangir surrounded by amazing bars, restaurants and cafes. The apartment is beautiful, the room is bigger than it looks like in pictures and Deniz and his girlfriend Virgine are very welcoming - I'll definitely be back on my next visit to Istanbul!
Great location. Deniz was welcoming and helpful.

Beautiful place, awesome people. Everything was clean, the apt is located in a great spot and very easy to find. Deniz and his girlfriend made me feel at home, gave me great suggestions and were overall super cool. Definitely recomended.

Wonderful host, apartment, and location. Very comfortable room with stunning views from the living room balcony. Deniz was on holiday during my stay but was incredibly communicative and helpful, as were his house mates. He even arranged for a super late check out when my flight home was cancelled. Many cafes and restaraunts nearby to suit any budget. Short walk to metro and Taksim. Very easy to find the place. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

My friend Claire was looking for a place to stay in the evening for the next day. It's not always easy to find someone who'd accept with as much kindness as Deniz did. She said to me that these two days with Deniz and Virginie were great, and I'm sure they were !

name: Rambla I - Plaça Catalunya
summary: Rambla I- Quiet and peaceful apartment. One double room. 3rd floor of a building from the 19th century with elevator and wifi on Upper Rambla
space: Quiet and peaceful interior apartment on the third floor of a noble building on La Rambla, very bright (pics taken almost when dark out) and cozy, totally silent. It has capacity for two people, with a double bedroom with a queen sized bed. Apartment very bright and welcoming, with balcony facing the inside of the apple. It has a living room with kitchenette, fully equipped for an enjoyable stay: toaster, microwave, etc ... The apartment has air conditioning, heating, bathroom with shower plate and washing machine. Linen and towels are provided for guests. Building with elevator and wireless wifi. 1 bedroom with double bed 1.40 x 1.90m. Living room with a fully equipped kitchen. TV and speaker. Bathroom with shower. Microwave, toaster, iron and hair blow dryer. Air Conditioning and Heating. Elevator and wireless high speed. This apartment is located in the best area of "La Rambla", the most known and cosmopolitan boulevard of Barcelona, just a few meters from Plaça Catalunya and most o

host.host_about:
We are a familiar company based in Barcelona and Tamariu and we manage various short-term rental apartments Barcelona and in the little town of Tamariu (in the coast).

We try to offer the best possible experience to our costumers by having few apartments and taking care of them at all times.

reviews.comments: В общем всё соответствовало описанию. Когда я сказал хозяйке, что дует с улицы через щели в окнах, то на следующий день пришёл мастер и заделал их. Район в самом центре, так что можно быстро добраться куда угодно. Окна выходят во двор, так что довольно тихо. Но в доме очень тонкие стены, так что если попадутся шумные соседи - будет всё слышно.

Excelente ubicación céntrica y mucha amabilidad por parte de la anfitriona María . Edificio muy antiguo con incomodidades que resultan pintorescas  sólo al principio de la estadía.Piso modernizado con equipamiento básico, adecuado para muy corta estancia. Todos los  medios de transporte a metros del piso .
Really nice location and a good service!

The location is really nice, close tourists places and the public transportation.
The apartment is really good but I had two problems that were not solved, one lamp and the conditioned air that was broken.
位置很好 交通方便 房间也干净 房东也很好 住在这是巴塞最好的选择

name: Waikoloa Condo on The Big Island HI
summary: Enjoy our 2 bed/2 bath ground floor end unit with easy access to pool/hot tub/BBQ area. Our quiet condo complex is a short drive to beach/shopping/ restaurants. Enjoy Lanai/wet bar. Condo stocked with coolers, beach chairs, snorkel gear, beach towels
description: Enjoy our 2 bed/2 bath ground floor end unit with easy access to pool/hot tub/BBQ area. Our quiet condo complex is a short drive to beach/shopping/ restaurants. Enjoy Lanai/wet bar. Condo stocked with coolers, beach chairs, snorkel gear, beach towels
house_rules: Follow our posted guest rules which will be provided prior to arrival

reviews.comments: 숙소 위치도 좋고~ 숙소안에 시설도 너무좋았어요!!! 처음에 위치를찾는데좀헤매긴했지만~ 잘 자고갑니다^^ 감사해요
Absolutely come back again! Location, the apartment itself, the environment, everything is perfect.

We have had a wonderful time staying in Paul's place. He sent us an email explaining all the details for checking in and we had no issues finding his place. The Condo is very well equipped, with anything that you need on a Kitchen, two very spacious bedrooms and bathrooms. It accommodated very well the four of us (two couples). Besides the fact you are not on the beach, the location is good, and you can go to some great beaches within 20 minutes from the condo. Paul has a property manager Sharon, and she was also very helpful and kind. Overall it was a great experience and I definitely recommend to others and next time we go to the Big Island I will contact Paul again! Mahalo...

This spacious and well-appointed condo made a wonderful home base for my wife and her in-laws for three nights. It was so great to have a kitchen and our own space. The lanai was an excellent place for breakfast and afternoon drinks, and I was surprised that there was a good view of the sunset from the unit. The check-in was well managed, having received lots of information prior to arrival. The property manager was present when we checked in around 4PM, and she gave us some extra guidance. There were a few minor repairs that needed to happen in the unit, but the property manager was aware of this and considering it is someone's home, we didn't feel it was much of an issue. Also, the price was excellent for the upscale feel and size of the space and the location. We would consider returning to this exact location on future trips to the Big Island.

We are very grateful that Paul accomodate us after a cancel reservation in another Airbnb and regret not booking this one at first for our stay on this side of the island.

The condo was everything described and more: Clean, comfortable, well located, peaceful, welcoming. Do you know when people say they have everything that you need for your stay? Well, this condo DOES have it. The best well equipped kitchen, quality beach gear, every detail and item that we could asked for. We plan to stay again next year, if this condo is available. It's fantastic. Thank you so much!!

We had a wonderful time and the place was perfect all around! All the necessities of being home and definitely will be staying here again on our next visit. I will be passing along how great and accommodating our stay was to friends and family! Mahalo your place is beautiful and great location!

This two bedroom condo is extremely clean and spacious. Waikola Village provide you with a great Island location. It is about 30 minutes from the Kona airport, 20 minutes from Hapuna Beach Park, and roughly 2 hours from the Volcanoes National Park. Check out the Waikoloa village market for decent Island prices on groceries. There are two separate pool and hot tub areas right next to the condo for your use. Be sure to open the sliding doors and front door, turn on the fans, and let the air flow through the condo for an amazingly refreshing Island air breeze. This condo honestly has everything you could want from beach chairs and a wet bar to a fully functional kitchen and washer and dryer. I would recommend staying here to everyone visiting the island. Please make sure to respect the property and all that this amazing location has to offer so that Paul and Christine continue to make their condo available for rent. We hope to return sometime in the near future. Thanks to Paul and Christine for sharing their island getaway with us.
Paul was providing very helpful Information in advance. The house is great in a lovely area. We enjoyed our stay very much! Thank you!

This was a great spot for my wedding party to crash at for the week and Paul was a fantastic host- quick to respond when I had questions! The place was clean, large and conveniently located in Waikoloa Village. I would definitely stay here again! Thanks Paul!

The Appartement is very comfortable and offers everything one could wish of (cooking utilities, two bathrooms, washing Maschine, bar, pool,...)
The Appartement is located in a living resort next to a golf resort. The wikoloa village doesn't offer much more than golf (as far as we discovered). We always drove by car to the coast/beaches (ca 20 min). 
It is a nice place to stay and relax!

Everything went really smoothly during my stay at Paul's place. The condo was clean and well stocked. The only two negatives about this space are the loud turkeys and that, when the sun comes up in the morning, it's really bright and hot in the Mauna facing bedroom. Just be prepared for that and everything else is Amazing! Thank you again Paul
Muy buena
Great place to stay!

It was our second time staying at Paul's condo and, once again, we just have great things to say about it: 

It's comfortable, well decorated, well equipped, nice ventilation, nice location.

It has everything for a family stay. Post doesn't list but there IS a spa at the pool area, along with BBQ grills and a refrigerator. 

We love our stay and plan to go back - Paul's place is a little gem.
A wonderful place to stay while traveling to the area for work. I will miss having coffee on the lanai each morning!

I highly recommend this home to anyone looking to stay on the Big Island. Fifteen minutes from the ocean and close to a highway that goes directly to Hilo. Paul was a gracious host and the neighbors are great. They also have everything you need to hit the beach from day one. I would definitely stay here again.

There are no words to describe how amazing our stay was. Anything that you can think of is provided. The home is cozy and very welcoming. We highly highly recommend Paul's place! We hope others will enjoy this place as much as we did. Thanks for making our vacation very memorable!!

Very neat and clean, and Paul is generous in letting us utilize his beach chairs etc. It's also a spacious condo with cute decor. The issue we ran into was bugs...we had ants in the kitchen throughout our stay, and we had dead cockroaches and a wasp in our room and bathroom. If you keep your food in the fridge and refrain from putting anything sweet on the counters, then you'll be okay. It's a quiet area and good location.
Really nice, silent, really good

Paul's place was great. We loved the beach gear that he made available. The condo was clean and comfortable. The community was quiet and had a convenient supermarket. We saved a lot of money by cooking in the well supplied kitchen. Thanks for the great stay!

Beautiful indoor & outdoor living area, very roomy & cozy. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking in, which is great for saving money on vacation! My only slight negative is the sugar ants! They are extremely aggressive, even showing up to drink off the water in the sink or clean dishes. We cooked a frozen pizza, & even before it cooled off enough on the counter to be cut, ants were swarming it. Otherwise, it's a very clean, well maintained unit that is very close to a lot of beautiful beaches & other attractions. Comfortable bed & sitting areas. Also, the televisions are new & large, which is very nice compared to the photos on here.

We had a very relaxing stay at Paul's place and I recommend it for everyone! The condo is spacious, cozy, baby-friendly and feels breezy during a hot day. It is equipped in everything you need on your family vacation (snorkeling gear, beach umbrella and chairs, toys, cooler etc.) Same for the kitchen - it has all sorts of pans, pots, cooking utensils, even spices! Great lanai gives you the opportunity to enjoy your meals outside and the wet bar is a wonderful bonus. The whole condominium complex is quiet, well maintained and has a luxurious vibe, located only 20 minutes drive from Hapuna beach.
Great place!

Good value and nice condo with beautiful grounds. Pools are clean. Hot tubs are luke warm. Not next to the beach if that's what you are looking for but way more affordable. Lots of tiny ants no matter what you do. We kept all food in the fridge and pest treatment was done the day before and there were still lots of ants and a few cockroaches.

Fantastic!!!  Best location! Cleanest place in the complex (my fifth time staying in Waikoloa Villas and most have been a bit sketchy).  Nice beds. Nice sheets. Fantastic deck. Everything you need.  If you are visiting the Big Island this is the place to stay. 10-15 minutes to everything (Hapuna, Beach 69, Maura Kea resort, shopping)  but still in a very quiet neighborhood.  No VOG here.  If you golf, the Waikaloa village golf course (clubhouse is a driver and nine iron away) is my favorite in the area. It is always in excellent condition not like the resort courses where you pay three times as much.
Beautiful place.
Amenity goods need to bring, but it is a place where you can spend a wonderful time other than that.
It was all me and my friends needed! We went to race ironman 70.3 so getting a house was better than a hotel, the market near by was perfect!

Great location.  Great property.  This place had everything we needed for a memorable visit to the Big Island.  We wanted to see as much as we could of the island and this provided a nice centralized location in the North where we could easily make day trips in multiple directions.  The air quality was also quite good on this end of the island as compared to the South and SouthWest.  If you are looking for a host who pays attention to the small details, this is highly recommended.
Nice and clean place to stay for vacation.  Supermarket and a few restaurants nearby.
‘Twas a splendid time. Recommend!
Tho was a perfect ending to our family vacation. we loved he central location to the best beaches in North Kona. we will be staying here again on our next vacation.

Pros:
Really really beautiful! 
Very very spacious!

Corns:
No AC! It is OK in the night if you open the windows. But pretty hot in the morning.
No body wash (no soap or gel or anything). They said Airbnb doesn’t provide body wash
Bad signal and no WiFi in the guest room.
Great place in a fantastic location. Pool is very close and fun for the kids.

Our stay at Paul's place ended beautifully our trip to Big Island.  The condo is  perfect, well-located and everything we needed was there (and more !).  The place is quiet, the pool and the spa were cool extras to finish our days with the kids.  Super confortable beds, breakfast on the patio every morning, beautiful decoration... we would definitely recommand this place !  It's even better than the pictures !
At Waikoloa Village, Hua Bay and Lava Lava Club are must-dos.   Kids also liked petroglyps at King's Trail !

What a quiet lovely place.  You probably could hear a pin drop at night.  Loved all the special extras that the owner provides:  Lots of towels including beach towels, boogie boards, beach chairs, beach umbrella, cooler, pool noodles, even ice packs in freezer, and washer and dryer in unit, etc. etc.  We were a bit concerned that having no air in the unit would be an issue, but there are ceiling fans everywhere, plus standing fans to keep you cool at night and there was usually a lovely breeze later in the evening to cool things down. The owner replies quickly if questions come up and we found everything how it was described.  We will definitely come back here.

Beautiful place! Very clean and comfortable. The island decor and furnishings were pleasant to come home to. The kitchen is fully stocked so we were able to cook anything we wanted and not have to go out. There are two rooms and the layout provides peace and privacy in each room being in different parts of the condo. The condo accommodates all your needs. It really felt like you were staying at someone’s home because of all the love and care put into to keep it pretty and homey. The master bedroom and the lanai in particular were our favorites. The grounds around the condo are kept clean and tidy. We loved our stay!

We had a wonderful stay in Waikoloa Village. The apt. is generously sized for 4 people (we were only two and had ample space). Everything is so clean and there are many towels, beach towels, household things, gear for the beach - much more you can want. The village is very quiet and comfortable. We can recommend this apartment very much.

Paul’s place is perfect. It was super clean, stylish and relaxed. We stayed as a family of 4 and the condo had everything we needed. It really was like a home away from home. 
We would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone looking to holiday on The Big Island.
We had a great stay at Paul’s place.

Great space to spend a week with a family of 4. Lots of room for all of us. Plenty of towels and beach gear. Everything was clean and well taken care of.  Kitchen was set up with everything needed to cook at home. The patio area is lovely for breakfast. The pool was never busy, we often had it to ourselves. Super close to groceries. Convenient location to easily access the many great beaches north of kona and to explore the northern part of the island.
Great place within a golf course complex. There are plenty of ceiling and standing fans to keep the house cool. Enjoyable outdoor areas  and good set of amenities for the beach/pool.

Paul’s condo was perfect for our short stay in Waikoloa. We’ve never stayed in that area so it was nice to be in a different area than Kona. It was still close enough to drive to Kona and nearby beaches on a daily basis. The condo was a good size for our party of 6 (4 adults and 2 kids). It had everything we needed. We didn’t get to explore the area as much but it’s a cute little town with ocean views and lots of breeze.
It was great stay!

ｺﾞﾙﾌ場を取り囲むｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑ｡ﾜｲｺﾛｱ地区でのんびり過ごすには最高の場所｡
ｺﾞﾙﾌ場､ｽｰﾊﾟｰ､ﾋﾞｰﾁ､近隣のﾓｰﾙにも近い｡
Great host, spacious and peaceful place.

name: 3BD SPACIOUS COTTAGE KAANAPALI 42
summary: This 3 bedroom cottage situated on the golf course is in a more quiet area of the complex.  It has AC and is a 5-10 minute walk to the beach. Fully equipped kitchen, gas BBQ grill on the lanai, free parking and wifi. Very private and located centrally to all West Maui has to offer.  2 swimming pools for 44 private cottages.  Old Hawaiiana setting.
space: Description: This quality 3 bedroom 2 bath home is located in the International Colony Club a community of freestanding homes nestled along the North Kaanapali Fairway within walking distance to Kaanapali Beach. Your Villa opens to a spacious floor plan with vaulted ceiling, large sunning deck, and all the comforts of home. Watch the flaming Maui sunsets from your lanai, cool off in the pool, or take a stroll down to Kaanapali and enjoy its fabulous white sand beach. Ready for some action, stroll down to Kaanapali's restaurants and resorts or drive 10 minutes to Lahaina's enchanting restaurants, shops and historical landmarks. This Kaanapali villa offers you, your friends, and family the best in location and amenities for enjoying a luxurious private fun filled Maui vacation. Amenities: 1,900 sq ft, Living rm:32" flat screen, CD Player, Fireplace, separate dinning area(6).  3rd bedroom: 2 twins, TV, DVD/VCR/CD combo.  Street side parking or in nearby parking area.  Common area pool,  g

Old Hawaiiana setting.
