notes: County of Maui Permit #STWM (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: We offer concierge service for all your activities and will deliver tickets to your property for your convenience.

host.host_about: I am a Realtor here on Maui as well as in California.  I love to travel and assist people to find the best on Maui!

reviews.comments:
We had a fabulous time in this little cottage, we were within walking distance of the beach ( 5-10 min with two small children). The house was spotless and had linens and all the spices to cook from home.
Carol was available at the beginning of our stay and on phone or email for the rest which was exactly what we wanted.
The little cottages are ideal if you do not want to be in the condo/hotel area but still have access to it and have two pools for the complex. A lovely time, we will be back!

Carol was on top of it!  If I had a question she answered almost immediately. If I had a concern or problem she handled with the utmost professionalism.  We were very impressed with her service.  The house was clean and comfortable.  I loved how close it was to all of our favorite spots.  Great place for our family.

# 42 at Kaanapali, 3 bdrm ICC Cottage was perfect for our 3 adults and 3 teenagers.  Plenty of room for all of us.  It was a good location, quiet, clean, comfortable, and Carol was most hospitable.  There were many homey touches that we appreciated - fully equipped kitchen & bathrooms, night lights, beach mats & towels etc - even beach umbrellas, which it turned out we needed.  Having a washer & dryer, A/C and ceiling fans were great.  I was happy there weren't any staircases as are typical in condos.  We could not have been happier with everything.

I had a phenomenal time at Carol's Maui apartment. There were 6 of us and the place was perfect. Really spacious, great location being a 2 minute walk from the beach. Basically on a Golf course too! Big living and dining area in a really nice quite neighborhood. This place was exactly what I was looking for. There was a hot tub too! I would highly recommend this to anyone.
Carol is great! Place is awesome! We came earlier and Carol let us drop our stuff and let us check in 2 hours earlier. Would definitely stay there again!!
The place was wonderful. Everything you needed was provided very clean. Thankyou carol would recommend
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great week in cottage #42. It was quiet, clean and well-appointed, allowing a family of six a wonderful vacation. We enjoyed the kitchen and spacious living space. It was so nice to have a washer/dryer and beach chairs available too. The home has a nice outdoor area and is an easy walk to the beach, which we visited every day. We will never stay in a hotel again when visiting Maui. Carol was a great host and responded quickly when we had questions.

When we arrived, the radio was playing Hawaiian music- helped get us ready for the island.  Good location - four cottages from the pool, easy in/out to the major road, close to local beaches.
We were able to use the beach chairs when we went to the beach and some mats.  That was so much nicer than just sitting in the sand.
The washer/dryer were great features.
Cottage was exactly as the photos that appeared on Airbnb.

Staying at Carol's condo made our trip! It was right in the middle of the best attractions and walking distance from one if the best beaches on Maui. The house comfortably fit 8 of us and had everything you need to have an enjoyable vacation. Carol was easily reachable and flexible with our reservation. I highly recommend this stay. Mahalo!
Everything was excellent!   We really enjoyed our stay at the cottage especially that we could walk to the beach.

The place was lovely and clean. I would describe it as tired. There were a few things not working (missing). Lights and wine glasses. 
The location was great as we could walk to the beach and even walked to dinner one night. The pool was very nice and practically empty.  
Carol was fairly responsive.  
I would recommend this place but may be overpriced based on age.

Location was absolutely perfect for a family vacation. It is an easy walk to the beautiful Kaanapali beach and  the shops are close by for groceries. 
The golfers in our group were also impressed by the wonderful golf courses in the area.
As first time users of airbnb we were thoroughly impressed with our accommodation. The description given matches the place exactly. 

Carol's advice to hire a car was wonderful as it gave us the opportunity to explore Maui. 
Carol was really friendly - she gave us a couple of fantastic recommendations for dinner and also several places to explore close by. 
We were also impressed by how quickly Carol responded to a request for a kettle and extra wine glasses - we certainly did not expect her to arrive so quickly and with a big welcoming smile. Nothing was a problem.
We will certainly use airbnb again and definitely recommend to our friends.

My family of 3 and my best friends family of 4 really enjoyed our stay at Carol's 3 bdrm cottage.  There was plenty of room and the place was clean and well stocked.  The location is perfect.  Just a short walk to the beach.  Our adult kids 17, 18 and 22 enjoyed the pool.  We were close to the shopping center to pick up groceries and the BBQ was a great bonus.  We would love to come and enjoy Carol's place in the future as we love Maui and her place was wonderful.

The house was large enough for our family of 9 (3 small boys and three couples) and comfortable. The location is great. It is close to the beach (10 minute walk) and there is a nice pool on the property that we used often, which is very close to the house.

The house is very well stocked with towels and bedding and for those with kids, it is well stocked with floaties for the pool and beach toys. There is a picnic cooler and ice packs in the freezer and both bathrooms have a hair dryer.

The house is not new and we did encounter some minor issues, including a leak into the hallway, which we assume has now been repaired.  This detracted little from our stay, however, which we enjoyed very much.

We had a great time at Carol's place! It was even better than it looks in the pictures; the patio is huge and has a mango tree, and there's a new sleeper couch in the living room.

The kitchen was fully stocked, and when we ran out of gas with the bbq Carol brought over a new tank right away.

Thanks Carol!

Die Lage des Cottage ist zentral allerdings liegt es genau an einem stark befahrenen Highway. Und dadurch ist Tags und Nachts starker Verkehrslärm. Es ist es etwas in die Jahre gekommen und eine Modernisierung wäre nicht schlecht. Das Cottage war bei der Übergabe nur oberflächlich sauber aber in Details nicht gut gereinigt. Der Grill und Kühlschrank waren in keinem guten Zustand. Die Kontaktaufnahme mit Carol via Airbnb oder Mail war nach der Buchung ohne Reaktion geblieben, so dass wir erst vor Ort nach einem Anruf den Code für die Schlüsselbox erhalten haben. Da hätten wir uns im Vorfeld über ein paar Informationen gefreut. Der Pool war gut und wir hatten diesen oft für uns alleine. Noch eine Sache zum Checkout: um 7 Uhr stand die Putzfrau vor der Tür und wollte reinigen. Sie sagte Checkout wäre um 10 Uhr. Wir haben Sie dann gebeten um 10 wiederzukommen. Darüber war sie nicht wirklich erfreut. 
Alles in allem unser bisher schlechteste Erfahrung.

The house is conveniently located, right next to a golf course and on the other side of HW 30 is Kaanapali beach.  Carol provides many items, such as a cooler, beach chairs, water shoes, pool floatation devices, golf clubs and even a bottle of sunburn cooler.  We didn't expect them, but these things turned out to be very helpful.  The house was clean, bright and airy.  We didn't try the outdoor grill, but suppose it works as other appliances.  Overall, it is a charming little house.  We enjoyed our stay very much.

Our stay was great! Carol responded to questions very quickly. She was straight to the point, but helpful. There was a miscommunication with the checkout and this was handled professionally. We appreciated that. The location of the cottage is perfect. It is close the beach, restaurants, and activities. It is easy to park rental cars near the entrance. The pool area is nice and quiet. The house was clean and matched the photos. There are beach chairs and coolers to use which was very helpful. We really enjoyed the space and would recommend it!
Beautiful condo in a quiet area! The pool is very private. Everything you need to make your stay relaxing. Plenty of room.

라하이나에서 보낸 3일의 시간은 마우이 전체를 즐기기에는 너무나 짧고 행복했습니다. 캐롤의 집은 우리에겐 훌륭한 휴식처가 되어 주었지요. 필요한 것은 거의 모든 것이 구비되어 있었고, 말그대로 내집같이 편안한 곳이었습니다. 창문에 붙어 있던 도마뱀, 문앞을 나서면 보였던 은하수, 조용한 야간 정취는 정말 환상적이었지요. 다음기회에 다시 올수 있다면 좋겠습니다. 너무 바빠서 풀장을 이용못한 것은 아쉽네요. 아이들을 위한 여행으로 다시 왔으면 합니다. 캐롤 잘지내고 왔어요.

The house was well equipped with everything you need/want. Spices, condiments, towels, beach toys etc. The space is big and adequately fit our party of 6 adults + 1 toddler. 5 minute walk to a spectacular beach and a close drive to everything you want in west Maui. I would definitely stay here again in a heart beat. The pool is a 30 second walk away and was always empty.
We had an amazing stay. The house is very comfortable. The only issue we had is the blinders in the twin bed room. When my mother opened them some came down.

Carol's place was perfect for our visit. It is bigger than it looked on pictures and housed 5 adults with room to spare. The location was perfect, close to the highway and a 10 minute walk from a really nice beach with great snorkeling. There were plenty of towels for the beach and a lot of great beach toys in storage as well. The condo was in a great location in the complex, good for watching the sunset and going to the pool, which we never saw anyone at. Would definitely book again!
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Carol is friendly and generally respond to our questions very promptly. The house is nice and located in a good spot--5 minutes' walk to the beach.

However, I must point out that the original description is not accurate. It says "AC" in the title and clearly states that the house has AC. However, upon our arrival in the late evening, we discovered that there was not a single AC unit in the APT. We contacted Carol, and were told the AC was broken and removed. Her initial suggestion is to ask us to find another place and she will refund us, which seems to me ridiculous as it's impossible to find a comparable home at 7:30pm in West Maui with a comparable price! To provide some context, we made the reservation 6 months ago just in the hope of securing a good place with a reasonable price.

End of story is that Carol brought two portable ACs on the second day and we have no choice but to suck it up. To be fair, it was not too hot in Maui in Feb, and we are generally satisfied with this home, but inaccurate description? Whatever

The house is fine, and was big enough for our group of 6 adults with room to spare. However, we had a really negative experience dealing with Carol. When we arrived, I called her to let her know about some issues (bathroom shower wasn't draining, no propane for gas, AC not working), and she said she'd send her handyman over soon. That afternoon, I got back to the house and nothing had been done. Eventually, when he did show up, Carol had only told him about the propane so he wasn't able to fix any of the other issues and had to come back later. Roto Rooter ended up having to come for the bathroom because the handyman couldn't fix it and despite us telling Carol in writing and over the phone that we weren't comfortable with the plumber entering the house without us or her handyman present, we arrived home to find him there alone and he told us Carol had given him the access code. She was incredibly rude about the entire thing, and we had to spend multiple days of our vacation dealing with these issues. Ultimately, there are plenty of other houses in the area that are just as big/nice at the same price so I can't recommend this one because of the negative experience with Carol and her management style.
Beautiful house in nice location. We've enjoyed staying in your house, plenty of room and this house has everything you need for big family vacation l. Thank you so much Carol.
Everyone loved Carol's place.  The patio with the bbq was a real hit.  It was close to everything that our group wanted to do.

Very spacious, beautifully furnished & decorated, and appointed with nice kitchen ware.    The location is excellent; a very quick walk to the beach and beachfront walk, while not needing to stay in the middle of it all. All the beach gear we needed (except for snorkeling) was provided.  Noise from the highway is considerable, but we felt almost alone in the pool and neighborhood, and enjoyed the patio with the evening sunsets. Easy parking.  Carol was easy to work with and quick to respond to our questions.  Thanks, Carol!

We all loved Carol’s place!! It was very beautiful, spacious and perfect place to stay for a big group of people (Three adults and four teen agers and one elementary kid) like us.  It has everything you need, and we really enjoyed making BBQ dinner every night at the outdoor terrace. Since Kaanapali Beach is in a walking distance, we went to beach every day.  It was also very nice that we could use some floating boards, portable chairs and straw mats that Carol has provided for the beach.  

Carol was very nice, easy to get hold and she responded to us quickly when we had some questions.  We would definitely like to come back again this place in near future when we visit Maui.  Thank you very much, Carol!
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The photos of the space are accurate, and the large common spaces/dining area/etc were great for our family vacation as we spent a lot of time playing trivia/card games in the living room. 
The location was also very good - secluded and central right across the highway from Ka'anapali. 
While the unit was clean, there is a musty/mildew odor that we couldn't really put our finger on. I will note that a lot of other places we visited on the island had this same issue. Generally, while the furniture was nice and the whole thing was cute and had an island decor, it really does need to be renovated I think. The air conditioner worked very well, but the AC unit condenser was right outside the house and was very loud in the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms. 
A note about the 3rd bedroom: the twin beds are small and not for adults. Also - the door in the 3rd bedroom was not really a door, more like hinged partition that you find leading to a den or a closet - basically it only provided for people not to see inside, but you could hear everything going on in the common spaces which made it very difficult to sleep if other people were awake. This bedroom is really only for children, it is not fit for adults. I wish that the owner would have mentioned this when I contacted her and clearly stated that we had 6 adults and no children. 
Additionally - the WiFi was very poor - nearly unusable. No HDTV. This was especially apparent to us as we had just stayed in a AirBnB in Honolulu the week before that had clearly updated WiFi and Electronics, so it was a bit annoying.
We loved our stay at Carol's place. Great size house. Very stylish but welcoming. Enjoyed the space, deck and pool and appreciated the well stocked and well equipped kitchen.

Location was walkable to the beach which was nice and the house had everything we needed! Didn't use the communitiy pool or anything so my review is just of the house. House wasn't anything fancy but worked out well and was affordable. Will probably stay closer to downtown Lahaina next time but it was only an $11 Uber ride. Overall the house was great!

Carol是亲切而友善的,她的房子在一个高尔夫俱乐部内,环境优美,交通便利｡离拉海纳小镇开车7分钟,到捕鲸镇海滩开车3分钟｡
房子里是三个卧室,典型的夏威夷风格装修,藤蔓家具很舒服,厨房及卫生间都干净整洁,非常适合家庭入住｡
在入住过程中我们遇到一些小麻烦,和房东联系,很快都得到了满意的答复和解决!
Loved the cottage and the location.

Cottage was clean and very spacious for our group. Nice swimming pool nice and close. Parking was handy for unloading and loading to go. Very quick to respond to any questions. Very easy to deal with.

This place is a great place to stay for big families. Loved the Bbq place. Make sure to check the gas for bbq because when I get there, there's only half gas left for the bbq grill. I contact Carol and she said she'll refill it the next day but didn't for the whole time we stayed. Luckily it's enough to BBQ for 2 days. The A/C noise is very loud in 2nd and 3rd room. The A/C located  right outside the 2nd room. So don't open your window. when we first step in the room is smells and dusty so we open all the window. It stills doesnt help but is nothing unbearable. 
Becareful of the dish washer. The water leaks on our last night of staying there and the water smells very I meant very bad. I contact Carol about it she just said she'll have repairment men come to fix it. Overall is a nice place to stay if the condo get clean more often to get rid of those dusty smells. The location is great. Carol is quick to response when I contact her.
Big, beautiful house and reasonable price!
Easy access , very spacious and clean. Close to every beach worth seeing.

The cottage is across the highway from Ka'anapali beach resorts, which was ideal for our work needs. The area is quiet and the cottage is well equipped with all the travel needs. The kitchen and family room are very open and good for gathering. The pool was refreshing and clean and the patio off the cottage was a nice feature. 
Carol was easy to communicate with during booking and our stay. 
We enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back for any of our work trips again!
The host canceled this reservation 120 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Large house close to the beach that needs a little TLC. 

Overall our stay was good, the property is big and fit the 6 of us plus a child nicely. I'll list the things that I found good and not so good below.

Pros:
We were able to check in early which was nice.
10 minutes walking to the beach.
Plenty of parking.
We were cooking a lot and had everything we needed to cook with right in the house.
Air conditioner keeps the place nice and cool.
Phone reception at the location is great(Verizon).
Lots of beach gear like chairs and floating boards etc.
Everything like the beds and towels felt clean.

Cons:
Like other reviewers have mentioned, the house itself feels a little old and not really cared for.
During our stay we had the sink leak and the kettle break. Also the fridge was leaking a bit. Not a huge deal just annoying.
There are three rooms total with beds, 2 bedrooms with king beds each and 1 room converted into a bedroom with two twin beds. The king beds are comfortable but the twin beds are pretty old and squeaky.
The wifi is just plain bad. It's slow and for about 3 nights out of 7 it just didn't work. 
The house has crickets living in it and they like to make noise at night which freaked out my wife at first. I killed a couple on our stay there but there are definitely more.
And the last thing is the air conditioner, it's REALLY loud. It hangs right outside one of the bedrooms so when it's on it's practically impossible to sleep in there. It's fine during the night since you don't really need it on but if you like to take naps during the day you can't use that bedroom.

In general everything was fine but if the owner would just take care of the house a bit it would be a much better place to stay.

Hermosa casa, buena ubicación, cercana a la playa. Equipamiento full, todo lo que una familia con niños pudiera necesitar, hasta el más mínimo detalle.Ubicada en un entorno maravilloso. Recomendable totalmente
The host canceled this reservation 70 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay at Carol's place was great. There was ample room for our group of seven. We enjoyed the AC and swimming pool. The house was very clean and it satisfied all of our household needs. We were able to walk to the beach and shopping centers. There is also a few restaurants and convenience stores nearby. We highly recommend staying at Carol's place.
Great place to stay! Carol was very responsive and helped whenever we made any requests! I would stay there again.

Un appartement spacieux et cosy.
Bien équipé et confortablement meublé.

Seul bémol, le nettoyage des sols n'avait pas été effectué.
Beaucoup de poussière et de sable.

Le cottage est situé dans une très belle résidence magnifiquement entretenue, mais se trouve proche de la route cependant. Bruyant.
Very roomy. Great vacation home in nice quit community.

The house is in a great location, 5 minutes walk from a beautiful beach with great snorkeling, 10 minutes walk to the Royal Lahaina luau. The common areas were spacious and fit our party of three families traveling together. Kids loved the pools. 
There were a few issues. I'd double checked well in advance of our arrival that there would be 2 portable baby cribs and the twin beds would be made up as one double bed; neither was done when we arrived, and I couldn't get hold of Carol for a while (which was more of a concern for the cribs, as we had 2 sleepy babies but only 1 baby bed). Both issues were taken care of within 24 hours. A panel fell off in the kitchen and the dishwasher leaked; Carol sent someone to take care of both things the day we reported them. After a few logistical bumps in the beginning, we enjoyed our stay at the cottage.
Carol was great.  Very helpful.

Good location near great beaches, restaurants and shopping, and with all amenities needed for a family traveling with kids.  Will definitely consider staying at this bungalow again during a future visit to Maui.

Carol's home is conveniently located and offers great views from the front porch. It was very relaxing to watch the sun come up in the morning from there. It was walking distance to the beach and the property location even offered great walkways for morning and evening strolls, given its proximity to a nice golf course.

 Carol's pantry had extra food items that we were not expecting.  Carol offered plenty of dishes and silverware so we didn't have to run the dishwasher until it was full. She also had plenty of towels. The house was very cozy and spacious. She provided some great reading materials on local activities that we found very helpful.

Finally, Carol was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Overall, staying at Carol's home enabled us to have a great experience at Maui!

Carol' s Place was amazing! She had music going for us when we arrived and the home was clean and inviting. The views are gorgeous and only a 5 min walk to the beach. We loved having a grill on-site and full kitchen to prepare our own meals. There is a grocery store less than 1 mile away.  We also very much loved being able to do laundry. And because we travelled with kids, the pool was a hit.  I will be coming back and recommending to my friends and family.
Great stay. Great amenities. As advertised.

We just returned home from a week long stay at Carols place and we can’t wait to go back! The home was spacious enough to accommodate 6 adults and 2 kids and had all the amenities of home! We had access to snorkel gear, boogie boards, a washer and dryer, TONS of towels, blankets, dish ware, a pack n play, the list goes on. It was the perfect house for my family, my parents and my brother and his wife to spend family time together in Maui! Carol was extremely helpful and available for anything we needed while we we were on island. The views of the ocean and the sunsets from the lanai were amazing, and the BBQ worked great! The pool at the complex was a few short steps away and mostly empty every day we went. The beach was a little walk, maybe 8 minutes, but totally convenient and literally across the main street from the complex. Cannot say enough good things about our trip..we will be back soon!
We had a great stay!
とてもよかったです｡一通りのものが揃っていました｡WiFiが最後の方遅かったです｡

Carol is extremely responsive. The house is in a great location with a cool older Hawaiian feel rather than a high rise resort which was much more our speed.  It’s well stocked with everything you could need.

Carol's place was perfect for our trip - spacious, airy and very well located. We could easily walk to Airport Beach, get to the center of Lahaina in no time and really enjoy all that Maui has to offer. There is ample parking at the house, too.

The beds are comfy, linens plentiful, the washer and dryer work well so that we always had a supply of fresh towels and clothes. There are lots of ceiling fans (three in the living/dining area) that keep air circulating so the AC doesn't have to work as hard. The bedrooms have lots of closet space and dressers as well, so no lack of places to put stuff. The master bath is a little tight for two (only a single sink) but the shower is spacious and the toilet is separated by a door, which is always a good thing. The kitchen is well-appointed (a full set of Kirkland pots) and three people can work in it without getting in one another's way. 

Carol was very attentive and responsive, even though we did not meet her face to face. All the instructions were clear and she answered all of our questions really quickly. There was a little miscommunication with the cleaning crew on our departure day (we checked out a bit later than they would have liked) but that got worked out in the end. All in all, a great stay and we would go back.

Carol’s place was far better than we would have expected. The space was huge, very clean and had all the amenities we needed (and more!). 5 mins from a fantastic beach, very close to parking and pool access and truly a wonderful space to call home. Carol was professional, quick to reply, and clearly takes good care of her space. Would definitely recommend and will be returning! Mahalo!

This is a great place for family vacations.  My family have stayed in almost half of the cottages on this property over the last 25 years.  Year after year, we love it.

The property is quiet, with two pools and beautiful landscaping.  It's a great location, within walking distance to the beach, and a super short drive to the resorts and restaurants at Kaanapali, and about 10 minutes outside Lahaina. A full grocery store is 5 minutes away.

This cottage is one of the largest on the property.  It has three bedrooms and was perfect for our adult family of 5.  The kitchen was perfect and we spent all our mornings with coffee on the large patio.  We actually had ripe mangos on the tree over head and we ate one each day.

The laundry is a great amenity, allowing us to pack light.  They also had pool toys and lots of towels for pool and beach trips.

Super house for the party of 6 we had.  Very comfortable and spacious.  The kitchen and eating area was great to have.  We were able to do laundry and come home with clean clothes.  Very responsive and helpful host. Thank u Carol
Great place, close to our favorite beach, and plenty big enough for the family. We will definitely be back.

This 3 bed house is really a great place in a great spot. The living area is old style vaulted which is lovely. The place is dated, but it feels island-y so that really isn't a problem. Coming from ultra modern San Francisco it is quite a change, but a welcome one. The walk to beach is about 10 minutes and the local beach is Kahekili beach, which is great for snorkeling (though there are better). The beach is much better than Kaanapali (which is frankly awful) and is a great place to be based. It was never crowded. As for the house: There were ample boogie boards (no waves so we didn't use them). There were ample masks and snorkels for adults and kids (we didn't use because we brought our own) and a pair of fins (we had our own). Plenty of towels as well. There was a small beach umbrella, which does the trick for two, but we brought our own sand anchor and would recommend either your own umbrella with anchor or purchasing one. There were also a couple of coolers (which we used) and various other items. We did bring our own water shoes and those are essential for kids and less confident swimmers. The house had a fully stocked kitchen including many basic ingredients (no olive oil, but we left our extra bottle). There was also trash bags and dishwasher soap, as well as laundry pods (we never did laundry). Bathrooms has soap and hand soap as well. Shopping was really limited to groceries, which was incredibly useful. Carol had a bottle of wine for us when we arrived. Parking was easy and right next door. We used the car to go to farther beaches and the Safeway (about 10 minutes away). The lanai was very pleasant with a good gas BBQ. All switches were thoroughly explained with sticky labels (actually quite a good idea). The TV and entertainment area was lacking. No way to connect to the dated stereo system (bring your own UE speaker for hanging out). And the TV channels on DISH were not HD (funny how poor the picture quality was until HD). Also no premium channels and the only way to watch movies was a DVD player. So no movie nights here. A couple of issues. The proximity to the highway was just loud enough to be noticeable but not enough to disturb sleep. The windows are old style glass slats which don't do a good job of noise damping or insulation, but do a good job of airing the house out during the night. There was AC but we don't like AC and didn't need it during out trip. Daytime high inside was 84 and overnight that dropped to 80. AC usually causes someone to get an earache so this is a blessing. The sprinkler woke us up a couple of times. Carol was an excellent host. She restocked the washing pods when we ran out and was...

Vi er en familie på 5 som hadde en fantastisk uke på Carol's sted. Huset er nesten enda finere enn hva bildene viser, og hadde alle fasiliteter vi trengte. Gangavstand til strand. Carol hadde lagt alt godt til rette og svarer raskt når man henvender seg til henne.

During our stay and leading up to it Carol was very helpful and gave quick responses to any questions or concerns we had. It is a very spacious home, that is a quick 10 minute walk to the beach and about a 30 minute walk to restaurants and shopping.

We stayed at Carol's place for 7 nights and had a great time.  The house is very spacious and comfortable.  It had all the amenities you will need along with extra wash clothes and towels.  Location was close to the beach and shopping.  We would definitely recommend Carol's house and look forward to coming back next year.
Thank you Carol for being such a great host! We had a wonderful stay at Cottage 42. The house was perfect and so close to everything. There was a lot of space, and we enjoyed the pool also.

Words cannot express how much we loved Carol’s place. The pictures really don’t do it justice! The kitchen was well-appointed and had everything we needed to cook many meals, and there was plenty of counter space. The dining area was very nice and had plenty of room as well. The living area had the most wondeful, cozy sofas. The layout of the main living area was great - since there were several seating areas, the teenagers could each have their own space while still being together with the adults. I also appreciated the little touches like the ceiling fans and stereo already being on when we arrived, that was very welcoming. The decor is somewhat modern with a vintage Hawaiian feel - the perfect combination. Bedrooms and bathrooms were nicely sized and in good shape.  We were very thankful for the use of Carol’s quality beach chairs and umbrella, as well as the washer/dryer. The location is great - the beach at the end of the street was great for snorkeling and bodysurfing, and less crowded than Ka’anapali despite being right next to it. We didn’t have any trouble parking at the beach, and we also walked to it once. I can only hope it won’t be too many years before I get to visit Maui and stay in this beautiful cottage again!

This home had some 5 stars and 2 Stars. It lacked attention to detail. The photos don’t allow for actual smell of the home.  It may have been a the type of cleaner that was used on the flooring, but it was pungent. This home had AC which was a plus, unfortunately this may be the only upside.  It did come with a fully stocked kitchen (ie, utensils, cookware, cups , etc)  and washer and dryer, but all that is expected when renting a home for a long period of time.  This home lacked functionality. The bedroom linens were dated, flat and smelly. The TV system had to be carefully tested to see what worked.  And the home wasn’t fully sealed to keep outside critters where they belong. However, I would rather see a lizard than a spider or other kind of bug.
This is a spacious unit right off the highway.  The beach gear was great and the pool was nice.  Would definitely stay here again.
Cottage was even better than expected. It is wonderfully located and had everything you might need.  Check in was easy and the community pools on site were a nice bonus
Great place and a GREAT location! Just a 10 minute walk to the beach and the standard beach gear provided helped us out a lot. Thanks Carol!
Great place clean and not far from the beach with plenty of things in the area to do. Would certainly visit again.

We just returned from a magical 14 day trip to Hawaii, with 10 days in Maui at Carol's place with 7 people.  (Grandma/Grandpa, Mom/Dad and 3 kids (ages 21, 19 and 15) 

Communicating with Carol was exceptional - she always got back to me within 30 mins. Check-in was super easy. The location of the home, was perfect, right in Kaanapali and a very close and easy drive to Lahaina and Whalers village shopping and dining.
The home is nice-loved the wooden beams and how roomy everything was. Close parking lot, right by the home. 
The private Lanai was awesome, spend every morning enjoying the sunrise!!   
It has 2 lounger chairs and 4 chairs and table. It also comes with a BBQ.
The 3 bedrooms were great and roomy!! 
1 Master with en-suite bathroom for Gma/Gpa, 1 Queen Room for Mom/Dad and 1 room w 2 twins + additional bathroom. Youngest daughter slept on the couch in the living room, as there are muliple "living areas and couches.  The living area and kitchen were nice and roomy - even had netflix and wi-fi, which the teens were very grateful for!  The property has a swimming pool just 3 doors down, which we never used, but it is nice and has a small outside kitchen and BBQ area.
A quick 10 min walk to a beach, which was super easy and nice to do in the mornings
We loved that the home came with lots of extras!! Lots of Beach towels, 2+ beach chairs, 2 body boards, sand toys, 3-4 pool noodles, etc.  Rental place was super close, so we were able to rent additional chairs, snorkel equipment and additional body boards and surf boards (great prices).  Check out was super easy.
We loved Carols house and are looking forward to our next stay in Maui and at the home!! Mahalo <3

We had such a great time! This cottage is in a great location, very private and peaceful. Parking was easy and very close by. Carol was super responsive and helpful. This place had all the things that mattered most to us!
Carol's place was wonderful. We truly enjoyed our stay! The common areas were spacious and a great space to gather. Thank you so much, Carol! We would definitely stay again!

This home was perfect for our stay with my husband, my sister and her husband, and our mom for her 80th birthday. The location was well situated in town and the home itself was very spacious, beautiful, and so comfortable.  There was enough space for us to all lounge around together, or go into other areas of the home as we needed.  The Lanai has a nice (distant) ocean view with lovely plants surrounding it and the birds love nearby the trees. There is a little bit of road noise while on the lanai, but it’s not so disturbing that you won’t use the space. We did every day! The beds and all other furniture are very comfortable.  We loved having the beach chairs and towels to use at the local beaches. My husband even enjoyed a round of golf on the adjoining golf course. Carol was prompt and responsive to all questions and wonderful to work with. We will certainly plan to come back to this location as soon as time allows!

name: Perfect 8th Avenue Apt in Chelsea
summary: Come Stay at 2bd apartment located in Chelsea. Central NYC, minutes away from Times Square, Broadway and other must-see hot spots. Great location for travelers on the move. Easy access to trains and citi-bikes.
space: The apt is perfect for NY sightseeing. You'll have your own private room where you (and a +1) will comfortably share a queen size bed. Please keep in mind this is a walk-up building.  The kitchen includes a stove, oven, microwave, full size refrigerator, and dishwasher. Feel free to use any appliance/utensils during your stay.
description: Come Stay at 2bd apartment located in Chelsea. Central NYC, minutes away from Times Square, Broadway and other must-see hot spots. Great location for travelers on the move. Easy access to trains and citi-bikes. The apt is perfect for NY sightseeing. You'll have your own private room where you (and a +1) will comfortably share a queen size bed. Please keep in mind this is a walk-up building.  The kitchen includes a stove, oven, microwave, full size refrigerator, and dishwasher. Feel free to use any appliance/utensils during your stay. Bathroom Kitchen and all appliances and cooking supplies  Bed, Speedy *Wifi* Washer & Dryer (directly across the street) Would definitely consider myself a laid back young professional. I work for an ad agency and also take acting class and workshops. My roommate is into fashion and design and will be around to answer any questions during your stay. Chelsea is hands down one of the trendiest neighborhoods in NYC. I absolutely love it here. Down 8th avenue
neighborhood_overview: Chelsea is hands down one of the trendiest neighborhoods in NYC. I absolutely love it here. Down 8th avenue alone you'll find a vast array of cafes, restaurants, bars, and bodegas/stores. Also steps away from the Joyce Theater if you'd like to catch quick a show. The following hot spots are walking distance from the apt:  Chelsea Market  The High Line  Whitney Museum  The Meatpacking District  The West Village  Chelsea Piers  Union Square  Times Square
notes: There is metered parking just in front of the building, please be sure to read all parking signs. No one wants a ticket or get towed, right?! Feel free reach out with any questions or concerns about the listing or neighborhood. I look forward to hearing from you - Welcome to New York!
transit: Less than a block away you'll have access to the main subway arteries of New York, the A, C, E and L subways. On 7th avenue you can also catch the 1, 2, and 3 subways.
access: Bathroom Kitchen and all appliances and cooking supplies  Bed, Speedy *Wifi* Washer & Dryer (directly across the street)
interaction: Would definitely consider myself a laid back young professional. I work for an ad agency and also take acting class and workshops. My roommate is into fashion and design and will be around to answer any questions during your stay.
house_rules: We just ask you to treat the apartment like it was your own. We love to go out and enjoy the night life. You probably do too. We definitely don't mind if you come home late from a party, just don't bring the party home. No pets or cigarettes.

reviews.comments: Un appartement très bien situé , assez proche du centre de New York , chambre très bien comme décrite dans l'annonce . Jen nous est très souriante et nous a très bien accueillis, je recommande !

Jen responded quickly to my same-day request, and was very helpful in helping me feel at home. The description was accurate. Location really great, right where I needed to be.
She even gave me tips on where to go out in the neighborhood.

Jen is a lovely welcoming host.  There was excellent communication before I arrived which made finding the apartment and picking up the keys nice and smooth.  The room is as posted: basic but clean and comfortable, perfect if you just need somewhere to get your head down while visiting New York.  The location is the main advantage of this apartment- bohemian downtown manhattan, right in the middle of everything.
Jen was very welcoming! Her place was quiet and very conveniently located to the subway.

Jen was the most gracious host and made us feel right at home, very cool and down to earth. Not only was Jen a wonderful host, but the location of her apartment is ideal. It's close to Chelsea Market, the High Line, train stations, and it's a cute area in general. Jen was accommodating and able to recommend great places to eat as soon as we got in to New York which was pretty late. In staying with Jen, we really made the most of our short trip which I cannot thank her enough for!

Jenn was a great host and was very accomodating. The apartment was perfect walking distance to where I needed to be while in NY, restaurants, markets, etc. The room was as discribed, simple with all basic needs met (clean bed, towel, etc.), and was a quiet environment.
Jen was very gracious, friendly and helpful.  She also gave us our space when we arrived. It was our first experience at airbnb and we'd do it again!

The room and the bathroom are exactly as shown in the pics: nice and clean. The room is actually pretty big compared to the New York standards. The apt is perfectly located, close to the metro and in a charming and safe area. Jen has been extremely nice and always available. I would definitely recommend this apartment and I will come back next time!!

So enjoyed staying in a prime spot in New York City! Everything was within walking distance, and the city was right outside the front step ready to explore! I walked pretty much everywhere (up to Central Park down to the Memorial) and loved it! Tons of little bakeries, coffee shops, and restaurants right around the corner. The room was comfortable and had what was needed for my short stay. Jenn was wonderful, so welcoming, and helped make my stay incredible!
Thank you Jen for hosted us and sharing tons of advices and good plans! Location is great, near everything :)

This is a terrific value. Very nice room and bathroom. Great location. Quiet. And Jen is a pleasure to work with to book, schedule arrival, get the keys and available for questions. Definitely will return.

Jen has been so great and welcoming! It was really nice staying at her apartment and she is a very flexible and easy person always trying to make your stay as comfortable as possible! I would definitely stay at her apartment again as its location is really nice and there is a Duane Read and Starbucks just right by :) 
Really recommendable!

It was really nice to stay at Jen's place. The apartment is exactly as it is shown in the pictures. I was late on the arrival day due to the terrible traffic, but Jen was so nice to wait for me at home. She provided useful information about the neighbourhood and was always ready to help. I definely would like to stay here again when I come to NYC for the next time. Strongly recommend!
Thank you Jen for making me feel so welcome! She even let me check in earlier. Her place is literally near everything. Would definitely stay with her again :)

My trip was very last minute with a lot of changing details. Jen was very accommodating and went out of her way on things she didn't have to. The apartment was very comfortable as was the whole experience. Thank you Jen!

Staying at Jens place was awesome. She is a wonderful host and made me feel comfortable. It was a last minute thing that I needed a place, and she was understanding and accommodated me quickly.  All in all a great experience.
Such a kind host.. She was very flexible with checking-out time and her apartment was extremely comfortable and spacious. Highly recommend to anyone!

My stay at Jen's place was fantastic.  The place was clean, quiet(!!!), and in a great location (short walk from 14th street station, Greenwich Village, Chelsea Market, and the High Line).  Jen was a great host, and gave super recommendations for restaurants and sightseeing.  I would highly recommend staying here, especially if you are a young person traveling alone.  I will definitely try to stay here again if I come back to NYC.  It's the perfect spot for a long weekend in the city!

Jen was a great host! She let us check in when we were ready to (earlier than I thought we'd be able to check in!), so that was great. We didn't really see her much but when we did she was so welcoming and helpful. She had a lot of great suggestions for things to do around the area. 
The apartment was in a great location. It was close to a lot of things that we wanted to see/do, and if we didn't know what we wanted to do, there were a lot of options to choose from. 
The room was very spacious and clean. I thought the apartment was very comfortable overall. 
I would love to stay here again. Jen made us feel right at home.

I really enjoyed staying at Jen's.  She's was great in accommodating me on short notice, and great at communicating a key drop off.  I thought her place was pretty spacious for an apartment in that area of the city.  And, like the description, it was clean and neat.  Super convenient location.  Had a great time.

The apartment and room in it were wonderful - perfect for my needs, perfectly described, very comfortable, and excellent value. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, thought I had been exceptionally lucky to have found this apartment and was thrilled with the whole experience.

We had a really good time staying in Jen's apartment. The location is perfect for exploring Manhattan, in walking distance to many things and really close to the subway if necessary.

Jen was a really good host. Communication was easy and quick and during our stay we got several good advices on restaurants ect.

I will definitely recommended Jen and her apartment to others.

C'était génial ! Très simple de communiquer avec Jen. L'appartement est vraiment bien situé ! Pleins de bons restos dans les alentours.  On avait de la place pour nos valises. Jen et sa colocataire sont très sympathiques et serviables, elles nous ont donné pleins de conseils ! J'y retournerai sans la moindre hésitation.

Jen's place is basic but all that an NYC frequenter like me needs: prime Chelsea location, private room with a comfy bed, clean bathroom (shared but with priority use) and an accommodating host(ess).  Perfect. I'll stay there again.

We loved our stay at Jen's! Jen was very welcoming, her apartment was in a perfect location for us, and she allowed us to leave our bags there early and the following day beyond check out time. We would definitely stay here again!

Jen was an amazing host. She made me feel welcome and even offered to take me out for brunch the following morning when I arrived. The room was more than I expected! It was war, and there was also a window I could crack open to regulate the temperature! The bed was exceedingly comfortable, with great pillows. Her place was spotless, and her kitchen had everything I needed to make a quick meal the night I arrived. The location was also great! Walking distance to bars, restaurants, and penn station. I couldn't recommend Jenn and her room more!

I highly recommend staying at Jens apartment!!

Jen was very friendly & welcoming. She gave me local tips & was great to have a chat & laugh with. My first time as a solo traveller & using Airbnb & she made me feel right at home.
I stayed for 6 nights, the room was basic but very clean & the apartment has everything you will need.
The location was perfect as you are out of the heart of Manhattan but still everything within walking distance & the subway so close. It was great exploring Chelsea as well with the market & highline just around the corner.

I would definitely stay here again & recommend it to all my family & friends.
Jen is a great host, she helps us a lot when we had questions. The room is beautiful and clean, I would like to recommend it.
Everything was perfect. Pictures matched exactly to what we received and Jen was more than friendly and a great host

Jen was a fantastic host - she was very friendly and welcoming! The apartment was very comfortable to stay in and we loved the neighbourhood - the Chelsea market is just a few minutes walk away as well as the High Line. We enjoyed our stay with Jen and I would recommend this place to anyone visiting New York! Thanks Jen!
Location is very convenient to discover Manhatten, room was clean and quiet. Helpful friendly host from the moment of booking.

name: BRAND-NEW 1 BD APT SAGRADA FAMILIA 41
summary: New apartment of 40 m2 with lift, located in a very peaceful, cozy and tree-lined pedestrian passage, only 300 metres from the emblematic Sagrada Familia Basilica. HUTB-010408
space: The apartment has a cosy living-dining room with a balcony and a comfortable double sofa-bed, a fully equipped open kitchen, a double bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with shower and a small laundry room with a washing machine. Features include: exposed wooden beams, preserved original stone walls, parket flooring and tasteful decoration creating a welcoming and homely environment. Very locally you will find shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, health food stores, banks as well as the public transport: bus and metro. The nearest metro station is: Encants (L2) and Sagrada Familia (L2 and L5), so well connected to the whole city. Situated in a major tourist area due to its proximity to many attractions, excellent nightlife, great bars and stylish restaurants. Also within a radius of 3 kms are Passeig de Gràcia, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, Park Güell, Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas, La Boqueria, El Borne, Barcelona Cathedral and Estació de França. Sagrada Familia Metro: Encants (L2) and Sagra
description: New apartment of 40 m2 with lift, located in a very peaceful, cozy and tree-lined pedestrian passage, only 300 metres from the emblematic Sagrada Familia Basilica. HUTB-010408 The apartment has a cosy living-dining room with a balcony and a comfortable double sofa-bed, a fully equipped open kitchen, a double bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with shower and a small laundry room with a washing machine. neighborhood_overview: The Sagrada Familia neighbourhood is part of the Eixample district. It's residential, very quiet and has parks to practise sports or read quietly, such as Gaudí Park, Jardins de la Industria and Jardins d'Antoni Puigvert. This neighbourhood takes its name from the most prestigious work by Gaudí because it's in the heart of the area. It's a fairly quiet residential area formed by geometric grids, though it's true you'll see some tourists around, especially near the Sagrada Familia.  The Avinguda de Gaudí is the perfect place to grab a bite to eat, it connects  Sagrada Familia with Hospital de Sant Pau, another modernist masterpiece
notes: Prices are VAT included. Check-in after 8pm: +20€ and after 11pm: +40€ Barcelona City Tax: 2,48 € per person ( >16 years old) per night (for a maximum of 7 nights) NOT INCLUDED in total price
transit: Metro station: Encants and Sagrada Familia
house_rules: - Parties, loud music and disturbances are strictly forbidden - Please respect your neighbours - Silent hours from 10pm to 9am - Please respect the noise level in the building common areas - A 100€ fee will be charged when loosing the keys of the apartment. - Non-smoking apartment. - All guests must treat the property and furnishings of the apartment with total respect. - Check-in after 8pm: +20€ and after 11pm: +40€ - Barcelona City Tax: 2.48 € per person ( >16 years old) per night (for a maximum of 7 nights)

host.host_about:
Are you looking for accommodation in Barcelona?
rentBCN offers you a wide range of apartment rentals in Barcelona, all fully-equipped and centrally located at extremely attractive rates. Choose your apartment and book now online.
Through our services, rentBCN opens the doors of Barcelona and wishes you welcome!

reviews.comments:
Simplemente decir que la estancia fue perfecta! El apartamento lo estrenábamos nosotros y no pudo ser mejor. El sofá-cama del salón es una maravilla: caben dos personas sin ningún tipo de problema y es extremadamente cómodo. El apartamento es pequeño pero funcional con todo lo necesario para pequeñas estancias, ya sea por trabajo u ocio. 

El barrio es estupendo: a 10 minutos caminando de la Sagrada Familia y con los servicios necesarios: restaurantes, supermercados, farmacias, metro,... 

¿Y qué decir de Silvia? La perfecta anfitriona, siempre disponible para cualquier duda o consulta. 

Sin duda alguna, repetiré estancia cuando vuelva a Barcelona. Lo recomiendo!
Really cool apartment, peaceful and reasonably well located

L'hôte nous a très bien accueilli et nous a expliqué tout les endroits à visiter dans Barcelone ( bon point) . L'appartement est très propre et bien équipé.  Il est situé à 5 min de la sagrada familia et à 10 min du centre en métro.  Très bon séjour avec ma copine . Merci silvia

El apartamento es excelente. Está todo reformado, muy limpio y tiene mucha luz. Muy bien equipado. La cocina tiene de todo y la cama es especialmente cómoda. La decoración proporciona un ambiente muy agradable. Está bien conectado con el transporte público y se llega fácilmente al centro de la ciudad. Está ubicado en un pasaje muy tranquilo que permite descansar por las noches sin nada de ruido. Lo recomiendo. Personalmente, voy a repetir.

The overall experience was good. The key handing was smooth and without any incidents. The flat was tiny but very cosy. It was well taken care of and pristine clean. 

Although small, it had everything we needed and it was very centric which means we were well connected and we had supermarkets, restaurants and shops close by. 

The only thing I'd point out is that the walls were very thin, so if you get the wrong neighbours (I think most of the flats in the same building are in Airbnb) it can get pretty noisy.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I really enjoyed the apartment, I will come back¡
The place was all we needed for our visit to Barcelona. Clean, cosy and outside of the main hustle, but close enough for us to walk around

This apartment was perfect for a few days in Barcelona! Check-in was very easy and the host walked through an entire map of Barcelona and gave us some tips and recommendations.  The apartment is located an a tiny, quiet street and is exactly like the pictures- small balcony which lets in a ton of natural light and a good breeze, clean, decent size rooms and modern kitchen. The location is super close to La Sagrada Familia (about a 5 minute walk) and is about a 35 minute walk to other areas like the Gothic Quarter/ La Rambla with many more restaurants, bars, shopping.  Otherwise, it's easy to get a taxi or take the metro to those areas.  Definitely a great apartment if you want to see Barcelona without being in the center of touristy areas.

Nous avons passé un excellent week-end dans cet appartement très agréable, rénové avec goût et très fonctionnel. Le quartier et l'immeuble sont calmes et un peu à l'écart de la frénésie barcelonaise mais à 3 min du métro et à 5 min à pied de la Sagrada familia. Nos hôtes se sont montrés réactifs suite à la découverte de l'absence du pommeau de douche et le lendemain le problème était résolu. Merci à eux.

Great 1 bed apartment very close to the Sagrada Familia. Very clean and airy with a small balcony looking out onto a quiet street.

Apartment was a short walk to public transport and also close to a number of shops and cafes. Easy to get to other sites via metro or bus.

Communication was good and even let us leave our bags early as we arrived in the morning to Barcelona.
Great apartment located on a quiet side street, but still conveniently located (5 min walk to Sagrada Familia). Apartment was as advertised and the perfect size for two for a few days in Barcelona.
It was fantastic, super clean and close to the metro station. Shops nearby Would definitely stay again!
Great host and accurate description of the property.

Silvia's apartment is in a small, quiet street.  The area has plenty of shops restaurants and easy access to public transportation.  5 minutes away from the Sagrada Familia basilica, yet it doesn't feel too touristy.  We enjoyed it.

This apartment was fine for our needs - we spent part of our trip working from the home and part of it exploring BCN. There was a table for us to set up our laptops, the bed was comfortable, the windows/doors open up onto a small terrace and allow light and fresh air into the apartment, and the washing machine was an added bonus so we could wash a few items before heading on to our next location. The stairway and lift, the bathroom and the kitchen are small but that is to be expected when staying in the city and were just fine for the two of us. Silvia was very responsive and has a few colleagues who are available to help out in a pinch if she is not available at the moment.

an apartment located on the sixth floor (if we count the mezzanine) without elevator, while the announcement on airbnb indicated 4th floor with elevator.
the wifi is unstable.
For equipment and products, it's the minimum. There is no towel whatsoever in the kitchen. there are just a few utensils.

if you need to cook, you go down to buy even the salt.

in fact, it is a company that owns all the apartments in the building.

it's just a disguised hotel
Bel appartement, bien situé,  commerce et transport à proximité, dans une rue semi piétonne, donc calme.

This apartment is clean, modern and well located near the Sagrada Familia, grocery stores and a metro station. There have all the basics for cooking and solid WiFi. The elevator is much appreciated after walking to the top of Park Guell. The host was responsive and helpful.

The only con I would list is that the walls are a little thin so you can hear your neighbors a little more than you would want and probably vice verse. Still highly recommended.

name: Rio de Janeiro, Paraíso Méier - II
summary: Die Unterkunft Trotz ihrer westlichen Lage in Rio, ist die Wohnung äußerst ruhig, hell und von Natur umgeben. Sie besteht aus Zimmern mit Wi-Fi, Kochgelegenheit und Dachterrasse mit Pool.
space: Ein Zimmer zwei Betten, Klimaanlage und Wi-fi in einer belüfteten Wohnung mit 4 Schlafzimmern,  offener Küche und Pool in Méier 3  Schlafzimmern zu vermieten! Täglich, wöchentlich oder vorübergehend. Verfügbar in dem Zimmer:  - Wireless Internet-Anschluss (10 MB).  Ausstattungen:  - Das Zentrum von ist gut Rio de Janeiro  erreichbar. - In der Nähe vom Engenhão Stadium - Restaurants und Kneipe in 5 min erreichbar.  - Ruhigen Wohnstraße. - Einfacher Zugang in der nähe von Bushaltestelle und Taxi. Keine andere Stadt in der Welt kann mit Charme bieten den Titel von "Wunderbar" wie Rio de Janeiro. Zwischen Natur und gastfreundliche Stadt, besuchen Sie den Christus der Erlöser, der Zuckerhut, der legendärische Maracanã-Stadion und den freudige und festliche Lebensstil von den Carioca (Leuten von Rio). Mehr als eine Postkarte, Rio ist ein Geisteszustand, immer gut gelaunt und positiv, wo die Strände und die Berge in Harmonie neben der größte städtische Wald in der Welt sind. Wer kennt diese S

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Great Host! Very kind. All clean and as advertised in pictures. I look forward to visit him again. Totally recommended

name: Big, Convenient, Working Fireplace!
summary: Large, beautiful apartment with a working fireplace, two bedrooms and a large, fully-equipped kitchen. Eleven subways within a three-block radius of the apartment. You can get to Manhattan in 10 minutes! Great bars and restaurants nearby as well.
description: Large, beautiful apartment with a working fireplace, two bedrooms and a large, fully-equipped kitchen. Eleven subways within a three-block radius of the apartment. You can get to Manhattan in 10 minutes! Great bars and restaurants nearby as well.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I work in communications for Brooks Brothers and live in Fort Greene, Brooklyn. I am originally from Minnesota and love to cook and do creative projects.

name: "Sunrise Unit"-Paia, Maui
summary: Both units are large Studio suites located on the lower level of the house  with no actual bedroom.  Approximately 400 SF each with private bath and kitchenette. Fully equipped with bedding, towels, utensils, soap, etc.  Maui County BB Permit:  BBPH #(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
description: Both units are large Studio suites located on the lower level of the house  with no actual bedroom.  Approximately 400 SF each with private bath and kitchenette. Fully equipped with bedding, towels, utensils, soap, etc.  Maui County BB Permit:  BBPH #(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Renting a car is a must in order to see our Island in entirety, but walking town Pa’ia Town is recommended due to limited parking. Coin operated washer & dryer located in the closet at the garage. There are also cleaning supplies for your convenience.
notes: Coin operated washer & dryer located in the closet at the garage. There are also cleaning supplies for your convenience.
transit: Renting a car is a must in order to see our Island in entirety, but walking town Pa’ia Town is recommended due to limited parking.

host.host_about: Aloha, my name is Avis Takakura.  Born & raised in Paia Maui!!

reviews.comments: Nihi B&B was a very comfortable and affordable way to spend some time in Paia. It is conveniently located in an area with few hotel options, within walking distance to shops and restaurants. Our host was very accommodating being flexible with check in and check out. Nice when you are coming from far away with early and late flights. She provides ample extras linens and towels, which are much appreciated in the tropical climate and with frequent visits to the beach.
Great location!  New and Clean!!

Best Air BnB I've stayed in to date.
Huge space, everything you need. So close to Paia shops and beaches. 
Loved it
Great place! Easy walk down Baldwin to town, great location.

The host totally saved me by booking me last second after a bad Airbnb experience in Paia. I stayed in the sunrise unit and it was incredible! It was clean and well equiped. Air conditioner worked great! Excellent location too.

Stayed here for one night with my partner and infant daughter. We found it very clean and comfortable and the location was just perfect for visiting the Paia town as it is just a stone throw away from all the shops and restaurants. Host was quick to respond to our request considering we booked semi last minute. Met her briefly during our stay and she was just as nice in person :) 

Can definitely recommend!
Good location for road to hana
Great location, charming town of Paia. New, modern and very clean. Easy comunication with the host. I will recommend to eveyone !

This lovely original Hawaiian home is very centrally located in the heart of Paia just a few blocks from the center of town. Anyone can easily walk anywhere from here - for shopping, the post office, groceries, diner, or for ice cream. Just a block away from their front door is an amazing coffee shop called "Sip Me" open from 7:00 am until 2:00 pm so perfect for breakfast or to hang out. 
I felt like a local and would definitely stay again since the location & space felt safe, was super clean, had extra beach towels, suggestions for day trips, parking, and delivered more than I thought it would from the listing. Thank you!

Cozy, clean and convenient - this little unit is the perfect place to stay in Paia. Close proximity to everything within walking distance to all of the adorable boutiques and great restaurants. Laundry is available on site and there is a little bodega right across the street to buy eggs and coffee to prep in the apartment. The bed is comfortable and the bathroom is updated - a true Hawaiian experience in the heart of town, you won't be disappointed!
Great place walking distance to a Paia!

Our stay in the sunrise unit was excellent! It’s a short walk into Paia which is an adorable town. We enjoyed the beautiful sunsets at the local beaches every night and frequently saw sea turtles. The unit has air conditioning which was not available at many of the other places we looked into renting.  The unit was clean, beautiful, and quiet. There is a table and chairs outside which was a nice place to enjoy breakfast. The parking spot is right outside your door which made for quick and easy loading and unloading for our day trips. It was exactly what we were looking for and did not disappoint.
Nice place, great location.  Good space.  Everything was perfect.

The inaccuracy of how this place is sold is a shocker. This room ( not a full house or a  full unit as your idea of them is) ; is like a cellar, no ventilation, no windows to the outside ( the only window is to the garage). There is no Sunrise Unit of any kind. It is very  noisy as you will hear every movement from above where the host lives. Toilet noises from above, fridge noises, street noises ... it is like a nice cave with a comfortable bed. Trust me, you won’t be happy staying here . You want to experience Maui differently , with light , air and health . This place lacks of all of that. It is super humid, hot and despite being clean it doesn’t feel clean. I have reported this place as 1 it is completely inaccurate and 2 it is not a unit of any kind. You need windows to somewhere but the garage. The front door you see it’s on the side of the garage, there is no Sunrise of any kind, there is no privacy unless you close the curtains as people can see you if the walk the back alley where the entrance is . Look, the host is a nice lady who is trying hard to make this space work, unfortunately this should not be allow on Airbnb as it lacks the fundamentals of any house or unit. Do not a tay here , you will not like it . I’m sorry ...

This was truly a wonderful place to stay In Paia.  This is walking distance to everything in town as well as a great jumping off point for day trips around the island.  The space was larger than I anticipated with a seating area and a dining table.  I even had family over for dinner.  I look forward to returning for another holiday in the near future.  Thank you.

Perfect little studio for solo traveler or couples visiting Paia. Walking distance to some nice shops and restaurants, plus a liquor store and supermarket. Closeby to famous Mama's Fish House (seriously, the best meal we ever had) and waterfalls down Hana Road. Kitchenette was well-equipped with dishes, utensils, pots, pans, etc. Super easy self-checkin and checkout.

I couldn't have asked for better accommodations for our 9 day stay. It was fully stocked with everything you would need. It even had a cheese grater! Which we obviously used. It is in a central area, making it easy to get to any part of the island.  It is only a 5 minute walk into town, but you don't get any of the town noise. The Pit Stop next door is an added gem, especially if you're snackers like us! Overall, such a great place to stay, I would highly recommend it.
Incredible location!
The host canceled this reservation 61 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Hale’s place is very clean with essential amenities and beach equipment, which were super helpful for our days out! I didn’t expect to be so close to Paia (I wasn’t paying attention to the map necessarily) and that part of this Airbnb was awesome! If you want to be close to Paia and have a clean, private space with off-street parking and a nice, responsive host then this is a great place to stay!

Location location location. Great little hippie-casual town which has matured into its touristic boom well despite the traffic. 

Kitchenette better than expected, in addition to the local eating spots, the local food & fish from the market 2-blocks away was amazing. 

Barbecue. Comfortable patio, step out to a pleasant view of a local Hawaiian neighborhood. Easy walk to beaches as well as town. 

This is a real place to stay, to get a sense of local culture. Use it as a base, it feels like home here afterwards. Nothing is really that far away, and you could start on the road to Hana early to get ahead of the crowd. Get to everything on Maui early if you can, it’s more fun. 

Nearby, Mama’s Fish House is a culinary revelation. 

Bed is quite firm. Coffee in Paia doesn’t open until 7am (we were often at Paia Coffee at opening), so if you’re coming from another time zone, you might want to get to the market for Java upon checkin...3 blocks away.

I greatly enjoyed staying in the sunrise unit during my time in Paia. The unit was clean and spacious, as well as just a few minutes walk from the main part of Paia. There’s a nice store across the street that had some good craft beer options and a very helpful staff. During my stay, Avis was very friendly and quick to respond to any questions I had. 

The kitchen met my needs perfectly, making it easy to make coffee and prepare lunches before I left for the day. I also used the toaster oven to cook slices of a fresh pizza I picked up! The internet worked great and the TV had some movies available for streaming which was nice.

Overall I was completely satisfied with my stay and would look to book again if I visit Paia again.
Nice place to stay in a good location - easy to walk into town and grab food & drinks
fantastic location, incredible value! parking accommodations are great...check in was super easy. highly recommend it

This was a great place to stay!  The location was perfect.  It was a 5 minute walk to the town center, which had great shops and restaurants.  Plus, Paia gets pretty busy with tourist traffic, so it was nice to have a place to park our car and walk.  The condo itself was great!  It is bigger than it looks in the pictures.  Perfect for two people and very clean.  Would highly recommend this place as a home base for exploring Maui.  We used the Lonely Planet book in the condo and found great hikes and other recommendations for fun stops.

The location can't be beat, and this studio is clean and stylish. The shower is amazing. The lack of windows to the outside--except a garage--is just something you should be prepared for. Avis is a sweetheart. Recommend.

Very clean spacious place and Avis was very accommodating with us checking in early.  The place is walking distance from the small town of Paia which has great shops and restaurants.  The Sunrise unit is in the bottom floor of a 2 story home and walls were kinda thin from upstairs unit.  Would definitely stay again!

name: Private Rooms in Very Peaceful Environment
summary: Brand new fully furnished apartment with bright & spacious rooms including air conditioning,TV, kitchen,living area and terrace access.  A perfect match for big groups of 30 plus guests well situated between Plaza de España, Maremagnum and Beach Area.
space: I want to be more than a host, I want to be your local buddy :) Brand new fully furnished apartment, including air conditioning, TV,modern kitchen, living area, patio, balcony and terrace access a perfect match for big groups. Well situated between Plaza de España and Beach Area, nearby Clubbing, bar restaurant and also close to the all major tourist attractions.
description: Brand new fully furnished apartment with bright & spacious rooms including air conditioning,TV, kitchen,living area and terrace access.  A perfect match for big groups of 30 plus guests well situated between Plaza de España, Maremagnum and Beach Area. I want to be more than a host, I want to be your local buddy :) Brand new fully furnished apartment, including air conditioning, TV,modern kitchen, living area, patio, balcony and terrace access a perfect match for big groups. Well situated between Plaza de España and Beach Area, nearby Clubbing, bar restaurant and also close to the all major tourist attractions. - Poble Sec [L3] subway station (1 min walk).  - Sants train station (20 min walk ).  - Plaza de Espanya (5 min walk ). - Beach (25 min walk ). - Buses just around the corner to take you to all the famous attractions. - Taxi rank (2 mins walk ).  - 24 hours car parking near the apartment on chargeable bases. 24 hours reception 24 hours laundry 24 hours cleaning 24 hours kitchen -

The Barcelona City Tax 0.72€ will be paid directly to the hotel upon arrival. Rates are per person and night. You will only have to pay for the first 7 nights, as from the eighth night, no fees will be charged. Neither children nor teenagers up to age of 16 will have to pay the tax.
transit: On the foot walk(1 min) you can get , tram, car parking ,bus, car and  train, you'll be close to all transport options including airport, our guests can easily get local transport to explore other parts of the Barcelona city
