interaction: - Friendly and professional customer service. - 24 hours reception service at the main door for the guests convenience.

host.host_about:
Stay in Barcelona like a local

I want to be more than a host, I want to be your local buddy :)

We are a huge accommodation in a quiet & central location of Barcelona. It is a main door, ground floor and first floor holiday rental close to many Barcelona main attractions. We can easily accommodate Small and Big groups of people, starting from minimum 1 person  to maximum group of 50 people . We rent it as a Full Apartment, Private Floor, Private Rooms,private compartement, Single Beds in Shared Room depending upon the guest requirements (terms and condition apply) . For more information feel free to contact us anytime (our lines are open 24/7 and 365 days a year)

The accomodation offers 367, 90 square meters of space with 2 grand living area, fully equipped modern kitchen, huge terrace, internet café, walk in shower rooms and balconies . It has 9 King size bright & spacious private rooms and 2 huge dining space . All the rooms have access to Balcony,Terrace,Patio, Living room, Kitchenette , Separate Bathrooms and Smoking area  

Accomodation is furnished with an assortment of mid-century & contemporary home comforts. The House is very close to Plaza de Espanya ,Barcelona Beach, Sant Jordi , Sant Montjuic and Main City centre Plaza Catalunya . The living room has a folding dining table that sits twenty to twenty five people in case you want to entertain or dine. There is a  big screen TV and CD player and a handful of DVDs and CDs for you to use. It has very good natural lighting and high ceilings, the living room feels very spacious and airy.  We also have special room on the ground floor for disable or for guests with mobility issues

We offer 24 hours reception service for our guests to ease the check in and check out process. The accommodation makes a great base to discover the area's much loved, such as independent bars, restaurants and shops . On few minutes away, you can find many night life and clubbing areas , cinemas, theaters, gyms, galleries, museums. Also you'll be few steps away from the all mode of public transports such as metro, bus, airport connections etc to explore other parts of the Barcelona City

Local area: 

- Main city centre Rambla Catalunya street (10 minute walk) 
- Quirky bars, restaurants, shops (2 - 5 minute walk) 
- Large Codis supermarket (1 mins walk)
- Famous Plaza Espanya (less then 5 minute walk)

Transport: 

- Barcelona underground metro station, Poble Sec few steps away 
- Barcelona Sant train station & Barcelona Nord Bus station (30 min walk ) 
- City Buses just around the corner to take you to all the famous attractions
- Taxi rank (5 mins walk from flat)

Our Guests also have access to :

- 24 hours Reception
- 24 hours Laundry
- 24 hours Cleaning
- 24 hours Kitchen & living area
- 24 hours Mini supermarket
- 24 hours Language storage facilities and Safe Deposit 
- 24 hours Taxi and public transport connections  

Looking forward to welcome you  !

reviews.comments:
Très agréable voyage, tres bon accueil et chambres et parties communes propres 
Par contre c'est une auberge de jeunesse, ce que je n'avais pas compris sur l'annonce, faites attention à ça. 
Mais je recommande cet endroit :)

Hostel was in a very convenient location, I was able to walk nearly everywhere. A lot of restaurants near by and I felt like a local. Very clean accommodation and comfortable. Hosts were very helpful answering questions.

The location is great and the place is very clean. We were a big group and were expecting to get one of the rooms that we saw in the pictures. Our room was in the ground floor close to the kitchen and had nothing to do with what you see on the pictures...quite dark, dated and not nice designed at all.
The description of amenities was misleading - it seems that towels and breakfast are provided but this is not the case. 
The receptionist asked for money in order to get towels when we arrived but they gave them to us at no cost when we complained. Breakfast is not provided as it says under amenities. There is an spacious kitchen where you can prepare your own food. The shower rooms are very spacious and equipped with shampoo & gel.
The communication with the host prior to arrival was excellent, he replies within 24h. 
The overall feeling that we got was a bit disappointing because of the condition of the room and the wrong info on the website.
The description of the place was accurate, it was clean and centrally located. Could not expect anything higher than the price paid.

I enjoyed my stay, Sunny was always their and willing to help and made sure your stay was as comfortable as possible, it truly is cloes to a lot that Barcelona has to offer and it's supper easy to get to the place from the airport. First time staying a this kind of place I would stay again.

Abbiamo soggiornato presso questa residenza per festeggiare un addio al celibato in 19 persone. Camere pulite, senza lenzuola. Bagni puliti, ma molto essenziali.Siamo stati divisi in due camere dormitorio, che avevano l'accesso a dei bagni con doccia per il piano. Non ci siamo trovati male, gestori disponibili. Ubicazione comoda abbastanza vicino alla rambla (20 minuti a  piedi, 5 minuti a in metro). La stazione metro è vicina e molto comoda.
grazie
ciao
davide

I spent 16 days in this hostel. Bedrooms and toilettes were clean, showers always warm. The host is a kind person and helped me giving me more nights. The kitchen was sometimes messy, but that is a problem of the guests, not of the host. Poble Sec is nice quartier and the hostel is close to Placa de Espana, 10 minutes from the sea. I would definitely come back!
The place is fine, not too good, not too bad, pretty cheap
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Buen sitio para dormir muy higiénico todo
Very friendly and perfect place for overnight during bachelor

Thank you very much for the nice welcoming and explanations, great and fast responses, easy check-in and check-out. 
If you are looking for a place to sleep, for that price, I'm more than satisfied
It was a good place. Clean, well located. If you want something cheap this is the one you are looking for.

It was a great hostel. The receptionists were very kind and the check in was very fast. The commun places were very clean and organized. The bed were very comfortable and we could lock our stuff in big drawer under the bed.
Luogo piacevole e tranquillo
Prix raisonnable.

Hostel has a good location, almost in the centrum of Barcelona, clos to metro, a few markets and lots of caffees. I came so much ealier, but it wasn’t a problem, becouse I could wait inside, also I could leave my luggage there. Girls and boys were separate, also toilets and bathrooms. Hosts are nice. Recommend!

The advert mis-sells this propert. This is a hostel and not a apartment. The rooms do not have air conditioning. After agreeing over a series of 5 messages that we could check in to our room and arriving at 2am after a long day, we were then told we cannot check in even though I had it in writing. 8 women crammed into one room he happened to have spare. The rest of us were shown a shared dorm which we had to sleep in as there was no where else. The reps photo is nothing like the person in charge. The showers were disgusting. The kitchen was untidy and dirty. The rooms were cheap but for the awful experience we had it really is not worth it. Be wary!
Auberge de jeunesse située au centre ville avec métro facilement accessible.
No me cuadró el alojamiento. Fotos de publicidad diferentes a las reales. Confort de las camas regular y lugares comunes poco higiénico

Good place to explore the city but if you want party's here they don't but all the accommodations was very clean and you have a locked place to keep in safe your stuff
 pretty well hostel
muy buenas habitaciones, las camas tienen luz, enchufe propio y un cortina que da privacidad. todo muy limpio. recomendable

name: Big and warm Montreal appartement
summary: On the Plateau! Around the corner from bars, restaurants, boutiques, and Parc Lafontaine! The apartment is old, with a brick wall in the living room, spacious warm and homie ! You'll be sharing with a glass blowing student a treeplanter. Laid back (:
space: It has one large bedroom with a double bed, one medium with the same, and a futon in the living room that hold two. Its quite nice, with warm lighting and low furniture.
description: On the Plateau! Around the corner from bars, restaurants, boutiques, and Parc Lafontaine! The apartment is old, with a brick wall in the living room, spacious warm and homie ! You'll be sharing with a glass blowing student a treeplanter. Laid back (: It has one large bedroom with a double bed, one medium with the same, and a futon in the living room that hold two. Its quite nice, with warm lighting and low furniture. We are on the plateau! Near absolutely anything you could want. It had a great vibe, and theres always stuff going on! The subway station Mont-Royal is about a fifteen minute walk down Rue Mont-Royal west from where we are. There are also bus stops all along our street.
neighborhood_overview: We are on the plateau! Near absolutely anything you could want. It had a great vibe, and theres always stuff going on!
transit: The subway station Mont-Royal is about a fifteen minute walk down Rue Mont-Royal west from where we are. There are also bus stops all along our street.
house_rules: There is no smoking in the apartment, pets are allowed.

reviews.comments: The host made me feel very welcome, and the apartment was very nice. The neighborhood was also very nice, and was located exactly where I needed to be within the city (I was there visiting a friend who lived closed by).
Sarah was very nice and accommodating. She was available right away for any questions or concerns.

name: Excl. Bosphorus view PrivateTerrace
summary: A great value. Cheerful and spacey Double room with En-Suite Bathroom and private Terrace.Peaceful and centrally location. Usually I welcome the guests. As I travel a lot if I am not available one of my team will handle the keys and welcome you at the property. My team will be reachable 24/7 by phone and certainly I still keep in touch with my guests via Airbnb messaging.  Open Buffet Breakfast available for 4 Euro per Person (2,5 Euro per Child).

host.host_about:
I am an urban planner with architecture and computer science qualifications.
I love to travel and work and am interested in international business. My favorite travel destinations abroad are Greece, South and North America at the moment.   
I am married and a very happy father of two children. I try to travel with my family as long as my son is on holiday and not goes to the school. We all are interested especially in good food, new places and nature. 
This property you are viewing now is located very central in the historical Peninsula so called Sultanahmet and was my home for about 6 years. After I moved to another district I remodeled the house and have now 17 rooms with en-suite bathrooms to rent. Public areas like terrace, breakfast room and a lounge are also available for all my guests. Our location is just perfect in case of being so close to the major sights and security. The standard of the rooms are high and my colleagues working in this property will do their best 24/7  to make you feel homey and get information about the city.  I am sure you will love this property as your home in Istanbul.
My Motto is share everything you can and be thankful for all you have.

reviews.comments: Location is fantastic, only few minutes by step and you can see Sultanahmet Mosque and Hagia Sophia. Ramiz and his stuff was very helpful. They answered to all our questions. They change towels every day. Very tasty breakfast include different kind of cheese, dried fruits, salads and cookie. The room is really good, with amazing sea view. I liked big windows in the room. My morning started from looking to the sunrise over the Marmara Sea. Really best room in Sultanahmet.

Это комната в небольшом отеле. Виды на Босфор и Мраморное море великолепны. Район очень тихий и находится очень близко от основных достопримечательностей. Персонал отеля отзывчивый и внимательный. В какой-то момент сломался кондиционер, который работает и в качестве отопления, был поздний вечер. Позвонила на ресепшн, сразу пришел администратор и все починил довольно быстро. Кровать удобная. Останавливались на 3 дня. Всё было великолепно. С удовольствием, остановилась бы снова в этой комнате у Рамиза..

It was generally a good place, Ramiz was very kind and helpful, the main problem that me and my wife were alone in the place at night and the fire alarm that keeps ringing, during our trip we had to move to another place that was better, this place was offered by Ramiz

Had an amazing time in Istanbul while staying at Ramiz's place. There was initially some availability mix up but Ramiz was immediately offer to fix the situation by letting us stay at one of his other (more expensive) properties. It had a close up view of both the Blue Mosque and the Aya Sofya and was located in an amazing part of Sultanamet. Thank you Ramiz for turning around and for the incredible hospitality.

This room was perfect for my stay in Istanbul. The view was amazing, and I loved waking up to see the sunrise. The rooftop patio was also excellent, and I loved how close it was to the room. I will definitely stay here on my next trip to Istanbul!

This is a hotel room not an apartment! 

We booked it because of thinking to live in ppl house n apartment n the living room in pics look so big. However it's a hotel room n no common area(living room) as shown.
Excellent séjour! Merci beaucoup Ramiz. Lorsque je reviendrais sur Istanbul je réserverai encore sûrement chez vous! Merci pour la marque d’attention et votre personnel très professionnel. À bientôt

name: Perfect for Female Travelers
summary: One bedroom available in a two bedroom clean, and safe apartment. Just 15 min away from Waikiki; 10 minute drive to Ala Moana mall or beach, 15 minutes drive to downtown. Easy access to public transportation and limited Street Parking available.
space: This is a 2 bedroom apartment and you will have your own private (bed)room with a twin size bed. Very safe neighborhood, day and night. Prime location, located near Waikiki and Ala Moana beach.  There is no AC in the apartment, but a fan is provided. The apartment has good cross ventilation.  Linens and towels are provided. Free WiFi, Smart TV so you have access to Amazon Instant Video, Netflix and Hulu, etc. HDMI cable ready.  Washer and Dryer located in the apartment. A few bus stops are within a block (1-2 minutes walk).
description: One bedroom available in a two bedroom clean, and safe apartment. Just 15 min away from Waikiki; 10 minute drive to Ala Moana mall or beach, 15 minutes drive to downtown. Easy access to public transportation and limited Street Parking available. This is a 2 bedroom apartment and you will have your own private (bed)room with a twin size bed. Very safe neighborhood, day and night. Prime location, located near Waikiki and Ala Moana beach.  There is no AC in the apartment, but a fan is provided. The apartment has good cross ventilation.  Linens and towels are provided. Free WiFi, Smart TV so you have access to Amazon Instant Video, Netflix and Hulu, etc. HDMI cable ready.  Washer and Dryer located in the apartment. A few bus stops are within a block (1-2 minutes walk). You have access to all kitchen utensils, washer & dryer, and living room. Towels and sheets are provided. If there is something that you are unsure if you use please ask me.  I am readily available and happy to help! I work
neighborhood_overview: Super safe neighborhood! Centrally located. The University is 10 min away so the demographics is fairly young adults and families, nearest beach is Waikiki and Ala Moana Beach Park. There is a big shopping center on Ward Avenue, just a few blocks away and also the Ala Moana Mall is nearby.
transit: Bus is very reliable and covers the whole island of Oahu. Bus stops are less than 1 minute away, within a block. (Website hidden by Airbnb) limited street parking available. Other forms of transportation include; Taxi, Ecocab, and Uber,
access: You have access to all kitchen utensils, washer & dryer, and living room. Towels and sheets are provided. If there is something that you are unsure if you use please ask me.  I am readily available and happy to help!
interaction: I work full time during the week, and my days off vary each month, but I am available to hang out for dinner or to go site seeing on my days off. I love hiking, and exploring new places around the island.
house_rules: Check in before 8am or anytime after 6pm.  Please leave the sand at the beach; rinse off sand prior to coming in.  NO smoking of any kind, NO drugs, NO loud music/noises. No furry buddies, unfortunately. Guests of guests are not allowed

host.host_about: I enjoy traveling and learning about other countries. In the past three years I have hosted international students from 10 different countries and it has given me the opportunity to meet some of the sweetest and brightest young ladies. I am passionate about architecture and interior design. I enjoy event planning, and I often volunteer to help charities with their special events. I love cooking healthy meals, and have recently developed a huge interest for integrative nutrition. On my free time I like to go to the beach, explore new hikes, and go shopping. My favorite shows include; Shark Tank, Zoo, Empire, Modern Family, and ANTM.

reviews.comments: It was really a pleasure to rent this room. Cosy and well-kept apartment. Asairet was very friendly and welcoming in showing me the room and answering all my questions about the island and things to do. She also showed me few secret places on the island that are hidden for tourists. The neighborhood with beautiful mountain view is very nice and safe. Very easy to get any point by bus. I would recommend to stay here for trips.

I love the location! It was easy finding a close by grocery store, coffee shop, hikes, bus stop, and Waikiki was also close. Asairet informed me a lot about Hawaii's culture, she took me to the city and explained to me the history of Hawaii. She was very helpful and friendly, I had a great time staying with her!

Asairet was an amazing host. The place looks even better than on the pictures. It is stylish, clean and cozy. 
The room is big enough and has a built in wardrobe that you can hang your clothes in.  
Asairet not only welcomed me with a nice surprise but was a great host aswell. She knows a lot about a local life and she showed me a lot of nice places in Honolulu that are hidden from tourists. We became good friends. 
Thank you Asairet for an amazing stay, I will recommend you and your nice room to everyone who is willing to come to Hawaii

I stayed with Asairet for a month.   She made me feel very welcome.  I loved the special extras she had in the room for me:)  The room was large with plenty of places to organize my things.  The kitchen had everything I needed to cook.  The washer and dryer were very convenient.  The bus stopped right outside.  The area was nice and I always felt safe in the apartment and in the area.  I enjoyed staying here.

I had so much fun with her :)
she was so considerate and friendly.
if you take the bus, you can look around everywhere! 
she took me the kailua beach and I think it is the most beautiful beach in hawaii !
and I could cook and watch tv, staying her place. like this, she made feel so comfortable. 

I really recommend you to staying joanna's place!!

It was a nice trip.
Her room is clean and stylish.

It is a little bit far to go to Waikiki,but we can go back by taxi for about 10$ from Waikiki. 

Host Joanna is very cute and kind person.

You will have a nice trip, if you stay in this room.

Thank you, Janna.

Joanna is a great host! I had a long stay at her place and I'm totally happy about it. Plus, her apartment (which is by the way really well decorated), contains all the equipments you'll ever need. I would strongly recommend this place to girls traveling on their own who need a clean and safe place to stay in. Moreover, Joanna showed me spots on the island that I had never seen before, which is awesome!

It was a great experience staying with joanna,she was so helpful with different locations and buses, she was a big help.
Her room was clean and spacious,thank you joanna for everything.

Joanna is a very kind and friendly host and she is also respectful of privacy/space her guests may need. Her home is very clean and beautifully decorated, with a nice powerful shower, and a comfortable and well equipped bedroom for guests. It's easy to get buses to lots of places or drive if you hire a car but I always walked eg to Waikiki beach & the fantastic Honolulu art gallery. Joanna can provide lots of tips for places to visit and to eat and to shop.  I visited Hawaii tired at the end of 5 months of travels and this was made better to have had such a lovely person as Joanna to host me and to hang out with in my last destination before home. Thank you for your kindness and company and for sharing your lovely home.
Joanna is such a sweet host. She was very informative about the city and bus system.  Her place is on a major street so it's super convenient to several bus lines and is walking distance to downtown.

Joanna is super sweet, considerate and helpful, she gave me very good suggestions! The place is super convenient to downtown, supermarket, the beach and shopping malls, and there is a 24hours 7-11 right outside the place!

Joanna was a great host. Easy to communicate with, flexible with my late arrival and always had good suggestions on what to do or where to go. 
The room is quite big and the interior is super sweet. I felt very comfortable. 
The busses stop right in front of the houses. (I just had some experiences of late busses so I always walked.) It's a 30 minutes walk to Waikiki from where you can head off to everywhere. 
In the morning the road is quite noisy, so if you are having light sleep you should probably bring ear plugs. (Or just get up early to explore the island) 

I highly recommend this place for other single travelers.
Thanks again Joanna, it was a pleasure meeting you!

Joanna was a great hostess!  Her home is very peaceful, spacious and comfortable.  The location is close to Waikiki Beach and I was able to park easily on the street everyday.  On her day off, Joanna took me around the island to places I might not of otherwise visited, which I appreciated greatly.  She also gave me great recommendations for places to visit.  I would definitely go back and stay with her again!

My stay at Joanna's was great. Joanna is a very lovely girl. She welcome me beautifully and she was waiting for me at the flat at my arrival. She was helpful in advising how to get around, which were the best places to visit, to hike and the best beaches to see. She was always available to answer my questions and we had good chats. I really enjoy my stay there and if I happen to go to Oahu again I'll make sure I'll contact Joanna again!
Joanna was the great host.  She always gave me appropriate answers or ideas whenever I asked her any questions and made me feel comfortable to stay there.  Thank you so much for everything, Joanna!

Everything was good. It is really easy to walk from the apartment : 30mns to the beginning of Waikiki, 15mns to the nearest big grocery. Bus stops front of Joanna's place ... perfect to move to Waikiki or Downtown !
You need help ? Joanna is very friendly and will help you. It was great going to several places with her... I discovered a bit more Hawaii !
I read the previous reviews and saw that her place is "noisy"... well... most of the Hawaiian apartment have this kind of windows and traffic is everywhere .. so it's up to you but I think you should consider this option :-)

I loved her place! She was very friendly and accommodating and was also very helpful with helping me decide where to go on the island. The only negative was the noise level. I am from a small town that normally doesn't have traffic outside of my window. Luckily, I just bought a set of ear plugs and I was good! Highly recommend her place!
She's absolutely a great host. Her place was well kept and neat - very conducive  for a restful stay that I needed that time. Would totally recommend.

Joanna is an expert host. My whole experience with Joanna was easy and straight forward from beginning to end. Her apartment is beautifully decorated and allowed me to have my own personal space - a welcome treat after 3 months travel and hostel stays! Joanna made me feel very welcome, as if the apartment was my own. She is friendly, helpful and could tell me any information I needed about exploring Oahu; buses, hikes, shopping and excellent places to eat. The apartment is located about a 30 minute walk from Waikiki but there are buses you can get from right outside the door. I cannot recommend Joanna's place highly enough. It was an absolute pleasure to stay there.

Small, clean room. Bus stop outside the building. Very easy to get around.
Joanna is a good host.

Joanna is the perfect host ! Really nice and helpful, she deserves more than 5 stars ! 
She gave me great tips and ideas to visit the island. I would recommend Joanna and her place more than twice ! 
The place is clean, spacious room, closet, shower etc... everything was great and as described. 
The Street is a little bite noisy but you get use to it. :) 
Thank you for having me, I would love to come back. 

Mahalo

Joanna made my stay unforgettable, and always made me at home. She did not only provide a home, but also spent time with me when she had the opportunity. The apartment was clean, neat and well equipped! It was located close to the bus stop, and also a short walk to the city bikes. I only have warm things to say about my stay at Joanna´s, and give her my warmest recommendations.

S ubytováním jsem byla velice spokojená. Jen počítejte s nejméně půl hodinou chůze na Waikiki. Bus je přímo u domu, ale nespoléhejte na něj. Hluk z aut na ulici je bohužel na Hawaii běžný, takže doporučuji špunty do uší. Zde auta nemají hlukové limity, takže někdy se klepou i okna. 
Nic však nezabrání tomu, si to na Hawaii užít. Joannu a její ubytování můžu vřele doporučit
ｼﾞｮｱﾝﾅはとっても優しくて､お買い物やﾄﾞﾗｲﾌﾞにつれてってくれます!お部屋も綺麗です!最高のﾎｽﾄだと思います!

Joanna's home is a lovely place to stay. Joanna is a sweetheart and more than willing to direct you in the direction of local-y spots. I never felt uncomfortable or unsafe in my 2 1/2 month solo stay. The room is comfortable, cute, and great for the price! The location of her home is very convenient, for I walked everywhere for the entire Summer I was there. Everything you need is within a mile and the bus stop right outside the building is a bonus.

Everything exceeded my expectations and then some! Joanna made living in a new place a smooth transition for me. She helped me out whenever she could and, additionally, is such a genuine and kind person. I always felt safe living in the apartment location and comfortable to reach out to her with anything. I would recommend any female that is traveling to Oahu to stay with her!

Endroit extrêmement (Website hidden by Airbnb) je suis très tolérante .
Cuisine et baignoire sale murs défraîchis et malpropres.
Wonderful place to stay, beautiful room and condo, amazing host. Definitely recommend staying with Joanna !!

name: Cozy West Village Studio Apartment
space: Cozy and bright little studio apartment with a kitchenette and full bath, A/C and Internet connection. My place is very quiet and peaceful, a bit bohemian yet simple and basic. The building is safe and located in a lovely neighborhood. Nearby are the cafes, restaurants, shops and boutiques and the narrow streets and little gardens that are characteristic of the West Village. The entrance to the High Line is a few blocks from my door, and Chelsea's art galleries are within walking distance. The Meatpacking District may be your favorite with its trendy clubs and outdoor cafes. Buses and subways are two blocks away. Non-smokers only, please.
description: Cozy and bright little studio apartment with a kitchenette and full bath, A/C and Internet connection. My place is very quiet and peaceful, a bit bohemian yet simple and basic. The building is safe and located in a lovely neighborhood. Nearby are the cafes, restaurants, shops and boutiques and the narrow streets and little gardens that are characteristic of the West Village. The entrance to the High Line is a few blocks from my door, and Chelsea's art galleries are within walking distance. The Meatpacking District may be your favorite with its trendy clubs and outdoor cafes. Buses and subways are two blocks away. Non-smokers only, please.
house_rules: It is important that my guests keep it as quiet and discreet as possible while in the hallway of my building. No couples. No additional guests. No exceptions.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am happily alive and well and have made New York City my home long ago.
My interest in arts and theater brought me here and the city has fullfilled some of my dreams, some of it is in the gutter to be picked again when the time comes. New York is a home for the homeless wanderer, my motto, however, is: 'to find the home within'. In that note: I welcome all my guests to feel at home in my little home in New York.

reviews.comments: Wanted to stay in a cheap and cheerful place in the west village. Host was friendly, location is great and the price is reasonable. A bit of a walk up but this is common in NYC.
My stay at Marise's small apartment went very well. It was practical and situated in a great neighborhood.

Marise is a warm and lovely host, very personable.. easy to communicate with... the place is charming, perfect  for one or two professional... beautifully located, with coffee stores, subway, buses and stores all around.. 
 I will definitively recommend the place and hope to go back.

Marise was a great host, always available when needed, and very accurate. A nice person to talk to. The apartment is tiny, but very clean. The kitchen equipment is basic, but who would not prefer eating out with tons of great places around?? No need to bring books, Marise Rose has bunches of good ones on the shelfs. The best option if you want to be at the very heart of the Village!

Location, location, location. What a gem! What a price! 

This simple, cute studio was exactly what I needed for a week in NYC - comfy bed, shower with great water pressure, vibrant amenities-filled neighborhood, and easy access to transit.

Marise is a wonderful and very accommodating hostess. 

I'll be staying here again.
The apartment was in a great location and was everything I expected it to be. Thanks, Marise!
The apartment was in a great location, cheap and fit my needs well. Thanks, Marise!
Host was great, place was as advertised, very conveniently located.  Good value for price.

I was very happy with my stay. The apartment is clean and nice. The location is absolutely perfect!! Couldn't be better. West village is such a beautiful area. 
Marise rose made me feel welcome and safe. 
I recommend this apartment!

The location is amazing, it's close to the subway, cafes, restaurants, bars etc. The place is cheaper than the comparable once in the neighborhood. It's in the heart of the West Village and it is a typical New York studio that looks exactly the same way it does on the pictures. The window is not street facing and it's on the fourth floor, so the street noise was not a problem for me as it was pretty quiet at night. The host asks in the house rules section of the description to be quiet, so if that works for you, you'll have a good stay. I didn't have any problems with the internet once I connected to the Ethernet cable that the host uses to connect her computer to the router. The apartment door has two locks, so you can be safe and sound at night.

It is certainly nothing fancy but Marise's place offers a great base in the West Village to explore New York. It is only a couple of blocks to some great restaurants, a half hour to the East Village and 5 minutes from excellent subway connections. 

The apartment itself is quiet, charming and cozy but offers great value given the location and price.

Marise is a friendly host who was very flexible and was open with some great recommendations around town.
The reservation was canceled 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect location, Marise is a great hostess, very flexible and accommodating. Thanks, Marise!
The place was perfect!  Just as described, small but amazing location.  Marise was very nice and accommodating, I highly recommend.
Perfectly adequate, safe, and cozy place in a great neighborhood. No frills. None needed.
Very welcoming host.   The apartment is cozy and well equipped in a great location

Marise's studio is amazing. It is small and simple but is perfectly appointed with everything you need. The location is great -- steps from Abingdon Square and minutes away from everything the West Village, Meatpacking District, and Chelsea have to offer. I recommend the apartment for anyone visiting New York who is looking for a cute, convenient place to stay.
It was a nice experience in a great location, the host was great, I'd recommend.
Apt is in a great location - in the heart of West Village. Marisa was a very considerate and welcoming host.
Easy to meet and get in. Marise called and checked on me a few times as well to ensure all was going well.

Great little studio in a fabulous location.  Quiet and secure.  This apartment puts you right at the center of everything: West Village, Meatpacking District, High Line, and Chelsea.  WIFI was a bit slow but everything else was perfect (including a very comfy bed!).

Marise is a very nice and accommodating host. The 4th floor studio is very cozy and sufficient with a comfortable bed and bathroom. The location is unbeatable, just between Chelsea and Greenwich Village, 6min walk to the 14st/8th ave subway, and Chelsea Market. I even walked to East Village and took me about 12mins. Would definitely book again.
Cosy apartment. Accommodating host. Unbeatable location, it could not be better located to explore the west village!

The apartment is exactly as described.  It is a studio apartment right in the heart of the Greenwich Village.  Marise provided everything that was needed for a comfortable stay.  The only downside was the apartment was on the 4th floor in a building without an elevator so if you have a lot of luggage it will be difficult getting in and out. Overall, it was  a good experience and great value for the location.
Really unbeatable value for the location. Relatively quiet at night except for some sort of drainage pipe running through the room. A bit run down and musty like all NYC apartments...
Great place to stay in Greenwich, very centrally located, and was as described in listing, would stay again!

Marise was extraordinarily welcoming and made sure I felt right at home in her cozy dwelling. Her place is a charmingly typical old-style apartment, including the narrow flight of stairs, the chanting pipes, the steaming hot water, the surprising patchwork of wall paint colors, and its rusty yet functional 70s era gas cooking stove. This is the authentic AirBnB experience where the home owner is clearly living there most of the time and shares her space with the occasional guest.

In addition the location is perfect and is ideally suited to coming back "home" on foot after a night out in the Greenwich village or Washington Park.

I had a fantastic experience all around. The communication was consistent and I was greeted in a timely and hospitable manner. The location is perfect and the apartment is very nice as well. The bed is quite comfortable. I would highly recommend this place to anyone considering and couldn't have asked for a better host.
A small studio is in run out condition. But you get reasonable price, absolutely great location, comfy bed and welcoming host, sounds like a good deal.

This cosy little reasonably priced apartment is only minutes away from many wonderful cafes and restaurants, Whitney museum, the High Line and Chelsea galleries. A perfect base to explore the entire Manhattan as well. Very clean.  The host is prompt to respond to questions, great communication.

Awesome location, although very underwhelming facilities for its price, particularly kitchen and bathroom. Host was very nice at a personal level, but didn't want to be seen by neighbours, leading to a very awkward check-in (including several phone calls and waiting in the street with the suitcases for a while).

Marise es muy amable, me recibió correctamente y se preocupo para recibirme en el horario de mi llegada a la ciudad. 
El barrio esta perfectamente ubicado, es muy lindo y uno se puede mover muy bien desde allí a cualquier lado. El departamento lo encontré limpio y ordenado. Yo viaje solo, así que el departamento a pesar de ser pequeño funcionaba perfectamente para mí, ya que no necesitaba más que una cama para dormir.
Marise was gracious and allowed me to check in early.  The apartment is in a fabulous neighborhood. As other renters have said, be forewarned that it is a 4th floor walk up. And great exercise.
Very cozy west village studio apartment.

A nice and cozy little studio in the West Village. A food store right across the street that I have never seen closed, lots of little shops,  cafés, bars etc. in the area. Two subway stations within comfortable walking distance. A great place to explore the city. I felt less like a tourist, but more like someone who had just moved to NYC. This is not an appartment that someone rents out all year to maximize profit, it's Marisa's cozy little home that occasionally accomodates guests. Marisa was always helpful and always accessible via phone.

The apartment is in a great location in a very nice part of Manhattan, near West Village and Chelsea. Definitely cozy but adds to the experience of staying in the centre of Manhattan. Marise if very friendly and accommodating. Would recommend to anyone coming the NY on their own.

Marise was very kind. The place was cozy but looked tired. The shower sprayed water everywhere, the fridge was pretty dirty and the bed sheets and pillow cases were old and overused.  This was a good place for someone who is on a smaller budget and wants privacy.

Solo apartment Airbnb rentals are dicey business in NYC these days, so some patience and understanding is necessary if you plan to try to rent a full apartment. That being said, my check-in experience here was incredibly awkward because the host wanted my presence to be completely hidden from the rest of the building. This meant meeting up several blocks from the apartment for check-in, hiding around the corner while she waited to see if the neighbors would leave her stoop, being told not to make noise carrying my luggage up the stairs to the 4th floor, being asked not to leave the apartment if neighbors might be in the hallway, and being instructed to ignore the super if they came knocking at the door.

I'm not picky when it comes to accommodations, especially when I need them on the cheap, so the fact that the unit itself is tiny and doesn't come equipped with toiletries doesn't matter so much for me. The host is a perfectly nice person, and this review isn't meant to be personal in any way. But it wasn't an especially pleasant or relaxing stay because of the uncomfortable check-in process and the expressed need for me to be invisible to the rest of the building. You get what you pay for!

Marise's place was great and my stay was as expected. It is exactly as described. The location is surely unbeatable. I think it's important to keep in mind a few things, concerning some of the previous comments. When booking an apartment in one of New York's pre-war buildings, one cannot have overly demanding expectations. All of these buildings are very old; the apartments may look dirty no matter how thoroughly one cleans them. That's because the construction is poor. In my opinion, and given the price, Marise's place is a great deal. Marise herself is a very nice and open person. I would definitely recommend the place to someone who's on a budget, wants to be in one of the best locations is NYC, and does not have extremely high expectations. Simple :)

Quaint apartment right in the heart of the West Village- the location is unbeatable. Walking distance from every West Village / Chelsea attraction. Marise was extremely accommodating and went out of her way to make sure I was settled!

Marise, a.k.a. "M," has a great walk-up loft in the West Village that's close to everything.  The apartment is a great deal for the location, and is authentic New York.  If you're looking for luxury, this might not be for you, but it's a great spot if you want a comfortable place for NY excursions.
She was Great!

The #1 reason to stay at Marise's place is the location, which is great, and the location relative to the price is a very good offer. That said, I would not stay here again, for two main reasons. 

1) As a previous guest mentioned in a review, Marise made the check-in process a pain. She asked me to wait on a street corner for 10 minutes because her neighbors were in the hallway and she didn't want to be seen with a guest, and then she took the next 10-15 minutes packing up her belongings while I was in the apartment. I had been traveling all day and all I wanted was a shower and sleep, so this prolonged check-in process was inconvenient and uncomfortable.

2) The apartment was technically clean but was so run-down and dingy that it felt dirty. I realize these are old NYC apartments and I don't expect highly-modern accommodations, but it was everything from the grime in the bathroom tiles to the chips on the walls to the stains on the wood floor. This isn't Marise's fault and it shouldn't deter guests who are willing to forgo some comfort and class for a cheaper alternative, but it didn't work for me. 

Smaller complaints: There wasn't a garbage can anywhere in the apartment so I had to store garbage in a plastic bag hanging from a kitchen cupboard; the A/C unit didn't effectively cool down the apartment; there was a strange smell in the entrance to the apartment; etc.

I think Marise's place is a good deal for budget travelers who know what they're signing up for, but I wouldn't stay there again myself.
Lovely stay at Marise flat !

The studio itself reminded me of the similarly-sized, rent-controlled apartment I once had in Manhattan. Apartments like these are in older buildings which are often poorly maintained by landlords who are eager to "nudge out" long-time tenants and capitalize on higher rents for newer tenants. In this context, some cracked tiles, old appliances, and the like are to be expected. The lack of "polish" some reviewers mentioned is attributable to this. Blame the landlord, not the tenant! Nevertheless, I had a very pleasant stay.  The studio itself was comfortable. The location was terrific. And Marise herself was a communicative and kind host. Thanks for the wonderful hospitality!

This is a splendid place in downtown NYC if you are visiting the city on your own. Be prepared for a longer check-in though, as your hostess will not let you in all at once as long as her bad neighbour is sitting on the stairs. That said I enjoyed my stay at Emma's place and I would rent the place again if I have the chance. Emma is very helpful with everything. Xx

This is a good little place at a great price in an amazing location... everything is within walking distance to give you a good flavor of NYC. Marise is very welcoming and and great to talk to while you settle in. There are a few issues with the place.. but that's down to the building itself rather than Marise.

this place worked out _great_ for me and i loved it. however, do read the other reviews and be mindful of some of the quirks of doing airbnb in certain parts of NYC and the quirks common to any older flat in this part of manhattan. if you're ok with all that, traveling solo, and want a very comfy bed in an almost ideal west village location at a very reasonable rate, i very highly recommend this place. great restaurants and pubs literally steps away (including the spotted pig) and a quick walk to several subway stations that cover most of the major lines.

I had a great experience staying here! I planned my trip last minute, but Marise was so helpful, understanding, and welcoming. She met me and showed me around so that I could better adjust, assuring me that she was there to reach out to if I needed anything. The apartment is just as described and was perfect to leave and return to each day. It was extremely convenient to either walk to or take the subway to/from. It was exactly what I needed and made my trip so much better!
Excellent location and cute apartment.  I really enjoyed my stay and look forward to using this Airbnb location again!
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Marise was very accommodating and wonderful host!  The apartment and location were great for a first timer in New York!
Marise's place is perfect for one guest. Much better value then paying for a hotel, and the location is incredible. One of the best areas in Manhattan. I would more than happily stay again!

Marise's place is just as advertised.  If you want a true NYC experience in a true NYC apartment, for a great price this is the place to stay.  As long as you are okay with forgoing the extra amenities that a hotel provides, I would highly recommend Marise's apartment.  As stated before, check-in can be a bit of a process (but this is because of NYC, not any of Marise's doing).  Amazing location!

This space is unique.  The location is great!

Read the prior reviews regarding host check in and expectations when you are coming and going.  Marise and I had some communication difficulties in the beginning, but were resolved instantly once we were in person.

It was in the low 90’s while I was there and there was a pretty hefty pet odor in the apartment.  There is a very small window unit that the host requested be turned off while not in the apartment.  It would take a couple of hours for the space to cool off to a manageable temperature in the evenings.  There is also a box fan that helps, but the apartment stays very warm, even in the evenings, on hot days.

The bed is comfortable, which is a big plus.

As other reviewers wrote, the apartment is as advertised.  It's an older, walk up NYC apartment so if you're looking for modern or amenities look elsewhere.  It's great if you're traveling solo, looking for something inexpensive in a nice neighborhood, and just need a place to sleep and drop your stuff.

I very much enjoyed my stay at Marise's place. It is located in a great neighborhood with many nice restaurants, shops and bars close by and a vibrant atmosphere. The apartment is a tiny, but cute NYC space. Marise was very friendly and helpful, and I enjoyed meeting her and chatting about NYC!

Apartment is as per the pics and description.
It is small but perfectly adequate for a solo traveller.
As mentioned in several of the reviews Marise makes the check in and check out process extremely difficult.
Travelling and using Airbnb regularly particularly in NYC several times a year I understand the need to be discreet around other people/neighbours within the building. Marise takes this to a different level. On check in she arranged to meet away from the actual building. When at the building door Marise became highly agitated when she thought someone from her building may see us coming in which created a very strange atmosphere. This person she saw turned out to be a cleaner rather than a resident so we eventually headed upstairs to the apartment.
On leaving by pre arrangement Marise wanted to meet me to check out of the apartment which I was happy to do so at her request. On leaving the apartment Marise heard someone coming up the stairs and then physically grabbed me by my arm and pulled me in to the small hallway of her apartment closing the door to avoid them seeing us. I found this very aggressive. In my mind this is unacceptable behaviour for her to touch or grab me in any way and made me feel very uncomfortable.
I would not recommend staying at this apartment for the reasons listed above.

DIRTY,  SMALL
I had to clean the bathtub before I used it. The bathroom, in general, wasn't clean. The mirrors were covered in filth. The bathroom sink didn't work and had a layer of dirt at the bottom. The fridge was very dirty inside and out and had a foul smell. The ceiling had water damage that is not shown in the photos. I will be asking for the cleaning fee back.

The photo used in the post is stretched out to make the place look twice as big as it actually is. The A/C unit barely worked (our host admitted when we got there that it didn't work as well as it used to) and stopped working altogether after being in the apt for 10min. The host said, "That just happens". Luckily my son was there to help me with my bags and figured out that the unit was, dangerously, plugged into too many extension cords. 

I met our host a block away from the apt and she said to "I have to smuggle you into the building". She waited at the entrance of the building and waved us up when the cost was clear. My son had to run up 4 flights of stairs with two heavy bags in order to not be seen. Apparently, her neighbors don't want her to rent out the place. None of this was in the description. She then informed me that I would have to listen at the door to make sure no one was in the hall before exiting. There were still dirty dished in the sink that she had to clean and the towels were still at the laundromat. She seemed unprepared for our visit.


Can't complain about this. Nice location in the West Village.

Would be a good deal if she cleaned the apt and posted a realistic pic of the studio.

I had great stay at Marise's apt! She was very kind and easy to communicate with.
If you read  people descriving Marise's place, you wouldn't have problems. This is amazing location that has nice bars, restaurants and shops. walking up to 4th floor was bit hard with suitcase but anything else was perfect!
Cozy, great location, and definitely suitable for a single traveler! Overall a great value.

Marise's place is very small and a 3 flight walk up. it is also pretty crowded with her things and there is not a lot of room for the guest. I was fine with this, because I was traveling alone and only staying there a few nights. But not everyone is going to be fine with this. Marise herself is very pleasant to deal with and the neighborhood is one of my favorites in the whole country.
The apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a great area!
Very nice and cozy place! Located in a beautiful area and close to all touristic places in New York. Marise was a great host!

This apartment is a cozy, classic West Village studio. It is not large but suited me fine for my long weekend visit to New York. The bed was comfortable, and the location was super convenient. I was surprised by how quiet the apartment is (for a place in New York) -- it is located in the back of the building, so there is very little street noise, and not much noise from the other apartments around it. The shower had plenty of hot water and the place was warm even though I was visiting during a very cold spell of weather (lows in the single digits). Marise's place is full of interesting books and decorations, showing her love of art and spirituality. I would definitely stay here again.

name: Heart of Hana, 1BR/1BA Cottage
summary: Relax in the fully equipped 1 bedroom cottage with a full kitchen, living room, dining area, washer/dryer, outdoor shower, and a covered deck with views of the ocean and mountain. $209/night (includes the taxes), maximum 2 guests.
description: Relax in the fully equipped 1 bedroom cottage with a full kitchen, living room, dining area, washer/dryer, outdoor shower, and a covered deck with views of the ocean and mountain. $209/night (includes the taxes), maximum 2 guests. *Two night minimum stay, although we will book a one-night reservation if there is one night open between the reserved dates of other guests. Our home is located in the rural town of Hana, on the East side of Maui.  There are beautiful beaches nearby, including Hana Bay, a 10 minute walk away, and Hamoa Beach, a 10 minute drive down the road, consistently named one of the most beautiful beaches in America, where we like to spend our time surfing, swimming with the kids, and lounging under the shady trees. Lots of hiking to see waterfalls and swimming in fresh water pools, including Oheo (Seven Sacred Pools) that is part of the U.S. National Park Service and Waianapanapa State Park that has a cool volcanic grotto you can swim in, a black sand beach, and a blow
neighborhood_overview: *Two night minimum stay, although we will book a one-night reservation if there is one night open between the reserved dates of other guests. Our home is located in the rural town of Hana, on the East side of Maui.  There are beautiful beaches nearby, including Hana Bay, a 10 minute walk away, and Hamoa Beach, a 10 minute drive down the road, consistently named one of the most beautiful beaches in America, where we like to spend our time surfing, swimming with the kids, and lounging under the shady trees. Lots of hiking to see waterfalls and swimming in fresh water pools, including Oheo (Seven Sacred Pools) that is part of the U.S. National Park Service and Waianapanapa State Park that has a cool volcanic grotto you can swim in, a black sand beach, and a blow hole along the coastline. Or just relax on the covered deck, play some cards, board games, read a book, or enjoy a movie or two via the wireless internet on your computer or tablet. There are many mom and pop places to eat, includ
notes: *Two night minimum stay, although we will book a one-night reservation if there is one night open between the reserved dates of other guests. *As per our vacation rental permit, maximum occupancy is 2 people, including children over the age of two years old, per bedroom (or less).
transit: A car is necessary to get to, from and around Hana.

host.host_about:
Active lifestyle!!  I grew up on Maui and my passion is the outdoors:  Surfing, biking, hiking, you name it.  And I love to travel.  Surf, snowboard, hiking and biking trips as much as possible.  I bought and remodeled the house in Hana for quick Maui staycations to surf and play in the rainforest hikes with family and friends, and the design of the home and cottage is to my type of lifestyle, indoor/outdoor living, comfortable furnishings, and ample room to prepare meals and relax.

Some of my favorite travel destinations are Canada and Colorado for the boarding, camping, hiking and biking, houseboat trips to Lake Powell, and, if time/money allow, the southwest of France for the surf, food, wine and culture.

My travel style has modified over the years.  It used to be budget all the way.  Those years are behind me, now I prefer a reasonable price, a clean place, with amenities, and convenience to the happening spots in the area, which is exactly what I want to provide for others in Hana as an Airbnb host.

It's a big world out there, set aside some time for yourself and explore!!

Aloha,
Brook

reviews.comments: Great stay at this sweet cottage. Wish we'd stayed longer than a night. Clean, friendly spot, easy walk to shops and beach. Perfect getaway!
Communication was clear, cottage was clean and neat. Amenities were new to newer. Location was very quiet.

Brook was a great host and we loved his cottage. Perfect spot if you plan on doing the road to Hana. Just make sure you go to the right place. There are two places on the island with the same address. We put in the wrong one and were on a goose hunt late at night without service. Drove to a part of the island with service and was able to call Brook who was really helpful in getting us to the right place. Navigate to travaasa inn first and it's only a couple minutes from there. Would highly recommend Brook's place to anyone!!!

Highly recommend this lovely house with awesome view of beautiful Hana Bay!! Brook, your host, is so nice, friendly and helpful. So easy to book, get in, stay and enjoy!!! Peaceful, private rainforest retreat!!

This was our first experience with Airbnb, and we could not have asked for a better host/brand ambassador than Brook.  She made sure to communicate with us immediately, and clearly, about the location, directions, ammenities, etc. and made us feel very welcome.  We left feeling like we got WAY more value and a cleaner, more comfortable stay here - in fact - than at our resort out on the other side of the island.  We will definitely book here again!

Brook was an awesome host. Easy to talk to on the phone and answered text messages promptly with the few questions that I had. His house was gorgeous and more so CLEAN! Bed was cozy, water was hot and the air was cool.
Location of his home was perfect with short walk/drives to all beaches and attractions in and around Hana.

Amazing and professional AirBnB experience! Brook's home is exactly what we were looking for - a modern, recently updated home with some privacy. Brook's communication was superb and she made every effort to make sure our stay was perfect! Would totally recommend for anyone looking for a place to stay in Hana.

It's a perfect little place. The bed was super comfy. Slept like a baby. Perhaps it was because of the country side noises: cows mooing and crickets singing. Thanks for pointing out Hamoa beach in your booklet. What a great beach!

Great one bed cottage that really is in the heart of Hana. Brook and her team were really informative, giving lots of information ahead of our arrival, and also very responsive - we couldn't get in using the agreed lock process but we got a response (over the app) almost instantly. Would definitely recommend one or even two nights if you're doing the drive from Hana. That extra time gave us more opportunity to explore the national park and find hidden waterfalls!

Luv'd this place. Fresh, open, clean, comfortable, private. Our only disappointment: Unlike as pictured (must be an earlier foto), outdoor plants have grown so tall, cannot see the water from porch or kitchen table - so could not watch the surf while eating or porch-lounging. Otherwise, it was all we hoped for.

This is a great find in Hana at a reasonable price. The house is updated, comfortable, and very clean. Brook has done a great job of making sure you have everything you might need for your stay (beach towels, bug spray, sunscreen, etc). My favorite features of the house were (1) opening all the windows to get a great breeze from the ocean and (2) the washing machine/dryer - it helps out a lot when adventuring around Maui with not much luggage. I also really liked the filtered drinking water, outside shower, and beautiful deck and view of Hana Bay. Communication with Brook was awesome. We called him the day we were headed to Hana because we heard rumors that the road was flooded. He quickly confirmed the road was okay for us by calling his friends in town. He also checked in with us after we had arrived to make sure everything was okay. Thank you Brook!

Lovely cottage with amenities, including a nice kitchen and two beautiful showers--indoors and outside (I've never seen such a pretty outdoor shower!) All immaculate, comfortable and conveniently located close to Hana town and beaches. Brook was wonderfully helpful with all arrangements and questions. We enjoyed every moment of our visit and are so grateful for our blissful days away in Hana!
After driving the to Hana, it was great to have a place to relax and unwind. It gave us a chance to explore the east side of Maui that we would likely not have done if we stayed on another side only.
The cottage was a great place to stay because of it's privateness and proximity to things to do in Hana. You can walk to the beach, walk to dinner, or just stay in and relax. It was just perfect.
I really liked the apartment- everything you need is there, even towels and kitchen stuff. From the very private terrace you can hear the ocean!

This place was great!  It was our favorite AirBNB experience of this trip.  The unit is accurately depicted in the description.  Located right off the Hana Highway, it was a great place to relax for a couple days after traveling the Road to Hana.  The views and outdoor shower really make this modern ohana unit a gem.  We would love to return to this magical place someday.  This cottage in Hana will always get our highest of recommendations.

My 15 year old daughter and I did the drive to Hana and stayed two nights. What a sweet cottage with views of the bay and covered porch. We  ate Thai takeout ( Check them out on trip advisor.) on the covered porch. It is really clean and the communication was great. We slept with the windows open and enjoyed the tropical air. There is an air conditioner in the bedroom and you may want to consider using it- the neighbor has three dogs that start barking way before dawn. For coffee drinkers- bring your own supplies. I can't move in the morning without a cup and had to go to local store store for a styrofoam cup full everyday.  I would definitely stay again if I ever get chance to go back.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Quiet and peaceful, staying here made us feel like we lived in Hana. Everything was set up for an easy arrival after the long drive on the Hana Highway. Centrally located for quick access to the local beach parks. We had a very enjoyable stay!

Host was very communicative from the start and we were appreciative for that. Getting settled in was seamless. The location and amenities were great. Really appreciated the fact that the place had a washer dryer as well as a full kitchen. Great views of the ocean from the house. We loved how the place also had beach chairs and a boogie board for the beach. Place was very clean and a close walk to Hana Bay, and an easy drive to other area spots. Would definitely recommend and come back here again.

Had a wonderful stay here in Hana! The place was perfectly located. Nice to stay over in Hana after a long winding drive and plenty of views :) we are from the food trucks and made our own dinner in one night with food from the general store! Very peaceful. Only hiccup was the rain, the road was closed back to Paia and had to drive around the other side to catch our flight. Silver lining - more great views!

Amazing spot! Brook and Sara were great at communicating from start to finish. We absolutely loved the location - right in the heart of Hana. We cooked in the place multiple times, and had very peaceful sleeps! An easy jump off point to anywhere near the end of the road to Hana. Check in and check out was also a breeze - looking forward to visiting again!
This is a cute cottage in a great location. Ideal for couples who want a relaxing vacation.

Great place. House was in the middle of hana and close to all attractions.  Looks like the interior was recently renovated and looks very modern. There's a shower outside and inside.  All instructions were extremely thorough and I had no questions! I can't really think of any downfalls!!!
Nice cottage to stay if you plan to discover the Hana area. Highlight: you will hear the ocean in the night.
The property and views are beautiful. The cottage is modern and well supplied. This is a great place to stay in Hana. I can't wait to go back.

I started my week trip to Maui with 3 nights in Hana.  This bungalow was perfect. It was perfect for one or two people, close to everything with a nice view of the ocean, and a nice adjoining  deck.  There is not much in the way of grocery shopping in Hana, so I would buy supplies elsewhere to take advantage of the stocked kitchen.  I would definitely stay here again!

Great little condo in the heart of Hana. Ocean views from the kitchen, living room, and bedroom. This condo is right off of the Hana highway, but is hidden by a large fence that provides a very private atmosphere. Very clean, and had everything we needed for our stay. We took advantage of the blender and picked up fresh fruit from  number of different roadside fruit stands on the road to Hana. 

Highly recommended, you won't be disappointed!
Excellent location to explore Hana.

Brook's place was absolutely perfect. My husband and I were looking to "break up" the road to Hana into two days as opposed to trying to squeeze it into one. We were able to see and do so much more having spent a night in Hana. The cottage is gorgeous. Extremely clean, and a short drive/walk to the town. Directions were bang on-we had no problems finding the place and checking in. I only wish we had stayed longer! Five stars all around.

This place is exactly the same as is described in picture. Check in was easy, and hard to miss out the place as Sara sent us the pictures in advance. Close to everything in the town. Koki beach is only 4 miles away, just good enough for early morning jog to sunrise. Definitely a 5-star rating from us.
Brooks place was great! Clean and a perfect location in Hana.
One of our favorite Airbnbs ever! Super clean and cozy and close to great beaches and food spots. Highly recommend!
Perfect place to explore Hana! Great location!

Our stay was wonderful.  We really enjoyed the location and the little cottage. We almost didn't want to leave. There were nice little touches that made our stay extra enjoyable... like coffee and super soft towels.
The cottage was absolutely perfect for us. Extremely easy check in - very comfortable and the outdoor shower is awesome! I will hopefully book again at some point!

This is a well equipped, stand-alone cottage right in town. It's either relativity new construction or has been recently renovated. The bathroom only has a shower but it is very nice and large. There are lots of screened windows and fans so we were very comfortable, but there is also a small air-conditioning unit of you need it.  The cottage is quite private and even has a partial view of beautiful Hana Bay. 

The location is very convenient and the owners are also communicative and easy to work with; check-in could not have been easier. While we were there the neighbors dogs were a little loud at times but overall our experience was very positive and I would absolutely recommend staying here.

Brook's place in Hana ,Maui was the perfect location. 10 minute walk to the beach, dining options close. Checkout The Barefoot Cafe a walk up coffee, breakfast and lunch place.  Just the right space for our trip.
Amazing views, wonderful accommodation. This is the perfect place.

The cottage is centrally located in the town of Hana and from the ocean-facing side of the cottage, you have a view over the town of Hana towards the ocean. The cottage is well-maintained and in a very good and very clean condition. Everything was as described on airbnb and communication with Brook was very easy and quick. Hana offers a small grocery store, however, I would definitely rcommend to do the main grocery shopping before you start taking the Road to Hana.
We enjoyed our stay in Hana. The house is a great location and was easy to find.  We were greeted upon arrival and had everything we needed for our stay.  The house was very clean and quiet.
This place looked brand new and had everything we could have asked for. Super convenient location and comfy bed. Would definitely recommend staying here after a long day on the road to Hana.

This place was great for a stop along the road to Hana! Brook was very professional and a pleasure to work with. There are so many awesome things to check out on the road to Hana that it's worth staying here for the beautiful view and to explore more of the incredible area all around! The neighbors dogs like to bark but other than that the cottage is newly renovated and beautiful!

Brook's place is FANTASTIC and I would absolutely recommend you stay here on your visit to Hana. Wonderful outdoor showers and huge indoor shower, very comfortable bed with AC if needed (we didn't use at all due to the wonderful breeze!), and lots of light coming from windows. Lovely outdoor AND indoor eating space and equipment to make food on your own. Oh, and two smart tv's if you really feel the need to watch tv after a long day out in nature! Walkable to Hana Bay, Thai Food by Pranee, and red sand beach. Such an easy check-in process with clear directions and lots of communication. All of these factors made it so easy for us to really enjoy and soak up our stay in Hana. Thank you so much, we will absolutely stay here next time we return!

This little cottage is just like the photos! Nicely renovated, clean and well equipped. We passed it by on the street but found that it was tucked back behind another house. The view is fantastic! I have always been a west coast person, we even live in west Maui, so it was amazing for me to see the sunrise out of the ocean each morning! We had an enjoyable stay!

Modern with everything that you could need in Hana and then some. Beautiful place, very clean, outdoor showers, grill, and a deck with a view.  Red and black sand beaches are within 10 minutes in either direction!
We had a wonderful stay in Hana!  We were  impressed with the cuteness, cleanliness, and value of the cottage.  Communication and directions were accurate and friendly. We had a blast!

This home is perfect for two people.  Modern and clean.  We stayed over a week.  I was surprised to have air conditioning in the bedroom.  The location was ideal and a quick drive to beaches and food.  We will be back!

If you drive all the way to Hana, you should stay for a day or two! This clean and simple cottage is in a great location for enjoying all the Hana area sights. It is very quiet and even has a view of the ocean and plumeria trees in the garden. The cottage is easy to access, communication with the owners was great. We enjoyed spending time in peaceful Hana - thanks Brook and Sara!

Quant cottage in convenient location for your location. Great shape and well equipped. Some noise in neighborhood that can probably be tuned out with the air conditioning. Very soft bed but would definitely recommend staying here.

We really enjoyed our stay! I would recommend this place to anyone who wants to stay the night (or several) in Hana. There is a very nice view of Hana Bay and it's a close walk to Travaasa for dinner. Easy check in as well.
Location, Location, Location.......this is a very nice cottage in an excellent location of Hana.  We loved it!  Has a nice view of Hana Bay!  We'll be back!
This is a super cute house in central Hana. We really enjoyed our stay. House has everything we needed, is clean and comfortable!
Very conveniently located in Hana. Views of the bay were amazing and a clean home to stay in. Thank you for having us.  Amy and Carey

This little one-bedroom cottage is very clean, well decorated and equipped. Two nice restaurants and two beaches within walking distance. It was a wonderful spot to base our Hana adventures from and Brook and Sara were attentive and helpful.

This is a great place to get away from it all. My husband and I felt right at home and had everything we could want! I highly recommend a visit here. Brooke was extremely thoughtful and takes great care of this sweet cottage retreat!

If you're planning on a trip to Hana you really should allow yourself a few nights there and this cottage is the perfect place to stay.  The host supplies all bedding, towels, shampoo/soap, etc. which really helps with packing.  This home is quietly tucked away allowing for restful sleep and relaxation between your Hana adventures.  I highly recommend this Hana Bayview Cottage!

If you are choosing to stay in Hana this is the place for you! It was so clean and the interior was all updated. It has views of the ocean and it is very quiet and peaceful as well as being surrounded by amazing landscaping. Definitely would recommend and hope to come back here again some day!

We loved staying in this cute little cottage. It had everything we needed and a pretty view. The location was perfect so we were able to spend time doing everything we wanted in Hana at our own pace-rather than driving there and back in one day Ave squeezing in lots of stops like a lot of people do.

Brook and Sara are such great hosts from A to Z. Before check in they have provided us detailed map and siteplan so we can find the cottage easily. The place looks much nicer than the pictures. Spacious and clean, with a cute terrace overlook the hana bay. Great spot to have breakfast and enjoy the breeze. You can see the owner paid lots of attention to the details to make the place cosy. We loved our stay and 2 nights are just perfect for us to explore hana. Definitely will recommend to others.

Beautiful cottage in Hana. It was clean and had everything we needed from beach gear to kitchen essentials. It is exactly as described in the listing. Sara is very  communicative and was available whenever we had questions. Surely a place we will stay at the next time we are in Hana! Thank you Sara and Brook!

Brook's cottage was the perfect location to check out Hana. It was well stocked with toiletries, kitchen supplies and beach essentials like towels and chairs. Make sure you heed the warning to clean all the crumbs. I forgot to empty our cooler one evening and got quite the surprise the next morning when I opened it up. I stocked up on food before we made the drive to Hana and I'm glad I did. The restaurant options are limited and most close early. My favorite was the orange burrito truck - try the guava chicken. Overall a great place to stay if you want a couple days to explore Hana.
Awesome place to stay at if you want to spend a couple of nights in Hana. Clean, tidy and a view of the sea, you can't wish for more.
Wonderful hosts and very charming place in an authentic part of Maui.
Great cottage. As advertised. Great location. Enjoyed our three days in Hana.
Beautiful and cozy home overlooking Hana bay.

Very nice stay in this cottage! It is in a gorgeous location, very comfortable and very clean with all the amenities necessary. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone who's stopping in Hana for a few days!
The house was absolutely adorable and perfect for two people. Easy parking, great view, cozy balcony, as clean as could be. I would highly recommend it and would definitely stay there again.
Brook’s place was great! Beautiful views outside and clean and comfortable inside. Would definitely stay here again. Oh and the air conditioner in the bedroom was perfect!

This place is absolutely the best.  The cottage is such a wonderful place to relax and unwind.  My husband and I stayed for a week.  We fell in love with Hana and with this cottage.  The bed was so comfortable, loved the shower and the washer and dryer.  The place was just the right size for the two of us.  Lots of beautiful greenery and waking up to a gorgeous ocean view!  Close to beaches and lots of great places to eat. Can't wait to visit again.
The Cottage was perfect for a couple. The kitchen was well equipped. The bed was comfortable and the shower was nicely done. Highly recommend it
Newly renovated place, but has old kitchen appliances. Centrally located to all attractions in Hana.

Super cute & comfortable home. Everything was clean and the bed was really really comfy! Loved doing dishes and looking out over Hana Bay! Even though it’s the back house the porch is really private and lovely. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Our stay at the cottage was GREAT. Cottage was easy to find since it is right on Hana Highway. Location was awesome; close to Hamoa Beach, Hana Bay, and Haleakala National Park, as well as all the food trucks and restaurants in Hana. After all the hiking and swimming it was great to go back and relax at the cottage.

My husband and I stayed two nights at Brook's cottage in Hana. We had an amazing stay. Brook's property manager, Sarah emailed us directions and pictures of the front gate to the property prior to our arrival. This was immensely helpful to us as we arrived in Hana after dark. Upon arrival, we found the cottage to be clean and roomy. The king sized bed was very comfortable. We miss having a king size bed in our own condo and it was definitely nice to be able to spread out to sleep. The towels in the bathroom was amazingly soft and luxurious. It was a welcome surprise and made our stay seem super high end. In the kitchen, there's a helpful binder full of tips on house rules, area restaurants and things to do. We really enjoyed picking up local groceries and making our breakfast in the kitchen each morning. 

Some things to note: There's no shoes allowed inside the cottage. I felt that this helped us keep the house clean throughout our stay so I didn't mind. In the mornings, the dogs in the neighborhood bark loudly so make sure you get a good night's sleep and start your day early! We are normally not morning people but we found that our day time adventures tired us out enough to get us to bed early. It was also more important for us to get up earlier to have enough day light to explore all of Hana's natural beauty. 

One major thing that bothered us was the wifi. The connection was pretty spotty. We were able to get the best connection in the living/dining room area which was surprising since the modem was located in the bedroom. It would have been nice to have a more stable connection as we had no cell signal in Hana. For reference, we have T-Mobile. (Pro Tip: download the Gypse Maui tour phone app before you start the Road to Hana. This provides location based audio tour for the drive and works without data. The entire Maui tour is $10. We got the Road to Hana only tour for $5 and bought the Maui tour after since we liked it so much.) .
Great place to stay in Hana. Close to all the central attractions and beaches. Brook’s place is clean and spacious. Love this place and definitely recommend.
It was fine. Lots of dogs in the neighborhood that barked at all hours (not a problem for me). Good location, easy to find.

Hana is a gorgeous little town and after the crazy drive to get there, we were glad to have a few days before we needed to make the trip back.  After 3 weeks and 3 islands, we discovered the best beach of them all, a 10min drive from Brook's place.  Hamoa Beach - sandy, no crowds, crystal clear water and sheltered bay.  The house is super clean and comfortable and we'd definately stay there again.

Very nice cottage with view of ocean. Convenient location right along hana highway yet private behind fence and bushes.  Everything you could need including beach towels and chairs
 Would highly recommend.
We liked the house very much. It was spotless clean, well equipped and had a nice view. Communication with the host was excellent. Thanks!
Excellent cottage, appointments and communication. Would definitely stay here again!
