This cottage is comfortable, relaxing and the perfect size for two. When we arrived the windows were open, ceiling fans were on, and obvious care had been taken to make us comfortable. The king size bed was super comfortable and surrounded by windows. The bathroom includes a roomy tiled shower and lots of towels, and there is insect repellent, sunscreen, shampoo, etc in case you forgot to pack some. The relaxation factor is high, and it was so nice to be able to cook in when traveling. There is a gas station and a general store, but it is wise to bring your provisions with you. The location is perfect for exploring the area at a more leisurely pace. We had a great experience, and would love to return. The cottage is in a quiet neighborhood, but there are some chickens and dogs who are early risers. Perfect for people who make their homes in the country and like it!
As advertised. Lovely little cottage with all of the comforts of home.
The house is super cute and lovely. It has beach chairs, towels, and an umbrella. It was super clean too.
We love this ohana unit.  It has everything you need to have a comfortable stay in Hana.  It is perfectly sized for two people.  We can't wait to come back!
Great and safe location in Hana. We found it to be very convenient after the drive and exploring for the day. There was also beach towels, chairs, boards, etc so we were able to enjoy Hamoa.

The home was really clean, the space is bright, airy, and has a great view of Hana Bay.  The bed was very comfortable.   The kitchen had pretty much everything we needed to cook our meals there.  We really appreciated that beach chairs, boogie boards and beach towels were provided, and the outdoor shower was especially helpful after coming back from a very muddy hike!  Brook immediately responded to any questions I had.   We were really happy we stayed in this home in Hana and would do so again if we return.
Peaceful location, nice place. We enjoyed being close to Waiʻanapanapa State Park and Hamoa beach. Food trucks and the ONO fruitstand were nearby making it very convenient.
Great stay with excellent directions and instructions well posted in logical places.  Great town. Great location. Great rental.
Awesome place and perfect get away to unplug and enjoy Hāna and it’s beautiful atmosphere. Highly recommend staying here.
Great location, easy walk to town.  Beautiful landscaping surrounds a cozy and clean home.  Hope to make it back again one day!
Great place to stay in Hana. Highly recommended.
Great location and super clean. Very responsive and gave clear and detailed check in details and tips. Would recommend
Such a gorgeous place! Kitted our with everything you need for a beach getaway. So easy to communicate and a five minute walk to everything in Hana

We loved staying at this beautiful cottage in Hana. It was very clean and in the perfect location to get to all the wonderful parks nearby. The bed was very comfortable and they even had a high chair which made it easier to feed our daughter. Our only complaint is that the dogs in the neighborhood are very loud and were barking early in the morning.

We had an incredible stay at Brook's place. The cottage is stylish, clean, and comfortable for two people looking to explore Hana. The location is super central and we were quick drives to the Red Sand Beach, Waianapanapa Black Sand Beach, and the food trucks downtown. Would highly recommend!

Dit is een gezellig huisje dat van alles voorzien is. Zeker een aanrader als je niet dezelfde dag de weg naar Hana wil terug rijden. In het nationale park is de pipi bay trail een aanrader. Zeker het deel dat door het bamboe bos gaat.
Good location great accomdations a relaxing experience. A great place to experience rural Maui!
Lovely cottage, close to everything. All was fine except the barking neighbor's dogs.

This is a great place when staying in Hana! It's conveniently located when going to different places towards the end of Road to Hana. Provided instructions and local information were very helpful and clear.
Very nice and clean place to stay in Hana - thank goodness for the AC in the bedroom!  Highly recommend staying here

This place is just a divine slice of heaven in Hana! Privacy guaranteed with the hedge wrapping around the balcony area despite the main house not being far away. High end, quality fittings throughout. From the door lock to the bathroom shower, all well done and complimenting each other. A king size bed that is comfortable and piled high with pillows awaits. A gorgeous cross breeze cools so the AC in the bedroom is not required.

This was our favorite place that we stayed at in Hawaii! We decided to stay in Hana for 3 nights, and it was incredible. We beat the tourists everywhere we went because we were already at the destination. Seven sacred pools, black sand beaches, red sand beach, it was all very close by. Beautiful location!

Brook’s place was everything we could hope for and more. Super easy to find and check-in was a breeze. It was well stocked with all the usual items and also many beach towels and other beach items for your use, including a great cooler. The cottage was very clean and the kitchen was well equipped for cooking meals. Highlights for us were the A/C in the bedroom (better than having it in the living room, which most condos do), the enormous walk-in shower, and the very comfy king bed. There are also outdoor showers with hot water, great for washing off after the beach. We would highly recommend a stay at the Hana Bayview Cottage!

Great location to explore Hana. A few minutes of drive from major tourist attractions. Place was very clean and well-organized. Has a great ocean view and a cute patio. Nice kitchen and bathroom too. Definitely recommend.

What an amazing place!! The photos didn’t do it justice. Sparkling clean, beautiful views, perfectly located to explore Hana. The host was very responsive and provided very useful accessories to make our trip a delight. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone.

We loved staying in the "Heart of Hana". It was the perfect stop on our tour or Maui, and we were glad we decided to stay 2 nights. The cottage was in a great location! It was secluded, peaceful, and clean. We loved the breezy lanai and the outdoor shower. We could see the ocean from the kitchen and enjoyed opening all the windows for some nice fresh air. The info booklet also provided some helpful tips for staying in Hana.  Thank you for a great stay!

I would highly recommend staying at the Cottage if you will be in the Hana area. It was a lovely place. It was clean and it stayed cool during the day and night. It had a full kitchen and a great deck. We cooked a number of our meals there. We stayed for three nights and we were so happy with the spot. One tip, if you are driving the road to Hana it is worth it to start very early in the morning, when there are less cars on the road. Thank you for having us!

Really beautiful space. Would suggest turning your car to the right at the bottom of the driveway and backing into your spot, because backing up the driveway is NOT fun!
Definitely get the A/C going in your bedroom, it took a bit to cool off when things were shut up during the day.

Make use of the great kitchen to save some money by preparing your own healthy meals! Full kitchen, except no dishwasher. (Not a problem)

Comfortable bed, nice sheets and towels. Other guests were quiet and respectful.
Neighbors dogs did keep me awake both nights with constant barking, as they would get other neighbor dogs started. I would think the owners should bring them in the house...this is not the property owners fault, but was frustrating as I’m here for classes and studying, and it was troublesome for that.

The space itself was nice, clean and functional. Owners were easy and helpful to communicate with.

Our stay at the cottage was everything we expected and more. The cottage is super cute and clean and there wasn’t a single bug inside! The cottage is also extremely well stocked and we were very comfortable there during our stay. The ocean view was great and having WiFi and cable was a bonus on the rainy days. I would highly recommend this cottage to anyone staying in Hana!
Petit cottage ravissant pour visiter hana. Équipement complet et hôte très sympa! N’hésitez pas !

Very spacious accommodations for a 1 bedroom cottage. Clean and well stocked with everything to cook, BBQ or go to beach. Bed was extra comfortable and neighborhood quiet. Enjoyed recommendations on food, beaches, activities. We would definitely stay again and if larger group, rent main house. Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay at Brook’s place. Great location close to the main amenities in Hana and perfect as a base for doing the road to Hana - we drove there and took our time with some stops on the first day, then went back and did the rest the next day - it was great not to have to rush and we loved the scenery and the drive! 

The cottage was comfortable, well equipped and had everything we needed! The bed was very soft and luxurious!
Everything we expected & more! Beautiful view of Hāna Bay with amazing amenities in a very chill town.

We absolutely loved staying at Brook's place. The cottage is nestled in the town of Hana, and it's just beautiful. The space is greatly decorated and includes all you need for your time visiting this part of Maui.  We really appreciated having the kitchen! It was perfect for what we needed. Also - the shower is amazing and the fluffy towels were just great :)

The cottage is just a short walk to the beach, restaurants and other great spots. We loved hiking up to Hagan's Cross at the top of the hill - and visiting the Red Sand Beach. 

Brook and Sarah were quick to answer any questions, and everything was just as they said it would be. When we get back to Maui - we hope to stay again!

We had a great stay during an overnight trip to Hāna. The cottage was super clean and had extra touches, like the fluffiest towels in the bathroom! Easy to find and easy to get in touch with owner. Overall, we’d recommend!

The cottage was amazing! It had everything we needed. We really enjoyed the outside shower. Made it easy to rinse off before going into the house. The location is great, just 5 minutes from Hana Bay. I cannot wait to stay here again. Thank you for making our Maui trip even better!

Brook’s cottage is very conveniently located in Hana, close to the shops, restaurants and beaches. It was a perfect base for us to explore the south side of the island. The space was ideal for a couple, comfy and clean.
We loved this airbnb, comfortable with everything you could need in Hana along with great views of the bay.  A perfect spot to explore the surrounding area!

Brook’s place is very cozy, nice and clean! With all the amenities you might need.
Very nice patio outside and close to nice beaches. That’s a great stop after the “road to Hana”.

The hosts are friendly and responsive.

We warmly recommend staying at this cottage.

First of all, for those considering the "Road to Hana," my wife and I recommend actually staying in Hana for a night or two. It's a beautifully quiet town where you can escape the crowds, eat delicious Thai food from a paper plate, and go to bed early in the pure darkness. And - this cottage provided the perfect jumping off point for our visit. It's right in the middle of town, so hikes, beaches, food trucks, convenience stores, and everything else are very easily accessible. It's clean and extremely comfortable (big, soft bed) but nothing over the top. It matches the vibe of Hana town perfectly. Loved it. Recommend!

The cottage was a great base for exploring Hana - which might be the most beautiful area on earth. Clean and comfortable and everything we needed. If only the drive there had fewer curves and switchbacks ;)
Brook’s place was great- private and perfect for 2!

Loved the space! Enjoyed the outdoor shower after exploring several nearby beaches. Great location for many "Road to Hana" stops. Check out Pipiwai Trail if you are going to Haleakala national park (Kipahulu district).
Loved our stay! All was spotlessly clean, comfy bed, linens and towels generously supplied, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom a/c, convenient location. Only regret is we didn’t stay longer!

Great cottage in a perfect location of Hana. House has everything you need, is super clean and cozy. Even great outdoor chilloutarea.
Would definitely stay with Brook again.

We enjoyed our stay here and it was super convenient for our trip around Maui. Self check-in is always nice, and the place felt pretty private. Super clean as well. Comfy bed, great bathroom. We love the outdoor deck/covered area. Nice to have A/C in the bedroom. Overall a well-run and thoughtful Airbnb listing!
What a great place to stay! great view of the water, and such a cute place. I recommend this place.
As advertised, clean, quiet, spacious.  Happy to have the AC in the bedroom.  Highly recommend if you want to spend a couple nights in Hana.

We LOVED our stay here. The cottage was extremely clean, had both bathroom and beach towels, WiFi, TV, and other amenities. The pictures posted don’t do the place justice— amazing stay and we highly recommend. I was thankful that a previous review recommended backing into the parking stall. The area is really tight and it was easy to maneuver if backing in since the driveway is steep. 10/10!

This private cottage is AMAZING. If you’re planning on doing the Road to Hana, do it over a few days and stay over here. The view is breathtaking and the space is perfect. We loved the deck with views of the ocean and Hana Bay. We’re so glad we found this little gem tucked away in a beautiful garden in Hana.
This was a great stay and location. Very old Hawaii!

Hands down ADORABLE and the definition of the perfect place to stay while soaking up Hana! Cozy, comfortable, and quiet. Even though there are other houses around you, you feel like you’re alone in a peaceful haven! The house has a lot of sweet touches and ungraded items that other places didn’t have....Think newer air conditioner, soft towels, and an amazingly comfortable bed, and the landscaping and privacy is simply beautiful! I could have moved in.... we just loved our little Hana cottage!! Wish could have stayed an extra day. We thought 2 days would be enough, but we could have stayed twice that and more! We didn’t want to leave Hana!!! 

Book and enjoy Hana... it will change your heart! It’s pure paradise
Lovely place with a convenient locationnin the heart of Hana.
Great location with view of Hana Bay.  Good instructions for arrival.  Close to everything you want to do and see in this area.

A very romantic cottage on the grounds of a larger house, overlooking Hana Bay. It is a great place for enjoying the Hana area. If you are just booking, realize a late flight onto Maui will put you driving the famed Hana Highway at night for the first time. Do a little research.
The Cottage at Hana is a beautiful place to stay.  Fully equipped with anything g you may need. Very clean and beautifully decorated.  Many amenities.  Highly recommended!
We enjoyed our two night stay at Brook’s place and its convenient location right off the Hana Highway. It’s a great spot to explore the area without trying to do it all in one day.

Wonderful, great view of the ocean!!! Great location- able to see the state park& national park waterfalls, travel the entire road system without cramming it into 1 day!!!! Had everything we needed!!!
We had a wonderful stay in Hana.  Location was great. Cottage was clean and had everything we needed.
Nice place

A home away from home in Hana. Sparkling clean with views of the ocean in the distance. The bamboo in the pictures have grown considerably, providing even more privacy from surrounding buildings on your private porch. Comfortable king size bed with nightstands, fast WiFi, and cable television. We spent 5 comfortable nights here, which was a long enough to leisurely explore the area such as Hamoa Beach, Kaihalulu Red Sand Beach, Waianapanapa State Park, and Pipiwai Trail; the AirBnB is within walking distance to Hana Bay Beach. Perfect amount of space for two people. Highly recommend!

name: North Shore Country Villa
summary: Brand New Luxury Country Villa With Ocean, Mountain & Horse Ranch Views sleep 12. Perfect For Families, With 4 Bedrooms each with King Size Beds, Great Lanai and Rec Room. Minutes from Turtle Bay, Sunset beach, Laniakea, Haleiwa and other famous North Shore beaches.
space: Brand New Luxury Country Villa With Ocean, Mountain & Horse Ranch Views sleep 12. Perfect For Families, With 4 Bedrooms and 3.5 baths, Great Lanai and Rec Room. Minutes from Turtle Bay, Sunset beach, Laniakea and other famous North Shore beaches.
description: Brand New Luxury Country Villa With Ocean, Mountain & Horse Ranch Views sleep 12. Perfect For Families, With 4 Bedrooms each with King Size Beds, Great Lanai and Rec Room. Minutes from Turtle Bay, Sunset beach, Laniakea, Haleiwa and other famous North Shore beaches. Brand New Luxury Country Villa With Ocean, Mountain & Horse Ranch Views sleep 12. Perfect For Families, With 4 Bedrooms and 3.5 baths, Great Lanai and Rec Room. Minutes from Turtle Bay, Sunset beach, Laniakea and other famous North Shore beaches. Exclusive villa for 10-12 people in a beautiful rural setting. Taxes: Airbnb does not collect the 15% taxes that the State of Hawaii imposes on short term rental guests.  These taxes are collected from you by us and passed along to the State of Hawaii.  For example if you pay $10,000 to Airbnb for a Villa rental you will owe an additional $1500 (15% of $10,000) which will need be paid to us with a credit card over the phone  or by check (30 days in advance).

host.host_about: Welcome .

reviews.comments:
We had a very relaxing time. The house e is very nicely done, with high ceilings and lots of warm wood cabinets and wood floors in the luxurious bedrooms. It is very quiet area yet near plenty of eating places, and right across a pretty secluded beach and beautiful mountains in the back.
The host was very accommodating and friendly.
Thank you Capt Ken!
Cpt Ken, was incredibly welcoming and immensely helpful! His villa was incredibly organized and the location was unbeatable! Would highly recommend staying here!

我觉得一切都太棒了,因为我们不喜欢去Honolulu 凑热闹,一直在北岸悠闲的度假,整个别墅非常新,让我们特别惊喜的是所有设施齐全的让你惊讶,还有中国人特别喜欢用的电饭煲,还有bose的便携音箱,可以带到海边,整个别墅的空调系统也非常棒｡开车十分钟就是一个超级大的食品超市food land, 你可以买到一切你想要的东西,比如李锦记酱油!!!还有重要的一点,房东本人就有旅游公司,可以安排任意一项旅游项目,因为我们时间有限,我老公和房东约好,下次来他带我们出海钓鱼!是不是太棒了,好期待｡其实还有很多好的地方,我因为时间有限,没有写出来,如果你和我们一样,是真正的度假,而不是去到处都是游客,尤其到处都是中国游客的地方凑热闹,购物,那就来这里吧,开始度假模式,而不是中国式的买买买旅游｡

If you're looking for a great hangout place for a larger group, just out of the bustle of the North Shore, but easy access to everything, this is a great option. You can hear the waves, grilling on the lanai, outfitted with everything you might need. Great appliances, nice bathrooms, and perfect layout for a group. Better for a few couples, or families with kids than a bunch of singles. (Note the checkout time.)

We got married at Loulu Palm on the North Shore, and we stayed here with our wedding party for three nights - the consensus was that it was probably the nicest, most amazing rental any of us had ever stayed in. The house was beautifully decorated, down to the artwork on the walls.

The house was stocked with just about every imaginable amenity you could need, from towels to glassware to 2 clothes steamers. Every single drawer and cupboard is labeled, making it super easy to find things.

Each of the bedrooms had excellent beds and were all well appointed. The master had one of the most incredible bathrooms ever. 

Location-wise, it sits on a ranch with a view of the ocean just past Kamehameha Highway. Turtle Bay is a few minutes East, and Ted's Bakery, Shark's Cove and Foodland, Sunset Beach, etc. a short drive West. A few of our guests took short walks to the water each morning, and it is incredible peaceful to sit on the lanai or balcony and listen to the waves.

We had to call Captain Ken just once because one of the key fobs to the gate wasn't working - it was a dead battery - but he picked up the phone after the first ring and couldn't have been friendlier.

Staying at this property made our wedding week even more memorable and I emphatically recommend staying here for any occasion you can justify. You will pick your jaw off the floor!

Capt Ken's place is exactly as described. It is beautifully decorated and has all the amenities needed. We used the bikes to take morning rides and enjoyed alot of time on the lanai. The caretaker was friendly and helpful. The location was ideal for our trip, with restaurants just down the road and a grocery store about a 15 minute drive away. If you are looking to get out of the city on your trip to Oahu, Ken's place is great for that.  If we ever need to be on the North Shore again, we will definitely try to stay here.

家は清潔で必要な物は全て揃っています｡ｳｪｲｸﾎﾞｰﾄﾞ､ｻｰﾌﾎﾞｰﾄﾞ､ﾗｲﾌｼﾞｬｹｯﾄ､ｼｭﾉｰｹﾙ､こども用のｳｫｰﾀｰｼｭｰｽﾞ､ﾋﾞｰﾁﾁｪｱ等､海関連用品も完璧です｡
家族で訪れましたが､夕方になると息子が家に帰りたいと言い､ｼﾞｬｸﾞｼﾞｰに入ったり､2階のｴｱｰﾎｯｹｰをしたり､自転車でｻｲｸﾘﾝｸﾞをしたり､ﾗﾅｲで飲みながらお喋りをしました｡
洗濯機､乾燥機が2個づつあり､助かりました｡
ｼｬｰｸｽｺｰﾌﾞへは車で10分､ﾊﾚｲﾜへは車で20分です｡
素敵な時間を過ごしました｡
ありがとうございました｡
Capt Ken’s place was amazing! Very very clean and spacious. I really enjoyed the north shore.

name: Honua Kai - Hokulani 414 -One Bed partial Ocean View| Sleeps: 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom
summary: Maui Westside Presents: Honua Kai - Hokulani 414 - One Bedroom Ocean & Mountain Views!
space: OCEAN VIEW - HOKULANI 414 1 BD/1BA ON THE QUIET SOUTH SIDE! Best one bedroom plan available with bright southern exposure. Only steps to the water and beach from this prime unit. Enjoy partial ocean and sunset views from the Lanai on this beautifully relaxing vacation home. Best yet, as you are on a green belt, you are joined by songbirds each morning as you drink your Kona coffee on the lanai watching the morning sun hit the tops of the trees and make its way from the mountains to the ocean. Truly beautiful! This popular One Bedroom/one bath unit faces south with some partial ocean views from the lanai. This condo has beautiful granite countertops in the kitchen and ensuite with glass doors that fold and open up the walls of the condo on to the lanai. Other amenities include your own washer/dryer. THIS CONDO HAS A NESPRESSO COFFEE MACHINE FOR YOUR SPECIAL MORNING COFFEE! Relax on the lanai after a day of snorkeling or swimming at the beautiful sandy beach right in front of the complex

Best one bedroom plan available with bright southern exposure. Only steps to the water and beach from this prime unit. house_rules: LEASE RATES Rates and minimum stay requirements may vary.  We reserve the right to change any rates quoted prior to issuing a reservation confirmation.  Rates are based on occupancy requirements.  Additional guests must be approved, and may incur an additional charge. TAX The State of Hawaii mandates a tax be charged on all transient accommodations. Hawaii State Transient Accommodations Tax is currently 9.25% and The Hawaii State General Excise Tax is 4.166%.  Taxes are identified in your reservation confirmation. ON-ISLAND CONTACT Maui Westside Properties is the property manager and your on-island contact for this rental property  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Please contact us with any issues or questions while on Maui. AMENITIES We provide fully furnished accommodations.  Telephones, televisions, kitchen utensils, dishes and linens are supplied for you within your rental unit as well as bath amenities.  We provide a starter supply of paper goods, cleaning products, soaps and ameni

host.host_about: MAUI WESTSIDE PROPERTIES manages this property on behalf of the owner.  We are a FULLY LICENSED and LEGAL Property Management Company and Real Estate Brokerage firm – license #RB-21121.  We are 5 minutes from the resort and are on property daily.   We are located ON MAUI – not somewhere on the Mainland with a local handyman or cleaning lady letting you in to your condo.  We PERSONALLY GREET each and every guest at the resort,  get you checked in and ESCORT YOU TO YOUR CONDO.  We are ALWAYS AVAILABLE to you during your stay with us to answer any questions or address any issues.

reviews.comments:
We were very happy with our stay! The location had everything we could have possibly wanted with all the beach gear that we would need. Plus having an in-unit washer and dryer when we have a one-year-old was a life saver. 

The property overall had everything we needed with multiple pools including one wading pool that was only half a foot, that went over well with our baby who crawled around in it every day. 

Communication from the staff couldn't have been better as they were on top of everything from before our stay until checkout.

Nice condo with great layout. King sized bed was very comfortable. The lanai is nice, not too sunny, with partial ocean view. The kitchen could be better equipped and the shower could be cleaner. 

Overall a nice condo with great pool area.
Super Lage und toll ausgestattet. War auch alles sauber. Würden wir wieder machen.

Great experience! Would highly recommend. Only suggestion is I hoped we would have clarified check in a bit more as I did not have cell phone plan and only access to wifi and I didn't know exactly how we were checking in but received a quick response from Walt and his team once I got to the resort. I also found they were very strict on the 11 am check out, which I wish they allowed for 30 min or so grace, as it was a bit difficult managing with an infant but we made it. I would recommend booking an extra day for departure to allow for more time if needed if your departure flight leaves at 9 or 10pm and you have little ones.
Thanks! Will definitely be back :)

It was very clean, spacious and comfortable. The condo offers a resort like feel with multiple hot tubs and pools. It also provided access to the beach. Tracy was great with responding to questions. There is a bar restaurant on site and a few places close by to eat.

name: LITERA 2 PERSONAS
summary: Piso delante de un parque amplio, a una calle y media del Hospital de Sant Pau.  Barrio muy bueno y tranquilo. Con todas las comodidades, servicios, supermercados, tiendas, paradas de metro, autobús en la misma calle y servicio de Bicing. Bebedores y personas ruidosas, abstenerse. En los timbres, dice ENTRESOL, la puerta es la 6 y en el ascensor se debe pulsar la E. Es el primer piso por encima del hall.
space: PRECIO PARA DOS PERSONAS POR NOCHE. Habitación pequeña con litera para dos personas -  NO HAY OPCION A NINGUN HUESPED ADICIONAL - ESTANCIAS CORTAS - HAY VENTILADOR. Apto para  turistas que quieran dormir por un precio moderado en una ciudad muy cara.  Habitación muy agradable y tranquila totalmente equipada. Es una zona muy buena y tranquila. Está a medio camino de la Sagrada Familia y el Parque Güell. Hay todo tipo de tiendas grandes y pequeñas, tambien un pequeño mercado muy cerca.
description: Piso delante de un parque amplio, a una calle y media del Hospital de Sant Pau.  Barrio muy bueno y tranquilo. Con todas las comodidades, servicios, supermercados, tiendas, paradas de metro, autobús en la misma calle y servicio de Bicing. Bebedores y personas ruidosas, abstenerse. En los timbres, dice ENTRESOL, la puerta es la 6 y en el ascensor se debe pulsar la E. Es el primer piso por encima del hall. PRECIO PARA DOS PERSONAS POR NOCHE. A las zonas a compartir están totalmente equipadas para que la estancia sea cómoda. La cocina tiene tod
neighborhood_overview: Situado en un edificio bonito, con gente buena y tranquila. Al lado mismo del Pº Maragall y del Hospital de Sant Pau. Delante de un parque al que ir a tomar el sol, leer, descansar y relajarse.
notes: En lugar de comprar billetes sencillos de autobus-metro-tren, pueden comprar un bono combinado de 10 viajes que sale mucho más barato, para poder moverse y hacer transbordos durante una hora y quince minutos sin  problemas entre los distintos modos de transporte. (Hay diferentes zonas para poder ir más cerca o lejos con el tren). Ahora existe el servicio de metro desde el aeropuerto. Se debe coger el metro hasta la parada Zona Universitaria bajar en la parada COLLBLANC y ahí transbordar hasta la parada CAMP DE L'ARPA, Linea V (azul) dirección VALL D'EBRON.  Tambien se puede tomar el tren hasta Sants Estació y coger el metro Linea V (azul) dirección VALL HEBRON y bajar tambien en CAMP DE L'ARPA.
transit: Por delante de casa pasan nueve líneas de autobus que conectan con el resto de la ciudad muy rápidamente. A una calle y media tenemos dos líneas de metro distintas: La azul y la amarilla. Paradas: Camp de L'Arpa y Hospital de Sant Pau-Sant Quintí.
access: A las zonas a compartir están totalmente equipadas para que la estancia sea cómoda. La cocina tiene todos los útiles necesarios para hacer desayunos, comidas, etc., cuando lo necesiten.
interaction: Compartir alojamiento con gente local es más calido y hogareño.  Haré todo lo que esté a mi alcance para informarles, ayudarles  y facilitarles toda la información sobre la ciudad para poder disfrutar de Barcelona.
house_rules: Cuando la llegada del vuelo sea tarde en la noche, se dará dos horas de margen para la llegada al domicilio. A partir de ese tiempo, no se esperará más a los viajeros, a no ser que haya un motivo justificado de retraso.  Tanto para la ropa que llega sucia como la que se va usando en la estada, no podrá lavarse ni en el baño ni en la cocina. Al lado del edificio donde vivo, hay una lavanderia. Trato amable y cordial de convivencia basado en el respeto mutuo. Puerta principal siempre cerrada con llave. Luces apagadas si no son necesarias. Consumo de agua moderado.  Dejar los espacios comunes igual como  lo encuentren: Recogido y limpio. Respetar el silencio, sobretodo en horas nocturnas. Pensar el el prójimo. .

reviews.comments:
Eleanor, была очень гостеприимна, мы с ней переписывались о деталях моего прилета, она подробно описала, как удобнее всего добраться до города и встретила меня около метро.
Все трудности перевода были легко решены с помощью (Hidden by Airbnb) -Translate.
Eleanor дала мне ключи от квартиры и была абсолютно не против того чтобы я возвращался далеко за полночь.
Вас ждет небольшая, но уютная комната, карта метро и города, полотенца, гель для душа, питьевая вода, персональная чашка и что-нибудь к чаю.
Расположение очень удобное: метро находится в трех минутах хотьбы, рядом есть продуктовые магазины и кафе. Место идеально для начала пешего исследования города.
Een erg vriendelijke vrouw met een keurig huis. De kamer is niet erg groot maar in Barcelona zal je toch weinig binnen zitten. Verder is bijna alles aanwezig wat je nodig hebt voor een paar dagen.

De buurt is wel prima. Vlakbij Sagrada Familia en 5min lopen naar de metro. Toch is er in de buurt zelf niet veel te doen. 
Leonor spreekt alleen Spaans en geen woord Engels. Ze is eigenlijk altijd thuis en dus ook aanwezig in de gedeelde woonkamer. De slaapkamer zelf is echt heel klein. Er staat een stapelbed en er is een kast om je kleren in op te hangen/leggen. Er is wel een raam, maar hierdoor komt geen zonlicht, waardoor het donker en benauwd is. Ook zit dit raam naast een schacht, waardoor je muziek en gepraat van de buren hoort. De badkamer is ook klein (gedeeld) maar wel prima.
Leonor es una excelente host! Muy agradable y gentil! Siempre estuvo muy dispuesta a ayudarnos y a hacernos sentir cómodos. Más que recomendada :)
Very nice hostess and very good location :)

Simplemente genial, la anfitriona muy muy atenta y amable, me llevo una amiga!! La zona práctica y tranquila estaba muy bien comunicada. Al llegar nos recibió con algo de beber y picar .. Se agradece!! Perfecto para dormir y descansar.

Es un piso muy cerca al centro, y se puede usar el metro con mucho facilidad, tambien es cerca.  Solo en en el primer piso, que es bueno para maletas largas.  Es un piso pequeño, pero tiene todo que necesite.  Ella tambien es una mujer simpática, y relajada.

The apartment is in a nice location, close to the Sagrada Familia, and also easily reached by metro (10-15 min walk) or bus.  The apartament is small, but also well-sized and she allows access to her appliances, which is kind.  She's a nice older lady.
Very good person..she helps whit city information and touristic places. The bedroom its ok, small one bit enough if you re just looking for a place to sleep and let your things
Little room but tidy and clean. Leonor is very nice. She will help you for everything you need. Thanks Leonor.
Очень приятная хозяйка, отзывчивая. Старалась обеспечить максимально комфортное проживание. Всё супер!
Habitación chica pero el piso es bien ubicado y Leonor es muy agradable

Leonor is a very kind old lady, she helped us with the tourist information and offered us drinks. Her apartment is in the central part of the city and near both the railway and bus station. I think the only disadvantage is the apartment is too small, if you don't mind this, it's a good choice to live here.
Leonor was a really friendly host and she was really helpful and kind to us. The apartment was fine and it had everything we needed. We loved staying there and would do it again. Thank you
Leonor is a very warm and good host. She was ready to help whenever needed. The room is quite cosy, very clean and as described. The location is well close to metro and bus both.
El piso de Leonor es cómodo para las personas que van a dormir y disfrutar del turismo que ofrece la ciudad de Barcelona, a tan solo unos minutos de La Sagrada Familia lo hace perfecto.
She was a nice host so nice and helpful will come again
Buena relación calidad precio, el trato perfecto, y cerca del metro
Muchas Gracias! We had a very good time in Barcelona. Leonor was always helpful and friendly.

Such an amazing place to stay when you visit Barcelona. Leonor truly goes above and beyond to make your stay at her place one to remember. 
Her place is located a walking distance from two metro lines that has easy access to the city. 
The room is extremely clean and so are the showers which I appreciated. 
Leonor also provided us with the map of the metro and the city. The city map was extremely helpful!

Leonor fue muy atenta con nosotros. Es encantadora. Nos dio información de la zona y nos preparo refrescos para combatir el calor. La habitación era justo lo que necesitamos, un espacio privado con intimidad y apañado. La casa estaba muy limpia. Por lo general muy correcto y recomendable.

とても快適に過ごせました｡
到着すると冷たい飲み物を用意して下さっており､暑さで疲れていた私たちにはとても有難かったです｡
また､ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅ市内の地図や朝食用に軽食やｼﾞｭｰｽも用意して下さっていました｡
小ぢんまりとしていましたが､室内もとても清潔でした｡
私たちにとっては鍵の開け閉めが少し難しかったので､事前に実際に開閉して教えてもらっておけば良かったな､という反省点はあります｡
総じてとても良い滞在でした｡
本当にありがとうございました｡

Leonor was wonderful! We had an amazing time at her place and she was incredibly helpful with the transportation and showing us where to go! 
She had a lovely little apartment very close to the Sagrada Familia. The room is small but wonderful.
Hôte sympathique et bien communiquante malgré la barrière de la langue !
Hote très gentille et accueillante. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans son appartement. Nous avons beaucoup aprécié les boissons au frais et le petit déjeunez. Merci beaucoup Leonor :)
Леонор добрая и пунктуальная женщина. Сразу все объяснила и показала. Расположение хорошее, рядом метро и магазины.

The house is in a nice part of the city. Everything is quite affordable around the house and very close to Sagrada Familia. 
Leonor is a very nice lady though she doesnt speak english, we communicated easily.

Leonor is a friendly and helpful hostess, she provides maps of the city and public transport, gives advise about tickets to the sightseeing objects. Despite the fact that she doesn't speak English, there is a possibility to communicate via translation apps. 
The location of the flat is quite good because you can reach Sagrada Familia by foot and use metro (the station is near) to visit other places. However the flat itself has some drawbacks. The windows open to shafts between the walls, which means that there is almost no daylight, lack of fresh air and you hear various noises from the neighbours around. There was no air conditioner (a mistake in the description), but there was a fan in the room. Also, without the Leonor there were two more people living (difficult to say - it was  other guests or relatives of hostess). The good thing, there were some snacks and cold drinks provided. Also, the flat was clean and tidy. 
All in all, the place is okay for a short stay if you only need to have a place to rest after the day.

Habitación pequeña pero con un cómodo y gran armario.
El departamento está limpio y Leonor es una gran anfitriona, nos proporcionó mapas, toallas y siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos.

Leonor byla výborná hostitelka. Měli jsme velký problém se zaparkováním auta v Barceloně (což jsme čekali) a ona sama od sebe zjistila možnosti a poradila nám. Byt byl ve všech směrech v pořádku, nicméně nemůžu to hodnotit extra do hloubky, ptž jsme se tam chodili jen vysprchovat a vyspat a celou dobu jsme chodili po Barceloně :-) Obrovským bonusem bydlení u Leonor je lokalita bytu, pěšky cca 10min od Sagrada Família.
La casa de Leonor es espectacular, el cuarto es perfecto para dos personas. No es tan cerca del centro pero para el precio está muy bien. Gracias por todo Leonor!
Parfait

Leonor est très gentille et nous avons réussi à nous comprendre malgré la barrière de langue.  Grande hospitalité et petites attentions bien que nous n'étions pas présents souvent dans le logement lors de notre séjour.  Propreté impeccable et logement situé près d'une station de métro.
房东人很好

This is a perfect place for getting into the city, easily, and within a 20minute walk. Leonor is very helpful, she gave us a map of Barcelona and a metro map which were both very handy, and use of her kitchen, and living space, which we really needed, as the bedroom is incredibly small. If you’re anything but a light packer, you’ll have trouble as the room is a squeeze, if it’s not just you. There were 2 of us sharing the space, and we found it tight. But the overall experience was great.

Leonor’s place is in a really great location (close to many touristy things but out of the way enough that it doesn’t feel overwhelming). She was a very kind host and was very helpful and accomodating. Would definitely recommend staying here
Room was tiny, but Leonor was great! Apartment is locate near Sagrada Familia, It's Next to metro stop, strongly raccomanded for 3/4 days holiday
Muy buena atención por parte de Leonor, muchos detalles (mapa, cafe, bebidas, etc). El tiempo que pasamos en el piso fue agradable y esta muy bien situado.

Leonor est une personne formidable qui nous a accueilli chez elle malgré notre demande à la dernière minute. Le logement est très bien entretenu et proche de boutique, restaurant et d'une station de métro rendant les déplacement en ville faciles. Vous aurez en plus la chance d'être juste à côté de la Sagrada Familia quon peut atteindre à pied en 5 minutes. Mais le véritable point fort de notre séjour à été l'hospitalité de Leonor qui a été aux petits soins avec nous et qui n'a pas hésité à nous donner des conseils et les bonnes adresses du coin pour se garer et pour manger. Nous gardons notamment en mémoire un superbe restaurant qu'elle nous a conseillé. Je la recommande vivement !

Thank you so much for having us! We had a very pleasant stay with Leonor. Great hospitality and location, very affordable and she was super helpful with navigating the area. The air in the room was a little stuffy though, and someone always seemed to be smoking right outside the window but other than that it was great!:)

Отличное расположение - рядом с метро. Напротив - лавка с фруктами и супермаркет.
Комната маленькая, но для двоих, уходящих рано и возвращающихся поздно - отлично! Квартира уютная.
Леонор - прекрасная испанская женщина! Сок, молоко, хлопья, чай/кофе - всем угостила Леонор. Спасибо! Было приятно у неё остановиться!
Aunque la casa no es muy grande está bien para pasar un par de días. Además Leonor es muy atenta, agradable y detallista y te ayuda en todo lo que puede.
Casa pequeña pero muy practica y apañada. Leonor muy amable y hospitalaria, en todo momento te hace sentir como en casa.

Я с другом был у Леонор 6 дней. Благодарны ей за предоставленные удобства. Квартира чистая со всеми удобствами. Находится в центре. Рядом есть продуктовые магазины, метро (3 минуты пешком), автобусная остановка. За 30 минут можно подняться на самую лучшую смотровую площадку “бункер Эль Кармель” откуда открывается великолепный вид на весь город. :)

Leonor was a great hostess! Provided us with maps of the city, the apartment was spotless, she even offered us access to some items in the refrigerator. She was accommodating, allowing us to check in a bit earlier than expected. She speaks only Spanish but this was not a problem as she mostly kept to herself the whole time besides giving us the keys and showing the apartment. Overall great stay and would stay again. :)
Good clean room. Very small tho

사진보다는 어두운 공간
친절한 주인!
Bien accueillis avec tous les renseignements nécessaires. L'appartement était très propre et bien situé.
Хорошее месторасположение, приятная хозяйка

Although the room is small,it’s clean and warm, Leonor is kind and we can communicate very well.in barcelona it’s conveniente to take bus and metro
I would like to introduce this room to you
Leonor es muy simpática, nuestra estancia en su casa fue genial !

Leonor ist sehr gastfreundlich. Die Lage der Wohnung ist optimal 
Sowohl mit der Metro als auch zu Fuß kommt man gut ins Zentrum. 
Für jeden kurzen Städte-Trip in Barcelona die perfekte Unterkunft.

Leonor es una barcelonesa encantadora, os ayudará en todo lo que pueda. 
Ha sido un placer haber estado en su casa.

name: IPANEMA BEACH, LOW PRICES, JANUARY AND FEBRUARY!
summary: CARNIVAL CHECK THE PRICE, MINIMUM OF 5 DAYS.MINIMUM 3 PERSONS. One block from Ipanema beach and 4 blocks from Copacabana beach. One block from General Osorio Metrô (Subway). ONE BEDROOM  WITH A BATHROOM INSIDE (SUITE) WITH A LED TV 32', A DOBLE BED AND TWO SINGLE BEDS. THE SECOND BEDROOM ,  A LITTLE ONE, WITH ONE SINGLE BED AND A LITTLE BUT COMPLETE BATHROOM IN FRONT.  We have WI-FI.. Wash machine. Secure and peaceful building. 24/7 doorman. OPTIONAL: AIR CONDITIONING.
space: APARTMENT WITH 2 BEDROOMS ONE WITH A BATHROOM INSIDE  (SIUTE) WITH A LED TV 32' , A DOBLE BED AND 2 SINGLE BEDS AND THE OTHER,  A LITTLE ONE, WITH A SINGLE BED AND  A LITTLE BATHROOM  INFRONT. The apartment Is conveniently located in Ipanema. Near Arpoador beach,one block of Ipanema Beach, General Osório Metro stop, 500 mts of Copacabana beach and all the night life and restaurants in a short walk away. It is located on a very quiet and safe  street.  The building is safe with 24/7  doorman at the entrance. 1º bedroom (suite, with bathroom inside the bedroom) comfortable , It's well furnished with a double bed and two single beds,  has a high definition flat screen TV 32' with TV cable  and a completly private bathroom, with hot water. 2º BEDROOM: A  SMALL  ROOM)  (on the back), WITH A SINGLE BED WITH WINDOW, CEILING FAN , WITH A LITTLE BUT COMPLETE BATHROOM IN FRONT. I’ll provide bed linen and shower towels. We have  also a couch and a mattress or airbed (optional), in the living room

neighborhood_overview: BEYOND THE BEACHES OF IPANEMA AND ARPOADOR , THERE'S THE  "GENERAL OSÓRIO" SQUARE AND SUBWAY, ONE BLOCK FROM THE APARTMENT.  A GREAT SUPER-MARKET "ZONA SUL" IS IN THE CORNER OF THE STREET.
notes: CHECK PRICES FOR CARNIVAL . GAY FRIENDLY.
transit: ONE BLOCK FROM THE APARTMENT , ON "GENERAL OSÓRIO" SQUARE, IS THE  METRO AND YOU ALSO CAN GET  BUS TO ALL LOCATIONS OF THE CITY
access: THE GUESTS WILL BE RENTING ALL THE APARTMENT.
interaction: WE ARE ALWAYS AVAILABLE TO HELP, FOR ANY PROBLEM, AT ANY TIME OF DAY OR NIGHT BY CELLPHONE.
house_rules: VISITORS NOT ALLOWED NO PARTIES. Por favor sempre manter cozinha ARRUMADA, jogue maneira seu lixo, o lixo orgânico em um saco plástico, na lixeira na frente do elevador e o não orgânico em um saco na escada. TODOS OS PROBLEMAS CAUSADOS PELO (S) HÓSPEDE (S) PARA O CONDOMÍNIO, UMA TAXA SERÁ COBRADA DO DEPÓSITO DE SEGURANÇA. POR FAVOR, NÃO FAÇA BARULHO DURANTE A LEI DO SILÊNCIO (22:00-08:00)

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
SOU CANTORA, COMPOSITORA, CASADA, COM CADU NOLLA, PRODUTOR, TÉCNICO DE SOM E BATERISTA.
VIVEMOS NO RIO DE JANEIRO. ADORAMOS VIAJAR E CANTAR.
 TEMOS UMA BANDA DE ROCK: "KYNNA".
GOSTAMOS MUITO DE IR À PRAIA E ESTAR COM AMIGOS. 
SE QUISER SABER MAIS SOBRE NÓS, ENTRE EM NOSSO  PERFIL NO FACE: CADU NOLLA OU LILIAN KNAPP

WE LIVE IN RIO ONE OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL CITIES IN THE WORLD!!
And where do you want to go? Rio is the #1 place to be, according to The New York Times
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

SEJA MUITO BEM VINDO!!!

WELCOME!!! 

CADU E LILIAN.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: I have stayed with my 2 friends at Lili and Cadu' s apartment during the Carnival in Rio. We have had an amazing stay. Lili and Cadu were very nice and helpful, they took a great care of us and helped us to book tours and Carnival tickets too. The location of the apartments is wonderful / just one block from Ipanema beach. We liked Ipanema beach much better than Copacabana, even though it was not far from Copa neither. Good restaurants and bars around. Busy place. We have enjoyed our holidays a lot. The apartment might be a bit small for 3 ppl, we managed well cause we were friends that know each other well.. So i would suggest the place for 2ppl maximum.. Anyhow we are all still in touch with Lili and Cadu, we became great friends. Thank you very much. Blanka

Lillian is a very good host. Our stay was very comfortable at the apt. The best part is the location and that it is very close to Ipanema beach. The host is very responsive and ready to help with anything. Definitely recommended. I ll certainly go back there next time.

Una experiencia única! Desde el momento de llegada fuimos recibidas de la mejor manera! Una pareja de anfitriones súper dulce y atenta! Nos brindaron lo mejor y con la mejor predisposición en todo momento...el departamento comodísimo a una sola cuadra de la playa!!!! todo un lujo!!!! todo tipo de negocios solo a pasos.....nos sentimos muy felices y cómodas durante toda nuestra estadía!! Espero poder volver pronto a Rio! es un lugar hermoso y con infinitas cosas para conocer y disfrutar! y sin dudas volveré al departamento de Lilian y Cadu!! Fue un placer hospedarnos con Uds!!! son personas muy lindas!!! No duden en confiar en (Website hidden by Airbnb) se van a arrepentir!!! Gracias una vez más por haber sido parte de unas excelentes vacaciones!!! Cariños!!!!!!
we had a great stay in Rio and mainly because of this lovely appartment in this great neighbourhood 300m from the ipanema beach... we can really recommend this appartment to anyone!

Having travelled to Rio on a whim and on a budget, we found hotels and hostels way out of budget.  Luckily someone told us about airbnb.com so we decided to have a look for a nice apartment near both beaches with a kitchen and all the mod-cons.  We found exactly that! The apartment is on the 9th floor in a complex and only a few hundred yards from Ipanema beach, and a 5 minute walk from Copacabana. There is also a 24/7 supermarket opposite the apartment.  The kitchen is reasonable and clean, a nice big lounge with cable TV and a comfy little bedroom with cupboard space and A/C.  There is one queen size bed which is fine for 2-people sharing and a single bed with an extra pull-out for a 4th person.  However, i think the room is at max, best for 3 people (we are 3 big guys).  The best part is the hotel-standard en-suite bathroom and shower. very nice!  
Cadu and Lilian were extremely helpful and made our short stay really helpful, recommending all the best sites, prices and good times to visit.  They also came to change the linen and towels whilst we were out which was really nice.
At the time we stayed there was also another (very pleasant) girl living in her own room with her own bathroom so just keep that in mind in case you want big parties etc.
Wholeheartedly recommend this apartment, and will definitely be coming back the next time i visit Rio!
Thanks Lilian and Cadu!

PASAMOS LAS MEJORES VACACIONES EN RIO! ESTUVIMOS DEL 6 AL 11 DE JULIO  EN EL DEPARTAMENTO DE LLIAN Y CADU ES EXCELENTE LA UBICACIÒN RE CERCA DE LA PLAYA RE ACCESIBLE A COLECTIVOS SUPERMENCADOS Y LUGARES PARA SALIR A COMER! LO SUPER RECOMIENDO EL DEPARTAMENTO TIENE TODO ES RE COMPLETO, Y NI HABLAR DE LOS ANFITRIONES! SON LO MAS NOS RECIBIERON RE BIEN SON MUY CALIDOS Y ATENTOS NO HICIERON SENTIR COMO EN CASA. TAMBIEN RECOMIENDO QUE PRUEBEN LAS VIANDAS DE CADU COCINA SUPER!!!!
ESPERO PODAMOS VOLVER PRONTO !!!

We loved our stay at Lilian's place. The apartment was in an ideal location and was nicely furnished and well set up. We would highly recommend this to anyone wanting an alternative to a hotel or hostel. Lilian and Cadu could not have been more friendly or welcoming either! Thanks so much.

Lilian and Cadu have been very nice to me, helpful and kind!
Their appartament is clean, tidy and perfectly located: very close to the beach of Ipanema and also to a practical supermarket, ground trasportation and the metro. Very important thing: the apartament has hot shower which is not so easy to found everywhere + Lilian speaks English  (the majority of Brasilian people don't!) so it is easy to comunicate. I would certainly reccomand this place as a great option for a great stay in Rio!!

Muchas gracias Cadu y Lilian!! han sido geniales con nosotras!! Nos recibieron super bien!! y el departamento esta excelentemente ubicado: 2 cuadras de la playa, enfrente al supermercado, proximo a bares, restaurantes, y todo los transportes! Un apartamento limpio, muy comodo y con seguridad! Recomendablee!

In a walking distance from Ipanema beach, close to restaurants, markets, shops, and very well connected to the rest of the city, Lilian and Kadu’s flat is the perfect place to start your love affair with Rio de Janeiro, “a cidade maravilhosa”. Lilian and Kadu welcomed us so warmly that we immediately felt “at home”. As the Brazialian poet and diplomatic Vinicius de Moraes wrote once “Life is the art of encounter”. We hope to meet Lilian and Kadu again, either in Brazil or in Italy...Rome is waiting for you guys.

Thank you Lilian!!!

My girlfriend and I stayed in Lilian's apartment for a week in September and were made to feel right at home. The apartment is spacious, clean and most of all, in an incredible location!

I will definitely be staying with Lilian when we return to Rio (it can't come soon enough!).

Thanks so much

Qualquer viajante sempre deseja se sentir em casa mesmo longe do seu lar, mas o final de semana que eu passei no apartamento da Lilian e do Cadu foi diferente. Em um apartamento muito organizado, com um quarto agradável e ótima localização, acabei me sentindo em casa. Os anfitriões extremamente preocupadas e atenciosos fizeram a diferença.
Espero revê-los em breve!
L'appartement est très bien situé à Ipanema et à proximité de copacabana. La plage n'est qu'à quelques minutes à pied. Le bâtiment a un portier permettant l'accès à toute heure.

The apartment was just perfect. It is 2 minutes walking from the beach away, in a nice neighborhood with restaurants and supermarkets. 

The room was very clean with enough space for all our stuff. It's a tv there and a huge wardrobe. We could also use the kitchen and the living room. We stayed here one week and enjoyed it really much! 

Lilian and Cadu are nice and uncomplicated! At the day of our departure could we stay till afternoon in the room and could also leave our luggage till evening at the apartment. 
Thanks a lot!

my first experience with airbnb and i must say it was everything and even more what i've expected. the communication with lilian was prompt and helpful. our hosts waited for me at odd hours to welcome me to my new apartment. i couldn't ask for a better location! it's located near the best beach in rio - ipanema, lots of corner eateries and nice restaurants. but at the same time conveniently hidden in a family like, quiet street in the center of ipanema. nearby ipanema metro station is a big bonus! i would highly recommend lilian's and cadu's place for any kind of traveller.
Lilian es muy amable y divertida. El departamento es confortable y la ubicación óptima: muy cerca de la playa, del metro y de un supermercado. Seguramente, volveremos
Excelente estadia. La ubicacion es perfecta, los ambientes muy comodos y amplios. Teniamos todo lo necesario para hacer de un viaje perfecto. Gracias lilian por todo!

I was very lucky that I've found this true gem, and delighted to stay at Lilian's apartment!
First of all, from the beginning inquiry to stay,  the experience of communication with Lilian was so kind and welcoming. She has provided me with all the information regarding the apartment, as well as with the comprehensive guide on how to get to the apartment from the airport. Lilian and Cadu have kindly checked me in despite on my late arrival. The welcome to Rio chocolate gift was such a sweet touch!
Then, the apartment itself exceeded all my expectations - it was located very close to Ipanema beach (Posto 8, Aproador rock), as well as in 10 minutes from Copacabana beach. There are lots of different shops and restaurants in the area, bus stops and a metro station. The building was on a safe and quite street with 24/7 doorman. We could use living room and a private bedroom with en-suite bathroom, sharing the kitchen with a fridge, dishes, and a drinking water. Lilian was so nice to provide even the separate kitchen towel for us.
The bed was comfortable, aircon was working well, cable TV with various channels, and the room was overall very clean when I've arrived. Bed linens and towels provided to us were also of a good quality and condition. Apartment has everything you need to stay. 
Again, I can't fully describe how I feel happy to find this place during the high season of Carnival for such a great rate, but most of all I was blessed to meet such nice and talented persons like Lilian and Cadu. 
I wish I could stay longer, and I hope I will come back to Rio again and again, meet Lilian and Cadu, and stay at this apartment =) Obrigada!!! xx
très bon emplacement, appartement propre, ras.

A few friends and I stayed in Lilian and Cadu's apartment for the first week of the world cup. From the beginning it was a great experience. Lilian was very good with communicating and answering any questions before we got there. When we got there the apartment was very clean and just as it was described. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone that is going to visit Rio. It is very close to all the different attractions you would want to see and within walking distance to all the great beaches. Thanks Lilian for all the help and information you provided! It helped make our trip even better than we imagined!

My wife and me love this little apartment. It was just as advertised. One block from Ipanema beach, Zona Sul (24hr open supermarket) and General Osorio Metro Station. Doormans were helpful and friendly. Hope we will return soon. Thanks Lilian and Cadu!

Hola yo le doy 5 estrellas de 5  les comento a todos la verdad que nos sentimos como en casa el aviso describe tal como es el departamento, la ubicación inmejorable a 200 mts de la playa de Ipanema y a 500 mts de Copacabana. La plaza del barrio ahí nomas con muchos colectivos y el metro. Realmente para recomendar

El departamento es tal cual se describe en las fotos. Esta a 100 mts de playa de ipanema, cerca de bares, supermarkets etc. Optima localizacion. Esta muy limpio y bien cuidado. Lilian y Cadu son muy simpaticos y amables, definitivamente para recomendar si vas a RJ.

Staying at Lilian's place was great! The location was perfect - quick walk to the beach, metro, and bus stops. The place was exactly as advertised. They were also very helpful with giving us tips on where to go and helping out in whichever way they could.

La verdad es que el departamento es mejor que en las fotos, para dos personas como en nuestro caso era enorme con todas las comodidades que puede tener!!! La ubicación de lo mejor a dos cuadras de la playa y a dos cuadras de la estación Gral. Osorio cuenta con seguridad las 24hs., muchas lineas de colectivos para ir a donde quieras, frente a un supermercado y muchos lindos bares y restaurantes, Cadu super amable atento a todo, se preocupo por nosotros el primer día porque llegamos tarde por el trafico, siempre atento bien dispuesto dando buenos consejos sobre los lugares que ver en Río, es nuestra segunda vuelta por esa hermosa ciudad y seguramente habrá una tercera y ya sabemos en donde alojarnos, Gracias LIlian y Cadu por abrir las puertas de su hermoso departamento!!!

Lilian & Cadu were exclusively kind to me and helped with most of the questions in Rio. The apartment was clean, full of all necessary equipment and I guess this is the best location, 'cause you can either get fast to Ipanema beach or Copacabana.

The good:

Location is close to Ipanema. I liked going to the part of the beach closest to the apartment. It's very close to a grocery store as well.

The ok:

The main bed is decently comfortable, but it was too small for us ( a skinny and not that tall couple). The other bed in the master bedroom was extremely stiff.

The bad:

Hosts didn't really take ownership over issues that came up and didn't seem very experienced with airbnb hosting.

Specifically...

I was surprised to find an open bag of sugar in a cupboard, because in this part of Brazil, that results in tons of ants.

There was scheduled maintenance on the apartment that resulted in electricity being out for an entire day, which they did not know about and thus failed to mention. They didn't offer any compensation and considered it not their fault.

The kitchen sink barely drained, but "it was fine when they left"

The apartment is perfectly located (right next to Ipanema beach, very close to the subway and many bus stops). It looks just like the photos and fit myself and 2 friends very comfortably. The apartment is located on a very safe block with a large security gate and 24hr friendly doormen. Lilian and Cadu have thought of every detail: fast wifi, kitchen water filter, etc. which makes for a very comfortable stay.

I arrived close to midnight on a Saturday and was met by Lilian and Cadu's niece, Luisa, who kindly showed me the details of the apartment.

Lilian was very responsive before and during my stay. 

I highly recommend the apartment!

Our hosts, Lilian and Cadu, were waiting for us when we arrived from the airport. They accommodated our early arrival and we were truly grateful for this. If you need tips or advice, Lilian and Cadu have a great wealth of information. 

The apartment was clean and had everything we needed on our first day in Rio. The apartment was close to the beach and is located in a great neighborhood. Ipanema is a safe neighborhood and with a doorman on duty 24-hours, we always felt at ease coming in late a night. When I visit Rio again, I am definitely staying here.

I would have no reservation recommending this listing.  The apartment was located in a charming neighborhood very well situated with a supermarket, bank and restuarants right around the corner.  Oh and the beach is down the street.  The apartment was as described and I felt safe during our stay.  The hosts were lovely.  Very helpful and always available to answer any questions we had.   We thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Great/Safe location in Ipanema. Definitely enjoyed it!

El departamento en Ipanema es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, amplio, luminoso,limpio y cómodo. Tiene todo los electrodomésticos, vajilla y soporte que existe en toda buena casa bien equipada. La ubicación del departamento es muy buena, ya que esta a tan solo una cuadra y media de la playa y los servicios que existen alrededor del departamento contemplan todas las demandas de las que un turista precisa para pasarla bien.  Fuimos atendidos por Cadu en primera instancia donde muy atentamente nos mostró todo el funcionamiento del departamento. Cuando nos retiramos le dejamos las llaves a Solange en virtúd de que Lilian y Cadu no estaban en Río de Janeiro. Nos sentimos muy cómodos. La experiencia fue extremadamente muy satisfactoria. No tenemos ninguna duda de que cuando volvamos a Río elejiremos el departamento de Lilian e Cadu.

Great location, a block and a half from Ipanema beach, last metro stop in Zona Sul, and good shopping and restaurants. The apartment matches the host description. It's not exciting, but it is comfortable for 1-2 singles or a couple with 1 or 2 young children. I enjoyed my stay of 2 1/2 weeks.

I had a awesome stay at this flat, location the best ever, near the beach, near restaurants (all kinds), near a 24 hour supermarket,around the corner from the subway station and many bus stops that's brings you anywhere you want in Rio. The flat has 2 bedrooms, one very small but with AC and American style bed - it is on the top floor with a nice breeze all the time, so it wasn't to hot inside the flat. The kitchen has everything you need, fridge, freezer, often, micro, ice cold water supply (in Brazil you shouldn't drink tap water) it is always good to have a water-filter installed, Cadu and Lilian had a special drinking water fountain. 2 TV set one at the bedroom and one at the main hall and most important for me a good internet connection (WIFI) that worked at every corner inside the flat. The building is quit, friendly people and a great staff - some of them don't know you at first so you have to say in Portuguese "apartamento NOVE ZERO DOIS" and show them the key, that's means flat 902 - next time I'm back in Rio for sure this will be my number one choice and I will recommend it to many friends and clients I meet - greetings to all from lovely Vienna

Lilian fue muy preocupada y hospitalaria durante la recepción. El Departamento es muy funcional hasta 5 personas a pesar de su tamaño y además muy bien ubicado. La pasamos fantástico con mi familia que llegamos justo en los días del carnaval. Comunicación permanente con Lilian. Recomendable

Siamo stati 10 giorni nella appartamento  di Lilian  e Cadu  di Ipanema. Bel posto  hai tutto a portata  di  mano  dalla spiaggia  , mercato, un Supermercato  aperto 24 ore su 24 negozi ecc.La casa è  attrezzata ha tutti gli elettrodomestici  compresi ventilatori ,aria condizionata  e wi fi. È  una casa pulita  e molto carina. Speriamo  di  tornarci presto. Francesco

Because of Lilian and Cadu, I would like to make a sweeping statement that all Cariocas are very welcoming! They even introduced their friend to be our guide, should we need one. The apartment is clean and exactly as stated, close to the beach, convenience store and public transport system, not withstanding its safe and quiet quarter.
Me recomendaron la oagina Airbnb y despues de evaluar toda la oferta nos decidimos por el departamentode Lilian.
La verdad que nos atendieron 10 puntos. Siempre atentos a todo, y el apto super comodo y el edificio es muy tranquilo. Excelentes anfitriones. Espero volver pronto

Lilian and Cadu were at the flat when we arrived.  They were lovely and available throughout our entire stay to answer any questions. 
What can I say about this place.  Location! location! location!  The neighborhood is great quiet, supermarket, nice good local restaurants, and the beach are all in walking distance.  The apartment has what you need for your basic needs including a washing machine which is a plus.  We took Uber to go to other farther away places which worked out great.  I would highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again on my return.
The listing and the photos give a very good discpriction of the flat. It is in a very privileged location 2 minutes from the beach which is the best thing about it.
Tudo muito bom!!!

Cet appartement est placé idéalement à deux pas de la plage dans un immeuble sécurisé. Les hôtes sont très à l'écoute et attentionnés. La deuxième chambre est petite mais très suffisante pour y dormir confortablement seul. L'expérience est excellente.

The place is in a very well location close to the beacu in a nice building. The hosts are really kind and helpfull.
The second room is small but good enough to sleep. Very good experience in Rio.

Ipanema and cadous home is one of the best spot in rio de janeiro. All went perfect, the owner and the doorkeepers are totally friendly and really helpful. It was great. The supermarket is nearby, lots of restaurants and a cool irish pub too. The beach is in walking distance. i really enjoyed it to stay there and would like to come back. Many thanks... :-)

El departamento tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia comoda. La zona es excelente, cerca de la playa, hay un supermercado en la esquina abierto 24 hs lo cual es muy practico. Ademas muchisimos bares y restaurantes como medios de locomoción a todos lados. Volvimos caminando de noche y es seguro. Lilian es muy atenta y siempre contesto los mensajes. Sin dudas volveria a hospedarme.

O apartamento é perfeito. Um ótimo custo beneficio. Sua localização é maravilhosa, perto de tudo.
Cadu e Lilian são uns queridões! Atenciosos e acessíveis. Espero voltar logo.

No soy de escribir mucho. El resumen es en un puntaje de 1 a 10, mi estadia , mis anfitriones merecen un 11. Lamento no haberlos conocido personalmente.
Quisiera volver, sin lugar a dudas!

I have stayed here before and when I return to Rio I would not hesitate to stay there again and recommend it.  This place is a perfect location close to the beach and walking distance to supermarket, restaurants, bank, etc..  The best part are the hosts who are very attentive and available to help with any questions or concerns.

Essa foi minha primeira experiência no Airbnb e não poderia ser melhor. A Lilian e Cadu são ótimos anfitriões e sempre disponíveis a ajudar no que for necessário.  O apartamento possui ótima localização (próximo à praia e ao metrô) e é (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaremos a nos hospedar lá futuramente.
Muito obrigada Lilian e Cadu!

This was my first experience with Airbnb and it was amazing. Lilian and Cadu are fantastic hosts and are always available to help when needed. The apartment is very well located (near the Subway Station and the Beach) and is also confortable. We will for sure stay there when we go back to Rio.
Thanks a lot Cadu and Lilian!
Muy hospitalarios y bien ubicado. Ideal para tres personas, no más.

El apartamento es muy cómodo y está ubicado muy cerca de las playas Ipanema y Copacabana. Lilian y Cadu estuvieron disponibles para consultas y ayudándonos tanto en nuestra llegada como en la partida de Río. Recomiendo alojarse en este departamento
Exelente apartamento con una buena ubicación frente a un mercado 24hs y 70mts de la playa puesto 8.
Apartamento muy bien ubicado. Lilian siempre estuvo a disposición para cualquier cosa, muy amables! Excelente. Si tuviera que volver a Rio, sin duda me alojaría de nuevo aquí!

Minha estadia foi excelente. Apê muito bem localizado a 1 quadra da praia, além de ser um imóvel limpo e organizado.
Os anfitriões, Lilian e Cadu, foram pontuais, prestativos e muito simpáticos.
Já é minha segunda hospedagem no apartamento. Voltaria mais vezes com certeza.

Flexible and available at all the time, Lilian and Cadu are definitely great hosts that I will recommend. 

As for the apartment, its location is just so great, the building is completely secured and all the convenient stores are really,really close by. 

The apart is comfortable. The second room though it has all the AC and fan installed, is really for one person.

Hot water in the second bathroom should be adjustable at will for freezy nights, except for this details, everything is great.

Cet appartement est très bien placé tout près de la plage et des commerces , supermarché ouvert 24/24 à côté. La 2eme chambre est tte petite mais Cest indique ds le descriptif et cela suffit en fait comme chambre d'appoint , sinon pour nous douche pas assez chaude mais à part ca parfait !

O apto é ótimo.
Super bem localizado,perto de metrô mercados e bares.
E a lilian um amor.
Super recomendo

Ideal para ir en familia o con amigos 
Arpoador es ideal. 
Frente a un super abierto 24 hs. A una cuadra de la playa.
El depto es ideal. Con lavarropas. 
Todo apto para estadías largas. 
100% recomendable.

Eu fiquei no local mais bem localizado do Rio de Janeiro, quiçá do Brasil, em um ambiente tranquilo  
O apartamento é grande. Tem dois quartos. A cozinha é ótima. Os funcionários do condomínios são pessoas incríveis. E você ainda desce do prédio e tem TUDO à mão, desde um barzinho, ao restaurante mais granfino, academias da melhor qualidade, metrô a alguns passos. No verdadeiro centro da cidade, no miolo da ZS, perto do centro e da Barra. 
Ahhh, e as praia do Arpoador, Ipanema e Copacabana estão a metros. 
A de Ipanema você vê quando sai do prédio. É lindo. 
Ficamos em 1 casal e uma gata. Super bem acomodados. 
E a Lilian ainda é uma compositora maravilhosa. Saí de lá emocionado em saber que ela que compôs - Devolva-me - Imortalizada por Roberto Carlos e Adriana Calcanhoto. :)

Lilian e Cadu foram ótimos anfitriões conosco! São uns queridos e atenciosos!  Nossa hospedagem nos 5 dias foram perfeitas! O apto é ótimo, com tudo que precisávamos e com muito conforto!!! Pertinho da praia, de restaurantes, mercado na esquina, barzinhos, estação de metrô na rua de trás, praças, feiras, tudo muito próximo e um clima muito agradável! 
Certamente vamos procurá-los numa próxima visita ao Rio.
Só temos a agradecer!!

Abrimos la puerta y nos encontramos con una gran sonrisa que fue la de Eliane  (Lilian y Cadu estaban de viaje), una persona muy amorosa en todo, explicó absolutamente todo y estuvo pendiente todo el tiempo por (Hidden by Airbnb) al igual que los propietarios. En el departamento te sentis que entras a un hogar y no a un lugar de turismo. Dto amplio,  limpio, bien equipado. El departamento supera las fotos, Estuvimos 18 días muy a gusto. Frente al departamento se encuentra un supermercado abierto 24hs parece detalle menor, pero no lo es! Accesible a pie tanto de Copacabana como de Ipanema. Y lo mas lindo de todo fue esa sonrisas de Lilian y Cadu al irnos, personas sociables y muy agradables. Si queres  ser tratado con valores humanos, sin lugar a dudas este es el departamento en Rio! !
Very nice and quiet place !

Gran apartamento. Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de las vacaciones. Es espacioso, cómodo, accesible, luminoso, equipado. Muy cercano a la playa, cerca del metro. Tiene un supermercado a metros. La zona es espectacular (Ipanema) Lilian esta disponible ante cualquier duda o consulta. Sin duda volvería a elegirla para disfrutar de Rio. Gracias!!!!!!
Excelente apartamento! Localização privilegiada. Os anfitriões muito amáveis e atenciosos. Recomendo.
Excelente ubicación y muy buena relación calidad/precio. Volvería.
Great host and very helpful! Thanks

El departamento genial, lo mejor la ubicación, hay bares, un supermercado de 24 hs. Abierto,  los anfitriones fueron muy atentos y agradables, nos dieron recomendaciones excelentes y las tarjetas para que podamos usar con el transporte público.
La pasamos genial!
Super bien situé pour visiter Rio et profiter des plages, très sécurisé je conseille vraiment cet appartement.

La verdad una hermosa experiencia con  Lilian y Cadu. El departamento es muy cómodo, tiene todos los servicios y una ubicación inmejorable, a una cuadra de la playa, 1 y media del metro y un supermercado casi enfrente abierto 24hs. Siempre fueron muy atentos y cordiales, nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Nos olvidamos la llave dentro y en 5 min una amiga de Lilian (Solange, por cierto muy amable!!!!!) estaba allí para ayudarnos con una copia de la misma. El último día tuvimos un percance con el vuelo, y ambos estuvieron presentes ayudándonos. Sin dudas volveríamos al departamento y a alquilar con personas tan amables y cordiales como ellos. Les mandamos un beso y abrazo fuerte !!!!! ♥️
Recomendo o local.

El mejor lugar para ir. Lilian estuvo atenta todo el tiempo. Incluso antes,  ya que tenia algunas dudas cuando me encontraba en Argentina.  Y ni bien llegamos al aeropuerto de Rio ya me llego un (Hidden by Airbnb) para ver si estábamos bien. Si vas a Río, el mejor lugar para ir es Ipanema y es la casa de Lilian!!! no lo duden!!! en serio!!. 100 metros de la playa! Supermercado en frente! 24hs y con descuentos. Un barrio y edificio seguro y muy hermoso. En unos meses vuelvo y voy a ir ahí. :)
Muy lindo y cómodo  el departamento. Ubicación excelente,a 2 cuadras de la playa,a 2 del metro general Osorio,ahi nomás de Copacabana. Supermercado 24 hs en la esquina.

Lilian e Cadu são excelentes hosts. O Apartamento é super organizado e com uma localização excelente: supermercado, farmácias, restaurantes, metrôs e além é claro de estar a 1 quarteirão da praia de Ipanema. Fiquei muito feliz em ter escolhido esse AP, recomendo e quando voltar ao RJ pretendo ficar lá outra vez!!

Adorei me hospedar com a Lilian e o Cadu! Apartamento super bem localizado, supermercado 24h do lado, os porteiros super atenciosos e educados....
Lilian e Cadu foram uns amores tb! Deram dicas de lugares para comer, de segurança etc
E super simpáticos! Quando voltar ao RJ com certeza ficarei lá de novo. Uma coisa que poderia ter no apartamento é um filtro de água, mas, no mais, bastante completo de utensílios.

Espaço amplo e confortável, dispõe de todo o necessárioaraa uma estadia tranquila. 
A localização é simplesmente sensacional, muito próxima tanto do metrô como sa praia, com comércios próximos, incluindo jm mercado 24h em frente. E, embora fiqje numa região movimentada, o apartamento é bem silencioso. O pessoal da portaria também mercê elogio, todos educados e solícitos.
Por fim, os anfitriões foram gentis prestativos e simpáticos, respondendo minhas dúvidas rapidamente. 
Enfim, será minha
primeira opção quando voltar ao Rio.

Lilian es maravillosa ! Llegamos con mi enamorado y nos explicó todo lo que necesitábamos saber sobre el departamento, la ciudad, las playas, etc. Y siempre estaba al pendiente de cualquier duda que tengamos. El departamento es muy acogedor y se encuentra a pasos de la playa de Ipanema. Si alguien está pensando ir, no lo dude y quédese en este lugar. Es seguro y súper independiente. Cuando vuelva a ir a Río, que de todas formas volveré porque es una ciudad hermosa, volveré a quedarme ahí :)

Éramos 2 mujeres y el departamento es como se ve en las fotos. Confortable, muy luminoso y con una ubicación INMEJORABLE a 1 cuadra y media de la playa de Ipanema y 4 de Copacabana, en zona de restaurantes, comercios y subte. Tuvimos un problema con el termotanque y Lilian e Cadu lo resolvieron inmediatamente. Nos sorprendió que no hay agua caliente salvo en la ducha pero es común en Río y hay que tener cuidado con el uso de la electricidad porque se sobrecarga usando varios artefactos a la vez o dándose duchas largas. La atención de Lilian es súper amable, nos dio recomendaciones súper útiles y respuestas rápidas. Lo súper recomendamos!!!!
DEPARTAMENTO EN EXCELENTE UBICACIÓN, CON SEGURIDAD LAS 24 HORAS. AMPLIO Y MUY COMODO.
Ótima localização e hospitalidade

El.departamento es sencillo pero tiene todo lo necesario para estar comodo. Es agradable estar ahi. El edificio es seguro, con personlaagradable que atiende las 24 hs.
Muchas de las cosas que necesitabamos estan a pocas cuadras, supermercados, cafes, restaurantes economicos, linea de colectivos, el metro, y las playas de Ipanema y Copacabana.
Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Lilian estuvo atenta a las necesidades que planteamos, pero a la vez nos sentimos libres de manejarnos com el departamento como si fuera propio.
Extremamente atenciosa nossa anfitriã Lilian

A relação custo-benefício desse apto é excelente. O prédio é muito bom, os funcionários idem, e isso é muito importante. E a localização, não poderia ser melhor: praia, supermercado, restaurantes, ônibus e metrô na porta. Vale muito a pena!

O apartamento esta em uma otima localizaçao privilegiada em Ipanema. Eu e meus amigos passamos otimos momentos hospeados. Nós fomos muito bem recebidos e sempre estávamos em contato com os (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza irei manter contato com. eles para futuras hospedagens. Recomendo a todos com muita segurança.

El departamento es muy comodo, es espacioso, tiene lavadero para dejar las cosas mojadas de la playa, la cocina tiene de todo para cocinar. Incluso había café para el desayuno. La ubicación es muy buena y hay un supermercado enfrente que está abierto hasta las 12 de la noche. Esta a una cuadra y media de la playa. Llegamos a la noche y la llave la tenía el conserje. Lilian muy atenta! Recomendable
Recall great place in Ipanema, great location, and Lillian was very helpful providing local tips
La ubicación del apartamento es espectacular. Tiene todo lo que ofrece. Y un detalle para argentinos tiene un termo de acero inoxidable!!!

name: I2 Waikoloa Beach Villas

space: Waikoloa Beach Villas is a fun vacation home located in Waikoloa Beach Resort and is the perfect getaway for two couples or a small family. Every guest can sit back and enjoy their time together in this magnificent Villa with features such as; 1,209 square feet of luxurious living space, two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and sleeps up four guests. Superior quality throughout enhances the vast living spaces, and the furnishings within the property are to a very high standard and modern in design. The living room is the focal point of this beautiful villa and features a large flat screen TV and comfortable furniture. The gourmet kitchen is impressively equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and plenty of workstations for food preparation. The dining area seats six with additional seating for four more at the breakfast bench. Just off the living room is a covered lanai with a dining table that seats four. The master suite features a cozy king-size bed, flat screen TV, a walk-in shower a
