neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds. The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.
notes: Please Note: due to property and association by-laws the maximum occupancy listed is the maximum occupancy that is allowed in the property regardless of age of the guests. GENERAL TERMS, RESTRICTIONS & DISCLOSURES: The general terms, conditions and disclosures which apply to this property include, but are not limited to, the following: The "House Rules" for each complex are located in the informational binder in your vacation rental. Upon arrival, please make sure to familiarize with and adhere to the "House Rules". 1.) BEACHES: All beaches in Hawaii are public; there are no privately-owned beaches. Private property begins at the high tide mark or at the commencement of the vegetation line. 2.) OCEAN WARNING: Ocean swimming has certain inherent risks. Wave and current conditions and dangerous sea creatures vary from area to area, day to day and season to season. Risk and responsibility for ocean swimming rests solely and completely on occupants and guests; lifeguards are not provided.
transit: Rental car recommended
access: - 2 Swimming Pools - 2 Hot Tubs - Fitness Room - 2 Bedrooms - 2 Bathrooms - Sleeps 4 - Gourmet Kitchen - High-End Appliances - Conversation Areas - Air Conditioning - Linens  - Beach Towels - Multiple Flat Screen TVs - Basic Cable TV and HBO and Showtime - High Speed Wireless Internet - Ceiling Fans - Telephone Service - Washer & Dryer - Large Terrace - Outdoor Dining & Living - 5 Beach Chairs - 2 Boogie Boards - 1 Portable Ice Cooler - Gas BBQ Grills at both Pools - Private Parking Stall - Concierge Service
interaction: Our office is open M-F 8:30-4:30. We are located in the Waikoloa Beach Resort - you are welcome to come by and meet our team! Available for emergency assistance 24/7
house_rules: Rental car recommended Yes, there are House Rules. Basics are; Quiet hours from 10pm- 8 am, no parties, no smoking, no articles of clothing or beach gear on lanai, no glass at the pool. If you have specific questions or concerns, please ask. The complete condensed rules are posted in each unit.

host.host_about:
Aloha!
We have had the pleasure of hosting thousands and thousands of guests since 2006. We have built beautiful relationships with our returning guests and love to share the "aloha" with all of our guests.
We look forward to building our relationship with Air BnB!

address.street: Waikoloa Beach Resort, HI, United States

reviews.comments: Very nice neighborhood.   Listing was not accurate.   Only slept 4 and states 6.   Furniture was pretty new.
The neighborhood is close to grocery store. Most daily needs are within walkable distance. The host replies to all you questions as soon as possible, and willing to work with your schedule.

Four of us stayed in the unit and found it to be exceptionally good value. The unit is in excellent condition and exactly as described in the listing. The facilities that are part of Waikoloa Beach Villas are excellent as well and we made use the small but adequately-equipped gym throughout the week. I would absolutely recommend this unit to anyone staying on the Big Island, particularly if you're staying for a week or more.

This place provided a wonderful and relaxing stay for our family of four.    
It is our first time to book on AirBNB and the proxess was smooth and easy.   There was immediate feedback and the instructions were clear.   
This Waikoloa beach villa has a great location.   It is walking distance to a very nice beach, a couple of groceries, restaurants and little shops.    It was peaceful and right by the golf course.    Highly recommended!
No

Great unit, location very nice, pool and grounds great.  Loved the sand chairs and boogie boards in the garage.   A few items were missing or not useable in the kitchen such as utensils for the BBQ, spatulas, knifes very dull.    
Loved the space and outdoor patio, as well as washer and dryer.
Lovely condo with restaurants and shops just a short walk away! Would definitely recommend hiring a car if you want to go and explore the island. We used it as a great base for a few days!

Location is perfect. 20min drive north of the airport, within walking distance to Queens Marketplace, Kings Shops, and to Anaeho'omalu Beach. Unit I-2 was awesome. Loved having a full kitchen and a lanai facing a vast manicured golf coarse with ocean breeze--great way to enjoy morning coffees! The management staff is very easy to communicate with and they were really helpful when we arrived a little bit before our check-in time. Thank you Resortica!!!
Awesome Condo - definitely recommend!

Wonderful stay! The space and apartment is absolutely AMAZING!!! My experience was more than worth it! The space just feels like home is extremely clean and on a great location next to shopping mall. I LOVED IT!
Great host! Super clean condo! We were very happy with everything.

It is clean and spacious to stay. Right in front of Gueen's market,restaurants and shopping stores. 
It takes a 3 mins to go to beautiful beach.
Great location close to the beach. Lots of useful amenities: snorkels, beach chairs, lots of towels, dish soaps and laundry detergent. Would stay again!
Stunning condo with great layout for a family. Super location with walking access to shopping and restaurants. Would definitely stay at again on next visit.

We found Waikoloa Beach Villas to be super clean and well stocked with kitchen implements, cleaning supplies  as well as a good selection of beach necessities such as folding chairs, cooler, snorkel gear and boogie boards!
Our first five nights were amazing and peaceful, using the communal hot tub and pool was fabulous. Out last two nights were a less pleasant due to newly arrived upstairs neighbours that woke us up at 3:30 am on both nights.
The unit was great and had every amenity one would ever need. Quite location with views on the golf course and an quick access to the highway. The pool and the Queens marketplace are steps away.

The condo is in a great location close to restaurants, shopping, and quick access to the highway and reasonable driving distances to beaches and island attractions. Beautiful view of the golf course. The unit is equipped with almost everything you could need. With this being a main floor unit, the only downside is the soundproofing. Unfortunately you can hear the people from the unit above constantly walking, we were awoken frequently during the night and very early morning.

The place was amazingly well stocked with all the amenities you can't pack in your suit case but need to have when you get there.  The people were extremely helpful when we arrived and the staff on site were great.  We have stayed in many locations and this one is the best we have ever had.
Great place, definitely will stay again.

name: 4 bedroom home 2km from Cronulla beaches
summary: This very cosy home has 4 bedrooms (1 has sofa bed) and 2 bathrooms/3 toilets. It is at the back of a safe complex so no road noise can be heard from the kingsway when you enjoy the sunny private garden. It is 2kms from Cronulla and 7 minute walk from the train that can take you to Cronulla or the city. You can catch the 971 bus - we are at stop 36 which is 100 meters from our front door. This is the Cronulla to Hurstville route via Miranda fair.
space: You will love this beautiful sun filled townhouse. Having 2 bathrooms and 3 toilets makes it very appealing to a family.  The sunny courtyard off the living area is a great place for outdoor eating too.
description: This very cosy home has 4 bedrooms (1 has sofa bed) and 2 bathrooms/3 toilets. It is at the back of a safe complex so no road noise can be heard from the kingsway when you enjoy the sunny private garden. It is 2kms from Cronulla and 7 minute walk from the train that can take you to Cronulla or the city. You can catch the 971 bus - we are at stop 36 which is 100 meters from our front door. neighborhood_overview: Caringbar is a great spot due to its location to Cronulla's beautiful beaches and a train ride to the city. You can walk to the centre of Caringbar for a coffee and Miranda's massive Westfield shopping complex is a 10 minute train ride too.
notes: There is a strict no party rule and no smoking
transit: trains and buses a walk distance away to anywhere in Sydney
access: Laundry has a washing machine you can use
interaction: Anything you need relating to your stay we will do our best to accommodate. If you have extra people and want to bring your own extra mattress or kids cots your welcome to use the forth bedroom for this. It currently is used as a reading room with a NEW AND COMFORTABLE sofa bed so it can be used as a reading room or bedroom.
house_rules: Please treat my lovely home as your own. There is a strict no party rule and this includes no smoking.

host.host_about: I grew up in northern NSW and then spent some time overseas working in Africa. Our projects are based in the DRC congo which is where my husband and I work with war widows x sex slaves and x child soldiers. We are renting our house in order to generate money for these projects. I can live without a lot of things but I do LOVE coming home to the ocean, Thai food, and spending time with friends and family.

reviews.comments: I absolutely love my stay at Kirsty's place. Photo/description  are accurate.House was very beautiful, very comfortable,  clean and spacious rooms, it was fully  stocked with everything we needed. A great location  close to beach and shop, easy to find. Fantastic  communication and hospitality, Kirsty is the    perfect  host.  10 / 10 I would definitely  rrecommend this home to anyone.

The hosts were really great with communication and kept in touch throughout our stay. The house was incredibly tidy. The house is a short drive from Cronulla beach and shops and restaurants. This a lovely home and definitely not somewhere for those looking to party. It's perfect for a cosy home away from home for families or couples. There's a lovely little garden we liked to eat our dinner in and enjoy the evenings. Fully stocked kitchen and air con was good. The main bathroom is amazing with shower and spa bath. It was lovely for our family to stay here whilst our daughter was treated at Westmead hospital and easy to get onto train into Sydney, go to the beach and go for dinner etc.

The home was presented to us in a clean & immaculate state, the rooms were very comfortable, the area was quiet so made a sleep in possible. The home is very convenient to the Caringbah Railway Station & the travel time into Sydney was less than an hour.
Also very convenient to the beautiful precinct of Cronulla where you have some wonderful eating places & a lovely beach we did not get to use. This was due to our stay was not a holiday but a visit to a eye surgeon for our daughter.
Couldn't fault the home at all, would go back if required.

Guests were very satisfied with the home and would stay there again.

Very impressed. Kirsty was very professional. I would recommend her home to anyone.
Wonderful home in Caringbah
Great place and location. Close to everything.

A lovely comfortable and private home, that we found very practical for 5 adults. Neat, clean and thoughtfully presented, this really made our guests first nights in Australia  a most pleasant "home away from home".
Perfect!!

Great stay for the weekend! Kirsty was fantastic to deal with. Had a bit of an issue getting in but she worked so hard to make sure it was resolved and we were happy! Much appreciated, and thank you for having us

We felt comfortable and at home the moment we walked in. It was perfect for our family of four! Tidy, clean, cosy and quality. And what topped it off was Kirsty’s caring contact and responses ensuring we had a great stay. 

Thank you.
We loved our stay. Everything was perfect and anytime we needed something Kirsty was happy to help.

If the property still has a king sized bed and a queen sized bed in the description and this is important to you then you may wish to get an explicitly acknowledgement that this is the size of the beds at the property as when we stayed the sizes were double and double.
A beautiful house with 4 bedrooms and a lovely garden, located in a quiet area, near two big supermarkets and not far from beach. We all enjoyed the stay in the house.
Kirsty was great to deal with and quick to respond to any queries we had from before we secured the booking and during our stay.  The house was clean and tidy and well equipped.
Good house for a stay in the shire
Very clean and well maintained

summary: Huge apartment with a king, a queen size bed and a futon in the living room.  Access to our amazing backyard for BBQs, picnics or just chilling in the hammock. Shampoo and towels can be provided

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is amazing! There are cafés, bars, bakeries (yes, 3, an italian, an organic, and the traditional one), the best poutine in town (Poutineville), and so many other things at a walking distance ll love it!
notes: - Please note we are young professionals and normal people that love having travelers home every now and then. Unfortunately we cannot provide a hotel standard stay.
transit: - Subway station nearby (Beaudry) - within a 10min walk - Bus 125 Ontario heading west and east - Bixi station
access: - A queen-size bed in a private bedroom; a king bed in the other + futon in the living room - Open-concept living room and fully-equipped kitchen - Access to the backyard with a picnic table and hammock - Access to the laundry - Feel free to buy your own food and prepare it at the kitchen.
interaction: We will make sure your arrival is as smooth as possible. When we rent our entire apt it means we won't be home, but we'll do our best to assist you with anything necessary.
house_rules: - No smoking inside the apartment (backyard and front balcony is OK; - No parties!!!  - Don't bring strangers, please respect our space as if you were the one renting your home to a stranger. - Please don't take any 'souvenir' with you. We worked hard for our stuff :/ - Please be flexible as we are. We will be traveling during the time you are spending in our apartment, so we may take some time to reply but I'll do my best and provide you contacts from local friends for emergencies. - Please let us know when you exit the apartment after your stay, or I'll think you've burned-out the place :p - We are opening the doors to our place, so please respect it.

host.host_about: Hello, my name is Isabela and I love travelling and host travelers.

reviews.comments: Isabela's apartment is great! I stayed there with more 5 friends and we really had a nice time in Montreal. It is well localized just a few minutes from the subway station. She was so kind and really helpfull with check in and check out hours. Definitely I recommend her apartment. Thank you Isabela!

Isabela was amazing! I did not get to meet her but she made she I had everything I needed, also made sure the apartment was warm and cozy! I would definitely recommend everyone to stay here, it is close to many places and she has some wicked cool CDs and board games!
Excellent experience! Isabela was very kind and accommodating. Communication was very easy. No problems were encountered.
Logement pas cher et très bien situé.
Très agréable séjour ! La localisation est parfaite pour un petit week end à Montréal ! Rapport qualité prix parfait ! Isabela très à l’écoute et aucun problème de communication !
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Comfort and Safety in Ipanema!
summary: Quiet and cozy 1 bedroom apartment in Ipanema.  Completely furnished, 1 queen-bed, 1 sofa-bed and 1 sofa. 2 blocks far from the beach, 3 blocks to the Lagoon. This location in Ipanema is one of the safest/secure area of the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro. A/C in the Living room and bedroom.
space: One bedroom apartment, 50m2. The apartment is completely furnished. 2 blocks from Ipanema Beach and 3 blocks from the Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Best location in Ipanema. The apartment is very quiet and silent, so you can perfectly rests after a long day enjoying the neighbourhood. Full kitchen, wifi, ceiling fan, floor fan, cable TV, one sofa-bed, regular couch and dining table. In the bedroom: one queen bed, air conditioning and cable TV (with home theater).
description: Quiet and cozy 1 bedroom apartment in Ipanema.  Completely furnished, 1 queen-bed, 1 sofa-bed and 1 sofa. 2 blocks far from the beach, 3 blocks to the Lagoon. This location in Ipanema is one of the safest/secure area of the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro. A/C in the Living room and bedroom. One bedroom apartment, 50m2. The apartment is completely furnished. 2 blocks from Ipanema Beach and 3 blocks from the Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Best location in Ipanema. The apartment is very quiet and silent, so you can perfectly rests after a long day enjoying the neighbourhood. Full kitchen, wifi, ceiling fan, floor fan, cable TV, one sofa-bed, regular couch and dining table. In the bedroom: one queen bed, air conditioning and cable TV (with home theater). The apartment will be fully available for the guests. Can be accessed by phone, email and social tools, 24x7hs. Best and fancy area of Ipanema, in the corner of Rua Garcia D'Avila, overlooking the Christ. This area of Ipanema is one of the safest
neighborhood_overview: Best and fancy area of Ipanema, in the corner of Rua Garcia D'Avila, overlooking the Christ. This area of Ipanema is one of the safest and more secure neighborhoods on the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro.  Very complete shopping area around the building (post office, banks, supermarkets, restaurants, bars, cafeterias, lotteries, hospitals, pharmacies, shopping, subway, etc.).  2 blocks from the beach.  Very nice bars and restaurants around.
notes: Default Check-in time: 4PM. Check-out time: 11AM. Checkin/check-out times can be flexibly negotiated previously, before the arrival.
transit: Bus stop in front of the building, towards Subway station, Copacabana, Downtown, Tijuca, Sugar Loaf, Christ Redentor, etc.  Bus stop to Barra da Tijuca, Leblon, São Conrado, Gavea, 2 minutes walking. Subway can be reached by 3 minutes walking (Nossa Senhora da Paz Station)
access: The apartment will be fully available for the guests.
interaction: Can be accessed by phone, email and social tools, 24x7hs.
house_rules: Os vizinhos são bem tranquilos e amigáveis, no entanto, é importante respeitar a lei do silêncio após 22hs. Neighbours are very friendly and easy-going, nevertheless it is important to obey the silence rule after 10PM. Não é permitido festas no apartamento. No parties allowed in the apartment. Não é permitido fumar dentro do apartamento.  No smoking inside the apartment.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Carioca, de bem com a vida, cercado de bons amigos, amo viajar pelo mundo, conhecer novas pessoas e novas culturas.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: We had an amazing time at Paulo's flats... The place is really clean right in the center of Ipanema just 2 blocks to the beach so it was just perfect. We were 4 there and the place was just perfect... large bed room and a big sofa with a bed in the living room, wifi works perfectly, air condition... Paulo was a very nice host very helpfull when we did arrive, and if we needed anything during our stay he was there. The place is very quite so after a long day at the beach... We could relax and at night we dont ear the street at all. We will definetly book again his flat if we come back to Rio soon.

Excelente departamento. Paulo estuvo siempre en contacto, incluso antes de que saliéramos para allá y se puso a disposición de todas nuestras dudas. El departamento es muy lindo, excelente ubicación y es incluso mejor que lo que las fotos muestran. Si consideramos el precio, la relación calidad-precio es genial. Encontramos todo muy limpio y ordenado.
La zona donde está ubicado es muy segura, cerca de todos los principales negocios y también cerca de la fiesta y la playa. En la calle del departamento pasan todos los colectivos y el subte está a pocas cuadras. Sin lugar a dudas,  super recomendado para todos los que quieran conocer Río de Janeiro.

Excellent location in a very well furnished apartment. 

It's quite a small space (as most apartments in the core of Ipanema) with everything one might need. The electronics are top. From LCD Tv to a mini-wine-cellar.

I felt the kitchen was insufficiently prepared. It had few dishes, cups, etc. But for a two day stay it's more than enough.

Definitively a good value choice. Worthwhile.

Localização perfeita, duas quadras da praia, duas quadras da lagoa, só é difícil achar lugar pra estacionar em torno. O Paulo é super solicito, sempre pronto a ajudar e responder qualquer pergunta, super flexível com os horários de check in e check out.  O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, tudo funcionando direitinho, TV grande com vários canais, WiFi funcionou bem, e estava tudo limpo. O prédio tem porteiro 24 horas. Não tem coador e as coisas pra fazer café, ou uma máquina de café expresso, essa foi a única coisa que eu senti falta.

Fiquei hospedada no apto do Paulo por 11 dias e foi tudo ótimo. Paulo é muito solícito e atencioso, sempre acessível quando preciso. O apto é bem silencioso e arejado além de ser muito limpo. O Wi-Fi e o ar condicionado funcionam muito bem. Levei minha cachorrinha e o apto é perfeito para animais. A localização tb é excelente, perto da praia e dos principais restaurantes e bares da Zona (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza pretendo me hospedar lá novamente qdo voltar ao Rio.

Staying at Paulo's apartment was an absolutely wonderful experience ! The place is so cute, and the apartment is in an excellent location - 2 blocks from posto 9, an awesome spot on ipanema beach, close to many bars, restaurants and supermarkets.
Paulo was easily reachable and available to us when we had questions. All in all, I not only recommend staying at his place but hope to stay there again!
O apartamento é muito bom! Exatamente como está nas fotos! A localização é excelente! O Paulo é muito querido e atencioso! Com certeza voltaremos a nos hospedar nele!

O Paulo é fantastico, atencioso e belo anfitrião, com direito a vinho e café expresso. O apartamento é conforme descrito, bairro nobre, localização perfeita, apenas duas quadras da praia, perto de padaria, farmacia, bancos e restaurantes excelentes. Pretendo voltar! Minha família amou!!!

Paulo has a very comfortable apartment in an excellent location in Ipanema.  The upmarket neighbourhood has many fine restaurants and boutiques.  His apartment is only a block from the beach and a short walk to the lagoon.

Paulo is very attentive and considerate; he offers great guidance.  I highly recommend his listing.  We as a family thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

O apartamento de Paulo e o melhor que un conhoci em meus viagems.
Tem TUDO! e MUITO legal! comodo e increivel ubicacion em (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza volveré a alguar este apartamento.

Excelente apartamento, igual às fotos, excelente localização.

Paulo, muito obrigado pela disponibilidade e acolhida, vou certamente voltar!
Abraço
Paulo, obrigado pela hospitalidade. O apartamento é muito bom, bem localizado e as facilidades modernas. Obrigado e sempre que alguém precisar, recomendo.
Todo fue excelente, el departamento esta bien ubicado y es cómodo. Paulo estuvo pendiente de nuestras necesidades todo el tiempo. Muy recomendable!

Paulo was an excellent host, taking care of all the details so locating/entering/staying at the apartment was easy.  He was also readily available by email/phone in case I had any questions.  The location of the apartment is fantastic, right in the middle of Ipanema, and it is very easy to walk to the beach, Leblon and Copacabana.  The apartment is quiet and accurately described as in the apartment listing.

Excellent location. Short walking distance to the beach, various restaurants and shopping. Very comfortable apartment, exactly like the photos. Paulo was very kind and always available to help should we have an inquiry. Andrea was super sweet! Thanks for the hospitality, we are looking forward to going back to Ipanema!

Apartamento muy confortable con excelente ubicación, cerca de la playa, en buena zona comercial y a pocas cuadras del metro.
De destacar también la preocupación constante de Paulo por saber si todo estaba bien o si necesitábamos algo.
Excellent location close to shops, bars, restaurants and the beach! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Paulo's flat

A estadia no apartamento do Paulo foi ótima. A localização é ótima, o prédio também é bom. O ap é super completo, espaço ideal para até 4 pessoas tranquilo. Louças novas, banheiro  limpo, ventiladores potentes, bons equipamentos eletrônicos, tudo muito bem cuidado. Não temos nada a reclamar! Nota 10

Apartamento acolhedor e muito bem localizado. Excelente anfitrião, muito solícito e atencioso. Sempre em contacto e disponível para ajudar. Zona do Rio espectacular, muito segura e com zona comercial excelente. Lojas muito bonitas com as melhores marcas mundiais e supermercados muito bons. A linda Praia de Ipanema a 2 quadras. Quando puder voltarei e se possível para este apartamento. Um muito obrigado ao Paulo.

Paulo's flat was Perfect! It was in a great location, central to everything a tourist/visitor could need or want!  Safe neighborhood with security at door.  Step outside to the best shopping, coffee, juice bars, & of course Ipanema, Copacabana, & Leblon beaches! Paulo was quick to respond to any question or inquiry! I would highly recommend Paulo's apartment for your trip to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil !

Excelente el equipamiento del departamento, realmente te sentís como en tu casa, pues no falta nada! Es tal cual lo publican. La ubicación en el Barrio de Ipanema la mejor sin dudas! Y Paulo siempre pendiente de que todo esté en orden. 100% recomendable!
Todo salio como lo esperado y el dto tal cual se describe. Muchas gracias y 100% recomendable

Very nice apartment, definitely recommend! Bigger than other options, and has nice TV and sound system. Paulo was very helpful with any questions we had and made us feel at home at his place.

I'll definitely contact him again next time I'm in the area!
Thanks Paulo!

Paulo ha sido un gran anfitrion, nos dió toda la información requerida antes de la llegada para que nuestra estadía fuese lo mejor posible. El apartamento estaba perfectamente adecuado a nuestra llegada y encontramos todo tal como él nos lo habia anunciado. La úbicación inmejorable, muy cerca de la playa, buenos restaurantes y tiendas al rededor, así como fácil acceso al servicio de transporte público. Fue mi primer visita a Rio de Janeiro con mi esposa e hija, y la pasamos de maravilla, una ciudad encantadora, con gran cantidad de actividades para realizar, esperamos regresar pronto y ojala poder contar con la fortuna de regresar al apartamento de Paulo.
Paulo's apartment is centrally located in Ipanema. He was a great host and made sure we had a great time in rio!

Paulo's apartment was very clean, comfortable and amazingly well located. You come out of the building into the best retail area of Rio de Janeiro, all the major brands are less than 1 block away. The beach is super close too. The apartment is charming and cozy and has a view to the Cristo Redentor. No matter how long you stay in Rio, I would recommend Paulo's apartment. He's been very accommodating, helpful and considerate, 10/10 would stay here again!

We had a great time staying at Paulo's place. The location is excellent as stated in the advert - right in the middle of the action in Ipanema. Paulo gave us loads of information to set us up in the apartment and around the general area. The apartment was as described, really nice spec, clean and very comfortable. In the hot summer heat the air con was great and the wifi was also very good. Would highly recommend a stay in Paulo's place - big thumbs up. Thanks Paulo.
Paulo was lovely and welcoming and very helpful with lots of information! He was easily reachable and the place was lovely with a great location! Definitely recommend!!!

O apartamento é muito legal!! As fotos refletem a realidade. O quarto tem ar e uma cama de casal confortável, a sala tem um sofá cama e um ar portátil. Cozinha com o necessário, apto com excelente localização!!! Tudo perto: mercado, banco, restaurante, bar, praia de Ipanema. 
A comunicação foi tranquila. Super recomendo.

Excelente departamento. La verdad que cumple tanto lo que se ve en las fotos y descripción como más; todas las comodidades, ubicado a dos cuadras de los postos más populares de Ipanema y zona céntrica. Altamente recomendable, deseamos volver pronto!
Gostei muito da oportunidade de passar dias em apartamento bem localizado em Ipanema, com toda a praticidade e hospitalidade do dono. Bela vista do Cristo Redentor e do horizonte carioca.

No tuvimos el placer de conocer a Paulo, pero estuvo continuamente pendiente de nosotros antes y durante nuestra estancia en Ipanema.
El apartamento estaba muy limpio y completamente equipado con todo lo necesario. Estuvimos muy confortables. Esta ubicado en una localizacion excelente.
Paulo no tendra problema en ayudar y aconsejar en todo lo necesario. Volveremos!
El anfitrión es muy amable y preocupado, está ubicado en un muy buen barrio a dos cuadras de la playa se puede pasear tranquilamente. La descripción del departamento es correcta.

It was a pleasure staying at Paulo's apartment for 2 weeks in March 2016. He was always available if I had any questions regarding the property & this made the stay even more enjoyable. It's in a perfect location in Ipanema & you can walk to Copacabana or Leblon if need be. A bed side light in the bedroom would be useful.
El departamento es ideal, muy bien equipado, no le falta nada, la ubicacion excelente en la mejor zona de ipanema, a metros de la playa, paulo es muy amable

The process was super easy. Paul is a pleasure to deal and very responsive.
The apartment was fully equiped and safe. 
The location is spectacular. There are loads of shops around and the beach is basically right there. Another bonus is the cheeky view of the Christ the Redeemer from the window. 
2 things on the constructive criticism side- the air conditioners are efficient but a little noisy and also, i had a bit of a hard time working out the shower head. Everything else was great.
Fue una muy buena experiencia. Todo salió tal cual lo describe Paulo. Súper recomendable todo. El Depto impecable. Muchas gracias Paulo y esperamos poder regresar
Excellent place very well located. The apartment has everything you need. Definitely felt like home for a few days.  Also Paolo was very proactive and helpful to ensure everything worked well.
Excelente todo. El departamento muy completo y con detalles muy sutiles en decoración. ubicado en zona inmejorable. Paulo siempre atento a cualquier consulta. Muy recomendable

Bel appartement bien situé dans la rue Visconde de Piraja  à quelques pas de la plage d'Ipanema .Appartement très fonctionnel,  trés bien équipé, entièrement moderne ce qui à fait mon choix pour cette location. Très  bien équipé  en mobilier, télé, vidéo, musique, divers linges de maisons , équipements de cuisine..., tout est à disponibilité dans cet appartement. Tout est facilement accessible et simple d'utilisation!!! 
On se sent rapidement chez soi tant on est à l'aise ici. Je me suis rapidement senti à la maison !!! Les commerces sont au pied de l'immeuble, tout est à portée de main, très importants, on peut faire ses courses à pied, sans pertes de temps !!!
Je retournerai sans problèmes dans cet appartement, Paulo est une personne formidable, généreuse, il est présent quand on à besoin de lui . Je lui avais demandé une faveur, il me l'à accordée dans la minute même, j'ai fortement apprécié ceci !!! MERCI Paulo !!!
Vous pouvez louer cet appartement les yeux fermés, j'en garde un très bon souvenir, j'y reviendrai lors de mon prochain séjour.
Ipanema est un quartier tranquille, calme, excellent compromis , l'appartement est idéalement situé dans la rue Visconde de Piraja, multitudes de commerces, de boutiques où vous pourrez faire du shopping ...vous trouverez tout !!!
Pour conclure, bel appartement dans une résidence sympa, pour passer d'agréables moments dans ce beau quartier .

Paulo was a great host.  He provided us tips and information even before we arrived in Rio.  Also what is exceptional is he even allowed us late checkout as our flight leaves 130AM.  Apartment though a bit outdated is cozy and extra perk is the view of Cristo Redentor on one of the windows.  Location is perfect, close to everything that we wanted to see.  Can't ask for anything more.  Will surely recommend this property and next time I'm back in Rio will book it again.  We enjoyed our trip so much thanks to Paulo.
Paulo foi excelente! Desde o check-in onde chegamos antes do previsto ao check-out, saindo ao fim do dia. O apartamento tem tudo e a localização é perfeita. Recomendo muito.

Just an amazing experience! Paulo's apartment is in a PERFECT location. We could not have asked for better. 

We did not meet Paulo in person, but he made the check in process super easy, and  was very fast (minutes) to responding via the Airbnb app. 

You should absolutely stayed here on your trip to Rio! 

Thanks again Paulo!

Paulo made our stay so easy.  He was responsive and provided suggestions for things to do, see and eat which were very helpful.  The apartment is perfectly located, right on the best street in Ipanema and close to everything - cafes, restaurant, bar, beach and walking distance to Lapa.  We enjoyed our stay and felt like a local coming in and out of his apartment.
Had a great time. Apt is very conveniently located. Comfortable bed. Very helpful when we got locked out and checkin and check out was very easy.

Paulo has a wonderful place. He was very accommodating and the apartment is in a perfect location. You can walk to the beach in a few mins, find a nice shop or bar right out the door. The apartment is wonderful and beautifully equipped with a view or the Cristo Redeemer.
Wonderful stay in Ipanema! Excellent location, plus great service. Close to all amenities. A++++

Paulo foi atencioso desde o primeiro contato. O apartamento e ótimo, bem localizado, confortável e fomos recebidos com uma garrafa de vinho a nossa disposição. 
Foi uma ótima experiência.

We were lucky enough to stay here during the Olympics so it was an exciting time to be in Rio! We had a couple minor issues and Paulo was available immediately to help with anything and everything we needed. The area has so many cute places to eat and the door guys downstairs in the building were so nice, we miss them already! The place is walking distance from the beach and has a view of Christ the Redeemer which we luckily got to see in person our last day in Rio.  Thanks for everything Paulo!

O apartamento condiz com as fotos e descrição do site. A localização é perfeita, muito próximo da melhor parte da praia de Ipanema e perto de bons restaurantes e bares. O Paulo é super atencioso, responde os emails com rapidez e ainda te dá todas as instruções e dicas para uma estadia confortável. Adoramos e já marcamos de voltar em Novembro!

Paulo's place was great. Perfect location in Ipanema, easy access to everything (BEACH, grocery stores, restaurants, shopping, the lagoa). Paulo left very detailed instructions for getting into his place and making use of the many ammenities and everything was exactly as advertised upon arrival. It was a great stay.

I found Paulo's place as described and very good. It's in a very central location in Ipanema and has good metro connections and all the shops and restaurants you could want. Plus it's just 2 minutes from the beach :) 
Paulo was very good at communications and kept me up to date and answered all my questions quickly. 
Another advantage of the apartment is the doorman who looks after the building and you can hand your key to him if you want to go to the beach and not lose stuff which is useful. 
I would stay here again, thanks Paulo!
Apartamento muito bem localizado e agradavel. Ambiente me fez sentir em casa!

Lovely cozy Appartement in a perfect location. Friendly and safe environment in one of Rios' high-end streets. 3 min walk to the the beach. Loads of shops and restaurants just outside your door. Paulo was super helpful and kind, and went beyond expectations with flexible check-in schedule, bottle of wine and  good coffee machine. Highly recommended.

Esta foi minha primeira experiência pelo Airbnb. Foi tudo fantástico! O apartamento do Paulo é exatamente como descrito no anúncio, tem tudo o que precisamos. A localização é excelente, super segura e no coração de Ipanema. Fica perto de tudo: supermercado, farmácia, restaurantes, lojas, transportes (inclusive uma estação de metrô, na quadra ao lado). O contato com o Paulo foi sensacional, sempre respondeu prontamente a todas as dúvidas e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.

Un apartamento perfecto tanto para viajar en familia como para ir en pareja o de viaje de negocios. El lugar tiene todo como fuera tu casa, elementos de cocina, de baño, de lavado diario del hogar, tv satelital, wifi, sona espectacular en el medio de ipanema a dos cuadras de la playa! Impecable!! Lo super recomiendo!

el apartamento está muy limpio
buena localización: desde supermercados a bancos correo restaurantes
la playa a 5@minutos o menos andando
si regresó a Río,volveré
Paulo muy amable conmigo y preocupándose si estaba bien o necesitaba algo
muchas gracias por@todo
Excelente aparatamento, ótimo localização junto com a atenção do Paulo, a experiência de ficar em Ipanema foi simplesmente sensacional!
Apartamento com excelente localização (praia e metrô), extremamente limpo e bem equipado. Anfitrião muito atencioso e com ótima comunicação. Recomendo!

El departamento es muy bonito y cuenta con todo lo necesario para que tu estadía sea la mejor, además Paulo se preocupa de entregar la información necesaria para que puedas llegar a su casa y moverte dentro de Río. Siempre muy preocupado como anfitrión! Su entorno está lleno de tiendas, restaurantes, farmacias, metrô a una cuadra y la playa a dos en una zona segura que te permitirá en verano desplazarte por sus alrededores sin ningún tipo de problemas. Pudimos pasear todo el día y disfrutar de la playa al anochecer sin miedo con mis hijos pequeños. Muy recomendable! Sin duda volveremos.
Excelente ubicación. Cerca de la playa de Ipanema y del metro. El departamento es confortable y está muy buen equipado. El ambiente muy agradable. Paulo es muy gentil y atento.
Ótimo tudo. Paulo super atencioso! Recomendo.
Foi tudo perfeito ! Excelente localização! O anfitrião Paulo super gentil e atencioso... O apartamento super bacana ! Portaria 24 horas... Recomendo  !!!

Paulo's place is very centrally located in Ipanema and his guidebook contains many helpful locations for shops, restaurants and points of interest. It is easy to take a cab or uber from this location. Paulo had excellent communication before, during and after our stay through the AirBNB messaging app, and when an issue arose (broken door lock), Paulo called the building management right away and it was fixed the next day. The apartment can easily fit three people -- two in the bedroom, and one on the futon. He also left us cold bottles of water in the fridge -- sorely needed during a hot Rio summer! -- and new soap in the bathroom! And he has tons of guidebooks to thumb through while enjoying your stay.

I never had the opportunity to meet Pauloj, but throughout our stay he was very attentive and friendly. He messaged us during our stay to know if we needed anything. 
The house was in an amazing location,  very clean, tidy and modern. Walking distance from the beach.
When we arrived there was cold water in the fridge and the apartment was really fresh, which was amazing when arriving from the outside heat.
If we could we would have definitely stayed longer.

Highly recommended! Paulo's place is great. It's spacious, clean and comfy. We stayed three people and it was perfect for us. It's really nice that it's just two blocks from the beach and at the same time right on a busy street with all that you need nearby. Paulo checked in on us during our stay, was very quick in responding and coming up with solutions.

Muy lindo el departamento de Paulo, buena ubicación.
Paulo siempre está cuando uno lo necesita

Desde que entramos al departamento nos sentimos como en casa! Genial!!!! No le hace falta nada! Paulo está constantemente pendiente que estemos bien y disfrutando! No tuve la suerte de conocerlo pero desde luego recomiendo que vengan a alojarse con el! La zona espectacular! A dos cuadras de la playa, en el corazón de Ipanema! Todo cerca está! Recomiendo por completo!

O apartamento é muito bem equipado e com uma decoração acolhedora, fez com que nos sentíssemos em casa. Tem ar condicionado e ventiladores de teto tanto na sala quanto no quarto, essencial para aguentar dias de calor no Rio.
Sua localização é excelente, próxima à Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, à Praia de Ipanema e ao Metrô Nossa Senhora da Paz. A rua é bastante movimentada e possui muitos comércios próximos, como padarias, mercados, bares e restaurantes.

Nossa estadia no apartamento do Paulo durante o Carnaval foi excelente. Apartamento seguro, limpo, muito bem localizado, camas confortáveis, sem contar a disponibilidade constante do Paulo, que foi essencial para que tudo desse certo. Recomendamos demais!

Totalmente recomendable!
El departamento está amoblado completamente, tiene muy buena buena ubicación, farmacias, bancos y supermercados en la misma calle, a 1 cuadra del metro y a 2 de la playa. En todo momento tuve contacto tanto con Paulo como con Pericles.
Seguramente vuelva!
Great apartment, perfect location to enjoy Rio, lots of helpful advice and quick to reply when we had questions. Thank you!

Ipanema Ground Zero. Look no further. Paulo's unit is located walking distance to restaurants, metro, the beach, and lots of shops. The communication was outstanding and he was flexible with my itinerary.  Very functional and comfy unit featuring comfortable bed, hot shower, and cold AC. The fans in the bedroom and TV room also help to keep the unit cool. The best unit in the best location hosted by the best. I will be back in December and I look forward to staying in this unit again.

The description and photos exactly match. Best localization, near from metro station Nossa Senhora da Paz. Besides, the hostess is attentive. What else do you need? When I return in Rio Janeiro, I will stay there again.
Apartamento ótimo para famílias, espaçoso, muito bem equipado e boa localização em Ipanema. Recomendadíssimo!
muy recomendable
O apartamento do Paulo é extremamente confortável, possui todos os utensílios e é muito bem localizado! Além disso o Paulo é muito solícito! Gostamos muito, voltaremos mais vezes!

Well, Paulo is a super host for a reason. He really went above and beyond to accomodate me. He was very quick to respond to my texts and to assist with all my questions about the apartment and Rio in general.

Excelente ubicacion, espacio comodo y bien equipado, cerca de transporte publico, supermercado, tiendas comerciales, casas de cambio, cajeros, etc. y a dos cuadras de la playa. Paulo excelente anfitrion siempre predispuesto a responder todas nuestras consultas! sin dudar me volveria a alojar aqui!

Communication with Paulo was super easy and the check-in/check-out process really convenient and flexible.

The apartment in itself is great and the location is perfect.
The bed is not the most confortable in the world but, for short trip, it's not an issue.

EL departamento, impecable, no le falta NADA y cuando digo NADA es NADA, todos los utensillos que te puedas imaginar, limpieza, me recibio con cafe, un vino, cervezas y un agua en la heladera, una barra llena de bebidas alcoholicas ( eso no sabia si tocarlas, je), el wifi y la television perfectas, dos a falta de una, y hasta un equipo en el que puedes reproducir tu musica con parlantes. La ubicacion inmejorable, en el medio de ipanema , muy seguro, lleno de negocios, Paulo me asesoro de bares y restaurantes, VOLVERE!!, gracias Paulo!

Paulo's place was great! There were 3 of us, which was fine (2 in the bedroom and one in the living room). The shower had great pressure! We didn't use the washer/dryer, but it was in the apartment if we had needed it. The neighborhood was very safe and nice, and the beach was super close! Paulo gave us great tips about what to do in Rio as we had some cloudy/rainy days while we were there.

La pasamos bomba ! El piso esta super equipado, comodo y mas que representativo de lo que muestran las fotos. Paulo estuvo muy amable con nosotros para darnos cualquier consejo y problema en la casa (pero no hubo). Esta muy centrico, a una cuadra no mas del metro y de muchos buses, y a dos de la playa. La zona es tranquila, pero con restaurantes y algunos bares a la noche. Recomendo 100% !
Super bem localizado, próximo a todos os recursos. Apto muito bem organizado, ensolarado , aconchegante e silencioso proprietários são excelentes, sempre prontos a nos ajudar!

Paulo foi um excelente anfitrião.  Sempre disponível e atencioso. O apartamento é confortável para duas pessoas e super prático, além de estar perto de tudo (praia, metrô,  restaurantes e mercado). Em relação à movimentação da rua o local é bem silencioso, apenas em relação aos outros apartamentos é que há mais barulho. Uma sugestão para o condomínio é adotar um pouco mais de rigor no controle de entrada e saída de pessoas.
De modo geral, nossa estada no Rio foi ótima e como ainda queremos fazer muitos outros passeios na cidade, voltaremos com certeza!
Very Comfortable  apartment to enjoy the best places from Rio de Janeiro south zone( the apartment in Ipanema near Leblon) it is a perfect localization to take a walk in  the neighborhood.

Beautiful apartment very well located in Ipanema at 2 minutes walk from the beach. The apartment is clean and very well equipped, there is everything for cooking, plus linen... The shops are at the bottom of the building. Paulo has made a good guide on things to do in Rio. We really enjoyed our stay in Rio, I highly recommend this Airbnb!! Thanks Paulo
Peaceful apartment in the heart of Ipanema. Walking distance to beach, subway and shops. Our host Paulo was very attentive and helpful the whole time. Thank you, Paulo!

el departamento de Paulo es 100% recomendable ya que tiene una ubicación privilegiada.
Es la 2da vez que paro ahí y lo haría siempre!

Excellent location and surprisingly quiet.  Close to everything in Ipanema and super easy to get to the subway and buses. Clean and tidy, a comfortable sleep.  The entrance to the building could be better, but Paulo works hard to compensate that by having a nice atmosphere in the apartment.  Full kitchen helps, so does the washing machine.  We had a short but pleasant stay at Paulo's place.  He was always available to answer questions online.

Ótimo apartamento, com localização privilegiada perto dos melhores restaurantes, bares, lojas, melhor ponto da praia e também muito perto da Lagoa. O apt é exatamente conforme a descrição, bem cuidado e a comunicação com o Paulo é excelente. Recomendo. Abs
Paulo foi super atencioso desde o primeiro contato para a reserva. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e equipado. Minha estadia no Rio de Janeiro com os amigos não poderia ter sido melhor.

El apartamento de Paulo está en una zona inmejorable, el apartamento es cómodo y Paulo te da toda la atencion para que pases muy bien. Estamos muy agradecidos pues fue una experiencia increíble estar en Río, en esa zona y en el apartamento de Paulo.

A localização do apartamento é excelente! Rodeado por lojas, restaurantes e bares. Bastante seguro! O Paulo foi muito solicito e respondeu as nossas perguntas prontamente. Estava tudo bem limpinho. Adoramos nossa estadia!

Adoramos nossa estadia no espaço de Paulo. Coisas que eu achei ótimas: -O Apartamento é muito bem equipado, tudo funciona bem (internet ótima). A cozinha tem todos os utensílios necessários -A localização é maravilhosa. -Fácil acesso a tudo e mesmo assim super silencioso para dormir. Estava preocupada com o barulho da rua, mas como o apartamento é de fundos, não se ouviu nenhum barulhinho. Achei isso excelente. -O banho é super gostoso. Paulo deixou sabonetinho cheiroso no banheiro, água na geladeira, papel higiênico disponível. - Antes de nossa chegado o anfitrião nos enviou todas as informações que precisávamos saber para ter uma estadia e check in tranquilo, além de estar disponível para sanar dúvidas o tempo todo.  Os espaços (quarto e sala) não são grandes, mas funcionaram muito bem para nós. Ficamos no apartamento em 4 pessoas e conseguimos nos acomodar bem. A única coisa que eu acho que poderia melhorar, que é mínima,  é uma melhor organização das toalhas de banho e rosto que ficam nos armários.

We spent four nights in Paulo's apartment and had a great time. 

The best part of the apartment is the location, which is amazing--one block from the metro and two from the beach so you can get anywhere you want to go easily. The neighborhood felt very safe and we never felt uncomfortable coming back to the apartment at night. There is also a doorman there 24/7 which was nice.

The apartment was very roomy and comfortable for two people. The AC worked well in the bedroom and created good white noise although we really didn't hear much noise up there at all, even though the apartment is in a busy area. The bed was comfortable and we slept well. The kitchen was equipped with all the things you needed to cook so we could easily make breakfast there every morning.

Paulo's apartment is a great deal in the best neighborhood, you will not be disappointed if you stay there!
Super beliggenhed og lejligheden er veludstyret.

Excelente ubicación , cerca de todo y en una zona hermosa de Ipanema.
Muy cómodo el dpto
Apartamento excelente e você se sentirá  em casa! A localização é ótima, o apartamento é limpo e muito bem equipado e o Paulo é prestativo e nos ajudou quando precisamos.

Apto muito limpo, confortável, bem localizado e com todos utensílios necessários para uma boa estadia.
Voltaria a me hospedar com certeza.
Localização excelente, comunicação ágil, apto super limpo.

Paulo fue muy atento en todo momento. Cuando teniamos alguna consulta contestaba rapido. Nos sentimos como en casa en todo momento. Sin dudar la proxima vez que regrese a Rio tratare de regresar a su casa.

A principal vantagem, na minha opinião, é a localização excelente, perto da praia e do comércio. O apartamento é bem equipado, inclusive com secador de cabelos, decoração simpática. Se alguém tiver que dormir na sala, como foi o nosso caso, é bom saber que a janela fica recuada e tem cortina escura, de modo que a claridade não atrapalha.
Excelente la informacion y atencion brindada. La zona es la mejor.

O apartamento é incrível, a localização é sensacional e todos os detalhes são pensados com muito carinho. A comunicação com o Paulo sempre foi muito boa e com certeza quero voltar outras vezes - recomendo demais! Obrigado Paulo.

Fomos para o apartamento com bastante expectativa, pela localização e pelas fotos.
Realmente, o  apartamento é bem localizado, amplo, seguro, tem elevador, porteiro e a simpatia da Andreia e dos anfitriões. 
No entanto, nos deparamos com alguns problemas que não esperávamos: no banheiro o chuveiro pingava intermitentemente e tivemos que fechar o registro geral da água e a pia estava entupida. 
Os ar condicionados não são splits. O ar do quarto era bem barulhento e o da sala era portátil e quase não refrescava o ambiente. Além disso, o ventilador de teto não pode ser usado pq fazia um super barulho e estava sem um pedaço.
Todos os detalhes mencionados acima podem ser facilmente resolvidos. Isto feito, o apartamento pode ser considerado 5 estrelas.
Excelente departamento , muy accesible su llegada y gran atención de paulo . No nos faltó nada , espacioso y cómodo . Lo recomiendo y volvería sin dudas al mismo lugar .
El departamento es muy comodo.
Paulo's flat is in best location of Ipanema. Paulo and co-host Pericle were always very responsive and helpful. We'd a great stay in RJ
El departamento es muy lindo, totalmente equipado y muy bien ubicado. La zona es segura y  la atención de Paulo fue muy buena. Altamente recomendado.
Ótima localização, fotos condizentes com a realidade, excelente custo beneficio e ótimo hospedeiro. Hospedaria-me novamente ao retornar ao Rio.

Muy buena ubicación, muy céntrico, con el metro a 100 m, a 2 cuadras de la playa y la laguna.
La comunicación con el dueño muy buena y algunos detalles menores a mejorar en el apartamento, pero en términos generales y considerando precio beneficio, muy buena relación. Lo recomiendo.

Excelente experiencia en el departamento de Paulo,muy bien ubicado,en lo mejor de Ipanema,a dos cuadras del metro,una del supermercado Rio Sul,a una y media de la playa.Inmejorable zona,con negocios de primeras marcas.Muy bien equipado,con todo lo necesario para estar muy cómodo.Paulo ha sido un anfitrión muy amable y preocupado por nuestras necesidades. Muy recomendable.
Hermoso departamento con inmejorable ubicación. La atención de Paulo genial, siempre atento.
Muy lindo dpto. Buena zona y muy segura. Paulo un genio. Estuvo siempre a disposicion por cualquier consulta que teniamos.
Apto pequeno  mas muito bem montado e extremamente bem localizado perto de tudo!! Paulo foi muito gentil e tudo foi perfeito. As dicas foram otimas!

I never met Paulo in person but he is one of my favorite airbnb hosts ever. Extremely responsive and patient in communications. I asked all sorts of dumb questions since sometimes the Portuguese to English translations don’t make sense. The place is very clean and hi-tech. The lights turn on by remote control. The WiFi was super fast. I love the electronic lock system — you never have to carry a key. The apartment is SUPER convenient AND safe (24h concierge). The apartment is smack in the middle of ipanema, 2-3 blocks way from the beach. It’s on a Main Street, so it’s next to everything you need — coffee at 7AM, supermarket a block away, restaurants etc.  

One minor thing to beware - LITTLE ANTS!! Paulo says they are common things in Brazil so nothing one can do. Do your dishes immediately (even if there’s no food on it anymore and it’s just used dishes) and take out food-related trash immediately. I left out an empty dish that held ham on the kitchen counter for a few hours and it drew ants nonetheless.
Excelente ubicación y comodidad. Paulo es muy atento y el departamento muy cómodo. Realmente recomendable.
Appart bien situé à la proximité de commerces et de la plage. Grand et calme.

Excelente ubicación!!! el barrio muy lindo y seguro. El departamento tal cual la publicación y con todos los servicios a mano: supermercado  a  1 cuadra y la playa  (ipanema) a 2 . wifi y  2 tv smart muy bueno!!.  Para movernos usamos uber y  eran instantáneos. Paulo muy atento con las respuestas. sin duda volveríamos al mismo departamento.
Recomendo muito! Excelente acomodação e localização.

A localização do apartamento é otima. Roupas de cama e banho limpinhas e cheirosas. Tem um berço portátil novinho em folha com mosquiteiro, perfeito para quem tem bebê. Nas janelas não há tela (tem que tomar cuidado com as crianças). O ar condicionado da sala não estava funcionando mas como nos hospedamos em maio e não foi um problema. Para quem tem problems com cigarro, há vizinhos fumantes no prédio.
Excelente apartamento! Bem localizado, bem cuidado, tudo ótimo!

Great place in a super location! The place is small (like most places in Brazil), but has everything you need. My favorite thing was the electronic lock on the door, so you don't have to carry any keys with you or worry about losing them! Safe building and safe surroundings, I never had any issues. Close to the beach and tons of great shops, juice bars, etc. I never met Paulo, but he was normally responsive - except for a text when I was checking out that he didn't respond to (but it worked out anyway). I would def recommend this place, and would happily stay here again next time I'm back in Rio!

Espaço condizente com as fotos. Atentar para o fato de que há 1 quarto e 1 Colchao de casal na sala. Atendeu nossas expectativas e a localização é perfeita. Faltou um pouco de segurança pra acesso ao prédio, qqer um entra. O apartamento é pequeno e funcional. Ar condicionado do quarto não da conta, sendo necessário se virar com o bom ventilador de teto. Encanamento antigo, que causou problemas na descarga e pia que entupia até ao escovar os dentes.  Tv e sistema de som excelentes, inclusive com caixa de som Bluetooth e entrada p iPod e segunda tv no quarto. Tivemos problemas com a internet que simplesmente não funcionou nos últimos 2 dias da estadia.

L'appartement est au sixième étage d'un immeuble qui est équipé de deux ascenseurs. Le quartier d'ipanema est pourvu de tous les commerces et est bien desservi par les transports en commun. La serrure de l'appartement fonctionne par digicode, donc pas besoin de clé ce qui est pratique notamment pour se rendre à la plage juste en maillot de bain et serviette. Le quartier est très sûre, nous n'avons pas eu de sentiment d'insécurité contrairement à d'autres quartiers. Copacobana est à vingt minutes en marchant à bonne allure. L'appartement est équipé de tout le nécessaire, il est très propre et le système d'eau chaude est très performant contrairement à d'autres éprouvés au Brésil. Nous étions deux adultes et deux ados et conseillons l'appartement de Paulo pour un séjour à Rio.

Paulos Apartment is a very nice and comfy place! The check-in with only the numbers for the pin-pad at the door is very comfortable. Very good area of Rio de Janeiro! Also you should definitely enjoy Paulos restaurant recommendations (especially for breakfast).
Thanks for the good communication Paulo!
Regards, Niclas
El depto está muy bien ubicado y es realmente cómodo. Paulo es un gran anfitrión que se preocupa por que sus huéspedes sólo se encarguen de disfrutar. Muy recomendable!

Hermoso departamento, tal cual las fotos! La ubicación es perfecta, a dos cuadras de la playa y en una avenida llena de negocios, bares, supermercados, lo que se te ocurra! Paulo siempre atento a nuestras necesidades. Muy cómodo y con todo lo necesario para pasar unas hermosas vacaciones, gracias Paulo!!
Great location to stay in Ipanema, comfortable place and it has all the needed amenities, even a Nespresso machine :)
Un lugar tal como lo describe el anuncio, tanto en comodidades como el barrio la zona la gente del edificio viaje confía nenas chicas y estuve muy tranquilo todos son muy hospitalarios
El departamento esta inmejorablemente ubicado, súper equipado, muy tecnológico, paulo está siempre a disposición y es muy amable y atento. Las recomendaciones son exactas y muy útiles.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, perto da praia e com todas as lojas e serviços necessários por perto. O Paulo foi muito disponível e empenhado para que as coisas corressem bem.
Excelente como siempre, es la segunda vez q voy

La descripción del departamento es idéntica a la publicación. El depto es muy cómodo para dos personas, tiene un montón de accesorios para pasar una estadía maravillosa. La zona en la q se encuentra es muy segura y cerca de la playa y de locales comerciales varios( bares, restaurantes, supermercados, etc). Paulo en todo momento se mostró atento a cualquier necesidad q podíamos llegar a tener.
Ótima hospitalidade, bem localizado, com boa apresentação e higienização.

Excelente experiência.  Anfitrião ágil e prestativo. 
A localização é excelente.  Muito boa mesmo!
Eu e a Camila adoramos! Vamos voltar!!
Tudo limpo e arrumado, sem nada que desabone.
Excelente!
Excelente apto. Muito aconchegante.
Espaço muito bom, aconchegante, seguro (maçaneta eletrônica). Local cercado por comércios e muito perto da praia.
excelente ubicación! el departamento muy lindo. super recomendable.

Me hospede  con mi pareja. El departamento super  cómodo, grande tal cual como se ve en las (Website hidden by Airbnb) ubicación es inmejorable, super seguro y lleno de lugares lindos para cenar y/o tomar algo. Paulo un genio, muy atento siempre. sin duda volveríamos.
The communication with Paulo was excellent, who was really helpful

O espaço é muito limpo, bem organizado e a localização é excelente. Realmente as fotos descrevem bem o que é o apartamento, que possui um grau elevado de limpeza e conforto. O anfitrião tem o cuidado de disponibilizar até Internet e Netflix de boa qualidade, o que acabou sendo útil em um dia chuvoso.

Melhor experiência com airbnb que já tive no Rio de Janeiro.
excelente, todo lo que se muestra en la foto esta en el departamento, impecable.
Localização otima, limpeza impecável, infraestrutura completa e anfitrião extremamente atencioso, não havia possibilidade de dar algo errado, recomendo muito!
Recomiendo 100% este hospedaje. Una zona súper segura y cerca de todo. El departamento bien equipado y limpio. Paulo siempre predispuesto para ayudarnos. Mi estadía fue excelente.
Looks better than the images! Great location and comfy bed!

El departamento está, en primer lugar, muy buen ubicado en Ipanema. Es amplio y a pesar de que el living no tiene ventanas, da a un pasillo bien iluminado que da buena luz al departamento.
Tiene baño y cocina completos y bien equipados (incluso filtro de agua) y Paulo cuida mucho los detalles: recibe con cápsulas de Nespresso, bebidas en la heladera, hay abundante ropa de cama y toallas, funciona perfecto la red de wifi y además, Paulo responde rápido y con abundantes detalles a cualquier requerimiento. 
Creo que es un gran anfitrión para un departamento muy recomendable. Espero volver!
Excelente ubicación. Muy bien equipado. Todo de 10!

name: Large 1 BD Upper East With Roof Top
summary: In the heart of midtown Manhattan, south exposure, quiet so you can get a good night´s sleep. SUPER convenient to all modes of transportation, shops and fine restaurants. Full-time doorman, rooftop deck and cozy space.
space: 1 large bedroom, large living and dining area. Sofa bed in living room (easily transforms from sofa to comfy bed. While there is only one toilet and shower - they are separated by a door lockable from both sides. No more waiting to use the toilet while someone takes too long a shower! The kitchen has everything you would expect including fridge, toaster, kettle, espresso machine, microwave and washing machine.
description: In the heart of midtown Manhattan, south exposure, quiet so you can get a good night´s sleep. SUPER convenient to all modes of transportation, shops and fine restaurants. Full-time doorman, rooftop deck and cozy space. 1 large bedroom, large living and dining area. Sofa bed in living room (easily transforms from sofa to comfy bed. While there is only one toilet and shower - they are separated by a door lockable from both sides. No more waiting to use the toilet while someone takes too long a shower! The kitchen has everything you would expect including fridge, toaster, kettle, espresso machine, microwave and washing machine. Be sure (no matter the weather) to go up to the 15th floor for some time on the rooftop terrace! When you will be staying at or place you will have the apartment for your own. In any case, we will be easily accessible via phone or email and we will be able to give you any information that you need. There is absolutely everything you could possibly need within walki
neighborhood_overview: There is absolutely everything you could possibly need within walking distance - food, clothing, hair/spa services, movie theaters etc. Walk 8 minutes for a view of East River and Roosevelt Island. We are walking distance (ranging from 10-25 minutes) from MOMA, Central Park, Times Square, Theater District, Grand Central Station etc.
notes: If you need to do laundry, go down to the lower level of the apartment and use the pay as you go machines. $1.75 per load and takes about 40 minutes. Add another $1.75 and 40 minutes for the dryer.
transit: It could not be easier to go anywhere in Manhattan from our place. Subways E M 6 at Lexington Av-53 St. 1 block away. 0.2 miles (Website hidden by Airbnb) at Lexington Av-59 St. 2 blocks away. 0.4 miles E M at 5th Av 0.5 mile (Website hidden by Airbnb) at 42 Street - Grand Central 0.5 miles F at Lexington Av 0.6 miles N Q R at 5th Av 0.6 miles. If you prefer to take private transportation, there are tons of cabs and our place is super well articulated for almost all forms of public transportation to take you even further afield.
access: Be sure (no matter the weather) to go up to the 15th floor for some time on the rooftop terrace!
interaction: When you will be staying at or place you will have the apartment for your own. In any case, we will be easily accessible via phone or email and we will be able to give you any information that you need.
house_rules: Please treat our home like you would hope guests would treat your home.  We use AirBnB extensively because we think it creates a win-win situation where the guest gets a great value for the money they pay and the owner renter in our case) makes some money to pay expenses of the house. No smoking (go to the rooftop or down to the first floor)  No pets please.  I encourage you to enjoy our space, but please be respectful of neighbours.

host.host_about:
I am a friendly adventurous guy from Barcelona who has been living abroad for the last 12 years (NY first, Zambia, Norway, Luxembourg and now back in NY). 

I have a degree on Physics and I work as a teacher. I have worked in public schools in Barcelona and NY and in International Schools in all the countries where I have lived. I have been renting apartments for the last 18 years and I have always had a positive rapport with all my landlords and landladies.

I am interested in using AirBnB as I think it is a good way to create a win win situation where owners and "tenants" benefit from a mutual agreement. I love reading, cycling, skiing, meeting people from different countries and cultures.

reviews.comments: Great location, flat and value. Highly recommend this flat which is perfectly located in mid town, the flat is very clean and spacious. All major attractions in mid-town are walking distance and groceries/restaurants/bars are steps away
Great place to stay! Clean, great amenities, very good location.

Super séjour chez Aquil ! Hôte génial attentioné. L'appartement est super bien placé et très agréable avec le rooftop en plus ! 
Il a vraiment été un hôte disponible et compréhensif. Je recommande pour un séjour à New York !

Aquil-Li and his wife were excellent hosts. The place was perfect and as described. Absolutely no complaints. The location made the deal even sweeter. Definitely looking forward to staying here again.

We had a great stay at Aquil-Li and Laura's place.  Fantastic location, spacious and clean apartment, roof deck was a nice bonus!  Other things we really enjoyed about their apt.:  room for all 3 of us to sit at dining table together to eat/talk...a rarity in NYC apartments.  The dual-entry bathroom made it easy for anyone to use toilet during the night, without disturbing sleepers in the adjoining room.  The kitchen has that quick-steam, plug-in teapot which was great.  The views are very NYC.  And that "Ess-a-Bagel" place a block away is fantastic!......every kind of bagel and cream cheese and sandwich you could imagine.  Two of us stayed two nights and there were three of us for one night...and we were plenty comfortable.  We would suggest some more & larger towels (just one hand towel and we didn't find washcloths anywhere) and more bedding.  There was only a fitted undersheet (on mattress) and then an ultra warm duvet/comforter on main bed.  The same on couch bed. Duvet was too warm of a cover for us, a regular cover sheet or lighter blanket as cover would've been more hotel-like/normal.

Aquil and Laura were very welcoming and made our stay that much better.  The place was clean and as described.  The location was great with access to subway system for easy access to the whole city.  Would highly recommend and would stay again if the oppurtunity comes about.

Our experience with Aquil-Li and Laura was wonderful!  They were very attentive and kept good contact leading up to our stay and during our stay.  Thank you both so much for ensuring we were comfortable and didn't have any questions!  Your apartment was lovely and we were very comfortable!!!  The apartment is in a great location and easy walk to most things we were interested in doing.  There are a lot of great restaurant choices nearby.  The apartment was very clean and had everything my husband and two teenage girls needed to be comfortable.  Thank you for an amazing place to stay!

Staying at Aquil-Li and Laura's apartment was a joy for all four of us.  It really felt great to be in the neighborhood and the surrounding stores and restaurants really made for a wonderful experience.  We arrived on the eve of the big snow storm of January 2016 and the setting made for a cozy environment for all of us.  The storm kept us indoors more than we had expected, but the apartment made it a pleasure.  We are so glad to have stumbled onto such a nice place.  Aqui-Li and Laura kept in good contact with us and provided us with great recommendations.   We hope to return!

Your apartment was great for our family and exactly as described and as in pictures.
We felt like "in home" .The bed and couch were comfortable. everything was very clean. The big table was excellent for meals and playing cards. 
The  location is great, nearby everything we need,  with  excellent restaurants and supermarket. 
Not far from most of the attractions of NYC and close to the subway.
Aquil - Li and Laura were very kind, excellent hosts. Laura was always in contact, and asked several times if everything was fine with us.
We, also, felt safe in this apartment with doorman presence  24 h/day. All the doormen were very sympathetic and helpful. 
This apartment was a contribute for our unforgettable holidays in NYC. We recommend it to all.
Thank you Aquil-Li and Laura!
Anabela, José, Laura e Alexandre (Portugal)
Everything was absolutely as listed and perfect.  Very nice and clean.  A perfect location in the city!

My husband, my two children and I had a great stay here.  The location is fantastic with close proximity to the subway and lots of restaraunts and eateries close by.   We enjoyed walking up to 5th and to all the tourist attractions with the added bonus of catching the subway to those further away.  The apartment gave my family of four (with an active boy) plenty of room to wind down after a day of walking around NYC.  Quil and Laura were great hosts ready to give advice and friendly banter at all times.

El departamento es mejor de lo que muestran las fotos ! El recibimiento fue extraordinario y la comunicación fue excelente, aunque casi no hizo falta porque funcionaba todo perfecto. La ubicación era ideal ya que estaba a una cuadra del metro y a no más de 10 minutos de las principales atracciones! Los porteros del edificio eran muy atentos y serviciales ! Pasamos unos excelentes días en su departamento ! Lo recomiendo 100% salvo cuando yo regrese ! Jajaja
Juan 


The apartment was better than the photographs ! The reception was amazing they give us everything that we need for our journey and also the comunication ! The location was perfect , we have the train at one block and all the attractions in less than 10 minutes! The doormans were such a lovely and friendly people! We have excellent days in their  house ! We recommend it 100%  but only when I don't rent it !! Jajaja 
Juan !

Wir haben den Aufenthalt in Lauras und Q. sehr genossen. Laura war sehr bemüht, dass alles bestens klappte und hat mehrmals nachgefragt. Die Wohnung ist liebevoll ausgestattet und bietet genügend Platz für vier Personen, die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und es gibt einen grossen Tisch, damit man auch in der Wohnung essen kann. Auch die Dachterrasse war super. 
Die Wohnung liegt in einer guten Umgebung mit Subway, Restaurants und Geschäften in nächster Nähe.

It was so nice to have an easy check-in (the keys were with the doorman) and to walk into such a clean apartment with snacks welcoming us after a long day traveling! Aquil-Li texted the next day to make sure everything was going well for us which was very thoughtful. Great location, great apartment, and a wonderful host!

Accueil tres chaleureux et attentionné.

Nous nous sommes vraiment sentis à la maison. Quili et Laura sont vraiment très attachant !

L'appartement est superbe et parfaitement situé !

Merci !

Apartamento muy bien ubicado, ideal para 4 personas, en un edificio con portero las 24 horas del día.
Inquilinos muy atentos y preocupados por que nuestro viaje fuera perfecto. 
Recomendable 100%
I really like this apartment; it is warm, personal and quiet. The owner was very nice and available. Everything was perfect.

This apartment is great and exactly as advertised. Aquil-Li was very easy to communicate with and the ease of the apartment and its location made our stay in NYC a great one. Apartment was clean and had the all the ease of being at home while close to subway, restaurants and all that NYC and Manhattan has to offer. We won't  hesitate to recommend it to our friends when talking about the trip.

Logement parfait, très bien situé,calme.
Appartement très bien équipé.
Hôte très attentionné !

Wonderful couple! Amazing hospitality! Not to mention the thoughtful touches. 
Aquil-Li constantly communicated with us, before we checked in until we checked out. Everything went smoothly, from the directions he gave us, to us getting the key when we arrived. 
Their apartment is very neat and tidy, in a nice, quiet area. It's also very close to public transportation. 
Everything was great overall.

Excelente todo desde el comienzo. Aquil-Li no sólo respondió a todas mis preguntas inmediatamente , sino que también me brindó información necesaria antes de llegar al departamento.
Es de destacar su amabilidad y predisposición para ayudar en todo momento. Siempre en contacto con nosotras.
El departamento ( la distribución, el baño, la amplitud del living/comedor y dormitorio; muy cómodo para 4 personas) y la ubicación son inmejorables. Muy bueno el tema de que haya un portero en la entrada durante las 24 horas para dejar la llave, sobre todo si son varias personas las que se alojan.
Definitivamente, lo recomiendo y volvería a alojarme sin dudarlo.
Susana

Very organized apartment
Nice and comfortable beds
Miró's memory game is fun!

Q's place was amazing - clean, comfortable and conveniently located to everything. He was very easy to reach when we had questions and was able to give suggestions on local food places. Will definitely stay again if given the opportunity!

Perfecto todo. Desde la ubicación, la veracidad, limpieza y atención. Destacar que en días tan fríos nunca lo sentimos dentro del apartamento. He utilizado airbnb en más de 15 ciudades alrededor del Mundo y sin dudas es una de las mejores experiencias.
No pudimos conocer personalmente a Laura y Quili-li pero no faltará ocasión.
Totalmente recomendable!

I can honestly say this is one of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed at! The apartment was fantastic! The space was much larger than expected, beautifully decorated, and backed up to a quiet, private garden area that offered relief from the bustling sounds of the city. The rooftop deck provided some great views. Check-in/out was a breeze. Would love to stay here again on future trips to NYC. Thanks, Q!
Aquil-Li's place was fantastic and spacious. it's in a great location and very clean. we had a great weekend!

Appartement très bien situé dans Midtown, proche de plusieurs lignes de métro.
Accueil très sympathique de Laura et Aqui Li. Ils ont été très attentionnés et nous ont donné toutes les infos utiles (metro, musées, parks, supermarchés, visites,etc) et étaient disponibles pendant tout le séjour.
L'appartement est bien équipé pour une famille avec deux enfants. L'immeuble est également sécurisé avec un portier présent 24h sur 24.
C'est une adresse idéale pour visiter Manhattan. A retenir !!

這個地點好到沒話說,在所有觀光景點的正中心,走路2分鐘就有地鐵
地鐵出口就有24小時的cvs(雜貨店),不用怕肚子餓
這個地區的治安很好,加上又有非常親切的管理員,可以非常安心的入住
房東也非常好跟貼心,設備跟用品一應俱全

I stayed for 2 nights. Aquil-Li was prompt on response. The apartment was very cool, the roof top garden had a great view. I have nothing negative to say, I had a great stay. Thanks to Aquil-Li and Laura for sharing their apartment.

Great location very close to all the main attractions and grand central station. Host was willing to accommodate to our needs and very helpful. There is a 24 hr pharmacy, superfood markets, and several restaurants nearby. Place is very spacious and warm felt like home. I would definitely recommend 115%%% !

name: Kona Kondo I- beautiful oceanfront Casa de Emdeko
summary: Casa de Emdeko is a wonderful oceanfront complex just 1.5 miles south of Downtown Kona. Enjoy my garden level condo overlooking the fountains in a beautiful courtyard and Infinity pool overlooking the ocean. Just minutes to restaurants and bars.
space: Casa de Emdeko is a wonderful oceanfront complex just 1.5 miles south of Kona. Enjoy my garden level condo ( easy access, no stairs or elevators to navigate, senior friendly ) overlooking the fountains in a beautiful courtyard. Quick  easy access to the swim pools, Cabana, restrooms, sandy beach area and spectacular Kona sunsets ! The grounds offer 2 solar heated pools (one saltwater with breaking waves splashing up into the pool and one freshwater pool) and a private beach with swaying palm trees that is perfect for viewing the sunset. The complex is very friendly and is perfect for making new friends from around the world. Several top of the line BBQs at the Cabana bring people together in the evening. Plus free coffee at the cabana. My condo is a large and quiet 1 bedroom unit on the ground floor. It is in a private location overlooking the two fountains that attracts birds singing for you in the morning. The unit comes with A/C, cable TV, DVD, and secure WIFI internet access. We ha
description: Casa de Emdeko is a wonderful oceanfront complex just 1.5 miles south of Downtown Kona. Enjoy my garden level condo overlooking the fountains in a beautiful courtyard and Infinity pool overlooking the ocean. Just minutes to restaurants and bars. Casa de Emdeko is a wonderful oceanfront complex just 1.5 miles south of Kona. Enjoy my garden level condo ( easy access, no stairs or elevators to navigate, senior friendly ) overlooking the fountains in a beautiful courtyard.
