Quick  easy access to the swim pools, Cabana, restrooms, sandy beach area and spectacular Kona sunsets ! The grounds offer 2 solar heated pools (one saltwater with breaking waves splashing up into the pool and one freshwater pool) and a private beach with swaying palm trees that is perfect for viewing the sunset. The complex is very friendly and is perfect for making new friends from around the world. Several top of the line BBQs at the Cabana bring people together in the evening. Plus free coffee at the cabana. My condo
neighborhood_overview: The Big Island is a very special place, and Casa de Emdeko is perfect location to anchor while exploring everything the island has to offer. Enjoy your vacation!
notes: Hawaii Tax ID: TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) / GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: The best way to get around is by car; however the property is less than 1 1/2 miles away from downtown Kona.
access: Pool access
interaction: There is a manager on site to offer any help the guest might need during their stay.  Contact Info: Tom or Myriam Edwards
house_rules: No pets allowed No smoking allowed Please be respectful to the furniture and kitchenware

host.host_about: I love to travel, and have been fortunate enough to experience many different countries and cultures around the world. I work in the hotel industry and have a passion for hospitality and tourism. I also enjoy meeting new people and enjoy sharing my beautiful " Kona Kondo ".

reviews.comments:
La dueña en todo momento estuvo atenta a nuestros mensajes, el apartamento está muy bien ubicado y con transporte público en la puerta. Es una zona de apartamentos muy transitada pero no se oye el ruido de la calle.
La casa estaba limpia y con todo lo necesario en cocina y baño.
Lo único negativo, la comodidad del sofá cama y que sólo hay un baño. Ideal para 2 personas.

The apartment was tidy and Jeanne was very responsive. It is located in a convenient location, a short drive from most activities around Kona. We appreciated that some beach equipment was provided, though most of the snorkel gear is a bit dated.
Kitchen was well stocked with equipment. Parking was easy to find.
Of note, the laundry facilities can only be used between 8am and 9pm, last load must be in at 7pm.
We had a wonderful stay! Thank you! 10/10 :)

We didn't meet Jeanna in person, but all her emails were informative, very helpful and just in time. We had a great time at Big Island - apartment's location is great: a lot of good food, gorgeous beaches and snorkeling places in less that 5-7 minutes drive. BBQ/Pool area with amazing ocean view is really cool!
I had a blast here on the big island! This place is a steal. Loved spending my time here. Will come back for sure!
Very nice condo! Very good condition and well equipped. Beach towels where provided - this was very much appreciated. Parking at the condo area. I can absolutely recommend this condo to anyone!

The property is lovely with 2 pools, bed comfy and all amenities provided.  The ice maker in the fridge was fantastic, and there are farmers markets in town to grab all the fresh fruit & veggies you need.  The property has aircon but I didn't need to use it - the place stays quite cool even on hot days and the ceiling fans were enough for me.  Plenty of parking and the onsite shop came in handy.
Beautiful apartment, clean and the sunset...amazing!

Jeanna made us feel very welcome by leaving a bottle of wine and some coffee. The condo was very clean, but older than the pictures made it appear. The amenities of the complex were very enjoyable and convienent.

The property and host were very nice as promised. We really enjoyed the beach equipment she let us borrow. I cannot rave enough about the saltwater pool next to the ocean, and the ability to BBQ and dine while hearing the ocean waves crashing.  Although completely outside of our host's control, It was a little hard to not have the host living in the area, just because we were not familiar with the process for tropical storm/hurricane issues that arose during our stay.

Our quick trip to Kailua-Kona was perfect and this was due to Jeanna's wonderful condo at Casa de Emdeko! 

It was super clean, cute, and spacious. It has everything you need as well for a great stay... Beach gear (chairs, umbrella, cooler, floaties, towels, boogie boards, and more), and the condo has all the cooking supplies in a great little kitchen. Oh, and the bed, it's one of the best I've come across! Best sleep ever! Plus the condo has AC for those hotter days and nights.

The condo grounds are wonderful as well, and well kept. With lush foliage, two pools (the salt water one is fantastic as it's on the water), BBQ area with grills, and a sandy area with lounge chairs and palm trees. It's hard to want to leave in the mornings. In fact, the morning we left we took a last dip in the salt pool and watched a pod of playful dolphins swim past... Pretty spectacular!

Lastly, the location is fantastic. Only about a 4 minute car ride/taxi to downtown Kailua-Kona, and close to the fun, little beach Magic Sands/White Sands beach.

We will definitely be back when in Kailua-Kona!

Thanks for a great stay and great communication + hospitality Jeanna!

This place was an amazing find! It was so comfortable and close to downtown Kona. Everything was clean, the air conditioning was a much enjoyed treat, and the bed was extremely comfortable. Jenna was excellent about sending all the info we needed to find the condo and to get settled. We would absolutely stay there again!!

The neighborhood was quiet and close to Kona downtown. 

The kitchen was well stocked with basic spices and gadgets , we appreciated that. 

It was a great value and the pools were an added plus. 
Highly reccomend it and I would return!

Beautiful condo in a great location! We walked downtown several times throughout our stay for meals and it was an easy, convenient walk. It was a pleasure to stay here, even better in person than in the pictures.
Great place to stay. We absolutely loved it. Very nice, clean and modern apartment. Very friendly and helpful host. We would definitely recommend and hope to come back next year.

This condo was great and had everything we needed for our stay! A cooler, beach chairs, beach towel, sunscreen, and other toiletries. There were even some cooking necessities, coffee, and snacks. We enjoyed the patio with a large table and comfortable chairs. The grounds were beautifully kept and the pools were not busy and very nice! The only time things got busy was around sunset, but we spent our last evening walking out a little path to a rocky area and enjoying it by ourselves. The location is right on the water and a short drive from everything. We had never been to the area before so after exploring, we do wish we had been a little closer to down town but it was still super close to everything!
Great, quiet place. Close to several beaches! We saw dolphin far away swimming towards snorkelers in the morning.

Cet appartement était très confortable, bien situé (proche des endroits principaux à voir à Kona) et contenait beaucoup de commodités pour la plage, notamment. Il est très spacieux pour un couple avec un bébé, ce que nous avons apprécié. Nous avons particulièrement aimé la table extérieure sur une petite galerie bien aménagée. Nous recommandons fortement l'appartement de Jeanna, une fille bien organisée. Elle n'est pas sur place, mais le document qu'elle nous prépare est très clair.
Jeanna's was condo was just as described!  The complex is quiet, well maintained, and in a great location.  We look forward to staying here again.
Great location!  Gorgeous view and accommodations.
Awesome location with everything you need for a home base to all your big island adventures or for a relaxing time by the pools and beach.

Hawaii is a warm place, it is imperative to have AC and this place did not.  There were only fans.  Also, don't plan on cooking much as the kitchen sparse and the oven doesn't fully open due to the fridge blocking it.  The fridge did not provide ice and not water, though a dispenser is there.  The bed squeaked with every little movement and the place was overall not very pleasant.  I would not recommend anyone to stay here unless you are really on a budget and don't plan on spending much time here.
Bel appartement très beau site qui mérite d y rester pour apprécier la résidence et ses atouts dont 2 piscines (eau douce et eau salée) proche de Kona pour les restaurants bonne adresse
Jeanna's condo was cozy   It was very clean and had nice finishing a. There are 2 pools. The salt water pool is amazing.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The building was a bit older than we expected but the property was well maintained and the unit was clean. We cooked alot in the unit and had plenty of useful utensils that allowed us to cook easily. We were glad to have two thick soft beach towels to take on our day trips.  The unit had four bath & hand towels and two facial towels.  The unit could be enhanced by a bath mat.  The laundry room was just steps from the unit which is very appealing. We could hear people walking above us at night and showering in the early morning. Aside from that the unit was just minutes from downtown and 30 minutes from Waikola with great restaurants and shopping.

This unit was comfortably furnished, conveniently located close to the entrance for easy access with parking easily available.  Really liked the cable television to access variety of shows, kitchen nicely equipped, nice sitting area and walk by the ocean.
We really enjoyed staying at Jeanna's condo. Being on the ground floor was very convenient with having children :)
We enjoyed both pools, being on the ground floor & location was perfect for activities N. & S. of Kona.

Jeanna’s description was spot on and it was very clean. She is also very informative and responsive. It was everything we were looking for on our getaway. We would definitely stay here if we ever come back to Kona.

The place was awesome! Right at the ocean, super clean, well equipped kitchen, a lot of beach gear, cozy patio, nice salt water pool, ... everything was amazing! Jeanna was very friendly and responsive :)
Really enjoyed our stay here. Condo has everything you need. The community is really nice. The saltwater pool is beautiful!
Great place to stay around Kona!  Beautiful sunset view! Extremely clean and with two great pools :)

We had a wonderful stay at Jeanna’s place. The suite was clean, comfortable and included all the beach gear one could possibly need. The pool and gardens were amazing, the barbecue and laundry facilities were appreciated and it was in a convenient location between the town and beaches. We particularly enjoyed drinking the complimentary coffee provided by the complex on our quiet, private patio each morning.
Awesome value and Jeanna was great. I would stay here again!
We had some great days at Jeannas condo! It was so lovely and the facilities were great with the pools and everything!

The house was perfectly located for us to be able to go south to two step for the day or in to town to get dinner. My wife and I loved our stay and would recommend it to anyone looking for a beautiful and quiet place to stay on the big island

The ground floor condo is part of a lovely garden resort.We loved the pools and bbq areas.Everything was keep beautifully clean. Good to see recycling encouraged. The unit was clean and well (Website hidden by Airbnb) was nice to be a bit out of town away from the noise.
Great location to explore the big island. Condo was clean, air conditioning worked well. The pools were nice and great sunset views.

Jeanne was very  caring  during my brief stay. She gives very well thought out instructions to make for a comfortable stay. The condo's location has a wonderful view of  the coast with salt water pool, lovely garden  and beach area
Good location, close to shops and restaurants. Minutes from a public beach

Jeanna’s place is located in a nice area of kona close to the main strip. We had an easy time getting around to some great restaurants and a nice beach. The pool at the complex was wonderful. We had an ocean view and could hear the crashing waves, but had the calmness of a pool. There was only two other people in the pool too, which was nice to not have it be loud or crowded. The apartment itself is well stocked with kitchen items, toiletries, towels, including beach towels and ocean gear to borrow (chairs, boogie boards, etc). There was a pack n play for our baby which was also great. The only problem was there’s not a great place to put the baby except in the bedroom with you. The other concern for us is there’s no carpeted area in the main living room, just tile, so for our 6 month old he couldn’t be left to crawl around and play by himself since falling over would’ve been quite painful! For older kids who are better at crawling and sitting it’d be fine though. The nicest thing was jeanna allowed us a late checkout so our baby could finish his nap which helped us have a better day all around. Overall it was a great place to stay, a little expensive for one night, but lovely and very relaxing.

This location is very convenient and the waterfront waves were the highlight. We had quite a few lovely mornings and sunsets watching and listening to the waves crash against the rocky shore. The sandy beach lounge area is a really nice touch, as well as the salt water pool, because you get all the beauty vibes even not being in an ocean-front swimmable location. 
The main drag of Kona is an easy 15m walk away, or you can hop on the trolley. We seemed to keep missing the trolley so we hitchhiked or walked to town most days. I recommend renting a car to enjoy the island, unless you are an ambitious hitchhiker (which is quite safe on the island). This unit comes with a parking pass which was really nice. 
The day we arrived there was a notice on the unit that the electricity would be out from 7am-7pm the next day, so neither the unit electric amenities or the pools were open. We rearranged our plans to be gone that day, but as a very-much-not morning person, the immediate early wake up to be able to shower and whatnot right after a long day of travel was kind of a bummer. The host gave us a partial refund for this day after some back and forth. 
If you are squeamish about bugs, be prepared to spot a cockroach or two. There was a huge dead one when we arrived and some smaller ones we got rid of. I think that because this is a ground level unit off the garden area, they sneak in the lanai door when left open. Wasn't a huge deal to us. 
The premises are really lovely and well kept. Take a peek in the bush on the lanai and you'll spot a bird nest! there were two eggs there during our trip so the next guests may have some chicks to admire. 
The neighbors and other guests are really kind as well. One couple feeds wild eels that live in the rocks. I'd never seen wild eels so that was a really neat thing to see. 
Overall a good trip, with just a couple minor hiccups!
Jeanna’s place was great! Totally perfect for my bf and I. It was a great location and we were close to everything on the Kailua-kona side. The pool was lovely. Would definitely stay again!

Clean, cozy, easy check-in. We had a plumbing mishap and the local contact arranged for a fix with minimal fuss. While there is no actual ocean access, the salt water pool overlooking the water is lovely. Beaches and town are a short drive away.

Excellent emplacement, résidence très calme, logement très grand et très bien équipé, le séjour s'est bien déroulé. Les BBQ, et surtout les 2 piscines d'eau douce et d'eau salée sont un vrai "plus". Nous recommandons.

I would recommend this place anyone is looking for a great location on the Big Island. The outside salt water pool is delightful and the ocean water spills directly into the pool during high tide creating a lovely experience and ambiance. The accommodations were great and the place has everything that you could possibly need. In addition, there are even boogie boards, beach chairs etc available.  Furthermore, the host's response time was very good and she is highly communicative. Overall, a great place to stay on your vacation!

The condo was clean and fairly well stocked. Location was amazing, exactly where the host said. Pools were wonderful. No wifi, so be ready for your phone not to work. No service until you left the complex no matter who your carrier is. Washer and dryer are in the common area by the condo, not in the condo itself. Beautiful views every morning and evening.
fantastic accomodation and great host..i loved the stay very much
Amazing place to stay!
Jeannas place was located in a great area. Many amenities. The pool was amazing with picture perfect views overlooking the ocean.

Hi Jeanna - thanks for your great hospitality. We had a great time in the area of Kailua-Kona. We enjoyed staying at your apartment very much, equipped with all the necessary stuff for a perfect holiday at the beach, helpful information some days prior to our arrival and a quiet, nice and relaxed terrace for breakfast, lunch or dinner. The sunset at the Case de Emdeko is beautiful. Thank you once again. Verena & Markus

Jenna’s place was just perfect for our family. The grounds and people were super great. One resident blows a conch shell over the ocean every night at sunset, so special! We loved how close to town we were but not in the middle of the busy main drag. We will be back! Cheers!

This beautiful little apt. was great and it was a very convenient location. There were 2 pools on site, one fresh water, the other salt that sat right on the edge next to the ocean shore. It is absolutely gorgeous and a perfect spot to watch the sunset. 
We ran into one issue with the hot water on our last day, but I think it was just a freak incident. The host looked into the issue as fast as she could. Other than that, everything was great! I would recommend this place without a doubt!

Very easy instructions for arrival and great location. One minor issue that was attended to and resolved quickly. Very clean with anything you could need. Recommend highly for anyone looking to stay in Kona!
Very quiet home with two warm pools and a shady outside area perfect for breakfast. Easy communication before hand with no difficulty at check in. Fantastic end to our honeymoon!

Jeanna's getaway is a real delight, in a wonderful part of the world!  The facilities have everything you will need, as well as some great outdoor access to pools/lounges/views of the ocean.  Incredibly easy and seamless operation, and we would be glad to use it anytime again in the future.  Thanks Jeanna, it was truly a magical week we had! - Tim Dixon

We enjoyed Casa de Emdeko and Jeanna's place very much.  The unit is nicely updated and we enjoyed the ground floor lanai location by the fountain a lot - it is quite private  and well screened by the landscaping with little foot traffic. We ate all our meals there. The kitchen is very well equipped. We didn't use much of the available beach gear, but appreciated it was there. The location is good; a bit out of the business of town, and the buildings are well set back from the road, so quiet.  We lounged at the beach and enjoyed the salt water pool a lot. The beach area was never really very busy, at least at the time we were there.

Jeanna was prompt and responsive. 
Her place was very clean and in a convenient location. 
Definitely loved the pools and the beach stuff she provided. 
Access was easy and so was check in and out. 
Thanks!

We really enjoyed our stay here! We liked the full kitchen for cooking meals. Ground floor makes it easy to come and go. Parking and location are great. We really liked the salt pool and oceanside patio. Makes for a great space to have dinner outside. Beach chairs, umbrella and cooler are provided and essential for the beach. AC worked well.

Great location and clean condo. Bathroom door didn’t close properly and there was only one key. Safe ran out of battery so we had to get new ones before we dared to use it. Manager was no where to be found the whole week we were there. The building is dated but Jeanna did a good job making it cozy. Nice towels and other basic amenities. Many drawers to put your belongings and hooks for towels etc - a very nice bonus! Overall a pleasant stay!

name: Sunny near everything
summary: Cozy, colorful and sunny appartement where you will feel at home. Quiet neighborhood near the subway, coffee shops, grocery store. Many plants to keep you company!
space: Lots of sunlight, quiet, fully equiped.
description: Cozy, colorful and sunny appartement where you will feel at home. Quiet neighborhood near the subway, coffee shops, grocery store. Many plants to keep you company! Lots of sunlight, quiet, fully equiped.
neighborhood_overview: À 1 coin de rue : Brûlerie très sympa : Olives et café Microbrasserie et restaurant : Isle de garde Accès aux vélos Bixi Épicerie Buanderie Dépanneur Boutique de vêtements fabriqués au Québec : Frëtt
notes: L'évier de la salle de bain ne peut être utilisé. Vous aurez accès à l'évier de la cuisine, parfaitement fonctionnel.
transit: 2 minutes a pied de la station d'autobus 8 minutes a pied de la station de métro
house_rules: Les voisins sont très calmes. Merci de respecter leur tranquilité après 23h. Merci de ne pas fumer à l'intérieur et de prendre soin du logement!

host.host_about: Fan de yoga, de tricot et de vélo, j'ai parcourus tous les continents avant de me poser dans ce charmant appartement montréalais :)

name: Beautiful Luxury Oceanview Furnished Apartment
summary: Full oceanview / mountainview apartment -- 2008 renovation 5th floor in quiet, safe neighborhood  Across the street from secluded beach, surf, and family park  Minutes to hiking, skydiving, shopping, world-famous beaches
space: Full ocean view, slate floors, teak furniture, modern kitchen, granite countertops, custom bath, fully furnished
description: Full oceanview / mountainview apartment -- 2008 renovation 5th floor in quiet, safe neighborhood  Across the street from secluded beach, surf, and family park  Minutes to hiking, skydiving, shopping, world-famous beaches Full ocean view, slate floors, teak furniture, modern kitchen, granite countertops, custom bath, fully furnished I'd love to send you a brochure with my favorite spots to visit on the North Shore and I always love to chat about what makes Waialua special to me Family neighborhood with several condominium buildings and a park by the beach. One parking space included.  Beach bikes available.  Elevator access.  Shared barbecue area. Internet, washer/dryer, HDTV cable, and wireless internet included.  Plus pots & pans, blankets, towels, beach chairs, beach bikes and boogie boards, books and movies, and everything you need for a comfortable stay
neighborhood_overview: Family neighborhood with several condominium buildings and a park by the beach.
notes: Internet, washer/dryer, HDTV cable, and wireless internet included.  Plus pots & pans, blankets, towels, beach chairs, beach bikes and boogie boards, books and movies, and everything you need for a comfortable stay
transit: One parking space included.  Beach bikes available.  Elevator access.  Shared barbecue area.
interaction: I'd love to send you a brochure with my favorite spots to visit on the North Shore and I always love to chat about what makes Waialua special to me
house_rules: Addressed in rental agreement.

reviews.comments: What a super place from such a super host.  Thank you Vanessa for a wonderful stay.

name: Hop Inn - 6 Bed Mixed Dorm (Mody)
summary: - 2 electric sockets, locker, bed curtain & reading light - Free Fibre Optic high speed Wifi - Microwave & Free drinking water - 24 hrs hot shower & A/C - Total 3 bathrooms + 3 washrooms are shared for 3 dorm rooms - Communal room for relax
space: Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2016 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2015 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2013 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2012 Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2013 WINNER - Top 20 Bargain Hotels in China Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2012 WINNER - TRENDIEST HOTEL Most Popular Hong Kong Hostel 2012 by Hostelworld Voted the No.1 HONG KONG HOSTEL 2012 / 2011 / 2010 By Hostelworld ~ Recommended hostel by Lonely Planet / Fodor’s / Petit Fute ~ HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed for independent travelers from around the world. Each living space is unique in its own way - Each was designed and transformed into living artwork by different talented local artists or illustrators. HOP INN is more than just lodging. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service. We look forward to seeing y
description: - 2 electric sockets, locker, bed curtain & reading light - Free Fibre Optic high speed Wifi - Microwave & Free drinking water - 24 hrs hot shower & A/C - Total 3 bathrooms + 3 washrooms are shared for 3 dorm rooms - Communal room for relax Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2016 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2015 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2013 Tripadvisor's CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE 2012 Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2013 WINNER - Top 20 Bargain Hotels in China Tripadvisor's TRAVELER'S CHOICE 2012 WINNER - TRENDIEST HOTEL Most Popular Hong Kong Hostel 2012 by Hostelworld Voted the No.1 HONG KONG HOSTEL 2012 / 2011 / 2010 By Hostelworld ~ Recommended hostel by Lonely Planet / Fodor’s / Petit Fute ~ HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed for independent travelers from around the world. Each living space is unique in its own way - Each was designed and transformed into living artwork by different talented local artists or illustrators. HOP INN is more than just
neighborhood_overview: Hop Inn is located in the heart of the historical Tsim Sha Tsui district, nestled among five star hotels. A three-minute walk takes you to the breathtaking Victoria Harbor, the monumental Cultural Centre and the Art Museum.
notes: •Check-in time: 1430 hours •Check-out time: 1130 hours * 24 hours reception. No worries to check in / out even mid night =)
transit: Getting Around.  HOP on the Star Ferry to Hong Kong Island, or take the MTR (subway). Want to head over to China and Macau? HOP on the ferry terminal, train, and airport bus stations. They're all a few minutes away. Shop.  Harbor City, Ocean Terminal shopping centres, Sogo department stores, and shops along Nathan Road are all steps away. Hungry?  Many superb restaurants of international cookery and flavours nearby. Night Life.  HOP Inn is also about action -- we are a short distance to the fun night life, but yet far enough from the noise and bustle at night.
house_rules: •No visitors after 11pm. •Child Policy:  Dormitory - We only accept guests above 10 years old, unless group or family bookings for whole dormitory room. •No extra guest. We reserved the right to refuse extra guest staying in the room unless mutual agreement has been arranged otherwise. Violator will be subject to eviction from the property without refund. •Strictly NO SMOKING policy in all area of the premise.

reviews.comments: 很好的一次青旅体验｡前台很nice,同屋的其他小伙伴也很不错,睡的很舒服｡装修及设施都很棒很干净!交通便利｡提醒一下,拖鞋和自己放东西的locker的锁是要自行准备的｡以后再去香港还想再来入住,性价比很高｡
房屋位置很好,房间也很干净,很不错的一次体验
还不错

곻항에서 찾아가는 것은 어렵지 않았다. 숙소는 침사추이역에서 가깝고 다른 곳으로의 이동이 매우 편했다. 건물은 낡아보이고 엘리베이터는 조금 무섭지만 Hop Inn 숙소는 매우 깨끗했고 아늑했다. 침대가 푹신하고 이불이 두꺼워 아늑했으며 화장실과 샤워실도 깔끔하니 좋았다. 무엇보다 6인 도미토리에서 만난 룸메이트들 덕에 더욱 즐거웠다. 다음에 홍콩에 방문한다면 다시 한번 묶고 싶은 곳이다. Thank you for Hop Inn and host. It was a great time in Hong kong and the room. See ya!
地理位置得天独厚,值得体验
good
非常好
在香港计划待2天,看了下很有特色的房间图片就选择住的这里,因为是自己玩儿,所以这里便利的地理位置选的太好了,去哪都很方便,楼下有家冰淇淋泡芙也很好吃｡
very nice.值得一去｡

Host is  very friendly 
Is very convenience to every where .
Room is clean and comfort =)
숙소는 전반적으로 깔끔하다. 그리고 편히 쉴수있는 거실?같은곳이 있어서 좋았다. 그리고 숙소와 인접한곳에 지하철 출입구가 있는데 출입구에서부터 지하철타는곳까지 에스컬레이터가 설치되어있어서 매우 편하다.  그리고 생각보다 한국인이 많이 찾는 숙소이다.  한가지 아쉬웠던점은 2층 침대에서 1층은 커튼이 있는데 2층은 커튼이 없어서 아쉬웠다.

Great place, very clean. First time try the hostel. The common room is comfortable, and good to know new friends. Free tea& coffee. The location is wonderful. Easy walk to most places. And the downstairs N1 cafe is cool for coffeeholic. Will live there next time in HK.
Pretty cool Hostel! Worth the money  stay here if you are in a budget
第一天貌似见到了host?后来都是前台的小姐姐,都很nice啦,洗漱､房间也很整洁~地段非常方便,非常好的体验~
it is a cozy place and there are a lot of interesting people I can meet.
Very good location, very nice roommate, good service. But just a little noise in the night outside ( the road).  Enough space to put the things.
在這住了四個晚上,服務人員態度都很好,空間也很整潔便利,大致上沒什麼問題｡
交通方便,走出去就是地鐵尖沙咀站入口,到搭車大概步行五分鐘多,機場快線的接駁車也相距不遠,房間的燈稍嫌昏暗,窗戶不大通風需要加強,洗衣服必須走去附近的店;樓下轉角的泡芙店相當美味值得一試!
环境不错,交通方便
性价比极高,很好的体验｡
很不错的位置,旁边就是地铁,住了世界各地的人
很棒的住宿
交通非常便利,附近就是地铁站,也有机场快线直达｡地段很好,在重庆大厦附近,很繁华,到维多利亚港步行距离｡前台服务人员热情周到,就是由于我自己的问题选择了混合宿舍,男女混住还是不太适应｡

Clean, and friendly staff. Close to the mtr and the cafe on the corner had the best breakfast

距離尖沙嘴站N出口近,走路五分鐘也有電梯//公寓狹小舊舊的,但hop inn感覺跟家一樣溫暖//房間沒有鏡子,六人房只有兩盞大燈,較暗//上下舖不建議家庭入住,適合學生或一群人,行動也較安全//衛浴為男女混用//櫃檯24小時都有人,很讓人安心
地點很棒,離尖沙咀站非常近,到港島也很方便,服務人員很親切,還有提供行李寄放的服務｡

地理位置非常优越,距离港铁尖东站N1口步行真的只需要1分钟｡

Real unforgettable experience in Hk, nice people with great service. All in readiness equipments.
Amazing place  next time!
物超所值,很多老外,下次去还可以选这里,真的非常好
清潔感がありｺｽﾊﾟ最強です｡
A litte noise from bed when it have a person in a bed

Super easy and convenient check-in and check out, even at midnight. Amazing location, close to everything. Nice people, very stylish design. Only stayed there for a night, but everything was perfect, highly recommended
Hop Inn超级棒唉,认识了好多小伙伴,畅聊到深夜,因为这有一个会客厅,超赞喔~~位置也很方便,tst n1出口出来就是,k11周大福就在楼下,那里是到宝安机场的巴士站哦｡尖沙咀嘛,各种门店都超级多的,随便逛就好了
首先正規-一個人也入住安心,位置很好回覆很快,還能夠寄存行李｡達到預期所想,點贊｡下次有需求還會繼續選擇這裡｡

Very neat and great location for travelling around. Lots of bars and restaurants nearby.
The common area is beautiful and they keep hosting events too. 
You get your own locker for keeping items and a cage for bags. 
Only issue I had was that the beds were quite noisy.

very good clean restroom

name: Double Decked Room for 2 pax (308)
summary: We are at the heart of  Jordan area,  across  Nathan & Austin Road. Just 2 minutes to/from Jordan MTR station Exit D & E and airport buses. Best for tourist looking for affordable place to stay in the city! Along Nathan Rd, left to TST & right to Yaumatei. There are lots of Shopping malls, local food and sightseeing.  Despite of it's busy location, we have a quiet and secured apartment, safe entrance and lift access. We maintain  clean place to give you a complete peace of mind.
space: A small room with bunk bed suitable for 2 single person looking for affordable room rate but wants to sleep in separate bed.  Our apartment is about 1,000 s.f located in 3/F of Block A of Pak On Bldg Austin Road. We have 2 lifts for the convenience of our guest and our building is accessible 24 hours daily.  We have total  8 bedrooms that comes in different sizes. We have rooms from single to double occupancy as well as we have also rooms for family of 3 to maximum 6 occupancy. Each room have it's own TV, aircon & wifi access. Some of our rooms have  0.5 bathrooms which means bathrooms are within common area for sharing. While we have also en-suite rooms with it's own private bathroom inside, depending on the guest preference.  In the receiving area, we have a small counter and a bench to welcome our guest or a resting area for some guest. We have wifi access everywhere of our premises. We have also computer incase some guest would like to use or print (with minimal charge for printing
description: We are at the heart of  Jordan area,  across  Nathan & Austin Road. Just 2 minutes to/from Jordan MTR station Exit D & E and airport buses. Best for tourist looking for affordable place to stay in the city! Along Nathan Rd, left to TST & right to Yaumatei. There are lots of Shopping malls, local food and sightseeing.  Despite of it's busy location, we have a quiet and secured apartment, safe entrance and lift access. We maintain  clean place to give you a complete peace of mind. We have total  8 bedrooms that comes in different sizes. We have rooms from single to double occupancy as well as we have also rooms for family of 3 to maximum 6 occupancy. Each room have it's own TV, airco
neighborhood_overview: We are nestled in the heart of Kowloon Central, in the centre of Jordan and TST Nathan Road. Public transportation is accessible including MTR, the fastest vehicle to reach all destinations around Hong Kong.  Going to the West side of our place is 2 minutes walk to Kowloon Park and 30 mins walk going to straight direction is a West Kowloon Promenade, Elements, Kowloon Station  as well as Hong Kong Macau Ferry. Going to South Direction is Tsim Sha Tsui area, 15 mins walk to TST Harbour City as well as TST Cultural Centre and HK Space Museum. To the East is going to the direction of Polytechnic University, Hung Hom KCR station and TST east, Science Museum and Rosary Church. To the North side is walking distance to  Temple Street Night market or Two (2) MTR stops to Mong Kok Ladies Night Market & Nelson Street, a place famous for all branded rubber shoes.
notes: “No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow" Lin Yuntang We are your home away from home! We are your home here in Hong Kong! We welcome all kinds of guest coming from Different parts of the world and from all walks of life. Our place is suitable for tourist who intend for a short stay to long staying guest. Most of our guest are budget travelers looking for an affordable, clean and safe place within the vicinity of shopping area of Kowloon. Another group of our common guest are families looking for a low budget home for a family but where they can cook simple dishes before going for a long day trip around HK or Macau. “Are you planning to come to Hong Kong? Let us understand your requirements and we'll make sure to make your stay unforgettable in an economical way" We provide a safe, affordable & clean residential unit. Located at the heart of Kowloon area and accessible as you can ever imagine, 3rd bus stop from th
transit: -2 mins walk from MTR exit E & D  -Taxi cabs stops in the front & back of our building -2 mins walk from the 11th bus stop of Airport Bus A21 -Airport Express free shuttle bus stops in front of the bldg -7 mins walk to Kowloon ferry pier to Macau -Green Minu bus 6  stop to/ from TST & Hung Hom area  -By MTR access to Disneyland, Ocean Park, The peak, Asiaworld Expo, HK convention & Exhibition Centre & others parts of HK
access: Our place is located in the 3/F of Pak On Bldg. We have 24 hours building access with lift service. Our apartment is accessible 24 hours daily. Each guest has their own room key for their safety and privacy. We have a landline available in the counter for use everyone. Please understand that our place is a Homestay like accomodations, therefore we have someone stay in the place 24/7 to maintain cleanliness.  Our common 2 bathrooms are for sharing among other guest.  Our kitchen is open for use to all guest. We charge HKD 50 per load for use of washing machine. Our  hair dryers and irons are found in the common area for sharing among other  guest. We also provide free hot and cold drinking water.
interaction: My husband Ken is most of the time staying in the counter to meet everyone of you. He gives assistance  and his best tips based on your travel needs to enrich your local experience in Hong Kong. Although we urge you to plan ahead your trips but incase you need some suggestions, please feel free.  As our Add on service to you, we provide you FREE Tour Advisory; we will help you plan your tours to maximize your stay. All you have to do is discuss with us your tour plans & expected destination, we can arrange referral for cheaper theme park tickets & other destinations (i.e Disneyland, Ocean Park, Ngong Ping 360, 1 day Macau trip) including transportation schedules and directions. We also provide Airport pick up services. Just incase you need a personal guide for your tours, just let us know & we can also arrange referral for your convenience. We also refer cheaper tickets for Disneyland, Ocean Park, The Peak and Ngong Ping 360 . Buying tickets a day before your trip will save you more ti
house_rules: This apartment is now your home during your short  stay in Hong Kong. Please handle all our facilities with care like your own.  Please use all resources such as electric and water in a moderate way. Turn off aircons, lights & water heater when you're going out of the house. Use bedsheets, pillows and towels in an appropriate manner. (E.g do not use the towel to wipe the floor or do not eat in the bed which will easy spill out in the bedsheets) any improper use of facilities that causes damage, we reserve our rights to charge the guest according to the actual price of the damage item.  We love pets personally but we do not allow entry of pets in consideration of other guest.  As we are located in a residential area, Guest are expected  to minimize noise as neighbours do not like Loud and Noise. in addition from 11pm, most guest are sleeping in preparation of next day long day trip.  This is a non smoking property, according to Hong Kong Government no smoking is allowed to any private a

host.host_location: Unit A2 3/F Block A Pak On Building 105 Austin Road Jordan, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host.host_about:
I live to eat! So I travel to meet new friends, see new places and explore different delicacies of different places in the world! 

I am a Filipina and my husband Ken is a local HK person. As a host, we match most of our guest expectations. We are hospitable and friendly family and we put cleanliness of our premises as priority. HK is also our expertise being a residence here for few decades. We give good tips to our guest to maximize their enjoyment during their stay in HK. We will be happy to host all kinds of tourist in HK coming from different parts of the world and from all walks of life.

我住的吃!所以,我出差到结识新朋友,看到新的地方,探索在世界不同的地方不同的美味佳肴!

我是菲律宾人,我的丈夫肯是当地的香港人士｡作为东道主,我们最符合我们的客户的期望｡我们是好客和友好的家庭,我们把我们的场地作为优先清洁度｡香港也是我们的专长在这里是一个住所几十年｡我们给予好的建议给我们的客人他们在香港逗留期间,最大限度地发挥他们的享受｡我们将很乐意举办香港各类游客来自世界各地和各行各业的到来｡

reviews.comments: Room is very clean.  I didn't feel itch during the days I stayed.  Bath room is clean and convenient.  Located at the central place of the city.  MTR just 2 min walkING distance.  The host is very nice and helpful.  He introduce me many places for good food.
Place is in a very good location. Host is very nice and easy to talk to. Very hospitable and patient

Zyla was very helpful since I step into HK and every query that I have, was promptly answered by her. The room that I got was a simple (1bunk bed) yet I had the privacy and also a homely feel as I come back daily and there will be someone at the reception welcoming one back. There may not be any brochures or maps but with all the apps & Internet available, exploring HK was a breeze. Although the shower/toilet is shared because I got the right room, it was conveniently located next to my room :D 
The location was also a major plus, everything was walking distance, 24 hours eating places just opposite building and 7/11! The bus to the airport is also conveniently located downstairs (for the shuttle) or the public bus which I took since it is more cost efficient! For a solo female traveller, coming back late everyday was not a big issue because HK never sleeps..heheheh
Thanks a lot for the welcoming and awesome stay.
cheers

Very good and friendly host. I went there in Christmas and they organized a Christmas party with really good food. They helped us a lot as well to find travelling tips. Everything was clean and neat. Thank Zyla, Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
The room is tiny like any other in Hongkong but location is very convenient and the owner super friendly and helpful.
房东非常好,非常有耐心,不论提出什么要求都想办法解决,周围购物,吃饭,坐地铁都非常方便｡
房主对我们很是热情,告诉我们吃喝玩乐的好去处,住的也很满意虽然房间不是很大(这是香港的住房特点)洗澡什么的都很方便,所处地段也堪称完美,以后去香港还是会住这里的
房东很热情,所处位置交通购物也很方便｡房间真的是很小

I needed a place to stay overnight between flights, and this is exactly what I was looking for.  A place with a good price and with good wifi.  It is close to the nearest bus stop for the bus to and from the airport.

My living experience was amazing!The location of house is very close to the Jordan station exit D. And I am super satisfied with Room 308. It is a doble bed room, tiny but clean and warm, it is good for two people have some private space. Hosts are very nice and they will also give some REALLY helpful advice on your trip plan.
房东很热情,不过不常在旅馆,可能也是因为我们早出晚归,只见过房东一次｡屋子真的很小,不过因为在香港,也不算小了｡最满意最满意的就是地理位置了,我们想去的地方基本上10分钟内步行走到,走不到的地铁公交也很方便,超级棒｡
在Zyla的協助下,我與同事都很享受這次的旅程｡Zyla熱情推薦附近的好吃實惠的餐館給我們,也告訴我們如何走捷徑到達我們要去的目的地｡

Just get chance to drop by HK with a business trip in mainland, the owner is helpful with looking for alternative accommodation as arriving one day earlier, it is nice place to stay for the excellently convenience to get anywhere, room is tiny and address is difficult to be found as it is located inside a shopping arcade with the only access by a lift, but u can call owner for directing u to the address for sure, nothing hassle and definitely recommending for a visit when going to HK anytime for a short stay and the most importantly it's the cheapest that u can find on Airbnb for the similar location.

Good Central location in Kowloon. Very small rooms although that was expected. If staying here aim to spend most of your waking time out and about - no common room and kitchen is very small. Overall clean and easy to find and good wifi

Zyla and Ken were very accommodating. They were readily available on Airbnb and Viber (and Kuya Pikok on the front desk) to answer our queries, give directions, and offer suggestions, throughout our stay. The location is a 2 min walk from Jordan Station and there are many restaurants near the place which close late. When you are on the 3F, look for The World Travel unit. We rented the double room (double deck). It was small but has enough space for us. Not advisable for those who have big luggages. They also provide towels. You get what you pay for with extra superb hosts and excellent location.
We arrived for an overnight stay. The unit is very ckean and comfy for sleeping. Highly recommended!
Best location, clean room, friendly  owner.

The host welcomed me.
The description and location of the hostel was as it was.
Good
地理位置好,交通方便,由佐敦地铁站出来步行8分钟就到了,房东Ken和Zyla 很热情,服务态度很好,也很乐意跟你分享好玩好吃的东西,以后来港游玩还是会选择这里｡
房东非常热情
短暂待过一晚 没有什么特别的感觉 卫生还好 隔音有点差
位置好找,对面是711和星巴克,附近有麦当劳肯德基,近佐敦D出口,相当便利,房间是真的小到出乎意料,宽度90cm,上下铺,房间应该就是一个转身的空间,隔音效果不太好,别的房客如果不注意说话音量,真的是令人相当苦恼,但所幸房东夫妇相当热情礼貌,遇到问题可以得到他们的帮助｡我们住的房间略闷热,置物架太高,房间仅有一张椅子可以放东西,因为房间真的太小所以舒适感并不佳｡
离佐敦地铁站很近去哪里都很方便,附近吃喝购物地点也很多~房东非常nice一直有跟我们积极沟通,房间虽小但是收拾得很干净没有异味,浴室里各种指示也标示得非常清楚!下次来香港也来这里住吧(˶‾᷄ ⁻̫ ‾᷅˵)

明明已經確定的訂單
卻在當天跟我說找不到
自動把房間降級
換到了低價位的房間
很過分
房东热情,态度好…位置很容易找到,离地铁口很近,性价比高｡
反正大家不要只看好评,多看差评,那些好评不说一句坏话的都是托

사진보다는 생각보다 많이 작았습니다. 캐리어 큰 사이즈가 펼쳐지긴하는데 진짜 딱 사이즈 맞는다고해야하나.. 마음 껏 짐을 펼치는 것은 어려웠어요! 하루 머무는 일정이라서 크게 상관있지는 않았어요! 조던역이랑 엄청 가까워서 너무 좋았어요~ 부엌을 사용할 수 있어서 좋았고 화장실도 나름 괜찮았는데 새벽에 샤워해서 그런지 물이 따뜻하진 않았어요! 수건이 제공되는 건지 정확하게 모르겠는데 저는 제공못받아서 들고간 여분수건 사용했습니다! 호스트한테 수건에관련해서 물어보세요~

The space was pretty clean. It's quite small but if all you need is a place to sleep this is a good place to stay. The hosts were kind and very quick at responding. I only stayed one night so I feel my review may not be the best representation. We also arrived quite late so it was a bit tricky to find but should be quite easy during the day or before closing time. I think it's also located in a very convenient and lively area (during the day).
位置就在地铁站出口那里 交通很便利  房东人也超好
靠近市中心,下面就是米其林餐厅,我已经满足了｡｡｡

Ken & Zyla are such lovely hosts! They were so helpful. We were in touch with them via (Hidden by Airbnb) and they were unbelievably responsive and soooo friendly!! Would want hosts like this everywhere I go to!! The location is great, there is a lot going on around the place and it is very close to the mentro. I would definitely stay there again. Btw: if you need good wifi: REVOL cafe is very close - good coffee and internet connection with no limit (like in Starbucks) ;)
Good

与妈妈的四天三晚香港之行,在Ken的环球旅馆住宿｡之前也有朋友说香港的旅馆都很小而且很贵,建议我住在深圳,但是来往过关一是路途遥远､麻烦､人多,二是签注时只给我签了一次,三是觉得既然自由行,还是需要住在交通方便的地方｡综合考虑我还是住在了香港,而且多方对比入住了这家｡我们住的房间确实很小,但香港都是这样,房间很干净整洁,卫生间也是,而且公共区域设备非常齐全,我们只带了自己的私人物品,洗发水和沐浴液都没带,这里全部都有提供,包括转换插座｡最令我满意的是交通方便,出门就是地铁和巴士站,离维港很近,离庙街就两三个路口,楼下各种超市药店吃的用的一应俱全,而且价格也便宜,单身女孩不用担心安全问题,大厦楼下就有保安｡我英语初中水平,但跟接待交流起来没什么障碍,她完全不会妨碍你,给你很自由的入住空间｡即使有疑问,也可以跟房东Ken联系,他很热情好客,我们中间有碰过一次面,聊的很投机,他很和善,话题也很轻松｡每天都有入住的新旅客,各个国家的,但相互之间不会打扰,妈妈也说很满意的,希望有机会再见面!
방은 작지만 잠 자기에 부족하지 않습니다. 호스트 분들이 친절하십니다. 2층 침대 한개 있는 작은방으로 보통 도미토리 6인실 보다는 훨씬 편했습니다.
性价比不错｡老板很热情｡卫生也很好｡就是比较小诶｡但是毕竟HK寸土寸金~交通便利｡离地铁站大概就200､300m｡

住宿位置方便,离地铁站近,离庙街近｡
房间小,大概5平方左右,就一张床,公共卫生间,公用设施齐全｡
如果仅仅是晚上在这里睡一觉那么其实这里是个不错的选择
非常方便的地理位置,临近商业购物中心,地铁可以在15分钟内,北至旺角,南至中环,住宿环境很安静,房东很热情,有什么问题都可以咨询｡

總體不錯 就是洗手間只有兩個
房東還把其中一個鎖起來也不知道為什麼
結果早上等廁所等到哭
房间超级好啦,房东人也很好,还可以寄存东西,真的超级棒,价格实惠,位置又非常合适,全好评,哈哈哈,
总体来说不错!
房东很热情,房子所在位置的交通很方便,我这次来香港主要是购物的,附近有sasa屈臣氏,还挺全的,挺满意的,交通真的很方便,一两百米左右就是地铁了
It was a nice place to stay. The location was great and the place is as shown in the pictures. The hosts are really considerate and very communicative.
位置很好,离地铁很近,楼下吃饭的地方也很多,老板很热情周到,居住体验不错
Zyla对待我们很热情耶,我们由于塞车原因会晚到也体谅我们｡住的地方也很干净,就是隔音不太好｡住的地方的周围也有商店什么的,都好方便!下次再来!
非常好!房东人非常好,也很干净!位置又好!
가격대비 좋아요~ 홍콩에서 너무 싼숙소로 가면 엄청 좁고 무서운데 여기는 생각보다 좁지도 않고 캐리어를 펼칠수있어요~ 그리고 아주 친절합니다
老板非常nice,很热心,房间打扫的非常干净~
地理位置很好,房东很热情｡
推荐
房东人特别好｡性价比超高｡交通便利附近很多好吃的店
换了房间之后Wi-Fi信号不好,连手机信号都卡｡洗脸的时候不太方便洗脸池太小了｡换房间之后的房间很小,好处是离地铁站很近,出行方便｡
地理位置不错 每个房间除了没有一次用具剩下的都挺好

name: "By the Bay" ideal holiday location
space: A brand new very private apartment with water and city views, 15 minutes drive from Sydney airports. The accomodation includes queen bedroom, second bedroom with double bed and 2 single beds, living room and kitchen, full bathroom with bath, 2 balconies and pool in an award winning  garden setting. The property is 300 metres from the bus to the city center with all its attractions. It is a 6 minute car trip to a large shopping mall and there is a small corner store on the street. It is only 400 metres walk  from several beaches and the beautiful Botany Bay National Park and within a kilometre of golf courses and tennis courts. There are many restaurants by the water just a 10 minutes walk away. The environment is very quiet and restful -ideal for a short restbreaks and equally suitable for extended stays. The owners are on site and are available to assist in making your stay memorable. Please note we are a TOTALLY SMOKE FREE accommodation and are in a quiet residential area where all n
description: A brand new very private apartment with water and city views, 15 minutes drive from Sydney airports. The accomodation includes queen bedroom, second bedroom with double bed and 2 single beds, living room and kitchen, full bathroom with bath, 2 balconies and pool in an award winning  garden setting. The property is 300 metres from the bus to the city center with all its attractions. It is a 6 minute car trip to a large shopping mall and there is a small corner store on the street. It is only 400 metres walk  from several beaches and the beautiful Botany Bay National Park and within a kilometre of golf courses and tennis courts. There are many restaurants by the water just a 10 minutes walk away. The environment is very quiet and restful -ideal for a short restbreaks and equally suitable for extended stays. The owners are on site and are available to assist in making your stay memorable. Please note we are a TOTALLY SMOKE FREE accommodation and are in a quiet residential area where all n
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet and peaceful and a short walk to beautiful beaches yet just 35 minutes by bus or 25 minutes by car from the city.
transit: The city bus runs from the corner of our street taking guests to all the attractions of Sydney.
access: Beaches, parklands, cafes and restaurants, golf courses with public bus to the city at the street corner. Peace and quiet, secure internal parking  and lovely pool and garden.
interaction: Just enough to service all their needs. The apartment is completely private and self contained.
house_rules: As it is a quiet environment this property is not suitable for parties, all noise that can be heard outside must cease by 22.30 and smoking is not permitted.

host.host_about: I am a retired school principal and grandmother of 8 who loves gardening, reading and travelling.

reviews.comments:
This is a high quality, furnished apartment about 5-10 minutes walk from some lovely beaches which are often deserted. The top-floor apartment itself is well kitted-out and clean and very quiet. Maree and her husband, who live downstairs, are very welcoming and kind. There is a bus very close to the apartment which takes just under an hour to get into the centre. There is a convenience store down the road.

On the downside, the kitchen is quite small and any cooking is based around plug-in hobs and woks which means that cooking for two was a bit of a challenge, but not impossible by any means. The pool is a reasonable size (not for lengths but for dipping in) but unfortunately was unusable for much of our stay. This was a bit of a disappointment, but the sea is not far away!

All in all, this was a nice stay with lovely hosts and I would recommend it to others.
Very nice accommodation, great owner, location is also very good, close to the ocean. The rooms are clean too
Great spot to experience suburban Sydney.

We had a very pleasant stay in Maree's property. It was clean and spacious. The cooking facilities were slightly limited, but it was very easy to work around! The property was also in a perfect location, right next to the beach and park. Maree and her husband were always on hand to help and very easy to communicate with. Overall, Maree's Airbnb was amazing and I would happily stay there again!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

By the bay is a fantastic place in a beautiful location. Maree is a great host and we loved our stay from day 1. 

Ps: There is a great Cafe 200m down the road.
Comfortable. Kind hosts. Had a good stay.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I booked Maree's place for my family visit to Sydney. Maree is very friendly and quick to response.

name: Romantic loft near historic center
summary: The Loft is a few minutes walk from the historic center in a small square very quiet, 100 mts from Rua Santa Catarina, one of the most emblematic streets of Porto. Near the Metro station "Marquês" and "Trindade".
space: The apartment is cozy , peaceful , with minimalist decor and very clean. 5 minutes walking you are in downtown. Near Rua Santa Catarina one of the most emblematics street of the city.
description: The Loft is a few minutes walk from the historic center in a small square very quiet, 100 mts from Rua Santa Catarina, one of the most emblematic streets of Porto. Near the Metro station "Marquês" and "Trindade". The apartment is cozy , peaceful , with minimalist decor and very clean. 5 minutes walking you are in downtown. Near Rua Santa Catarina one of the most emblematics street of the city. Access to everything in the house. I will always be available for everything you need. The neighborhood is close to the center but far enough to avoid the hustle and bustle of the city. neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is close to the center but far enough to avoid the hustle and bustle of the city. This was a typical neighborhood populated by workers of Porto that served in the hat and weaving factory. Now the factory has been transformed into an artistic foundation, the Fábrica Social - Fundação Escultor José Rodrigues (he is the author of the Ribeira cube sculpture)] that usually hosts exhibitions, laboratories and workshops. At the back of the Fábrica remains one of the most curious places of Porto ... and one of my favorites! A series of 'ruin' houses that this foundation - instead of demolishing them - gave an original approach to it when in 2010 it hosted the 'Visual Street Performance' event. This event brought together graffiters from all over the country and also from abroad to paint street art Live. The art remained there and only a few know that behind the building of master José Rodrigues' studio there are graffiti works by HBSR, Hium, Klit, Mars, Vhils, Youth One, by Po
transit: to arrive I suggest Marquês metro station, because it is always easier to go down. Following the same logic, to get from home to the metro it is better to get in at the Trindade station because, again, it’s a way down :) and there is an elevator straight to Trindade station at travessa Alferes Malheiro.
access: Access to everything in the house.
interaction: I will always be available for everything you need.
house_rules: "Mi casa es su casa".  When you leave please turn off the lights and the heaters. DO NOT turn off the modem electric current. The check-in is till 21:00H, but there may be a tolerance until 22:00H. Delays of more than an hour has a cost of 10€/h.

host.host_about: Trabalho como designer, gosto da natureza, de cinema, livros.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Very cool apartment,completely newish and good design.Close to the historical city center.Highly recommended if you would like to stay in beautiful Porto!

Ana was a warm, caring hostess.  She met us at check-in doing last minute clean up.  She showed us the apartment and explained where we should park our car.  The apartment is as described and has two beds and a kitchen, sitting room and bathroom.  The accommodation is minimalist as described.  If you have a car, be aware that parking is not easy.  There is parking out front but it is a no parking zone and you risk being ticketed.  Parking in Porto is scarce overall.

De ontvangst was hartelijk; we kregen op de valreep informatie over buslijnen etc. 
Het appartement ligt op de derde en bovenste verdieping; het lijkt recent opgeknapt en in gebruik genomen. Het is licht en fris; het was  schoon, ook gehorig; de tweede verdieping werd verbouwd waardoor we 's morgens gewekt werden door het geluid van boren etc. 
Bij slecht weer is het wat kil binnen vanwege de betonnen vloer.
Het is rustig gelegen in een hofje; voor winkeltjes of ontbijtplekken of metro even 10 minuutjes lopen. 
Tip: leg een map neer met een folders van bezienswaardigheden en een gastenboek waar gasten tips voor volgende gasten kunnen zetten voor eethuisjes, barretjes, theater, musea en ook voor wandel- en fiets trips.
Perfeito! Simplesmente Perfeito! Ana é muito atenciosa e gentil. O apartamento é um encanto.

We had an amazing time in Porto and especially at Ana's flat! It is really beautiful, very very clean and cozy. It is even nicer than the pictures show! Definitely a recommendable place to stay when you plan a trip to Porto. Plus, Ana is such a nice person, she was so friendly when we arrived and gave us great tips for our time in Porto.  Everything went very uncomplicated both at our arrival and our check-out. The flat is really close to the centre and down town area, really good located. All in all a great flat and amazing place for airbnb plans!

I was working at Porto for a week and I've made the perfect choice. The location was great - near the city centre and transports - and also very quiet. 

The house is amazing and very cozy.  The host was very nice and helpful. You will love for Sure!!
La casa de Ana es súper acogedora, y está muy bien localizada. Estupenda para pasar unos días en Oporto. Todo un acierto!

Ana was a great host. She explained us everything about the apartment and she helped us to have a nice trip in Porto. The apartment it is located near the city center, it was very clean and it was well equipped with everything anyone need.

The apartment was fantastic! The loft was fun and there was also another bedroom with a great double bed. Very nice bathroom also. The apartment was in a good location - a quiet neighborhood but very close to the city center. We would definitely recommend.

We spent 3 days at the apartment and it was really nice! Just how it's shown in the pictures. Very minimalist and cozy with everything you need and more. Awesome place to stay if you want to get to know Porto or just to chill for a few days. Thanks Ana!

Todo estuvo increíble, el barrio muy tranquilo fácil de llegar caminando al centro en unos 15 minutos. Ana muy amable, nos hizo sentir en casa, el lugar esta genial, limpio, romántico y muy acogedor. Si van a Porto, sin duda consideren este lugar, lo disfrutaran mucho!!!

Desde el primer momento Ana se mostro muy atenta y agradable con nosotros. Su apartamento se ajusta al 100% a lo que se aprecia en las fotos, es muy comodo, moderno y muy bien situado ya que en apenas 10 minutos caminando estas en pleno centro. Una alternativa muy recomendable para una estancia en Oporto.

El apartamento es tan bonito como aparece en la foto, aunque el edificio sea un poco antiguo. El barrio está bien ubicado, muy cerca del centro. No pudimos conocer a Ana y fue una amiga suya quien se encargó de recibirnos. Era muy agradable y nos dio las indicaciones que necesitábamos sobre dónde aparcar, cómo llegar al centro, qué platos típicos debíamos pedir.
La experiencia ha sido muy agradable.

Todo Perfecto!!! El apartamento es precioso y no está lejos del centro, Ana es encantadora.... Nos ha encantado y repetiríamos sin dudar. El único aspecto mejorable es que aunque el apartamento es cálido, hemos pasado un poco de frío con los dos únicos calentadores que proporciona para un dia de invierno.

Appartamento perfetto,romantico, pulito, spazioso e a 200 mt dalla fermata della metro Marques, buon punto di partenza per visitare la città.

Ana è disponibile e inoltre ci ha lasciato tutta la libertà possibile.

Noi siamo stati sfortunati con il meteo, in quanto ha piovutoi tutti i giorni, ma se dovessi tornare a Porto prenoterei sicuramente di nuovo questo appartamento.
Ana's place was pretty and on a little hill with windows to overlook the scenery outside. she was a very nice host to us

Very beautiful, big, in a calm area of the city. 
It is easy to find and near 2 metro stations:)
We had a wonderfull time in Porto! 
The restaurants are super good there!^-^

The loft was as you can see in the photos: stylish, compfy, clean and close to the city centre. I didn't meet Ana but she was always achievable by phone or messages. It was delightful to stay in Ana's loft and also in the beautiful Porto.
We had a really good time in this beautyful apartment, near the centre and very comfortable!

El apartamento era muy bonito, igual que en las fotos del anuncio, no nos quejamos de nada. Todo estaba limpio y ordenado. El barrio estaba muy bien situado, cerca de dos estaciones de metro desde las que se podía llegar a cualquier parte. No pudimos conocer personalmente a Ana, pero si a su amiga que era muy simpática y nos explicó todo. En general diríamos que vale la pena.
The appartement was really beautyfull and tidy. Only 5-10 munutes to walk to the city center. Ana helped us. She was a good host. I totally recommend this appartement for staying in Porto!
Great flat, great location and great price, warming welcome, everything perfect, thanks!

Excellent accueil d'Ana, l'appartement est juste adorable et on s'y sent comme chez soi!
Très romantique 
Extrêmement propre et très cosy
Le secteur est pratique, tout près de la rue Santa Catarina, et les transports sont facilement accessibles.
À refaire en été !!
Muito obrigado Ana!!!!

L'appartement était très sympa, les photos ne sont pas trompeuses ! A une dizaine de minutes du centre ville, pratique pour visiter. Ana est arrangeante pour l'organisation du séjour, c'est très appréciable.

Un seul petit bémol, il fait un peu froid dans l'appartement, mais Ana fournit de nombreuses couvertures/plaids, et des chauffages d'appoint bienvenus !

Merci Ana pour ce séjour !

L'appartement est vraiment propre, agréable et comme sur les photos, tout est très bien. Il est près de tout, en 10 min on est au centre et 20 min au bord du Douro, parfait. Ana est facilement joignable et répond rapidement aux mails, elle est également très arrangeante par rapport à notre arrivée et notre départ. Très bonne expérience! Merci beaucoup.

Ana wasnt there to receive us but her sister was there instead to welcome us. The sister was friendly and there was a fruit basket with a bottle of port prepared for us too (the fruits made a few good healthy snacks during our stay there!) 

Location of the apt is actually in between marques station & trindade station but the route to the apt from marques stn is more straightforward and less hilly thgh i feel the route to trindade station is abit shorter. 

It was raining during my first day there so it was freezing cold throughout that day. Ana has prepared a warmer in the main living area and also the room on the first floor. The loft was freezing as a result and my friends had to move up one of the warmers to keep themselves warm thru the nite up on the loft bed. It will be good if there is also a warmer at the loft area & also the toilet (it was still cold to take a shower at nite thgh there is hot water as there was no heater in the toilet). But other than that the rest is good! Clean towels with basic toiletries provided. Ana was also prompt and helpful to ans any of my enquires during my stay there :)

Merci beaucoup Ana pour ce merveilleux séjour et appartement, très bien situé et très cosy ! 
Laissez vous tentez !
Beautiful apartment! Very clean and comfortable. Great location. Close to the metro station and a supermarket. Would definitely come back!

Het was een super rustige buurt, plm 10 min lopen naar metro en 15 min lopen naar centrum. Heel schoon. Twee 2-persoonsbedden, voor lange Nederlanders beetje krap. Goede communicatie met verhuurder!
Trap naar open zolder voor 60-plussers beetje griezelig vanwege ontbreken van leuning. Twee elektrische kacheltjes, heel prettig!

Nuestra experiencia ha sido inmejorable. La atención de la dueña, la situación del apartamento así como las prestaciones del mismo han cubierto por completo nuestras necesidades y cumplido nuestras expectativas. El apartamento es acogedor, cómodo y agradable, y la ciudad de Oporto nos ha ofrecido su mejor cara. Ana nos ha facilitado la entrada y salida en el apartamento acomodándose sin problema a nuestras necesidades. Estamos muy agradecidas y satisfechas.

Great loft. Everything like the seen on the pictures. A lot of space , surely enough even for  4 persons. Everything is within walking distance. Getting the keys without problems  and the informations given about Lisbon were very helpful. We enjoyed our stay and could recommend it without doubt!

Muy bonito apartamento, bien situado.
Exactamente como en las fotos.
Facilidades para el check in y el
Check out

Porto is a fantastic city. Thanks very much for your hospitality and your appartment Anna. Special mention for the bed, it's magic !! :) We have passed two relaxing nights. We parked easily beside the flat. See you soon again maybe. We recommand Anna.

Joli appartement dans un quartier calme à 20 mn à pied du centre de Porto. Très propre et agréable. Fernanda une amie d' Ana nous a très bien reçues et nous a donné de très bons conseils pour visiter la ville ainsi qu' Ana qui nous a laissé une liste de ses endroits favoris.
Merci beaucoup pour votre accueil et pour la qualité de votre appartement. C'était parfait à tous points de vus. Coup de cœur pour la literie.... A bientôt
Cosy apartment very close to town centre. Ana was helpful and fast at responding to our messages.

Ana was a great host- provided us all the info we needed and her friend who met us at the apartment was lovely and gave some useful tips! Flat is open and clean- very comfy bed and good shower. The flat is within 15 min walk of the buzz of central Porto. Great for a weekend away exploring.

We as a family of four people (2kids) had a good stay at this apartment. The apartment was big enough to house 4 and comfortable. The small stairs to the third floor makes it a bit difficult to come up when traveling with heavy and clunky suitcases. Finding a supermarket or bakery nearby is hard and walking with kids to the center can be a bit far, but luckily we had a rental car. We never met Ana but we could always reach her online and we were met by a key holder to let us in.

Geweldig appartement in een rustige buurt. Mooie inrichting en ruim genoeg voor ons tweeën. Het is een stukje lopen naar het historische centrum, maar door de straten van Porto is dat geen straf. Het appartement voldeed aan alle verwachtingen. Erg fijn dat alle voorzieningen aanwezig waren. We hebben Ana zelf niet ontmoet maar de communicatie verliep goed. We kregen de sleutel van een hele aardige buurvrouw die geen Engels sprak, maar ons wel meteen welkom liet voelen. Een aanrader om hier te verblijven tijdens je verblijf in Porto!

El apartemento de Ana es muy bonito y acogedor. Estuve muy contenta alli con mis padres. El unico bemol es que hace un poco de frio, pero hay que decir que nos tocaron dias lluviosos. La acogida fue muy agradable. Su amiga Fernanda nos acogio muy bien y respondio a todas las preguntas de mis padres, que eran bastantesè!!! Recomendamos es te lugar sin ningun problema.

It was a great experience to visit this loft. It really looks like the pictures and is very comfortable. Also the warm welcome and all the folders are very handy. The loft is nearby the old centre of porto. We loved to be in this place.

Ana ne nous a pas reçu, une charmante dame était là, a fait des efforts pour nous parler en Français. 
Environnement : Le chien du voisin aboie, Ana y est pour rien.. un peu embêtant !!
L'appartement est très agréable et très propre.
Un peu loin du quartier Ribeira (Douro), il faut compter 25 mn pour y aller. Nous sommes des randonneurs ... nous avions de bonnes chaussures ..
Dommage c'était un appartement av 2 chambres, nous étions 2 amis il a fallu partager le lit (sinon un supplément 80-120euros était demandé).
L'ami ronflait beaucoup..!.!.j'ai mis mes boules quiès
Cathy de Rennes (Bretagne)
The studio/loft was very cosy and welcoming. We felt like at home. Thank you:)

The apartement is situated in a calm area but not thar far away from several metro stations. The apartement itself is fine to stay in for several days during a city trip. Everything is there what you need althouhg we did not ate or prepared any meals accept coffee. The only thing we missed were kitchen towels but were to lazy to ask for them.

We got there late by an hour. Ana had our keys prepared and someone ready to guide us to getting in and comfortable. She gave us suggestions, kept in contact with us, and called our taxi promptly for the following morning. My girlfriend even forgot her Fitbit and she sent it to us, free of charge. Slightly uptown from the river, but truly is in a prime location to experience Porto. I would recommend Ana's place, especially for couples, for a few nights in Porto.
goede communicatie. Duidelijk
Ana was very helpful. The apartment was perfect just as described and had everything we needed . Thank you if going back to beautiful Porto we would stay here again

Nous avons 3 nuits dans l'appartement d'Anna. Super cute appartement, propre et bien situé sur une rue très tranquille. Environ 15 minutes de marche du centro. Par contre, nous aurions apprécié savoir à l'avance qu'il y avait un coût de 5 euros pour l'utilisation des draps du 2ème lit. 
Nous recommandons cet appartement!
Merci Anna

O apartamento da Ana é bem localizado e nós gostamos da nossa estadia! É tal e qual como vemos nas fotos e o apartamento é limpo! 
Eu recomendo :-)

We had a fantastic stay in Ana's apartment. It was beautifully decorated and had everything we needed for the week we spent there.   It is in a good location for walking into the centre of Porto, and has a few local shops around the corner to pick up groceries. Although we never met, Ana was a great host and always responded quickly to messages.

We hebben erg genoten van ons verblijf in deze mooie loft in Porto. We werden heel hartelijk verwelkomd en kregen meteen uitgebreid informatie over alle leuke plekken, gezellige restaurantjes, waar we fietsen konden huren enz. Alles in de loft was netjes en in orde. De loft is goed gelegen om Porto te verkennen. Wij deden alles te voet maar er zijn metro stations vlakbij. Een aanrader! Klara, Jolien en Hilde
Really nice experience! Flat in a good location, near a big subway stop. Flat clean and with a good day light. Perfect for young people who want to visit the city and go out!
Anna n'était pas présente lors de notre arrivée mais avait délégué un jeune homme  qui nous a très bien accueilli et donner beaucoup d'informations sur la ville et les sites à visiter.

Ana's flat is a little gem in the heart of Porto. 5-10 minute max from the centre, it's a perfect base to discover Porto and to feel part of Porto even if it's just for a few days. The flat is lovely, very well decorated. I highly recommend it whether it's for a first time or returning back to Porto. Ana was a great host.

Hi! Must say that the house is beautiful and very comfy. The kids were super happy about sleeping in the atic's bed!!During the days we stayed in Oporto the weather was really hot, so Ana kindly offered us a fan, because the house was also very hot.
The neighbourhood where the house is placed made us feel a little bit insecure late at night when we came from the closest metro station, but at the same time it is a place where you can leave your car parked at the door for free.
Ana kindly answers the same day if you have any questions.
Just say that missed an air conditioning and a coffee maker ;).

Amazing apartment and helpful host. Only a 5 min walk from the main shopping strip and a 15 min walk to the river. 
I would definitely stay at this accommodation again. 
Had an amazing experience in Porto.

Notre séjour à Porto s'est très bien passé. Nous avons été chaleureusement accueillies par Philippe, un ami d'Ana. Il nous a présenté les lieux incontournables de la ville et nous a donné de nombreuses adresses. L'appartement était très fidèle aux photos, propre, moderne, plutôt bien situé par rapport au centre ville. Nous recommandons cet appartement pour un séjour en famille ou entre amis ! Le seul petit bémol est la chaleur car la chambre en mezzanine est sous les combles. Il faut noter qu'il fait très chaud à Porto en août ! Philippe et Ana ont toujours été joignables, que ce soit avant ou pendant le voyage.

Il quartiere non è vicinissimo alla zona centrale pur avendo la metropolitana a circa 10 min a piedi. E' molto tranquillo, ma non ha attrattive. 
L'appartamento è molto carino, pulito, comodo, luminoso e fresco.  L'aria condizionata non è effettivamente necessaria. La ragazza che ci ha accolto (italiana) è stata molto gentile e disponibile nell' indicarci tutti i luoghi di interesse della città.  Consigliato!

El piso tiene muy buenas vistas. Está en una zona tranquila, a 10 min andando de Bolhao. Tiene parking a 2,5 €/dia en Marques.
Mención especial a Felipe, que nos atendió maravillosamente.

Les + : appartement très agréable, lumineux style minimaliste, vaste, neuf et propre.
Les - : voisinage extrêmement bruyant à l'extérieur de l'immeuble comme à l'intérieur. Je précise que nous avons laissé les fenêtres ouvertes en permanence mais qu'il y a des doubles vitrages. Literie trampoline à revoir. Chambre sur mezzanine impraticable à cause de l'échelle trop raide. 

Centre ville un peu loin si on n'aime pas marcher.

Great loft apartment with a lot of space and natural light. The host was very helpful and friendly who provided us tons of tips about good places around Porto. It was lovely to stay there for our Porto trip!
We had a great time at Ana's loft.  It was quite central to everything in Porto.  Thanks!

Ana was very accommodating and we had someone great us on arrival. 

Also Ana took some time to find out about surfing, football games nearby and other useful information. 

We loved the place and it was a great place to be based from. It's about 15/20 minute walk from the centre but close enough to make the most of the city. The mezzanine and room are great and it's plenty of space for you. 

Had a great stay in Porto and this apartment was a big part of that.
I enjoyed my stay at Ana's place. It's walking distance to everything even though not located in the heart of downtown.  Great value
We´ve been at home, i really recommend this to everyone. I will like to go again...

Really good place to stay for a few days in Porto, 10 min walking from the metro, Flavia, the girl who we met at the apartment is really kind, she told us what to do and see in Porto! great time there!!

Lovely two bedrooms flat almost in a city center, more than enough for us, two guys on a business trip. We had a few requests on our host Ana, all fulfilled without any problems. All I can do is to recommend this :)

Although Ana wasn't there to greet us during our check-in, her friend, Philip, was helpful and friendly. He also gave us loads of helpful tips and recommendations. The flat is conveniently located to all the sights and sounds and is safe. We would not hesitate to recommend the apartment to any of our friends if they decide to visit Porto. Love it!

La casa de Ana es fantástica. La situación es ideal porque es una zona tranquila y El Centro está a unos quince minutos. La atención que recibimos es fabulosa porque estuvieron a la hora que dijimos y nos informaron de todas las cosas que podíamos hacer allí. Es la segunda vez que voy a está casa y la experiencia no puede ser mejor.
Lovely city, very nice appartement, 15 min walking distance to the city centre. I recommend the place!!

Very unique and fun space. Walkable to the city center while still being quiet and residential. The hosts provided lots of recommendations for off the beaten path restaurants and things to do. Because it was a loft with cement floors it was chilly in November but I can imagine a great place to stay in warmer seasons. The host provided extra blankets when we requested them.

El apartamento es tal como se describe . Ambiente minimalista y con personalidad. Solo echamos de menos una televisión en algún momento, pero está totalmente equipado con lo básico para pasar unos días muy cómodo.
Es un barrio muy tranquilo, y por las noches muy silencioso. Solo lleva unos 15 minutos andando hasta el centro de la ciudad. Ana no estaba en la ciudad esos días pero Philippe nos dio una gran bienvenida, fue muy amable y nos mostró como movernos por la ciudad de la forma más cómoda y económica!

Cosy and romantic are not words I would use for Ana's loft apartment. Freezing and bleak are nearer the mark. It was an endurance task I never want to experience ever again! 
Granted we visited on NYE which is probably the one of coldest times in Porto, but I never thought I would be renting an apartment that had insufficient heating on Air B&B ( this was our first time ) 
 Myself and the other guests had to wear 4 layers of clothing at times. I didn't use the shower as it was so cold in the bathroom it would have been unbearable. There were 2 electric heaters that had little effect as the apartment is open plan with high ceilings and has stone floor. We had to be resourceful and turned the oven on and opened to door in the hope of some extra heating! Our plan was to cook dinner as the restaurants were very busy, but we really couldnt stay in the place to do so.
We called Ana on NYE and she said she would drop off an extra heater and blankets 'tomorrow'. We waited until midday the next day but nobody came. When we returned to the apartment in the evening & still no word on the heater etc. My husband put oven and the hob for extra heat and this must have tripped the electrics, so there we were freezing, sat in the dark in a hill in Porto...Happy 2017 ! We called Ana and her husband arrived some what 'put out' as he was just about to sit down to his evening meal and then had to come out into the cold and fix the electrics!! 
We considered going to a hotel by the airport as we were leaving Porto at 7 the next morning but we just went to bed to try and get warm and we didn't want to spend anymore money.
The worst thing for us was not being able to get warm for the whole 2 days. It was cold outside, 4-10 degrees but it was the same in the apartment. 
I am writing this honest review in the hope Ana does rectify this serious issue when renting out her place in the winter months.
A good place, in a very calm neighborhood, but not far from the center of the city. Was nice :)

This place was exactly what you need for a fantastic value and comfortable stay in Porto. A bit of a walk uphill, but let's you walk off the amazing food! Very clean and easy time checking-in. Ana was great about giving us a bunch of tips of everything to do in Porto and more. Would definitely come back again.

El piso de Ana es muy acogedor perfecto para una pareja. Fueron muy amables y atentas. El único problema fue q el apartamento se encuentra en una parte muy alta de la ciudad y el acceso a pie desde El Centro no es muy cómodo. 
En general hemos estado muy a gusto en el piso.
Calm place, good located. Not a beautiful neighbourhood but safe and quiet.

El alojamiento es como se ve en las fotografías. Como inconvenientes diría que las escaleras (teniendo en cuenta que es un tercer piso) son estrechas y, obviamente, el inmueble no dispone de ascensor, aunque esto es normal y yo no esperaba otra cosa, teniendo en cuenta que son inmuebles viejos, aunque están bien rehabilitados.
La zona es tranquila y enseguida estás en la zona comercial de Rúa Santa Catarina.

Net apartment op loopafstand van het centrum van Porto. Ana helaas zelf niet gezien, maar Rita heeft ons erg goed verteld waar we in Porto het beste terecht konden. Al met al een mooi appartement in Porto, kon wellicht wat schoner, maar ruim voldoende!

Anna's apartment is light and airy, it has a perfect location, you can walk from there to all city sights.
Located conveniently between 2 metro stops.
It was a joy to wake up there and return to at night.
We felt very much at home!
Obrigada Anna!
Bien placé en centre ville, pas loin de la rue Commerçante Santa Catharina et du Mercado.
We had a lovely three nights here -- everything you could need, and in a great location. Many thanks Ana, we'll be back!

Leuke loft op centrale plek net achter het centrum. Minuut of 5 lopen. 

Goed onderhouden, alles schoon en de bedden waren lekker met heerlijke dekbedden. Ook de douche was fijn, let wel je moet niet langer zijn dan 1,80 anders pas je niet in de douche. 

Ines heette ons welkom en heeft direct alle must-sees laten zien op de kaart die al klaarlag. Wat een uitstekende service en een perfect begin! Met haar tips hebben we veel gedaan.
