The apartment is perfect for four persons, it is really nice and near the center of Porto. 
Ana was available before and during our trip, and she helped us for arranging our arrival / departure !
Nice place, well located and easy to reach with public transport. Just a walk downhill to city center an many scenic spots.
El apartamento de Ana es perfecto para pasar un fin de Semana romántico e incluso para ir con amigos a conocer Oporto. Mi experiencia a sido perfecta, volvería sin duda alguna.

Ana has been insightful and patient all the way until we arrived, then provided us with the best tips on Porto's things to see and do. The apartment is lovely and calm, in a pictural neighbourhood that is changing fast, close to Trindade metro station and from the best nightlife.

appartement très lumineux situé dans un quartier calme mais à 5 mn de marche des quartiers commerçants
Possibilité de parking dans la rue ou au parking public à 5 mn à pied

Accueil très chaleureux et conseils avisés de Pedro à l’arrivée

We had a pleasant stay at the appartment. It was spacious and located in a good area. Ana responded to our messages quickly, allowing for good communication. We did have ants in the kitchen, which was the only downside to our stay here.

We enjoyed our stay in Porto. Although the apartment was a little walk away from the centre of town, we enjoyed the walk through the little streets in the morning. The apartment was comfortable and had everything that we needed. Thankyou

Great loft apartment with high ceilings. Makes it feel quite spacious.
We had a lovely stay with surfing,dancing and taking in the city. 
One of the best things about the apartment was that it gave a feel that you where living in Porto and not just a tourist.The neighborhood and area created that feeling. Little rough around the edges but completely safe.

Just one little thing would be to have some basic products available like: shampoo,soap,toothpaste etc... for all of us Easy Jet travelers who are not allowed any liquid on the plane:)
Maybe a small Bialetti for some morning coffee.

We stayed in the Romantic loft apartment with our golden retriever puppy. He is not a little dog but still felt very comfortable in the loft and spacious enough. It's was very convenient that the bed is upstairs and so your pup can't climb up to bother you at night. This was our choosing point for this apartment. The host was very helpful and responsive and left recommendations of where to go and what to do around. It was helpful. They have good and fast wifi (faster than we have at home so I was surprised haha) and the location is also quite good, about 10-15 mins walk from Porto Baixa , a lively region with bars and restaurants. The parking wasn't a problem, right in front of the house. 
Recommend for couples, families with pets too. As it's always a problem to find a nice and affordable place within the town center to stay with a dog.

Absolutely amazing apartment - exactly as specified on the website, beautifully decorated and a great location. It is very close walking distance to all of the tourist spots but in a quiet residential street so you can get a good nights sleep. Would highly recommend and would certainly stay here again!

The stay at Dana's apartment was really nice!
The apartment was very sweet, just as shown on the pictures! It is clean and very light. We loved the sleeping room on the second level. :)
The check-in worked without problems and we could reach Ana any time. She has organized a shuttle for us from the airport and a friend of hers waited at the apt when we arrived, to give us the keys and show us around. The apartment is a 20 minutes walk away from the city center.
Also, Ana has prepared her personal tips for Porto that she has printed out, which was very helpful for us.
We had a great stay and would recommend the apartment anytime!

Pros: large apartment (would easily fit 2 couples) in a good location near to the centre of Porto. Good amount of seating for eating and relaxing. Stylish apartment with a warehouse type vibe. Amazing local info from girl who checked me in.

Cons: lack of lighting - barely any ceiling lights - we had to bring in lamp from bedroom to living area to get enough light. Minimal kitchen equipment (no kettle or toaster) but adequate for a short city break. Often an uphill walk home (we got a taxi back after dinner every night).

But, overall, I would recommend!

Nous avons apprécié l'espace aménagé et la mezzanine qui est conforme  en tout point. Nous avons pu récupérer les clefs plus tôt ce qui était très appréciable pour notre bébé. Nous avons trouvé facilement des places devant la résidence, cependant le parking n'est pas une place privée.

I and my girlfriend have had excellent experience at Ana’s apartment. The location might not be so close to the center yet it keeps us from the bustle so that we can rest well, and there are some restaurants offer fine local food with reasonable prices around. Indeed it’s not a long way from the tourist spots so we walked everywhere. We both quite like the design and furnishing, which makes us forget our own home.

Уютное жилье недалеко от исторического центра. Мы приехали раньше оговоренного времени, но хозяева пошли навстречу и мы заселились раньше. В 5-8 минутах ходьбы от квартиры круглосуточная парковка, но можно оставлять машину на улице.

Overall: 5 star rating - Ana’s loft was as described on the Airbnb site and fully met our expectations.
Stay: 7 nights with family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids 6&8).

Pros: The apartement is clean. Metro stations and city centre are in comfortable walking distance. There are good quality bed sheets and towels. Great support by Sergio from Home Me during check in and when we needed some additional bed sheets. Basic set of kitchen utensils is available, good for breakfast. For dinner we enjoyed the nice places that Porto and Matosinhos have to offer.

Cons: Not really. It can be a bit chilly on a cold evening but the available heaters and blankets made it comfortable.

All in all a great base from which you can explore Porto. Surely recommended!

The flat is really spacious and comfortable, and the facilities (e.g. kitchen) are good. It's in a location close to the centre, an easy walk with the metro also nearby. We were met by Sergio who was really friendly and helpful, and gave some good tips on places to go etc.

Beautiful loft - wish we could have stayed longer! Check in was great despite us arriving so late. Loved the apartment - exactly as shown in pictures - very stylish and cool. Perfect location as walking distance to the metro and everything you need plus all the central sights. Would go back!

We had an enjoyable stay in the house:) Detailed and useful travelling tips are provided, we have understood more on the cultural side of Porto. 
Enquiries are answered timely and in details. The house is a bit far from metro and need to climb up some stairs before you get to the house. The check-in process went smooth. And the house is as beautiful and big as the pictures in Airbnb. They provided everything that we need, such as soap, towels, etc. However, the house is a bit dark. But still, we slept really well during the stay! I will surely recommend the place to you if you want to visit Porto:D

Een erg fijne accommodatie: schoon, dichtbij het centrum en sfeervol. Daarnaast werden we erg hartelijk ontvangen en kregen we diverse tips om voor ons verblijf in het geweldige Porto! De douche-ruimte is iets klein, maar d rest van de Loft is erg ruim, gezellig en van alle gemakken voorzien.
Excellent place. Great hosts, location and a charming place to explore Porto. It has everything you need in a quiet area but not far from everything.
Buena ubicación
Les photos sont conformes à la réalité. Appartement propre et bien équipé. Parfait pour un court séjour. Accueil sympathique. La situation est plutôt pratique (à 10 min à pied du métro).
Es war eine schöne Wohnung, sauber, groß, ruhig. Gerne wieder!
Szuper jó hely,kedves szállás,meredek lépcsővel.

good location,   no privacy from second bedroom.   tiny bathroom.
second bedroom not made up,  was told by check in clerk, they ‘presumed’
we were a couple so only one of 2 beds prepared.  only 1 and a bit toilet
paper left for us.   tried contacting host about this morning after
arrival without avail
Die Unterkunft bereitet viel Freude!
We had a great stay in Porto!!
Really nice loft in pretty Street, walking distance to downtown Porto and all the action. Appreciated the advice on check in, and overall and very pleasant stay! Thanks!

Apartamento reformado en un bloquecito muy del estilo de Oporto. Quizá sea más cómodo para estancias cortas, sobre todo si vas con peques, pero está bien y cerca del metro de Trindade. Estuvimos a gusto, aunque paramos poco por allí. Si vais en moto, el parking de Trindade es gratis para las motos. Es buena opción, porque la calle es empedrada y manejar la moto allí es complicado. La cama en lo alto, aunque a primera vista parece para gente sin vértigo, es un detalle curioso. Se duerme bien, no es una calle ruidosa.
Très beau appartement!
Me and my friends had a great stay at the appartement. A friend of Ana welcomed us and gave us some good tips for things to do in Porto.
clean, furnished, centrally located apartment that makes excellent use is the available space to give you a comfortable stay in a beautiful city
We had a pleasant stay at the apartment. Especially because of it’s Location.

Looks like it does in the pictures, a few stairs to climb and can get quite hot in the mezzanine, but there is a fan.

Lovely little place, we had a car and was easy to park on the street outside. Good base for seeing Porto.
Nice apartment in walking distance to the city center. Apart from some noisy neighbours we enjoyed our stay in porto very much!
Nice apartment. Quick response when we asked for bedding for the second bed.
Amazing location, hospitality, and decor, loved it!

Nice, clean and and modern flat in central Porto, every highlight can be reached by foot. Great communication and fantastic city tour advices on our arrival day. 

But: very clairaudient flat, neighbour coming home sounds like being in the same room, I assume owing to the house construction in Porto. Put some earplugs in your bag and you will be fine.

Super super benefit: Not any troubles about early check in, what a pleasure. THANK YOU
Огромное спасибо ,за такой тёплый приём !!жилье полностью соответствует фото и ожиданиям)если вы будете в порто,то выбирайте эту квартиру )

Pros: the hosts are very nice and communicative; the location is amazing (quiet but walking distance from tourist spots and city centre), the apartment itself is very pretty, well decorated and different from the usual stuff.
Cons: There was quite a bit of dust in both rooms, there was no dish soap, the shower clogged a bit. 
If some improvements are made, this place can be truly spectacular!

Nos gusto muchísimo! estuvimos 4 días y volveríamos sin duda alguna, la casa es tal cual sale en las fotos. El host fue muy amable, agradecemos que nos dejara hacer el chek in antes de la hora de entrada ya que yo estaba un poco enferma. Totalmente recomendable! Volveremos pronto! :)

name: Updated 1st Flr Maui condo sleeps 4
summary: A welcoming 1st floor, one bedroom 723 sq ft condo at Kihei Kai Nani complex across from beautiful Kamaole II beach, in Kihei.  It is recently updated, fully furnished and equipped with full kitchen, Queen size bed and a fold out queen sofa-bed.
space: Comfortable, fully equipped first floor one bedroom condo in Kihei, Maui, within walks and short drives to the best Maui Beaches, across the street from Kamaole II Beach, which is a wonderful sandy, shallow beach, with a nice snorkeling reef.  Two miles north of prestigious and very expensive Wilea, our condo at Kihei Kai Nani provides you and your family an ideal location for affordable accommodations on Maui, while enjoying the  best beaches, golfing, snorkeling, dining and shopping on the island. This is unit 153 in Building 7 in the Kihei Kai Nani Complex.  The lanai faces the North/West side of the island and has a garden view.  The condo provides free wireless internet, TV, Radio, CD, VCR, DVD, lanai with garden views, fully equipped kitchen, Queen sized bed and a Queen sized fold out sofa (the sofa bed provides comfortable sleeping for two extra youths or one adult on a firm 6 inch foam mattress).  Towels, kitchen utensils, silverware, plates, pots / pans, beach equipment, etc,
description: A welcoming 1st floor, one bedroom 723 sq ft condo at Kihei Kai Nani complex across from beautiful Kamaole II beach, in Kihei.  It is recently updated, fully furnished and equipped with full kitchen, Queen size bed and a fold out queen sofa-bed. Comfortable, fully equipped first floor one bedroom condo in Kihei, Maui, within walks and short drives to the best Maui Beaches, across the street from Kamaole II Beach, which is a wonderful sandy, shallow beach, with a nice snorkeling reef.  Two miles north of prestigious and very expensive Wilea, our condo at Kihei Kai Nani provides you and your family an ideal location for affordable accommodations on Maui, while enjoying the  best beaches, golfing, snorkeling, dining and shopping on the island. This is unit 153 in Building 7 in the Kihei Kai Nani Complex.  The lanai faces the North/West side of the island and has a garden view.  The condo provides free wireless internet, TV, Radio, CD, VCR, DVD, lanai with garden views, fully equipped kitc
notes: Air Conditioning is a window A/C in the living area & has a 5 hr. max. timer (can be re-set after 5 hrs).  Condo rules prohibit installation of an A/C unit in the bedroom to avoid noise disturbance to other condo’s sleeping occupants.  Bedroom and Living Room both have ceiling fans and a portable floor fan is provided to assist with air circulation as needed. Two bikes (one 27" adult male and one 26" adult female) are available for rent separately from the owners for all or part of your stay.  Contact owners with questions regarding bike rental availability and cost.
transit: The condo is located directly across the street from Kamaole 1, II & III beaches, which have been listed among the top 10 beaches on Maui.  There are several restaurants located around the condo complex and a bus stop at the front of the complex.
house_rules: Guests are expected to treat the residence and its contents as if it was their own.  No shoes inside the unit, no wet bathing suits on the furniture, smoking is not allowed in the unit or lanai.  Smoking is permitted in the condo complex in marked designated smoking areas, replace / repair any damage, respect other guests and comply with quiet time rules after 10pm.  Motorcycles are allowed on the condo premises but need to be parked in designated areas.

host.host_location: Grosse Pointe Farms, Michigan, United States
host.host_about: We are a happy family who decided to purchase two condos in Maui in the Kihei Kai Nani condo complex because we love Maui.  We enjoy renting out our units to guests because they all enjoy the island and all it has to offer as much as we do and we get to enjoy the island ourselves as much as we can.

reviews.comments: We had a nice stay.  The condo was very clean and had everything that we needed

Everything about this condo was perfect! An excellent location close to great beaches and standard amenities, a good size and fully stocked. The condo community was lovely; the grounds were well-kept and the other visitors/residents and office staff were very friendly. Elizabeth and Chuck provided ample information about directions, local attractions and other items that made getting around very easy. The units was clean and ready for us upon arrival. We had some challenges figuring out some of the lights and fans in the condo, but after some trial and error we learned which switches controlled what devices. If you're looking for a place close to beaches, with a laid-back feel but not outside of civilization, come stay here!

We loved this Maui condo. The Kihei location is perfect - walking distance to restaurants, shops, and beaches. Elizabeth & Chuck were very welcoming and provided a wonderful home-away-from-home for their guests. We would definitely book with them in the future! Mahalo!

The apartment was just as nice as the pictures portrayed it, and the area with condos very quiet and friendly. Still it was very central and easy to get to the beach and shops. The receptionist was very helpful as well. A great place to stay when vacating in Maui!

Liz and Chuck had everything taken care of and were very responsive with any questions. The condo was clean and comfortable and felt like a home away from home. Super close to the beach and town so we could walk pretty much everywhere in the area. Would definitely stay here again!

This was our first AirBnB experience and we were very happy with the condo.  It was super comfortable with everything we could possibly need.  The complex was quiet and nice and the beach right across the street is beautiful.  We also enjoyed 808 Bistro and coconut and macademia nut pancakes with coconut syrup (!!!) at Fred's Mexican Cafe right next door.  An extra thanks to Chuck and Elizabeth for providing prompt responses to our inquiries!  Made the stay smooth and easy, :).
Condo was equipped with everything we needed. Across the road from the beach and a short walk to shops and restaurants. We had a great stay!

The condo was in a great location right across the street from a nice beach and had all of the amenities we needed for our first trip to Maui.  I would definitely recommend this place for those who're more active and looking to explore Maui rather than stay at a resort the whole time.

I had the best experience at Liz's and Chuck's condo. It just felt like home. I stayed from the 9th-13th and had the best time! The condo is located directly across from the beach. The pool is warm and closes late. The neighborhood is quiet but if you like to venture out for drinks, it's only a few minutes walk away. 

I booked the room literally hours before landing and Liz answered all the questions I had. She have great direction and the house rules are basic. Be a grown up and have respect for other people's things. 

We enjoyed having everything at reach! We went to Hana, upcountry twice and of course the beach everyday. There is ample parking and security actually is friendly and reliable. The office lady was inviting also! The neighbor even gave us perriers and a ton of limes! 

The kitchen is fully stocked. We kept thinking this and that and we open a cabinet and it was already there! The water pressure in the shower was perfect and I loved having so much space in th room for our multiple luggages. 

Don't think twice about it. You'll be lucky to be able to stay here. I cannot wait for my next trip to Maui and to stay at Liz's condo!

Elizabeth and Chuck are very accommodating and easy to communicate with before and during the stay if needed. The condo is easy to get to from OGG and close to great beaches like Makena and good restaurants like Koiso Sushi just a few blocks away.

Location, location, location! The beach, restaurants, and stores are within walking distance. The condo itself is cozy, clean, and a perfect size for the 3 of us. Plus it's packed with everything you need plus extras! I will be returning! Thanks so much for such a wonderful first airbnb experience.

The place was very nice and clean! We would definitely stay there again. It was just across the road from the beach and right next to shopping and places to eat. The only thing we didn't like was the bed was small and pull out bed from the couch was very uncomfortable. Blankets were very rough and not comfortable to sleep with.

Kihei is the place to be in Maui and Liz & Chuck's condo is located in a great spot. The condo itself is very clean, well equipped, comfortable, and parking was easy. They were very communicative and sent plenty of information with what to do before and after checking into the condo. I would recommend this place to anyone who visits Maui and I would say here again.

Thank you so much for an amazing experience in Maui. Your condo exceeded our expectations.  Everything was perfect: location- close to everything,  perfect beach outdoor shower, life guard, restaurant, shopping. .. We saw many turtles in the water while swimming.  AMAZING! 
The condo was more than equipped. Thank you for a fast and easy communication.  Would love to come back next year.

숙소가 위치한 키헤이 지역은 마우이 섬을 기준으로 서남쪽에 위치하고 있었습니다. 공항에서도 약 30분 가량의 위치에 있어 이동하는데 큰 어려움이 없었습니다:) 숙소는 사진과 거의 똑같았고 큰 기대를 하지 않았는데 매우 아늑하고 여행을 위해 머물기에 완벽했습니다:) 요리를 할 수 있는 주방도구와 해변에서 사용하는 물놀이 장비들이 모두 갖춰져 있었습니다. 덕분에 매우 편리하고 경제적으로 여행을 할 수 있었습니다:) 적극 추천할 수 있는 숙소라 생각이 듭니다.
Liz and Chuck were awesome!! Great communication, great condo, great location and I look forward to one day staying there again. The overall experience was a 10 out of 10.
The hosts were very welcoming and friendly.  The unit is efficient, but clean.  The access in and out of the unit through the parking lot is a bummer.
Outstanding location and value!
Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und super ausgestattet. Wir haben uns die ganze Zeit wohl gefühlt.
Quick response, excellent location, very clear directions and instructions.  It was really nice to have the snorkeling gear.  The price was excellent, though I think we were there off season.
Excellent feedback and very helpful sorting out a small issue with very short notice
Very nice condo in an excellent location just across the street from the beach. The condo was clean and had everything we needed. Would recommend.

My sister and I had a wonderful time staying here. Plenty of room for two separate people with the couch pull-out. It's location is ideal, right across from the beach and right next to one of the best breakfast restaurants on the island, the 808 Bistro, which is just a short walk next door.

This place is quite normal, it has everything you need if you plan a vacation for a week or too on Maui. It's close to the beach, but you have to go through the parking road and cross the street. It's close to different small restaurants and bars and shops. Inside you will find everything you want to make normal breakfast or dinner. The patio deck is always in the shadows, no sun there, but you can step few steps on to the grass and you will have a sun. It's a good place for a family stay, but I didn't find it romantic. Just normal everyday place. It was very clean, the bed was comfortable, the living room was relaxing too. You can also find some beach essentials, which is a big plus.

Liz was very informative before our arrival. The listing was exactly as described. The location and space was great for our needs. We were right next to the beach which had the best view of the sunset in the evening. The neighborhood was quiet and safe but still close to shops and restaurants. There is access to beach equipment which was nice to use.

This place was conveniently located with less than a two minute walk to one of the best beaches on the island. There are many shops and restaurants nearby including an ABC store. The lanai was peaceful and spacious for cooking or lounging. The place itself was comfortable but could use some updated furniture. Although the apartment was unequipped with the proper amount of essentials (only 2 trash bags, 3 toilet paper rolls, and 1 small bottle of dish soap) it is well maintained. Having booked last minute this place was great and had a lot of informational guides on activities, restaurants, and beaches on the island.

The condo was well-equipped (nice kitchen and bath, good wifi) and had everything we needed to enjoy Maui and the beach - towels, cooler, snorkeling gear, etc. Location was also really good for exploring the island or just walking across the street to the beach.
Had a great time. A great location in a great holiday destination. You won't be disappointed. It is very quiet and private.

Place was gorgeous. Nice communication from owner.
Location is just perfect.

Condo location was superb. Beach was perfect, beautiful with a feeling of seclusion and only a short walk away.  Condo and essentials were exactly as described. Great communication with the host via email with detailed information.  Convenient local restaurants and grocery. Highly recommended as a relaxing, stress free vacation destination and condo.

The apartment is very clean, quiet and in a great location. It's off the main road right across from the beach (awesome sunsets!) and walkable to beach rentals and restaurants.  Recommend to couples and families alike!

Place was clean and exactly as described. Location is central to everything and made a great place to chill at the end of a long day. Liz was super responsive to all our questions. Defiantly a great place to stay to explore Maui.

Location, location, location.  If you are not up for spending the money for a beach front unit, then this is next best thing.  The complex is large.  The complex is very attractive for families.  The downside of the unit, was the noise levels that can be heard from above and the side neighbors - the wall construction does not appear to have sound dampening ability.  However, in general all residents were respectful of the quiet hours, but you can hear when people get up, walk around and go down the stairs.  The pool was a nice place to rest before the evening hours.  Overall - a great value when compared to what you can pay for neighboring properties.

Perfect space in a great location. Multiple beaches across the street or within easy walking distance. Grocery store a 5 minute drive away and lots of places to eat and drink nearby. Unit has everything you need to make it feel like your home away from home. Communication was great and check-in & out was a breeze.

The condo itself was great! Very comfortable and well equipped for cooking meals at home to save on over priced restaurants. In addition to being walking distance to multiple beaches, it is close to shops and all kine restaurants.

This was our first time in Maui and our first time using Airbnb and because of Elizabeth & Chuck's place, it made an outstanding first time experience for both! The location is very central and we were able to get to Wailea and Lahaina with no problem. The place comes fully equipped with anything you can think of needing while visiting Maui. We had a great time and truly enjoyed our stay!

Great condo. We stayed for a week and had no problems at all! It was in a great location. Every time we found a restaurant we were interested in eating at, we'd look on the map and it was right next door!

This place is great! In the perfect location across the street from an amazing beach where you can snorkel with turtles . The locations is amazing with self check in check out and the communication was great. Highly recommend this place.

We loved many things about this place:1. Location! It is few steps to the nice beach. The condo is also nicely located so you can look at beautifully landscaped yard and not a parking lot. 2. Condo is small but very functional. It is tastefully decorated and the hosts provided many things from dishes and measuring cups to beach chairs and boards, even books to read. . They really thought of everything you may need during your stay. 3. Bed is comfortable and sofa is okay.4. Did I mention location? Because several beaches nearby, couple of parks with ocean view, stores and restaurants nearby, but way less crowded than Lahaina for example. And family friendly. Some small items are showing they have been used many times (beach towels, beach chairs...) regular wear and tear I would say. We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it.

If you're looking for a location in which you can walk to 3 beaches and several restaurants and bars - this is it! My family of 4 really enjoyed staying in Liz and Chuck's condo which was situated in a prime location for hanging out at the beach in Maui. There was plenty of places to eat and grab some great kona coffee. We would definitely come back!

A comfortable, clean condo right in the middle of Kihei and directly across the street from the Kamaole beaches. The hosts were very communicative and we had no issues at all. A really great value too and I definitely recommend it.

Unit is conveniently located in a complex just across the street from the beach.  Everything was well stocked, including beach items (chairs, snorkels, fins, etc.).  Complex was quiet and ground security was present.  Parking was convenient.  Location in Kihei is a good jumping off point to explore the rest of the island.  Bugs are to be expected in a tropical climate, but nothing too serious.  Owners/complex take precautions to mitigate any issues.  No noise/sound issues.  Fans and AC are more than enough to keep cool.  Would definitely stay again.

If you have never been to Kihei, then you need to stay at Elizabeth's and Chuck's place! My husband and I loved how nice everyone was in the complex and were very impressed about how clean everything was. Ever since we have returned to California, we have been raving about their condo to all of our friends and family. We loved that we could walk to many restaurants and that we could watch the beautiful Hawaiian sunset every night. When we return to Maui we will definitely stay here again. :)

It was a great place for a vacation in Maui. The room was much better than the pictures. The room was very clean and decent. The condo itself was quiet and peaceful. Beach was just a minute away. There was everything for beach activities like parasols, beach chairs, paddle board and snorkeling equipment. The best thing I love was lanai and garden. I could grab some beer at lanai or on the grass with a view of tropical garden under uncountable stars. I absolutely choose this place for my next visit to Maui.
This condo was perfect for a quiet relaxing vacation.  The place was clean and perfectly located to restaurants and shops.  Would stay again!

Es hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Alles war wie auf den Bilder dargestellt. Sehr gemütlich, ruhig. Tolle Lage am Strand. Super waren auch die Boogie Boards. Check-in und Check-out war sehr unkompliziert. Wir waren nach Check-in Zeit dort und es war kein Problem das Auto über Nacht bis zur nächsten Check-in  Möglichkeit stehen zu lassen. Vielen Dank an Liz und Chuck, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können es uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen!

We had a great time at the condo. It was a fantastic location, a 2 minute walk to the beach. It had great amenities - snorkel gear, water shoes, beach towels, cooler… perfect for the person who likes swimming and the one that prefers to relax on the beach. The place was clean. Liz was very easy to communicate with and responded in a very short period of time.

We had a wonderful time staying at Elizabeth & Chuck's place in Kihei. It was central to everything we wanted to do in Maui - the airport is about 20 min away, the start to Road to Hana is about 40 min away. The beach is also across the street, so it's super convenient! Snorkeling gear and body boards are also provided in the condo, so you can save some money by not needing to rent those. We highly recommend Elizabeth & Chuck's place, and are definitely considering staying there again in the future.
Nice condo , Béarn the beach, very well equiped and clean. Things like beach chairs, cooler, parasol were available for the stay. We recommend this place.
Great stay in Kihei. Perfect location and comfortable condo with all the extras.
Such a great place in a perfect location!  Many beaches and restaurants within a very short walk.

Elizabeth & Chuck's place has a lovely yard, is a 2-3 minute walk to the beach (you just have to cross the street), and is near plenty of restaurants, bars, and nightlife attractions. 

That said, the apartment is also tucked far enough back from the street that you don't have to hear any of the carousing while relaxing in bed after a long day of hiking. 

If the nightlife or beach hangouts are not your thing, nature preserves, mountain hikes, and all sorts of lovely outdoor loveliness is a short drive away. All told, I found Elizabeth & Chuck's place to be convenient, affordable, and accommodating--it's just what I wanted on my first trip to Hawaii.

Thanks guys!

Really great spot! Close to the beach, which was mellow and beautiful. Saw and swam with a sea turtle about 20 yards off shore. Absolute highlight. Pool is great. Restaurant next door called Moose/Fred's Mexican was awesome for breakfast. Really spacious and beautiful rooms. Beautiful sunsets from the shore of the beach across the street.

Great stay at Liz and Chucks. Across the street from the beach and sunset, next door restaurant for all meals, shopping and natural food store near by, private and quite. I needed to call liz and she returned my call immediately. 
Be aware this apartment has no dishwasher.  other than the usual piling up of dirty towels and sheets, you will also be expected to sweep and clean up before you leave. A written document threatens that if do not clean well, you will be changed an additional $45. A little unexpected, but other than that the place was really nice and very comfortable. Liz and Chuck provide all you will need including a box of fins and snorkels to try, 2 boogie boards, and 2 beach chairs.

Chuck was able to stop by and say hello which was great.  He shared some insight on sharing his place and I wish I had his luck.  I'd have done the same and shared this incredible place with others.  Front door has combo-lock access plus extra key inside for easy continued access.  Very clean, fully equipped kitchen and no need to rent snorkel gear.  Everything works perfectly.  Great TV too.  Even an outdoor BBQ just out back sliding door.  We never neede the A/C but one is there if needed.  A very short walk to the sandy beach and shopping is also a short walk away.  Centrally located so our car wasn't needed unless we wanted to go far.  Easy and safe parking and the place also has a pool and rest area for complete relaxation.  With this review, I DO hope they don't plan to raise the price because we plan to return if they'll let us.  Mahalo Elizabeth and Chuck and don't change a thing.  We loved it.

This is a really nice condo -- especially good for a longer term stay. Kihei is a great location, walking distance to really nice beaches, restaurants and groceries. The room is in a relatively old condo complex but is well appointed and comes with many little amenities for the beach. Highly recommended if you're looking to be in Kihei and are looking for a spacious living situation.

We loved it!!! Fantastic location! Very clean and well maintained. There were so many extras including beach chairs, snorkeling equipment, and a well stocked kitchen. 
We literally walked across the street each night to watch the sunset from our beach chairs. Amazing!!

We had a great time in Maui and staying at Liz & Chuck's property made our stay and vacation even more pleasurable! Their rental was equipped with all that you need or required.  Kitchen was fully equipped and allowed us to cook and make a few meals.  Their property was just steps away from the beach and walking distance to all other shops and restaurants in Kihei.  We had a great stay and we definitely will recommend their property to family and friends. Thank you Liz & Chuck
Good condo with lots of beach gear for the family. Laid-back neighborhood with lots of accessible spots and beaches.

This condo is a great place to call home in Kihei. It is comfortable and conveniently located. We were able to cook our own meals in the well equipped kitchen, but lots of restaurants were close by. We hope to return some day!

We came a few days early before a business conference at the Grand Wailea Resort. We wanted a weekend of relaxation and time at the ocean and this was the perfect location. We had ice cream next door, grabbed coffee at the shave ice place (delicious and only a block away) and spent the rest of our time across the street at the beach! We had breakfast on the lanai with groceries we bought just a block away. Check in was easy and the security guy was very helpful. We had everything we needed at the condo. Would definitely come back!
Nice places, well located, quiet, free parking, wifi, tv cable, beautiful beach on the other side of the road. acces to a pool.
We had a great time, the location was perfect, so close to the beach. Very quiet at night. .
This place was great. The beach is right across the street and the owners have all the beach necessities you’d need. We had a great stay.
Very good location and a nice place to stay, furnished with beach towels, chairs, snorkel equipment and more. Would definitely stay there again.

Good space close to everything.  One complaint was the A/C was set on a mechanical timer for 2 hours which meant in the middle of the night, it got warm.  Otherwise, it was a great place and Liz was easy to work with.
Great place, great location! Lots of beach equipment: chairs, umbrellas, snorkeling stuff.
Very convenient and quiet place to stay. Nice to have all the beach and snorkel gear too! Great location and a fair price.

This condo is in a great location right across from the beach!  It is close to several places to eat, get coffee, shave ice, etc.  The complex has a lovely pool, easy laundry services and nice on-site staff. The condo itself is nice and the lanai opens onto a lush green space which provides privacy and a lovely view (major bonus and best part of the condo!) but unfortunately the pullout double bed in the front room is very uncomfortable. I wouldn't recommend the condo for anyone who plans on having someone (adult or child) sleep on the pullout bed. We had our 5 and 8 year sons on the pullout couch and even they complained about how uncomfortable the bed was.  The condo is a perfect spot for a couple who want easy beach access, walk-ability to stores and restaurants and enjoy their coffee on the lanai each morning.

We fell in love with Maui, and I think this condo definitely helped! The location is perfect, about a one minute walk and your on the beach! And Kihei was the perfect location for all of our day trips around Maui. The condo was clean and included everything we needed, the snorkel equipment, beach chairs, and body boards were especially nice! Can't wait to come back!
Great location, 2 min walk from Kamaole Beach II which is a nice clean beach. Only con was no AC in the bedroom.
Great location, literally a two minute walk to the beach. Woke up early and had the entire beach to myself.  Would stay here again if I come back to Maui.
Good place.

This place is awesome!   Right across the street from the beach, and there is an awesome pool onsite.  The condo was clean, and the lanai looks out to the backyard, with green grass and beautiful plants.  We loved every minute!
We had a wonderful, albeit too short of a stay at Liz and Chuck's place. It's got quick access to the beach and is conveniently stocked with beach and snorkel gear.

Nettes Apartment in guter Lage, man ist in 2 Minuten am Strand, hat Einkaufsmöglichkeiten um die Ecke und auch ein paar Restaurants. Das Appartment ist schön eingerichtet und für den Strand sind alle möglichen Sachen bereitgestellt (Stühle, Schirm, Body Boards usw). Nur das Bad hat schon bessere Tage gesehen und es gibt nur eine Klimaanlage im Wohnzimmer, dh im Schlafzimmer war es teilweise sehr warm
Like buying diamonds you can use the “C” method: clean, comfortable, and combines location you can walk toy beach and many stores close by.
Great location. Fast response!
Great value and location!

Elizabeth and Chuck have a condo with a great location and lots of amenities like good wifi, snorkeling gear, sun umbrellas, boogie boards, a full kitchen, guidebooks and coffee. It was just across a beach and located next to restaurants. The parking and ease of self-check in were very helpful.
Perfect location with everything you need.

Liz and Chuck provide a comfortable and quiet place to vacation near everything! Beautiful beaches just across the street with gorgeous views of the sunset. Amazing restaurants and shops all within a few blocks and plenty of excursions within a 20 minute drive. Highly recommended! Thank you for a great stay.

Roll out of bed and 500’ down the driveway is the ocean and beautiful sand beaches. We loved the location with delicious eateries close by. This well kept condo complex has andelightful pool and ample parking. Liz and Chuck’s is a great place to stay in a Kehei!
Great place to stay!

Liz and Chuck’s condo is a great place to stay as you explore Kihei and all of Maui! It has a well equipped kitchen but is also convenient to many restaurants. Access to the beach is easy and close. A very nice place to stay!

name: Classic villeray apartment
summary: Hi! I have a simple room in a gigantic apartment for rent. w/ queen size bed, private parking, basement, kitchen /dining room backyard access, 800m to metro. email for info. We speak French, english, spanish and chinese. À plus tard!
space: Kitchen "island" where you can eat Dining table that seats at least 6, if you are too cool for the island Backyard with BBQ (leave a few bucks if you use it for gas) Coffee machines (moka pot, filter) Sofa in your room. Wifi (15mbps down / 10mbps up) 1 room occupied by a pretty chill French traveler called Guillaume, he might give you pointers on having a great time.  Dressers for your clothes & more wardrobes than you'll ever need. No cat was here ever, so no worries for allergies. Another room will also be available, with capacity for another 2 persons (queen size bed)
description: Hi! I have a simple room in a gigantic apartment for rent. w/ queen size bed, private parking, basement, kitchen /dining room backyard access, 800m to metro. email for info. We speak French, english, spanish and chinese. À plus tard!
neighborhood_overview: Villeray is a pretty cool area. Larger apartments, backyards, and relaxed neighbords. There are some nice neighborhood bars around, and cool restaurants. In case where you would need more "buzz", the Plateau Mont-Royal is not too far, and by taxi or metro, downtown is not far at all either. Villeray is also close to highway 40 which will get you anywhere you need to go.
notes: Feel free to make some requests. I do not mind accomodating people :).
transit: 800 meters ( 2400 feet?) to the nearest metro. Very close to highway 40, and to Papineau street which is great for driving. Car2go is all over the place in this neighborhood, so if you have a membership, great choice!
access: Backyard, your room, washroom, kitchen, dining room
house_rules: This is my apartment. Please, treat it like it's your own house.

reviews.comments: Great experience. Everything went well. All the essentials were provides. Guillame was really cool too.

name: Waikiki Studio@Hawaiian Monarch
summary: This studio is located on the 20th floor of the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel. It offers beautiful canal views of Ala Wai. The hotel is located in the center of Waikiki, beach and Ala Moana shopping center.
space: Studio unit sleeps 2 adults max. Queen-sized bed. Full bathroom. Recently upgraded Flat TV with Cable, Fast internet and WiFi is included in the studio. All bed linens, bath, beach, and kitchen towels, soap & shampoo provided. Extra amenities include antiseptic hand soap, paper goods, and extra trash bags. Other info: Parking is operated by private company. Pay attendant direct $25/daily rate Coin Operated Washer and Dryer in the building Pool/Hot Tub/BBQ on 6th Floor Fitness Center-brand new amenity (Lower Lobby) note: will be available August 2015 Convenience store (Upper Lobby Casual Eateries/ Sports Bar/Hair Salon /Rent a Car (Upper/Lower Lobby)
description: This studio is located on the 20th floor of the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel. It offers beautiful canal views of Ala Wai. The hotel is located in the center of Waikiki, beach and Ala Moana shopping center. Studio unit sleeps 2 adults max. Queen-sized bed. Full bathroom. Recently upgraded Flat TV with Cable, Fast internet and WiFi is included in the studio. All bed linens, bath, beach, and kitchen towels, soap & shampoo provided. Extra amenities include antiseptic hand soap, paper goods, and extra trash bags. Other info: Parking is operated by private company. Pay attendant direct $25/daily rate Coin Operated Washer and Dryer in the building Pool/Hot Tub/BBQ on 6th Floor Fitness Center-brand new amenity (Lower Lobby) note: will be available August (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Convenience store (Upper Lobby Casual Eateries/ Sports Bar/Hair Salon /Rent a Car (Upper/Lower Lobby) If you have a car, you can park for free on Ala Wai Blvd or any street parking. You just need to move your car on M
notes: Hawaiian Monarch hotel is a 24hr secured building with its own little night life, famous restaurants, convenience store, rental services, spa, community that you will have access to. W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: If you have a car, you can park for free on Ala Wai Blvd or any street parking. You just need to move your car on Mondays and Fridays from 8:30am to 11:30am for street sweeping. You can alternatively park in the building garage for $30/day.
house_rules: HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service as it is privately managed.

host.host_about: I and my husband were both born and raised in Taipei, Taiwan but met each other in Honolulu, Hawaii. We have two boys and love Hawaii as our home.

reviews.comments: I enjoyed my stay in the room. The host was fine. She provided a very clean room with shampoo. There is a coffee maker, tv, refrigerator, and microwave. The only downside is the thin walls but once you turn on the AC you can't hear them.
Beautiful view of the canal, clean, plenty of towels. Walking distance to the beach. Good communication.

The host was very receptive to my  questions, and answered them promptly and professionally.  The description she provided in her listing was accurate. The view from the window was spectacular, the unit is clean and has all the essentials for a lengthy stay.  There is a laundry room available if needed.  

The location of the unit is pretty central to the downtown scene.  I would highly recommend this unit because of it's location, price, and cleanliness.  By the way, the shower is very nice.

Wei's space was perfect for our needs. And what a view! Everything was very clean & well-kept, lots of towels, shampoo & other sundries, and even a box of chocolate covered macadamia nuts was waiting for us! Access was easy, parking was a breeze, and it was less than a five minute walk to the harbor/beach access.  We would stay there again. Thanks, Wei! :)

My boyfriend and I stayed at the Hawaiian Monarch for 3 days and 2 nights while finishing up our trip in Hawaii. The studio was as pictured and had a fantastic view of the canal. There was even a box of chocolates that greeted us at the studio. Wei was very communicative and responsive to all my messages. Everyone at the front desk was friendly and helpful. Would recommend for anyone to stay here as it was super close to Waikiki!
We had a faboulous stay! We felt like being Home. Thank you for Hosting us. We would come back!
Stayed for 2 nights in February place was nice and clean. Elevators didn't consistently work with our cards but wasn't a huge problem

Wei, was very attentive and answered all of my questions promptly. I rented Wei's condo for my father and the location was perfect. Right of the canal and just a few blocks from the beach. Thank you so very much Wei!

This is my first Airbnb experience, and I really enjoyed my stay at Wei's apartment. This place is perfect for two people. Towels were provided, the room was very clean and the bed was super comfy. It was exactly like the picture with a great view, and it is located in the center of the city with close proximity to the biggest shopping mall. There's also a really good Japanese restaurant downstairs, so make sure to try it out!

This was my second time using airbnb. The unit is exactly as pictured and described. The view is amazing. You can see the Ala Wai Canal and the ocean. 
Wei responded quickly to my questions which was great. The unit is very clean (no bugs thankfully) and it was easy to check in and get the key cards. No issues. Waikiki beach/Hilton is about a 15 min walk. It's about a 1hr to 1.5 hr drive to North shore (I didn't experience traffic). Parking was easy in the building totally worth the $25/day. Very secure also. I will definitely stay here again next time.
Thanks Wei.

I had a very nice stay at Wei's place. It's a small condo on an upper floor of the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel building. The view from the window is great. The place was clean, everything needed was provided (internet, AC, fridge, towels, soap, etc), and the location was convenient (can walk to the beach in about 15 min and easily access local buses). I did not meet Wei, but she was very quick to respond to inquiries through airbnb messages.
The listing was accurate.

I cannot say that Wei's condo was new or fancy. But it was absolutely great enough to stay regarding compatible old hotels in Honolulu. Wei respected my privacy, which means I did not need to meet her or contact her often. I probably stay at there again for next visit.

This is my first Airbnb and really enjoyed with my husband at Wei's studio. It was perfect for two people. The room was very clean and bed was comfortable. It was exactly same as the photos with a great view. Located in the centre of the Waikiki; 10mins walking for beach and Ala Moana shopping centre. so make sure to try it out. Thanks once againg Wei~
Wei was extremely helpful and generous in facilitating our arrival and departure.  The location was great; it's within walking distance of the main Waikiki area yet far enough away to be quiet.
Such a great and stress free stay. Communication, location and facilities were great. I would definitely stay here again, if I come back to Waikiki. Highly recommended!
This was a wonderful place with a great location. It is great a for a couple. Price is well worth it.
Listing description was accurate, restaurants and shops were walkable, safe location
Good experience at Wei's place
Super séjour, le logement est bien situé, a côté des commerces et de la plage, agréable chambre avec une jolie vue. Mahalo

The studio is as described however it is very basic. Reasonable location close to bus links to all major areas and walking distance to shopping centres and the beach. Useful cafes underneath building.
The room is good located but not as clean as we expected.

Wei's studio was located in a great walking distance from the main strip in Waikiki. The studio is placed inside the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel. The hotel main lobby and hallways aren't the nicest, but it's great for sleeping arrangements. There was enough towels for my trip, as well as plastic silverware, refrigerator, and a microwave for those that want to save a few bucks on food. The room itself is by the elevator, so you can hear the elevator when someone is on it. The room had fresh sheets on the bed, and it was a decent size bed for 2 people. Also very comfortable for being away from home! As far as parking, if you rent a car, there is hotel parking that's $25 for 24 hours. When approaching check in, it was a bit confusing since there wasn't much explanation. The first entrance to the hotel has mailboxes and lock boxes. That's where you'd pick it up. Once you have the room key, then you are able to park in the hotel parking. The attendants in parking aren't the nicest people! But over all, I had a good experience at Wei's studio.
Wei's apt was clean, conveniently located next to Waikiki and downtown,  and had an amazing view.   I highly recommend it to any tourists looking for a great value.

Wei's place is clean and tidy. The bed is comfortable and there is a nice view down the canal or across to the ocean. It is quite close to Ala Moana shops. We needed a place for just one night in between trips, and though the price quoted is ok, the cleaning fee and taxes (when applied for just the one night) made it a bit more expensive. There is no kitchenette, which I might have missed when I read the initial ad. The tenants before us only decided to check out late at the last minute, creating a very long waiting day for us. Throughout this I must say that Wei responded quickly and courteously to our messages.
一个价格很合理又很方便的住处,停车需要$25一天,在Waikiki算是正常价格｡性价比还不错的住所
I could have such a nice vacation with her house. Thank you so much.
Listing was pretty accurate. Location was great, view was great, room was adequate, wifi worked great. Good value.

Great location, only 10 minutes from the beach and 15 from the main street, restaurants, shops...
The view from the 20th floor is just amazing.
Njce place....would stay again A+++
Convenient location. 7-11 very close. Great restaurant on 1st floor of condo for breakfast.

The Good: the place was clean and conveniently located. It has a great view. There was a full-size fridge and microwave. The bathroom was also full-size and clean. Once I got through security, access was easy and fast. The bed is soft, but comfy. AC works well, though it is a bit noisy (it's a window-unit.)

The Bad: The place is tiny. Overall size of the entire unit, including bathroom is about 10-by-15 feet. It is just one room with a bed on one wall and the fridge and microwave on the other--more like a hotel room than a condo. The electrical cord for the fridge runs across the wall in a way that looks weird. The dresser is full of stuff--drapes, extra pillows, dishes, silverware, etc. so you can't use the dresser for your clothes. It also took me 3 days to find the silverware and dishes--they're there--keep looking. Weird. There is no closet, but there is a place by the door to hang things. (Its above the vacuum cleaner in the pictures.) There is no desk, no alarm clock and no way to plug anything in near the table or the bed, so if you need to work or to get up at a set time, you will need a fully-charged laptop and/or phone. Parking is $25/day, payable in CASH ONLY.  

Could go either way: There is some religious imagery and signage in the condo.
About a 5-10 minute walk from the beach, great view, and in walking distance to lots of restaurants and shopping.

The unit is older but location is good, close to Don Qinjote Japanese supermarket for your grocery shopping. Easy access to bus stops, 7-11 around the corner with laundry mart. Get a monthly bus pass($60) or 4 days pass($35) from 7-11 and enjoy the best BUS system exploring the whole island.

This place was perfect for me, studio condo for 1 or 2. Wei's place was very clean and had all the amenities I needed. Full size refrigerator, microwave, and WIFI. She also had beach towels provided. There is a washer/dryer on the 5th floor coin operated. The hotel itself is right next to a 7-11 and a laundromat. It's walkable to everywhere I needed to go. 

Because of the location of Hawaiian Monarch it's along Ala Wai street which has lots of street parking around the condo, I did not have to pay $25 valet parking that's required at most hotels to park in the hotel. Instead I just looked for parking around the hotel, street parking is free after 6pm. Just pay attention to the signs on when to leave the parking spot. That was an extreme plus because that saves you $125 for 5 days just in parking. 

The check in and check out process was as simple as can be! You won't have any issues. 

I will definitely book here again as it saves so much money and the savings can go to other Hawaiian attractions instead.
Wei's place was wonderful! It is a very close walk to the beach, a very comfortable place to stay, and she is very responsible and a great host! I highly recommend it!

I stayed in this lovely house almost one month! It was very close to the beach, waikiki and alamoana so really comfortable. You can go any where. 

Everything in the room such as furniture, amenity is same as pictures and well equiped. The room was so clean. 

Wei was good at communicating with me and gave me the anwer very quickly. 

But the only problom was noise. Sometimes the neighbors could make a noise. because the wall is very thin you might listen to the music of them. 

After all, i recommend this room!

There was everything we needed and more! :) Wei was even nice enough to let us in a little bit earlier than the check-in time. The place is great and in a very good location. We loved everything about it :)
If you like to read and watch tv it's a nice place.

Wei was very fast at responding messages if you have questions about the staying. She was very easy to talk to and patient. Me and my girlfriend had a good time at her condo apartment, all the amenities were thoughtful and useful! It was at 20th floor too, perfect view of the canal and mountain side. Reasonable price and highly recommended!

This unit is in a great location and is a good value for the price. There's nothing too fancy about the unit, but there are some great niceties like a fridge and microwave.

The location is great, I was able to walk to anywhere in Waikiki, and was also able to hop on a bus to get to other parts of the island.

There were some noisy neighbors, but hotel security were responsive when I contacted them about the noise.

Overall good unit for anyone who wants to see all that Oahu has to offer on a budget.

Has this old apt musty smell. I think the apt is quite old. I stayed in two different Airbnbs, and for the extra 1.5x I paid for the other place (Superhost place), it was so much better.

If you want to stay in the most basic place, this is it. If you are on vacation, I suggest you get a bit of a better place, seeing as you are gonna end up spending crazy amount of money in Hawaii anyway...
We had a great stay at Weis accomodation!
Great location!! Walking distance to the beach, shopping and resorts. She’s a great host with quick responses
Stay was great for the value. Only negative that you could hear everything you neighbors were saying, the walls are very thin. But overall the stay was great!
Soooo close to the ocean, the mall, so many shops and restaurants!! such a perfect spot!

Wei's place at the Hawaiian monarch was awesome.  It was perfect because of the location. About a ten minute walk to the beach and the shopping centers.  Surrounded by places to eat and convenience stores.  Right below the hotel there is a fun little bar where the locals treat you like one of their own. As well as nice,  decentley priced places to eat.  Wei was very accommodating with the questions I had along with letting us have a late check out.  We will definitely be staying here next time when we come back to visit.  Thanks again for being better than a hotel stay.  This is why I choose airbnb
The place is very cute and secluded to the rest of the hotel. Just what you need when you need to just get away.

This apartment is located in a great area of Waikīkī so long as you have a car to explore the rest of O’ahu. There is a great smart car rental place right downstairs that have very reasonable prices. The beach is about a 15 minute walk and there are tons of shopping and restaurants in walking distance as well. I would give this place 5 stars for location but if lodging is important to you,  I would say it is just ok. It is very minimal but doable if you don’t mind an ok apartment.

The view of the canal is just breathtaking. This apartment is located near almost all the good places like Waikiki beach, Royal Hwaiian, Ala Moana mall(you can take Biki bike and it'll take you about 7~8 minutes to get there) etc. If you're renting a car, you should be extra early bird since free parking near the apartment is only from 6pm to 6am. Me and my boyfriend had to move our car near to the canal every morning since you can park your car there any time. But you can only park there till 8:30am from Monday & Friday. 
Other great thing about this place was the swimming pool & how it had all those hangers we could use to dry our wet clothes & towels! :) Also the mister at the pizza shop in the lobby is quite cool so try to drop by and say hi (and ask him what kinda pizza they have. he'll ask you back with what kind of pizza you want lol) xD Big thank you Wei for making our trip unforgettable! We'd love to stay at her place again if we visit Hawaii again. Mahalo :)
Perfect space, good central location for a first time visit to Oahu!

Wei's place is simply amazing. Awesome view, easy check-in, short walking distance to shops, short walking distance to the beach, and just a great place to stay. We stayed in a hotel for the first part of our stay because of business meetings...hindsight tells us we should have just stayed at Wei's place the entire time. On our next trip to Oahu, we will be staying here.
N
Had a great time this place offers a comfortable bed and a great view
Great deal for the location! If you are traveling by yourself or with 2 people it is the best!

name: *-35% Discount* Prestige Luxury Suite Downtown
summary: This suite is located in one of the most exclusive buildings in the heart of Downtown Montreal. The location is prime as it is on the same street as Montreal's most exclusive malls, restaurants, and steps away from Montreal's famous Bell Center. This suite is furnished with exquisite furniture and decorated with taste. Guests will enjoy the  pool, gym, and rooftop with BBQs. This suite offers an exclusive & luxurious experience to visiting guests.
space: With a breathtaking view that is located in a building that is over 20 stories high, this high-floor suite will amaze all clients and offer the most luxurious and exquisite experience for all guests. Guests love to drink their coffee on the balcony and enjoy the great view that comes with this apartment. This suite will feel like a true getaway for people coming to explore the city or for business men on work trips due to it's prime location. It is a calm & cosy place to rest in at the end of a long working day or week and visitors quickly regard this suite as a second home. This Suite equipped with all the essentials that one could need. Room service is optional with complementary concierge service that is offered by partners. More details are given at the check-in. There also is a parking spot available in the building for a potential extra charge.

The location is prime as it is on the same street as Montreal's most exclusive malls, restaurants, and steps away from Montreal's famous Bell Center. neighborhood_overview: Everything is within the proximity of a 5-10 minute walk at most. The closest bus stop is literally 50 meters away, and the closest subway stations are a 2 minute walk. You are located next to some of Montreal's best restaurants, night clubs, hotels and animated streets. You are only two blocks away from Crescent Street where there are plenty of clubs, pubs, restaurants and cafes.
