You are located next to some of Montreal's best restaurants, night clubs, hotels and animated streets. You are only two blocks away from Crescent Street where there are plenty of clubs, pubs, restaurants and cafes.
transit: Everything is within the proximity of a 5-10 minute walk at most. The closest bus stop is literally 50 meters away, and the closest subway stations are a 2 minute walk. You are located next to some of Montreal's best restaurants, night clubs, hotels and animated streets. You are only two blocks away from Crescent Street where there are plenty of clubs, pubs, restaurants and cafes.
access: All guests will be required to set preliminary contact to set an appointment for the check-in at the rendez-vous point. A tour of the premises and all the required information will be delivered to the guest. The guests are not allowed around the premises before the appointment has been set therefore it is of extreme importance that guests maintain contact with the host only and no one else from the building.
interaction: Guests will have my contact number and I'll be available for anything 24/7 as well as the concierge service. Please do not contact any one else in the building besides the host.
house_rules: Please respect my Apartment and the building. Excessive noise will not be tolerated by the neighbours. Please keep the place clean. If there is damage a replacement charge will be applied to the equivalent of the value of new furniture. I expect to find my Apartment just how I left it. THE CLEANING FEE IS TO CLEAN THE APARTMENT BEFORE YOU ARRIVE. THE CLEANING IS DONE BY A PROFESSIONAL it is not meant for anyone to leave a mess and expect it to be cleaned. 1) The Apartment must be clean after your leave. No Mess is expected. If it is not left clean, and extra charge will be applied ranging from 50 to 500 dollars. 2) Partys / gatherings are not allowed. If there are partys or gatherings without being advised you will be charged a fine of 500 dollars for the non respect of the house rules. 3) Please do not lose the keys and the FOB or lock yourself out. If you do a charge of 50 dollars will be charged for opening the door, 150 dollars for loosing the key, 250 dollars for loosing the FOB.

host.host_about: Lux For Less is a London based company that is specialized in offering the best apartments for rental around Canada and other major cities around the world. Lux For Less is known for its exceptional customer service and beautiful apartments all over downtown Montreal, Toronto, Vancouver, London, Miami and Dubai.

reviews.comments: Very good location. The host Karim was great with kindness. Nothing to complain and someone who enjoy tje city of Montreal, this place would be recommandable...very cozy.

L'appartement est très bien situé en centre ville à proximité de la station de metro Peel.  Karim a été très accueillant et flexible sur les heures d'arrivée et de départ. 
L'appartement est spacieux, très bien décoré, propre et donc très agréable. La chambre possède un très grand lit, nous avons pu facilement dormir à quatre dans l'appart (avec le canapé).  Une très belle vue sur la ville! Immeuble très bien sécurisé avec concierge à l'entrée. 
Parfait pour passer un court ou long moment à Montréal.

Very accommodating and helpful host! Karim was very quick to answer to any questions. The apartment was very clean, had quite neighbors, and had the best location in downtown Montreal. The apartment was equipped with all necessary everyday use items. For sure will stay again here, when come back to visit Montreal!
Het was een prima appartement met veel ruimte en comfort; prima ligging voor ons, dichtbij congrescentrum en eetgelegenheden.

I stayed at Karim's place for one night with a work colleague. It's in a great location, with an easy walk to shops, restaurants and bars. Although one bedroom, the sofa is HUGE and as wide as a single bed anyway. 

The apartment was spotlessly clean, and Karim was extremely friendly and accommodating. He helped us out with several recommendations in the local area and replied to messages almost instantly. 

If I come to visit Montreal again, I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

This apartment is exactly as pictured and described. Do you want a  large, modern, well-equipped apartment in a great location? This is a prime choice. We were able to walk to some of Montreal's best restaurants, bars and shopping. The excellent Metro and bus system is very accessible. Karim is a charming and welcoming host. He responded promptly each time we contacted him. Also, he offered to act as a concierge , if needed, during our trip. The building is safe and secure and the quiet neighbors will allow a relaxing sleep in a large and comfortable bed. It was obvious the apartment had just been cleaned and the linens were freshly washed. The Wifi was fast and dependable and there was Netflix and Apple TV. The city views from the apartment are great and the rooftop terrace is even better.
We would highly recommend this listing, if a visit to Montreal is planned.

Karim was an excellent host and made us feel right at home, not only at his apartment but in Montreal.  The apartment is great and what you see online is what you get; an excellent location, clean apartment and welcoming host.  Thanks again for a great stay!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Beautiful apartment and Ka is a super knowledgeable and accommodating host.

Great location, accurate pictures, safe building!! My friends and I were extremely comfortable in this beautiful apartment. It has an amazing balcony (with a table, two chairs, and some small outdoor lights) that provides a great view of quaint architecture below and lovely trees. Ka was extremely helpful and flexible when it came to our checkin and check out which I greatly appreciated since I was coming from the United States and was caught in border traffic. The building is extremely safe. Only thing to keep in mind is that currently your car must be 6'3 or shorter to fit in the garage. We found parking on the street since it was the weekend and had no issue.
Good central apartment
Excellent location - close to Crescent Street and Mount Royal; best for couples

Everything about this apartment worked well for us. The host was friendly and helpful and went out of his way to drop off a second key and let us store our luggage on our last day. The location was perfect for my conference a couple of blocks away. We loved the balcony and the TV set up. The bed was very firm -- best if you like that in a bed. The only downside -- a previous guest had left something in the fridge that had gone bad and left a pretty unpleasant odor -- was pretty easy to deal with.

We were very very happy with this booking, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this apartment.  The host, Karim, is a delightful young man who is hospitable, respectful and very able—thus, a great host.

We stayed here with two elderly people, and their comfort was of utmost importance to us.  We therefore had a lot of questions prior to booking the apartment and before our arrival.  Karim was prompt in his replies and diligent in his answers. Everything went smoothly and according to plan. 

The apartment was clean and in tip-top shape when we checked in.  One thing we loved was the bathroom, which was very spacious—offering not only a bathtub, but also a shower.  The kitchen was clean and aptly equipped, which was nice.  Nice big couches as well!  Being a high-rise building, the view was also great.  This is a relatively small apartment, however it does not feel like it at all.  The people who work at this apartment building—those at the reception etc.—are also very helpful and able persons.  They assisted us whenever we needed the help, which would have probably happened even if Karim did not also talk to them on our behalf upon our arrival.   

However, the biggest asset of this property is probably its location.  It is situated at the heart of downtown Montreal.  If your desire is to do all the touristy-stuff Montreal has to offer especially in the summer, this apartment is ideally situated.  For instance, the day after we arrived (July 1), the Canada Day Parade took place only a street away (5 mins walk).  A couple of days later, a cycling race happened right in front of the building, which was a lot of fun to watch.  Quartier des spectacles, where the Jazz Festival was happening, is only a couple of metro stops away.  The Old Port/Old Town is about a 10 min taxi/car ride.  

This location should also prove ideal for families from outside Montreal who wish to visit the numerous universities in Montreal.  Both Concordia* and McGill are at a walking distance, and UQAM is again only several metro/bus stops away.  This may also apply to scholars. (*Not Loyola Campus, but the downtown campus)

In all, we were very happy with our stay.  Great host, great apartment, great location, and a most wonderful city. 

Alp

Amazing place great host, I really recommend to anyone who want to be near in everything, clean, safe, and has everything u want. Great place for families. Kams is very friendly and easy to deal with.

Best Airbnb experience in Montreal. This apartment has all that you need. Amazing view of the city. Close to the supermarket, bars, restaurants, malls, metro station. Also Kams is available all the time. Perfect place to stay.

Our suite was better than what we expected. Very modern and clean with all the amenities we needed. Good location  in downtown Montreal with excellent view of city. Host was excellent  Great value for the price.
Great location and apartment!

I don't do negative reviews, but this is not a video, pic, opinion. This was technically a transaction between two parties (three?). I will stick to the facts and you can draw your own conclusions.
I booked my first trip using airbnb on Oct 15th (credit card record) . Since it was my first time I email with some questions but didn't hear back. I wasn't alarmed since it seemed to be a hosting business posting through this website.
On Nov 18th, three days before my trip I email a second time. The host never replied me. On Tuesday Nov 20th at noon my spouse was able to talk on the phone (we weren't sure about bringing linen, parking and/or how we would get the key). Everything looks fine, he will be waiting for us, be sure to text 30 mins before getting there.
Since we were planning on leaving at 5 am, I went to bed early. At 11:33 pm I got a text message that couldn't make sense ... checked my email and there was a message about a heating issue and that ..." I unfortunately wont be able to get the heating system back in operation before your arrival.Please accept my apologies." I wasn't sure how to proceed, would I get the apartment later in the afternoon? What does it mean? I went back to bed thinking I need to get up earlier; will check my email later and hoping for good news.
At 1:13 am. I got a second text saying my reservation has been cancelled. Now I was suddenly awake. In a couple of hours I need to wake my family up for a 7 hours drive to a metropolitan city where we don't have a place to sleep?! 
By now I have 3 emails from airbnb in my inbox ... at 1:13 am with the cancellation ... 1:28 am with a ticket number ... 1:37 am some manager following up ... 
One of the emails have a button to get a refund or a button to rebook. 
I booked a hotel using a well known travel website, once I got my confirmation I requested a refund (which shows now in my credit card with Nov 22nd).
So as far as my experience was, I won't be using or recommend airbnb. Maybe it was an isolated case, maybe the heating was really broken, I don't want to hurt anybody's business but something didn't add up. As a consumer I felt completely vulnerable. 
By the way: I don't know how much information airbnb shared with the hosts but to be able to book you need to upload your drive license and/or passport, a recent picture and I might be forgetting something ... I spent hours preparing this trip that almost didn't happen, but maybe because I knew the destination pretty well I was able to fix it quickly. 
What I'm not so sure of fixing quickly is removing my personal data from airbnb.

Suite à un problème avec l appartement que j avais loué, on nous a donné un autre appartement un peu plus petit mais plus luxueux. Équipements modernes, très propre, bien situé avec un garage; excellent pour un séjour  à Montréal.

Je n ai pas rencontré Kams, c est son ami Rubens , qui nous accueilli. Check in imposé á 18:30 que j ai pu négocier à 17:45 . C est un peu tard surtout que le Check out est a 12:00. Il ne semblait pas savoir grand chose sur notre arrivée. Communication avec Kams par mail lente au début mais très réactif par la suite, pour éclaircir certains points donc le changement d appartement. 

Excellent appartement, bien localisé, bon rapport qualité/ prix. À recommander sans hésiter.

Karim was an amazing host. Answered a last minute request, picked us up and even ordered an Uber for us to transport our tons of luggage. The unit wasn't exactly the one in the photos, but same amenities in the same building and was probably even better. I highly recommend anything he has to offer, and we'll certainly be back.
The location and property are superb. Great view from living room and bedroom. Quite large apartment. Clean.

Really beautiful apartment. Great location, close to city centre and metro. Comfy beds, aircon, pool and gym and even underground parking (essential if you have a car as parking a nightmare in downtown Montreal). Great host - apartment spotless. You really can’t do better than this apartment for a short break in Montreal.
Great.  Everything you need.
Very clean, great location and parking was also free as advertised. Check in and communications were a bit confusing and stressful.

Nous voyagions en famille (3 personnes) et nous avions réservé ce grand logement avec jacuzzi pour profiter de la fin de notre périple au Canada.
Tout à commencer par un jeu de piste pour réussir à trouver le collaborateur de l'hôte, dans un quartier où on ne peux pas stationner avec pas loin de 10 coups de fil.
A ce moment, il prétend un problème électrique dans l'appartement, et nous réoriente vers un autre appartement et une place de stationnement dans la rue avec une carte de paiement pour l'achat des tickets.
Au final, cet appartement ne comportait qu'un lit double et pas de jacuzzi.
Il nous a proposer un matelas gonflable: unique pour un appartement luxueux!
Nous avons naturellement refusé et il nous a promis que nous ne serions remboursé.
Nous avons dû trouver une solution d'urgence pour trouver un hébergement à 19h car il n'avait pas pris la peine de nous prévenir de l'indisponibilité avant le check-in.
Après 3 jours, toujours aucun remboursement.
J'ai dû faire appel à AirBnb pour faire annuler la réservation et initier le remboursement.
Bref, hôte qui ne communique pas, qui ne gère pas grand chose.
Pas sérieux, à éviter absolument/
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Although this host was helping AirbnB and I out of a difficult situation by being available last minute, this unit was not what was pictured or described at all. It felt like we got a bait and switch unit. And, because apparently AirBnB’s are not allowed in the building, we were escorted they the back door/parking garage by hosts and asked to keep a low profile. The unit looked  like they had no longer cared. Area furniture, broken mirror in bedroom, all the pictures were crooked. It looked like a college student lived there. It was not at all what was advertised or pictured. It was terribly disappointing.

The host cancelled our stay the morning of our flight arrival in Montreal !!!We booked 2 months in advance the same apaprtment with the same host we did 8 months ago. We received the usual airbnb message of our incomimg trip 7 days prior to our stay. I send a message to the host two days before as I did not received any information on where and how to meet and get the key. I resent a message the 18 hours before and just before taking our flight to Montreal. No answer !

We landed in MOntreal and I received from AirBnb an email, a SMS and a phone message saying that the Host cancelled our stay.  We had to find an hotel and of course at peak tourist season and higher price.  This is not an individual who rent his appartment but some kind of company.  Very unprofessionnal and not trust worthy.
Karim was overall a good host, but I was disappointed that he did not respond to messages in the Airbnb interface. The place was great: pool + hot tub, location, cleanliness, all great!
The space was very nice and in a great location but I had some issues with communication. I was only contactable on WiFi and the WiFi connection stopped for 3 days.

To say it simple: what you see is what you get. :) Though we had shortly to switch to another apartment (due to a water damage) it met exactly our expectations. Karims apartments seem to be all of the same modern style. Nice lounge area, two TV's, a modern bathroom, a comfortable bed and a well-equipped kitchen. Above all a free parking-space in the garage and a heated pool outside. A really amazing extra was the free coffee-service in the lobby from Mon-Fri which we really enjoyed.
Our apartment was - as promised - in the heart of Downtown and also only a few steps away from "Crescent Street" with all its bars, pubs and restaurants.
Prior to our visit I was al litte concerned if the central location might cause too much noise but in the end we heard nothing. No noise from the streets or any neighbours.
The only little thing that was missing was a hair-dryer (or maybe we just didn't find it....?). However, due to the hot summer-temperatures it was not really an issue for us and I'm sure Karim will handle this. ;) He has a back-up for nearly everything and if something is not working or missing just let him know.
We would definitely stay in the apartment again!
Bien pour visiter Montreal 2j.
The apartment was great and the building was also very nice. Mid-way through my stay the internet was upgraded to 1 Gbps, which was super nice to have, though it was already plenty quick.

Very comfortable accommodations and the location was wonderful! If you want to visit Montreal and Old Montreal, this is the place to stay. The Museum of Fine Arts is a block away, the Metro is close by and the variety of restaurants is amazing!

This condo is really well located and comfortable for this single traveler. I appreciated having the space and amenities of a condo. The appointments are sparse- just a few minimal items in the kitchen, which are enough to get by. As others have mentioned, this host is not consistently accessible within the app, but was really responsive via phone. Unlike others, I had absolutely no trouble with the WiFi- that worked great
Host cancelled day of trip. Found out after arriving in Montreal.

Great host, Karim went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable.  Even if it meant delivering a blowdryer and body wash at 11pm at night and picking us up in the freezing rain and arranging for parking for my car.   

I would recommend staying here, great location and easy access to downtown!
Nice location and stylish place with good view. Several amenities such as hot shower and sink are broken.

name: Flat&terrace&confort in Galata
summary: Locating in Galata; very near to galata towercitycenter; only some minutes to Taksim; Karakoy; historical places by walking; great view from own entering top terrace; historical places such as Golden Horn; Topkapi Palace; Hagi Sophia and Blue mosque
space: City center; close to all interesting venues inc. historical ones ; great landscape from terrace

Thus cat lover guests will be highly welcome and will be apprecaited for their kind care.

transit: City center; close to all interesting venues inc. historical ones ; great landscape from terrace
access: all parts
interaction: wellcome for all needs during your staying
house_rules: just respect :)

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful time in Istanbul staying in Murat's apartment for a long week! Murat was very helpful host and easy to communicate with. The apartment is simple and cozy and has a perfect terrace with beautiful view. It is located in a very great neighborhood, central location making it great for exploring Istanbul.

I can highly recommend Murats place to spend your time in Istanbul. Everything went smooth, and Murat made us feel welcome, and helped us finding concerts and good cheap restaurants. He gave us a fine direction to find his apartment, and it was so easy.
We enjoyed the amazing view from his terrace every day, after walking the streets. We enjoyed that everything you need is in a walking distance, and the boats and metro are just next door, which made it easy to explore the things we wanted so see. 
Our meeting with Istanbul and Murat, were the best way to explore Istanbul.
Solid stay in central Istanbul.  Murat is willing to accommodate you in any way to make your trip more memorable. Highly recommended. Plus, the view from the terrace is incomparable.

Tout était comme décrit dans l'annonce. Murat est très accueillant, y compris le soir très tard à la sortie de l'avion. Appartement qui dispose non seulement d'une très belle vue sur le Bosphore mais qui est également proche de tout, des commerces, de restaurants, de la place Taksim, de la tour de Galata.

The perfect host in the perfect place! 
The flat is stricly as shown on photos... Murat's flat is convenient and really comfortable... And what a pleasure to have breakfast just front of bosphorus and Topkapi palace !!
Murat is really Kind, helpful and easy-going. Above all, he shares all advices you need!
I highly recommand this host !!!

Murat is very easy going and we felt at home. He gave us some tips on where to go and answered any questions we had. We asked for a beer and he had some delivered to our door in 10 minutes. He and the others living in the building were very sociable and welcomed us to Istanbul with open arms. The balcony is amazing, a large selection of coffee as Murat is a bit of a coffee addict I think and in a city as big as Istanbul I think Murat could offer anything wanted or needed to make your trip anything you want it to be.  We left passports, money and everything we owned in the apartment and not once worried about safety. Really good people in the apartment and we were introduced to great people. If you want a chill apartment with a huge balcony and really cool people..book it. 

Murat would happy welcome his flat to families but If you are younger or older and looking for a good time day or night I highly recommend booking with him. The view is amazing and a 20 minute walk to the tourist areas or the party areas with true Istanbul at your door step. 

cheers, 
Behn (Canada)
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Murat was a great host and made us feel at home in Istanbul. The apartment is in a cool area with an amazing view over the Bosphorus. Would stay again. Thanks for everything!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I have recently stayed in this apartment for 5 nights. 
I haven't actually met the host as he was abroad then , however his neighbours were super helpful and friendly as if it is a big large family living in the whole apartment. We have been greeted by Murat's friend who lives on the lower ground. He has ensured that if I needed anything I could have always contacted him. I have had family and friends popping in and out frequently who fell in love with Murat's cats. Location is amazing and as it has been mentioned in the previous reviews, the view from the living room and the terrace is spectacular. There is everything you could ask for in the area right by the door step; supermarket,  off-license open almost till morning, restaurants for all budget, souvenir shops , breakfast cafes open from 8am, bars. Trams and Busses are about 7/8mins walk as well as the boats to go to the Asian side of Istanbul. Galata Tower, Grand Bazaar, Taksim Square are some of the few walking distance places. If I have to consider one disadvantage , that would be the stairs in the apartment - perhaps if a family with a young child and a buggy would stay in the apartment or someone with an elderly, there are quite a few steps to keep your fit :) 

Best Wishes,
Cisel (London)
It should be a real pleasure to stay in this flat, the hote was very available and nice. The terrass is very big with a very beautiful landscape.

Lovely apartment, one of the nicest we've stayed in. Fantastic arty atmosphere suits Galata.  We fell in love with the cats. 

Didn't get a chance to meet Murat as he was out of town but he was very helpful over the phone and we met his neighbour, Yaşa, who helped us into the flat. 

Hope to get a chance to stay again. Thank you Murat.
Great view. Great location. Great host. Great deal !!!! Friendly cats are a plus ;)

Great place in Galata ... next door to the Galata Tower and with nice restaurants / shops around. A fantastic view of Istanbul: Bosphore, Sante-Sophie, Blue mosk, TopKapi palace ... A must! 
Murat is a very nice person, very keen to give good advices. 
Enjoy the cats! :-)

Your legs will pay, when you walk up to 4th floor, but your eyes will be rewarded twice, when you enjoy fantastic city view from own roof terrace. Get yourself a bottle of wine for spending time up there. Galata tower district will make for you all old Istanbul stories comes true. And yes, two cats there really makes atmosphere (pet little cat, she loves it).

What a wonderful place! We had an amazing time staying in Murat's flat. He gave us recommendations and took us out with his friends and we had so much fun! My favourite part had to be watching the sunset from his terrace, with the two cats hanging around. His neighbours were super nice as well! All in all, we had a great time. Thank you Murat!
Murat's flat is perfectly located in the area of Galata. The view is amazing and the two cats who are living here are very easy going. this is definitely a place to recommend!

Abbiamo soggiornato una settimana nell'appartamento di Murat in Istanbul. L'alloggio, fornito di tutto ciò che può servire, é tranquillo, ha una splendida terrazza da cui la vista spazia sul Bosforo e sul Corno d'Oro; il quartiere (Galata) è molto vivace, vicino a due linee della metropolitana, un piccolo supermercato è a 100 metri, in zona ci sono inoltre molti ristoranti, locali, negozi ecc, Murat è un host molto gentile e disponibile, sollecito nelle risposte. Consiglio questo alloggio e spero di tornarci!
Great location, very helpful and nice host, not the cleanest flat due to cats

Murat has a great flat, in a fantastic location. It is within walking distance of Galata tower, the river, and the river. The amenities are great, and Murat was eager to give us tips and suggestions for local cuisine.
Great host, Nice neighbors great location beautifull balcony. Nice people and openminded admosphere.

Great space with plenty of room for the two of us. The location was perfect for exploring Galata area and just a short walk over the bridge to go and see the bazaar, Hagia Sophia etc. The view from the rooftop was exquisite and the perfect place to have an afternoon drink and watch the sun go down. Murat was quick to respond and very helpful with any questions and recommendations. We had a great time and would definitely stay here again.

Lovely and very homey flat just around the corner from Galata Tower, which is very touristy area but the street of this flat is nice and not crowded at all. The flat is on the top floor, so lots of climbing is guaranteed. The view on the balcony is worth it. Bear in mind that the balcony is not private (for some reason I thought it was).
The cats are absolutely adorable and one of them loves to be caressed so much she will probably climb on your lap already on the first day. 
I was in Istanbul during a hot period and the flat gets very warm. There is one floor fan to  cool you off but no AC.
Overall a nice experience. Murat was very helpful and welcoming. The flat has all the necessities. And cats are adorable.

I stayed with a friend in Murat’s place for 5 days. The balcony with the view over the city is incredible, potentially the nicest we had in the entire trip. The neighbors from the other flats in the building come up to sit in the balcony, and are friendly, welcoming and charming. Bearing in mind that turkey is a fairly conservative country, I think it’s worth pointing out that this building is somewhat of a liberal stronghold - so this flat would be a really good choice for women travelling alone or LGBT people, etc. 

The flat itself is not exactly pristine, but it’s comfortable and very well located. All the basic things are in good working conditions. Although there’s no a/c, the flat is relatively cool at night and you’ll get a good night’s sleep. 

Murat is a great host and very easy to communicate with. I really do recommend staying here!

Very nice place with amazing view over Old Istanbul. One important benefit is the location, which is closed to tramway (5min walk), ferries (10min) and metro (10min). If you love cats, then you’ll be spoiled with two ! Please note that the terrasse can be shared sometimes but most of the time you have it for you (at least during my staying)
Murat has been a perfect and very kind host. The apartment is wonderful as the view from his terrace.
Nice appartement in very beautiful and vivid Part of Istanbul. Best view from the terrace!
A great spot. Don’t expect luxury, is more of a student flat cupboard doors insecure. Tiny bathroom and bed linen not up to scratch but clean. Great views

Location is just perfect, and Galata Kitchen right in front of the apartment. Murat was very nice and met us late at night, then let us keep the luggage for extra hours. 

This place is for you if you love cats: these two are very talkative and are keen to hang out with you everywhere. There's a third one coming to the flat to eat free food :)

It's moderately clean, but there's plenty of hot water and the terrace is great!
Murat was very welcoming! Still available, with good advices for visiting the nice places in Istanbul! He even helped us for our return to airport
The location and the terrace are exceptional! :)

We had a great time at Murat's apartment, which is wonderfully Bohemian, is in a great location in Galata (near the Tower), and has a fabulous view from the roof terrace.
 Of course, the view comes at a price - not money, as Murat's appt. is excellent value, but you need to be fairly fit as it's at the top of a hill and then four flights of stairs.
Murat is an excellent host, and is also smoker friendly - a breath of fresh air compared to smoker hostile Britain. Non-smokers should not be put off though, as the flat is well ventilated and doesn't smell of tobacco. 
The cooking facilities are fine, but you probably won't want to use them much as there are so many fabulous places to eat nearby at all price levels, which, generally, are much lower than anywhere else we've been in Europe. What's more, you can just pop over to Asia where the prices are even better.
Murat keeps a couple of cats, which I think are rescued street cats. They are very affectionate, seemingly flea free, and enhanced our stay. 
To sum up - Istanbul is amazing fun, great sightseeing, great shopping (bargain hard, but keep it friendly!), fabulous food, good local wines, very friendly, wonderfully  atmospheric and, by European standards, very good VFM, but tough for anyone who is disabled.
When you come to Istanbul, Murat's is the place to stay, just so long as you're ok with cats.

4 flights of stairs as advertised - spectacular location. Cats as advertised were very Friendly. 1 block to Galata Tower. supermarket nearby - easy downhill walk for local transportation. Worth the stay for a frugal traveler.

We had a great time at Murat’s  place. The flat is clean and well equipped and the view from the terrace is incredible. The district is very central and there are a lot of great restaurants nearby. Finally Murat was very welcoming and flexible (arrived very late on friday). I highly recommend this place

Murat was so helpful; he was very flexible with check in and out, gave us lots of local tips, and helped us book train tickets. His flat is lovely and cosy, and perfectly located with lots of places to eat nearby. 

His cats are very friendly!
Appartement très bien situé et accueil chaleureux de Murat et des chats lors de notre arrivé. Très bon séjour chez Murat !

Our time in Istanbul was great- we had a fantastic view over the city from Murats terrace. 
Thanks for all !!!

name: Luxurious 65㎡, Spacious in Soho/Central(中环)
summary: Entire apartment, 65 ㎡, very spacious, completely renewed in 2015, in the most deluxe apartment building in Soho/Central(苏荷美食区/中环). Countless shops, restaurants and bars nearby. Quiet and very ideal for a city trip. 3 minutes to Sheung Wan MTR(上环地铁站), 5 minutes to Central MTR(中环地铁站), 5 minutes to LKF(兰桂坊), 8 minutes to IFC.
space: The luxurious & spacious apartment is situated in Soho/Central (苏荷/中环). It's almost the most deluxe dwelling building in Soho area you can find. 65 squared meters and newly renovated. High floor. • Bedroom 1:  KING sized bed (1.8m*2m) with 2 sea-viewed windows (Rare in the center of Hong Kong), AC, heat, spacious. • Bedroom 2:  Double bed , cozy, AC, heat. • Living room:  Spacious, Deluxe dining table and furniture, TV, premium speaker, sofa for three, huge French window, SEA view balcony. • Kitchen: Fridge, microwave, and all standard utensils and plates. • Bathroom: Bath towel, shampoo, bath lotion, toothbrush and toothpaste. You have free access to: • LED TV • Broadband Internet/Wifi • Fresh Towels & Linen & Toothbrush  • Shampoo. Conditioner & Shower Gel • Professional Hair Dyer • Tea, Coffee, Tea, Sugar, • AC  • Heat • Top-class Cooking Utensils • Microwave Oven Also, you can access to facilities in the building: • Fitness room: 24 hours entrance (30HKD/per day) • Swimming pool (f
description: Entire apartment, 65 ㎡, very spacious, completely renewed in 2015, in the most deluxe apartment building in Soho/Central(苏荷美食区/中环). Countless shops, restaurants and bars nearby. Quiet and very ideal for a city trip. 3 minutes to Sheung Wan MTR(上环地铁站), 5 minutes to Central MTR(中环地铁站), 5 minutes to LKF(兰桂坊), 8 minutes to IFC. The luxurious & spacious apartment is situated in Soho/Central (苏荷/中环). It's almost the most deluxe dwelling building in Soho area you can find. 65 squared meters and newly renovated. High floor. • Bedroom 1:  KING sized bed (1.8m*2m) with 2 sea-viewed windows (Rare in the center of Hong Kong), AC, heat, spacious. • Bedroom 2:  Double bed , cozy, AC, heat. • Living room:  Spacious, Deluxe dining table and furniture, TV, premium speaker, sofa for three, huge French window, SEA view balcony. • Kitchen: Fridge, microwave, and all standard utensils and plates. • Bathroom: Bath towel, shampoo, bath lotion, toothbrush and toothpaste. You have free access to: • LED TV • Br
neighborhood_overview: Many many famous trendy shops, cafe, restaurants, tourist attractions nearby. Easy to find a bus stop, escalators and MRT within walking distance. Because it is a high-floor apartment, you do not need to worry the noise in such a popular area.
notes: You are not near Soho/Central. Because you are IN SOHO!!!
access: Any special requests can be arranged after contacting with householder, such as discount for LONG-TERM stay.
interaction: I've lived in HK for 4 years and have been 35 countries. I am happy to share the HK I love and the world I love.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment.

host.host_about:
Hi, my name is Quan and I'm glad to welcome you to my apartment in Soho/Central, Hong Kong.
I am originally from Guangzhou, China. Cantonese and Mandarin speaking. Lived in Beijing, Guangzhou and Los Angeles, and living in Hong Kong for 2 years. Being here is a great pleasure and I enjoy the city. I like sightseeing, food and bars and I will be happy to show you any information regarding places to visit and to shop, tips on restaurants and interesting corners to see.

I am into travelling and have been 35 countries. Meeting new guys is really a pleasure. 

Hope to welcome you very soon.

Quan

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Quan is a "SUPER" host. extraordinarily welcoming, hospitable and helpful. The best host I have had!  I will 100% recommend this sumptuous apartment  to anyone looking for a great place to stay in the heart of HK. 

非常高档的公寓,法式的家具很考究｡在香港少有的宽敞房间｡就在中环,位置很赞,吃､住､行都非常方便｡向小伙伴们力荐!

Quan is a very nice host. She gave me a very detailed reminder on every issue from entering into the apartment, to the every small tiny part inside is marked clearly with memo paper. She is also very caring with drinks and bread prepared in advance. It is a very nice expereince and I will go back to revisit definitely.
Great location and easy access. Enjoyed my stay!

We had the best time staying at Quan's apartment in Soho. We are locals and needed a place for a weekend getaway. Quan's apartment perfectly served the purpose of our trip.

The apartment looks exactly like the photos shown here on the listing. It is spacious, clean and tidy, which is quite hard to find the central part of Hong Kong Island. It is located about 5 minutes away from Sheung Wan MTR station, which is quite convenient. The building is surrounded by delicious restaurants. It is also right next to PMQ (a new area for creative and innovative artists to display, promote and sell their work) if you exit the building from 3/F. 

Quan was very helpful and responsive. She prepared everything for us and we only needed to pack our clothes! She also kindly left us the key card to access the gym room in the building. We enjoyed playing with her cat as well and I can assure you, it is the friendliest you will ever meet! It surely brightens up the apartment even more than it has already done.

All in all, if you want to relax and chill while still staying in the city centre, this is the best place for you :) I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Hong Kong.
白白很可爱,房间位置很好,三道锁很安全

Listing description was accurate. Great neighborhood with lots of restaurants near by, and close to all places downtown. View from apartment is great. Apartment is clean and looks exactly like the pictures. If Quan gives you the option of taking care of her cat "bai bai" who lives there, absolutely do it! Sweetest cat I've ever met that just constantly wants to cuddle.

Quan's apartment in Soho was amazing! Just as described and in the pictures. The apartment was spacious and clean, with everything we needed for a wonderful trip. Quan went the extra mile to make us feel welcome and make sure we had everything we needed (toothbrushes, slippers, towels) to have a comfortable stay. 

The location of the apartment can't be beat with close walking distance to great restaurants, bars, and shopping just down the street but still feeling quiet and residential. The building was awesome with a gym and great security measures in place. We didn't get to use the pool in December but it looked lovely! I would happily stay at Quan's again and hope I can visit HK soon to do just that.

I stayed at Quan's place for two nights last week. Quan was very kind and responsive! The apartment looks exactly like the picture shown in her profile, big and tidy! The location is absolutely perfect, it's surrounded by lots of cool restaurants and bars! 

I think it's quite easy to get to Quan's place from the MTR station. I really appreciated that Quan's left me the resident card so I could use the gym room! Also, the other main reason why Quan's apartment is so perfect - her cat! Definitely the most friendly cat in the world!! It just made so happy seeing him every time I came back to the apartment! 

I would definitely recommend people to stay at Quan's place. It's totally worth the price!
Best location! Nice Hostess! Quan gave us very detailed instruction ang the place is comfy and quiet. Thanks for CNY gift. So sweet staying :)
This is a great place and Quan is incredibly helpful. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Hong Kong.

Excellent spot 
Very clean and tidy 
Lovely cat 
Responsive host 
Couldn't find a better spot in Hong Kong

Quan's listing accurately describes her apartment, which was quite comfortable.  SoHo is a fantastic neighborhood.  Quick walk to just about anything you'd like to eat.  Prince, the kitty, was adorable (and very demanding of cuddles)!

The apartment is awesome. It is very clean and tidy exactly like in the pictures or even better. It's definitely big space for staying in Hongkong. It's very central with lot of restaurants and cafes. We enjoyed a lot there, many thinks.

Quan is a very good host. The apartment is extremely nice and is same as what i see from the photos. It's cosy, warm and comfortable like home. I do spend a good time staying in Quan's apartment. The location is wonderful, nearby soho area and 10 mins walking to LKF. A lot of nice restaurants in the surrounding. And the cat "bai bai" is adorable. I definitely recommend to stay in Quan's apartment.

Quan was a fantastic host and even left us a Happy New Year gift! The location is fantastic for exploring Hong 
Kong by foot and the apartment has everything you need. A great place to stay!

We had a very nice day here! Quan was a wonderful host, really accomodating and helpful. Her place is gorgeous and cosy. Very nicely decorated and well equipped apartment, quiet and peaceful. Perfect location. Central and Soho are perfect for staying. Would highly recommend staying here!

Her cats are adorable and so playful. Even my wife who has cat allergies couldn’t stay away from them. Highly recommended for tourists and long term stays. We will definitely be back to visit so her cats won’t forget our faces. :)

Quan's place was conveniently located about a 10 minute walk from the MTR. There is also a convenience store across the street and restaurants near by. The apartment was as described.  Quan was quick to respond to all messages and was helpful with all questions. We had a lovely time with her 2 cats, one of which loves to play and cuddle.

Quan’s apartment is centrally located in a fun part of Hong Kong in a luxury building. The apartment was very clean. Quan was really welcoming and even checked in with me to make sure I️ had everything I️ need!

Nice and large aapartment (per HK standards), perfectly located in Sheung Wan, in a high-end building. The flat is very quiet, well equipped. Nothing to complain about,  I had a very nice stay.

Communication with Quan was efficient and smooth.

I can recommend this apartment to other travelers.

Quan’s place is super convenient.  I used to live in HK, and her unit is bigger than your usual apartment available in the area.  She was quick to respond, very thorough, and the check in and check out process was seamless.  The location is hard to beat, and her cats are super playful if you do not mind cats during your stay!
Quan has a very nice apartment in very convenient central location in Soho. Her cats were adorable, but they like lots of attention!
Although looks a little older than the pictures is a lovely place. Is big for being in a city like Hong Kong. Super cool neighborhood and very close to central station.
I will be back for the cats! :)
엄청 좋아요. 고양이들도 너무 예쁘고요. 사진보다도 훠얼씬 좋아요!! 홍콩에서 이정도 가격에 이정도 숙소 구하기 정말 힘듭니다. 재방문 의사 200% 있습니다. 감사합니다 :)

Quan was very quick to respond to all our questions before and during our stay. The apartment is in a great building in the hipster Soho, I totally recommend the area!
However, the apartment didn't live up to our expectations. It needs maintenance (paint is chipping off in several places) and the living room, where the two cats stay, had a strong smell of cat litter and stale cat food.
地理位置便捷,周边生活及其方便,房屋安静

Quan's place is located in one of the best  neighbourhoods in HK. A lot of good bars and restaurants in the area. A short walk from the MTR. Quan was very quick in responding to questions and a small issue we had with the wifi. For the price you wont find a better two bedroom apt on the island. Highly recommend.
Quan's place is adorable with a great location -- it's such a great place to stay when in Hong Kong.  They are hospitable, and have a super quick response rate.  Much appreciated!

Awesome location, top it up with some awesome views from the balcony this
apt is really nice. Also nice cats, especially Swan:)

We had a great day at Quan's place. Quan was responsive to my messages and Eva was very helpful as well. The apartment is located at a great location which is surrounded with great bars/cafes and convenience store. The club house is great with swimming pool, sauna room and steam room. It was quite convenient when going out or back, either take the MTR to/from Sheung Wan or via the escalators of Central and Mid-Levels. There is a bus line from there to Central, Wanchai and Causeway Bay as well.  The cats there are great and both are so adorable! I would recommend this place to others.

name: Charming & Comfy in Annandale - 2
summary: Nice and charming space close to the centre of Sydney.  Walking distance to water view, parklands, shops and public transport.  Sydney University, Sydney Fish Market, Glebe, Newtown and Leichhardt are just a few minutes away.  Cafes and restaurants are abundant in the area and the suburb is a quiet village that have easy access to other parts of Sydney. We enjoy hosting guests and have met hundreds of Sydney visitors and our aim is to make their stay just like home.  Come and share with us.
space: Welcome to Annandale! Please read through the entire listing carefully before booking this room as it will answer most of your questions and I'd like to share with you all aspects of the room, not just a pretty picture.  If you have any questions please ask before booking the place. Due to high demand for Christmas and New Year period, between Dec 20 to Jan 15, the minimum booking period is 4 nights. The house: Close to the city of Sydney CBD, located near the heart of Annandale village, walking distance to shops, transportation and water-side recreation, this century old 3 bedroom established house features high ceiling, timber floor, nice living space and a charming deck that leads to a little backyard with a fish pond that has some goldfish in it. It isn't a newly built mansion, but a comfortable home that carries a great vibe. Transport: One minute walking distance to the bus stop, 15min bus ride into the city, another takes you to Coogee beach. 3 minutes walk to the shops, you can
