If you have any questions please ask before booking the place. Due to high demand for Christmas and New Year period, between Dec 20 to Jan 15, the minimum booking period is 4 nights. The house: Close to the city of Sydney CBD, located near the heart of Annandale village, walking dis
neighborhood_overview: Annandale is a charming area based in the Inner-West of Sydney, the village features some heritage listed architectures, cafes & restaurants, and is very close to the City, Glebe, Newtown and Sydney University.  10min walking distance you get to the bay at the foot of ANZAC Bridge or you can go explore areas like Leichhardt & Balmain which is all fairly close.
notes: We recently adopted two kittens, so now we have a house with cats.  If you are allergic to animals and dislike pets in the house, this place isn't the right fit for you.  Please be very mindful with the kittens as they will want to get out the house at any given chance and / or making discoveries, trying to get into your room, under the bed to have a play, or they might follow you asking for a hug.  If you think any of the listed behaviour can cause some inconvenience to you and your stay, please do not book the place.  We just discovered that feeding two kittens is like taking two small babies, it involves work on our end, and understanding on the guests' end.  Please do not feed the cats as they follow a particular diet and don't let the cats run out as they are still small and can get lost, attacked by larger birds and/or hit by a passing vehicle.  If you think you can live with two tiny friend in the house who are generally clean and cute, we believe the kittens can also bring you
transit: One minute walking distance to the closest bus stop, where you'll get two buses, 15min bus ride to central and the other bus takes you to Coogee Beach.  Bus comes around at 15min interval during peak hours and 25min interval off peak.  You can also walk 10min to Parramatta road where there's a selection of about 8 buses that goes into the City or western suburbs of Sydney.    There is a light rail station within 10min walking distance and you can take a light rail into the City on a 15min ride that goes through Fish Market, Darling Harbour and China Town eventually Central.   You can get here from the airport either by train then bus (45min) or Taxi (25min).  In terms of parking, you'll get plenty of street parking free of charge 7 days a week.
access: Other facilities: - Street Parking (free 24x7) - WiFi available Please be mindful that this isn't a hotel or serviced apartment. It's a sharing house where you get your own rooms.  Furnitures and other items not listed in the profile are private property (e.g. Piano, books & albums etc), please ask if you wish to use them.
interaction: Me and my partner Julie live in the house, unless we go on vacation or travel for work we will be around most of the time so please don't hesitate to ask if you need any directions, suggestions as to place to visit, things to see.  I have been hosting for some time now both with AirBnB and through other platform, we enjoy meeting people and the general feedback we get is that guests love the place and our hospitality. We look forward to your visit and hope you enjoy your stay in Sydney.
house_rules: We recently adopted two kittens, so now we have a house with cats.  If you are allergic to animals and dislike pets in the house, this place isn't the right fit for you.  Please be very mindful with the kittens as they will want to get out the house at any given chance and / or making discoveries, trying to get into your room, under the bed to have a play, or they might follow you asking for a hug.  If you think any of the listed behaviour can cause some inconvenience to you and your stay, please do not book the place.  We just discovered that feeding two kittens is like taking two small babies, it involves work on our end, and understanding on the guests' end.  Please do not feed the cats as they follow a particular diet and don't let the cats run out as they are still small and can get lost, attacked by larger birds and/or hit by a passing vehicle.  If you think you can live with two tiny friend in the house who are generally clean and cute, we believe the kittens can also bring you

host.host_about:
Easy going, optimistic, spontaneous, creative and adventurous person. After former corporate life that propelled me to explore what life has to offer outside of what many people see as an attractive 'career path', I have been happily living an unconventional life experiencing it to the full.

I'm quite active, I love ocean swimming, riding my motorbike, go hiking, skating or long walks to enjoy the outdoors. I go dancing from time to time (tango or salsa) and I channel a fair bit of energy through my creative outlet in photography. I love to travel, even though I haven't been to nearly as many places as i wished to, but each and every travel experience brings immense joy, learning and friendship that I value. 

I enjoy meeting people, I especially love spending time with those who are positive, easy going, adventurous, open minded and passionate in following their dreams.

Recently i have swam the English Channel (yes UK->FR) and am now working on my next challenge (and a few of them too :)

reviews.comments: Un super séjour chez Wyatt ! Le quartier est très sympa et a toute les commodités, l'accès au centre ville est simple et rapide ! Et Wyatt est toujours de bon conseil pour les visites à effectuer à Sydney !
I had my privacy, quietness, clean and good surrounding area to be in.

Wyatt is nice and very informative, gave us a lot of ideas where to go and how to go...
A convenience place to stay, only a min walk to bus stop from his place and 15 mins to Chinatown by bus Restaurants, convenience store and supermarket can easily reach by foot 
Thank you for your advice and caring msg, Wyatt 
All the best
Wendy and her mummy

Wyatt is a warm and friendly host. We spent a comfy and joyful stay at his apartment in Annandale. Great location, just 15 mins by bus to the centre and steps away walking distance from Glebe and Leichardt suburbs.
It is close to cafes, shops and transport buses too.
We will highly recommend it!

Nous avons passé nos 2 premières nuits à Sydney chez Wyatt, et nous ne le regrettons pas ! Discret et disponible, Wyatt respecte très bien les valeurs du Bed and Breakfast. Il a de plus été précieux dans ses conseils sur Sydney, les endroits à découvrir, ou sortir, les balades à faire, les bon restaurants etc... On peut dire que Wyatt a été notre guide touristique pendant notre séjour !

L'appartement est au pied des transports en commun, et tout proche des commerces. La chambre et l'appartement sont très agréables, et la petite terrasse donnant sur le jardin donne un coté rustique à cette maison de Sydney.

Vous le constaterez par vous même, on est très bien chez Wyatt !
Séjour très agréable chez Wyatt que nous recommandons. N'hésitez pas à laisser votre empreinte sur son mur ;)

We had a great time at Wyatts place! His house is just so nice and comfy and we especially enjoyed having dinner outside at his small porch. The location is also great, very close to Uni and everything you need for everyday life... Wyatt is a very carring host and we'll definitely recommend his place!

We had a really good time at Wyatt's house. We loved the area, cause it was possible to walk into the city and Annandale has several nice cafés and shops and it was not too busy. We enjoyed ourselves during a breakfast on the little balcony. Wyatt's place is furnitured with a lot of love and good taste. He always was there if we had any questions about the city. The only little thing we could criticise is that the bed in the smaller room is like a sleeping couch which was not the most comfy sleep. But it was ok for us. We had a great time at his place and would recommend it!
My mother stayed at Wyatt's place for ten days during her visit in Sydney. She really enjoyed both the accomodation and Annandale. We will certainly consider Wyatt for her next visit.

Where do I begin? Wyatt is the perfect host.  Super friendly and down to earth, Wyatt really made me feel at home.  Not only did he have many recommendations for things to do in the city, he also showed me around some of Sydney's landmarks.  Traveling alone and this being the first time I visited this city, it was nice to have a locals perspective and insight to getting around town.  When I look back on my trip and stay in Sydney, I smile... Thanks to Wyatt for making it such an amazing and enjoyable visit.  WHEN I come back, I will definitely stay at Wyatt's place :)

Thanks so much Wyatt for being so welcoming and generous :) Col and I loved our stay and would recommend a stay at Wyatt's to anyone looking for accomodation in Sydney.  
Goodluck with all your adventures Wyatt :)

I stayed in Wyatt's house with my girlfriend for 4 nights. Wyatt is really nice host. This was my second time in Sydney and he recommended me good spots to visit which I hadn't seen in my first trip. He has a big painting along the wall in the hall of the house so we were asked to paint something in there. We really enjoyed it and we thought it was a really good idea. Regarding the room, it is really small, so there was space just for us and our small bags. Anyway our stay was short so we didn't spend much time in the house. For sleeping 4 nights it was good and I consider a great value for money. It is a better choice instead of backpackers. The house is cozy and well equipped in all areas. The toilet is shared and it could be a bit cleaner. Anyway it is enough for a short stay.

When my friend and I was there, Wyatt was not in the house so his mum hosted us. A really nice and helpful lady. I forgot to bring the house key on one of the nights and Wyatt's mum helped me to contact the other guests (who were not in the house at that moment) to see I they are coming back soon. 

The house itself is filled with that artistic atmosphere with wall painting and canvas. Our room is a bit small and simple but that's enough for two girls. The only thing is that they don't seem to have an air-con in the room. Bathroom is clean and they have a bathtub. Kitchen is free for usage for all guests and is quite well equipped.

We reviewed Wyatt's other listing as we booked two rooms at his house! My sister and our friend had a great time staying in this room. We all enjoyed Wyatt's house and his hospitality! It was in a nice, quiet neighborhood that had several shops, bars, cafés and restaurants and was in about a 20-25 minute walk to Glebe Rd! There were also a couple bus stops right out the front door.  Bathroom was a bit small to share between everyone but that was no problem in the end.

Wyatt was a great host, very welcoming and had lots of great tips for exploring Sydney. The house and room itself was great and had everything that we needed. The bed was ridiculously comfy and made for a great sleep. Annandale is a perfect spot with lovely cafes and just a 15 main bus ride into the city centre. We would definitely recommend this place. Thanks Wyatt.

Very. Easy communications to let me book in and find his house. And when Wyatt was away, his sister popped around to make sure that I had everything I needed.  The bed was comfortable, the kitchen and sitting room spacious and everything I needed was available, right down to some tourist brochures and transport timetables on the area.  It soon felt like living in ones own home.  But ones action say more than words.  I have booked to extend my current visit here and also booked a return visit on my way back through Sydney in a weeks time. Thank you Wyatt, great place.
enjoyed staying there for the short trip. It was a nice experience. The house is well designed and comfortable. The host is thoughtful and nice.

Emplacement parfait calme et proche du centre. Chambre propre et appartement très sympathique. Wyatt est incroyablement accueillant très ouvert et on peut voir que c'est quelqu'un qui à lui même voyagé et qui sait donc exactement ce que un voyageur recherche durant son voyage. Malgré le fait que c'est une chambre dans un appartement on se sent tranquille et on à pas l'impression de faire intrusion dans la vie de l'hôte ni de se marcher sur les pieds. Thanks a lot! Samuel & Karolina

Wyatt has been a really great host! The place was comfy and the toilet was kept clean all the time. The place was also very convenient and easily accessible to all the attractions like Sydney Opera House, Darling Habour, Chinatown and the City. I really enjoyed my stay there and look forward to renting the place again if I go back to sydney.

Wyatts place was very clean and comfortable. It is a fair distance from the city but public transport is very convenient and there is a bus stop right outside the door and there are shops and restaurants nearby. Taxi from the airport cost us around $50 dollars but was worth it as it was much quicker than public transport. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney!
A cosy cottage in one of the best neighbourhoods in Sydney. A lovely and convenient base to explore from, with a warm and welcoming host.

From the first second on Wayne made our stay as pleasant as possible. He supplied us with loads of informations of what to do and where to go. If he is not busy working, you can have a sophisticated chat with him.
The room was very comfortable and clean. Everything worked although it's a very old house he manages to keep it clean, tidy and working. 
Thanks for the awesome stay and hope to see you again.
Wyatt made us feel right at home!!  He let us use his fridge, kitchen, garden, showers, bathroom, (Website hidden by Airbnb) was like staying at home :)!!!

Vielen Dank für die Gastfreundschaft im weihnachtlichen Sydney. 
Wyatt hat mich mit guten Tipps versorgt, die Gegend ist sehr nett.

Dank Wyatts offenheit und Gastfreundschaft haben wir uns gleich sehr wohl gefühlt. Das teilen der Küche und des Badezimmers hat gut geklappt. Die Wohnung ist mit dem Bus gut verhältnissmäßig schnell zu erreichen.

Wyatt was a friendly, accommodating and generous host, he even helped us with our laundry even though he had many things to do. The small bedroom is a bit tight for a couple but was as described in Wyatt's listing so we expected that, but it had a comfy bed and clean bedding. The house itself is indeed charming and cool, and located in a good, central suburb and you can bus down to CBD within half hour max, so that was great.

We really enjoyed Wyatt's company and found him a great host, thanks Wyatt.

the house of wyatt is perfect for enjoying Sydney for a few days. nice neighborhood, the bus stop for the city at a few meters from the front door. the house is beautiful and wyatt is a good host, he explained us how to move and where to go. i would definitely go back or recommend it.

The house was very clean and well situated, in a quiet and nice suburb with some shops really close.
Wyatt was an awesome host who showed us everything in the house and gave advices on what to do in Sydney. He made us very confortable. Really good place in Sydney for a short stay!! :)

Wyatt is a great host! Always give you some tips about the city and chates with you if you like.
The house is great and you have everything that you need. Bus station is just 1 minute away and you get to the city or to the famous beaches!
When we come back to sydney i stay in that house again!

Wyatt was great!! He is a very cool and genuine guy that makes an effort to communicate and interact with his guest. Wyatt saved us a couple of bucks and picked us up from the train station, so nice! The house was very cute and charming. It was fun to hang around with the other guest and Wyatt and share stories about our home country and the activities we enjoy! I would definitely recommend staying at this house!
Really nice place to stay, not far from the city. It was a shame that we did not meet Wyatt but we had a great time in Syndey.

We stayed at Wyatt place for 3 nights. The room is in a typical Australian terrace house with a nice backyard and conveniently located close to transports and Annandale's shops. We slept in one of the 2 rooms available for airbnb guests; the bed was very comfy and the place is very quiet. We were also lucky enough to have the entire place for us for most of our stay since the other room was vacant and (unfortunately) Wyatt was overseas. We would suggest Wyatt's place to anyone looking for a cost-effective accommodation in Sydney (way better than any double room in a hostel for about half of the price!).

We really enjoyed staying at Wyatt's place. His flat is very close to busstops and some little shops. 
He is a great host - very helpful and care about all your needs.
We would recommend him to any travler. 
Thanks a lot for your hospitality :-)

Hi! The stay at Wyatt's house was amazing (: I had such a lovely time there with my boyfriend, he's helpful and provide tips and where to go. The room are very comfortable and it's the best place to stay if you're looking for something cozy, definitely will choose this place again the next time!
Great being back in Annandale at Wyatts place and visiting old friends and making new ones.
Great host, great house, great area! Would thoroughly recommend. If only our stay was longer !!

Had a great 4 days stay at Wyatt's place. Location was good and we enjoyed our stay. Wyatt is really easy going and provides great advice on all queries we have about visiting the places interest. Would love to stay at Wyatt's place again if we come back to Sydney.

Wyatt is very helpful and friendly. He take his time to explain every but of things that we hv question to. Location was good. The bus is easy to take and train is just a 15mins walk away from home. I had a great stay and the room isnt too small :)

Très bonne expérience, jolie maison pleine de charme à une vingtaine de minutes du centre de Sydney par le bus (arrêt de bus à deux pas). Hôtes très accueillants, Julie, la compagne de Wyatt, est française pour l'anecdote. Pour les fumeurs, le jardin sera apprécié ! 
Nous avions la plus petite des deux chambres, finalement d'une taille suffisante, et malgré le descriptif, nous n'avons pas été gênés par les bruits de la salle de bains attenante. Seuls les avions pourront être entendus de ceux qui ont le someil léger, mais ils ne survolent pas le quartier tous les jours.
Bref, que du positif, n'hésitez pas, d'autant que le budget est raisonnable.

We stayed at Wyatt's house for a couple of days and it was really comfortable, the house is charming and has everything you need. It is in a nice neighbourhood with a lot of shops and cafes. The bus stop is right infront of the house so the transport was convenient.
We had no problems with the host whatsoever, he was helpful and nice to us.
I would recommend Wyatts place to everybody who wants to enjoy Sydney and a quiet place to stay.

Regards 
Silvia

We were made to feel very welcome by the hosts. They were also politely accommodating of our late check-in. The room and kitchen were in excellent condition and everything was as described. Would certainly recommend.

We've stayed at Wyatt's house for 6 nights. Julie and Wyatt were very helpful, calm and welcoming. The room and the bed was very comfortable and the room was clean and nice. The city was not far away and it was very easy to get around with busses and train. Wyatt was also very helpful our last day, because we needed to hire a taxi and stuff. 
Thanks very much for your kindness!

We went to Sydney for sightseeing and stayed at Wyatt's place for 4 nights. We were overly happy with this decision, felt comfortable at all time and enjoyed Wyatt's and Julie's hospitality. I would definitively recommend this place for backpackers on a budget. The bed was very comfortable. Everything was just as Wyatt described on the listing. Wyatt is a very well prepared host when it comes to briefings on how living together can be more enjoyful. I really liked this and it makes everything running more smoothly:). As stated, the room is a little small but all our stuff (one big suitcase, two large backpacks and a drone case) fitted well in there. Tthe bathroom is a little small but fits the atmosphere of the house. We can definitively recommend staying in Wyatt's place!
Very relaxed and easy going what else is important for a nice stay :)

We stayed 3 nights in May 2016. We had a lovely time both Wyatt and Julia. They made us both feel very welcome and we had some great chats. The apartment is close to liz of places to eat and very easy to get into the city. The house was clean and tidy the whole time we was there and We parked outside the house and it was free. Over all we had a great time staying at Wyatt house it was the best Airbnb experience we have had so far. We will for sure be back when we are next in Sydney.

It was a short enjoyable trip thanks to Wyatt. Thank you for his hospitality and warmth welcome to his home. Wyatt is very easy-going and comfortable to get along with. We shared and exchanged quite a bit of interest in common and thanks to Airbnb I have made a new friend :)

The place was quiet and clean. I just wish  there  was a heating  in the  room as its winter  and the room is very  cold. Lucky i got thick  onesie to sleep on. Plus I suggest  atleast 1 clean towel to use for the  guest  on the duration  of their stay  would be good. I have to buy my own towel somewhere.
谢谢Julie和Wyatt!他们很热情友好!我们在悉尼过了很开心的四个晚上,悉尼是个很大很漂亮的城市｡
房东和女朋友人特别好,很热心,会尽力帮助别人｡房子很干净,整洁,卧室很舒服｡

The place was a great location in the city, close to bus stop and shops. He gladly let us come earlier for check in. He was there when we arrived letting us know about his house and rules and such. The bed was super comfy. The only issue I had was the window was locked open and couldnt close or open it more. Otherwise place was good, quiet and safe.

The host is very friendly. He gave us a lot of useful information. The room was very small and VERY VERY .. as well as the bathroom My opinion not to recommend. I do not want to get too close now, but maybe a lot can be improved!

Julie and Wyatt greeted us warmly when we arrived. They made the check-in process easy. They are both knowledgeable about Sydney and Australia. They are both polite about the many house rules. The small bedroom was big enough for two backpackers, and being next to the bathroom on the other side of the house gave it a more private feel. Wyatt's apartment is in a great location: walking distance to several restaurants and cafes; 470 bus stop just down the street that takes you to Central (<15 mins); and walkable (a little longer, ~35 mins) to Newtown and Redfern. The text description of the apartment is more forthcoming than most hosts', and accurate. We feel that there was a large discrepancy between the photos and the actual state of the apartment. We would have enjoyed our stay more so if we had a fan, or the window in the small bedroom had a screen; the screen could have prevented mosquitoes from entering the room on a hot, rainy summer night.

She is a very zealous hostess, offering us so many useful tips on our trip. The house is quiet, clean and tidy, a really good place for rest! Also, the house locates in a beautiful town which is near the center of Sydney, so it's really convenient to have a meal or take a bus.
房东人很热情 是华人 有问题都可以找他解决 很干净 交通特别方便 门口就有470bus往返central 机场uber大概30刀 下次有机会还会来
Nice stay, hosts were lovely, bit out the way for the city and surround area, would be best for though with a car.
Nice house and friendly hosts. Quiet neighbourhood and easy to get into town, would recommend and stay again
Ccv

My friend and I stayed with Wyatt over Easter and had a lovely time! It’s easy to get to the city with buses running past regularly. The bed is so comfortable and we felt very relaxed! I’d highly recommend Wyatt’s place, thanks again for having us!

Thanks a lot for the help that Julie and Wyatt gave us. They are both really nice. Julie is very beautiful and good at cooking. Wyatt is very talented. We had great days with them. 
The location of the house is well and it is so easy to go to city by bus. Shopping is also convenient. It is near to the newtown which is full of delicious food. The house is cute, quiet and tidy with a nice balcony.
We enjoyed our stay in this place and certainly recommend it. Thanks very much for welcoming hosts and friends.
房子虽然不在市中心,但出门走1､2分钟就有公交到central station,所以出行还是很方便｡如果自驾来,街边都可免费停车｡附近也有一个超市可以买到日常要用的东西｡有独立的房间,共用客厅､厨房和卫生间等公共空间,因为房东很好相处,所以也很自由方便｡另外小宋和Julie 还提供了许多关于旅行､出租等等信息的帮助｡总之,值得推荐｡
Very comfortable & central location.

As the advertisement noted, this is a budget accommodation wherein which the room is small, but it was enough for my partner and I to be happy. Wyatt and his partner are both lovely people and great to chat with! Overall everything was tidy and the experience was smooth. I would definitely recommend staying here as it is minutes from the city, too!
Un appartement bien situé qui permet d'être dans le centre très facilement. Julie et Wyatt sont des hôtes très sympathiques. La chambre était conforme à nos attentes.
Wyatt and Julie are very friendly and gave us some advice of our trip. The location is very convenient, easy to go everywhere. The room is clean and comfortable. Nice stay in their house.

Our stay at Wyatt and Julie 's home was fantastic. The house is clean and cosy, it feel's like home! It is close to the city (15min by bus) but you can spend a real quite and relaxing night.
We Had the chance to spend some time with Julie and she is such à nice person! "Don't be afraid to ask" that' s what she taught us. And indeed, she does her best to Help, provides pieces of advise .. she now is more than a host, but a friend ! We did not see Wyatt much, but he was very welcoming and cheerful! 
If you are planning a trip to Sydney you should definitely stop at their lovely house !

First of all, i wanted to talk about Annandale Village. My wife and i loved the place. It's a very quiet village with friendly people and lots of options for food and coffee. It is not too far from CBD and if you want a quiet/peaceful environment, Annandale is the perfect location.

Wyatt's place- we loved staying at Wyatt's home. We didn't get to meet Wyatt and Julie as they were travelling during our stay. Erika hosted us instead. She was very helpful and accomodating. The house is literally less than a minute to the bus stop (470 to the City and 370 to Cogee Beach).  The location is just 15 to 20 minutes to the City. Very convenient. We enjoyed our stay at Wyatt's place. There's a rustic, homey feel to it. The room, although small is just about right for my wife and myself. We even spent 1 day just being lazy in the room and drinking coffee in the balcony.  I will not hesitate booking the same room on our next visit to Sydney. I recommend Wyatt's place and please read his instructions first so you would know what to expect. All in all, we had a great stay in Sydney and our trip was made even more memorable by staying in Annandal and Wyatt's place. We miss it already. Hope to be back soon!

Super location in annandale, not to far from centrum with a bus leaving evry 10 min from the doorstep to centrum (often late though). Wyatt was super nice even though he was in France, and had a great system to give us the key. The house is very neat and cool design with good facilities and beds.
Thanks a lot.
Strongly recommend! Julie is very nice and friendly. The house is very pretty. Check in and out is easy. Some high quality local cafe nearby. Would definitely visit again next time in Sydney!
房东是一个很热心,nice的人｡给了许多旅游建议｡公交也很方便,从central station 坐470,15分钟左右到,家门口就是站台｡好评指数五颗星希望有机会再次入住^_^
We stayed at Wyatt’s old villa over the weekend. It's located in a great place close to City. It was a great value for money.

Nice room in a convenient location just outside the city. About 15 minutes bus ride to the heart of the city, very convenient. Also, just a couple minutes walk will lead you into a few Annandale shops, consisting of cafes, bakeries and a convenience store. 

The room was clean and also cozy. No big complaints. Only one would be that the house is old, with creeking floors everytime someone walks by, so if you are a light sleeper/ gets annoyed by noises, this could be a concern.

Wyatt and Julie were also friendly, sharing with us about Sydney's hangout spots and some local insights on them. They were also very hospitable during our stay, constantly checking if we were all good during our time there.

Overall happy with the place!

name: Flat with a Stunning Bosphorus View
summary: Flat with an amazing view in the heart of Besiktas. Close to all major forms of transport and tourist attractions. Our home is a nicely decorated and comfortable place with easy connections to wherever you might want to discover in this perfect city.
description: Flat with an amazing view in the heart of Besiktas. Close to all major forms of transport and tourist attractions. Our home is a nicely decorated and comfortable place with easy connections to wherever you might want to discover in this perfect city.

host.host_about: I am a Canadian teacher living in Turkey. I have been living in Turkey for several years now and have a flat with a fantastic view. My home is perfectly located in the heart of Istanbul - close to many of the tourist attracttions that Istanbul has to offer in an eclectic neighbourhood. I am easy-going and friendly. I am ready to guide you through my adopted city.

name: Private Room.. Heart of Kadıköy
summary: home is located center of kadikoy. very close to the Bahariye street, bar street and trasportation. 10 minutes to ships(beşiktaş, eminonu, karakoy and prience islands), metro and marmaray. 15 minutes to metrobüs. 2 minutes for market and bars..
space: home is located center of kadikoy. very close to the Bahariye street, bar street and trasportation. 10 minutes to ships(beşiktaş, eminonu, karakoy and prience islands), metro and marmaray. 15 minutes to metrobüs. 2 minutes for market and bars..
description: home is located center of kadikoy. very close to the Bahariye street, bar street and trasportation. 10 minutes to ships(beşiktaş, eminonu, karakoy and prience islands), metro and marmaray. 15 minutes to metrobüs. 2 minutes for market and bars.. home is located center of kadikoy. very close to the Bahariye street, bar street and trasportation. 10 minutes to ships(beşiktaş, eminonu, karakoy and prience islands), metro and marmaray. 15 minutes to metrobüs. 2 minutes for market and bars.. Feel like your home
access: Feel like your home

host.host_about: hello, i quit my job and trvelled sout of asia for a year..now i back to istanbul. im studying for acting, i like to meet people around the world..i like to share my room and memories and i can be your good guide for local experience about istanbul..

name: Charming spot in Montreal
summary: The apartment is located in a nice and friendly neighborhood where you will find everything you need. We are at 15 min from down town and 10 min from Olympic Stadium, Botanical Garden and Planetarium.
space: Nice little warm and comfortable apartment in a relaxed environment and a quiet neighborhood, and very close to all amenities. The apartment is very well equipped. Bedding through towels, washing machines and dryers to the kitchen where you will find everything you need to cook as you want, you will fell like home. And if you missed anything, we're just downstairs and we will be happy to help you out. We also offer travelers who arrive late in the evening to do some shopping for breakfast. Just tell us what you would like and we will get it for you.
description: The apartment is located in a nice and friendly neighborhood where you will find everything you need. We are at 15 min from down town and 10 min from Olympic Stadium, Botanical Garden and Planetarium. Nice little warm and comfortable apartment in a relaxed environment and a quiet neighborhood, and very close to all amenities. The apartment is very well equipped. Bedding through towels, washing machines and dryers to the kitchen where you will find everything you need to cook as you want, you will fell like home. And if you missed anything, we're just downstairs and we will be happy to help you out. We also offer travelers who arrive late in the evening to do some shopping for breakfast. Just tell us what you would like and we will get it for you. All the apartment is yours. We love to receive and welcome our visitors Whether you want to exchange or not, we'll be there for you when you need it. The apartment is located in a nice and friendly neighborhood where you will find everything y
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a nice and friendly neighborhood where you will find everything you need. We are 5 minutes from the Maisonneuve Market, which offers a wide variety of products (meat, bread, fish, and natural products, cheese and dairy products, fresh fruits and vegetables) 7 minutes from Olympic Stadium, Biodome, Planetarium, Starcité theater and Viau station which will take you downtown in 15 minutes. We are also 15 minutes from the Botanical Garden, Insectarium and Promenades Ontario where you will find great restaurants. The location of the apartment offers you the opportunity to experience both the excitement of the city, as we are 15 minutes from downtown, the ability to escape into nature (Boucherville Islands are 10 minutes by car) and enjoy the quiet of neighborhood life. We await you in our beautiful apartment, where you will feel like home!
transit: From the airport, between taxi and public transport, it depends on your budget. The taxi is much faster, but also more expensive. It's around $ 50 from the airport to the apartment (which is located at 2102 rue Sicard). There is a shuttle (747) from the airport to the central bus station. From there you can either take a taxi (about $ 20), or take the metro to the Viau station, which is 7 min walk from the apartment. You can go by yourself to STM site and get complete information. The shuttle costs $ 10, but I know that if you intend to take public transportation during your stay, you can buy (at the airport, in international departures) a bus / subway card (Opus card), which allow guests to take metro, bus and the shuttle and then save shuffle cost. There are several packages (1day, 3 days, week-end unlimited, a week ...) at different prices. To go down town from the apartment you can either take the bus 125 witch is just at the corner or Viau station. We are 15 min down town by metro
access: All the apartment is yours.
interaction: We love to receive and welcome our visitors Whether you want to exchange or not, we'll be there for you when you need it.
house_rules: We are simply asking people to be respectful of the site and pay attention to the noise, especially between 10pm and 8am, as we are in a quiet area and want to respect the neighbors. No party is allowed of course.

host.host_about:
Je travaille dans le milieu des arts, j'aime voyager, je suis mariée et j'ai deux enfants. Je suis moi-même propriétaire d'un appartement que je loue. Ce que j'aime dans ce genre d'échange, c'est que je rencontre beaucoup de gens de partout dans le monde et lorsque je voyage moi-même, c'est une façon d'apprécier encore plus les lieux que je visite. 

I work in the arts, I love traveling, I am married and have two children. I myself own an apartment that I rent. What I like about this kind of exchange is that I meet many people from all over the world and myself when I travel is a way to appreciate even more the places I visit.

reviews.comments: Nous avons passé une semaine fantastique dans l'appartement de Valérie et Jean. On se sent immédiatement comme à la maison dans cet appartement super cosy, parfaitement propre et ou il y a tout ce qu'il faut et plus encore pour un séjour court comme pour un séjour plus long. Nous y retournerons sans hésiter une minute. Le quartier Hochelaga est vraiment sympa et vivant et est parfait pour explorer la ville. Enfin les Valérie et Jean sont très chaleureux et ont vraiment a coeur que le séjour soit parfait.

My daughter and I had an excellent 3-night stay at Valerie’s apartment!  It was exactly what we were looking for, as we had tickets to an event at the arena within Olympic Park and wanted accommodation within walking distance.  One of the reasons we enjoy using Airbnb is to get to know local neighbourhoods of big cities, such as Montreal’s Maisonneuve. The apartment actually exceeded our expectations - it is as pictured and described; very well stocked with what we needed for a comfortable stay; we parked our car right in front and either walked or used public transport to get wherever we needed to go (Olympic Park – Biodome and Planetarium a short walk – and we took the Metro into the Montreal Old Town); appreciated the maps, tourist info and book with Valerie's personal recommendations of nearby restaurants, services, etc. including the nearby Maisonneuve Market.  After our busy days, it was great to come “home” to our classic “Montreal walk-up” apartment!  Merci Jean and Valerie!

This was my first airbnb experience and what an amazing one. Valerie and Jean were great hosts. The apartment itself was cozy, comfortable, very clean and had everything we needed. Cute balcony  which made me feel so relaxed and like I was away somewhere tropical. The apartment location is also great. Great restaraunts close by, convenience stores, a market, the metro, and other cool places to check out in Montreal like  Parc Île Jean Drapeau was a 15 min drive. Would give this 5 out 5 rating and highly recommend to others!

My girlfriend and I enjoyed our stay with Valerie and Jean. They were very accommodating to our early arrival time. The place was clean and comfortable to come back to after spending the days exploring the City. Montreal was great to visit. Also, one day we were able to rent a car and drive up to Quebec City. It was a couple hours drive, but it was well worth it. We also enjoyed checking out the nearby planetarium, botanical gardens, market, and Hoche Cafe.
We had a nice visit - the apartment was very comfortable and relaxing, the setup was perfect for our 3 day visit and the nearby playground was an added bonus for our daughter!

Valerie's apartment was wonderful. Very clean and there were clear directions about the internet, etc. She also included information about the neighborhood. I was only their briefly and didn't get the chance  to meet her, but she was very flexible and able to accommodate my arrival and departure times.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Valérie et Jean. L'appartement est très bien situé (juste à côté du Biodôme et du métro), calme et propre. C'était parfait pour notre fin de séjour au Québec. Valérie est facilement joignable et a su répondre à toutes nos questions. Nous recommandons sans problème cet appartement ! Encore merci Valérie et Jean.

I booked for my parents. 
They were first time AirBnB users. 
They both agreed, "We will do it again". 
Thanks for the great experience.

Merveilleux séjour dans un appart très confortable, propre et fonctionnel. Nos hôtes ont été à l'affût du moindre de nos besoins. Le calme du quartier et la proximité de tout en fait la combinaison parfaite. Hochelaga-Maisonneuve est devenue un arrondissement très à la mode et pleins de petites merveilles de restos, bars et magasins. Super expérience !

Nous avons été sensible au livret d'accueil et à ses recommandations ainsi qu'aux cartes de visites des bonnes adresses à découvrir dans le quartier. La rue est agréable, arborée et proche d'une artère commerciale. Le descriptif et les photos correspondaient en tout point à la réalité des lieux. Nous aurons plaisir à revenir chez Valérie et Jean pour un prochain séjour à Montréal.

Première expérience airbnb pour mes parents venus de France et ils ont adoré l'accueil de Valérie et son conjoint, des hôtes très chaleureux et discrets. Appartement propre et tout équipé (laveuse, sécheuse. etc.), très bien placé avec commerces et transport à proximité. Rue très calme, à recommander chaudement!

It was such a pleasure to stay with Jean and Valérie! The apartment is filled with just about everything you need, and is easily located right near the metro, making getting around such a breeze. My mother and I stayed here on a bit of a last minute notice and Jean and Valérie were very accommodating and attentive...highly recommend and would stay again!

Jean and Valerie were excellent hosts! The apartment was wonderful and had everything you might need, including a washer and dryer. They even included a book full of restaurant suggestions. They were very thoughtful hosts. It felt like a home away from home!

A return visit to Valerie and Jean’s – that should say it all! 
We were once again very pleased with the hospitality and the apartment itself – clean, comfortable, quiet and well-equipped with many thoughtful touches provided for guests.  Within walking distance of Olympic Park attractions and the Maisonneuve Marché and neighbourhood.  Convenient to drive to Montreal attractions or use public transit.  Highly recommend!

Both Naveen and I were very impressed with the apartment.  Everything was neat and clean.  The kitchen is well equipped.  The pictures are very accurate.  We would've enjoyed staying longer.    The location is perfect.  It is very close to the Botanical Garden (easy walking distance).  The Metro is located at the Garden as well, so getting downtown was very easy.  We parked our car, and used public transportation the whole weekend.  Ontario Street is a great place to check out (again, easy walking distance).  Valerie was wonderful.  We really appreciate all the extra touches she adds (books to read, maps of the city, guest book with details about nearby stores/restaurants).
Logement très agréable, confortable et reposant. Nous recherchions un petit coin de paix pour quelques jours et c'était un lieu idéal!

We were greeted and made to feel welcome as soon as we arrived. We were given a tour of the apartment so that we felt comfortable and knew where to find everything.  Also there were notes with useful information as well. The apartment had everything we could possibly need and we felt right at home.

My wife and I had a great experience at this apartment. Close to the subway and a variety of restaurants and shops. Jean and Valerie are excellent hosts.  They made us feel welcome and we had no problems checking in and out.

My sister and I had a wonderful stay on Rue Sicard. Jean and Valerie were tremendously accommodating and very kind. The space was clean and the essentials were perfectly supplied. I thought the location was great as well and easy to get to and from other parts of Montreal.

I have stayed in several Airbnb apartments and this one was definitely a favorite!  The apartment is so cute and inviting and very clean.  It's obvious that Jean and Valerie care and want you to have a pleasant experience.  The market just a couple of blocks away is amazing. We really enjoyed buying some things for dinner and eating outside on the balcony. The subway is a short walk away, which makes traveling into the city very easy.  The neighborhood itself is quiet and friendly, and it's perfect if you are traveling by car since you can park right outside.

Studio agréable, propre, très bien équipé  et au calme.
Proche du parc olympique, à quelques minutes du métro pour se rendre dans le centre de Montréal
Accueilli par le propriétaire très sympathique
On se sentait "comme à la maison" Merci

Moi et mon mari à passé un week-end parfait ici pour notre deuxième anniveraire de mariage. Ce appartement était calme, nettoye et romantique. Valérie et Jean sont hostes très aimables, et encore mieux, ils nous donnent plus du temps pour quitter l'appartement à cause de notre train qui part a plus tard. J'adore Montréal, je sais je vais rétourner, et la prochaine fois, pour plus du temps! Merci à tous, Jean et Valérie, pour un vrai expérience Montréal.

A beautiful place to stay, just outside of old Montreal. The subway was a 5-10 minute walk away and was easy to find. It was another 5-10 minute ride into town, but it was great to get off at different stations and have a look round. Car parking was easy and we felt comfortable leaving the car out front.  The unit itself was clean and comfortable; the bed was so cosy. The only minor criticism, there was no aircon, but there are multiple fans which helps cool the unit down. Overall a great place to stay and I would recommend the unit to anyone wanting to visit Montreal. Thanks Valérie for being a great host.

Tres bonne experience. L'appartement est tout mignon et tres agreable. Nos hotes étaient egalement charmants. Tout était operationnel, bien organisé. Dommage que les vacances soient deja termines. Christelle & Arthur

Such a charming and delightful place! Very comfortable stay here. A little bit out of the city but very easy to get downtown on the metro. The guidebook was a lovely touch and very helpful. Would gladly stay again!
Jean was there to welcome us and Valerie introduced herself later. Directions were very clear.

Le logement de Valérie est parfait pour découvrir Montréal: très confortable, bien équipé il correspond exactement à l'annonce. Le quartier est calme, il y a de la place facilement pour garer la voiture et la station de métro est toute proche pour visiter la ville. Valérie et son mari sont sympathiques et vous conseilleront efficacement. Je recommande vivement Valérie et son appartement et j'espère avoir l'opportunité d'y retourner. Merci encore pour tout et peut-être à bientôt.
RAS
Great place to stay, we loved having a little space of our own to enjoy after wandering beautiful montreal! Easy to get around with transit and really well-kept apartment. Thanks for a lovely spot!
Valerie was very nice and had a beautiful apartment. The bed was extremely comfortable and our hosts provided lots of information about local sights and places to eat. 5 star hosts for sure
I had a great stay at Valérie and Jean's apartment. It was a perfect getaway - private, quiet, clean, and beautiful space. I'll would definitely stay here in the future!

My husband and I had a perfect stay in Valérie's apartment. The location is very convenient to get to the downtown area, and also features local amenities and charming restaurants. The apartment itself is wonderfully spacious yet cozy and comfortable. We would love to stay again and definitely recommend to anyone visiting Montreal!
L'appartement est bien situé, près du parc Olympique et d'une station de métro, très propre et bien équipé. Il correspond à la description et je le recommande.
Logement très accueillant et tranquille.

We spent a really nice week in Valerie's lovely apartment. Everything we needed to make our stay pleasant was provided and Valerie even suggested things to do/see in the city. Checking in/out was very uncomplicated.
Thank you! Merci beaucoup!

My wife and I stayed for a week at Jean and Valérie's apartment. It was basic, but comfortable, homely and well equipped.

There's plenty of public transport close by so it's easy to get around the city.

If you're looking for a great value apartment as a base for exploring Montréal, this is an excellent choice!
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Quartier très calme. L'appartement est très bien conçu. Il ne manque rien. L'accueil est chaleureux. A recommander.

I cannot recommend Valerie and Jean strongly enough; they were the prefect hosts.  When my friend and I had travel issues/delays, Valerie was always very quick to reply to my updated messages regarding our changing schedule.  The apartment is perfect: very clean, cozy, small private balcony, comfy bed... really an ideal base from which to explore Montreal.  Although it's north of the city center there are lots of things to do/explore within walking distance of the apartment including the old Olympic Park and Botanical Gardens, plus, the Metro is about a 10 min walk so it's very easy to get anywhere else in the city.  This is an ideal, quiet retreat from the hustle and bustle of downtown that still allows visitors to take advantage of all Montreal has to offer.

Valérie et Jean sont des hôtes absolument charmants, généreux et très arrangeants. Ils nous ont apporté d'excellents conseils pour l'organisation de notre séjour au Québec.  De plus, le logement est impeccable, propre, fonctionnel et surtout très bien situé. Parfait pour visiter la ville de Montréal et ses alentours tout en restant dans un endroit calme et apaisant. Merci encore!

Valérie et Jean sont des hôtes formidables, et ce fut un réel plaisir que de les rencontrer. De plus, leur logement est parfait, tout à fait conforme à l'annonce, très bien équipé et à quelques minutes a pied du parc Olympique. Le balcon est un réel plus. Nous le recommandons vivement !

We had a wonderful time at Valerie's place! The apartment is very comfortable, clean, and in a great location. We could walk to tons of restaurants and the metro was close by so we could be in the center of the city very quickly. Jean and Valerie were so nice and made a point to say hello and offer us tips and recommendations for the area. We tried out their recommended breakfast spot and it was great. We'd definitely recommend this place for your trip to Montreal.
Fantastic host, very friendly and prompt to reply to messages. Lovely apartment with everything you need and more. Perfect location for our trip as we were at the Olympic Park most days. Thank you.

Très bon appartement à quelques stations de métro du centre ville,  commerces à proximités, et stationnement possible, magnifique jardin botanique à proximité ainsi que le Biodôme. Nous avons été très bien accueillit par nos hôtes.

Valérie's place was absolutely wonderful for my wife and I's weekend getaway to Montreal. My only regret was spending so much time in the city and not in her apartment! The apartment was just as described, wonderfully clean, spacious, and very comfortable. Plenty of power outlets to charge my many camera batteries as well. While we didn't use it I loved that the kitchen was well supplied with all pots and pans you might need to cook yourself a nice dinner to eat on their lovely back porch. It's located within walking distance of many outstanding restaurants, Olympic Park, and the Metro for easy access to downtown Montreal. Easy parking on the street right outside as well! I'm already looking at my calendar to figure out when we can come back!
Valérie's place is great! The apartment is cozy and well appointed. It is also super clean and in a great location. I'd stay here again.

Valerie’s place was fantastic, we felt like home throughout our stay. Valerie welcomed us when we checked-in and was available throughout. The place has everything we needed and more, we will definitely be back again.

C'est la deuxième fois que je séjourne chez Valérie et je recommande ce logement. Il est bien situé, près d'une station de métro, du marché Maisonneuve et de la piscine olympique. L’accueil est chaleureux, l'appartement est propre et la cuisine est bien équipé.

Bons moments passés à Hochelaga chez Jean et Valérie. Quartier pas (encore) trop touristique et authentique. Les rues Ontario et St Catherine ont du charme avec  ces commerces divers et variés; la boulangerie, le saucissier et le biérologue, les divers bars/cafés et le beau marché couvert de Maisonneuve. Nous avons eu le plaisir d'avoir un week end où la neige est tombée à gros flocons rendant la rue avec tous ces escaliers et ses arbres, magnifique.
 Valérie et Jean ont un sens de l'accueil qui fait plaisir à ressentir avec ce mode de location, et on se dit, bien volontiers en partant que l'on aura plaisir à venir les revoir!!
Nous avons été bien accueillis. Un marché sympa est situé non loin du logement ainsi qu'un bon restaurant recommandé par nos hôtes.

Parfait, le logement est cosy, on se sent comme chez soi, l'endroit est calme, un peu à l'extérieur, mais bien désservi servi par le bus à 150 mètres et/ou le métro à 10 minutes. Valérie et Jean sont très sympathiques, nous vous les recommandons. Yves et Fabienne
Clean, calm and well situated apartment. Great hosts and a great value.
Amazing place and great communication with the host!!
Superbe séjour à Montréal dans votre appartement ! Le logement est parfaitement propre et bien équipé, on s'y sent comme à la maison. Merci pour l'accueil :)
Appartement très mignon, emplacement super proche métro viau et marché Maisonneuve. Hôtes très sympathiques et réactifs. Tout est parfait rien à dire !

Je recommande sans hesitation cet appartement. Il est très bien situé (métro, commerces, restaurants) dans un quartier agréable. L'appartement est très bien équipée et très propre. Les propriétaires ont été très réactifs et la communication très bonne et efficace.

L'appartement est très propre et exactement comme sur les photos.  Très bien organisé avec un petit manuel d'instruction et des recommandations de restaurants et boutiques du quartier.  N'hésitez pas à louer cet appartement, il est vraiment bien.

Valérie’s apartment is beautiful, cozy, and quiet. It's located in a very nice part of Montreal, close to Marche Maisonneuve and many restaurants, the metro is about a 7 minutes walk away. The kitchen is very well equipped and there is a washer and dryer. Thank you, Valérie and Jean for being perfect hosts!

name: Quarto Copacabana perto da praia!
summary: O quarto grande e confortável. Possui armário, TV e uma pequena varanda. Silencioso. O apartamento está localizado próximo ao Hotel Copacabana Palace como referência. Andando até a praia é um minuto e até a estação de Metrô Arco Verde são 3 minutos. Comércio próximo, com restaurantes, farmácias, mercados.  Livre acesso às demais dependências do apto. Sinta-se em casa!
space: O apartamento é confortável, grande e arejado. Quarto amplo. O ambiente é tranquilo e familiar. Localizado na Av. Nsa. Senhora de Copacabana, Posto 2, próximo à mercados, bancos, metrô, praia e áreas de lazer. O prédio é residencial.
description: O quarto grande e confortável. Possui armário, TV e uma pequena varanda. Silencioso. O apartamento está localizado próximo ao Hotel Copacabana Palace como referência. Andando até a praia é um minuto e até a estação de Metrô Arco Verde são 3 minutos. Comércio próximo, com restaurantes, farmácias, mercados.  Livre acesso às demais dependências do apto. Sinta-se em casa! O apartamento é confortável, grande e arejado. Quarto amplo. O ambiente é tranquilo e familiar. Localizado na Av. Nsa. Senhora de Copacabana, Posto 2, próximo à mercados, bancos, metrô, praia e áreas de lazer. O prédio é residencial. É possível cozinhar, temos um filtro de água.  Acesso a todas as dependências do apartamento. Qualquer dúvida, estamos à disposição.
access: É possível cozinhar, temos um filtro de água.  Acesso a todas as dependências do apartamento.
interaction: Qualquer dúvida, estamos à disposição.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Adorei minha estada no Rio. As depedencias confortáveis e a anfitriã muito atenciosa.Recomendo.

German and English

German: ich verbrachte einen Monat in einem sehr schönen Apartment bei der Mutter von Renata. Es leben weitere Personen in dieser Wohnung, Ihr Sohn und 3 Frauen. Alle waren super Nett. Die Wohnung war immer sauber und ich konnte zu jeder Tages oder Nachtzeit die Küche und das Badezimmer benutzen. Die Wohnung liegt direkt an der Copacabana. Ich kann dieses Apartment zu 100% empfehlen.  

English:

I spent a month in a very nice apartment from the mother of Renata. There live more people in this apartment, The son and 3 wimen. Everyone was super nice. The apartment was always clean and I could use the kitchen and the bathroom at any time, day or night. The apartment is right on the Copacabana. I would recommend this apartment to 100%.

I had an amazing stay. Everything was clean and the people very nice. Recommend this place and would stay there again. 
The neighbourhood was good, close to the beach with lots of shops and bars. 
To me all seemed to be safe.

A estadia foi ótima, eu precisava de um local para ficar com urgência que fosse de fácil acesso, tranquilo e confortável. Em algumas horas a Renata prontamente me auxiliou com tudo isso. Amei o clima do local, além da recepção da mãe da Renata e da própria que me deixaram super à vontade. Super recomendo, local aconchegante, tranquilo, limpo e com preço justo.

It was a perfect stay ! I totally recommend it. The people are very nice and the bedroom (and apartment) was perfect. They have a big heart and are always present for you if you need them. I will never forget my stay, it was plenty of nice moments !

A Renata e sua família foram ótimos e super acolhedores. Me senti em casa desde o início da minha estada. O quarto estava muito limpo e arrumado, é super arejado e tive o privilégio de ter vista para o mar. A localização é excelente, perto da praia, restaurantes, mercados, transporte público, tudo...
Recomendo a estadia sem pensar duas vezes.

A Renata foi ótima, super solicita. Me orientou nos passeios e na melhor forma de me locomover pela cidade, já que foi minha primeira visita ao Rio. O quarto era confortável e a localização do apartamento excelente. Só tenho a agradecer!

La verdad una casa muy linda, con gente mas linda aun, lo pasé fantastico en mis 16 días en Río! Aparte es una casa muy comoda para moverse ya que tiene la parada del metro a 5 minutos, también esta situada a 100 mts de la playa de Copacabana una maravilla Rio y su gente! Gracias Roberta y Girsi por todo! Absolutamente recomendo!

The truth is a very nice house, with people even more beautiful, I had a fantastic time in my 16 days in Rio! Apart is a very comfortable house to move since it has the subway stop to 5 minutes, is also located 100 meters from Copacabana beach. How wonderful is Rio and its people! Thanks Roberta and Girsi for everything! Absolutely recommend!

Eu fui muito bem recebido tanto pela Renata quanto sua mãe e a família; pessoas muito simpáticas e gentis.
 O apartamento é amplo, banheiro espaçoso, o quarto bem aconchegante com Tv e ventilador; o apartamento fica muito bem localizado perto de bares, restaurantes, perto também da estação de metrô e pontos de ônibus sem falar na maravilhosa Praia de Copacabana.
Minha experiência foi muito agradável, gostei muito de tudo, quando voltar ao Rio quero ficar novamente neste lugar e a todos que estão procurando um lugar para ficar eu recomendo ficar no espaço da Renata, pois é um espaço muito bom, tranquilo e com check-in e checkout flexível.

Um abraço a todos!

Apartamento super bem localizado, casa limpíssima, super organizada, quarto com muita privacidade, mas o melhor de tudo foi a anfitriã. Deu muitas dicas, foi super simpática e atenciosa. Impossível eu ter ficado em um lugar melhor!
Renata tremenda anfitriona, todo excelente y atenta siempre a cualquier inquietud que tengas. La ubicacion del depa también y todo muy limpio y ordenado siempre...ideal si viajas solo

O apartamento é extremamente bem localizado. Perto da estação de metrô Arcoverde e próximo à praia, restaurantes, bares e bancos. O quarto é muito aconchegante, com TV, ventilador, varanda, cama e um guarda-roupa que acomoda quem costuma levar bastante bagagem. A Renata é uma ótima anfitriã, muito atenciosa, cuidadosa e gentil. Responde às mensagens com muita agilidade, nunca nos deixando na mão. É, também, bastante flexível, o que nos faz sentir em casa. Aconselho o seu apartamento para todos que queiram ter uma experiência inesquecível no coração de copacabana, pertinho de tudo e com uma decoração que é uma verdadeira cena de novela! Fiquei encantada com o apartamento e com todo o carinho e conforto com que fui recebida. Obrigada Rê, por todos os dias!!! Você fez das minhas férias a melhor de todas!!! Beijo Grannnnde...

name: Ocean Views & Private Access to Beach
summary: Amazingly light and airy apartment with ocean views.  Large open plan lounge and dining space with full height windows creating a beautifully open, light and relaxing space.  Opening onto a wrap around balcony perfect for a morning coffee or afternoon BBQ. Hear the sound of the ocean from both bedrooms at night for the perfect sleep.
space: The apartment has 2 great sized double bedrooms.  Bedroom 1 - Queen sized bed with large window.  Bedroom 2 - Queen sized bed with large window with ocean views. Bathroom - Beautiful bathroom with large vanity area, sink, walk in shower and a seperate bath.  Kitchen - light and bright space which includes fridge/freezer, dishwasher, Nespresso machine and all sorts of pots, pans and blenders so you can get into the Freshie lifestyle with a smoothie every morning or cook up a storm if you don’t fancy a BBQ!  Lounge & Dining - Large open plan lounge and dining area, complete with comfortable sofa, huge beanbag for a lazy arvo nap, TV with Netflix, Apple TV and PlayStation 4,and a dining table to eat all those perfectly cooked meals.  Balcony - the large wrap around balcony is a perfect space for a morning coffee or firing up the BBQ for a few afternoon burgers and beers watching the ocean. Bring out the bean bag to relax, or sit at the solid timber table and bench seat to wind away the af
description: Amazingly light and airy apartment with ocean views.  Large open plan lounge and dining space with full height windows creating a beautifully open, light and relaxing space.  Opening onto a wrap around balcony perfect for a morning coffee or afternoon BBQ. Hear the sound of the ocean from both bedrooms at night for the perfect sleep. The apartment has 2 great sized double bedrooms.  Bedroom 1 - Queen sized bed with large window.  Bedroom 2 - Queen sized bed with large window with ocean views. Bathroom - Beautiful bathroom with large vanity area, sink, walk in shower and a seperate bath.  Kitchen - light and bright space which includes fridge/freezer, dishwasher, Nespresso machine and all sorts of pots, pans and blenders so you can get into the Freshie lifestyle with a smoothie every morning or cook up a storm if you don’t fancy a BBQ!  Lounge & Dining - Large open plan lounge and dining area, complete with comfortable sofa, huge beanbag for a lazy arvo nap, TV with Netflix, Apple TV an
neighborhood_overview: Freshwater is one of the Sydneys best beach suburbs most versatile places. Perfect for adults, couples, families and kids, it has everything you need for a relaxed stay in Sydney.   The beach is beautiful, and perfect for swimming or learning to surf (depending the waves).  The sun rises over the ocean, and there’s nothing better than diving into the ocean or using the awesome salt water pool if you want to get some lengths in at sunrise or enjoy the ocean without the waves. There’s also plenty of space to relax on the rocks if the sand is not your thing.  Within 100m of the beach are 3 cafes, including the epic Pilu Cafe for a coffee with ocean views, and the trendy Cafe Calm for an afternoon burger and beer after all the hard work at the beach!  To kick start your day after a morning swim, venture into Freshie Village (only about 500m from the beach) for even more epic cafes. Fuel up with great food, a coffee and a smoothie before you tackle the surf! There’s also the best bakery in
notes: Feel free to use the little things that make our cool apartment feel more like home; - State of the art wireless speaker - TV with Netflix and Apple TV - Playstation 4  - WiFi - Volleyball set  - Beach chairs
transit: The northern beaches are on your door step. Walk north along the coast path to Curl Curl of Dee Why, walk south to take in Queenscliff, North Steyne, Manly and Shelly beaches The 139 bus stops right outside the apartment. This will take you to Manly (if you don’t fancy the beach side walk),or Warringah Mall if you need some retail therapy or a trip to the movies.  There are many ways to get in to the Sydney CBD. The ferry wharf is a 35 minute walk along the beaches, or a 15 minute bus ride from right outside (139).  Or you can grab a B-Line bus from Warringah straight into the city. During the working week, an express E65 bus will take you to the CBD during morning and evenings.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment. There is a lift up to the apartment.
house_rules: Our apartment is a lived in home, and we want guests to feel at home during their stay.  Feel free to put your feet up, relax with a beer and enjoy the stunning views and lifestyle. All we ask is that you treat it with the same respect you would your own home. No Pets. No smoking.

name: Lovely sun light  in a stylish loft, Downtown Spot
summary: Centrally located in one of Porto downtown historical streets Rua da Formosa, one minute to Bolhão and Rua de Santa Catarina this stylish and sunny loft provides a great accommodation  while visiting Porto. Quality equipment, open space, and lots of sun! A fresh and clean stylish loft. Excellent WIFI and Smart TV A peaceful night sleep is guaranteed at the center of everything. Welcome.
space: Loft at the first floor in a refurbished historical building. This open space apartment with a perfect division of spaces allows privacy for all the guests. The kitchen connects with the living room with a modern balcony, island bar format, the place to enjoy your meals, work or just check your plans for the next day. Equipped for five people with the all the appliances and quality cooking prepare utensils. The confi living room has a big sofa that transforms into two real large single or couple beds.  The room as also two real beds that can be organize to make a couple bed. There’s a small balcony to enjoy the nice weather and relax outside. The bathroom has a nice division of the area to allow a confortable trip. Very nicely refurbished with new and quality materials, decorated with some photos and objects from the story of Porto or Portugal.  We provide fresh and clean towels and sheets, the basics; olive oil , salt, sugar, coffee or tea. Shampoo and soap are also there.  Modern big

Quality equipment, open space, and lots of sun! A fresh and clean stylish loft. Excellent WIFI and Smart TV A peaceful night sleep is guaranteed at the center of everything. Welcome.
