The room as also two real beds that can be organize to make a couple bed. There’s a small balcony to e
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very cool so you can be in the center while enjoying a peaceful night sleep as it’s facing the nice backyard of the building. A sunny and bright place to enjoy the best of the city. Parking has a special price of its 12,50Eur per 24H. One of the charming areas of this groovy city.  The oldest city market Bolhão and metro station is 4 minutes walking distance. The main theaters are there too. Its the downtown area with lots of cool restaurants, shops, commercial area, nightlife is 5 minute walking distance,  everything in a short walking distance.
notes: Just relax and have fun. The place works really good. 27395/AL  Tourism register
transit: Metro Bolhão is 4 minute walking distance - all the transportations in a short walk
access: Access to the building and to the apartment.
interaction: Welcome to this great Loft, we are looking forward to welcome you with particular tips to make your trip & sleep even better. Always available.
house_rules: Please act accordingly, respect the apartment and all its equipment. Its a residential building be careful with noise. Please take the rubbish out.

host.host_about: Hi we are  Miguel and João and a good friend of us Miguel also. We live in Porto and we have  some great ideas and spots for having a good time wile traveling to Portugal. We are starting a company of quality rental accommodations and services. The houses and apartments belong to friends and family. We are managing the places and, one or the other will be always available to assist and welcome you. We consider ourselves open minded persons and professional, always open to assist. We enjoy meeting people from all over the world and give them great tips to have a great time with original hints of the city, love travel, Design, sports (play tennis regularly), food, music and life. It will be our pleasure to help you to have a great time in Portugal.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
O João foi um anfitrião impecável! Sempre disponível e recebeu-nos com toda a simpatia. Surgiu um pequeno imprevisto no apartamento e foi logo super prestável para o resolver, de modo a nos proporcionar uns dias maravilhosos de descanso.
O apartamento é perfeito e totalmente de acordo com as fotografias. Tem todo o conforto necessário para passear no Porto, com uma localização ideal, perto de todo o comércio e restauração da Rua de Santa Catarina.
Vamos de certeza voltar!

O João Caria foi incansável a receber-nós! Desde o início da marcação que esteve super disponível, disponibilidade e simpatia essas que se mantiveram na recepção e na estadia. Foi um anfitrião muito cuidadoso, que nos deixou super a vontade e ainda nos indicou sítios a ir e as proximidades. Deixou-nos com imensa vontade de voltar!
Really good  and professional host. Can warmly recommend.

Hola, la atención de João fue exquisita, estuvo muy atento a la llegada y en todo momento durante nuestra estancia.
El apartamento, en un lugar ideal para visitar Oporto a pie, sin necesidad de coger transporte público para casi nada. Esta prácticamente nuevo, con poco uso, y muy bien cuidado.
Solo un pero, yo fui en coche, y no paso ni una hora sin que me me rompieran uno de los cristales para robarme. Os recomiendo el guardarlo en parking, que además de más seguros son muy baratos para este tipo de estancias. Vimos varios cristales rotos por el mismo motivo en la zona.

We took a 10 minute stroll from São Bento train station to João’s flat. The town house was carefully restored and looked even better than it is presented in the pictures. The bed are really good and big. Great stylish and well appointed apartment in a fantastic location near the action but in a nice quiet zone. Loved it!
João was extremely nice. The communication during that time was very fast and friendly.
We had a fantastic time in Porto. We will definitely be back!

This is a perfect apartment to stay in for a visit to Porto. From the airport it is a short ride on the metro with the nearest stop being five minutes from the apartment. João was an excellent host, meeting us at the apartment and staying for a short while to point out a few places on a map that we should visit. 
The apartment is very modern and comfortable with a well equipped kitchen for making breakfast or simple meals. We stayed for a week and honestly felt as comfortable as at home. The beds are large and firm and there are additional blankets provided if you need them. There is a good sized supermarket located one street away next to the Coleseu auditorium. The apartment is very well located being within easy walking distance of a number of bars, restaurants and many of Porto's attractions. 
I would recommend staying here if you want a good base to explore the city and have the freedom to live like you are at home. Very, very nice.

Great apartment in a great location ! This brand refurbished apartment is located downtown with all the equipment needed. Joao has hosted is very well! (We were 2 hours late ...) and provided some good visits advices .

No geral a experiência foi bastante agradável. Fomos bem recebidos pelo irmão do anfitrião que nos mostrou a casa em detalhe. Mesmo não tendo estado presente, o anfitrião enviou sms quando foi necessário.
Único ponto menos positivo foi o estacionamento que não é muito fácil na zona, muito central, a não ser que seja pago.
Perfect description, very nice host, fantastic location
Simplemente perfecto
The Apartment is beautiful, clean and everything is new! The flat is in The middle of Porto and you can visit everything by Walk! We would prefer The Apartment to all of our Friends! Thanks João

Joao welcome us very nice and gives us some good tips for our visit. The loft looks like in the photos. Clean, great bathroom, big smart tv, everything you need is in the apartment. The location is next to shopping street Rua Santa Catarina.  A big supermarket is around the corner. To the Cais da Ribeira is a small walk.  We would come back.

Beautiful apartment exactly as shown in the photos. We particularly appreciated the comfy beds, great shower and cute balcony. And of course Joao himself, who was very welcoming and full of excellent recommendations about what to do and where to go. If you're looking for somewhere to stay in Porto then what are you waiting for?!

The apartment was great. Very clean and modern and fantastic location easy to walk to the all of Porto's famous sites and the river. The host João was really helpful too and really helped us out when our daughter was unwell. We'd love to revisit and would stay here again.

João's apartment was great, just like in the pictures. The beds are comfortable and the location is very convenient. João was very helpful and tried to accommodate all our needs. We'll definitely go back if we're in Porto again.
Perfeita! O local é maravilhoso , perto de tudo ! O apartamento é muito bem montado  de muito bom gosto , muito limpo , é super equipado.

A great long weekend in Porto!
The loft is exactly as presented in the description. It is well equipped for all your needs. We didn't have the chance to use the balcony for breakfast, since we always had it at a Cafe, but it is very nice to chill out there. João has welcomed us very warmly and he provided us many wise tips about restaurants and nice places to visit.
The location is just perfect. Quiet (despite what I had read on some reviews) and basically right in the city center. We suggest you to try Confeitaria do Bolhao, just a few meters away. Having breakfast there gets you in the perfect Portuguese atmosphere.  If you happen to be in Porto on a Saturday, it is worth visiting the Bolhao market, just in front of the Confeitaria.
Last but not least, you have to try the heavenly juice named after this city: Porto wine. On the south side of the river you'll find plenty of historical cellars that you can visit and get a wine tasting at the end of the tour. We recommend Ferreira, the only 100% Portuguese one that has been left totally original. On the other end, you can also enjoy a relaxing time having a Porto Bliss (my new favorite cocktail) on the Sandman terrace with a view on the river.
Joao est très accueillant, souriant, répondant bien à nos besoins, donnant des conseils sur les lieux à voir, les restos à fréquenter... C'est un hôte parfait !

L'accueil de Joao a été excellent, avec des petites explications précieuses sur la ville lors de notre arrivée tardive. L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description et aux photos. Il est super agréable à vivre, très lumineux, très fonctionnel, très propre et super bien situé. Merci beaucoup à Joao !

I really loved the Joao's loft. It is exactly like the pictures and it is fully equipped. The location is perfect: in the middle of Porto but a quite neighborhood.  Miguel (Joao's brother) was at the place when we arrived. He gave us really useful information about Porto. Would definitely recommend this place!

Joao's  loft in Porto was great, good location close to all Porto has to offer.  The loft was equipped with everything you need.  Miguel was very helpful during check in, he explained where everything was and the good places to go.  We would highly recommend this loft for anyone visiting Porto.

El apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos. Nos resultó muy cómodo. Todo muy limpio. La ubicación muy buena también y las camas muy cómodas. Dejamos aparcado nuestro coche en un parking de la misma manzana por 8€/24 horas. Joao fue muy amable en todo momento.  Sin duda lo recomiendo para tu estancia en oporto
Would really recommend this place. Clean place, nice hosts (gave Some good tips) and a very good location! I would book this again when visiting porto! :)

Très bel appartement spacieux, très propre et fonctionnel dans le centre de Porto ! Exactement comme sur le site. Idéalement  situé pour visiter la jolie ville de Porto.
Accueil chaleureux de Joao ! Il nous a donné de bonnes adresses ...
A recommander sans hésitation !    Merci Joao.

Très bon accueil de la part de Miguel, qui nous a conseillé les endroits sympas de Porto, les incontournables, ses restos préférés dont un qui est fabuleux! L'appartement est super, très confortable, et bien situé. A recommander sans hésitation

We had a wonderful stay in Porto thanks to this fantastic place. It absolutely looks like the photos.  The location was great too!  Joao's brother Miguel welcomed us and gave us lots of information.  The restaurant that was recommended, Traça, was out of this world and I whole-heardlty recommend it.  I would definitely stay again.  Thank you again for everything.
It couldnt have been better :)

The apartment is gorgeous, very bright and comfortable. Joao welcomed us the at our arrival and showed us everything in the apartment. Furthermore, he gave loads of information on where to go in Porto which was very helpful.
Now and again, he asked if everything is okay or if we needed further information, towels, ...
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto!!!
... and the bed ist huge: very important for people with 1,90m height :)
Nous avons passé un super séjour chez João ! L'appartement est exactement conforme aux photos, calme et idéalement situé dans Porto.

The appartement was perfect. It looks exactly like the pictures. Everything was there as described. It is located in the centre of Porto, you almost can 't get any closer. We met up with the brother of Joao and he was very friendly and even gave us tips for things to do in Porto. If I ever come back to Porto, I won't hesitate to choose this place again.
The appartment was really nice and it was close to everything. We had a really nice staying!

Sehr sehr schönes Apartment, sehr netter Gastgeber, Apartment liegt sehr Zentral, alle Sehenswürdigkeiten und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in nur wenigen Gehminuten erreichbar.
Gerne wieder !

We loved our stay!!!
The apartment is really cosy, clean and it has everything you need for a short or longer stay. The neighborhood was quiet and it's close to many restaurants, bars, supermarket, everything in walking distance. The communication with the host was amazing, João answered really fast and and gave us great restaurant recommendations.
Near to Bolhao metro/subway station. We stayed for 19 days and we'll certainly come back!
So fantastic place : we can say : AMAZING ! We totally recomend for everyone !

O apartamento é muito funcional. A localização é a melhor do Porto para quem quer usufruir do centro da cidade. Existe um estacionamento 24h para o carro logo ao virar da esquina, literalmente. Os anfitriões (João e Miguel) são 5 estrelas. Vamos voltar de certeza e recomendar a todos os nossos amigos e familiares.

A good location, close to Bolhão metro station. The loft is nicely styled by a very known Swedish brand. Our host was João brother Miguel. He was very helpful and gave us some excellent tips. Keep in mind that it can be noisy sometimes of fellow guests in the apartment building (above) Nonetheless is this a excellent starting point for discovering Porto.
Great architecture and perfect location. Super communicative. Pristine in terms of cleanliness. Bring a sweater though in winter as the house doesn't have central heat.

O apartamento tem uma localização excelente, estando muito próximo da Rua Santa Catarina e do Bolhão (onde também há uma estação do metrô). É perfeitamente possível andar a pé para todos os lados; apenas utilizei o metrô uma vez para ir até Vila Nova de Gaia (onde ficam as caves do vinho do porto). Numa rua próxima há dois supermercados e, não muito longe, há uma tasca chamada Casa Guedes, com um sanduíche de pernil maravilhoso. João ficou sempre disponível para dar dicas e tirar dúvidas. Apartamento altamente recomendado! Ah, por fim, foi ótima a estadia para nós três -- o sofá-cama é uma cama de verdade, super confortável. A cama de casal também era muito boa. O apartamento fica um andar acima e é de fundos, sendo perfeito para idosos, também.

Apartamento bem localizado. Super charmoso, decorado com capricho. Oferece todos os eletrodomésticos necessários para suprir as necessidades do da a dia com qualidade e arrumados de forma organizada, com capricho e cuidados.
Apartment full of light. Very clean. Excellent location at walking distance from cool places, and good recommendations to spend the day.

Lovely place to stay in porto and ti visit the city by walk.
Really precise host.

Thank you very much for your hospitality and your suggestions to the city!

Bellissimo appartamento in zona centrale completo in tutto e molto ben arredato con componenti  nuovissime, comodissimo alla metro Bolhao, a pochi passi da Rua Santa Caterina, zona pedonale con molti negozi. È la soluzione ideale sia come appartamento  per lavoro che per un soggiorno  con la famiglia, alľ arrivo ci ha accolti Miguel che dopo averci fatto vedere la casa ci ha dato parecchi consigli su come e dove muoverci per la città.
Un grosso ringraziamento  e saluto ai padroni di casa.

중심지에 위치해 있어서 걸어서 둘러볼수 있고 모든것이 다 깨끗하고 예쁜 숙소입니다
주차는 바로 2분 거리에 저렴한 주차장이 있어서 편리하게 이용했습니다
편리하게 이용할수 있는 숙소로 추천합니다~

Super séjour de 5 nuits dans l'appartement de Joao et Miguel. Nous avions prévenu Miguel que notre avion aurait un retard d'une heure mais il n'y a pas eut de souci pour nous accueillir. Miguel était très sympathique et a pris le temps de nous indiquer les principaux points d'intérêts de la ville. L'appartement est superbe, refait à neuf et conforme aux photos. Les lits sont très confortables et il y a beaucoup de rangement. L'appartement ne donne pas sur la rue et est donc très au calme. L'emplacement est également parfait, très central, avec un supermarché juste à côté et de nombreux restaurants. Nous recommandons vivement pour un prochain séjour à Porto !!
Centraal gelegen, erg netjes en schoon, alles is er wat je nodig hebt; gastheer (Miguel) goed te bereiken
Super accueil avec explications touristiques sur la ville. Très bon emplacement. Très calme et propre tout en étant en plein centre. Appartement très bien équipé avec balcon.
Perfect location and very clean.

Awesome flat, like in a catalogue, in the heart of the street for shopping, very well located, guys are very communicative, friendly for the best advises, i'll be back for sure !
Many thanks to João

Fantastic place and fully equipped. Very clean and modern, fantastic location easy to walk to the all of Porto's famous sites and the river. 
Really good and professional host.

Ich bin mit zwei Freundinnen im Alter von 18 Jahren nach Porto gereist und wir haben in dem Appartement gewohnt. Ganz abgesehen davon, dass Porto eine wunderbare Stadt ist, haben wir den Aufenthalt in der Wohnung sehr genossen. Miguel hat auf uns in der Wohnung gewartet und uns empfangen. (Die Wohnung ist leicht mit der Metro vom Flughafen aus zu erreichen.) Er hat uns die ganze Wohnung ganz genau gezeigt und alles wichtige erklärt. Die Wohnung sieht genauso aus wie auf den Fotos! Alles war sauber und schön eingerichtet. Daraufhin hat uns Miguel noch zusätzlich auf einer Stadtkarte, die wir am Flughafen erhielten, Sehenswertes in Porto gezeigt und uns einige Restaurants empfohlen. Er nahm sich Zeit für uns und beantwortete alle unsere Fragen. Miguel war sehr freundlich. Die restliche Woche standen wir nur über airbnb in Kontakt. 
Die Wohnung ist sehr zu empfehlen! Sie ist sehr gut mit Küchenutensilien und allem Nötigem ausgestattet. Jedoch würden wir die Wohnung nicht für mehr als 3 Personen empfehlen, da sie klein ist und nur ein Bad hat. Für uns drei hat der Platz aber deutlich ausgereicht.

The loft in Porto was amazing. Very modern, had everything we needed and we felt very relaxed. It was easy to find from the metro, a direct line from the airport. It was close to so main shopping streets and sights, and a 25min metro ride to the beach. An excellent, central location. We really appreciated Miguel taking the time to point out key sights on a map and let us in on some local knowledge regarding top locations to eat and where the night life was. He pointed out handy places such as the closest supermarket as well. Small touches that really made our stay wonderful. We would highly recommend the loft to anyone, especially those staying for a few days in Porto.

Loft spacieux et bien équipé, idéalement placé pour découvrir la ville, calme car donnant sur la cour.
Hôtes accueillants et attentifs.

I would highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Porto in the future.  It's pretty central, steps away from a metro station.  A short 15-20 minute walk will bring you to the river's edge where you have great views of the Bridge and Vila Nova de Gaia.  The place is well kept with a great kitchen fully stocked. There's a grocery store just around the corner.  It was nice to have a washing machine as well.  The neighborhood is quiet so you get a good night's rest.   Joao & Miguel we're very quick to answer any questions we had.  Porto is a lovely city!
Great stay, great communication from the hosts and seamless check-in.  Location is perfect for getting to all that Porto has to offer.
Great flat. Centrally located. Superb places to eat nearby! Excellent communication and no problem with a later check out. Thank you Miguel and Joao!
Loft lindo, limpo, confortável e em local estratégico. Passei ótimos dias com minha família nele, e com certeza recomendo a experiência.

These guys are incredible! Everything in the description was absolutely accurate - perfect location, amazing communication with them both and the flat itself - gorgeous! I could have stayed forever. Porto is now my favourite city in the world and Miguel and Joao play a huge part in my love for it. Also special thanks to their lovely cousin who gave us the most amazing tips of where to go - we took as many as we could during our week-long stay which made us feel like we got to experience the secret and local Porto. Obrigado!! Will definitely be back.

Très bel apaprtement . Tres bien situé . Super contact et disponibilité car nous sommes arrivés avant l'heure prévue. Voyage avec mes enfants de 12 et 17 ans. Ils ont adoré. Je recommande vraiment car proche de tout à pied et logement calme . Tout est nickel.
muy aconsejable
Wunderschöner Aufenthalt in der Wohnung, sehr empfehlenswert, alles gut erreichbar, wir kommen gerne wieder

Apartamento muy bien situado y realmente como en las imágenes. Joao está siempre atento y disponible para responder a sus huéspedes. Todo está muy limpio.
Todo perfecto, solo que los vecinos del momento de nuestra estancia no fueron muy respetuosos.
Bien situé ! Bel accueil MIGUEL

The apartment is in a great location, just minutes away from a metro station, and in the middle of hustle and bustle. However when you're in the apartment it's so quiet inside you wouldn't know you're a very short walk away from bars, shops and restaurants.

The apartment was absolutely immaculate, and had everything you need in there! 

It's very spacious, light and comfortable. It's the perfect base to explore Porto and if I were to return I'd certainly be requesting this apartment again.

Amazing apartment in the city center of Porto. Very clean and well equipped apartment. The communication from Miguel was very kind an helpfull. We recommend this apartment to everybody, its great for couples but also for a group of friends.

We do recommend this apartment which presents a lot of advantages : its location at short walking distance from the rebeira, the quality of renovation and furniture and the quality of the hosts who wecomed us so nicely.
O loft é  como mostra as fotos. Limpo e aconchegante, de bom gosto. Destaco a excelente localização e facilidade de transportes públicos. Apesar de no centro é silencioso. Cama confortável.
It's a very nice apartment has everything you need with good location! Don't hesitate!

This apartment is clean, bright, spacious and in an excellent location. The bed was comfortable, kitchen was well-equipped and we really appreciated the washing machine. There were lots of little thoughtful touches e.g. coffee beans, some basic pantry staples, laundry detergent, bluetooth speaker. The communication with the hosts was very prompt and helpful. Unfortunately, there was a lot of noise from the other apartments in the flat during our time there, particularly directly above us, at all hours of the day. We felt we could hear every footstep upstairs! I don't expect that the hosts can do much about this. Overall, the apartment in itself was good.

Miguel was extremely helpful in answering all our questions and giving advises. Communication before check in and during the stay couldn't be easier. Check in was a breeze and the place is very nice just as pictures. The location is right in the heart of Porto but also very surprisingly quiet at night. I love the fact that we can use the washer as our trip is long. I'm very very picky so I couldn't help to notice the mold growing in the corner of the shower but other than that the place is spotless clean and has everything we need to the maximum comfort. Thank you Miguel for such a wonderful experience in Porto.

Appartement très agréable, tout confort, très propre, bien situé, proche de toutes commodités et à quelques minutes à pied d'une station de métro. Communication et gestion efficace avant l'arrivée.  Un accueil sympathique mais bref de Joana qui nous a prodigué des conseils de visite de Porto et ses environs.  Seuls petits bémols sur le séjour : les bruits au milieu de la nuit venant du dessus la dernière nuit et quelques remontées d'odeurs dans la salle de bains. Rien cependant qui n'est empêché de passer un très bon séjour.

„The best place in the world“ steht auf dem Schmutzfang vor der Eingangstür und ja, das ist er. Für uns wurde nachts ein Abholservice organisiert, der uns ins Apartment brachte. Die Wohnung ist wunderschön und hat alles was wir brauchten. Top Lage. Niedliche Aussicht. Porto, wir kommen wieder. Du und deine lieben, freundlichen und aufgeschlossenen Menschen, ihr werdet uns fehlen. Diese Entspanntheit und das Miteinander wünsche ich mir sehr in Deutschland. OBRIGADO

Ubicación la mejor!! Llegas andando a todos lados!! Anfitriones los mejores, atentos y más amables! Miguel ha sido nuestro mejor guía de turistas, nos ha recibido con mapa y no nos hemos perdido de nada! El departamento de lujo! Mejor q en las fotos! Equipado con todo, limpieza ✅✅

Zeer goed verblijf en super goed gelegen. Hartelijke ontvangst . We kregen vele leuke tips. Het verblijf is zoals het wordt voorgesteld op de site. Goed uitgeruste keuken.  Enig minpunt : slechte isolatie tussen de verdiepingen: lawaai van de bovenburen. Wel geen lawaai van buiten op straat. Prima adresje voor 4 personen.
포르투 여행을 계획하시는 분들은 이 숙소 추천합니다. 걸어서 모든 명소를 관광하기 편해요

Personnes très disponibles. Acceuil chaleureux, l'appartement est super bien situé et il est exactement comme sur les photos. L'appartement est propre et très bien organisé. Merci pour ce magnifique séjour.

A hospedagem no apartamento foi ótima!Quando chegamos a Joana ja estava a nossa espera e foi super solicita. Tem só um andar para subir de escadas.
O apartamento é silencioso e super bem localizado, fizemos tudo a pé!
Tinha todos os utensílios que você precisa para cozinhar, passamos o natal e foi ótimo!!
Como fomos no inverno, achamos que os aquecedores portáteis ñ foram tão eficiente, colocaria mais! Mas em outras estações do ano isso não seria uma preocupação!!
Tivemos uma pequena dificuldade para usar a máquina de lavar roupa, seria ótimo se tivesse um manual de instruções.
Super recomendo a hospedagem no apartamento!!'
A wonderful apartment in a great location with perfect hosts. Don't look for another apartment. Book this one!

Un très agréable logement très bien situé en plein centre ville et au cœur de toutes les commodités métro supérette et magasins restaurants... toutes les visites  se font à pied ou en tramway ou métro c’est comme on veut (stations proches)
Le loft est très propre, clair et au calme grâce à sa petite cour centrale.
L’équipement et les mobiliers sont neuf et très bien agencé ! 
Et pour finir l’accueil a été fait très chaleureusement avec pleins de conseils stratégiques sur les lieux à ne pas manquer 
Ce logement et nos hôtes ont répondus à toutes nos attentes 
Merci !

Deze accommodatie was helemaal naar onze zin. Mooi, ruime appartement voorzien met alle gemakken op een goede locatie in het centrum. Comfortabel bed, goede douche. Miguel was zeer vriendelijk, hij heeft ons goed uitleg gegeven over de bezienswaardigheden van Porto.

El departamento es espectacular!!!!!!! Es mucho mas que solamente cómodo, esta llena de detalles lindos y funcionales. Es super limpio y la cama es grande y cómoda. Tiene un hermoso living y la cocina esta muy bien equipada. Miguel es muy servicial y nos dio todas las recomendaciones necesarias para conocer Oporto. Más que agradecidos!!!!!
Apartamento muy centrico,con un diseño muy cuidado,con todo lo necesario para que la estacia sea cómoda y en un edificio precioso  tipico portugues muy bien rehabilitado.Parking económico cerca
Miguel's place was very close to the central area with easy access to all the shops and restaurants. The place was spacious, clean and comfortable. Highly recommended for a lovely stay in Porto!

Apartment is nice and very good equiped. The locstion is perfect and close to everything. The only thing is that it has thin walls and you can hear every step in apartment above. So if you are not lucky it can by bit noisy. But you can absolutely hear no noise from street at all.

Ottimo appartamento, molto spazioso e confortevole. Ha tutto il necessario anche per la lavatrice e lavastoviglie, unico problema sono i vicini molto rumorosi.
L’appartamento è centralissimo e dietro l’angolo c’è anche un garage che costa solo 9€ al giorno.
Miguel è un host eccezionale e molto disponibile!

Miguel's been a great host. He reacted quickly to news, gave us some tips for the city of Porto and tried to make everything fit.

The appartment is very centrally located and well equipped for a city trip. A large kitchen is also available, bit this is not needed due the good localities and great prices.

When I get back to Porto, I'll book Miguel's place again.

We zijn erg warm ontvangen door een van de eigenaren. We kregen een heleboel tips over Porto, erg erg handig! Zeker de moeite waard om de tips te volgen. Het appartement had alle nodige voorzieningen en meer! Erg centraal gelegen, middenin het centrum van Porto waardoor het makkelijk is om overal te voet naartoe te gaan. Verder was het appartement koel, ideaal voor warme zomermaanden. 

Tip voor mensen die van koffie houden: tegenover zit een hele goede koffiezaak, Alambique, ze hebben ook to go. Heerlijk!

Amazing place in the center of Porto! Central, stylish, clean, and quiet the place had everything we needed. Great checkin experience as well, Miguel was very nice and gave us tips to make the most of the city on our arrival. He also took the time to come back later to provide some beach towels, as we read the flat would have some on the description, which highlight a unique service standard!
Appartement très bien placé pour visiter Porto ! Accueil chaleureux avec plein de conseils!
Tout simplement un très bon appartement et un très bon accueil pour profiter d'un séjour à Porto !

Unser Flieger hatte über 2 Stunden Verspätung, dies war überhaupt kein Problem! Super Kommunikation, die Wohnung liegt mitten im Zentrum - alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar! Die Wohnung entspricht genau den Fotos und ist gemütlich und sauber! 
Danke Miguel und João dafür, beim nächsten Besuch in Porto kommen wir gerne wieder!
Alles liebe Kathrin, Katrin, Vera und Sarah
Piso muy bien situado. Muy acogedor, con todo lujo de detalles, y la limpieza sobresaliente. Si contactas con Miguel, su respuesta es casi inmediata. Un sitio para repetir sin duda!!
Excellent accueil. Proche de tout.....appartement très propre et très calme

We were hosted perfectly by Miguel & João. We had a great check-in where we got a lot of informations about Porto and the best places to visit. The appartement is very clean and you have everything that you need to visit Porto. Thanks a lot.
We had a great stay and really enjoyed the city
El apartamento muy bien ubicado, muy lindo, cómodo, limpio y moderno. El anfitrión excelente, muy atento y presto a nuestras necesidades. Recomendadisimo!

Wonderful stay ! 
Great tips for discovering the city. The apartment was very clean, modern and with everything we needed ! We will recommend your loft to friends and family.

L’accueil a été excellent tout comme leur réactivité. Toujours disponibles  pour répondre à nos questions. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié les conseils (restaurants, etc.) donnés à notre arrivée.

L’appartement, très propre, très moderne, est conforme aux photos. La literie est excellente. Il est très agréable et très très bien situé (plein centre, métro à côté, gare de Sao Bento à 5 minutes à pied) . Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour.

We absolutely loved staying at Miguel and Joao’s apartment. They were extremely communicative and accommodating before, during and after or stay. I would highly recommend their apartment to anyone, it is in a great location for walking everywhere in Porto!
Superbe accueil et quand on a découvert l’appartement, là on s’est dit qu’on avait bien choisi, bien situé,propre, calme, très bien équipé, tout simplement GÉNIAL.
Beautiful airbnb situated in the center of Porto near all the attractions. Highly recommended!

집은 굉장히 깨끗하고 지내기에 편했습니다. 계단을 거쳐야하긴했지만 호스트가 짐들어주는걸 도와줘서 괜찮았어요.
시내쇼핑거리와 매우가깝고 근처에 슈퍼도 있어서 편리했지만 강가까지 걷기엔 조금 시간이 걸립니다. 그점만 빼고는 추천합니다
Very nice apartment, well located, but a bit noisy (especially in the eary morning), because it is an old town house with a wood floor.
Great area for restaurants shopping and safe to walk day or night

Miguels apartment ist perfekt. Standort top, es ist alles zu Fuss erreichbar. Wir waren zwei Erwachsene und ein Kind, dafür war die Wohnung sehr gut. Kaffees und Supermarkt gleich um die Ecke. Die Wohnung ist sehr zu empfehlen!
We had a really pleasant stay in this apartment. The communication was quick and easy and we got a lot of good tips about Porto during check-in. Overall it was a perfect vacation!
This place is THE BEST! I loved the location and walkability to everything. The checkin process was super easy and this place has all the amenities needed.

Super appartement, tres propre,chaleureux, au calme et pourtant en plein centre ville. Il donne sur l’intérieur donc pas de bruit de voitures, le Top !! Les commodités sont a côté  : supermarché, metro, bus, shopping, lieux touristiques. Tout peut se faire a pieds sans aucun problème. 
 Nous recommandons ce logement sans hésitation.
Everything was amazing. The house is really well located, all the touristic sites are at a walking distance. I trully recommend this place in Oporto!

Miguel is very friendly and kind to us.  He explained where to go, where to eat, and helped us to make a plan of sightseeing in Porto.
The place is very convenient, but quiet and comfortable.
Kitchen with dishwasher and fridge is so useful.  
Shower room is ok with plenty of hot water flow.
We are coming back here when we visit Porto again.
Thank you.

Excellent location and very good accommodations. Host (Joao) was there to greet us and everything was smooth. Just wished there was a place to put toiletries in the bathroom and perhaps a larger sink.   The location is perfect!  Nice little balcony but no view.  We would definitely sat again and would recommend this apartment!

Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir konnten Sie immer kontaktieren. Die Lage ist mittendrin und doch ruhig. Die Loft ist zum wohlfühlen und für einen Städtetripp ein genialer Ausgangspunkt. Man hat alles in nächster Nähe und kann es zu Fuß erreichen.

Es war eine wundervolle Loft für zwei! Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen! Sehr zentrale ruhige Wohnung gleich neben der Einkaufsstrasse und alles ist zu Fuss erreichbar! Kann ich nur weiter empfehlen!

Die Wohnung ist für meine empfinden gut legen. Unweit entfernt ist die Metro Station Bolhão, die Altstadt kann zu Fuß erkundet werden und ein Supermarkt befindet sich ebenfalls in unmittelbarer Nähe. Die Wohnung bietet ausreichend Platz für zwei Personen. Kann ich guten Gewissens weiter empfehlen.

L’appartement est très beau, fonctionnel et très bien placé, proche du métro qui emmène à l’aéroport.
Miguel a été très disponible pour nous et nous a donné plein d’infos sur la ville. Si je reviens à porto, c’est là que j’irais sans hésiter!

We really loved this apartment and had a wonderful time. It was so comfortable and had everything we needed. The kitchen is small but smartly laid out, with a beautiful marble-like countertop. The apartment was nicely decorated and felt trendy. It’s also in a great location, but lots of stores and restaurants close by. Joao met us to check in and gave us lots of recommendations. I would definitely stay here again!
The location is great! Awesome value.
Comfortable and beautiful spot right next to the St Catarina street - a center of the old town district.  The apartment is modern yet cosy and well equipped.  Worth chosing when traveling to Porto.

Appartement fonctionnel, bien situé et fidèle aux photos. Miguel a été un hôte très attentionné et toujours à l’écoute, avant le voyage et pendant.

Seul bémol du séjour : voisins de l’étage au dessus bruyants.
The Loft is beautiful and it is very  Central so you can walk in few Minutes to many nice places and to the Metro Station. Miguel is a very nice host!
A perfect air bnb for seeing Porto. Very spacious and comfortable!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
*French version below 

We host international business & leisure travellers since 2009 - vacation and corporate housing.

Renato is the architect (responsible for the 5-story house design) and Louri is your main host, as well the manager of the place. We are the owners.

If you like outdoors sports, biking, running, swimming, hiking, climbing, stand-up paddle (SUP), or just want to try Rio in a different and original way, we are waiting for you.

Architecture & Design can connect us, as well. if you are interested to know more about architecture in Rio, we could take you deeper in this world. Renato has some cool projects in town and he will be more than happy to give you some information and guide you, if you are interested, of course.

We are Smoke-Free/Drug-Free/Drink Responsibly

Every aspect of your stay is important to us and we can tailor any request to your individual needs ensuring you have a unique experience in Rio.

We are available in English, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

Nous accueillons des voyageurs internationaux depuis 2009 dans le cadre de leurs déplacements professionnels ou touristiques.

Renato est l'architecte à l'origine du design et de la conception des 7 suites et Louri votre interlocuteur et manager des lieux. Nous sommes tous les deux associés et propriétaires.

Si vous aimez les sports extérieurs, vélo, course à pied, nage, randonnée, escalade, stand-up paddle ou si vous souhaitez tout simplement découvrir Rio différemment nous vous attendons!

L'architecture et le design à Rio peuvent également être des sujets d’intérêts en commun que nous pourrions vous faire découvrir plus en détail. Renato pilote actuellement plusieurs projets dans la ville qu'il serait plus que ravi de vous expliquer, si bien entendu cela vous intéresse.

Nous sommes non fumeurs, non consommateurs de drogues et peu consommateurs d'alcools.

Chaque aspect de votre séjour est important à nos yeux; c'est pourquoi nous nous efforcerons de répondre à vos attentes afin que votre expérience à Rio soit unique et inoubliable.

Nous sommes à votre disposition en Anglais, Français, Espagnol et Portugais Brésilien, bien entendu.

name: Penthouse patio,city view,BIG bed
summary: Sunny apartment with sunset views of entire city. King bedroom — Lots of privacy. Kids welcome.  We have a mattress we can pull out for them. The most famous Brooklyn bars, restaurants, shopping and dance clubs that put Williamsburg on the map are by Bedford L stop and walking distance from here.
space: Sunny apartment with sunset views of entire city - you can see the empire state building from the the king size bed!  The most famous Brooklyn bars, restaurants and dance clubs that put Williamsburg on the map are by Bedford L stop and walking distance from here. We JUST switched the bedrooms around and redecorated the whole apt! The new guest room is the bigger room with a KING sized bed and large space. We tend to be away, so you can often have the place to yourself. Short term or long term OK - be in touch for long term deals. If you want to rent out the whole place that is an option too. One bedroom is a huge king bedroom (huge by NYC standards). We charge a little extra cleaning fee for a third person FYI. Families are welcome. We have a spare twin size insanely comfortable memory foam mattress in case you travel with children or need two beds. The apartment is 2 blocks from the waterfront and located half a block to the main shopping/restaurant street, Bedford Avenue, in the hear

neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg Brooklyn is undeniably the trendiest neighborhood in NYC right now. It doesn't get more fun that this. I used to live in Manhattan, but now that I actually see the city skyline every day, I feel even more like a New Yorker.  Williamsburg is typically know for: outdoor festivals, live music, art, vintage stores, new designers, cutting edge food, rooftop parties, fashion, bike culture, hipsters, interior design, and my favorite part about Brooklyn: a friendly neighborhood community. We are in Williamsburg proper here at Bedford Ave, not just a nearby subway stop to it or a far walk away. The waterfront area is the most desirable part of Williamsburg, and Bedford ave is the main street. Everything is close, and neighborhood is safe. There are people out and about all day/night hitting the nearby restaurants and bars. This is the first subway stop in Brooklyn from Manhattan, and the first Brooklyn neighborhood right off the bridge.
notes: Please don't lose our key because we will have to charge you the cost of replacing the lock at $90. We take security in the building very seriously : there is video outside of the building that surveys the area for strangers, video intercom, an alarm directly linked to the police station, etc. There is another video in the hallway linked up to an alarm. We are all set up here even though it's a very safe neighborhood in a community that looks out for each other. The neighbors are all wonderful. On mailing packages here: If you need something sent ahead like a box or suitcase, I can help you direct your packages to the nearby UPS/Fedex office. We can help you pick them up when you arrive in NYC. Though we used to let guests send directly to our apartment, the UPS/Fedex deliveries recently got a little out of control (OMG so many huge heavy boxes in one week!)  If you would like laundry done, you can use the pick-up/drop-off service that we use. Bag up your laundry in the morning (or nig
transit: The Bedford L train, JMZ, and East River Ferry are all walking distance and one stop to Manhattan. (about 10-15 minutes)
access: You can use everything -- the patio, kitchen, dishwasher, living room, dining table, bathroom and WiFi. There is a guest computer by my desk you can use in the evenings too. Only thing you don't have access to is my desk area and the second bedroom. There is an espresso machine and a french press for coffee in the kitchen.  For music, there is a jambox bluetooth speaker in your room so you can play music here or take it on a picnic. We also have wifi speakers.  An outlet by the bed with 4 USB spots will allow you to plug in your phone without having to worry about international outlets if you are traveling from abroad. As long as you use these common areas and items with respect, we are cool.  Kitchen has a dishwasher and you are welcome to use our cooking tools and wine glasses and all. Everything in the house is provided from dishes to bath towels.  I even pick up all those little hotel bottles of shampoo from my many business trips so you can use them. We have a Nest thermostat for
interaction: We travel a lot, so at times you will have the whole place to yourself. Don't be surprised if you only cross paths with us a few times during your stay. For this reason, I might not be able to offer hot breakfast but will be sure to leave things like yogurt and fruit out for you. We have french press for coffee, but do note that the coffee culture here is huge and there are dozens of incredible coffee shops within a few short blocks. We love hosting new people and having guests back again. You are most welcome to make yourself at home here. I am presently putting together a mega-book that is a guide to all my favorite places in Brooklyn and Manhattan. I also made a small subway map that I'll give you when you arrive. I can set you up with recommendations or an itinerary of things to do nearby if you like. I love showing off my neighborhood. I've even written itineraries for guests not booked with us :)
house_rules: The breakdown is pretty simple of our rules: No smoking inside the apt (only on patio) No pets in the apt No nuts of any kind brought into the apt Do not book if you have a cat at home (thus dander coming with you) Do not set down drinks on the antique cabinet - use the big table or coffee table for drinks. No parties Check that you turned the stove off properly if you use it  Please be the person who is staying (do not book for someone else) Details: Smoking on patio only please. No nuts in the house of any kind due to children with allergies. This includes peanut butter,  pesto on pasta or even any kind of almond oil (or similar) you use is the shower. I provide lotion and hair care in case you don't bring any.  You are most welcome to our liquor-- just replace what you drink if in excess or leave some cash behind to replace . No pets in the apt!   We allergic to cat fur-- like major asthma attack allergic. If your clothes are covered in cat hair from your pet at home, this is not th

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
NYC city designer living in the best neighborhood the city offers: the new art and music scene in Brooklyn.
It's hard to tear me away from here, but my work requires some travel often.  I like to share the place.
Hope you enjoy having some wine on the patio during a sunset as much as my husband and I do. He works long hours so you may not get meet him, but everyone loves him. We often travel together for work.

My brother lives nearby which is so nice for me, and also handy if you need anything while staying here if I'm traveling. I usually work just 5 blocks away so feel free to bug me if need something while I'm at work. I can pop back to the apt to help. As a designer, the schedule is really flexible. Please don't hesitate to ask me any questions if you need to know anything about me or the place. Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great apartment at a nice location. Good restaurants/coffee shops around. Lacey was a great host and flexible to our needs. We had a great time and would definitely recommend this property.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wow.  What a great place to stay while in Brooklyn!  The HUGE patio alone, is a rare commodity in Williamsburg!  The apartment was huge, especially by NY standards and the furnishings, a testament to the owner's tasteful design aesthetic, but oh so livable and comfortable.  How could I have almost forgotten the views!  From the patio, there is a view of the beautiful Williamsburg bridge and at night this provides a twinkling backdrop that is magical.  
Lacey was a wonderful hostess and provided everything needed for a 5 day stay.  It would have been easy to entertain here too, but we were out and about most of the time.  For those who don't know the Williamsburg area, it is in the middle of world class restaurants and yet, only one short subway stop from Manhattan.  Would I recommend this location for your stay?  Absolutely!! (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Lacey is a wonderful host, very welcoming, friendly and helpful. Her place is really amazing and peaceful. The room and the patio have fantastic views! The neighborhood is also really great and safe, with plenty of bars, restaurants and nice shops. The waterfront is really nearby, so does the subway. Staying there made our holidays even better.
Definitely the place to be, so much for the place itself as for the hosts. 
Thanks Lacey!
Fantastic host! Wonderful rooftop apartment with amazing view and patio. Breakfast was fantastic as well :)

Great apartment with a fantastic terrace and with great views from both sides, day and night. Great neighbourhood and very quick and easy to get to Manhattan too. Lacey and Stuart are really nice and welcoming.  I had a great time there and I'm sure you will too!
Lacey was very welcoming, and extremely accomodating and generous with the arrival/departure times. The location is perfect, calm, yet everything at close proximity. Cool views over the city!

Had a fabulous stay here with my boyfriend! The room is gorgeous and the apartment is very clean and centrally located. Lacey is super easy to communicate with and extremely warm and welcoming. I highly reccomend this airbnb...overall a very positive experience :) can't wait to come back!!

Just returned from an amazing 5 day stay at Lacey's apt. She is an extremely gracious host & was very flexible with my arrival/departure times. The apt is in a great location with gorgeous views anytime, day or night. You can enjoy the NY skyline and Empire State Building from the room or the Williamsburg Bridge from the outdoor patio. I would highly recommend staying here & look forward to my next visit.
Lacey was sooooo accommodating!! Her place was as described and she went above and beyond in making our stay a comfortable. Super sweet lady who I would recommend any day of the week.

First of all! I was suppose to arrive at 8 pm, but because my flight was late I first arrived at Lacey's apartment at 5 am - and she was so nice and welcoming even though i woke her up in the middle of the night. 

That pretty much describes Lacey's attitude towards her quests. She is open, sweet and nice. I can only recommend staying at Lacey and Stu.

Lacey was extremely welcoming and she is just so friendly, I love it! The description was spot on. The bedroom view of Manhattan is amazing, the picture does not do it justice. And the neighborhood is great, so many good places to eat(GO TO Pie-N-Thighs trust me).....and definitely ask Lacey for recommendations she knows what's up!


Lacey thanks for awesome stay and for being so welcoming to us at the apartment. We wish the best to you and Stuart in September:).

Jeff.

We had a great stay in Laceys very nice flat in Williamsburg (NYC).
The apartment is as discribed and Lacey a the best host we ever had.
If you will spend some days in NYC, Laceys apartment is the best place to relax, to discover and to enjoy. 
Many thanks for all!
Lacey and her fiance were fantastic hosts.  I promise you that you will not be disappointed.  I will surely stay there when I return to NYC.

Lacey's place is so great! It's beautifully-decorated, with great views of Manhattan and a lovely rooftop patio. She was so welcoming and really made us feel at home. She was very helpful with recommendations on grocery stores, places to see, etc. Thank you so much!

Everything about my stay was perfect. I felt so welcome and  without stress the whole trip. Lacey is a wonderful host and her place is everything you would expect and more. The neighbourhood is beautiful and was very convenient for my stay. I would recommend her listening any day, And I would not of had the amazing trip I had without finding such a wonderful place to stay. The views are extravagant and Lacey's welcoming and positive personality was such a great bonus. I am still just so happy I came across this BnB, it was exactly what I needed for a perfect trip into New York.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Lacey and Stu's place for 7 nights and everything was just perfect. We were a little bit nervous of how it would be to live with "strangers", but we quickly forgot about our concerns when we met Lacey and Stu. They are so welcoming, kind and open. Couldn't have asked for better hosts!

The area is perfect and I don't think I will ever stay in Manhattan after we got to know Williamsburg. Lots and lots of (great!) restaurants just around the corner and the area just seems much more local and relaxed than in Manhattan. 

The room is kinda small, but you have everything you need. The bed is very comfortable and there's a big closet and a mirror. The skyline-view is breathtaking! 

I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this experience, but I could go on with the good stuff. If we ever come back to NY, we'll be staying here at Lacey and Stu's place - Without a doubt!
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stay just for one night but the experience was great! Lacey was so welcoming and King. The bedroom and the flat is clean and very confortable. And the views: just amazing! What a beautiful day to woke up with the skyline view.. 
the neighborhood is great with many restaurants, bars, shop.. 
it's not the first time i come to NY but i will surely stay there when i return to NYC!

Lacey was a VERY welcoming host, and the communication was amazing. She is so nice. And the apartment and the patio were wonderful. The small but comfortable room had the greatest view over the Manhattan skyline -  couldn't be better to wake up with a view like that. Some noise from the air conditioning fans outside, but nothing you can't overcome - 'cause when you walk out the door you are right in the middle of cosy Williamsburg with great restaurants, galleries, parks and shops right around the corner. We would definitely come back.

Lacey and Stu were wonderful! Can't say enough good things. They let us drop our luggage early, and then because the other guests left early, Lacey arranged things quickly so we could have a nap before heading out to explore New York. Lacey gave tips and info about New York and was always trying to make sure we were comfortable. All this while their wedding is a week away! They were so relaxed and hospitable and we are SO thankful we picked them to stay with!

Lacey has a great apartment and is as described. Great views and roof terrace. Location is great. Lots of bars and places to eat (check out DuMont Burger, ribs from Delany's BBQ and Pies n Thighs). I wouldn't hesitate in staying again and totally recommend staying.  Lacey responded to all our queries and accommodated our late arrival and departure.

I have not stayed here but booked the room for my mother in law and her friend. Here's their feedback: the apartment was very small, and so was the room and bed. It would be recommended for young couples only. Unfortunately the sheets were not clean upon arrival, but they were changed immediately when they asked for it. Pros: nicely decorated, central location and close to all restaurants, bars etc., great space when the owners are not there. Cons: very little privacy when sharing with owners.

Lacey and her husband Stu are great people. We went with them to different locations in Williamsburg and had a funny evening together. There is a lot to see and do there and both can recommend many good places! The apartment is as described and really nice. The view from the room or the patio is awesome! The next subway station (Bedford Av) is not too far, but you may walk 10 minutes. I can totally recommend this place!!!

I've been to NYC several times, either in big Manhattan hotels or tiny BnBs, but my first accommodation in Brooklyn was by far the best. Located in South Williamsburg close to Williamsburg bridge, it's super easy to get to Manhattan (by foot crossing the bridge or L train, subway station is 8 min walk). But Williamsburg itself is also an upcoming, trendy neighborhood with loads of bard and restaurants, people here seem to be all young, funky and creative :-) The hosts, Lacey and Stu, gave us a great time, very helpful, kind and outgoing. I won't mention the stunning view on manhattan or the huge patio, the pictures speak for themselves! Next time - and that's not just a formal term - again at Lacey's!

This place is a winner! Lacey and Stu were awesome hosts! we stayed at their place for 2 weeks and we couldn't be more satisfied with our experience. The location was perfect, close to bars, restaurants and subway in Williamsburg area. Only 1 subway stop from Manhatten, 3 stops from Union Square. The apartment itself was exactly as presented in photos, clean, tidy and comfortable. Including the terrace area which has an awesome view of the Willaimsburg bridge and Manhatten. 
Lacy and Stu were very welcoming, kind and fun people. They were very helpful in terms of where to go and what to see, etc. I couldn't recommend this place anymore!

Lacy (and Stuart) were very accommodating hosts. They provided everything described in the amenities list, and more! Lacey made us waffles one morning and a killer cup of coffee! She even provided several maps for the area within the guestroom and had plenty of suggestions upon request. 

 The whole home is very clean and provides several great views of the city. Parking was relatively easy. The only thing you need to move your car for is the occasional street sweep which is clearly posted on signs throughout the neighborhood. 
 
 The whole area was pretty easy to navigate and FULL of great things to do/see and we couldn't have asked for a better place for our first airbnb visit.

We had a fantastic time staying in Lacey's gorgeous apartment!
 
- The location was perfect for us, a really creative area with SO many good places to eat and indy shops - plus excellent transport links into Manhattan

- The apartment itself is stunning - a massive lounge / living space with a huge balcony area, immaculately furnished with some really lovely design pieces. We were hardly there because we were so keen to make the most of the city but we almost regretted not being able to spend more time there! The bedroom we stayed in wasn't huge but it was perfectly fine for us - very comfy, clean, and with an awesome view of the Manhattan skyline.

- Lacey and Stuart were amazing hosts - such cool, friendly, nice people! They had lots of great advice for the city and were always available if we needed them. They made us feel very much at home and we definitely plan on staying with them again when we're back in NY.

We had a great time staying with Lacey and Stu , They have an awesome place and made us feel very welcome.
Lacey was very helpful with directions and recommendations , they were great hosts and cool to hang out with.
The Williamsburg area was perfect with loads of hip bars and restaurants with excellent commuter links , The perfect place for a break in New York.

Machiel and I arrived late in the evening. Lacey was very hospitable by offering us a beer and giving us all kinds of advice where to eat, how to go around town, etc. 
The room and bathroom was cosy and neat and we had a great breakfast on our last morning.

It was really comfortable to stay at this apartment with an amazing view. There were so many nice restaurants and coffee shops around this neighborhood. I truly had an amazing time and really would like to come back there if I visit Brooklyn again in the future.

Staying at Lacey's apartment honestly represented everything which I love about AirBnB. Lacey and I were in touch beforehand meaning I arrived feeling like I knew whose place I was staying at and feeling totally comfortable there. Her and her husbands apartment is one of the nicest I have seen in New York having spent 6 months there. Large, beautifully decorated, cosy. And although I have seen the Manhattan skyline many times it is was a very special experience actually waking up to it. For those people who don't know the geography of New York well, the location is incredible, less than ten minutes from many of the newest and top restaurants and bars - and not the flashy/overpriced ones that you often find over the river. Finally, at the risk of sounding crude, it is extraordinarily good value compared to not only hotels but also other AitBnB apartments. Thank you for a perfect start to my trip Lacey.

Everything was fine. Lacey was very helpful even though she couldn't be there. Her very nice neighbors helped us to come in and gave us a lot of helpful informations. It is a really nice appartment with an amazing view!

Toby, my boyfriend, and I stayed with Lacey and Stu for three great nights. I can only agree with and iterate the widely positive feedback they've received. We were greeted after a looooong day of travelling by her brother - all went to plan and it was greatly appreciated. The apartment and surrounding neighbourhood was a homely and friendly base for us to explore Williamsburg and NYC  - Lacey was a great source of knowledge and very forthcoming with tips and recommendations. During down time in the apartment we felt relaxed and welcome to chill out with them both, the gorgeous Ragu (a friends dog) and their friends - only wish we had more evenings to drink and talk the hours away! I'd highly recommend staying with Lacey and Stu...we certainly hope to again.
The reservation was canceled 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lacey was an amazing host! Her home was clean, spacious, and comfortable and the location was perfect. My flight arrived very early and she was extremely accommodating and allowed me to check in right away. She is also incredibly sweet and fun to be around - I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely return. Thanks Lacey!

Couldnt have asked for more perfect hosts for honeymoon week in NYC. They were away quite a bit of the time, and when they were home, they helped us with recommendations for transport and great places to eat. 
If they recommend the American BBQ joint, go there. 
Its just around the corner and its super good. 
So many other restaurants, food trucks etc around as well , and the area is super safe. 

The home is beautifully decorated and we made use of their big bath tub a few times.
Only thing was the bed was too soft for my liking, but we were so wrecked from exploring NYC everyday... it didnt bother us too much. 

Oh forgot to mention when you wake up you see the sunrise over Manhattan behind your head out the bedroom window. 

Would totally stay here again next time we visit. And I will be recommending this place and these guys to all my friends travelling from Australia also.

Great experience at Lacey's and Stu's apartment! The apartment is beautifully decorated with a very nice patio, and the room has a great view on NYC's skyline. Lacey and Stu are excellent hosts and they will be more than happy to help their guests discover GREAT places! Overall an incredible place to stay at!

Lacey and Stu were awesome! Not only did they give us heaps of great tips on NYC and Williamsburg, but their little dog Ragu was the best cuddle buddy out. The apartment is really convenient, but make sure you have a subway map handy! We just visited (so possibly the coldest time of the year) and the apartment was comfortable for those nights when facing the weather was just too scary - thanks so much guys for the hospitality.

We can't say enough good things about Lacey, Stu, and the delightful puppy, Ragu. They are such hospitable and accommodating hosts, and the apartment is charming, clean, and conveniently located. If you're headed to Williamsburg, you won't find a better room.

Lacey and Stu were fantastic hosts along with their adorable dog, Ragu. Lacey was extremely flexible in meeting with me despite her work schedule and was very welcoming. She also provided any amenities you could probably need and the view is amazing as well as the apartment furnishings. Highly highly recommend to stay here if you're in town--only regret is didn't have more time to hangout with her and hear more about her thoughts of New York! :)
Lacey and Stu were great hosts, friendly and helpful. The location was great to discover both Brooklyn and Manhattan. We had a great a time.

I had a great time at Stu and Lacey's apartment. They're great hosts, always ready to help you out. The apartment is great and exceptionally located. Williamsburg European feel is awesome and really well connected to the rest of the city
Lacey and Stuart are great hosts - super friendly and accommodating - their apt comfortable and inviting and Williamsburg is a great neighbourhood to base yourself when in NYC. Highly recommended.

We had a great time at Lacey and Stu's place! Lovely neighbourhood/ location, nice and very hospitable people (cute dog!) and great views from both the room and the patio. We would definately recommend staying there :)
The reservation was canceled 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We just left Lacey's apartment and are a little sad that our stay was so short!
If you need a place to stay in Brooklyn you should stay there. They were both very welcoming, relaxed and helpful. The apartment is beautifully decorated and the view was absolutely stunning. Lacey's restaurant recommendations were incredible! We would definitely stay at their place again! Thanks again!
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lacey and Stu were fantastic hosts. Communication was great prior to and during the stay. Both of them are very friendly and helpful, as is their neighbour. They are full of tips and advice on things to see and do and places to eat. Apartment is clean and tidy with a spectacular view from the bedroom and patio, as seen in the pictures. The location is very close to transport and Manhattan, with lots of places to eat, drink and shop nearby too. Highly recommend staying here. PS we'll miss you Ragu :P

We had a wonderful experience staying with Lacey and Stuart. They are friendly and kind and were very helpful to us in terms of acclimating to the neighborhood and surrounds during our stay. Their apartment is great, perfect location, well appointed with a lovely terrace. Our room and bed were very comfortable. The apartment is easily accessible by train. I would definitely recommend staying here!

We enjoyed our stay at Lacey's. Her and her husband were very nice and welcoming. The location is perfect, the room was cute and clean and the view from the patio is beautiful! My husband and I would definitely stay here again!

Lacey and her husband Stu made us feel very welcomed in their home. They are both warm and friendly and made it known to us from the start that we were welcomed to use the house as if it were our own.
Lacey helped us with navigating the subway and trains in and around Brooklyn... her advice was most useful
The bedroom was clean, the bed was very comfortable and the view was outstanding.
The only thing I would suggest to them would be to replace the large chair in the bedroom with a more useful dresser.
I would not hesitate to use this rental again... Thank you Lacey and Stu!
Amazing.  Lacey was great and the room is gorgeous.

Lacey was super accommodating on short notice, such an awesome first solo Airbnb experience! Great location in Williamsburg, room was clean and cozy, plus taking my coffee on the roofdeck was so nice. Thanks, Lacey!

These guys were such great hosts, super chilled out and made us feel right at home.  The patio is so beautiful especially great to have a couple of drinks and watch Manhattan at night. Great way to get to know Williamsburg, great area and Citi bikes virtually outside the door which we found very handy to use on our trip. We got a tip off about a bar with incredible free range fried chicken, a 10 minute walk to Metropolitan Ave at a local grungy bar called Commodore. Go at Happy hour on a hot day - amazing. Thanks Stu and Lacey for your hospitality!

We were overwhelmed with not only how polite Lacey & Stu Were but how Nice And Homey The Place Felt. No Hassle . Great Veiw for the Fireworks & the neighborhood Rocks!!! Would highly recommend this Place To Anyone..Great 4 Couples!!!!

We had a great stay at Lacey and her husband in ther beautiful apartment. There terrace is to die for! They are very welcoming and kind, and gave us many tips on restaurants and what to do. The perfect place to live if you want to stay with a really kind american couple. Thanks a lot Lacey!

Awesome cute place to stay for the night. Lacey was there and available whenever we had any questions about places to visit and how to get around. The outdoor patio was beautiful as well, unfortunately it rained the night we were there but its a perfect place to lounge on the hammock on a sunny day. With plenty of awesome local bars and restaurants just minutes away down the street. And a quick subway ride into Manhattan. Would gladly stay here again!

The stay was an astounding discovery for us. In the middle of the most interesting district of New York, coupled with unearthly hosts. Lacey and Stu were more than just proprietors, they were wondrous location scouts and had always an open ear for even the most complicated questions.

The apartment is very tidy and clean, overall remarkably furnished. The view from the bedroom is astonishing, having had more than once the opportunity to gaze upon the skyline of Manhattan in the blue hour. The Zenith of the apartment: the terrace with its staggering view on the Williamsburg Bridge.

The welcome was heartily, we got free drinks and Lacey made breakfast for us in the morning :)

We can highly recommend staying over with Lacey & Stu in their rare and exceptional apartment.

Thank you very much for the time and your obligingness.
We will definitely come again!

We feel so lucky to have been able to stay with Lacey and Stu in their beautiful apartment. 

The place is exactly how the listing describes it, but the views from the balcony and bedroom window are so much better in real life.

The neighbourhood is awesome. We ate at a couple of local restaurants which we found to be much cheaper than Manhattan, and went for drinks (based on Lacey's recommendations) at the Wythe hotel and Maison Premier which we loved. The apartment is close to the subway and there are plenty of shops/services on the doorstep.

Lacey and Stu are wonderful, very kind and accommodating. We particularly enjoyed watching movies, especially on the rooftop terrace (we'd pay £30 per ticket for such a privilege in London).

We'd highly recommend the apartment and will hopefully be back in the Christmas run up, sometime in the future. Thank you for such a wonderful experience.
Had a great time in NY and Lacey was great, we only had a 2 day stop but we are really pleased with our stay, really liked the positioning of her apartment.

Will definitely try to re-book when I am back in NYC!
Nice apartment, small room but functional, good bed (double-size), with beautiful view of Manhattan. Nice deck (weather permitting :)
Friendly welcoming owners.
One bathroom to share, but only with owners (no other guest rooms).
10 minutes walk to either the L train (Bedford station), or the J,M,Z trains (Marcy station), or the fun East River Ferry.

Lacey&Stu have a beautiful penthouse in the heart of Williamsburg, just as lovely (I'd say even more) as the pictures shared on airbnb. Their patio is a nice place to relax with a stunning view and the guest room shares a stunning view of the city skyline. It's a great place to come back to after a long day of walks and sight seeing. Lacey&Stu, (and their neighbor Vlad) are friendly&helpful people with great recommendations for a nice brunch or where to see a nice sunset. We loved our stay in Williamsburg as their place is greatly located - quick access to the city by metro or ferry, or a short walk to anywhere in Williamsburg. I would not hesitate to recommend this place to friends or coming back for another stay myself!

Really friendly couple as was Vlad, the neighbor who let us in. Truly lovely, large apartment full of interesting paintings. The photos on here cannot do justice to the views of Manhattan from all the room and roof terrace. Great location between two subway stops, so easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.
A very Nice and cool place, easygoing People.
Lacey was a extremely friendly and helpful.  She gave us great tips for getting around, coffee shops and restaurants.  It was our first visit to Brooklyn and the location was perfect

Lacey was a lovely host who made us feel very welcome. The apartment is in the perfect Williamsburg location with endless great restaurants, bars and shops within just a few minutes walk. Sitting on the rooftop terrace at night with views over Williamsburg Bridge and Manhattan was also a real highlight.

Stuart and Lacey made us feel so welcome. The apartment was even more beautiful than in the photos, and the bed was SO comfy. The view from the bedroom window is also incredible! We can't recommend this place enough, if we come back to New York, we'll book with Lacey if we can.
Fantastisk lejlighed i hjertet af Williamsburg med den vildeste udsigt og terrasse! Lacey er overmåde gæstfri og sørgede godt for os. Alt i alt et super ophold.

This place was a lot of fun. The location was great and very easy walking distance back up Bedford for eating, shopping and drinks. Lacey was a great host and the apartment was very comfortable.
    Walk-up Bedford Ave. to the L line for great access and don't forget the ferry across the East River!
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great Location. Host is very communicative and responsive and accommodating. Good and safe budget accommodation in Brooklyn!

This is our second time staying at Lacey and Stu's. Their place is everything you need and more and is in the perfect location . Lacey's tips for surrounding restaurants and bars were so helpful and made our stay even better! 
We hope to return again soon!
Great location - easy street parking

We stayed for a month and we had such a nice time. The roof terrace is amazing and the nearby Domino park is an excellent place for a jog or just a walk.  The hosts, Lacey and Stu, are very friendly people and know the neighbourhood well. If you're staying for a longer period like we did you'll be happy to know you will have an excellent stay here!

The location was great. Very close to the trains to get across the water. Your place is wonderful too! Great views and ihome Siri was so cool. Thank you for the privacy and accepting us into your home. Great quick responses to all queries.

name: Aconchegante , Colorido e Lúdico.
summary: Meu espaço é perto de Maracanã. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de o aconchego, o bairro e a cama confortável. Meu espaço é bom para casais e aventuras individuais.
description: Meu espaço é perto de Maracanã. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de o aconchego, o bairro e a cama confortável. Meu espaço é bom para casais e aventuras individuais.

viajar sempre
