reviews.comments: Valéria é uma excelente anfitriã. Simpática, acessível e atenciosa. Pensa em todos os detalhes. O ambiente dela é limpíssimo, lindo e aconchegante.

name: ~ The Kauai Luna ~ Panoramic Views
summary: A Rare & Unique Location offering Multiple Views that other locations can't offer: Tropical Jungle, Mountain, Waterfall, Bali Hai Sunsets & Distant Ocean. Spacious with 2 Bedrooms ~ 2 Beautifully Remodeled Bathrooms, Fully Equipped Kitchen,  Balcony and more. Fully Equipped Kitchen & Large Flat Screen TV ~ No A/C This is a BUDGET FRIENDLY & Awesome View Location -  *The KITCHEN is OUT-DATED but Expertly Clean and Fully Equipped. *The BATHROOM Showers ARE NEWLY RENOVATED & Beautiful
space: Perched above the Jungle Valley this condo feels like Tropical Tree House with Amazing Views. Hawaiian Themed Interior with Tile Flooring, Stainless Steel Appliances and Washer/Dryer. The kitchen is Fully Stocked for all your cooking needs .
description: A Rare & Unique Location offering Multiple Views that other locations can't offer: Tropical Jungle, Mountain, Waterfall, Bali Hai Sunsets & Distant Ocean. Spacious with 2 Bedrooms ~ 2 Beautifully Remodeled Bathrooms, Fully Equipped Kitchen,  Balcony and more. Fully Equipped Kitchen & Large Flat Screen TV ~ No A/C This is a BUDGET FRIENDLY & Awesome View Location -  *The KITCHEN is OUT-DATED but Expertly Clean and Fully Equipped. *The BATHROOM Showers ARE NEWLY RENOVATED & Beautiful Perched above the Jungle Valley this condo feels like Tropical Tree House with Amazing Views. Hawaiian Themed Interior with Tile Flooring, Stainless Steel Appliances and Washer/Dryer. The kitchen is Fully Stocked for all your cooking needs . Enjoy the Sparkling Community Pool, Hot Jacuzzi, 2 Gas BBQ's Grills and New Pool Furniture for Poolside Dining 2 Beach Chairs & 1 Igloo Cooler We are available and ready to assist with any unforeseen maintenance issues.  We do manage multiple properties so when reaching
neighborhood_overview: The Alii Kai Resort is a hidden Gem in Princeville. Situated back off the Ocean Bluff and just minutes from all North Shore destination beaches. This is a low density  condo community allowing for a private and quiet stay. The landscape is expertly manicured. The sparkling pool, hot jacuzzi and bbq's are cleaned every morning.  The resort has a Resident Manager onsite 24/7.
notes: We want your stay to be most enjoyable...  We start you off with a starter supply of:  Shampoo & Conditioner & Body Soap 4 Beach & 4 Bath Towels Fully Equipped Kitchen & All Cookware Dish Soap & Dishwasher Soap Paper Towels Toilet Paper Trash Bags Coffee Filters  Laundry Soap Saran Wrap & Aluminum Foil Salt & Pepper 2 blow dryers (1 in each bathroom) Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms and Living Room NO AIR CONDITIONING
transit: RENTAL CAR HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
access: Enjoy the Sparkling Community Pool, Hot Jacuzzi, 2 Gas BBQ's Grills and New Pool Furniture for Poolside Dining 2 Beach Chairs & 1 Igloo Cooler
interaction: We are available and ready to assist with any unforeseen maintenance issues.  We do manage multiple properties so when reaching out to us, PLEASE let us know what Location and Unit Number you are staying in. We welcome your questions prior to or during your stay.
house_rules: Strict...  Please be Mindful of our Condo.  The bedding is White & Sofa is White  NO Smoking inside or on balcony NO eating in the beds No candles whatsoever Upon Check-Out: Remove ALL & Open Food - Remove it to the outside dumpster.   NO shoes worn INSIDE the condo (Hawaiian Custom) In the event there is Excessive use or Damage to the Condo, the security deposit will be accessed.  Bed linens & towels will be washed by our housekeeper.  Great efforts are made to be sure the condo is in EXCELLENT CONDITION for YOUR stay. In the event an unforeseen item need to be repaired or replaced CALL US. We are onsite and ready to assist to ensure your stay is most enjoyable. Thank you!

host.host_about:
Aloha...! 

We have a lot of Gratitude for living on the Beautiful Island of Kauai. 

We Embrace the Diversity of our Global Community. We Warmly Welcome travelers from All parts of the World and All walks of Life. Our goal is for your stay to be Most Enjoyable!  

We welcome your questions and would be Delighted to Host Your Stay.  

With gratitude, 
Shana & Jeff

reviews.comments: Perfect location on the north shore. Immaculately clean with nice touches, like fresh towels laid out and quality shampoo and coffee. Presented a bit more like a hotel than an AirBnB, which was pleasant. Also a gorgeous view of both ocean and mountain... no AC but a great breeze through the apt.
Nice, clean place in Princeville. Calm neighbourhood. Nice pool and grill opportunities in the common area.
Absolutely wonderful place and location! Neighborhood was great, and honestly, we couldn't have asked for a better place! This place was amazing and we had a blast! Thanks Shana and Jeff!

Apartment is located in a beautiful area and is good equiped with everything you could need. Jeff and Shana were always available but we didn't need to contact them because everything works perfect. We are a family with 3 children and the apartment is roomy enough. We enjoyed the pool and the spa with warm water at night. Everything was as described. Highly recommended.

We were very comfortable at Jeff & Shana's place, which was located in a beautiful spot, overlooking a nice canyon; even a bit of ocean was visible from both the living room and the main bedroom!
The place was in a golf course kind of development, so if you don't like that kind of thing and you want to feel closer to nature, this won't be your place.

The north shore of kauai is a beautiful place to vacation and Jeff & Shana's condo is smack dab in the middle of paradise! Very close to Queens bath, Hanalei and Kilauea and only a short drive to Kapaa it was conveniently located right off the main hwy that takes you around the entire island. It is very spacious and open with beautiful views of the lush foliage that surrounds the complex.  It comfortably housed 5 adults for over a week and even had access to a hot tub and bbq which we used on several occasions, especially after hiking part of the kalalau trail! We enjoyed our stay very much and hope to return to kauai someday!  Thanks jeff & Shana!

This place was amazing! Super clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We were able to cook breakfast every morning as well as a couple dinners. The view is amazing and there are beaches everywhere nearby! I would definitely recommend this place, we enjoyed every bit of it.

Our family loved the condo.  The sunsets on the lanai with gorgeous.  The pool was great for a daughter.  The kitchen had everything that we needed for cooking and grilling and they Jeff and Shana even got us a pack and play for our daughter to sleep in.  Would recommend this place and are looking forward to our next trip.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Princeville is a lovely area and the view from the is beautiful! The place is very clean and well kept. The kitchen had everything you would possibly need to cook with! The beds were comfortable and the place had all the comforts of home. Thank you Jeff and Shana.

Location, location, location! The condo's location was very nice. Close to many tourists attractions and restaurants/grocery. 

The condo had a lot of amenities. The kitchen was complete; it had all utensils that I looked for. Extra towels were available as well. Look inside the cabinets! All kinds of goodies are in there.

The host was very responsive. I received a reply almost immediately.

Overall I was very satisfied with the condo and I highly recommend it!

We loved our stay in Princeville at Jeff and Shana’s condo! The location was very convenient to the Princeville Shopping Center which we visited many times for groceries, restaurants and shops. The condo itself was very clean and spacious. We especially LOVED the gorgeous view outside of the lanai. Would highly recommend!

We just got back from our honeymoon, and really enjoyed staying in the condo. The place was clean, very large, and comfortable. Kitchen was stocked with all appliances/dishes you would need, and plenty of clean towels and blankets were provided. The view out of the living room was awesome and there was plenty of seating in the condo.

One note, there was no easy "direct" way to get to the ocean from the condo complex, as it is on a cliff.
It is very close to Queen's Bath (a short walk), and a few minutes drive to Hanalei's town center where lots of resturants and bars are located. Also very close to a large grocery store. Location of the condo was in a huge complex with lots of other condo complexes and gold courses around. Lots of families and older folks staying at the condos. There was plenty of parking right front of our unit.
Overall we loved our stay and would recommend this air b&b if you're looking to be near the Napali coast and Hanalei.

Thanks!
We felt very welcome the location was great Princeville was wonderful.  Everything was well stocked supply clean and ready to go .

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Jeff and Shana's condo in Princeville. It was exactly as described and pictured. It was comfortable, beautiful and wonderful to have a "living room" to spend time with family as opposed to a hotel with separate rooms.  They recommended a guidebook for Kauai which was invaluable.  We had a simple issue when arriving which Shana corrected immediately.  We highly recommend this condo and would definitely return.
Perfect spot for two couples. Great location. Had everything we needed.
Jeff & Shana were both very responsive. The condo was amazing and very affordable. Pictures were exactly what was offered. I would undoubtedly stay here again.

We loved this Princebille apt! 
It was exactly what we needed in the most beautiful neighbourhood.
The apartment itself was exceptionally well maintained and stocked; it had everything we could think of and even others at we didnt (washer/dryer + detergant!). 
I would 100% stay here again and will (have already) recomended it to my friends and family.

Jeff and Shana were very organized and very easy to rent from. The property was fantastic! The location is awesome! It's nice to have an ocean view in Princeville. 

A very good deal for a condo of this size. We would stay here again!
Spacious unit, which was perfect for two couples.  Every amenity has been provided!  Comfortable stay.  Thanks!

Great location and all the amenities for an awesome Hawaii vacation. The unit was very clean and the furnishings were perfect for the space. The condo was a great bargain and would definitely stay there again.
Jeff and Shana were very friendly and attentive. They provided all the info you would need, i really didnt need to ask them for much else!

We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay on Kaua'i! The north coast was beautiful, and we had an amazing view of it from our living room. The condo was exactly as described--very comfortable, clean and well-stocked. We shared it with a couple friend, and we had plenty of space for 4 people. The little details are so nice--like having the kitchen supplies needed to make our own drinks to enjoy on the balcony! Jeff and Shana were very easy to work with and had quick responses to all our questions. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone else!

Our stay at this lovely apartment was great. The apartment itself was a good size - I was there with just my boyfriend but it would have been plenty big enough for 4 people. The amenities were great, and Jeff and Shana were really responsive throughout the entire process, from booking to while we were there. The location was good with amazing views but you definitely need a car. There is a grocery store a 5 minute drive away, and you can get to Hanalei in about 15-20 mins. 

The highlight of this apartment was being able to have breakfast out on the balcony overlooking the beautiful valley below. Just lovely.

Thanks Jeff and Shana!

We loved the location. Having visited before we knew how awesome this part of Kauai is. The condo itself was lovely, clean and spacious, with wonderful views from every window and the lanai. Because it rained heavily for a good part of the time we were there we were able to appreciate the comfort of the condo even more than anticipated. The kitchen was well equipped and lovely to cook in. Communication with the host was professional, friendly and quick. Would recommend this place to anyone fortunate enough to visit this beautiful island.

Jeff and Shana's condo was fantastic. Located in a great spot in princeville it had everything you would want in an airbnb house and great ocean and mountain views. It was spacious, very clean, and comfortable - we would definitely come stay here again.
The place was beautiful and very clean

The condo was well situated and clean.  The pool/hot tub/kiddy pool was awesome. The beds were very comfortable and the floor plan was great for the four of us. Thanks for a great stay. What a beautiful part of the world.

Jeff and Shana were very responsive, and gave us detailed instructions on how to check-in,  check-out, and where to go to find things to do on Kauai.  The Condo has a great view of mountains, and is a short drive/walk from the Queen baths.  I would absolutely stay here again when in Kauai.
Amazing. Loved the condo and princeville. Great place for walking, panoramic views and beautiful beaches nearby. Condo spotless and clean.
Very nice and clean space. Lots of towels and Big kitchen. The place was Very comfortable and quiet. We have enjoyed our stay and we highly recommend this apartment. Thanks!

Very nice accommodations!  Wonderfully comfortable beds!  Well equipped kitchen with updated appliances!  Cabinetry a bit worn but certainly functional.  Lovely view of the mountains- balcony was a lovely place to have coffee or a glass of wine in the evening while viewing the sunset.  If you are not familiar with Princeville, arrive during daylight hours so that you can easily find your way to the condo.

Jeff and Shana's made our trip to Kauai even more special. The place is beautiful, clean and close by to many local spots including the state national park which is a must for hikers(Captain Cook Anyone?!?) 

We really enjoyed our time and miss the rooster's wake up calls. At night, you can still hearing the crashing waves from shore. 

This was the perfect location and Jeff and Shana were great hosts.

TEN STARS!

This place is a jackpot! Jeff & Shana have though of EVERYTHING. An easy access lockbox to get the keys, a full stocked home with all the kitchen, bathroom, and laundry basics. All you need to do is buy food! EVERYTHING else is there. The view is stunning from the balcony: a rainforest, mountains, birds, its phenomenal. And you're right next to the ocean! Their condo is like stepping into your friends house to house sit. The beds are extra comfortable, the place is so spacious and perfect. Two couples can easily have ample space here. There is plenty of parking, it's quiet but lovely with active people on the main roads in the subdivision. There is a golf course seconds away, you're right next to town which is less than five minutes by car. You're less than 10 minutes away from Hanalei Bay, Lumahai Beach, the bird sanctuary, and about 20 minutes from Ke'e Beach and the Kalalau Trail. 

Beach towels? Check. Beach chairs? Check.  Coolers for day trips, water bottles, laundry detergent, check check check. 

The hosts are very responsive but do not intrude on your vacation in any way. This place could not have been more perfect. 

Grocery store is around the corner. Restaurants too. Check out Walmart for good grocery deals. 

Ladies: There are swimsuit stores that are about 1000x better than anything I've ever seen on the continental US and they're 5 minutes away from the condo. "Scrunchie Butt" is THE style everyone is wearing. :) Don't be caught in the uncool bikini style I brought. :P Do yourself a favor and pick up a new amazing suit in Hanalei. 

Best trip ever. :) Thank you Shana & Jeff!!
Quiet location with wonderful views. Well stocked and ready for your Hawaiian adventures.
The apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable. Great views.Great location for golf.  Close to botanical gardens, zipline, short drive to hanalei and aninni beaches.
Beautiful condo on the North Shore of Kauai. The hosts were great with communication and accuracy of the booking description. I would recommend this to anyone!

Aloha Shana and Jeff,

You're hospitality has been outstanding! 
We can't thank you enough for accommodating us and fixing and unforeseen construction problem next door that were outside your control. 
We really appreciate all that you did for us to make our stay exceptional and very comfortable- far exceeding expectations.
We highly recommend your wonderful accommodation.

Thank you once again for making our holiday, coming  all the way from Australia a memorable experience.

Cheers Betsy and Brian

Jeff & Shana's place was at a wonderful spot in beautiful Kauai, close to one of the most beautiful beaches we have seen in our trip in Hawaii. 
Everything was great and up to expectation. What I would like to highlight is the attention and care Jeff & Shana show towards their guests. We've experienced this first hand, when we discovered that in the apartment below construction was ongoing which obviously was a noisy. Even before I was reaching out to Jeff & Shana, they already wrote us once they've learned about the construction site and offered us another apartment in the same compound. We gratefully accepted their offer and moved to the new place which was even an upgrade. We spent wonderful days in Kauai!
Staying at Jeff and Shana's condo was an amazing experience. Clean and quiet, it offered everything we could have wanted. I would definitely recommend it and , given the chance, I'd stay here again.

This is a great condo and location. The view was the most pleasant surprise, overlooking a wooded ravine and the distant craggy mountains. It was very quiet and peaceful, we had the windows open the whole time and had great breezes. The hosts could not have been more gracious or accommodating.

Beautiful place! Jeff and Shana were very accommodating when we arrived and found out the unit directly below this one was under construction. (It hadn't been started back when we booked it.) We were concerned about the noise, so Jeff and Shana gave us two other options for identical units we could stay in. The view wasn't the same but everything else was. It had everything we needed.

What an amazing place you have here! The sunset views are incredible. We loved waking up to the sounds of roosters crowing and birds chirping. The entire community is lovely. We especially appreciated the well-stocked kitchen and the supply room full of useful goodies such as coolers, chairs and boogie boards. It made our stay very enjoyable to have these conveniences.

Jeff & Shana's place was great! It was perfect for our stay, in a great resort, amazing sunset views, and close to Hanalei, which you have to visit. We did not have a chance to use the amenities (pools etc) but they were very close to their condo. We would definitely stay here again!

We had a great vacation staying at Jeff & Shana's place. It was conveniently located in Princeville so we could pick up groceries at the Foodland and just a short drive to Hanalei for lots of restaurants and shops. The condo was well furnished and the kitchen had everything we needed. The kitchen, dining and living area were nice and open and the view out the living room and patio was incredible. We saw rainbows almost everyday. The pool area was also really nice. We've stayed in several princeville condos and this has been our favorite!

Overall we enjoyed our 5-night stay here. Nice location, nice community pool, place was well maintained. Would have given it 5 stars but there were persistent tiny little ants in the kitchen and I really have a thing about ants. Fortunately no other bugs to speak of. We did get some construction noise on a couple of days when we wanted to take naps unfortunately, I missed an earlier review that mentioned it. It looked like they were going to be done soon though. Jeff and Shana were very responsive to requests to spot treat the ants and also fix a light bulb that had gone out. If they could fix that one issue I'd stay there again.

This home truly has an awesome view, we enjoyed just gazing out the windows!  It is a convenient location to the north shore, although we drove all over the island during our stay.  The condo was clean and we really appreciated the mini washer and dryer.  Lovely place, would be happy to stay again during our next visit!
Beautiful location, amazing view, very clean, relaxing, close to all north shore activities. All questions answered promptly. Thank you Jeff & Shana!
We enjoyed our visit. The condo was as described. The view from the condo is amazing. We would absolutely want to stay there again.
This place is perfect! The view, the surrounding.. everything was great. I would go back and recommend it anytime. It was our first trip to Kauai and it will not be our last.

Nice spot with amazing views from the deck and master bedroom. Princeville is a great location to explore the north shore and there were some great short walks from this unit to over look the ocean. The place had loads of rules and warnings posted so it didn't have a warm "home" feeling but we still enjoyed it.

Our stay at Jeff & Shana's place made our trip to Kauai such a memorable one. The condo is very spacious and well equipped with everything needed to function during a long getaway (beach towels and cooler for the beach, blender for smoothies, etc.). 

The location in North Shore made for breathtaking backdrops of the Napali coastline but unpredictable weather during the winter months! BBQ/grill facilities were excellent (two Webber grills near the pool area). 

Highly recommended this place for couples and families looking to experience Kauai like a true local.

Wonderful condo in Princeville. House was very clean, very airy, and quite spacious for two couples. 
Jeff and Shana were fast to respond and easy to work with.
Thank you for having us! This condo is an ideal location. The ocean and mountain views are unbeatable. The views are just as described! We loved our vacation and we can't wait to go back.

Balcony has a fantastic view and condo is well situated within the Princeville resort community.  However the kitchen and bathroom have quite a bit of wear and tear and are very much in need of updates.

The view of mountains and all the trees filled with bird songs, listening to the surf at night, sitting on the lanai and watching light and sky changes.  We enjoyed our stay very much.  Excellent location.  We had everything we needed.

This is a wonderful place for us to unwind after a hard day of travel. The balcony has a very beautiful view with a slice of ocean and expansive views of the valley and mountains.  While the condo might need a little updating,  it was very comfortable and well equipped. I would highly recommend anyone needing relaxation to stay here.

For those looking for a reasonably priced condo in Princeville, this is a great option. 

The condo overlooks a small forest / garden. We really enjoyed sitting on the balcony drinking coffee and listening to the birds in the morning.  The location is nice and quiet at night. 

Great location for exploring the North end of the island. The condo is less than 10-minutes from Hanalei Bay. 

Communication and check-in was fast and easy. We arrived on a late flight so it was nice to show up, get the key and settle in. 

The kitchen and bathroom are a bit dated but clean. Don’t expect granite countertops and a luxury tub but the condo is clean, spacious, well equipped and comfortable. 

Overall we would stay here again and would recommend the condo to others.
Jeff & Shana's place was lovely! Very clean, spacious, and with an incredible view. We had a fantastic stay and we will be coming back!
The Alii Kai complex is a gem! Jeff and Shana have excellent amenities for any guests to enjoy and highly recommended to anyone looking to enjoy the north shore of Kauai.
Good location and size.  I am glad it was a top unit.  Tv was valuable for down time.  Kitchen is well equipped.
As advertised, a wonderful clean condo well located in a convenient spot on Kauai’s north shore with involved and caring owners.

Super clean with so many windows! Constant breezes kept us cool and the balcony was a great spot to eat breakfast in the morning looking for rainbows and chickens in the backyard. It was great to have multiple bathrooms and the place has lots of useful things like beach chairs and a cooler. Definitely recommend!

Location was great, condo very clean and as described. The only issue was that there was a humming noise coming most likely from the downstairs' neighbor's ceiling fan at night - so we heard this in the bedroom. If you are sensitive to any man-made (low-frequency) noise  at night - like we are - then this could pose a problem. Otherwise, everything was wonderful - Jeff and Shana are very responsive hosts and really tried to make our stay comfortable (i.e. providing us with body boards the next morning after our request - as  we couldn't access the closet where they were supposed to be stored). It was relaxing to have breakfasts and dinners on the balcony - beautiful view!  We also left a beach umbrella/tent for the next guests in the condo.
Beautiful scenery, nice location, great amenities, lovely and spacious! Very satisfied! Thank you for a memorable stay!

We absolutely loved staying at this place. It had everything we needed and it was great for us to have a bathroom each. The place was spotless and the shared pool and spa and BBQ area were great. The apartment had a really homely feel to it and the view from the balcony was so beautiful both day and night. Some people have mentioned the kitchen was a little outdated - but it didn't bother us at all. We loved our stay here - so close to Hanalei too.

We loved staying in Jeff and Shana's place.  The location and view are wonderful.  The condo is located on a bluff with a view of Makana Mountain (Bali Hai) in the distance.  The condo is comfortable and well furnished.

The condo is super clean and spacious.  It is a lovely and comfortable place to stay.  The view from the balcony is beautiful and makes a great place to have coffee in the morning and plan your adventures for the day.
The view from the deck suprised me. I did not expect to have a view of the mountains, jungle, and the sunset. The home was very comfortable and was perfect for what we wanted in a place.
Wonderful place and great location and view! A home away from home. Would definitely stay here again.
Nice location, great sunset views from living room and lanai.  Clean and well furnished unit. The beds were a bit too soft for us.

On a scale from 1 to 10 we can evaluate this house with a 6.
The position is good inside a good and quiet resort.
The pictures of the listing are not recent so you’ll find it surely older than you can see in it especially the two bathrooms and the kitchen.
We reserved this apartment also for the BBQ but the two bbq of the resort are old, very dirty and bad used. Two fires on three don’t work (in both bbq) and you have to switch them by hand (very dangerous). The bbq tools are very dirty and you have to wash them before use.
The overall value was not the one we expected.
In any case Mahalo
A beautiful location on the North Shore with quality amenities to make you feel just like you’re at home!

El departamento es increible, super accesible a todo, en un area muy linda y literal al lado de hoteles carisimos y por un súper precio, tenia todo y mas de lo que se necesitaba, estuvo super limpio, y fue muy fácil solo entrar y salir de el departamento, la
Comunicación fue muy buena y volveria con muchísimo gusto
Great tropical view. Kitchen needs a serious update. Mattresses need replacing. Pool area is very clean and the grounds are very well kept.

name: 1 Bedroom Great Location and Views
summary: Charming apartment in a great CBD location within walking distance of everything, including public transport to the airport, beaches and mountains. Superb views from every room, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with bathtub and pool on roof top.
description: Charming apartment in a great CBD location within walking distance of everything, including public transport to the airport, beaches and mountains. Superb views from every room, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with bathtub and pool on roof top. Check in and out times are flexible. It may be possible to check in earlier and/or check out later, please enquire to make a suitable arrangement. In order to maximise arrival time flexibility the access card can be picked up from a near by shop, a $5 collection fee will apply. Guests have access to swimming pool and viewing deck on roof top. Instructions will be provided to pick up access card from local store, giving maximum flexibility to guests with regards to arrival / check-in times. 200 mts from Town Hall station. The apartment may accommodate a third guest if they are happy to sleep on the sofa in the living room. The sofa is approximately the size of a single bed when the cushions are removed. Extra linen, doona and pillow will be prov
notes: The apartment may accommodate a third guest if they are happy to sleep on the sofa in the living room. The sofa is approximately the size of a single bed when the cushions are removed. Extra linen, doona and pillow will be provided. Also note that this apartment is in a very central city location, which involves a level of noise to be expected from such a location, like traffic and sirens.
transit: 200 mts from Town Hall station.
access: Check in and out times are flexible. It may be possible to check in earlier and/or check out later, please enquire to make a suitable arrangement. In order to maximise arrival time flexibility the access card can be picked up from a near by shop, a $5 collection fee will apply. Guests have access to swimming pool and viewing deck on roof top.
interaction: Instructions will be provided to pick up access card from local store, giving maximum flexibility to guests with regards to arrival / check-in times.
house_rules: Smoking is not permitted in the apartment and anywhere in the building, except the roof top. Pets are not permitted.  Guests must not create noise which is offensive to occupiers of neighbouring apartments, especially between 10pm - 8am. Parties are not permitted at the apartment. Guests may receive a maximum of 4 visitors at any one time and must ensure they are aware of and comply with the House Rules. Only the guests nominated and agreed in the Booking may stay in the apartment overnight.   Guests are to dispose of garbage and recycling in the provided bins, refer to the House Guide for details. Guest must not remain in the building lobby for extended periods of time and must take care that their luggage does not obstruct the passage for other residents. Whenever leaving the apartment, please close all windows and door to maintain security and prevent rain and water damage.  Guests are responsible for damage, breakages, theft and loss of the Property and any part of it during their

reviews.comments: We enjoyed a five night stay in Sydney at this apartment.  The view is an amazing outlook over Hyde Park and the harbour as pictured.  It was wonderful to wake up to that view each morning. The location was great for exploring the city on foot and with public transport as buses and trains are close by, as are the iconic Sydney attractions and delicious restaurants and wine bars.  Hugo was great at communicating check in details and left a handy apartment guide with apartment and city info.  We really enjoyed our stay and would stay here again if back in Sydney.

10/10. Fantastic apartment located right in the center of Sydney. Amazing views, full service amenities plus more, close to absolutely everything. Hugo was easy to deal with, welcoming, friendly, and very helpful. The listing details and photos are very accurate. The views of Hyde Park, Royal Botanical Gardens and the Sydney Harbour are lovely. The apartment was extremely clean and well kept; it had a cosy, warm, homestyle type of feel. A very refreshing place to retreat to after a day out. I found it much more private and comfortable compared to normal Sydney hotels and apartments. After staying for a few days I almost didn't want to go home. I'd highly recommend this apartment listing to anyone wishing to stay in Sydney whether it's your first time and you want to see all the tourist locations or even if you travel to Sydney regularly and just want a great place to check in to, like a home away from home. I'll definitely look at staying here again on my next trip to Sydney. Thankyou Hugu, your hosting is very much appreciated.

Excellent location in the heart of Sydney. Great view private view of the harbour from the 34th floor. As 1st time visitors we had the prefect base for exploring the city. Detailed sign in instructions and Hugo was easy to reach ...though assistance was not needed as everything was as presented. Have no hesitation recommending as a good value. There is a Woolworths a block away to pick up any supplies.

An apartment with stunning views within easy reach of Darling Harbour, Circular key and the main shopping areas. Close to train stations and local buses. The apartment was clean and tidy with everything you need for a short break. The only downside for us was how noisy it could be from the street level through the night, considering you were 34 floors up. The whole building was very quiet internally.
Great location with outstanding view of Sydney.i could sit in apartment and just look out the window all day.bathroom and kitchen alittle cramped but workable.Loved the place Hugo.

Lovely apartment in a very convenient part of Sydney. Five minutes from the Town Hall and QVB and about 20 minutes from Circular Quay. Lots of food and drink outlets in the immediate vicinity.  The apartment was clean and well equipped with amazing views over the harbour and Botanic Gardens. Hugo's instructions for getting in and using the apartment were clear and helpful. Bonus is the roof top terrace and swimming pool, which unfortunately we didn't have time to use!  Many thanks Hugo and Pamela

Had a great 4 night stay at Hugo and Pamela's apartment. The description and photos are accurate and the view is just as amazing as it looks. The check in process was simple and Hugo checked to make sure everything was fine once we arrived. The location is perfect, multiple train stations nearby and buses right outside. I'd recommend this apartment to anyone and would stay again if in Sydney.
l'appartement ressemble aux photos sur le site, très bien situé en centre ville très calme et propre; je recommande vivement l'appartement de Hugo et Pamela

Hugo and Pamela's apartment is in a great location to visit all of Sydney. Public transport is very close 1/2 - 1 block depending where you are going. If you want to walk to Sydney Harbor, it is less than a mile, but we hopped on the bus each way because it is so convenient and affordable. 
Hugo will contact you a couple of days prior and explain how to access the apt. He gives very clear directions, easy to follow. He also has everything you need to know about the apt. written out in a binder, which we referenced a few times.
We loved the big windows with the view of the harbor. There's great air flow once the windows are all opened, so no worries about not having AC.
We had a great stay, and I would definitely recommend Pamela and Hugo's place.

Thank you for all your assistance in making us feel so welcome at your apartment.  It was truly wonderful waking up and going to sleep with the view which is ever changing.  The position of your apartment is sensational which Hyde Park across the road, trains and buses so very close and main downtown shopping a 5 minute walk.  All in all a great spot to stay.  Thank you.

Hugo was super helpful upon arrival and responded promptly to any questions. He was always kind and polite in communications.

Instructions were clear to retrieve the key to the apartment and getting around in the building. The view is exactly as shown in the pictures. The apartment is equipped with everything needed in the kitchen (pots, pans, toaster, cooking oil, salt, pepper, even a hand blender). Location is right downtown, 45 second walk to Hyde Park, 5 minute walk to the cathedral and 10-12 minutes to the Royal Botanical Gardens which leads to the famous Sydney Opera. We didn't even need a transit card to get around the city, we were able to walk everywhere. The view is fantastic, the location is great if a bit noisy because it is downtown and there is a lot of traffic, but I would definitely stay here again!

Eagles Nest was perfect for our stay with wonderful views in a great location. The apartment was clean, well appointed and comfortable. Communication with host was easy and helpful. We would love to stay there again.

Hugo was unfailingly polite on the phone as I homed in on the property without being able to access his impeccable directions. The view from floor 34 is as good as you could get. The apartment was just the job for accessing all parts of the Sydney area and I was very grateful for the basic provisions in the fridge. Lots of facilities nearby.

We had a wonderful stay here! The location vouldn't be more perfect, especially for people like us that like to walk everywhere to make a weekend trip feel as much as holiday as possible. And the view! Wow!

Hugo and Pamela's place was incredible. The location is excellent and the place was clean when we arrived. Hugo was very friendly and made this trip stress-free. There was also a guide explaining what's nearby in the area, which really helped when we needed some tips from a local for sightseeing and the best places to buy necessities.

The view from every room was breathtaking -- the pictures really don't express how amazing it is to look out over Hyde Park.

I would definitely stay here again and will be recommending Eagle's Nest to friends.
I enjoyed three nights at this flat. It's located very well, walking distance from public transit (< 20C). Pick up of key was easy, as was wifi and use of the apartment.
Good location, beautiful city view!

We spent à nice stay in Hugo and Pamela's apartment. The apartment well located was comfortable and pleasant with a beautiful view. The host Hugo was very attentive to all our questions and our well being during the stay and very available when needed. Thanks a lot Hugo !!

Location, location, location! The apartment is in a central part of the city so you can walk practically everywhere! Pictures were exactly as shown (with an amazing view) and Hugo was a great host. He allowed me to check-in early, which was great since my flight got in at 6am! Hugo met me at the apartment when I arrived and showed me around the unit plus gave me tips on what to see and do while in Sydney since it was my first time visiting. The place was tidy and extrmemely clean. I would highly recommend this place and if I do ever come back to Sydney, this is where I will stay.
모든게 완벽한 숙소였습니다. 위치가 정말 좋았고 뷰도 아름다웠습니다. 깔끔한 인테리어와 편안한 잠자리, 그리고 주방에 필요한건 거의다 갖춰져있어서 식사를 챙겨 먹기에 부족함이 없었습니다. 체크인아웃도 편리했습니다. 최고의 숙소였습니다.

We loved our stay at Pamela and Hugo's. The apartment is in a great location, very close to several train stops and is a short walk to some of the best parts of the city. The apartment was spacious and clean, and had amazing views. Hugo was a fantastic host, very quick to respond to questions and was very accommodating and flexible in our arrival and departure. He even left us beer in the fridge! We would gladly stay here the next time we are in Sydney.

i really enjoyed 4 nights in Sydney and in Hugo's apt! Fantastic view through window that we can see sea and Hyde Park and Sydney Tower. Hugo is very kind who answered our message even in the evening. The apt has a really good location, 200m from Town Hall, 100m from Woolworths and Chemist Warehouse, just in the very Sydney CBD. We walked to anywhere. Thank you Hugo and if I have another journey to Sydney, I will first choose your comfortable apt to sleep.
Really brilliant location and fantastic views. perfect as a base. we ate out most of the time but we could easily have eaten in.

Neighborhood was great! Right in the middle of everything, close to transportation, taxis, great restaurants, shopping, and very walkable. The view from the apartment was fantastic!! There were a couple of glitches at the beginning of the stay, but Hugo was very responsive and diligent, and everything was resolved in no time at all. Apartment was comfortable, we'll definitely try to book it again when we're able to return to beautiful Sydney!

What an excellent stay! The views from the apartment are stunning and the location couldn't be more central. Really easy to get to from the airport and an excellent base for exploring Sydney. Great communication from Hugo before we arrived with areanging early check in and late depaeture, and during our stay when i managed to (temporarily) misplace the key card... thanks for your help Hugo and sorry for the inconvenience!

Location can't be beat for ease of walking the town, shopping & restaurants. 
Comfortable bed; a small but fully equipped kitchen & spectacular view. 
Expect city noises.

We loved our stay in Pamela and Hugo's inner-city apartment! The views from the apartment are amazing and the location is unbeatable. It's close to public transport and walking distance to the iconic sites that Sydney has to offer! Communication prior to arrival and during our stay was clear and concise.
Highly recommended!
Great location to get around Sydney CBD as well access to public transport, restaurants etc.
Apartment was advertised.  The instructions were very easy to follow. Unbeatable location .

Centrally located close to Town Hall Station, this place is my new favorite in Sydney. The views.were.absolutely.amazing.mind blowing. 
The TV was left off, there is enough entertainment sitting in the couch looking out the big windows in front. This apartment has everything what you need for a convenient stay. I will definitely book again!
If you drive with your own car to Sydney, the best carpark would be the one in Sussex street (Wilson)- 20 dollars a day for a bay

This apartment has a fabulous view and is very centrally located between Town Hall and Museum stations and close to a large supermarket at TH station.  The host was very helpful and available to assist if needed. The apartment is compact but with a range of facilities, including really good internet connection which was much appreciated.  There was traffic noise even on 34th floor with the windows closed, but it did not stop us  getting a sound sleep.   We were there during a heatwave, and one night was quite hot.  Otherwise, the cross breeze at night cooled the apartment and we were mostly out during the day.  The bed was comfortable.   We only had one access card to the building which at times was limiting if we wanted to go out separately.   A great place to stay and the view made up for the minor inconveniences such as traffic noise.
The apartment is completely and usable furnished. Its location near town hall ist perfect to visit Sydney.
Great apartment, great location. Easy to get anywhere by foot or public transport. Incredible view from room or rooftop pool. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Lovely cozy place. perfect location. easy to go famous places. hosts are also very kind. thank you for having me good memory.

Hugo and Pamela went out of their way to help us. Hugo went to the apartment to meet us so we could park our car and unload our luggage before returning the rental car to the airport so we didn't have to drag it through the city. They also let us stay on the day of check out in the apartment longer since we had a late flight. 
The view of the city is beautiful and the apartment is located close to all transportation. It is very basic, clean apartment conveniently located. They even provided milk and a bottle of water in the refrigerator to get you started. Nice flat screen TV in family room with excellent sound system.

Thanks to Pamela and Hugo for being a great host! We arrived a few hours earlier after a long journey from Canada. Pamela and Hugo managed to get us in right away. The place has great view of the Royal Botanic Garden area and the ocean. It is very clean and safe. Pamela and Hugo provide a lot of stuff, including tea, milk, and etc. for guests to do simple cooking, to keep clean, and to enjoy the life in Sydney! The location is really central, 2 minutes walk to Town Hall Station, Woolworths supermarket, Queen Victoria Building; and only 25 minutes walk to the Opera House; very convenient to tourists. We love the host and the place!
Good location. Better then I spect

The house is very good.and it is close to all the scenic spots.The view is great and the entrance is safe.There's everything you need in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) owner is patient and careful.This is a very good choice if you choose a free trip.
非常愉快的旅行,房子可以看到海德公园,景色很好,楼下有便利店非常方便,距离悉尼的景点也可以走路到达,距离超市也很近,推荐
Fantastic views, great location, very comfortable
the apartment is soooo great. Near to every place. We can go anywhere on foot. Besides, the scenery outside the window is so fabulous. I love this place.

We loved the soft seat in front of the fabulous views of Sydney through huge windows. The rest of the apartment - bed, bath, kitchen etc were so comfortable. Hugo & Pamela provided great directions, communication and welcome. We'll be back!

Everything about our experience was first class.  Traffic noise at night or through the day if you wanted the windows open was an issue but was easily forgotten with the fabulous location and views.  Highly recommend this host and apartment.

Everything it promises and more. The views are incredible, the apartment is immaculate. So walkable - 10 minutes from everywhere (25 to Mrs Macs chair), depending how fast you walk, obviously.
Pamela & Hugo have presented a lovely apartment, with perfectly sized furniture to make it comfortable without being crowded. The full kitchen was amazing to have access to as someone with dietary restrictions. Being 2 blocks from a full supermarket made life so easy.
Our only almost-negative was the neighbour playing super loud music when we got in at 10pm, but the doors are incredible noise barriers, and once indoors, the ambient road noise covered it.
The views are amazing. The public transport in the immediate vicinity life changing. If we lived in Sydney, this is where we would want to be.
Great compact unit in the heart of the cbd. really close to all the shops and harbour or Oxford street. The apartment has every thing you would need for a short stay and a great view

Hugo was a great host, very flexible with check-out and readily available by text to answer questions.  The apartment location is ideal for exploring the entire city; it's an easy walk to shopping, the ferries at circular quay, the opera house, the botanic garden as well as to great restaurants in CBD/Hyde Park as well as Surry Hills.

The big window with incredibally harbor view of Sydney is really amazing. For cooking lover, this will be your first choice. Pamela & Hugo's apartment kitchen is not that big, but it does equipment almost EVERYTHING  you need.(including aboundant seasoning stuff) You just need to buy fresh ingredient from the 1 min. walking distance Woolworth supermarket.  narrow street, high raise building and the frequent road noise from police car and fire truck make this area very similar like NYC Manhattan. The excellent location makes our one week discovery in Sydney all done by foot without the OPAL card.  so highly recommend Pamela & Hugo's lovely , cozy apartment.

We booked Hugo' s apartment for the view and it certainly didn't disappoint. Fabulous views over Hyde Park and St Mary's Cathedral out to the Harbour.

The apartment is compact but well appointed and complete. It is clean and well maintained.

Communication with Hugo was excellent throughout and when our travel plans got thrown into disarray, he graciously helped us out.

Location, location and great view!
All perfect

The view from this apartment is just stunning! The location is perfectly central in the city-very easy to get everywhere! There is well stocked cupboards with all of the essentials which was such a welcome relief after arriving from a long flight! Hugo is a fabulous host with great communication! I couldn't recommend this apartment more highly! Thank you Hugo!

Appartement correspondant en tous points à l'annonce. Très commodément situé en plein centre à proximité des principales attractions, commerces et transports publics. Petit mais bien organisé; très belle vue. Hôte très efficace et réactif. Très bon choix!
Awesome view, great communication, and the location is perfect for tourist activities.
Great view and location

Absolutely wonderful apartment in a perfect location! We had a fantastic stay in the Eagle's Nest and Hugo was so accommodating with checking in/out times. It's a lovely apartment with breathtaking views and walkable to all the sights. If we're in ever in Sydney again we'll definitely be back.

As central as you can be really, 5 minutes from central locations and easily accessible. Would definitely recommend staying here— Hugo and Pamela were quick responders via messaging and, upon arrival, everything was as promised!

I had the most wonderful stay in Pamela and Hugo’s unit.  Everything was perfect and the location is incredible!  I had friends staying in an executive sweet at the Hilton (just around the corner) and the view from Pamela and Hugo’s unit was much better!!  I would rate my stay 10/10.

The Apartment is clean neat, exactly match with the photo. and the view from living room is so beautiful~ but in the evening there is a little bit noise. And the location is very inconvenience!!!! close to Museum Station ( the train to airport ), walk to Darling Harbor 10mins, china town 10 mins, circular quay 20mins.
Great views of Sydney and the hosts were so responsive to our requests to arrive early
The convenient location, extraordinary views and excellent communication with the hosts made our stay in Sydney fantastic. Definitely recommend this apartment!

This is a fabulous place if you get the chance to visit Syndey.  The location is fabulous, Pamela and Hugo communicated with us quickly and were very helpful and the apartment was exactly liked it looked in the pictures.  The views are terrific!!

Great place and excellent position in the centre of Sydney.
BAthroom is on the small size, but otherwise flat is excellent.
Amazing communication with Hugo and easy to arrange different times to check in/leave.
Would recommend +++
Just do it, stop looking and do what you have to do

'' Eagle's Nest " is the perfect name for such a great position in central Sydney. The views to die for and so handy to bus ,train and a 20 minutes walk through the gardens to Circular Quay. The best shopping in Sydney QVB and David (Website hidden by Airbnb)  perhaps too close ! Handy supermarket n an attractive pool on the roof . Very kind generous host and hostess.
Fantastic location for the shops, sight seeing, trips and restaurants.  Lovely little apartment with fantastic views and thoughtful little touches. Will certainly return next time I visit Sydney.
Great location. Very helpful and communicative hosts.

What an awesome place. View. Location. Just perfect.  Hugo and Pam excel in their service to their guests. From communication and directions to on the spot support for any unforseen help needed. They were great. Steve Jackson
We really enjoyed our stay. Amazing views all the way out to the ocean. Pamela and Hugo were very quick to respond and very accomodating when it came to checking in early.

Pamela & Hugo's place has a spectacular view of the harbor and downtown. They gave us good suggestions about the local area. A great location to explore Sydney CBD. The apartment features a good living space for guests. I would pick this place again if I go back anytime in the future.
A very well equipped flat in a brilliant location close to public transport, shops and all the sights!  We very much hope to return!

The place was in an awesome location with a fantastic view. Working TV and Wifi were great. It was a little smaller than I expected and had no AC. But I was out of the apt most of the time so it didn't matter too much. Overall a pretty good experience for my short time in Sydney.
Highly recommended !!!
Wir hatten eine super Zeit in Sydney, das Apartment hat eine großartige Aussicht und liegt perfekt, so dass man wenn man will alles zu Fuß erreichen kann.

Great little apartment right in the heart of Sydney CBD. The most incredible awesome views of Sydney and the Harbour. Easy stress free booking with great communication providing great directions and instructions. Look forward to hopefully staying again in the future.  Thanks so much.
Excellent downtown location, beautiful view, apartment well stocked, highly recommended
Was a great apartment, modern and clean in an amazing location. Would definitely recommend

Pamela and Hugo's apartment has a fantastic location, right next to Hyde Park, close to stations Town Hall and Museum, near the supermarket, shops and restaurants. It is comfortably furnished, has a comfy bed and great TV. The kitchen, although functional, could possibly be updated to modern standards I think. But it has fantastic views over Hyde Park and part of Sydney Harbour.
非常棒的地理位置,窗外就是海德公园｡房东很贴心,消息回复很及时｡非常棒的入住,强烈推荐!

Very well located, tidy apartment, with great views.  Apartment is surrounded by good restaurants, coffee shops and a local supermarket. but offers a neat fully equipped kitchen if you prefer to cook your own meals.   Apartment has access to rooftop pool and sun deck.   Air con would have been delightful, but ceiling fans and window coverings kept the heat at comfortable temperature.

My partner and I stayed at this apartment for 4 nights in April, and we absolutely recommend it. If you're looking for a very central place with really breathtaking views, this is a no-brainer. It's a great size for two people, and we could walk to all main Sydney attractions. We cooked some of our meals with no issues. Light sleepers, be mindful that this apartment is at the heart of the city, so there is traffic noise. Communication with Hugo was great, and we're very thankful for the early check-in. In sum, we came in with high expectations, and they were exceeded. Thanks to the hosts!

A prime location between public transport and shops. Great host who replied instantly to any questions! Only slight complaint was the dated bathroom and kitchen. But the beautiful views from the apartment more than made up for it.

We enjoyed our four night stay, thanks to Pamela and Hugo, having everything we needed and of course we loved the great views and location. Check-in was easy due to Hugo’s clear instructions. Yes there’s some traffic noise being mid-city but earplugs at night helped and it didn’t worry us much at all. We would stay again. Highly recommended.
Excellent rapport qualité prix pour ce logement très agréable malgré le bruit. Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine.
Fabulous apartment! Great views, super comfy bed, deep bathtub, excellent central location. Very detailed instructions and fast response and support from Hugo. Highly recommended.
Unit as described. Great location. Amazing views.
Good experience!

Noise, random, loud, at all times of the day or night from the street below. Sirens, trucks, motorcycles, vehicle horns, crowds... If you don't need to sleep or have very poor hearing, the location is great.
Excellent apartment in the heart of the city. Exceeded expectations as clean, tidy and good value for money.

Such a great location and the photos don't do the fabulous view justice. Positive prompt hosting and a good folio of info and tips on site. This is an excellent value, convenient apartment for a Sydney stay.

The place is exactly as described and has a great view. The building is a little dated but it has a laundry and pool. it is central to everything and their are lots of good restaurants and cafes around. I particularly liked the coffee shop downstairs and fix wine bar down the road on Elizabeth st.  All in a good stay.

Great apartment to stay in if you are in Sydney! Perfect location, comfy couch, nice shower, very comfortable bed and stunning views. Hugo and Pamela are great hosts. They inform you well and respond quickly on messages. Check in is easy.

Pamela and Hugo have an amazing apartment here. I was visiting for a conference at Sydney ICC and this was the perfect home base. It's walking distance to the conference center, opera house, botanical gardens. The large windows make the views incredible. Street noise was minimal and we slept very well in the comfortable bed.

The location is very central, and the views are indeed fantastic. The building and fixtures are showing their age a bit, but everything was fully functional. Amenities like binoculars, umbrella, and travel outlet converters are a nice touch. Hugo was very communicative and accommodating with regard to check in/out. The apartment is over 30 floors up, but sound still carries from the busy streets below. If you need somewhere quiet, I recommend staying in a quieter neighborhood outside of the CBD. If you can handle some city hustle and bustle, though, this spot is great!
Perfect for a stay in the city. Everything you need and in a fabulous  location. Hosts were great
真的像自己家一样,设备全,特别是厨房用品,适合家庭出行｡位置也好,旁边就是大超市和公交站｡房东给的游玩等建议也很棒,写在入住的小册子里｡最主要是窗外风景,每天早上对着这样的景色吃早餐,太舒服了,不想走｡

Hugo was a super host! His apartment had spectacular views and was in a very central and convenient location. Near Townhall train station and a local supermarket. Very much appreciated Hugo’s thoughtfulness with local tips and sites to see and always had quick responses.
Central, great view, clear instructions, easy check in. Highly recommended.

Reception 24h. Security 24h. Discount does apply for 7 nights and more. Meet business standard ! Ideal stay for rest. For someone looking for: business / beach / culture / shopping. neighborhood_overview: Barra da Tijuca is a great choice for travellers interested in Sand Beaches, Beach and Nature.  Barra da Tijuca is the biggest sand beach (15km) of Rio de Janeiro and one of the hottest neighborhoods in Rio de Janeiro, if not the hottest. Located approximately ten miles west of Copacabana, Barra, as the locals call their home, is a Brazilian beach neighborhood that has a decidedly American feel. If you want to meet native people go directly to barra da tijuca beach, on which tourist could be sometimes a rare treasure. Spending time at the beach and seeing what the local restaurants have to offer are just two of the options for things to do in Barra. This is also an excellent shopping destination. On a Barra da Tijuca shopping spree, you can hit the largest shopping mall in Latin America, visit any number of smaller shopping malls, and check out the goods at a variety of upscale boutiques or specialty stores. The main mall in town is known as BarraShopping. This Barra da Tijuca shopping
notes: NOT adapted for kids. Identity card requested before checking. Breakfast is not included. Toilet case not fornished. Including cleaning, each 7 full nights BUT NOT laundry. Washing machine available. Cameras in corridors. The door of the flat account number of people accessing it. Ask availability of a parking BEFORE booking. Have a cool stay !
transit: Free parking possible for 1 vehicle within the building BUT you need to ask availability BEFORE booking. 29 km from Tom Jobim International Airport.  15' from the flat to Olympics Pavilhão center by bus. Options numbers 332 or 613. Accessible by car/taxi (Way takes 1 hour) You can reach the flat by public transport from the airport (train).  It takes 40 minutes.  Take the BRT at galeao airport to barra da tijuca. Exit at Alvorada station and take an other BRT to "Madureira Parador" direction. Exit at Pedro Correia. The flat is located in the building knowed by Promenade. It is 5 minutes walking from Pedro Correia stop. For security comfortable reasons, we do not recommend guest coming from the central bus station or the airport to reach our flat by bus. It can takes too long. You must change up to 4 times and it maybe not safe. Far way 20 minutes driving distance from the barra da tijuca beach. 5.5 km from Rio Centro Convention Centre. 23.5 km from Maracanã Stadium and 29 km from Tom J
access: Access to the whole studio, including all facilities offered by the building.
interaction: Possible by email and by phone, if necessary. The flat is our second residence in Brazil , we are often out. I can not unfortunately welcome our guest personally BUT we have reception 24h. We speak Portuguese, French and  English. We offer chekin and chek out at any time for your best convenience.
house_rules: 1) Smoking only  in the veranda.   2) Pets and smoking are not allowed.  3)PLEASE turn off air conditioner when you go out. 4) One cleaning per week included in the price, if you book for a whole week (7 nights), or more. Extra cleaning during a stay lesser than 7 nights, is under your charge! If you need extra cleaning we must know it to book for you. Be aware that ONLY the personal from the governance of the building are allowed to clean the flat.  FYI the flat is equipped with a washing machine and cleaning products. You will pay the flat  in EUR € currency. Possibility to pay in US $ or local currency (R$). For that request the exchange rate.

host.host_about:
We are a family with two beautiful children.
We are working within humanitarian aid and doing many missions in the world ... We have a lot of stories to tell but also in perspective . We love to travel !!! Love the atmosphere of airports, train stations ... specially with children,  but we do not appreciate hotels any more ! 

You are welcome to our stays, if you respect it as you respect yours.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
The owner was very attention,really.If I need something he really help me as soon as possible.
This is absolutelly nice apartment-studio,
everything beautiful and comfortable.
The location nice too.
I may recommend stay here for everybody.
If you come here,you will be happy,I am sure!
Excelente! Limpeza, localização e ótima comunicação com o proprietário. Recomendo a todos.
The host canceled this reservation 114 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Quarto muito espaçoso, completo e novo. O proprietário muito gentil, proativo, atencioso e receptivo.
Lugar aconchegante e com vista bonita. Tudo muito bem limpo e arrumado. Davi sempre muito atencioso e educado.

name: 1 bdr w Private balcony Fort Greene!
summary: Spacious apartment w 1 bedroom in shared 2bdr apartment. Will be residing with my roommate who is very kind, quiet, and considerate.  Lots of restaurants and bars in area, one block away from Fort Greene park, located in a tree lined gorgeous neighborhood. 5 mins away from many subway stations and only 1 stop away from Manhattan!
space: The room is private however the kitchen, bathroom, living room, and balcony area are shared.
description: Spacious apartment w 1 bedroom in shared 2bdr apartment. Will be residing with my roommate who is very kind, quiet, and considerate.  Lots of restaurants and bars in area, one block away from Fort Greene park, located in a tree lined gorgeous neighborhood. 5 mins away from many subway stations and only 1 stop away from Manhattan! The room is private however the kitchen, bathroom, living room, and balcony area are shared.

reviews.comments: We stayed at Leigha's place for a couple of days and had a really good time there. Leigha was not at home so we slept in her room. Her flatmate, Lea, was there and very hospitable, helpful, friendly and fun talking too. She made our stay even more pleasant. The flat and room are clean and the location close to Fort Green in Brooklyn is very central and thus perfect to visit NYC. We got Citi bikes ( 12$ a day) and could reach Brooklyn Bridge in a just few minutes by bike. Thank you for having us! Sarah & Marius :)
Cute clean apartment as described, host was super friendly and helpful, made us feel at home - great value for the area.

Leigha’s place is a cute, cozy little spot in Brooklyn that’s super close to Manhattan. There were quite a few restaurants that were walking distance from the place. Check in was also really easy, and her roommate is really cool as well. Overall, really happy we booked this place!

name: Go2oporto @Ribeira do Porto 1
summary: Feel the standards of high comfort and functionality, while feeling the lives that accumulate on the walls of this city, in this recently renovated rustic apartment located on a street with more than seven centuries of history and overlooking the Douro River. It is an ideal solution for your leisure trip. Info note: The late check-in has a fee of 30€ and may include pick up service with key delivery - Please contact property for late arrival.
space: Recently renovated, this rustic, very spacious apartment, using vintage elements, offers high standards of comfort and functionality, and a fabulous view of the Douro River. It is located on a street with more than seven centuries of history and although its appearance has changed over 500 years, 250 years ago it maintains its final style, the restoration works being done in a way that respects history, preserving the Typical architecture and the charming style of the Ribeira buildings, classified as a Unesco world heritage site. Right in the heart of Porto's historical center, a world heritage site, the stones of its walls are witnesses of more than 700 years of history! You can park your car at a special price at SABA - Ribeira Parking, thanks to the existing commercial agreement with Go2oporto. In this area you can enjoy breakfast in one of the several cafés and summer terraces along the river Douro, while a street artist fills Description with music. Of great daytime and nightlife,

host.host_about: We are a local company that works in the Apartment rental business. In these 5 years we have received people from all over the world, and it is with love that we have hosted them in Oporto and have shown the beauties of our amazing city by the river.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Wanneer we aankwamen in Porto kregen we een vlotte ontvangst.

We kregen een rondleiding in het appartement en kregen een karafje porto te beschikking om te consumeren.

Verder kregen we van de verhuurder ook nog alle nuttige info mee zoals plaatsjes waar je lekker kan eten en wat de moeite waard is om te bezoeken in Porto en wat je beter links laat liggen.

Het perfecte onthaal.

Het appartement is prachtig, het is groot voor de prijs die je moet betalen aangezien de schitterende locatie ( aan de rivier) en het prachtige uitzicht.

Dit was mijn eerste Airbnb ervaring, een eerste ervaring die zeker kon tellen. niets op de service aan te merken alles was er.

O apartamento é fantástico, ideal para um casal, com uma vista deslumbrante do Rio Douro. O pessoal do Go2oporto foi super prestativo, auxiliando-nos ao longo de toda a nossa hospedagem. Ótima localização. Recomendo.
Excellent accueil. Super vue. Idéalement placé. Parfait pour une escapade à 2...
Fantastic view and great location for exploring Porto.
ABSOLUTELY PERFECT.
Well appointed apartment within walking distance to great restaurants and sights.

name: Modern E. Village 2BR w/Roof Deck
space: Great apartment in the heart of the East Village furnished with internet, 42" flat-screen TV, dishwasher, washer/dryer, modern kitchen & bathroom, full set of cookware, premium cutlery and dishes, hardwood floors, 12' ceilings and exposed brick throughout. AND...a roof deck! The deck is a dedicated section of the building roof just for my apartment and that has a table, chairs, umbrella and BBQ with views of the Empire State Building and the Freedom Tower. I have also recently added (not in photos) cushioned lounge chairs that are perfect for relaxing in the sun. Sightsee in the morning, tan in the afternoon. Location is perfectly located a block from the subway and within a five minute walk of roughly 100 bars and restaurants. Recently ranked 37th best restaurant in the world, Momofuku Ssam Bar, is a 3 minute walk. I'm more than happy to make many bar and restaurant recommendations or suggest sightseeing activities. Apartment is up five flights of stairs, so unfortunately it's not han
description: Great apartment in the heart of the East Village furnished with internet, 42" flat-screen TV, dishwasher, washer/dryer, modern kitchen & bathroom, full set of cookware, premium cutlery and dishes, hardwood floors, 12' ceilings and exposed brick throughout. AND...a roof deck! The deck is a dedicated section of the building roof just for my apartment and that has a table, chairs, umbrella and BBQ with views of the Empire State Building and the Freedom Tower. I have also recently added (not in photos) cushioned lounge chairs that are perfect for relaxing in the sun. Sightsee in the morning, tan in the afternoon.
