neighborhood_overview: The home is located steps away from spectacular Ke Iki Beach. It is also about two minutes from the best market and coffee/tea shop on the north shore. Just down the road are multiple famous beaches and surf spots such as Waimea Bay and Sunset Beach. Around the corner is Sharks Cove, where the best snorkeling and tide pools are found on the North Shore, and the Banzai skate park is just across the street.
notes: The state of Hawaii requires that all short term renters pay both the GET and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax) on rent and fees, a total of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %. The Airbnb platform does not currently give us the ability to itemize and charge these taxes accurately. We are in contact with Airbnb regarding this, and hope to have the issue fixed soon. In the meantime, after making a reservation all guests will be sent a separate e-contract with house rules, and will be required to pay the taxes using a major credit card. We will not ask for or accept checks/cash. We collect tax only, Airbnb collects all other rent and fees. # W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Local Contact: Hawaii Beach Homes *We typically require a 4-10 night minimum for advance reservations.  In the event of last-minute availability, we can accommodate reservations for 2-4 nights.*
transit: Public Transportation is possible and a bus stop is located just up the block, but we highly recommend a car as there are many spots you will want to see on the island that aren't accessible by bus.  Taxis are available in this area if you call ahead, Uber is more readily available than in the past, but is not yet a reliable form of transportation on the North Shore.
access: The entire property is all yours! The house is a private, detached, single family, fenced in home with no other tenants on site.
interaction: We provide guests with a free app that includes driving directions, move in instructions, information about the house and loads of info about our island. We love to share our favorite recommendations with guests, and are available in the office 7 days a week to answer your questions. After hours we use an answering service in case you need reach us about anything urgent.
house_rules: All guests will be required to sign a house rules contract and pay required State of Hawaii taxes prior to arrival.   If you do not feel comfortable signing the house rules or paying the taxes outside of the Airbnb website please do not book online. The house rules are standard, such as no smoking and no pets.  One very strictly enforced rule is that we do not permit outside guests; all people on property must be registered.  Our homes are intended for the enjoyment of our resident guests and not as a gathering spot for parties or events. This is in order to honor and respect the neighbors - we take pride in being great neighbors! If you would like more information about the rules please request a copy of our full contract before making a reservation. The state of Hawaii requires that all short term renters pay both the GET and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax) on rent and fees, a total of 13.962%. The Airbnb platform does not currently give us the ability to itemize and charge these t

host.host_about:
Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

reviews.comments: This wonderful place had everything and  was alot bigger than expected. We thoroughly enjoyed our time here and we'd definitely stay there every upcoming trip. Thanks for the amazing place!

The property was the perfect size and location for our group. Less than a minute's walk from Ke Iki Beach and just a short walk or drive from Foodland, this was an ideal place for us to call home during our short-stay on Oahu. I loved sitting on the covered lanai during the short bursts of rain in the morning.

The host was very responsive to any questions or issues that came up (wifi didn't work initially, we were confused about trash day).

We had a wonderful family holiday.  Your home was very comfortable.  Beautifully presented with everything we needed.  Great location.  A short stroll to the beach.  The food vans were just a quick walk along the main road and we had a couple of great meals there.  And an easy 10 min drive to the lovely town of Haleiwa.  Would definitely live to return one day soon.
This house is amazing!  Well-stocked, clean, cozy, and nicely decorated.  Perfect location, and everything was easy and hassle-free.  We loved every minute of our vacation and can't wait to go back!
We went for a long weekend to the house; it was a nice house and well stocked with everything one would need for a stay in Hawaii
We loved this home and plan to stay here in the future!
Cannot beat the location. Very cool house.
Lovely, spacious family home in a great location.  Our family loved our stay here.

Perfect for 5+ Guests!  Within walking distance to Sunset Beach breathtaking to say the least and you can hear the waves from the house sadly your street side but other than that pretty easy access when renting a vehicle!

Loved this house!!! It was super comfortable and had everything we needed and more. Love the access to the beach and food trucks. Made viewing sunsets in the evening and grabbing an Acai bowl in the morning very convenient. Thank you for letting us enjoy your little piece of heaven!

We absolutely loved our stay at this awesome house.  The location is great - steps from a great beach for sunset (too crazy for swimming though) and a short walk down the bike path to the best snorkeling and easy swimming beaches on the North Shore.  We rented bikes (which was super easy - they came and dropped off/picked up! North Shore Bike Rental) which made it super easy to explore further to the incredible beaches in the hood. The food truck set up down the street has 8+ killer dining options and is right next to a grocery store - all a ten minute walk - which makes food a cinch. 

The interior of this house is lovely - super comfortable and well decorated. One note on the bedroom setup - the room pictured with bunk beds is in a bit of a shared space (folks have to walk through it to get to one of the 2 bathrooms or to get to the upstairs bedrooms) so make sure that whoever plans to sleep in there goes to bed late! 

Overall our group of 6 friends (two couples) loved this place and hope to come back and stay!  I highly suggest making sunset margaritas and walking down to the beach behind the house (about 100 yards down a little path between houses) to join the handful of folks doing the same thing.  We made it a nightly tradition.

This home is in the perfect location and is absolutely beautiful! The layout of the home is highly functional, cozy, and quaint. Our party of 7 had an incredible time and could not have been happier!!!!!!

We had a very nice stay at this home. The layout was great, with front and back decks, a nice kitchen and living space on the main floor. Only wish there was a bathroom on the top floor for the two bedrooms up there.

This house is located right on the north shore of Oahu. Conveniently located right down the street from the best beaches and snorkeling. Foodland grocery market is right down the street as well as the food trucks! The house has all the stuff you need in the kitchen to enjoy a meal with your family. Just a minute walk from the house is the beach too! I would highly recommend this house. Haleiwa is a beautiful city with great shopping and restaurants as well.
Wonderful beach house!
This is a really lovely place just a short walk from the beach, really great location and large house to enjoy the North beaches. Great food only 5 min down the road and plenty of parking !

Wonderful stay on North Shore. Lovely home in convenient location near Sharks Cove with easy beach access. Communication with host before and during stay made our vacation stress-free and even more enjoyable. As past residents of Oahu, we highly recommend this North Shore rental.

This was a lovely place to stay. After booking from New Zealand, I was a bit nervous as to what the house would be like.  It was easy to find, the check in was easy and everything was as the pictures showed. The house was very roomy and homely, and had everything you could want, the beds were very comfy and the lanai was great for sitting out on.  It was a great location, easy walking  to the local supermarket which had everything you could want and need, the food trucks, and the lovely beaches. There was beach equipment hire gear near the food trucks too, but it was a bit more expensive than hiring it at the nearby town of Haleiwa. Snorkeling at Sharks Cove was awesome, plenty of fish and we saw turtles there as well. We loved our stay here, it was a very relaxing area to spend a few days in and house was great. Thank you.

name: 100 year old Railway Carriage
summary: Comfortable but compact, set in beautiful bushland, owner's house closeby. 10 minutes from shops, restaurants and railway station. 50 minutes from Sydney Airport. Extra note: some guests have mentioned swimming in the George's River but this is not always advisable due to water quality . Also while there is an electric BBQ it is not always possible to light  the open fire because of legal restrictions.
space: Bring walking shoes for bush walks, on the property or to the George's River. There are plenty of Eucalyptus Punctata (koala food) but the koalas are hard to spot.
description: Comfortable but compact, set in beautiful bushland, owner's house closeby. 10 minutes from shops, restaurants and railway station. 50 minutes from Sydney Airport. Extra note: some guests have mentioned swimming in the George's River but this is not always advisable due to water quality . Also while there is an electric BBQ it is not always possible to light  the open fire because of legal restrictions. Bring walking shoes for bush walks, on the property or to the George's River. There are plenty of Eucalyptus Punctata (koala food) but the koalas are hard to spot. An open pavilion and entertainment area with cooking facilities is available for you to cook up your own storm if you like. Several restaurants deliver to the area. We will almost certainly be here to help you with anything you need. This is a neighbourhood where the natural environment is protected by law, on the outskirts of the fast-growing Macarthur area. In the city of Campbelltown there is an Arts Centre, the Cube Entert
neighborhood_overview: This is a neighbourhood where the natural environment is protected by law, on the outskirts of the fast-growing Macarthur area. In the city of Campbelltown there is an Arts Centre, the Cube Entertainment venue, good restaurants. Close by is horse riding, hot air ballooning, the Mt. Annan Botanical Garden, historical homes, wineries.
transit: Buses are infrequent especially in school holidays.
access: An open pavilion and entertainment area with cooking facilities is available for you to cook up your own storm if you like. Several restaurants deliver to the area.
interaction: We will almost certainly be here to help you with anything you need.
house_rules: We hope guests will respect this lovely place as if it were their own.

host.host_location: Minto Heights, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: Absolutely perfect. Margaret and John are lovely and made the stay even more memorable. Thanks so much.

Beautiful and unique property with great hosts. The breakfast spread was very welcome and the surrounding property has some lovely walks. Would highly recommend visiting the river as well. Many thanks for a wonderful stay!

A wonderful experience and a great host. Margaret went out of her way to make us feel welcome and to make our anniversary special. Her and her husband take great pride in the train and their property and made us feel right at home. A really great experience.

We had such a lovely time at this charming authentic train carriage. The train car had so much history and was such a unique place to stay and is nestled in a tranquil green setting surrounded by trees. 
From the moment we got there Margaret and her husband were  welcoming and gracious hosts. The little touches were fantastic and the fixings for breakfast were a welcome and lovely surprise. I would highly recommend this place.

This property was a little but out of the way but that only added to the experience. Tucked away amongst the trees was this gorgeous train carriage. I loved the attention to detail, both in the train refurbishment and with the breakfast. Loved staying here and would highly recommend it to everyone.

This is a gem, and we will most definitely return in future. Not the cheapest accomodation by a long shot, but considering the class and character of the reconditioned railway carriage (actually suprisingly spacious, except for the kitchenette), the beautiful forest location - its a good deal. Margaret and her husband is a friendly and engaging couple, provided quality breakfast ingredients and just took great care of us. We particularly enjoyed inviting 9 people over and entertaining them at the pavillion !

A  very exciting experience. We have never before slept  in a 1st class bedroom in a 100 year old train wagon situated in the bush. We can certainly recommend a stay in Margaret and John's well preserved wagon. Also we were treated more than good, and we had a joyful and interesting night together.  Thank you Margaret and John.

Margaret was a great host. The train is beautiful and so are its surroundings. Great getaway just out of Sydney. We cooked up a feast on the BBQ which Margaret helped arrange. We will definitely be coming back

This was my first stay through AirBNB and thanks to both Margaret and John, you were very welcoming.  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and completely loved the carriage, my daughter would have enjoyed it and I was wishing she was there with me.  I would definitely recommend your carriage and I would stay with you again.  The fridge was well stocked and although I didn't have breakfast it was all there if I had chosen to have it.  Thanks so much for having a wine with me I really enjoyed the whole experience.

Margaret and John are the nicest and most helpful hosts I met so far.
Since I didn't have a car Margaret offered me several times to take me to town. She also helped me move all my belongings on the the day I moved into my new home. John and Margaret also took me out for dinner with their friends, which was a really lovely evening.
The property is very beautiful, there is trees everywhere and a lot of nice sitting opportunities to hang out. You can go for walks and do bicycle tours in the surrounding forest, there is also a river not to far away.
The carriage is a very special place to stay. There are so many unique, beautiful and old details and everything works very well (lights, shower, wifi...).
The kitchen is equipped with everything you need and Margaret had set fruits and filled up the fridge.
The bed is super comfy and even got warm heating blankets.
I would love to return to the carriage which was my nest for about a week. 
Thank you so much Margaret and John!

My partner and I had an absolutely lovely stay in Minto. The property is beautiful and the train was such a unique and fun place to stay. Everything we could have needed was either provided or minutes away.  My only hope is that we can come back again some time soon :) Do note that you will definitely need to follow Margaret's directions. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps has no clue how to find this place!

The carriage was an absolute delight to stay in. We were there two nights and wish we could have stayed longer. It had been beautifully restored and the hosts had clearly invested a lot of thought and effort into creating a one of a kind step-back-in-time experience. The hosts were very warm and welcoming, and were an incredible source of information about the train as well as the surrounding area. 

The food provided for us to use, along with the presentation of the in-carriage dining table really gave it that extra first-class 20th century touch. Although shops were conveniently located a 15 minute drive away, the property is isolated giving the carriage a very embedded-in-bushland glamping feel. 

One of our best Airbnb stays to date - would definitely recommend.

My boyfriend and myself spent a night at Margaret's train carriage. It was absolutely charming and cosy. The carriage was pretty big and had everything we needed and even a few surprises. Margaret is such a great host, she did all the necessary to make our stay perfect. She was available as soon as we needed it, offered us a lovely breakfast and set a fire. We had a beautiful romantic weekend. We definitely recommend it and thinking of going again some time.

Margaret had the carriage warm and ready for us with lovely supplies for breakfast and more. Although it took some juggling to prepare our meal the first evening we got into the swing of it and indoor-outdoor was part of its charm. We loved the bush surrounds (how could it be near suburbia?), the fire pit on our last night and the warmth of hospitality and conversations. Margaret went out of her way to care for our needs while respecting our privacy and space. We definitely recommend the Carriage and all the location has to offer.

Margaret and her husband well very welcoming hosts in making us feel at home . The train carriage was lovely to stay in and amazing nature at which they stay on with some lovely little Bush walks down by the Creek. Would love stay there again with lovely genuine down to earth people ... Who treated us with some home made apple pie before we left .

Margaret was a lovely, welcoming and warm hostess that made our special weekend away that much nicer. The train itself is set on a sprawling 9 acres of bushland and there is a warm fire for the cold nights and great outside cooking facilities.
Two words: luxury & value. This place is beautiful, warm, and private. Margaret is a generous host and easy going.

Margaret was such a welcoming and lovely host, her communication was great and she was so helpful catering to my arrival times. The train itself is beautiful and felt like i was taking a step back in time. They have decorated it brilliantly and it is rather spacious and very comfortable. She was even nice enough to supply some goodies for a nice breakfast! Would definitely recommend this place and will go back again!
Margaret was very easy going and accommodating.

Margaret was the perfect host. The carriage is beautiful and Margaret and John have done an incredible job at restoring / keeping in great condition! It feels like a piece of history. I took my partner here as a birthday gift and it was better than could have been expected... We felt so welcomed, and there was such attention to detail and we even had fresh coffee and a bowl of blueberries and strawberries! The area is also beautiful and great for walking. Would definitely recommend and it would make a great gift.

Margaret and John were welcoming hosts. The train carriage was lovely with everything you need including quality linen and comfortable bed. The bush setting was a delight to wake up to with easy access bush walks. I would definitely recommend.
What a beautiful, magical place to stay. Set in bush land this wonderful railway carriage is all romance and charm. Margaret and John were lovely hosts. A fantastic peaceful getaway from the city.
Generous and helpful hosts. Loved the carriage, loads of character.

Loved the novelty of staying in the carriage. Lovely bush setting. Extremely generous in the breakfast food provided.  Margaret and her husband were very kind and generous people.  Thank you for your hospitality. Julie

Such a lovely place with such lovely people! Very warm and welcoming to me and my Film crew. It is definitely a place I would love to come back, but next time will be for a vacation for sure! Thank you so much for your warm and kind service you have shown us on the day!

Margaret was exceptionally helpful from when we first booked our trip! Even though she was away the weekend we were staying she organised for a friend to meet us and gave us all the information we needed before we arrived. She also left us fresh fruit and vegetables, as well as food for breakfast which was a lovely surprise! 

The railway carriage itself is a wonderful space and full of historical touches. It is easy to see that a lot of love and work has gone into the carriage and it truly felt like a home away from home. It was very relaxing waking up right next to the bush, and located a short drive away from shops and other bushwalks. We also loved getting to meet Margaret's dog and puppies! 

We look forward to hopefully staying at the railway carriage again in the future - perfect for a weekend escape from the city!

Great place to stay, plenty of character and lovely hosts, will definitely be back!
Thanks Margaret

Delightful hosts who went out of their way to be welcoming - even picked me up from the station when the taxi didn't show. The accommodation is delightful, filled with memorabilia and collectibles, comfortable and containing everything one could ever wish for. The bushland setting, puppies and parrots add another dimension! Just loved it.

Location, location, location. We are North American residents and stayed two weeks. From Minto Heights, the train station and local mall are only ten minutes away. The train ride to Sydney is only about an hour, the drive to the Blue Mountains about two hours, to Illawarra about an hour-and-a-half, and to Canberra, about two-and-a-half hours. It's a perfect location to see much of the Sydney-Canberra area. Staying in a converted railcar is a unique experience. It is not like a standard apartment and some of the spaces are a little quirky. John and Margaret are excellent hosts and we found nothing wanting. Our stay was both comfortable and pleasurable. We would return in a minute!
Lovely place. Margaret and John were really friendly. Wish we could stay longer. Will be back soon!!! Thanks guys for having us.
Margret and John were very accommodating. From bush walking tips to where to get a bite. We enjoyed our stay.
A very special place, set in an Australian bush setting and a unique and interesting experience spending the night in a converted train carriage.
An amazing unique experience, with great hosts who thought of everything. We will be back to enjoy the beautiful scenery. It is a very special place!

Margaret is a generous host who respects your privacy yet unobtrusively ensures that you have everything that is needed, including generous breakfast provisions.
We stayed several weeks whilst waiting to move into our new home and although the bathroom and kitchen are compact they are functional and we soon adapted to cooking and boiling water for washing up in the indoor/ outdoor kitchen. The shower has plenty of hot water but once again is compact. The bed is comfortable and the living area quite spacious. Train enthusiasts will particularly enjoy checking out the many original artifacts that decorate the spaces. 
The accommodation is located a few kilometres from the train station so a car is recommended. There are some beautiful bushland walks leading to the George's River that are well worth exploring and Sydney is about 50 minutes by train.
We would highly recommend Margaret's place, especially for short stays. We loved the convenience of being close to everything yet being on the edge of bushland and the river. We also enjoyed interacting with Margaret's three dogs that live on the property and look forward to returning when we return to the area.

Very authentic. Nice rural safe location, you wouldn't believe you were 10 minutes from Campbelltown. Great hosts and very private. Looks like they are adding a small conductors office, and the friendliest quietest h blue healers I've ever met. Great stay
This place is very special and you will never stay anywhere quite so unique. The hosts were so lovely I would recommend this place to anyone
It was fantastic staying in the unique train carriage. Margaret, John and the dog's were delightful company!

A cute little get away, very well presented and lovely location. The train is unquie, with great features. Margaret was very hospitable, and thought of all the little touches. 
Thank you very much.

Great stay everything perfect and this accomodation offers just that little bit more! 
Awesome
Margaret and her husband have done an amazing job restoring this over 100yo carriage. It takes you right into another space and time. Thank you Margaret.
I loved the secluded bush setting of the train carriage, and found it a beautiful place to relax and recharge.
Adorable! Exactly what i was looking for! I would love to stay again :) what a treasure! Thank you!
Fantastic place to stay if you are after something a little different. Beautiful bush setting and lovely hosts. Very well recomended

I bought two nights in the train carriage for my dad who is a train enthusiasts. He had an absolute ball spending two nights there. We also had a family bbq at the premises on one of the days, and the hosts were absolutely fantastic. There were 20 of us at the bbq, and there was ample room and Margaret was very accommodating and obliging. Excellent facilities!
The communication with Margaret was excellent, she made sure we knew everything we needed to make this a memorable stay. 
We will definitely think about booking this for other treat train enthusiasts we know.

You don't need to be a train buff to really enjoy the experience of the carriage and surrounds. But it's even better if you are. :)
It is easy to get lost in the romance of train travel as it was. A perfect place for a romantic getaway; if only I was young again.
Highly recommended and I will be returning as it is a perfect place to relax but still be close to the big smoke.
Very quiet. Nice stay.
Awesome unique place to stay. Warm and comfortable with everything you need. Dogs were gorgeous as well and so friendly.

Staying in this beautiful train carriage is one of the nicest Airbnb experiences I've ever had. Everything was delightful - from the wonderfully preserved vintage interiors, to the thoughtful modern upgrades, to the beautiful bush setting. Best of all was the kindness of the hosts - Margaret not only came to pick me up from the station, but also stocked the train carriage with simple, delicious supplies (sourdough bread, tomatoes, eggs, fresh basil etc) so I could make my own meals in the tiny kitchen. Other highlights include the hammock/day-bed which was perfect for reading in the sun, and the three gorgeous dogs who were endlessly playful and amusing. I would recommend this place to railway enthusiasts, vintage lovers, and anyone who wants to immerse themselves in nature. I hope to stay in this beautiful place again!
Nice quiet retreat and unique accommodation in a train with a few treats as extra.

I loved my short stay at Margaret's Air BnB. I was looking for somewhere quiet and relaxing to do some reading and writing, and a friend had recently raved about her weekend spent staying in this beautiful restored train carriage. It was just what I needed, and Margaret and her family were extremely generous and welcoming to me. It was such an easy trip from Sydney centre and is surrounded by beautiful bushland, creeks and rivers. I would recommend it to any person or couple looking for a relaxing and lovely little getaway. Thank you for such a wonderful stay!

Had the most amazing 3 week stay here . 

I can't recommend the train enough. 

If you love peace and tranquility this is the place for you.

In the most beautiful setting. 

John and Margaret are perfect hosts.

I felt at home as soon as I arrived from the Uk.

The train has everything you need for a very comftable stay with lots of little personnel touches to.

Margaret provided me with some lovely things for breakfast upon my arrival .

I will always have the fondest of memories of my stay there and was sad to leave easily could have stayed longer .
Great place to stay - relaxing, easy and novel.
Pleasant people and lovely bushland

Great, unique experience. Very welcoming. Excellent instructions made it easy to find. Authentic train, beautifully restored. Made extra special by lots of little extras and the added benefit of a beautiful log fire.

We had an event with 20 people out on the patio during the day  and then in then stayed in the train overnight afterwards. 
Such a great day! So much history and train has been beautifully restored! Such a lovely place!

The train carriage was exactly the place I wanted for a relaxing weekend getaway. The accommodation was amazing in that it was quiet, uniquely designed and surrounded by nature. Margaret was very welcoming and baked us cakes which was delicious. Overall, it was a enjoyable stay and we're planning to go back.
This stunning historical train carriage is a unique place to stay, surrounded by the quiet bush, so close yet so far away from suburbia.  Margaret is also an excellent and helpful host.

Great relaxing place to stay. Loved the bush setting, the quirky carriage, the 2 welcoming cattle dog pups and all the little special touches that Margaret provides. Had a great stay and would return anytime.

The rail car was the perfect get-away after four bustling days in Sydney. Margaret and John were lovely hosts -- welcoming and attentive, not a bit intrusive. Wifi was on the blink when we arrived, but my husband (on working holiday) survived the brief disconnect and I enjoyed the added serenity! Highlights of our stay included bush walks, " brekkie with the lot" using the fresh ingredients Margaret provided, and a relaxing day trip to the New South Wales Rail Transport Museum (Thirlmere) and Australian Botanic Garden (Mt Annan). Would love to stay again!

Margaret was very accomodating to our late check in and late check out the next day. There were thoughtful touches to the carriage that we only discovered before we left. On a longer stay, I’m sure there are more surprises to be found. A very memorable stay!

This was a fantastic find , especially if you’re looking for a quiet place, out of the way but near enough to get to other amenities . We thougherly enjoyed our stay and wouldn’t hesitate to come again if the opportunity presented itself.

Great accommodation 
Nice to have experience something a little different 
Dogs are super friendly
Unique experience.

Such an unique experience and Margaret even provided us with fresh fruits and toasts and heaps for us to have during our stay. Their dogs are very friendly and smart, welcoming us and even leading us to the way to exit on the first day. I would say overall Margaret made us felt like home away from home, and, in the meantime the help she offered is just right on spot so the privacy is 100% guaranteed as well.

Margaret and John are absolutely sterling hosts!  

What a unique and restful experience this was!  In the midst of a peaceful Australian forest, you will find a private, refurbished railway carriage with so many true to period furnishing for you to enjoy a lovely yesteryear ambiance.

Margaret provided fresh fruit, vegetables, breakfast makings and beverages.  A very generous food offering.

I highly recommend this venue.

You will particularly enjoy the experience if you have an appreciation for historical railway memorabilia, and days gone by!
A Quirky place in a lovely location full of charm and personal touches. It just works

We had to find last minute accomodation and what a fantastic surprise, we absolutely loved it. We only stayed at the property minimally as we were in Sydney for work, Margaret very thoughtfully made sure the carriage was heated for us before we arrived home each night. We will definitely be staying in this little gem find on future trips :) It provided a lovely reprieve from what were very exhausting days.
This place is absolutely beautiful! The little touches like fresh strawberries, tomatoes, eggs, bacon and jams really made a difference! Thank you for a lovely stay at this unique Airbnb!

The weekend away was amazing. The accommodation transported us back in time,  the whole carriage is fascinating. Outside, the walking tracks and friendly dogs were a highlight. Margaret's tips on bushwalks and local spots added to the perfect weekend getaway.

Thanks Margaret for the amazing time we had over your property , enjoyed the stay even though it was only for a day . It was a surprise for my wife's birthday and she was delighted . Has all the amenities that you need . Peaceful stay and will not forget the fresh strawberries
Such an amazing stay! Margaret is an outstanding host, will lend a hand when you need it, even if it's just turning the heat on in the carriage before you arrive.
We would absolutely recommend this place, would have loved to stay longer and are hoping to be able to come back some day!
Margaret’s train carriage is a hidden gem in a beautiful location. Margaret and John are wonderful hosts and made our stay perfect. We would definitely come back again. Loved it!
A unique experience. Amazing place. Not to be missed.

Margaret and John were such generous and friendly hosts, we had plenty of privacy but they were always on hand for advice. The train carriage is so artfully done up with extra thoughtful touches. We were very comfortable during our stay, and the supplies left for us to cook breakfast were delicious. Such a quiet, beautiful escape to the bush yet conveniently close to the city. Would definitely recommend staying here for a novel experience with lots of character and wonderful hosts!
Great place to stay. Great hosts. Quiet and peaceful and ideal romantic getaway.

This is an Airbnb experience like no other. A train carriage set in a quiet bushland reserve...amazing. All of the historical touches (the old signs and black and white photos) really enrich the experience even if you're not a history nerd. On top of that, Margaret is incredibly hospitable and charming, as are the two dogs. Would highly recommend the train carriage to anyone looking for something relaxing and special.

What a little gem found in such a beautiful setting. We loved the history of the train and that it was beautifully restored. We hope to stay again next time we visit our old home town. Definitely worth a visit !

Awesome and novel experience. Clean and tidy. Train lovers will love it. Couples seeking peace and quiet will love it. Small touches included making the stay wonderful get away. You won’t regret staying here.

Margaret is a great host, and this wonderfully restored train carriage is a unique piece of history and a far more interesting place to stay than your standard run-of-the-mill hotel. The property is located on a pleasant and secluded acreage, were you'll be gently woken by bird calls and the wind in the trees. The train carriage itself is cozy and well-appointed for two guests - with cooking facilities, chairs and benches for lounging, and a private room to retire in. We enjoyed the games that were provided, as well as reading about some of the history of the railroads in the greater Sydney area. We hope to visit again soon!

Margaret and John were lovely and their two dogs friendly and welcoming. The carriage is spotless and beautifully restored! Absolutely loved the tranquility.... great stay and I highly recommend to all Air Bnb travelers!
Most Outstandig Experience
A wonderful place to stay. Very special! We had a fantastic nightly train ride. Margarete is a perfect host and the communiction was always very easy.

Margaret is an amazing host and the carriage was some much more nostalgic than I expected.  The touches around the carriage added to the nostalgia. The bush setting ia amazing. The train was spotless and comfortable. Would definately stay here again. Thanks again Margaret and John.

A magic place, a very unique experience. Staying in a museum. Everything just perfect.
And Margaret and her husband such lovely people.
My best Airbnb experience ever

Margaret & John’s hospitality was wonderful & the two dogs as welcoming committee! The outdoor kitchen, fireplace and the train itself are beautiful and the photos don’t do it justice. I’m hoping to send through some new photos we took of the train to further show what’s on offer. Only a short walk away is a river for swimming and there’s a few paths for short bush walks. Anyone interested in the local history will get a kick out of some of the ‘Easter eggs’ around the train- with commemorative photos. Definitely recommend getting the fire going and cooking outdoors- bring bug spray! Would recommend to anyone- and looking forward to staying again.
Truly unique experience, excellent host, very pleased with the booking

This is the perfect slice of history for those wanting to experience an authentic train carriage. The details of the restoration are perfect. Lovely country atmosphere, and great hosts! We had an amazing stay!

One of a kind experience. The railcar is absolutely stunning, in pristine condition and decorated as it might have been for a cross-country haul in the 1930s. I stayed for a night, enjoyed sleeping in the cozy bedroom area of the car, and dined in the dining area. Even did some writing in the little railcar office. It's a little spooky at night, but in a fun way. You're staying in a piece of history! Margaret and her husband and their dogs are incredibly welcoming and kind and went out of their way to make my stay wonderful. Thanks, Margaret!

name: On Waikiki's Gold Coast
summary: This beautifully 750 Sq.ft  fully furnished 1 bedroom condo is located in the ocean front Diamond Head Beach Hotel and Residences. Sleeps 4. King bed, memory foam sofa bed.  Full kitchen, granite counter tops.  With secured parking
space: The apartment is a non smoking unit.
description: This beautifully 750 Sq.ft  fully furnished 1 bedroom condo is located in the ocean front Diamond Head Beach Hotel and Residences. Sleeps 4. King bed, memory foam sofa bed.  Full kitchen, granite counter tops.  With secured parking The apartment is a non smoking unit. Included Secured parking.  Stall #2 I will be meeting you at the hotel to check you in. The apartment which is in the Diamond Head Beach Hotel and Residences is uniquely located.  The  famous Kapiolani Park is just across the street. Waking distance to the Aquarium, zoo, Waikiki Beach.  A 5 minute drive or a 20 min to Diamond Head Crater and Saturday Farmers Market.  Restaurants are at you finger tips.  Michel's, Lulu's,  Tucker and Bevy, Bogart's Cafe. The Pacific Ocean is your backyard.  Relax on the lawn to watch the beautiful sunsets.   Please Note:  Check House Rules for information on taxes that  will need to be collected. Convient to public transit and taxis.  Famous Bogarts Cafe just up the  street. 10 min walk. D
neighborhood_overview: The apartment which is in the Diamond Head Beach Hotel and Residences is uniquely located.  The  famous Kapiolani Park is just across the street. Waking distance to the Aquarium, zoo, Waikiki Beach.  A 5 minute drive or a 20 min to Diamond Head Crater and Saturday Farmers Market.  Restaurants are at you finger tips.  Michel's, Lulu's,  Tucker and Bevy, Bogart's Cafe. The Pacific Ocean is your backyard.  Relax on the lawn to watch the beautiful sunsets.   Please Note:  Check House Rules for information on taxes that  will need to be collected.
notes: Access to swimming to the left of hotel lawn.  Short walk on the wall to steps where you can plunge into the pacific ocean.
transit: Convient to public transit and taxis.  Famous Bogarts Cafe just up the  street. 10 min walk. Diamond Head Grill.  Saturday Farmers Market beautiful walk or drive to Diamond Head Community College all in the same area on Monsaratt Drive.  Hau Terrace for breakfast at the New Otani Hotel a 10 min walk.  (reservations a must)  Lulu's   15-20 min walk.
access: Included Secured parking.  Stall #2
interaction: I will be meeting you at the hotel to check you in.
house_rules: Please note that taxes are not included in the price.   The tax rate is 14.75% of the rental price.  You may  pay by check or cash upon arrival at the apartment.

host.host_about:
Born and raised in Hawaii.  Live in Honolulu.  Formerly owners of 
travel company known as Hawaiian Adventure Tour and Travel.  
Avid golfers and tennis players.  Love to travel. Most important
in life is good health and lots of sunshine.

reviews.comments:
I would highly recommend Terri's apartment to anyone thinking of a trip to Oahu/Waikiki. I was met by Terri at the apartment with a gift basket of snacks and shown around,the parking space, private beach access and lanai,etc.
The building is in a perfect location,
close to Diamond Head and the Park but also close enough to walk to the restaurants and shops of Waikiki.
I know I'll be back.

What a gem

My wife and two teenage daughters spent 5 nights at this beautifully decorated and centrally located condo unit.  Everything about this place exceeded our expectations.  

The condo is a 10-15 minute walk to Waikiki.  The building is on the waterfront across from the expansive greens of Kapiolani Park with Diamond Head in the backdrop.  I like the quietness of this area yet close enough to Waikiki to be convenient. The so-called Local Beach is right next door.  It's quiet and much less crowded than Waikiki Beach but if want to enjoy Waikiki Beach, it's less than a 15 minute walk away.

As for the condo unit itself, it is tastefully decorated, fully equipped and very functional.  We could tell the host puts in a lot of efforts and thoughts into making the unit a home away from home for the guest renters.  

Terri, the host, returned every one of my inquiries in a most timely manner.  She met us promptly  at the prearranged check-in time. Couldn't ask for more from our airbnb host. 

All in all, both Terri the host and the condo unit itself get a 5 out of 5 stars from us.  Thank you, Terri.  We had a wonderful stay and will be back again next time.

This vacation rental is a real gem. Spacious, comfortable, nicely decorated. The location is as good as it can get in Honolulu. In an oceanfront condo, right in front of Diamond Head, away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, yet only steps away if you're looking for cafes, restaurants, nightlife, beaches, etc. We used to live in this area and it is our favorite in town. Terri and Cal were very helpful. We had an issue with the wifi router and as soon as we informed them, Cal went to buy a new one and replaced it immediately. This apartment is excellent value for the price. We will definitely try to book it for our next Honolulu trip. Mahalo Terri and Cal!

We had an amazing stay in Hawaii!  We felt that Terri's pricing was extremely gracious considering the location and accommodations we experienced.  It was wonderful to walk out every morning to a view of Diamond Head on one side and the ocean on the other.  The back patio offered private and amazing views of the sunset every night.  We were within walking distance to the beach, shopping, and restaurants.  The apartment was perfect for our family.  We loved everything about our stay!
The host was accommodating for our needs .  The location is ideal.

Thanks Terri for letting us check in early.

We loved the condo and would book again.  The local area and beach are perfect for a peaceful stay near the action in Honolulu.
Location and Accommodation are both amazing. Would recommend anyone to stay if they get the chance.

Terri and Cal's apartment was the perfect place for us!  The location can't be beat, quiet and restful waterfront property, yet close enough to many sites and amenities.  We thoroughly enjoyed staying here and would definitely consider coming here again.  The apartment was very well equipped and tastefully decorated.  It was clean and comfortable.  Thank you so much!

Location was great (walk a few minutes to Sans Souci/Kaimana beach), easy parking, well-equipped (awesome shower!), nicely furnished, comfortable for 3 people (1 couple and 1 child). Terri and Cal met us after our late flight and gave us a quick tour. They also had a Mai'ikai card for the local supermarket (Foodland) so we could get the discount price. Would definitely stay here again!

Roomy, great location with a beautiful kitchen. The four of us had plenty of space in a clean well kept room. Close to everything we need. Would definitely come back. Easy and speedy communication. Thanks for everything.

Our family very much enjoyed our stay at Terri's lovely condo. It was very quite and relaxing. It is also just a short walk over to all the action in Waikiki. We liked be able to take a walk each morning from the condo to get coffee and one morning we even walked to Diamond Head from the condo. It was also great to be able to come back and have our own parking spot that was in a secured garage. Thank you for allowing us to rent your condo for the week.
The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Theresa was a fantastic host - extremely quick to respond to all communications and very hospitable!

The apartment was perfect for our first overseas family holiday. We were very impressed with the location, facilities and all the inclusions with the fully furnished kitchen, bedroom and bathroom - everything we needed was provided! 

We will be back!!

Terri was super flexible with our check-in time even when I had to change it due to travel logistics at the last minute. The condo was clean, spacious, and the portable crib was laid out perfectly for our arrival. The location was wonderful too! Far away enough from Waikiki to be quiet but just a 20 minute walk away!

Theresa was a great host... very timely and communicative from the start regarding any concern about the   property, she was very patient with the typical delays to get the car, figure out where you are and head in the right direction, and then meeting us upon arrival and showing us the space and its various amenities. The space was clean and was most accurately represented in the photos provided. The location was perfect...on the beach, just off the center of activity yet within walking distance to all of the events, activities, restaurants as well as  easy access to  the main thoroughfares for travel to other parts of the island (includes parking for a rental car was a great feature). The amenities of the space were also just as noted, coffee maker, microwave, etc. Of singular exception was the bed which was beyond  fabulous. A perfect nights sleep every time.  Experience has left us with the typical 2-3 nights to get used to it...this was automatic, lights out!
Overall, I would assess Theresa as a terrific host and the  property as an excellent value and would recommend it as a great place to stay if one were to visit Oahu and all its sites. Albeit beaches, island access, restaurants both neighborhood and tourist or even just a sunset view with a glass of wine from the properties private beach front you can't go wrong.
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A great condo!  Kitchen is very well equipped, location is great - near most everything!  The shower is not accessible for someone with limited mobility.  TV sets can be a challenge to turn on and tune........More detailled instructions would help!
Overall we very much enjoyed our stay!
Thank you!

A wonderful place and stay. Theresa met us there and walked us through things which were not complicated. Private parking under building a plus. Location is perfect. Quiet and scenic near Diamond Head but very walkable to beaches and nightlife and easy access for driving. The unit was spacious and very very accommodating. The pictures are very accurate. Laundry in building was nice. The patio overlooking ocean was awesome. A perfect place on Oahu close to things but in a much quieter and relaxing setting!! Could not have been better. Theresa is a great host!! Mahalo!!!

The positives:

1. Host was always prompt in replying to our messages.
2. Place was spotless, well decorated, and well equipped.
3. Location was perfect for us; close to everything yet more quiet (spent one day at the Hyatt Regency Waikiki and the police/ambulance sirens were going all night).
4. FREE Parking (spent $35 per day to park at the Hyatt garage). 
5. Air-conditioners and TVs in both the bedroom and the living room (watched the local news daily).
6. Washer and Dryer on site.
7. All information about the condo were accurate (we had no surprises).
8. Flexible check-in time.

The could-be-better:

1. Condo is on the water but I would NOT recommend swimming for children due to sharp sea floor (could get cuts on feet). If you decide to swim in front of the condo, use swim shoes. Note: Within a couple minutes walk you are on a nice sandy beach (did not affect us at all that we had to walk a couple of minutes).

My partner and I spent 11 nights at Terri's place and it proved to be a great experience!  The unit is exactly as depicted and matched our needs.  As the access to the only bathroom is through the master bedroom, the unit probably works best for a single couple - but there is enough space with the pullout couch in the living room if you need it.  

Terri was great to deal with, and was very responsive, including bringing us a kettle when we requested it.  The building is close to others and the 4th floor unit has only a peekaboo view of the park  and Diamond Head (if an ocean view or lots of light is important for you) but the location was perfect for us - across from a lovely park and close enough to walk to Waikiki and the beach, but with a quieter residential feel.  The king bed was extremely comfortable and the unit was spotless.  We would stay here again.

This is an ideal place to stay in Honolulu. The location is quiet but close to everything Waikiki has to offer. The Gold Coast neighborhood is beautiful. The nearby beach Sans Souci is great for swimming and stand up paddle boarding. The condo is beautifully decorated and has everything we needed. The bed is very comfortable. Terri met us at check in and was extremely helpful. I would consider myself lucky to be able to stay there again.

We had no issues at all during our stay. The location is just far enough from Waikiki to be quiet and safe but close enough to be able to walk. Fantastic sunset view from the small garden/lounge area at the rear of the apartment building. Terri met us there when we arrived and after that just left us to enjoy our vacation which was the perfect amount of interaction. Messages were always answered promptly during the booking process and a small snag about dates was quickly resolved. Would stay there again if we go back to Honolulu.

My wife, 15 month old son, and I stayed here for about a week.  We really enjoyed our stay here. Pictures were accurate and Terri was very accommodating for check-in and check out. Awesome set-up inside the apartment, and we enjoyed the location since it was outside the noise of Waikiki but still within walking distance. Only downsides were no beach access on the property (~10min walk) and the elevator was broke the day we checked out, which made lugging suitcases down a few flights of stairs fun.

In our humble opinion, this is a 5 star property in a quiet neighborhood while still being in Waikiki. The description is accurate & condo very well appointed. You won't regret staying here, we can't recommend it enough.

Terri's apartment was perfect for our family's needs. We loved how it was off the beaten path, and didn't mind walking the 10 minutes into the heart of Waikiki for coffee and restaurants. We highly recommend Terri's place!
Wonderful location!! We loved our stay here. The place was very clean. Close to all the action, without being too loud. All in all a great stay!

This is a perfect location. You can stroll into the hub of Waikiki. Kapiolani Park is right there. The building has a private lawn area fronting the ocean. It is not a beach, but there is ladder access on the seawall to go swimming. The condo has a good kitchen; there are plenty of bath and beach towels. Parking is a huge plus. Thanks again, Terri and Cal.
Terri's place is a great value - it's large, spacious, and conveniently located very close to the beach. I'd definitely stay here again.

Terri’s place was wonderful. Plenty of space for the 3 of us and an excellent location. It was walking distance to Waikiki but far enough away to avoid all the crowds. The building is great- a big park on one side and a gorgeous lawn area overlooking the ocean at the front where you can take a drink and enjoy the sunset without having to wrestle other guests to find a nice position. All the residents were lovely and there is a wonderful swimming beach a short stroll away. Terri was great- and all went smoothly. We will be back. Thanks for your hospitality Terri!

Nice place and appropriately furnished for a beach stay. Location was pretty good. Lots of towels, which was very appreciated. Not many extra frills like coffee for guests. 

Also, I didn’t realize the price was 14% higher until I had booked. The host lists the extra tax in the listing details but it is  not reflected in the list price on the Airbnb search results. The host could calculate the total price and include it to be more transparent up front.
A wonderful condo with a well stocked kitchen and super location. Terri was a gracious host and made us feel welcome after our long trip. Thank you!

Terri’s place is super, got everything you need to have a great vacation from cooking amenities to beach towels, kid’s set. The location is great with beautiful park at the front building while the beach is at the back door step. Could not be happier in such a great place.

name: Spacious house w/pool in Sydney
summary: Enjoy our light, breezy and spacious, Spanish-style house on the banks of the Georges River. Relax by the pool and bbq area, enjoy our modern kitchen and (3) bathrooms, go for bush walks, hit the local cafes or take a comfortable 30 min trip to the city.
space: Large and perfect for a big family. Why spends thousands during the peak holiday period at a hotel when you can enjoy our space for a fraction of the cost. Will comfortably take 8 people.
description: Enjoy our light, breezy and spacious, Spanish-style house on the banks of the Georges River. Relax by the pool and bbq area, enjoy our modern kitchen and (3) bathrooms, go for bush walks, hit the local cafes or take a comfortable 30 min trip to the city. Large and perfect for a big family. Why spends thousands during the peak holiday period at a hotel when you can enjoy our space for a fraction of the cost. Will comfortably take 8 people. Full access to the house. This is a lovely, quiet area with parks and waterways all within walking distance. But there's public transport, a cafe around the corner and further shops just a few kms up the road. It has a relaxed suburban feel. There's a bus service on our street; there are three train stations to the city within approximately five kms from the house. We have two cats? Happy to feed them while we are gone - enjoy a further 10 per cent discount on your stay!
neighborhood_overview: This is a lovely, quiet area with parks and waterways all within walking distance. But there's public transport, a cafe around the corner and further shops just a few kms up the road. It has a relaxed suburban feel.
notes: We have two cats? Happy to feed them while we are gone - enjoy a further 10 per cent discount on your stay!
transit: There's a bus service on our street; there are three train stations to the city within approximately five kms from the house.
access: Full access to the house.

neighborhood_overview: O apartamento esta localizado no 10ºandar com vista deslumbrante para a Baia  de Guanabara. O  hospede poderá usufruir o Parque do Flamengo  para  caminhadas e esporte. Não podendo usar instrumentos musicais e aparelhos de som.  Não aceitamos crianças de menos de 10 anos. Proibimos o FUMO. no apartamento mas podemos oferecer uma área para esta finalidade

name: 700sqft / 1BR in Central Soho With Open View
summary: Great 700sqft apartment in prime center location, literally 1 minute walk away from SOHO, 5min to subway station. Picturesque green view over HK Park to the HK skyline. Quiet road. High Floor. Bright. This apartment is perfect for your HK stay if you want a bit more space than the usual for Hong Kong. 1 Queen size bed and 1 large couch.
space: Amazing location in Central/SOHO. 1 minute away from the buzz in Soho and the nightlife in LKF. 5 mins walk to the MTR and the Peak Tram. Close to escalators. I rent out the apartment when I am on travels. To maintain cleanliness, the apartment, will be cleaned 1x a week during your stay. This is a complimentary service that comes with the apartment. Special requests can be arranged.

High Floor. Bright. This apartment is perfect for your HK stay if you want a bit more space than the usual for Hong Kong. 1 Queen size bed and 1 large couch. Amazing location in Central/SOHO. 1 minute away from the buzz in Soho and the nightlife in LKF. 5 mins walk to the MTR and the Peak Tram. Close to escalators. I rent out the apartment when I am on travels. To maintain cleanliness, the apartment, will be cleaned 1x a week during your stay. This is a complimentary service that comes with the apartment. Special requests can be arranged. My apartment has 3 rooms and there's everything inside you'll need. The sofa is huge and comfy. The kitchen is fully equipped. The flatscreen TV is perfect for a chill night in. Plug your Mobile into my Hifi for great tunes. And dont forget to enjoy the morning sun on the b
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood is in perfect center location, very clean and modern all around the area. Once you get out the door its relaxing and not overcrowded like other neighborhoods around can be.
transit: 5min away from the CENTRAL subway station. Taxis are easy to get just outside the building. 5min walking distance to all the restaurant, clubs and bars of SOHO and LKF.
access: My apartment has 3 rooms and there's everything inside you'll need. The sofa is huge and comfy. The kitchen is fully equipped. The flatscreen TV is perfect for a chill night in. Plug your Mobile into my Hifi for great tunes. And dont forget to enjoy the morning sun on the balcony.
interaction: I am living in HK for 10 years so I'm always happy to give suggestions.
house_rules: I expect you to treat my apartment with respect. Only rules, no smoking inside, no pets. Enjoy the apartment, location and chill with the view. I hope you like it as much as I do.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I had a great time at this apartment! Location is great and the view is superb! Martin has been very helpful throughout my stay. I would definitely want to book this apartment again in the future!
Cosy, clean flat in a great location. Perfect for our needs. Martin was very quick to respond to any of our questions both before, and during our stay.

Stayed at Martin's for 2 nights and everything was perfect. Location is great, just a few minutes walk to all the bars and clubs in LKF and a 7/11 just minutes away. Flat is very spacious and Martin replied instantly whenever i needed his assistance. Would definitely stay again.

Apartment is in a great location (amazing views, especially at night) of Hong Kong – easily accessible and is quiet.  Martin is extremely quick to respond when contacted.  

Apartment is best suited for 2 people; there was no pillow for the 3rd individual and only 1 sheet.   On arrival the toilet was broken (didn’t flush), unfortunately for the first ~16 hours we had to manually add water for it to empty.  

One of the main reasons I had booked the apartment was that it had a washing machine; house manual was altered once we had checked in to advise it was broken.
Great apartment, great view and amazing location. Would recommend to any of my friends visiting Hong Kong in the future. Martin communicated everything I need to make for a smooth Airbnb experience.

We had a great stay at Martin's place. Really feel at home in this cosy apartment. Bright, nicely decorated, fully equipped kitchen, close to everything...5mn walk to Lan Kwai Fong and Soho with an amazing choice of bars and restaurants...10mn walk to subway...bus stop right in front of the building.
Would definitely stay here again on a next trip.

name: D3-Standard Twin Bed Room
summary: We are licensed guest house, opened in 1987. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days.
space: We opened in 1987 and we are on the 21 st floor. The residence is also fitted with CCTV surveillance, 24-hour security services and smart card access to. All of these make your stay more comfortable and safe. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed. Traffic is also very convenient for the tourists. Very close train and airport bus station (3 mins walk).  Our room types are as follows : - Single bed Room without window : no window, one bed (1m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres room (no extra bed provided) - 1.2 Double-bed Room : with windows, one bed (1.2 m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres room (no extra bed provided) - Standard Double-bed Room : with windows, one bed (1.5 m X 1.83 m) for 2 persons in a 8 square metres
description: We are licensed guest house, opened in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. We opened in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and we are on the 21 st floor. The residence is also fitted with CCTV surveillance, 24-hour security services and smart card access to. All of these make your stay more comfortable and safe. All of our standard rooms and triple rooms have windows, provide free wifi and with separate washroom. The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed. Traffic is also very convenient for the tourists. Very close train and airport bus station (3 mins walk).  Our room types are as follows : - Single bed Room without window : no window, one bed (1m X 1.83 m)
neighborhood_overview: We located in the central area of Mongkok. Very close to varies tourist hot spots. The lady market, sneaker street and Langham Place are not far form our house. It is very continent to get to the Harbour City, Avenue of Stars,  Hung HomColiseum, airport by buses, train or taxi.
notes: -The check-in time is 2 P.M and the check-out time is noon 12:00.  - We provide 24 hrs reception services.  Booked rooms will be held for check-in until noon 12:00 of the scheduled check-out date. After which the booking will be deemed no-show. No refunds will be provided for the no-show booking. If you check-out beyond the stipulated time at our guest house of your stay, we reserves the right, without further notice to you, to charge you an additional fee or remove your belongings out of the room. We shall not be liable for any loss or damage to your belongings as a result of the action(s) taken. you need to provide a deposit of 200 dollar per room when you check-in, in either Hong Kong Dollar or Chinese Yan (cash only). Deposit will be refunded fully if there is not any extra fee or compensation (including fees for late check-out, damage items or extra cleaning cost and so on) needed to be charged.  It is free to for luggage storage at the front desk. Luggage storage is available onl
transit: Tourist spot in/around Mong Kok: * Sai Yeung Choi Street ( concentrates shops of electronic products, cosmetics, and discount books. ) * Tung Choi Street (also known as 女人街, Ladies' market,specializes in women's clothing, accessories, and cosmetics, and is open daily from noon to midnight. There are also food stalls selling noodles, seafood, and congee. An open-air market of fruits and vegetables is also located in the vicinity) * Sai Yee Street (with many sport shops) * Goldfish Street (There are a dozens of shops and hawkers selling tropical freshwater and marine fish, aquarium and accessories) * Flower Market * Langham Place (59-storey complex with a shopping mall, a hotel, and offices.) * Sino Centre (Shops sell comic books, VCDs and DVDs related to Japanese cartoons, and regular CD albums) * Temple Street (night market and one of the busiest flea markets at night in the territory)
access: In your room, you will have: * TV * Airconditioner * Free wifi * Conversion plugs * Electric kettle(We also provide bottle water, you can purchase at front desk) * Hair dryer * Personal hygiene products (toothpaste and toothbrush, shower gel and shampoo), hair dryer * Slippers,clothes hangers, toilet roll * Water glass * Separate bathroom(with shower, 24 hrs hot water) * towels * The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed.  * Comb (you can get it at front desk) We also have a mini common area for guest chat and a balcony to hang up their wet clothes. The opening hours for balcony are from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. It is also equipped with a refrigerator and microwave in lobby space.
interaction: We provide 24 hrs reception services. You are welcome to ask if you have any question. Early check-in / check in at night:  Check in time depends on the check out time of the previous guests. You may check in earlier if we have rooms free. Basically, the check in time is from 2 p.m. You can keep your belongings at the front desk if your room is not ready.      Booked rooms will be held for check-in until noon 12:00 of the scheduled check-out date.we have 24 hrs reception services, just come to our front desk at 21/F to get the keys even if you need to check in min-night.       Verified ID process  A ID verification is a must to successfully book a room through Airbnb   Please upload an image of your government-issued ID, such as your driver's license or passport. It could take you 1 to 6 hours to complete the process. please be patient. For details, please browse this site:  https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/450/what-is-verified-id?locale=en   or contact Airbnb directly at 852 5808 8
house_rules: 1.每天入住时间为下午2点,退房时间为中午12点前,如延迟退房可能会被扣费｡  2.宾馆室内一律禁烟,如需抽烟请到室外｡如被举证最高可罚款5000元港币｡  3.床单､被单､枕套为3天一换,如需增加或改换需要额外加收50元港币/每次 - No pets inside.  -The check-in time is 2 P.M and the check-out time is noon 12:00.  - According to the Base Law, smoking is forbidden in the area of the guest house. An individual who commits an offence and is liable on summary conviction to a maximum fine of HK$ 5,000｡ - The guest room will be tidy up and the set of bedding will be changed once every three days. An additional cleaning charge of HK$50 will be charged for any extra bedding used or changed.

host.host_about: 我是香港本地人,在台灣修的旅遊科,很喜歡交朋友,很高興能認識來自世界各地的朋友,我將盡力為你們提供最溫馨最真誠的服務和房間｡

reviews.comments: 宾馆很好找 地理位置适中 周围买东西很方便 7-11  sasa 都有   房间也是新装修的 很干净  服务态度很好很热情

I had a really nice time at Ken's place. Stayed there for 3 nights. I would recommend this place to budget travelers who will be out most of the day, but needs a convenient, safe, comfortable and clean place to come home to. Most reviews say the room is small, which is a standard in HK. But our room (and the toilet) did not feel cramped at all - unless you're a really big person. We only had handcarries but a trolley or two can still fit in the room. No closet though but there's space to put your clothes, toiletries, etc all over the room. The guesthouse is very convenient location-wise. Everything is walking distance: A21 bus stops from and to airport, MTR Mongkok E1 exit & others, Ladies market and sports goods street, grand plaza, langham place mall. Early in the morning we eat at the congee places around the area for breakfast that elderly locals frequent. Just walk around and you'll def find one. One week before your stay, Ken will send you a FAQs sheet. It has all the info needed about the guesthouse and directions to the place which they have youtube videos of. Wifi was stable and fast. Mongkok is a very busy place with lots of people but the rooms are quiet and high above the busy streets. Security is stationed beside the elevators and monitored with CCTV cameras. Also, the guesthouse has 24 hour front desk. They're called a guesthouse but really functions more like a motel.

Directions to the place was given well. Really loved the location as it was easy to find and also just a few mins walk to the MTR. Super accessible! Room was also clean and cosy, had a great stay there :) Recommended!

This place was extremely convenient, right in the heart of Mongkok. The room itself was very clean, cozy, and just right for what we needed. The common areas were very charming and artistic!  Ken and his staff were great. We enjoyed it and would definitely stay there again.

Ken and Zoe are very nice and helpful with all our touristy questions. Place is worth the money plus very convenient in getting around mongkok, very near to mtr station. Will definitely go back and recommend this to my friends :)

We stayed for three nights, and felt really comfortable. We found that one of the strong advantage in this guesthouse is the location. It locates in exactly the center of Hong Kong! Also, the staffs and the room facilities were nice. Many thanks for your kindness :D
房間乾淨整齊很不錯,會再考慮入住
照片跟網站提供的圖一樣,麻雀雖小五臟俱全,適合短期旅遊者~老闆也是台灣人,所以覺得非常親切,有任何疑問都會盡量提供幫助,住的地方離地鐵､機場巴士站､公車站都非常的近,真的很方便!下次再去香港的話一樣會住那邊:-)
Excellent all around-clean room, helpful staff and quick servicing of the room all came without any request on our part.
Excellent location, excellent host. Would come back.
地理位置比較方便,前台的工作人員也很有耐心回答我們的問題｡

The hostel is located at a central location of Mongkok with the nearest MTR station just a minute away. There are many shops and restaurants nearby as well. The room is a little small but alright for budget travelers who just require a place to rest. However, the toilet is very small and hence not advisable for people who like to have a more comfortable stay. There seems to be mosquitoes in the room as well as I always find myself with many mosquito bites every morning after I wake up.

Amazing experiment!!i can't find a word to describe how awesome the room is !The host is friendly and nice .Here really made myself at home!if u guys wanna live in Mongkok come here!Not only the price is reasonable but also the shower machine is lovely haha .i love it.i really do!!In a word highly recommended!
Clean and comfortable room in a great location. Would recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 169 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The room was quite comfortable, I would suggest you to provide more storage spaces / area to hang cloths. Thanks
房东非常nice 愉快的体验

Nice modern room in center of Mongkok shopping area.

Our room is clean and comfortable.

We will comeback and stay here in our next HK trip for sure !!
房子的位置很棒  离地铁站很近   周围便利店和饮食店也都很多   房间也很干净    还有阳台可以晒衣服    房间也有转换插头  很方便
房东很热情,只要能碰到面都会主动打招呼｡房型和照片上一模一样住的很舒服哦!
房主很有耐心噢,很不错的地方!

This place was, as it looks, really small, but it was cozy enough to stay. There was everything like towel, a pair of slippers, tooth brush, shampoos, and hair dryer.. The diretion Ken gave us was pretty detailed so I was able to get to the place smoothly. The building was a little dirty, looked old and sketchy, but inside was clean and nice! So don't be scared when you see the building.

My cousin and I stayed at Kam Mun Guest House for 4 days and 3 nights. The place is about 5-min away from MTR Mongkok Station and the receptionist was kind enough to accommodate us despite arriving on wee hours. The building where it is located looks kind of sketchy and dirty, but upon arriving at their receiving area on the 21st floor, it was brightly lit and well mantained. 

We stayed at a standard twin bed room on which was cozy. The aircon was working well, as well as the television. The bathroom was really cute, just enough to accommodate the toilet and shower. The latter had a hot and cold option available, and shampoo and bath gel were provided for. Also, towels were readily available at our convenience. Free WiFi for guests was  available. There were essential items inside the room too like hair dryer,  electric kettle, plastic cups, toothbrush, and toothpaste. 

Unfortunately, the adaptors provided for us for the electricity plugs werent working leaving us with only one socket to charge our gadgets. We had a hard yome explaining this with the receptionist as she doesnt speak english. However, upon mutual agreement with our concern, she had the adaptors immediately the next day. 

Overall, our experience was really good :)

Sent from my iPhone
