價格很合理 房東也能很快回覆我的問題

숙소가 몽콕역에 가까이 위치하였고
큰대로변에 위치하여 편리했습니다. 주인이 친절하셔서 체크인도 원활했습니다^-^
地理位置很好,房间设备齐全｡三人间的话稍微偏小,但是影响不大,性价比很高
Great stay in Hongkong. Location was near everything and the metro. Communication was excellent as I checked in at 2am due to a delayed flight. Ken was very nice as well. Would definitely stay again.

It was really great guest house!
So close to MTR, nice hosts!
I really enjoyed my trip~

Nice location with mrt station, food and shopping nearby. Room is clean and look exactly like what it showed in the photo. Room is small but still more than enough for us to just use it for a good sleep at night.
離地鐵站蠻近,周邊吃的東西很多,房東很親切,浴室與房間真的非常迷你,整體蠻推薦預算不多的朋友入住哦!
到达住处的时候都有一直在联系房东,虽然我们较晚到达不过房东给我们的指引路线都很容易明白｡那里的地方真的很好找｡

Un logement qui est proche de tout, aussi bien du métro que des magasins. La chambre est petite comme nous nous en doutions car les logements à Hong Kong sont rarement spacieux, mais propre. 
Super expérience! Je le recommande!
Great places to stay
房間整潔乾淨交通便利,下次來香港還會再住這裡
十分温馨的地方,整洁的环境,周到的服务,交通也真的算很方便｡我觉得来香港真的就应该住旺角

Ken and the other host were friendly. They had great suggestions on places to eat and things to see. The room is also in a very central location, it's located in a busy shopping area surrounded by thousands of restaurants and retail shops.
三天的假期住在旺角｡地理位置十分方便如果是来购物的话可以考虑这
挺好的 以后来香港还会考虑住这里

The size of the room (203) with bright windows is very pleasant and  good value. Location of the guesthouse was good close to A21 airport bus and Mongkok Station and many eating an d shopping places.  I also like it that it faces a main road and we girls do not have to go through an alley.  

However, the host Kent was very responsive and managed to resolve the issues we had very quickly.  He and his staff are customer friendly and certainly made up for some of the imperfections. 

Thank you for a good stay.

We should be back the next time we are in HK.  :)
방 자체는 작아요. 보증금 생각을 못했어서 급하게 환전해왔어요. 깔끔하고 잘 정돈돼있어서 좋았지만 앞방의 숙박객이 문을 열고 떠들어서 불편했네요. 몽콕역 E1 출구에서 걸어서 10분 내에 있어요.
邮件写的位置描述清晰｡交通方便
很好
Great
交通方便房東熱情的好地方,價格也很合適,推薦各位投宿｡
老板人很好,也很贴心｡去之前给了详细的信息｡位置就挨着旺角地铁站,出行超方便｡性价比很高,推荐大家来    下次去香港还会来~

Its noted that the room is small as hongkong standard, but the smell something bad inside the room is terrible. Second thing is the wifi connection is not reachable inside the room. Aside from that the place is ok and the reception is very good though not fluently in english so must explain slowly your concern untill she will understand. That was all during my stay.
A very good stay, good location and friendly host
좋았습니다.
房间经济实惠干净舒适 整体环境还不错 Ken的服务态度非常好
外装は少し汚れているが､内装はとても綺麗｡立地は最高でした｡
位置很便利 就在朗豪坊旁边 有名的小食街也在附近 房间也很干净
Convenient location
這是一個適合在旅程的休息站 我喜歡這裡的佈置以及美好的事物
위치 좋아요! 겨울에 가시면 좀 추울수도 있어요! 홍콩이 난방시설이 거의 없어서 마찬가지지만요!
性价比还是不错的,地址在旺角,很热闹,要买的东西基本能买全,离我要去的地方也很近,就是热水器太小了,洗澡要很快,但是这个地方这个价格也是差不多的了｡下次还会选择!
非常棒的住宿,一出来就能逛街,下次来香港还住这
Very good
这是一次超级棒的住宿体验,房间干净整洁,交通超级便利,离地铁站不到五分钟路程,周边值得打卡的美食也很多,阿ken还有其他工作人员也都很热心,沟通非常愉快,五星推荐~~~
價錢便宜,抵住,房間清潔,下次會再住
地理位置得天独厚,房间也很干净,下次去一定还会住在这,值得推荐

Value for money, compact, neat, tidy, safe and quite comfortable accommodation.
Situated right in the middle of shopping, foodies, transportation hub anything you can think of.
Quite easy to get around with helpful guidance from Ken to start with.
You will become part of the locals in no time.
Be happy and enjoy …..
離地鐵站近,但隔音有點差,不過整體CP值高
在香港四天晚上都住这儿 除了空间小一点 毕竟寸土寸金 其他真的非常棒 体验感很好 到哪儿都很方便 店家也非常nice 特别是对比之后住的宾馆 这家 真的没话说 下次来还会住这儿的
Recommended guest house for those coming to hong kong. Walkable distance to hong kong metro subway, ladies market, shopping malls and mong kok areas!!
Výborná poloha ubytování.Ubytováni ok. Vše čisté a připravené. Žádné problémy.  Ken je skvelý člověk. Pefektní komunikace. Určitě se vrátim do tohoto ubytování. Kene děkuji moc za všechno. Děkuji.
Ken’s place was clean and well organized. His place was really easy to find.
这是我第二次选择了金门宾馆,相当的满意…Ken是位很friendly and nice的人…我与我的家人都非常的满意…下一次有去香港一定还会再选择回这间…
地理位置很好,房东也很热情,但是就是卫生间太小了,洗澡很容易水漫出来,而且花洒没有办法固定只能手持,除了这点其他都很满意｡
A very convenient place to stay - 3 minute walk to MTR and lots of nightlife around. For 2 people, the twin room was decently spacious. Ken was a great host.
Great choice for travellers looking for a place to rest while they explore the wonderful, busy city of Hong Kong. Ken and his team are super responsive!
We stayed at Ken’s place for 6 nights and enjoyed the time there, it’s our second time there, I would definitely come back again if I ever come back to Hong Kong and highly recommend this place.

name: A Formosa 2 -The red sofa room
space: Big, sunny room right in the middle of the heart of Oporto waiting for you to enjoy :) A spacious double bedroom,with a sofa that can also be used as a bed when necessary. There are other three rooms (one single and two double bedroom) on this floor, each with its own key.There are two bathrooms in the house, both with shower to shared use.  All linen and towels are provided. We have a large common living room & dining room where you can enjoy breakfast and relax in the sofa while listening to our vinyl records. The kitchen is fully furnished with a fridge, stove, cooking plates, coffee maker, toaster and kettle.  There is also a quiet terrace with sunbeds for you to relax after the long walks exploring the city. We have two metro stations (Aliados and Bolhão) just two minutes away from the house. On your doorstep you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, cafés, and some of the best bakeries in town within walking distance.
description: Big, sunny room right in the middle of the heart of Oporto waiting for you to enjoy :) A spacious double bedroom,with a sofa that can also be used as a bed when necessary. There are other three rooms (one single and two double bedroom) on this floor, each with its own key.There are two bathrooms in the house, both with shower to shared use. house_rules: "your home outside home" is our mote,so we expect you to feel both free and caring for the space were you are going to stay If you use the kitchen,please clean what you use. No smoking inside the house,please. We have a big terrace and balconies and if you smoke use this spaces to do so.

host.host_about:
Hosting people is traveling without leaving home.
My Guests are the best in the world.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Sara and Joao were so lovely!  Went out of their way to let us know all the good places to eat and made us feel at home.  Good location and great facilities.  Definitely recommend their place.
What a wonderful place to stay! If you like clean, convenient and friendly then this is your place.  I will stay here again!!
The room was great, very spacious, clean and with great lighting. I would not hesitate to stay there again.
Everything was nice, even waiting for us to arrive until 1 am ! Sara and Juan are really good guests and let you use the kitchen, the terrasse and the dining room.

We had a great time in rua formosa with Sara and Joao. Clean and confortable room, really in the old center of oporto. 
Obrigado! and A te a proxima!
Andrea e Valentina

Sara and John were amazing! It was are first time in Portugal and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. The location was superb and these hosts left you not wanting to leave. We would recommend Sara's apartments to anyone who is looking to relax and have a real taste of the local atmosphere. Hopefully we will be back again one day!
It's a very nice, clean and well located place. I really enjoyed my stay. Sara and Juan are awesome people who make you feel comfortable and at home.

Sara and Joao were wonderful. They were very accommodating, the room was spacious and clean and very inviting, and the property was centrally located. I would recommend this property to ANYONE visiting Porto, and in fact hope to stay there again in a few weeks.

Sara was very welcoming, and had a beautiful home. She also had great recommendations for us for local places to eat and go out in. My awesome experience in Porto was made even better by staying here!
Perfect and spacy apartment, perfect location and perfect city! Thanks!
We had a lovely time, hosts made everything to make our stay enjoyable and felt like home.

My girlfriend and I had a great time. Sara was very helpful well before the trip started, and Joao was very kind and welcoming throughout the duration of our stay. 
The apartment is in a great location. Direct line from the Airport, and walking distance from all city highlights.

Sara and Joao we very helpful, we stayed there only one night but wish we had stayed more. The appartment is a lovely / spacious / retro-chic hide-away right in the center of Porto...highly recommended!

Breakfast in the fridge was a vaery much appreciated touch!

I had a great time in Porto thanks to Joao who welcomed us warmly and indicated everything needed. Great atmosphere in this apartment, simple but decorated with taste, everything is here to make you feel at home, and Joao does the rest ;)
The air bnb description is 100% conform, no bad surprise!
I didn't have the chance to meet Sara, but she helped me to make a quick booking and was nice on the mails

I would definitively recommend this place to any friend that stays in Porto!
Lovely host, full of advices! The room and the house were beautiful, in a nice quarter. 100% recommended =)

I didnt hve a chance to meet sara but Joao was very friendly & helpful
I absolutely adored my accomodation - Sara & Joao have GREAT taste!
Everything was provided
Great Location!
Thank you so much for your hospitality

Me and my girlfriend had a great time in Porto definitely also thanks to Sara & Joao's place. The bed is comfortable, the room is clean, spacious and light, the bathrooms are clean, shower is good, kitchen is fully equipped (although we didn't use it because the food in Porto is too good to not enjoy every day & night) and both Sara & Joao were really helpful and friendly! And then when you think things can't get better..BAM..a record player and cheese in the fridge for good measure. Just saying :) 

Because it is so amazingly close to the center of town it can be a bit noisy at night so if you're a light sleeper or a nagger you should bring earplugs. However, I could not have imagined a nicer place to stay in Porto! 

Cheers
Great place! Very nice and central spot! Next  to the traditional Market! Sara and João are very Courteous hosts!

Lovely place in center of Porto. João was there to greet me when I arrived early on day one and went I left late on day two. I was only spending one night in town but it was no problem leaving my luggage in the room till my train was leaving which I really appreciated. 
My room was big, the internet was fast and the breakfast was spot on. I got good recommendations for things to do in the city so I will have to come back with my girlfriend and stay with Sara and João.

Sara was a great host! the motto in their introduction is very true - a home away from home.
location was great, very convenient for an all around visit to Porto
hope to come again soon...
Great central location, great place decorated with taste, great hosts ! Best spot in Porto but don't spread it too much so this sweet B&B don't get crowded !

Das Appartment ist sehr zentral gelegen (ca. 5 Gehminuten vom Bhf. São Bento), alles frisch renoviert & modern geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Zahlreiche Cafés & Läden in der Nähe; die Innenstadt ist gut fußläufig zu erkunden. Lage & Unterkunft top!
Ich habe Sara nicht kennengelernt, aber João war ein sehr netter, fürsorglicher Gastgeber. Absolut empfehlenswert!

The appartment is centrally located (5 min from São Bento station), new & modern tasteful refurbished. Many cafés & shops around; the city discoverable withtin a walking distance. Area & location top!
I didn't get to know Sara but João was a very nice & caring host. Absolutely recommendable!

Sara and Joao were absolutely wonderful hosts! The room was lovely, quiet, and spacious. The bed was very comfortable! Also, the apartment was so nice to come back to everyday--we napped on the terrace in the lounge chairs, and had leisurely breakfasts with yummy food provided by our hosts every morning. Joao also helped point us in the right direction for restaurants, events, and things to see around the city. Overall, a wonderful stay and I hope we can come back soon!
Good location, nice host, clean and bright apartment. Good experience staying there. Definitely recommended!

Fresh flowers, space and light make Joao and Sara's place a very cosy nest to stroll around in Porto. Their freshly renewed house is very central in Baixa, next to Bolhao market and metro station (direct to airport), a few minutes from Clerigos, Sao Bento train station, Sé and Ribeira. Single glazing windows offer you the sound of the city but their street is very calm at nights. Three rooms on our level, and two bathrooms which are far enough. Fully equipped kitchen, a nice living room and a large terrace we couldn't use because of the stormy weather. Our hosts come every day with their stories about Porto, Portugal and their lives, give you accurate piece of advices for where to go and a delicate taste of portuguese way of life (thanks for giving us the address of the best francesinha in town!)

A fantastic place to stay within walking distance of pretty much everything you might want to see in Porto. The flat is wonderful, retro cool and anywhere that has a copy of the Superfly soundtrack and a record player to play it on has to be good. 

Plenty of room however many guest are staying. 

Jaoa was full of insider knowledge, not least of which was the unmissable (Website hidden by Airbnb) . Get there early for brunch at the weekend.

Me and my friend had a great stay at la Formosa. Well located, beautiful appartment, we were more than happy to come back at this place after a day of walk in Porto.

It will be the place of our stay next time, for sure!

I had a lovely stay at Formosa 2. Absolutely a charming little place, clean, and within steps away from the metro station that takes you directly to the airport AND all the touristy spots that you need to hit. I have to add that the hosts are wonderful! I didn't get to meet Sara in person, but communication with her was prompt and easy. I met Joao, who is just so very helpful with everything, and available even close to midnight (apologies!) by cellphone, as i was having some problems opening the front door to the building. I highly recommend this place. Could not hv asked for a better place or host(s) in the lovely Porto! :)

João was there when we arrived. He is kind, speaks English really great, had no problem with communication. He helped to make our itinerary, recommend nice restaurants which was amazing. After I got back our country, I became an Airbnb host. I'm doing exactly same as João. Mark the place I recommend on the map for the guests or asking how's going so far, hanging out sometimes etc.. I really appreciated what our host did to us. We felt like we're in our dear friend house. 
 Room is exactly the same as photos and very spacious for two people. Clean and tidy, located really good. Greatest pastry store, Conga on Michelin guide and McDonald is few steps away.
Overall, perfect stay!

완전 좋았음. 다음에 또 포르토에 간다면 당연히 여기서 묵을 예정임.
clean with a nice style.  nice flat.

It was just exactly what we needed; a clean room with a view in the hart of Porto. Jaou made us a super breakfast with fresh products (from his parents garden if I'm correct) and day-fresh bread, helped us on our way in the city and just made a great host. 

Bathroom: clean, Livingroom: Cosy, Kitchen:  fully equiped with all the basic foods and drinks for free to take.

Super!

Foi a nossa melhor passagem de ano! <3
O João e a Sara são excelentes anfitriões, levamos da formosa dois amigos e um local para voltar numa próxima ida ao Porto! 

O apartamento está muito bem situado e o espaço está lindamente decorado, lençóis lavados e água quente, aquecimento no quarto e cama confortável! A cozinha estava muito bem equipada e no frigorífico e armários comida para livremente fazermos refeições. 

Fizeram-nos sentir em casa, excelente hospitalidade, adorámos! 
...e vamos voltar! ;)

maybe my best airbnb experience so far! we arrived to our friendly host, Joao he gave us great tips for food and drink and Porto in general. spot on about the free port cellar tours that aren't on the water front (we did croft's and taylors) Casa Guedes is amazing with the Serrana sandwich with cheese and pork, though we got tricked from his franceshina place, there are two cafe santiagos, on same street about 200m apart, we went to the wrong one which is more modern, but still good. the right one has plaques for voted best by trip advisor. I hope to go back!

Sara and Joa were excellent hosts. Very friendly and accommodating, not to mention speaking excellent English (a relief for us non-Portuguese speakers). Three of us stayed very comfortably in a room with a double bed and a pull out couch. There were two bathrooms with showers and tons of hot water (a priority in my book!) which made  it so that there were no bathroom hold ups in the morning with the three of us or the other guest down the hall. While Sara and Joa don't live there they were over often and offered to make us breakfast, which sadly we could not partake in b/c we had to leave so early. I would definitely stay with them again. They are very centrally located and gave us a map and lots of recommendations which were much appreciated. Definitely a great place to stay!

Pasamos unos estupendos dias en casa de Sara y Joao. La habitación es grande, luminosa y con muebles preciosos, super acogedora. Ubicada en una calle muy tranquila del centro, puedes ir a cualquier sitio andando.

Un lugar super recomendable para conocer Oporto.

A Formosa was on of the best places that I've stayed apart fom home. Defenetly the best hostal experience. Good service, welcoming and always very helpful. The rooms are nice an cosy, good bed and pillows, big windows, kitchen and bathrooms were always clean. Extra points from good taste in furnishing.

Some nice things A Formosa offered during my stay in march 2012: laundry service, good breakfast, heating and about kitchen was that a Formosa offers some spices, olive oil n stuff people usually need for cooking. 

A Formosa is centrally located, it's well taken care of and the atmosphere is good,  I highly recommend.
Perfect stay! Joao welcomed us with a very nice chat, we talked about life and had a couple of Porto shots. The house is brilliantly set up, very nice. You'll love it. The position is optimal.

It is hard to put my feelings into words.  Nonetheless I can say that the magic of Porto, in my eyes, has a lot to do with people like Joao and Sara.  Firstly, Joao came to meet me and my two friends in the pouring rain in the dead of night.  Joao takes his job very seriously; he even left dinner mid way to pick up another visitor!  I know this because we dined with Sara and Joao the first night there at a wonderful gem called Frangos.  I don't want to make this comment too long, but Joao and Sara are THE BEST and the most generous, hospitable people I have ever met.  I plan to come back to stay in this apartment the next time I can make it Porto, which I can guarantee you will be soon.  I would consider Joao and Sara my friends, though Joao would probably just say "oh my god i know right. what the fuck."  Missing you guys terribly.  Will email soon and will send back the Monocle which changed my life.

Nice, clean and very friendly place in the center of Porto with a good price-value ratio and a discreet service mentality of the host (Joao). We felt welcomed and at home and can recommend the place to other people. Obrigado.
La casa y la acogida ha sido muy buena. Las habitaciones y zonas comunes están muy limpias y son bastante acogedoras
Really nice appartement. Great welcome. Ideally situated. Easy when you arrive by train or plane !
Excellent location and great room, excellent value!

I stayed for three nights at Sara's cosy place with my partner and we really enjoyed our stay. We didn't actually get the chance to meet Sara, but João was extremely friendly and helpful in everything as we got some very useful tips to explore the wonderful city of Porto. The bedroom was very spacious and decorated with taste. We also enjoyed the common areas such as the terraces. Everything was clean and the breakfast was great giving a good start for each day. The location was just perfect right in the center of the city within a short walk to nearly all the interesting spots. Thank you so much for hosting us!

Amazing apartment in the very centre of Porto in which we felt like home. Sara and Joao appeared to be really helpful with all tips about the city life and tourist attractions. Place definately worth to recommend.
Thank you guys for making our stay so nice :)
Sara and Joao were wonderful people who made us feel very welcomed at their place. Great location, great rooms, great hosts. We wished we could have stayed longer!
A very friendly and accommodating couple in Casa Formosa- it reflects a very easy going ang generous nature that we found throughout Porto. We highly recommend it! We would definately go back again!

Hemos pasado unos días estupendos en A Formosa 2. La casa está inmejorablemente situada y es preciosa. No coincidimos con Sara, pero  sí con João, que fue un magnífico anfitrión y nos dio valiosos consejos acerca de la ciudad. Oporto y el alojamiento en A Formosa han sido una combinación perfecta. Altamente recomendable, ¡volveremos!

Guille y Estefanía.

our favourite place to stay from our whole three week vacation in portugal! incredibly helpful and friendly host, perfect location and the coolest vibe ever. i love the cool old world minimalism mixed with all the modern amenities one could need. 
when we come back to porto (and believe me, we WILL come back) we'll most definitely stay at a formosa. i'm telling all my friends about this hip place!

We had a great time Formosa! The owners were very friendly to us and really wanted to ensure our stay was the best. The rooms were clean and good, the terrasses were a fine addition to the house to enjoy breakfast or just relax.
A great place to stay - would highly recommend!

We had a great time at A Formosa.  Joao and Sara were very helpful from before we got there through helping us leave.  They gave us excellent food recommendations!
The room was nice and spacious and the apartment was very clean.  We would happily stay there again if we are in Porto.
Maison propre, bien située, et hôtes très accueillant. Merci

Althou  we didn't meet Sara, her friend João was wonderful and caring host.
 Accommodation was exactly what we were expecting to be. The entire apartment was very clean and tidy, few minutes from Alidados square.
We highly recommend this place.
Thank you!

A very special place, furnished with taste. The room was full of light, the bed comfortable, the living-room really cool, the kitchen nicely equiped with a juicer, and the 2 terrasses perfect to enjoy the breakfast. 
The apt is perfectly located, in the center, just next to the Bolhao market.
Most of all, Joao was a great host. We'll be back !
Clean, simple, inexpensive. Hosts were friendly and hospitable.

Unbeatable location, immaculately clean apartment, super friendly hosts, and very professionally run. We stayed just one night and João (sara's partner) made sure we had a great itinerary to make the most of our stay. We would absolutely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Porto. One of the best airbnb experiences we have had.

We received a warm welcoming by João (Sara's friend) who gave us a good quick guide and city advice. The flat is spacious, the kitchen has everything to prepare your own meals, and the breakfast food is variated and nice. The room is exactly as depicted in the photo; nice bed and clean sheets though it can use an extra place for keeping your clothes if you are planning a long stay with your couple. There are two bathrooms which are overall quite clean (the shower curtains need attention). Location is very good since is almost next to the City Hall of Porto and the closest metro station is almost two blocks away. There are some renovation works on the building next door resulting in noisy early mornings. Ask the owner if this is still going on by the time you are there. Engine sounds from the street can be heard at night.

Hosts and room was very nice.
We have good recommendations for vegeterian lunch in garage building.

The location is right in the centre of Porto and is perfect for walking the city as well as for transport connections in and around the city. The room was lovely and clean and the terrace was great for breakfast which was provided. There was a good internet connection as well. Finally the host, Joao, was very discreet but always very helpful providing us with a map and advice (including the best sandwich ever!). We would highly recommend to stay at Formosa.

We enjoyed staying at this nice appartment right in the city centre of Porto!
Thank you very much for everything!

If you are looking for a true B&B  experience and not just a room, this is a perfect solution. We only met Sara briefly but Joao turned up every morning with fresh bread or something else from the bakery for breakfast. The ktichen is fitted out well and the breakfast provisions provided make this exceptionally good value. The room is exactly as pictured. It is full of light, very large and comfortable. The linens were good quality and the bed exceptionally comfortable - very nice to sleep in. The house which was nicely decorated in retro style, is kept very clean every day.  Joao had many excellent suggestions for things to do and places to eat- especially those places that, as a tourist, you would never find. In addition to that, he was just a really interesting person to get to know.
We enjoyed are stay immensely and highly recommend it.

This place is the best Airbnb experience we have had so far!!!  Great room, exceptional host, nice breakfast, and an incredible value. The location is a little away from the river, but it is great for getting a taste of the local cuisine and culture! Overall great experience!

Joao was really friendly and helpfull, we got from him lots of information about local places and Portugal culture. Location is really good, and flat itself is nice and clean. We enjoyed our stay there!

João was a really nice host! We were just for one night in this apartment. But he made cake for us and helped us with a taxi in the night to the airport. Further, the house was very nice and the location could not be better, in the middle of the city. There was also lots of food we could use. We felt very welcome!
Great Location! Charming Apartment!

Enjoyed our stay at Casa Formosa very much. Joao was helpful and informative, enthusiastic and creative about Porto and Portugal, which added to our enjoyment of the city and it surroundings. We were guided to family restaurants, informal fado, and markets. The room was comfortable and clean and the shared bathrooms kept spotless. Breakfast was fresh and plentiful. All in all a very good experience. Even the noisy gulls and the odd lorry or machine in the night became just part of the rich mix. Thank you, Joao.

Great place to stay. Highly recommend! Joao is a great host and brings fresh bread every morning! Make sure to ask him where the best gelato place is and the pork rolls!! If you have a hearty appetite, ask him where to find the best tasting little french girl...or francescina. Best location!

Nice & clean room, perfectly situated in the heart of Porto AND no problem with parking possibilities.
We enjoyed our stay in Porto a lot! Such an interesting, varied city with great bakeries, bars, cafés etc. Joao is a super great host, very obliging and attentive! Thanks to him and his advice we have found the best traditional Portuguese fresh fish restaurant in Portugal :)
Thanks a lot!

Gorgeous bedroom on a vintage decorated stylish flat. Just wish I had more time to enjoy my short stay. Definitely will return. Joao  as a host was truly helpful, friendly and super flexible with all our needs. 5 f*****stars!

(Website hidden by Airbnb) João is amazing person, very helpful and he really made us feel like we are in our home! The apartment is located in the center and you are able to reach everything on foot. It is clean and for breakfast you can have almost everything. I wish to have more days to stay in Porto. When I' ll be back for sure I will visit him again!
João is a great guy, really friendly and easy going. I loved the space and the ambiance of his Casa Formosa and the location is just excellent! Highly recommended.

The location was perfect, the bedroom and bathrooms were very clean. There was free breakfast. Joao was an excellent host.  His English was flawless, and his brief summary of the city was very helpful. I will definitely choose this place again next time I visit Porto.

Joao is a great and friendly host. He gave us lots of good advices. 
The room was nice, sunny and clean. 
We had a very good time in his house.
We definitely recommand this adress.

My fiancé and I greatly enjoyed staying in Joao's place. It was exactly what we needed. We spent 3 nights in Porto and we were able to see everything we wanted and still get a good night sleep. Joao was great, even though we didn't see him that much, he gave us great recommendations for food and where to to visit and was always accessible.
joão is the best host ever! Kind, warm, funny...caring. just perfect. Apartment is nice, location epic. I'd recommend it to anybody.

This apartment is a great way to spend your stay in Porto. It's very cosy and charming. Also João is such a happy, warm and helpful person. The interior is nice and has a vintage atmosphere. Location is very central! Highly recommended!

La casa está localizada en un sitio estupendo, muy bien comunicado con el aeropuerto y a 15 minutos andando de la Ribeira. La habitación era amplia y espaciosa, muy limpia y agradable. Joao es un gran anfitrión y estuvimos muy a gusto.

A casa formosa est un endroit idéal pour visiter Porto. Nous y avons sejourné 2 nuits avec notre fils de 2 ans. L'appartement est très bien situé juste à côté de la mairie, une grande terrasse idéale pour le petit déjeuner, 4 chambres et 2 salles de bains, le tout très propre et decoré avec goût, il est relativement facile de se garer à proximité. Il y a un réfrigérateur à disposition et une machine à laver (le top pour des itinérants comme nous). Joao est un hôte très disponible, serviable et en plus parlant français ! A recommander sans hésitation.

Joao is one of the best hosts i`ve ever met. He is friendly, helpfull, warm and really funny. He showed us the best places in Porto (to eat, to drink, to see). His apartment is cozy and has a good mood. Very central, clean, with a great roof terrace and a great vintage look. We really enjoyed our time there. We will come back :)
We very much enjoyed our stay at João's house. We are definitely coming back soon!
Great location, great host, great room! Apartment was clean, wifi was very good and we even got breakfast.  We had a very pleasant stay!

Our stay in Porto was incredible! And the main reason - Joao. Helpfull, funny, interesting peorson!!!! Just start to speak and you can't stop smiling.
The room is good, spaceous and very clean. The apartment has a lovely terrace, ideal for breakfast and evening drinks.
Joao was an attentive and knowledgeable host who clearly enjoys the company of passing travellers. The location is perfect and the accommodation was great. Fully recommended.

Joao was a great host, the first thing he did when i got to his place was take out a map and show me some great spots to see around the city. I would definitely return to Casa de Formosa - the location couldn't be better and the rooms are great.

It was a great and warm experience!  It started with a simple mail fixing our arrival leading us from aeroporto to the red sofa room.  Joao was a fantastic host.  We got lot's of information about the city:  How the city is organised?  The different districts?  Where to eat good and cheap?  How to find the best gin-tonic bar? ...  It was our first airbnb experience and now we're in for life!  Thank you Joao!
...and of course, we'll be back someday to have a coffee...
Grtz and hugs from Hervé and Reinhilde (Belgium)
O João é muito porreiro. A casa tem muito boas condições e está mesmo no centro da bela cidade do Porto. Dá para passear a pé para qualquer lado. 5 estrelas!

We really had an amazing time at Joaos apartment! He knows how to make his guests feel comfortable and he recommended us amazing places to go to! Also the apartment is beautiful and very comfortable! For the breakfast we had a large variety of things!! We hope to come back!!

A comunicação com o João foi sempre pronta e eficaz. Fizemos a reserva no próprio dia e o João certificou-se que tudo estaria pronto aquando a nossa chegada.
O quarto é luminoso e muito espaçoso e estava agradavelmente aquecido.
Gostamos da nossa breve estadia na Casa Formosa.
Joao was inviting, helpful and easy to talk with about Porto and other things. He seems genuine and anxious to please his guests.

The place to stay in Porto! Joao is a great host and I definitely recommend to stay at is place.
I stayed for just an evening and didn't had the opportunity to explore much Porto nor the place, however, it is a great typical apartment in the heart of Porto.
Joao as a host is great, he receives guests very well, guides us through and recommended places.
To repeat.

Logement très bien situé... 4 nuits à Porto sans utiliser le métro sauf pour se rendre à la chambre et regagner l'aéroport (1/2 métro !)... Très bon accueil chaleureux... João est charmant  et nous donne plein de "tuyaux" pour éviter les pièges à touristes ! 2 sdb à se partager pour les 4 chambres pouvant accueillir jusqu'à une dizaine de personnes ! Très propre !

O João é muito receptivo e simpático.
Ficamos somente uma noite na vossa casa e gostamos muito do quarto. Boa localização, limpo e espaçoso.
O banheiro também limpo e o chuveiro com água quente

Joao Pinto rulez  Porto! His apartment was really spacious, bright and has got this modern twist which you would love! Central location brings the opportunity to pop in for quick nap if you need one whilst visitng beautiful Porto.  He advised us on places to visit and try local cusine.  We loved his sarcastic/ironic sens of humour. We would defo recommend the host and his castle.

João is an amazing host! My mother and I really enjoyed to stay in La Casa. The description of the room and entire flat was to the point, you will find everything you need in it and it is perfectly located to discover Porto. João is present to give great travel tips and hints for authentic Portuguese restaurants. I would def. recommend to stay in A Casa Formosa!

Super super!
It was a great place to stay in Porto. João was very helpfull and friendly! The room was big and clean. The bed was Nice!
Merci à Joao pour son accueil : tout était OK dans la chambre et la salle de bains. Nous avons bien apprécié la machine à laver.

Joao est venu nous cherchez dans porto et nous a guidé jusqu'au parking le plus prés pour ensuite nous conduire vers notre location, il nous a indiqué les meilleurs restos et toute les choses à visiter sur une carte de la ville de porto.
il nous mis toute sa maison a disposition et a accueilli nos amis également en airbnb.

We stayed for two nights at João's. He is a very(!) good host! He told us good local spots where we should go!
The room is exactly how it was discribed, clean and cosy,  like the rest of the flat.
The location is almost in the Centre of Porto - so you can explore the City perfectly by foot!

We had a great time in Porto, and we'll definately recommend João's Casa Formosa!!!!

Joao gave us a great description how to get to his place, so it was very easy to find his house. The room was as advertised, and he is a very friendly and accomodating host. Talking to him about my plans for the next day, he offered his support - fabulous.
O João foi simpático apresentando os pontos principais da cidade através de um mapa. O quarto é confortável e a localização é boa.

João nous a très bien accueilli, il nous a donné une carte et pleins de bonnes adresses. Il a toujours été accessible et à l'écoute quand nous en avions besoin. 
Son appartement est propre et exactement comme sur les photos. 
Nous avons passé un super séjour chez lui et recommandons l'adresse à 200%.
Quarto muito bem decorado, espaçoso, cheio de luz, na zona mais portuense do Porto!

Detta boende är centralt beläget, nära till vad Porto kan erbjuda. Joao är en fantastisk värd. Han var mycket organiserad och trevlig. Rummet var rent och snyggt. Inredningen är personlig, med fin 50-talskänsla. Man delar kök och badrum med andra, men det fungerade smidigt och bra. Rekommenderas varmt!

João is a really helpful guy, he took at least 30 Minutes for us to give us tips for the city, without the need to ask.
The room is quite nice, but I think a bit to small for more than 5 ppl. The rest of the flat is very beautiful and unique and João will be around for a chat quite often too.
We had an awesome time in Porto and would love to come again!

Very helpful, Joao provided us with tips for our visit to Porto and he upgraded my mother as he had another room available. This house is large and comfortable with walkout balconies from the bedroom in addition to the very large shared ones. I would stay here again hands down. Lovely experience.

포르투는 아주 작은 곳이므로 이 숙소에서 어디든 10~15분가량 이면 도보로 이동가능합니다. 호스트 분이 첫날 아주 자세하고도 친절하게 주변에 대해 설명해 주셨고 특히 음식점에 대한 해박한 지식으로 지도에 꼼꼼히 표시해주었기 때문에 로컬들이 가는 소박하고도 값싼 음식을 많이 접할수 있어요.
방은 둘이 지내기에 충분한 공간이었고 소파를 침대삼아 사용할수도 있게되어있는데, 아쉬운 점이 있다면 화장실의 기구들이 많이 낡았고 세탁기가 윗층 주인집에 있어서 자유롭게 (주인분은 자유롭게 쓰라고 열쇠까지 주셨지만) 사용하기 조금은 부담스러웠습니다. 그리고 가격이 저렴하지는 않다는 생각도 들고요.
하지만 전체적으로 최고의 도시 포르투를 즐기기에 좋은 장소라고 생각되어져요.

Ich kann Joãos Unterkunft nur wärmstens empfehlen. Das Zimmer hat genau der Beschreibung entsprochen. Der Standort der Wohnung ist super gelegen. Ich wurde sehr herzlich empfangen von João und habe super Restauranttipps bekommen! Vielen Dank noch mal dafür. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder!

Central location, close to shops, cafes and public Transport. Joao was very friendly, accommodating and guided us with all the necessary information of tourist and local attractions. Overall a pleasant stay!

Joãos place is super central, the location couldn't have been better, really friendly guy and check-in was totally easy :)
Approved! Recommended!
Lovely, clean, spacious flat in a great location.

This is a room in a hostel located in the heart of Porto. You'll get a nice room, cool balcony with a view over the narrow street (which I loved) and shared facilities like a dining room, kitchen and several bathrooms. The location is really great as you're in the walking distance to the city center but at the same time it's located on a smaller street which is quiet and cozy. There're some great restaurants just around the corner and you can actually take the food away and eat in the dining room to the sounds of gulls and old vinyls from the host's collection. The hostel features a collection of vintage stuff which is picked by orange color.
Highly recommended for getting to know the beautiful city of Porto!
房东非常有趣,跟我们聊了很多,也总是能及时的给予我们帮助!房间很大也很干净,只是卫生间稍稍有点不够理想!总体来说是值得推荐的地方!

C'était un séjour formidable dans cette grande maison en plein centre de Porto et à 2 minutes de tout. 

Joao a été un très bon hôte, très gentil et plein d'humour il nous a montré dès notre arrivée toutes les choses à faire et à ne pas faire à porto, les bon restaurants et les bons quartiers pour faire la fête. 

Très social, il répondra à toutes vos questions sans aucun soucis. Il comprend le français mais vous répondra en anglais parce qu'il est timide ^^

La maison est faite de telle sorte que personne ne se marche sur les pieds mais on y fait toujours de belles rencontres. 

Je recommande vivement, j'y retournerai avec plaisir dans cette "auberge Portugaise"
really nice stay in João's Place. Clean,  lovely furnished and everything is easy to reach.  You need earplug, if you have a light sleep but nothing more. - Obrigada João!

We had a reservation with Joao's home one day prior to our arrival to Porto. Easy access to the his address and closeness to the metro station was key to our decision. It was also very convenient to tour around the city so we walked to almost most places. Joao was very friendly and was kind enough to give us basic information on how to best tour around the old town and also the northern medieval towns and national parks.  The Red Sofa Room was comfortable and met our expectations. We highly recommend this place to explore lovely city of Porto.
logement très bien situé en plein centre de Porto , métro ,  nombreux bus , et commerces à proximité . Logement propre et vaste .

Lage und Preis-Leistung waren super.
Check in war etwas unglücklich. Joao gab an bis 20uhr da zu sein. Nachdem wir zeitig genug losgefahren sind erreichte uns die Antwort, dass er doch nicht mehr da sei. Dann sollten wir den Schlüssel in einem Restaurant abholen, wo wir nach 15min durchfragen endlich den Schlüssel bekamen. Leider war im Bad Schimmel an den Decken und am Wasserhahn.
Zimmer und Handtücher waren absolut in Ordnung.

Guten Tag Zusammen,

Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit dem Apartment. Die Lage ist wirklich super. Paar Minuten zum Supermarkt. Direkt unter der Wohnung ist ein Bäcker und in die Stadt dauert es auch kaum.

Die Wohnung war schön eingerichtet und sehr groß. Alles steht einem zur Verfügung. Super Terrasse zum grillen und Wein trinken.

Ein negativer Faktor war der Lärm zur Straßenseite. Schon früh morgens hört der Schmuckladen Musik per Lautsprecher das zum Apartment schallt. Die Fenster waren nicht so gut abgedichtet wie ich es kenne aus Deutschland. Scheint aber typisch portugiesisch zu sein.

Ansonsten kann man die Wohnung nur sehr empfehlen.

Vera hat uns super Tipps gegeben und sie sprach super englisch.
Very nice place with great location in vicinity of central area.

It's a nice apartment to stay. The location is close to public transport and not to far from the center. The room was plenty big. Just note that the bed isn't very wide. I can recommend this place if you don't mind sharing an apartment with other people.

The location is wonderful, right in the middle of the city- close by to many shops and restaurants. All amenities were nice, good lighting and common areas. The space was very clean and well-kept. Joao was kind enough to allow for a late check-out and was easy to communicate with. My only complaint was that the pillows could have had more fluff. All in all, a nice place to stay that fulfilled all of our needs.

O quarto é espaçoso e cheio de luz, a decoração podia ser um pouco mais trabalhada. A vera foi muito prestável e amável e sempre rápida a responder às nossas mensagens. Também nos deu óptimas recomendações para comer perto de casa. A casa esta perto de tudo já que o centro do porto e pequenino. Tem a zona comercial e central super pertinho. A qualidade preço parece estar de acordo. Repetiria certamente.
El apartamento es muy agradable, mucho espacio y acogedor; la ubicación es muy buena, se puede disfrutar la ciudad caminando. Los cuartos de buen tamaño y cómodos. Buena opción para unos pocos días.
Great house and very kind host
João was an amazing host and I recommend this place.

My friend and I booked a room at Joao’s place for 2 nights, not knowing that such a great place would be ‘waiting’ for us. The kitchen provided all the equipment we needed, to cook for ourselves. We also had soap, shampoo, towels etc. 
There is one big terrace where we enjoyed our meals and had nice conversations with the other guests. Joao and Vera gave us helpful tipps when we asked for them. Also the flexible checkin/ checkout was perfect for us, since our ‘travel-style’ was also spontanious.
Thank you for having us, would stay there again!

my cousin and I stayed at the joao apartment for 2 nights. The apartment is central, large and in vintage style, I loved it. There is a very large and well-equipped terrace, the apartment is bright, the host at the entrance provides maps for the city to hold and in the salon has more detailed guides to consult. Although the two bathrooms are shared we did not have any cleaning or other problems.
Nice,nice , nice!!!!!
公寓很大,所以需要和其他三间卧室的客人共享客厅､厨房和卫生间｡厨房只提供设施,盐､油､调料都需要客人们自己添置｡洗衣机不在公寓内,需要要求房东拿到他家去清洗｡公寓里有蚊子,晚上如果不想被蚊子叮,就需要闻着灭蚊剂的味道入睡!
Great place to stay in Porto. Very cozy and centrally located, host was easy to communicate with and very sweet!
The appartment is located in the center of Porto, close to everything. The appartment is clean and the staff very helpful. We had a great stay!
Great and central location with a nice terrace! Totally recommanable :)

name: Kona Country Cottage (Clean and Cozy)
summary: Cute and Clean, Hawaiian style cottage in Holualoa. Upgraded 2 bedroom, 1 bath with full kitchen, living/dining areas, Wifi and Cable TV.  Comfortable outside living on the lanai, ocean and mountain views, turnkey and ready to go. Holualoa is close to everything you need but just far enough away for cool, country comfort.
space: Cute and Clean, Hawaiian style cottage in Holualoa. Upgraded 2 bedroom, 1 bath with full kitchen, living/dining areas, Wifi and Cable TV.  New sleeper sofa with pull out queen size bed. Comfortable outside living on the lanai to enjoy the country surroundings.  Ocean and mountain views, cooler elevation but still just minutes to Kailua town.  Kitchen has everything you need, just stop at the grocery store on your way up.  New tiled walk in shower with granite top vanity. Bath is stocked with linens, towels, beach towels, cooler, etc. We do have a no pets policy. No smoking in or near the house please.
description: Cute and Clean, Hawaiian style cottage in Holualoa. Upgraded 2 bedroom, 1 bath with full kitchen, living/dining areas, Wifi and Cable TV.  Comfortable outside living on the lanai, ocean and mountain views, turnkey and ready to go. Holualoa is close to everything you need but just far enough away for cool, country comfort. Cute and Clean, Hawaiian style cottage in Holualoa. Upgraded 2 bedroom, 1 bath with full kitchen, living/dining areas, Wifi and Cable TV.  New sleeper sofa with pull out queen size bed. Comfortable outside living on the lanai to enjoy the country surroundings.  Ocean and mountain views, cooler elevation but still just minutes to Kailua town.  Kitchen has everything you need, just stop at the grocery store on your way up.  New tiled walk in shower with granite top vanity. Bath is stocked with linens, towels, beach towels, cooler, etc. We do have a no pets policy. No smoking in or near the house please. (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps is the best way to find us. The ro
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Historic Holualoa!  Desired by many for it's cooler elevation yet only minutes from the ocean and downtown Kailua- Kona.  Located in the Kona Coffee Farm Belt on the slopes of Hualalai.  Wake up to beautiful ocean views from this cottage in the country.  Holualoa offers a post office, art galleries, restaurant and a small family convenience store. Drive 15 mins and you are in town for shopping, restaurants, ocean and beaches. The airport is 30 mins away. Holualoa does have roosters and coqui frogs which you will hear at night, especially when it rains.
notes: Holualoa has roosters and during the rainy season we do have coqui frogs which can be a little noisy at night.  This is  common in many areas on the Big Island. The cost of electricity in Hawaii is very high and the hot water heater is on a timer. It's on from 5am-10am and 4pm-12midnight. To ensure hot water at other times there is a gray box mounted to the corner of the house, manually slide the switch to on and it takes about 15mintues for the water to get hot.
transit: You will need a car if you want to get around.  We are a short 15 minute drive to town with access to most everything you will need.  There is a local family store in Holualoa with the basic necessities, post office, art galleries, a cafe and restaurant. There are many adventures and places to see and do on the Big Island!
access: (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps is the best way to find us. The route to Holualoa coming up Lako street is the easiest. Lockbox on entry door.  Code will be sent prior to your arrival.
interaction: We want you to enjoy the convenience of coming and going during your stay.  We live in Holualoa and you can call us anytime with questions or issues.
house_rules: Our property is located on a private road in Holualoa.  The location is private, quiet and at a cooler elevation on the slopes of Hualalai.  We do have a no pets policy.  There is a binder with info in the kitchen drawer when you arrive.  Otherwise we are just a phone call away if you have questions.

host.host_about: Aloha!  Our family roots are here in Hawaii. Sandy is a Realtor for 30+ years and loves working with people.  She loves to travel with her grandbabies and almost every kind of craft.  I'm the daughter and we work together full time.  We hope to meet you someday!

reviews.comments: Sandy made us feel most welcome. She had great suggestions for beaches, where to shop, etc. The house was clean and comfortable. We cooked many meals in the kitchen and sat on the lanai to watch many sunsets. We loved how quickly we could get down into the hustle and bustle of Kona, and then how quickly we could get up and away from it all. Kona Country Cottage is a great place to stay on the dry side of the Big Island.

Exactly what the other reviewer said, close to everything but far enough away to enjoy it all. My family had a good time relaxing after a long day out and about exploring the island. Sandy was very welcoming and helpful. Everything you need to make the cottage feel like your second home. If your from a big city look up in the sky at night to see all the stars. Small convienence store and great restaurant 200 yards down the road.

We couldn't ask for more. The house was amazing. It was spacious, clean, nicely decorated, complete with basic necessities, and even beach towels are provided! Finding this beautiful house would be a little bit tricky but we got the hang of it. Highly recommended!
非常整洁干净的房子,在山上,从科纳开车过去有一些路,不过总体很不错｡

This was such a beautiful place! We would highly recommend it and would come back again.  It is in a beautiful place with an very nice view and peaceful ambience.  Sandy is very sweet and kind and excellent to interact with.

My family of 4 spent a great week on the Big Island and having a cottage on the mountain with a nice view on the sea was central.
Sandy and Rachelle were great host and felt that the house had all the little necessities to enjoy our stay.
We will definitely stay there again and recommend the cottage to anyone coming this way.

Sandy was an awesome host, extremely attentive to our needs! The location was perfect for our needs, it seems ideal for 3-4 people. We loved the location, close enough to downtown Kona, but still a distance away to get peace and privacy. If we came back here in the future, we would hope to stay here again!

We had a wonderful stay at sandy's house in Kona. She made it very easy for us to access the key and responded to our messages/questions super fast. The house is also very lovely and true to descriptions. We didn't have any problem with anything!

We spent 4 nights at the cottage and it was just perfect. Nicely decorated and lots of space for 2 people. We loved the Lani to sit and watch the sunset and listen to the coqui frogs at night. The cottage was equipped with everything you needed for a comfortable stay and some goodies left in the fridge for us to enjoy! Sandy and Rachelle were easily available to get in contact with and communication prior and during was fantastic via email. Location is great, away from the tourist resort town of Kona. Holualoa is set in the hills of a beautiful artist village with a great cafe and restaurant holuakoa gardens and cafe less than a minute drive away! Finding the cottage was a little tricky for us located on a private road but once you find some good landmarks to know where to turn its pretty simple. We would love to return and make our stay back at the cottage, we would recommend this place any day!!

Our stay at Kona Country Cottage was simply perfect. After travelling for many months and staying in many nice airbnbs, this was the best of all. The setting is more than idyllic, the cottage is incredibly cute and was perfectly clean and equipped. I almost cried when we had to leave. You can't find better value anywhere in Hawaii. Don't ever think of staying in a hotel there, they are all ridiculously overpriced.
Honestly, you will not find a nicer place to stay anywhere in Hawaii. Thank you so much, Sandy!
We were welcomed with very clean setting up whole place which was cool enough after beach activities. We had beautiful sunset everyday!

Staying at Sandy's lovely home was amazing. My friends and I did not have the pleasure of meeting her because we were out doing so many activities but the moment we arrived I felt as if it was my own home. The locations was not to far from Kona and easy to find. The home was so clean and everything we needed and more was there. the nights were peaceful and the morning came with natures famous alarm clock...a rooster. The beds were so comfortable and spacious room for all our luggage. I would recommend anyone who is looking for a nice, peaceful, and a aloha filled home, Sandy's home is the way to go.

This was an awesome place to stay.  Nice house, great location and lots of charm.  Sandy was very nice and had the place very well prepared for our visit.  Before you shop for anything see what other guests have left behind.  We contributed a beach umbrella!  Thank you for hosting us and for having a very nice house to share.
Our experience was awesome!! We had a little trouble with hot water but they fixed it by the second day. Thanks again for the wonderful stay in Kona.
The place was very nice and clean. It's located uphill next to a coffee plant, a bit difficult to find in the first place.

Staying at Sandy's place was painless and enjoyable. She left detailed instructions on how to find the location and check in and the place was very comfortable and more than enough room for my business partner and myself.
鸟语花香

We loved this cute little home! Having the porch to sit on in the early mornings was so peaceful, and the evening sunsets were beautiful. The garden was an active place to observe, with lots of geckos, bird, and chickens, and full of plywood, avocados, limes, and other pants. 

Thank goodness for the air mattress in the closet! We ended up being that extra bed for my husband and two year old.

The place was great, and Sandy was very responsive.  It is also a lot cooler here up on the hill than down by the beach, so I also recommend it for people wanting a place to sleep that is cooler.  Great place, great host!
We loved this cottage. Super cute and clean. The location was perfect and it was easy to find.

We loved staying in the upcountry cottage! It was so lovely to be near Holualoa-such a sweet spot. Coffee growing across the street and ranches up the road. Great walks! And we had everything we needed, including the water jug to fill up at the store. The home was clean and very nicely decorated. Best lanai ever-we spent a lot of time there. Mahalo for all the nice details.

Loved the Kona Country Cottage. The house was clean and well equipped  with just about everything we needed. As described, those coqui frogs were in full force but we were use to them by night two! Enjoyed sitting on the lanai and watching the wildlife(hens, roosters, butterflies and geckos).  Great location! Very private. Thank you Sandy!

Sandy made sure that instructions are clear and it was easy to find the place even at night.  The cottage is located 500m above sea level and has a nice view of the ocean. 
The cottage is very clean and well kept. Sandy made sure that the cottage felt like a home away from home.  Ample towels, full kitchen facilities, extra pillows etc were available . She made sure guests are really comfortable in the cottage. 
Loved the outdoor lounge area. Would have my morning breakfast there enjoying sea view and cool breeze. 
Sandy dropped by to see if I was comfortable.  Really liked her personal touch in making sure  I received the hawaiian hospitality.
Cottage had a very good vibe and I felt very peaceful staying there . After the hustle and bustle of training and completing the Kona Ironman race, I felt good coming back to the cottage everyday.
Spacious cottage with a nice view! I really enjoyed my stay there. Thank you for being a wonderful host.
Sandy was very responsive and helpful.  Neighborhood nice and quiet.
The house is really nice and well located. Both bedrooms are good, one of the beds is pretty small for a full size though. It was clean and made my friends and I fell at home.
It is a good place to live. My wife and I, and her parents really enjoy living there.
Sandy had a really nice little place with everything you could need! The lanai was the best.. great for late nights hanging out and early morning breakfast!!

I loved this house! Our hosts were prompt with their communication, anticipating our needs. I loved the neighborhood - feeling very much in the country with the sounds of coqui frogs, ample fruit trees and high above Kona, but at the sane time close to restaurants and other activity. 
The 4 of us were very comfortable in this space. The lanai was incredible, the beds were comfortable and the kitchen was well equipped for our needs. We thought the location was perfect, peaceful and close to town. We will definitely want to stay here the next time we are on the Big Island.
Great spot!  A tiny bit out of town but easy access to highways in all directions; great if you have a vehicle.
This is a great cozy little place. Very clean, recommend to other travelers.

Lovely spacious cottage in the midst of Kona coffee country! Beautiful sunset views. Loved sitting on the lanai and just hanging out. A nice home away from home. Easy access to all attractions in Kona, yet far enough from the crowds and tourist traps. Love to come back and spend more time soon. Very responsive and friendly hosts. Mahalo Sandy and Rachelle :)
great!!

A fantastic place to stay if you want to be away from the hustle and bustle of town. In the cooler hills but a short drive from everywhere. You feel surrounded by nature, we loved the frogs that croaked all night and didn't mind the roosters either. The house is difficult to find first time, you will need GPS especially if it is dark. Everything you need is there, very well stocked kitchen and plenty of space.
We had a lovely stay and will definitely stay here again

Fantastic little cottage in close proximity to all things Kona.  Quiet residential area surrounded by nature!  Cool evenings and nights made for fantastic sleep.  They thought of most everything you could need while here including ice chest, bags, etc.  look forward to staying again!
Great place up in the hills. Very nice house. Spacious.

We really enjoyed the privacy and the cleanliness of this house. The house had everything a guest could wish (parking, good wifi, kitchen, washer-dryer, and a beautiful lanai with a view). You do hear coqui frogs in the evening but they quiet down later at night. For us it was part of the charm, just like the roaming neighborhood rooster. Our hosts were also very responsive and helpful in their communication.
We really enjoyed the quiet beauty of this place! Had everything we needed for our stay. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay on the Kailua side of the island.

Maison très bien équipée. Il y a tout pour cuisiner. Très propre. Les photos représentent très bien l'endroit. Nous étions 5 et avons été très bien logés. Facile de communiquer avec l'hôte. Nous conseillons fortement cet endroit.

Location was close enough to everything we needed for our trip. We enjoyed the old local kine decor. Only set back is you can only take a hot shower during certain hours. They have the hot water heater on a timer, stumbling around the back of the house at 10pm to find switch then wait 15 minutes to shower was a bummer. I live on Maui and understand how expensive electricity is, however when you rent nightly and guests pay a good price they should be able to shower when they want. Setting a timer and leaving us with not hot water purpose unacceptable.
Beautiful home in a beautiful setting.  With a lemon tree, an avocado and a lilikoi tree all in the yard.  The cool town is just a 5 minute walk.  Beautiful view of the ocean.

Sandy的房子非常棒,干净整洁｡房子在半山腰,要开大约20分钟到半小时的上山路｡建议大家白天到达,因为天黑的时候找房子有些困难｡
我们住在Sandy家很享受,夜晚很安静,早晨都会被公鸡叫醒｡还有院子里的柠檬树!牛油果树!每天都会从树上掉下一､两个熟透了的牛油果｡
这个地方棒极了!

this house is just amazing , brilliant view ,very tidy , fully equipped with everything I wish could be needed , neighbors are so friendly as well . 
Sandy is very nice person , i would stay     in here again for sure !

We loved staying at Sandy's place.  She's so organized and really thinks of everything a guest could want.  We'll definitely return.  Be aware that there are loud roosters nearby in Holualoa who may wake you up.  Aside from that, paradise!
all was super except the roosters LOL LOL
Highly recommend it. Very clean with great porch.
We had a wonderful time.

Sandy's house is very well maintained and clean. The patio is very nice and the kitchen is well-equipped so we cooked several times. She is very considerate and let us check in a little bit earlier. There were several rosters in the first day but we didn't hear them later on. During the night there were some sound made by coqui frog (which we first thought to be birds), which doesn't bother us at all. In the storage room in the backyard, there are some boggie boards and sand toys. Anyway, this house is great for family.

We would absolutely stay here again! It was the perfect size, very clean and Sandy is wonderful.  Any and everything we needed was there that we forgot or didn't bring.  The tropical sounds were magical and the colorful tropical birds were amazing.  The view of the city is amazing.  What a great place, made our whole trip extra special.  Thank you!

Wonderfull cottage in the middle of the trees, very peacefull (with frog sounds at night), very convenient location, perfectly corresponding to the description, and very good contact with Rachelle and Sandy. 
We would definitively love to come back here again.
enjoyed the stay at your house, nice place with good view.

Loved the location of this house as well as the prompt communication from the hosts! They always replied quickly to any of our queries during the stay! The house is well stocked with utilities and extremely clean. Would definitely visit this during our next visit :)

Excellent place to stay!! We enjoyed the cottage and would happily stay here again! In fact, we did at the end of our trip. 

We arrived at night, and it was fine getting into the house. The roads are windy and narrow, so take it slow driving. The bedrooms were comfortable. The view from the porch (ocean and plants) was wonderful to wake up to. We were glad to sit on the porch in comfy chairs. There were a few mosquitos, but we bought bug spray. If you'd rather sit inside, you can, and the screen door and windows make it feel like you're outside. We used the washer to freshen up our swimsuits from several days of scuba diving, snorkeling, and relaxing times on the Kona beaches (and with sea turtles!)  Note, the frogs at night are loud and the roosters can wake you up in the morning, but we enjoyed the nature sounds!! 

The surrounding area was nice for a quiet stroll but a ~10-15+ minute drive from the busyness of Kona shops/places to eat. We walked just down the road to cute little shops (galleries and cafe), which included historic signs describing how the buildings were in the early 1900s. Kona and this cottage were a great place to stay - highly recommended!! Thank you Sandy for making it such a nice home.

We had a great time at Sandy's lovely place. It's a beautiful home away from the  tourist crowds, close to coffee farms, with a view of the ocean. There is a little cafe and art galleries a short walk away. We stayed at Sandy's on two separate occasions. Everything was clean and organized for both arrivals- even all of the bathmats had been changed. The few downsides of the location were the roosters in the morning and the mosquitoes. Both were easy to overlook. I would highly recommend this cottage.

Sandy was very responsive, communication was clear and check-in and check-out very smooth. House was very clean and overlooking Kona with a great view from the pleasant outdoor area.
It was a bit smaller than what I expected to accommodate our party of 2 adults and 2 children with no blinds on the window waking us up quite early. Probably not the most easy house to use for families but otherwise Sandy provides a BBQ, a cooler and everything which is needed to have a pleasant stay. 
Thanks Sandy!

Sandy's place is quiet and comfortable, in the sleepy town of Holualoa. Within walking distance to the few shops/restaurants in the town. Good location for exploring Kealakekua and Kailua-Kona. Neighborhood is quiet. The higher elevation means it rains more, especially in the evenings. Would definitely stay here again next time we are needing a place for a few nights on the leeward side. Nice spot. Mahalo nui!

This place is awesome. Has a great view to town and ocean from its balcony. There is also an amazing lime tree in the yard. Totally recommend it and would stay here again. Sandy and Rachelle were very quick in responding. I would like to thank them for letting us stay at their beautiful place. Mahola Sandy and Rachelle!

The cutest little home in paradise!  Super clean and well maintained.  It really does feel like home!  If you're looking for peace and quiet away from all the tourists, this is the place for you.  We didn't see or hear a single person other than ourselves during the stay.  Kitchen is perfect size for all your needs.  Will most def come again!

This house is very good for family, you basically can get everything you want. We are morning person so we are very happy with the rooster (except it doesn't like camera very much and will run away if you take pictures). But if you're not that might be a trouble. There are also many kinds of different small wild animals and birds around and they are very friendly. There are also some harmless bugs, we don't really mind to get close to nature but it can be a problem with people who's afraid of bugs. The house is on the mountain so it will be cool at night so you can get a good sleep. You can also see the ocean right in front of the balcony. The room is big with fast speed internet and cables, you can get every cooking equipment you need. There is a moldy smell in one of the bedroom, it might due to the wood furniture since it basically rains every day here. Overall me and my family are very happy with this place.

We really enjoyed our visit in Kona Cottage.  It is in a great location resting on the hill high above the city center, making it easy to get into town to pick up supplies or to eat at nearby restaurants.   It's a lovely home and very tastefully decorated, and Sandy has done everything she can to make sure you'll have everything you'll need for a visit to this part of Hawaii.  It is a tranquil location, You will go to sleep to the calls of Coqui frogs and awake to crowing of feral roosters (of which Kona seems to have a lot of).   Just be aware that some of them can be early risers some times, so if you are a light sleeper,  you might want to pack a pair of ear plugs.
The house is beautifully situated, so you get the cool winds and beautiful views...its a short drive into Kona! It was very cosy and had all the amenities...highly recommend

The house is perfect. Located on a hillside in the midst of coffee plantations. Immersed in a tropical lime garden, passion fruit and avocado. The patio from which you can see the ocean is great for dining. We were fine.

Sandy's place was even better than the pictures suggest.  In a quaint, quiet spot with stunning views.  This home is well cared for with beautiful furnishings and comfortable and well equipped.  It was exactly what we hoped for for our last days in Kona and Hawaii.  Thank you and we hope to be back. I highly recommend it.  Mahalo Anthea
It is a cottage in a beautiful landscape. We needed about 10 Minutes to Kona with the car. The house is perfekt for four people. In the kitchen is everything you need. We had there a perfekt time.

The house is exactly as described, nice location, close to downtown Kona, the only annoying thing was the bird chirping noise at night and there were plenty of red ants, but that is expected in tropical places. Overall the view was amazimg from the house and we loved our stay and had a great time.

This is a terrific listing to stay at.  My Mom and I stayed together for five nights and the place was just perfect for our needs.  The check-in was easy, and our setup was top notch for getting around.  To stay here, a rental car is a virtual must, but once that is secured, everything is a relatively short drive away.  Very clean.  Clear, though slightly robotic communication.  Private and a bit away from the hustle and bustle.  Avocado and lime trees in the yard and chickens clucking up and down the hill.  Really, a very pleasant stay overall. Gets me and mom's stamps of approval.

The cottage is a great little oasis to stay at. I stayed here with a couple of friends for a girls trip and we loved the space. The kitchen has just about everything you need to make breakfast, lunch or dinner for people in long vacations. The foliage around the house and on the mountain is beautiful. Most of our time was spent out exploring the island or visiting local friends but we really enjoyed having a home to come back to and relax at.
빅아일랜등 숙소가 대부분 이러한지 잘 모르겠으나.. 숲속에 있는 느낌을 많이 받았습니다. 처음에는 좀 당황 했으나 시간이 지나니 닭들과 친해질 수 있었어요~^^
Great spot if you want to be close to the action but not in the middle of it. A very lush and peaceful retreat!
Awesome cottage....we enjoyed our stay!
It is a very clean and stylish house. We had stayed for 4 nights. It has beautiful location, near to snorkeling beaches, and perfect sunset view.

This was an awesome place to stay. Beautiful view. Very clean. Everything as described, but better. Thoughtful touches, such as a notebook for guests to leave comments of their experience. We locked ourselves out--when we called they responded promptly and helped us get back in. We left some prescription eye glasses at the Airbnb and she is mailing them to us. Overall, we were very pleased. Great host!
Nice house and convenient location.
Sandy’s place was a cozy and quiet retreat, up a big hill and pretty remote, but still just a short drive from the downtown area of Kona and the beach. We had a very peaceful stay!

Die Unterkunft ist auf dem Berg mit Überblick auf Kailua-Kona (ca. 15 min) Wir waren kaum im Haus, da die kleine Veranda einfach super gemütlich und schön war. Man fühlt sich wie im Urwald mit all den Geräuschen rings herum und all der Natur (Avocadobaum, Mangobaum, Zitronenbaum, ... und noch sonstiges, was wir nicht kannten) sehr sauber, top Ausstattung (auch Ausrüstung für den Strand), Waschmaschine, Trockner, Internet super,... wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und sind schweren Herzen weiter gefahren

This was fine for a couple of nights but we wouldn't have wanted to stay for an extended period. The ceilings are low, so if you're tall it feels a bit oppressive, and the kitchen is small and awkward. I was very relieved that there was spare cotton linen in the cupboard because the bedding was all polyester when we arrived. The lanai is a nice space and a good spot for coffee in the mornings. The location is good, easy access to cool places without being surrounded. If you go at this time of year (December) be prepared for the house to get cold at night.

Lovely, quaint little spot up in the hills. It's admittedly a little hard to find after dark (keep an eye out for a 25 MPH sign and a giraffe-printed pillar), but it's a great quiet refuge after a day out adventuring. It's a quick drive down to Magic Sands Beach Park, retail, and restaurants. Check-in was smooth, wifi was fast, water pressure was great! The kitchen is fully stocked, too, and we were able to cook some meals during our stay.
Very nice place in a nice location. Comfortable and very clean. Very remote and therefore you can hear roosters in the morning. This was pleasant for us. Very charming.

This is a very sweet cottage in a nice neighborhood.  Very clean with all necessary provisions and a good location along the west coast for venturing out north and south. Yes, there are roosters in the early morning, so if that bothers you bring earplugs. We'd stay there again, but would bring slippers as it was chilly at night.

highlight was a nice veranda in a well-maintained, natural garden. house was simple but clean and ready for our arrival. kitchen was well equipped. about 15 minutes from the center of Kona in an artistic town close to cloud forests. highly recommended.
Wonderful place!

If you're looking for a cute little, secluded home this place is perfect! It was the perfect size for us to stay here and work remotely on the beautiful deck. You NEED a car to stay here, or to take an Uber/Lyft anywhere. The roads are not safe for walking on really and its an hour plus walk down to the beach if you do walk. There's a really cute café nearby as well, about a five-ten minute walk which we loved. We didn't meet our hosts but they were responsive to our booking messages. Thank you for having us!
Nice.

Beautiful, quiet location!  You're just barely out of Kailua-Kona (convenient for restaurants, shopping, etc.), but Sandy and Rachelle's place is upslope, about 1400 feet above sea level so you get a great view (although partial) of the town and ocean from the lanai. The lanai offers fantastic afternoon seating with filtered sun, shaded by a lemon tree. (Have you tasted lemon straight from the tree?  These are almost sweet!) 
 
The cottage is very clean.  Sandy and Rachelle have also provided beach goodies such as boogie boards and a cooler.  

Directions provided to get to the cottage were spot on and easy.  Another beauty of this location is that you can avoid hitting huge delays coming back into town after your day's activities in the north.  The state is working on the main highway (19) and afternoon delays stretched for miles north of town.  If you take Kaiminani Dr (1st left south of the airport), it takes you up to Hwy 190 where you can navigate back to the cottage on a much more scenic drive, and in much less time.

You must stay here.

While my husband enjoyed browsing through the books in the house about the island, my daughter and I loved sitting outside taking in the view and the local sounds of nature. This little cottage offered what you need to enjoy the beach which is a short drive and come back to cook out, which we didn’t stay long enough to do unfortunately. It was comfortable for our family of 3.

저녁에 도착하여 내비게이션 안내대로 주소지를 갔으나 찾지 못하고, 주변의 주택에 주민들에게 두번이나 들려 문의를 한 뒤에 전화통화를 하여 겨우 찾아 갈 수가 있었다. 숙소 비밀번호도 몰라 숙소에 도착하여 다시 전화를 하였더니 관리인이 친절하게 와 주어서 문을 열고 들어 갈 수 있었다. 사전에 숙소를 찾아가는 길을 자세하게 안내를 해주었으면 좋겠다. 

숙소는 예상보다 깨끗하고 좋았다. 전망도 좋고...
다만 어렵게 찾은 하루밤만 자고 가기에는 너무 아쉬웠다.

Sandy's place is great. Beautiful location over looking the coast and town. Reasonable drive to the airport, town or beaches. Very clean and everything you need including beach supplies. Nice place to escape the rush and relax.
A wonderful home! We soaked in the location! Out of the crowds, surrounded by birds and lush vegetation. The local town is full of beautiful galleries, and has the best restaurant on the island!

We had a relaxing stay at Sandy's cottage - it is spacious for our family of four. The cottage is up on a hill and a little hard to get to/find particularly when we checked in at night - Sandy and Rachelle provided clear instructions/directions which helped. Like other previous guests, we enjoyed sitting in the lanai (outdoor lounge) where we had our breakfast while enjoying the view and surroundings - watching the birds that occasionally perched on the nearby tree and feeding the chickens with bread crumbs.
The kitchen is well equipped and we were pleasantly surprised to find bottles of spices and herbs in the fridge which we used to prepare our breakfast. There are also beach towels which come in handy when we went to the beach. There are also a washing machine and dryer with washing detergent in a shed behind the cottage.
I love this home! Especially the outside porch, the birds, flowers, garden, the view overlooking the ocean.  I wish I can live in this house forever!
Little tricky to find at night, but worth it. Spacious, clean and quiet location. I would definitely stay again
Great place to stay for a small family or a couple friends. Had everything we needed, mahalo!
Above Kona with views and wonderful sunsets.   Very cozy.  The lanai is really comfy and a perfect coffee spot or cocktail venue.

Wonderful spot high up the hill but close to town and beaches. The patio is very comfortable with a great territorial view. Enjoyed our stay at this lovely place.
The Holuakoa Cafe and Gardens is minutes away and a great spot for coffee and scone or a gourmet dinner.
Thank you for being so hospitable at the last minute. You really made our stay convenient and a joy! Hawai living at its authentic finest!
非常棒

This cute and truly unique (it is literally in the "fauna jungle"! bungalow gave us the much needed respite we were looking for; I would try & not go during the rainy season, we are sure that with sunshine the place would have been great...

You feel very much at home here. The deck is great for relaxing and the house is very neat and clean. I enjoyed been above town - a quieter experience and not a far drive from about needs you might have. I will book it again when on the island

Sandy's cottage is just what you need as an alternative to the tourist strip in Honolulu. Quiet, with great views, the cottage is very well-equipped, and the hosts are easy to contact and very responsive. We spend 4 days exploring the Big Island, from the volcanoes to Merriman's restaurant. We highly recommend Sandy's and the Big Island.

Sandy's house is gorgeous especially the garden ! It s very clean  and comfortable . My partner , my father and I stayed there for 4 days, we used the kitchen a lot . There are lots of amenities you can use for daily life.  Location is very good too . Highly recommend it
Great place. Porch is one of the highlights. Love how it's surrounded by foliage and even the roosters and birds were great to be around.

Sandy was a great host! Very cheery and nice! The house was well equipped for us! We had a great time using the beach items that were provided and they had plenty of towels, great kitchen equipment.
