The location was very central! I would suggest having a car+ you will want to have some adventures while you are in the Kona area!  We loved the cottage- was great for an unfussy group of travelers. Hope to back soon for a longer stay.   Ken and Molly

Nice, quiet home that is near enough to Kona to make everything really accessible. Good location if you want to avoid the cost and bustle around the main town area. The home was just a bit tricky to find but does show up accurately on (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps. The home is tidy, comfortable, and well appointed. The beds were a bit springy for my taste but I still slept well. Didn't have any major coqui or rooster noise issues during our brief stay. The washer/dryer behind the home are quite old and the dryer did not work for us. May have been user error but would have been nice to dry our towels. A good value in the area if you want tranquility and space.
I've great time in kona with ur house.
The house was very beautiful and clean. We had a wonderful time!
Gotta stay here a must tropical oasis away from kona town but with local old town feel.

This was a great place for my family. Awesome Hawaiian cottage in a hillside town overlooking Kona. Quite setting but close to all that Kona has to offer. This house was exactly what we were looking for our stay.

The cottage is located in a cosy village close to many art galleries that we really enjoyed. Is was perfect for us, two adults and a child. It has a new bathroom and elegant wooden furniture.
We really appreciated our stay and we recommend it for other families.

We stayed only one night at Sandy's place, escaping from Hurricane Lane and the east side of the Island. We endured about 3 feet of rain in 3 days, and fled after worrying we wouldn't make it to the airport for our flight out with all the flooding and mudslides. We were able to book the place that morning, arriving only a couple of hours later. So great, abd deeply appreciated!! Better for us than a hotel by a long shot as we like to cook our own healthy food. We found the place extremely clean, well organized, and well appointed with everything we needed. Its a sweet little place. Our only complaint, really, is that it is so small! Low ceilings, tight little kitchen and sitting room, and for a family of 4 with two tall teenagers it would have been too small to be comfortable for more than one night, at least for us - and especially on vacation, it would not have had enough stretching and relaxation room. But everything else was great!
Place was awesome. Great location.

Sandy's house was the perfect place for us.  Within walking distance to the little town that was full of art galleries mostly, a small food mart, and restaurant.
we were lucky to hit First Friday and the little town becomes a festival that fills with lots of people, musicians and food.
The house itself is immaculate, a newly remodeled bathroom that was spacious with plenty of counter space,  tastefully furnished rooms with the most comfortable beds.  The location is perfect for hanging out in the Kona area.  Fell in love with everything this Hawaiian bungalow had to offer....including the music of the Coqui frogs.

La casa non sarebbe male se non fosse per la forte umidità...è posizionato in una zona interna rispetto alla costa e immersa nel verde...
Nel complesso non siamo stati male ma sicuramente il proprietario dovrebbe intervenire per risolvere il problema dell’umidità che causa cattivo odore in casa...
Very comfortable and private.
Great stay at!

Love Sandy's place, wonderful setting and very clean.  We did hear the frogs but they actually had a soothing experience for me and I slept better than I have in a long time. I highly recommend staying here.
Sandy’s place was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. Loved the view down to the coastline and being near the small town of Holualoa.

Sandy was a great host and had a wonderful home! The location was great and the temperature was nice and cool, which is hard to come by in Kona. 
Definitely worth staying here
A beautiful property about 15 minutes from Kailua-Kona . There is a beautiful view of the coast.  Beds were comfortable and house was clean. A great place to stay!
Sehr sauber, gute Austattung, schickes Haus
Great place for our 1st night on the Big Island.
Highly recommend !Much better than i though!I had a amazing experience in this house!Really beautiful!10 out of 10 will be here again!
Very peaceful and nice place to stay! Cosy as well
Everything went off great. When I could not get the cable working, Rachel was nice enough to drop by and get it fixed. Highly recommend this place.

We loved this little cottage in Holualoa. It had everything we needed in the kitchen plus had a bunch of beach toys for use. It was at the perfect elevation with very comfortable temperatures. We were able to make fresh squeezed lemonade due to the huge lemon tree outside. Washer and dryer worked great and was able to do laundry with out a problem. Always had hot water for showers when we needed it. Roosters do crow in the morning but the local rooster next to this house does it maybe for max 15 seconds and to us was just part of the experience. We were used to it and it didn’t wake us up or bother us. There were beautiful sunsets from the lanai. Overall this was a great air bnb experience.

Really well situated. Terace is wonderful.  Kitchen is not so well equiped and could be cleaner. Host was really flexible and quick answering.  We borrowed a kid crib which was really helpful. Fruits and flowers around the house are nice and tasty!
Enjoyed Sandy's cute cottage for our four night stay in Kona

Kona Cottage was perfect for what we needed! It was cozy and in a great location. Easy walking distance to a small town with a great restaurant. The place was clean and the beds were comfortable. We enjoyed sitting out on the deck listening to the birds.  This is a great value as well! I highly recommend it!

We had a great stay at this place. Sandy and Rachelle were very responsive to my calls. The garden around the house is a bonus, we loved exploring the trees. There are lots of roosters so we got the natural alarm go off at 5 am, if you dont mind that, you will certainly enjoy the stay. One word of advise is that this place can be hard to find the first time, so if you are checking in, try and get there when there is some sunlight. Also the road is very steep, so if you are renting a sedan, you are guaranteed to have some scratches under the bumper no matter how slow you turn. We enjoyed our stay here and I will recommend it to others.
It was clean and conveniently located.

Fantstic location and very comfortable cottage with all the amenities. Bathroom countertop is beautiful, deck and view are wonderful. Super clean and has everything you would need! Excellent communication with host.

name: Wailea: Live the Spirit of Aloha
summary: A secure tranquil place to relax and enjoy!  Ground floor (no stairs) 2pools and BBQs available, free parking.  Fully equipped with new appliances.  The large lanai overlooks the ocean, islands, and sunset.  Surrounded by tropical flowers and palms.  Easy walk to Shops at Wailea and Wailea Gateway shops and restaurants.
space: Remodeled in 2015.  Fully air conditioned plus lots of screened windows for crossbreezees.  Great ocean and sunset views from the large lanai.  No steps or stairs from the parking area and throughout the condo.   Living area furnished with queen sofa bed, large tv, bluray player, leather recliner, dining for 4, breakfast bar and stools. New granite kitchen counters. New appliances, lots of cupboard space, ocean view from the sink. Lanais from bedroom and living room.  Comfortable table and chairs for enjoying morning coffee and watching the amazing Maui sunsets. Bedroom and living room with ceiling fans and dedicated air conditioners and openable jalousy windows.  Comfy king-size bed with plenty of closet space and alarm radio with charging dock.   Washer and dryer in condo for guest use.
description: A secure tranquil place to relax and enjoy!  Ground floor (no stairs) 2pools and BBQs available, free parking.  Fully equipped with new appliances.  The large lanai overlooks the ocean, islands, and sunset.  Surrounded by tropical flowers and palms.  Easy walk to Shops at Wailea and Wailea Gateway shops and restaurants. Remodeled in 2015.  Fully air conditioned plus lots of screened windows for crossbreezees.  Great ocean and sunset views from the large lanai.  No steps or stairs from the parking area and throughout the condo.   Living area furnished with queen sofa bed, large tv, bluray player, leather recliner, dining for 4, breakfast bar and stools. New granite kitchen counters. New appliances, lots of cupboard space, ocean view from the sink. Lanais from bedroom and living room.  Comfortable table and chairs for enjoying morning coffee and watching the amazing Maui sunsets. Bedroom and living room with ceiling fans and dedicated air conditioners and openable jalousy windows.  Comfy
neighborhood_overview: On the quiet south end beyond Kehei yet the city is only 10 minutes away.  Near luxury hotels, golf courses, and some of the best beaches on Maui.  The road ends in a natural lava park south of us.  A highly acclaimed Maui chef has a restaurant near us, with large open areas that overlook the ocean and a generous happy hour.
notes: Whale watching Fall through Winter make the west coast of Maui special.  City of Lahaina 30 minutes away.  Easy access to "turtle town" beach where snorkelers will always find turtles.
transit: Easy access to direct "highways" to Kehei, Kahului and airport, Mt. Haleakala, and Lahaina.
access: Two private pools, BBQ areas, and beautiful walking paths on property that lead to shopping area and beaches.  Near 3 golf courses, many outstanding restaurants and happy-hour bars.  Nearby Wailea and Makena beaches considered the best in Maui.
interaction: We are reachable by phone and we have relatives and friends nearby the condo to assist with any issues or info.
house_rules: Manage noise between 10pm and 8am.  No Smoking.  No pets.

host.host_about: Active retiree, lived in Germany 5 years, Spain for a month, hitchhiked around Europe for a year, taught English in Japan, worked for Habitat for Humanity for 4 years.  Always dreaming about the next place to visit.  Appreciate family, good wine and food, a good cup of coffee in the morning, good conversation.  Places can be interesting, people marvelous!  Married to Gail, my delightful partner and confidant.

reviews.comments:
A great space! The neighbourhood was peaceful and pleasant. Close to several beaches and near golf courses, and restaurants. The condo was clean, and comfortable. The pictures are accurate and the view is beautiful. We would highly recommend staying here.

Richard and Gail were helpful in outlining directions from the airport, and explained how to use the television, where to lock valuables, and how to access the pool. They answered questions promptly. Overall, they were great hosts!

Maui was great!  Wailea was great! The Condo was great! This season in Maui was very comfortable and the best for whale watching and touring.  

We especially appreciated the full kitchen and in-condo laundry facilities. The landscaping was lush and beautiful, as was the view from the lanai.

This was our favorite home stay on Maui so far.  The condo was perfectly located for our needs and within walking distance to my husbands conference at the Marriott.  The community felt safe, quiet, and removed from the hustle and bustle.  Having a washer and dryer was invaluable.  The kitchen had all the necessary things so that we could fix our meals 'at home'.  The bed was comfortable.  Having a cooler, beach umbrella, beach chairs, and 2 boogie boards available was a fantastic bonus.
Richard and Gail were available to answer questions both before and during our trip. 
TWO THUMBS UP!!  We'll be back.

Richard and Gail made our first experience to Hawaii very easy. They answered all our questions and provided us with many tips. The condo was very comfortable clean and all the appliances brand new. We were lucky enough to be the first users of the BBQ on our lanai which we used every night while we watched the sunset. The view was beautiful.

This place was fully and well equiped! The beach equipment was perfect for our day at the beach! We really enjoyed our stay there and the sunset view from the balcony is awesome! It was perfect for our trip!
Beautiful condo, convenient location, very clean and comfortable, would definitely return

Very comfortable and well-equipped condo in a quiet setting. While it isn't on the ocean, there are many lovely beaches within an easy and quick drive. And there is a view of the ocean from the lanai. The pools at the complex are very nice, and the landscaping is lovely. Richard and Gail were also very quick to respond to the couple of questions we had (some previous tenants had removed some informational paperwork). We definitely recommend this place.

This place is in a fairly quiet neighborhood. The environment is really nice and clean. A shopping mall, several restaurants and Kihei area are all within 3 min driving distance which makes the location very convenient.

The condo is beyond expectation. There are one bedroom with a really comfy bed and two separate bathrooms. The living room area is HUGE!! You can tell from the decent decorations and those detailed guide book placed on the table that the hosts here are very considerate ppl. Hot water is sufficient. Water pressure is great so taking a shower after beach surfing is really enjoyable.

Very comfortable condo, very "homey" and beautiful views. 

Lots of extras included as well. Boogie boards, chairs, towels, umbrellas, full kitchen too!

I recommend !

Great location in Wailea.  Clean & Neat & as advertized.  Very nice condo complex with pool.  Having 2nd full bath was great!  When having wine on Lanai there was a very nice view of the ocean.  Can walk to Wailea Tennis Club and to walking paths along the ocean.

Rich & Gail's place is clean and spacious with nice decorations. The lanai is a great touch to the place. We enjoyed the view of the garden and the sea in the distance from there. The unit is located in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood. A shopping center is a 5 minutes'  ride away. We drove to Wailea beach in 8 minutes. Walking there took about 30 minutes. We had a wonderful stay at this place. It is great for a family vacation.
This condo is everything you'll need for a great vacation: quiet, with a nice ocean sunset view, near restaurants and shops and the beach, and with plenty of amenities to make it very comfortable.

Rich and Gail's' place is truly a gem. We stayed for four nights and we were sad to leave. It had everything we needed and more! The cooler, chairs, and bogey boards were an added bonus. The bed was very comfortable. We also found the recliner and couch to be extremely comfortable. Will definitely stay here again if we return to the area.

It's a great location, great view, very quite, convenient shopping close by. The condo has everything you'll need including air conditioning, beach chairs, and other beach gear. The condo is very clean and organized. They have great recommendations book on fav beaches, restaurants and walks, which we used lots and found very helpful. This will be the first place we stay at when we come back!

Very nice place to stay.  They have really given it a lot of thought.  You can tell the owners care about their rental & provide more than expected when it comes to amenities.  I've never stayed in Wailea (Website hidden by Airbnb) a very beautiful part of the island and most of the beaches nearby are great for families.  Thanks for a lovely stay!

The location of the condo was fabulous! Close to everything in a very quiet subdivision. We enjoyed how spacious it was! Hosts a Rich and Gail were wonderful to deal with, would not hesitate staying here again.

The condo was clean and well-decorated. It was a perfect place to stay when attending a wedding at the Four Seasons resort nearby. We loved that the hosts provided recommendations for nearby restaurants and activities. Parking in the complex was also very convenient. Thank you for a great stay in Wailea!

Amazing accommodation with a fairly decent location.

Definitely recommend!
Great hosts, great beach gear, well equipt kitchen (except for the standar Airbnb blunt knives), a bit of a hike to the beach but still walkable if you bring minimal beach gear.
Lovely condo with all the details provided.

Rich and Gail offer a really great place that is equipped with everything that you could possible need (beach umbrella, seats, bodyboards) as well as being within a quick walk to the beach. Thoroughly enjoyed staying with them in their spacious place!

This is a lovely unit in a beautiful setting. Shops and restaurants are minutes away by car (or by foot for the more active). Communication with Rich and Gail was quick, easy, and informative.

The unit itself is well-stocked with higher-end appliances and utensils -- everything needed for a comfortable stay. The beach chairs, umbrella, and towels were greatly appreciated.

We weren't sure if the unit would be spacious enough for 4 adults and an infant, but Rich assured us it would be fine -- and he was right. There are 2 full bathrooms as well as a good queen-sized sofa bed. Everyone was comfortable. (Caveat: sofa bed is on the softer side, so larger people or those with back problems, take note). 

All in all, a great vacation in a lovely condo. I wouldn't hesitate to book with Rich and Gail again.

Very convenient place, the surroundings are beautiful and peaceful, best place to live in maui.
The condo is also well decorated, home like experience.

Highly recommend this stay and Rich and Gail were super kind, welcoming and responsive. We had a blast and this is only a few blocks away from a great restaurant called Monkeypod Kitchen (helps to make a reservation in advance). The location is great for getting around Maui and parking with the rental car was super easy. There's also a nice shopping center right nearby. Thanks again Rich and Gail!

This place is awesome, fully equipped with everything you might need and  with beautiful sunset views from lanai. Rich and Gail are very kind and responsive-they even let us check-out bit later, as our flight was in the evening, we definitely recommend them. It's such a lovely, safe and peaceful place close to the restaurants and the best beaches on the Maui.

It was a pleasure to stay at Rich & Gail's. Check-in & check-out were smooth and easy. The location was fantastic, parking was always available, and there were several amenities we didn't expect: beach chairs, towels, umbrella, boogie boards, a VERY useful "around the area" guide that saved us a lot of time and guesswork when choosing beaches and restaurants. Additional perks: a king-size bed (which is necessary in the Hawaiin heat, when you don't want to be anywhere near your bedmate), remote-controlled fan, overhead light, and AC (sounds simple, but when your in bed early and exhausted from a long day at the beach, having a remote for these things is like a dream come true.). I highly recommend this location and Rich & Gail as hosts!

This is a comfortable condo in the very exclusive area of Wailea. It's within walking distance to several good restaurants & near some popular beaches. Having a washer & dryer & free & easy parking was nice. The pool at the condo is worth a visit. Check in was easy. Check out Monsoon India in nearby Kihei for some of the best Indian food you'll ever have & as well as Bluemoon Cafe for a good breakfast. We would stay here again.

Family of four  with two kids ages 4 and 6. Loved the condo - very clean and organized! The condo is on the ground floor so we didn't have to worry that our kids were stomping and disturbing ppl below us. We found the condo easily and were welcomed with a note and Hawaiian coffee package. We tried to eat on the lanai every chance we could get so we could enjoy the tropical garden view and a little view of the ocean. We watched the sunsets on the lanai and enjoyed the quiet atmosphere of Wailea Ekolu. The swimming pool is right around the corner and rarely had any people swimming. On the weekends there are more people at the pool. And I will say that this area seems like it has a lot of retired elderly - there were some elderly ladies who complained loudly about any family with kids who came to the pool. They even asked the kids to not swim near them. Fortunately we only saw them once during our week stay here. 
The downside is the location because you can't walk to the beach- or you could (20-25mins) but not with two kids, a cooler, and beach toys. BUT this gave us a chance to check out all the beaches (Makena, Maluaka, Onelu, and beaches in Kihei). I'm sure if we stayed close to one beach we wouldn't have visited all the different beaches. 
We are so happy we stayed here with such great owners who answered all our questions and made it feel like our second home. We would definitely book here again on our next trip! Mahalo!

This place is amazing and a great price for such a beautiful location in Wailea! It is close to everything in Wailea and Kihei is just a short drive away. The place is so peaceful and serene if that is what you are looking for. It has a very nice pool that is never too busy. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a relaxing place to unwind and that is near everything you would want to participate in on the island.
Great location, walking distance to major hotels in the area. Attention to details in unit.
We had a great stay!  Thank you ;)

A wonderful condo, comfortable and very well-equipped (e.g., washer & dryer, electric grill, etc.) with a nice view of the  Pacific from the lanai.  The location is great with easy access to fine beaches, shopping and restaurants along Wailea Alanui Drive.  The owners clearly thought to furnish their guests with the necessary amenities to make their stay memorable.

We love the Wailea area and this condo met all our needs for our stay. Check in was easy, the condo was clean and had everything we needed. We were able to walk down to the beach path easily and to the nearby shops and restaurants.
Beach chairs, umbrella, boogie boards etc were provided and on the occasions we went to the beach we did drive rather than carrying everything.
The area is very quiet and we enjoyed sitting on the lanai for breakfast in the mornings and again in the evening.
Would definitely stay here again.

Rich and Gail's place is lovely, comfortable, and clean. It's in a great location, within walking distance of Wailea Beach and several nice resorts, restaurants, and bars, and a short drive to the many beaches in Kihei and Makena. Gail was great about communication instructions on how to find the condo, how to check-in, etc. I would highly recommend renting with Gail and Rich!

Gail was accommodating with an early check in and very friendly. The space was perfect for my husband and I - spacious and very clean. We loved the location! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a vacation spot in Wailea.

Excellent experience! The space is very thoughtfully organized and equipped-the beach umbrellas and towels were so helpful to have on hand. The condo is both centrally located, with easy access to beaches and the Shops at Wailea, and nice and quiet. Having a washer and dryer in the condo was great too, and it was wonderful to be so close to the pool. And you can see the ocean from the lanai! It was exactly as described and we really enjoyed our stay-would definitely recommend as a place to stay in Maui.
Nice located very clean condo. Kitchen has all you need to prepare your breakfast or dinner; if you want to.

Cannot describe how beautiful and perfect this retreat was for me and my fiancé’s weeklong vacation. We had a wonderful trip and made so many memories. Very clean, gorgeous views, and perfect location for a sunny vacation filled with memories. Hope to visit again.
Absolutely amazing. Beautiful condo, GORGEOUS view, and within a mile from the beach, shopping, etc. Highly recommended.
Rich and Gail’s place was perfect for our Hawaiian getaway. Excellent value for the price. Everything you need! Fast responses and easy check in. Would definitely recommend again!
Excellent appliances, roomy lanai, gorgeous flowers and plantings near the condo and quiet.  Owners are super-responsive.

Great location
Quiet
Plenty of Space
Great Kitchen 
Comfortable bed
Will be back

We stayed for three weeks in this most comfortable and well situated condo. We did a lot of cooking and found the kitchen amenities fulfilled our needs. The ambience of the condo was enhanced by the themes of water wave and sand. I found my self looking at the pictures located throughout numerous times. The proximity of beaches, shopping and walking distance to these amenities fit our expectations. The bed was the the best we have ever slept on in a rental unit, which is a huge bonus on a holiday.  The relatively unused pool and serenity of ekolu was also very noticeable. The sound of birds, insects and plants is not masked by the sounds of our normal everyday life. It was delightful. The lanai was of course a highlight. It put us in the midst of sun, wind, cloud and rain, and connected us to the natural world that we often close out from our northern lives. We loved this place and commend Rich and Gail, very helpful and kind hosts.  It would be great to thank them in person as opposed to writing this review. We definitely lived the "spirit of Aloha". James and Ingrid
Amazing place!

A lovely, quiet, comfortable space close to beaches, shopping, restaurants - everything one needs! We enjoyed the fully equipped kitchen, and walking down the hill to the Shops at Wailea for a good coffee and wishful browsing. Comfortable king bed, awakened by birdsong. Also too easy to doze off on the remote-controlled cushy leather recliner!
What an amazing place! Great location. Beautiful views and walkable to everything. Couldn’t ask for a better vacation. My husband and I will be returning.

The condo was very comfortable with amenities for cooking such as salt, pepper, olive oil and pam. The beach chairs and boogey boards were great. And the king sized bed was very comfortable. Gail answered our questions promptly and had a binder of some helpful tips in the condo.

Comfortable condo in a beautiful location. Only minutes from several nice beaches. Full kitchen with everything you’ll need. Washer and dryer allow for lighter packing. Condo has beach umbrella and chairs.

Exactly like the pictures. Private beautiful location, very close drive to some of the best beaches in area. Communication with host was excellent. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you Rich and Gail!
Rich and Gail's place was lovely.  I really hate to give a fabulous review because we want the place all to ourselves...but it was perfect it many ways!

Perfect home away from home. N
Spacious. Clean. Quick walk to beach. 

Perfect location for those looking for an area away from hustle and bustle but close by neighboring towns. Great location on the island in a wonderful neighborhood. Would highly recommend to future visitors. !
A lovely place that was lovely and clean. Had everything we needed. Great pool onsite that was a lovely temperature. Thanks for a great stay.
This is a fantastic condo with beautiful views and wonderful amenities.  Very clean and wonderful location.  You won’t be disappointed!!

Quiet location that requires a car if you plan to explore. All the necessary amenities and then some. Grocery store and a Starbucks roughly 5 miles away and there are some other boutique/higher end shopping closer. Beach is down from the condo  . . Walkable for people who are fit but if not or you want to pack things to the beach best to have a car. 
All in all nice stay. Aside from lunch when we first arrived we bought groceries ($114) and cooked all meals and brought food to beach daily so we didn't have to spend on food while out. 

If you use the beach chairs or other amenities be sure to clean them so the next guest can use them... There was lots of sand left over on the chairs and find etc from the guests who stayed before us. We used the chairs and beach umbrella at beach because by mid day the sun was intense.

Have fun
Sehr schön und modern ausgestatette Wohnung.  Super sauber und neuwertig. Tolle Ausstatung. Sehr empefehlenswert.

Nice, clean and conveniently located to shops and restaurants. Place was easy to find and quiet. The beach items (boogie board, chairs and umbrella) were a great item, we had fun at the beach! There were four of us (two adults and two children) and the place was spacious for the four of us. We really enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful condo with all the amenities you will need. Very clean. Ocean view from patio.
在大大的阳台上可以看见大海,欣赏日落wa晚霞,amazing!所有的海边用具全,ti n停车方便!

Rich and Gail provide a clean, stylish, and comfortable condo with all the amenities.  Great location: sea view from balcony, close to lovely beaches, and a short drive or walk to shops and restaurants.  Communication with the hosts was efficient and helpful.  Thoroughly recommend.
The photos are 100% accurate. Spectacular condo in a great location. This booking exceeded our expectations!

Rich & Gail's place is nicely located in the well manicured neighborhood of Wailea. We thoroughly enjoyed having a well-appointed one bedroom apartment for our family of 3 (including our 2 year old). We took advantage of all the amenities (wifi, kitchen with oven/stove/microwave/fridge/dishwasher, washer/dryer). We were a 5 minute drive from Wailea Beach and a short stroll from the pool on property. Rich and Gail were always quick to respond as we coordinated our arrival. They were everything you hope for in airbnb hosts.

I would highly recommend staying here! Great location, great hosts, and a great price.

Highlights: 
Letting me in an hour early so I didn't have to drive around killing time.
A little welcome note on the table.
Snorkel gear, boogie boards, towels and chairs to borrow.
Great view for sunrises/sunsets.
Great condo with an excellent location and space. Clean and has plenty of room. We would stay here again

Rich and Gail’s place is a really great place to base yourself while enjoying Maui. Close to everything you’ll want - beautiful beaches, restaurants etc. We really couldn’t have asked for anything more. Thanks so much - we hope to be back!
Love the lanai for breakfast!  A nice spot a bit removed from the crazy mega hotels on the beach. I would stay here again!
The condo was very clean and comfortable.
Fantastic place to stay - would highly recommend to anyone.
Fantastic experience at Rich and Gail’s place. This was the perfect alternative to a hotel stay in Wailea and truly provided us a home away from home.

This condo is private and peaceful. The view was way more spectacular than I expected! The beachy decor is really charming and replete with a lot of thoughtful detail. Amenities included unexpected items like aloe for sunburns and beach umbrellas along with the usual boogie boards, chairs, etc. This place really had everything. All I had to do was put food in the fridge and I was all set!

I would say the most outstanding feature of this condo is its privacy and quiet. Even though it’s on the ground floor, the lanai feels like you are above the street because of the way the property is laid out.  I was in town for a family reunion and this condo gave me a serene place to get away from my loud crazy family. ;-)

Great location just outside Kihei. We prefer this area, but it just depends on what you are looking for. Great view and has everything you need. The hosts were great communicators and the place is very clean. We will stay here again!!!

Rich and Gail’s suite is in a brilliant location with lots of thoughtful touches and marvelously soft towels.  Gail was quick to respond to questions and provide answers as they came up.   A couple of minor issues that came up were dealt with in an appreciable manner.   Great view of the sunset off the lanai or head to Monkeypod if you want more of a public celebration.

Rich & Gail's place is great. The location is convenient to beaches, shopping in Wailea and to all the outdoor activities we enjoy. The kitchen is well equipped and there is lots of things to take to the beach including umbrellas, a beach chair, boogie boards, etc. We had a fabulous time.
Fantastic place to stay. Inside of Condo very nicely decorated. Very peaceful complex and very well cared for. Top notch place to stay!
You can count on them being highly responsive to any issue.

Great place to stay in wailea. Convenient for walking and all the activities that being in south Maui offer. The view garden and pool were the backdrop to many great experiences and memories. The condo is somewhat dated but very fresh in color and decor which highlighted the theme of wave water and sand. For those who love to cook and host, the kitchen was quite adequate with dishes, appliances and cookware. We would love to stay again.
